name: Apartamento frente ao mar na Barra
summary: Apto com vista  maravilhosa para o mar. arejado,  2 quartos (1 ,ampla sala, mobiliado, ar cond., copa-cozinha equipada,dependencias empregada.Condomínio fechado com piscina, quadra de esportes e play,1 vaga coberta,estacionamento e segurança. Ótima localização, serviços e restaurantes. Vá a pé para a praia!!!!!!
description: Apto com vista  maravilhosa para o mar. arejado,  2 quartos (1 ,ampla sala, mobiliado, ar cond., copa-cozinha equipada,dependencias empregada.Condomínio fechado com piscina, quadra de esportes e play,1 vaga coberta,estacionamento e segurança. Ótima localização, serviços e restaurantes. Vá a pé para a praia!!!!!! Há transporte público e estacionamento no edifício.
transit: Há transporte público e estacionamento no edifício.
house_rules: Por favor , desligue o ar condicionado e as luzes ao (URL HIDDEN) as janelas e retire o lixo do apto.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Sou carioca, moro na Barra da Tijuca, adoro viver em frente ao mar, por isso escolhi morar aqui. 
Gosto muito de viajar e conhecer novas pessoas e culturas.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Ótima localização !!! E uma bela vista.

Fui muito bem recebido.
O apartamento possui uma vista maravilhosa, ótima localização.

Pasamos unos días increíbles en el departamento de Ángela. Nos esperó, nos explicó lo necesario y estuvo atenta a nuestras preguntas. La ubicación es inmejorable. El departamento inmaculado. Preciosos los placards. La vista. Lo único malo es que tuvimos un poco de calor   Mil gracias Angela. Volveremos

name: Brooklyn Loft Studio, One Subway from Manhattan
summary: My place is situated next to Brooklyn Navy Yard, and between Dumbo and Fort Greene.  My apartment feels like a treehouse cabin a million miles from the noise of the city, but in fact is only one subway station from Downtown Manhattan, where you'll likely spend most of your time.  There's a park on the doorstep, and nestles in a cute and quiet little neighborhood.  My place is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
description: My place is situated next to Brooklyn Navy Yard, and between Dumbo and Fort Greene.  My apartment feels like a treehouse cabin a million miles from the noise of the city, but in fact is only one subway station from Downtown Manhattan, where you'll likely spend most of your time.  There's a park on the doorstep, and nestles in a cute and quiet little neighborhood.  My place is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

host.host_about:
Scottish guy living in Brooklyn.  Beautiful apartment, located park-side (with an outdoor swimming pool mid-summer) conveniently just across the Manhattan Bridge by the Navy Yard.  Easy to get to the city, and around Brooklyn.  Citibikes all around, and subways a short stroll away.

I sublet my apartment when I head back home to Scotland, or other destinations...

reviews.comments: It was great to stay at Douglas's place for several days - everything was in great condition and spotless. Very accommodating as well as cozy. Conveniently located to nearby subways with one stop to Manhattan. I highly recommend staying here!!
The host canceled this reservation 51 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great place to stay in Brooklyn, Douglas was quick to respond to any questions we had and the proximity to the 2 3 and F train make it so easy to get to and from anywhere in Manhattan. Everything we needed to have a great trip was there. Would definitely recommend this place. Great first experience on airbnb renting from Douglas.

My boyfriend and I stayed in Doug's aptmt for about 2 weeks while we were transitioning between aptmts. We had a great experience! It's conveniently located between so many fun Brooklyn neighborhoods. You can easily walk to Dumbo, Brklyn Heights, Vinegar Hill, etc. and you can be to multiple subway stations within 15 mins and there are at least two bus lines right by the house. We took these to Manhattan, the beach, and several other neighborhoods! There's a large park across the street from the apartment with a free public pool, playgrounds, etc. So we give it an A for location based on accessibility.

The apartment itself is lovely. It's on the top floor, but it's just up two sets of stairs (the outside ones and one flight inside). It was quiet and the perfect amount of space for two of us. The kitchen is equipped for cooking. Very nicely decorated, clean and charming. The key situation was easy. Doug was very responsive and helpful.

Release em English and Portuguese!

The studio is super cozy in the best way of the word!
Seriously! It looks like a movie set, with lots of details in decoration that bring you good memories about old and nostalgic movies. In addition, there is a well-equipped and structured kitchen and a super comfortable bed that you won't want getting out of it. It's great to go back there after a full day walking around the city and enjoy all the comfort that the apartment can provide. An excellent choice for my first visit to New York! 

O estúdio é super aconchegante no melhor sentido da palavra!
Sério, parece um cenário de filme, com vários detalhes na decoração que te remete a vários filmes e memórias antigas. Além de uma cozinha super bem equipada e estruturada é uma cama super confortável que não dá vontade de sair dela. É muito bom voltar para lá depois de um dia inteiro andando pela cidade e aproveitar todo o conforto que o apartamento pode proporcionar. Uma excelente escolha para minha primeira visita a Nova York!

Dude, this place is awesome! 

We came in from LA as a media crew as we were shooting a couple videos out in NYC, and everyone loved it the second we walked through the door, this place was awesome! Spacious, comfortable, and super chill, not to mention Douglas was amazingly accommodating!

Totally recommend it! I definitely plan on staying here again the next time I'm in town!

Stayed in Doug's place for 3 weeks and loved it. He is a fantastic host who was there to greet us and show us around his really cool loft space (it's all one room so perfect for couples or the solo traveler). The kitchen is very well equipped if you're one who enjoys cooking. Doug was kind enough to create plenty of storage for us, there's also an area outside his apartment where you can store suitcases and such too (it's perfectly secure as Doug has the entire top floor of the building). His neighbors are great and there for you if you need any help. The location is perfect if you're one who enjoys walking (as you're close to DUMBO, Vinegar Hill, Clinton Hill and Fort Greene). The subway is a 10-15 minute walk and you're one stop away from the Lower East Side. Highly recommend popping into Brooklyn Coffee Roasters on Washington & Flushing to pick up some coffee. Highly recommend staying here for your New York adventures.

We really enjoyed the stay in Douglas apartment. It's beautiful, clean, comfortable, unique and well located to manhattan. Everything we needed was there - as specially he got us some beer at the arriving night. 
It was a pleasure! We definitely recommend this place!!!! 
Douglas - we would love to come back soon. :)

El apartamento es muy bonito, está cuidado, tiene de todo y es perfecto de tamaño para 2 personas. El único "pero" que le pondría es la localización, está a unos 15minutos andando de las estaciones de metro y la zona donde se encuentra no es de especial interés así que parece que quede un poco a desmano de todo. A pesar de eso, el apartamento está muy bien.
Apartment is great. Thanks for a great stay mate.

The place is exactly as described, very homey, pleasant and comfortable. 
We arrived late at night, Doug left us a key, and it was very easy to find our way around as Doug left sticky notes all over the place with instructions which was very sweet and practical...! The communication with Doug was as well very pleasant mostly by emails which he replied immediately with any question we have had. 
The area is very cool, some walking distance great coffees and restaurants as well as very good public transport to anywhere in Brooklyn or Manhattan. As we stayed for 3 weeks, for us it was perfect!!

Doug is a great host! His place is just as described online, and in the pictures. Communication was very easy and straightforward and he had good tips and suggestions for my three month stay in town. He left me some good materials (maps, guides on what is happening in NYC, etc.), and the fridge had the necessary to have breakfast for a couple of days -which was great, specially because my arrival was around 2am. Checking in and out was pretty simple. And, I got to meet Doug a couple of times, which is always a plus when airbnb-ing. Siria (my dog) and I felt very welcomed and we made Doug´s home our home for 3 months. I definitely recommend Dougs´s place to anyone travelling to NYC, whether it is short term or long term. He is the greatest host!

name: Posto 4 em Copacabana
space: Alugo confortável quarto, banheiro social completo com Box e banho, lavatório, banheira e vaso sanitário. Ofereço roupas de cama e banho. O apartamento é lindo, claro, confortável e tranquilo, tem sala , 2 quartos, banheiro social, Frente, 9º (website hidden) internet e TV a cabo! Prédio super seguro com porteiros 24 horas, localizado a uma pequena quadra da praia de Copacabana com fácil acesso para toda a cidade. Próximo dos melhores restaurantes, churrascarias, bares, supermercados e outras atrações. Região com fácil transporte para toda a cidade.  Nas proximidades você encontra tudo que precisa para uma estadia tranquila. Ficar em Copacabana é uma das formas mais práticas e confortáveis de se conhecer o Rio de Janeiro e, Copacabana está entre os lugares do Brasil mais conhecidos! house_rules: Não pode trazer ninguem ao apartamento.(em hipótese alguma) You can not bring anyone to the apartment(on no account) Has the names of the guests in the lobby of the building

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Gosto do verão, do sol, de ir a praia de passear e saborear a beleza da nossa natureza...
Gosto dos meus amigos a minha volta...
Adoro cozinhar nos finais de semana, ficar na internet e ver filmes.
Sou uma otima anfitriã, amo viajar e fazer novas amizades. 
O mais importante é ser feliz sempre.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Ane was a lovely host, her place is one street from the beach and close to everything. The room is very large and spacious. Also a maid comes everyday during the week to clean and make breakfast, she is very sweet and makes great breakfast! I had a nice time and totally recommend.

Ane is a wonderful host, gave me many tips on tours and information about the bus. She cares about the guests, her apartment is very cute and cozy. Dona Graça prepared us a delicious breakfast ...The apartment is very well located, the beach of Copacabana is located in the backyard. I went out at night without any problem because the place is super secure, a lot of policing, quiet, and has taxi all the time, and several types of locomotion for all places of Rio de Janeiro, a few blocks to the subway, and has several bakeries, cafes and restaurants that are open late. I've been to Rio several times before but this time my stay was the best. I recommend Ane's apartment!

Minha estadia no apartamento de Marina foi excelente. Ela é uma anfitriã amiga. Quando vc chega a casa tem um cheiro delicioso de limpeza. O café da manhã foi maravilhoso. O quarto é grande, a cama é ótima, dormi como um passarinho, não tem barulho. Ótimo acesso a todos lugares. Perto de centros comerciais, restaurantes, meia quadra da praia de Copacabana. Os porteiros do prédio são queridos. Enfim, um dos melhores lugares em que fui recebido.

Ane is a wonderful host. She went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed and comfortable. We were late to arrive for about 5 hours and she didn't make a slightest problem out of it - we were met with the warmest smile. The apartment is simple, cosy and in the perfect location. We felt safe in the neighborhood. Copacabana beach is just a block away. Plenty of restaurants, bars, coffee places and shops around. Metro is a few blocks away. 
Every morning we were treated with delicious breakfast - coffee, fresh fruits, omelet, breads. 
Don't be discouraged that Ane doesn't speak a lot of English.  I was hesitant to contact her at first and wasn't sure how this will work. But we didn't have any problem communicating with a help of Translate App since Wi-fi in the apartment works very well. Ane helped us out with directions, recommendations, bus routes, etc.
I would definitely stay again in her place and would recommend it to others.

Ane Marina é uma ótima anfitriã e o apartamento esta super bem situado, pena que passei pouco tempo la! Recomendo de qualquer forma.

Nice and friendly hostess with a well situated apartment. A pity that i've just spent so short time there! Recommended for short or long stays!

Ane's place is the best location if you want to stay in Copacabana. It is one block from the beach and one block from the main street of shopping, restaurants, etc. It is not too far north or south. 
For me the best feature was the safety. The condo is on a relatively quiet stretch of many condominiums, all with doormen/guards and gate access. 
The apartment is nicely decorated and comfortable. The first night I was there I was feeling sick and stayed in to read in her comfortable living room and it was divine! Christine (spelling?) her house assistant, was very sweet and served breakfast each morning.
Ane is a laid back host and available to help with anything.

Sem críticas negativas à Ane e seu apartamento. A simpatia e proatividade são características da anfitriã, sempre dando informações que precisamos sobre a cidade. O apartamento é super bem localizado, em uma rua segura, perto de restaurantes, bares, e a uma quadra da praia. O quarto é arrumado, bem cuidado, sem barulho e temos total privacidade quando hospedados. O chuveiro, com resistência queimada, foi arrumado de prontidão para nosso conforto. Simpatia da secretária da Ane também cativa, além de seus maravilhosos cafés-da-manhã. Espero voltar em breve!
Todo muy correcto. Necesitaba de urgencia un cuarto para mi hermano que se encontraba en la ciudad. Y Ane me respondió y acepto rápido! Mi hermano estuvo muy conforme con el lugar.

I had a really great stay at Ane Marina's. The apartment has a great feel to it and I felt very much a welcome guest and at ease. Would definitely recommend staying here. Christina the house keeper was lovely. Both Ane and Chris were perfect host. Excellent  location.

Ane's apartment is in an excellent location, just one block from the beach in Copacabana.  Everything was as promised: a clean, simple room in a lovely apartment.  Ane was very responsive to my questions before my arrival and she was a pleasant and accommodating host.  She made her kitchen, dishes, and coffee maker available for us to use, which was a nice bonus.  I would recommend Ane as a host.

Ane es una anfitriona increible, desde que llegamos tenia todo listo para facilitar la estadia y siempre estubo pendiente de cualquier cosa que necesitamos. 
El apartamento es pequeño pero esta bien decorado y es limpio (La habitación es como aparece en la foto). La ubicación a una cuadra de la playa de Copacabana es perfecta. Conoci gente que tenia que tomar 40 minutos de metro para ir a la playa :S ... Hay una estación de metro a 3 cuadras que facilita el desplazamiento por la ciudad si uno desea ir a otra zona. Seguramente volveria a quedarme en otra ocasión.

We planned on staying at Ane's apartment for 3 nights. However, we ended up staying for 5 nights because we liked it that much. Ane's apartment is located just one block from Copacabana beach. The apartment is very nice, comfy and clean. Since Ane was out of town we had the whole apartment to ourself. 
If you are looking for a great room at a perfect location, this is a perfect choice!
The reservation was canceled 54 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a wonderful 5 nights stay ( although we booked it for 3 nights first but it was so nice so we decided to stat more) with Ane! Room was clean and comfortable for two of us, we had our own bathroom which was very nice and clean as well. I can highly recommend this place to all visitors of Rio! Location is also great, fee minutes to the beach and street is full of bars. 
Thank you Ane and your family for a great stay!

Foi minha primeira experiência aqui pelo site e simplesmente adorei! O apartamento da ane é muito bem localizado, próximo a parada de ônibus, supermercados, restaurantes. Lanchonetes e do ladinho da praia!
A Ane nos deixou super a vontade com total privacidade! Gostei muito!

A hospedagem no apartamento da Ane foi muito boa, pois o quarto e demais acomodações são exatamente como anunciado. Ane é super simpática e atenciosa, deixando a gente à vontade e prestando todos os esclarecimentos e apoios necessários ao nosso bem estar.
A localização do apartamento é excelente, não só por ser em Copacabana,  mas, também, por ser seguro, tranquilo e perto de tudo que se (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, não só recomendo para todos, como voltarei a me hospedar lá quando voltar ao Rio.

Foi a minha primeira experiência com o AirBnB e, superou as minhas expectativas. Anfitriã disponível, muito atenciosa e educada. Alguns dias até precisei chegar de madrugada. O quarto estava limpo, organizado e bem decorado. Recomendo e voltaria novamente.

Me hospedar na casa da Ane foi uma experiência nova, e muito boa! 
Ela nos deu toda atenção que precisávamos e ao mesmo tempo nos deixou totalmente a vontade na sua casa, com toda liberdade de entrar e sair a qualquer hora, nos deixando bem à vontade! Seu apartamento é bem aconchegante, e tem tudo que precisamos bem perto, além disso fica a alguns metros do calçadão de Copacabana e da praia!

Ane was a wonderful host. The apartment had all the amenities mentioned on the website. It was just one block away from Copacabana beach and two blocks away from the nearest subway. The apartment was very clean and the room was very well maintained. One could use the kitchen and living room as well if desire. Ane gave me a spare key to her apartment so it became very convenient to hang around the places with worrying about the time. One could have total privacy without any disturbance whatsoever and Ane took a good care of that. She also provided me with tourist guide which had all the details of the places to visit in Rio along with the best way to explore each one of them. I would definitely recommend Ane's place to someone on a tight budget looking to stay near the lively copacabana beach and enjoy the beauty of the city.

Ane m'a très bien reçu. Elle s'est renseigné sur mon heure d'arrivé de l'aéroport et m'a attendu pour me donner la clef. Elle est hospitalière, très discrète et aimable.
La chambre est très grande et bien meublé, comme elle a été présenté.
Ane habite dans un immeuble luxeu avec gardien à côté de la mère, dans le merveilleux cartier Copacabana, un de plus beau cartier de Rio.

Foi minha primeira experiência com o Aibnb, e não poderia ter feito escolha melhor. Ane nos deixou muito à vontade e é super simpática. O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos, muito aconchegante e muito bem localizado, perto da praia e das principais ruas de Copacabana. Quando voltar ao Rio já tenho lugar certo para me hospedar.
Gostei muito da Ane e do seu apartamento que è perto da praia de copacabana e de tudo o que pode precisar, se vou voltar em Rio de Janeiro com certeza vou contatar novamente.

The location can't be beat, just on the back street of the main beach boulevard (Av. Atlantica), at posto 4, it is so convenient for beach, jogging, restaurants, bars and super markets. Can pretty much walk anywhere in Copacabana neighborhood from the place.
As other reviewers pointed out, the guest has a separate bathroom (not en-suite), so never had conflict using toilet or shower.
Ane allowed me to use the kitchen where I cooked my breakfast and some dinner during my stay. It's also very helpful that I could use the washer, otherwise I could've ran out of clothes in a few days due to either the heat or the rain.
There were two things to watch out: 1. The internet speed is slow, less than 1M I think. Can do web surfing and (Hidden by Airbnb) , but big download or video streaming is almost impossible. 2. The air con makes all kinds of noise, light sleepers need ear plugs for sure.

Realmente muito tranquilo e acolhedor o apartamento da Ane. Assim que cheguei fui muito bem recepcionado em um apartamento extremamente limpo, as toalhas estavam sob minha cama junto a um sabonete,um chuveiro excelente e ela prontamente cedeu uma chave do apartamento para me deixar ainda mais a vontade e poder fazer meus proprios horarios.
Apesar do pouco contato com Ane, ela foi sempre muito solicita e aberta as minhas necessidades.
Recomendo muito pela limpeza e localizacao, pois esta proximo a tudo.
Muito obrigado Ane pela confianca e por ter me proporcionado uma otima estada na cidade do Rio de Janeiro.

A estadia no apartamento da Ane foi fantástica. O local é exatamente igual às fotos, um quarto super confortável com televisão e ar condicionado. Banheiro também impecável e sem falar na localização perfeita. Além de todos atributos do apartamento, a Ane é uma anfitriã excelente, super amigável, flexível e tranquila. Recomendo e ficarei novamente.

Eu e meu namorado ficamos 3 noites na casa da Ane e foi nossa primeira experiência no Airbnb. Adoramos tudo! O lugar é exatamente como nas fotos, muito limpo e organizado, tanto o quarto quanto o banheiro. Super bem localizado, fica próximo de tudo, como bons restaurantes, padarias, confeitarias... Apesar do pouco contato com a Ane, ela sempre foi atenciosa e nos respondeu com (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendamos  o quarto e ficaremos novamente em uma próxima oportunidade!
Great Airbnb within one block of the beach! Large bedroom with comfortable bed, modern bathroom and kitchen facilities. Thanks for having us Ane.
Lindo departamento, ordenado,limpio, habitación cómoda y con mucha privacidad. El baño  bien decorado, limpio y muy cómodo. Lo mejor que esta a 5 minutos de la playa Copacabana caminando.

A Ane é um amor de pessoa e fez com que eu e minha amiga nos sentíssemos super a vontade desde o primeiro momento que entramos no apartamento. Ela até deixou a gente guardar algumas coisas para o café da manhã na geladeira, o que foi ótimo. 

A localização do apartamento é ótima, uma quadra da praia de Copacabana. O quarto é exatamente como nas fotos.

Boa localização, as fotos correspondem ao encontrado.
No pouco contato que tivemos mostrou-se amável.

Foi minha primeira experiência no Airbnb e foi muito positiva. A Ane nos deixou super a vontade, deixou as chaves do apartamento conosco e tivemos muita liberdade para ir e vir. O quarto era bom e tínhamos um banheiro exclusivo para o nosso uso. O apartamento tem excelente localização, fica perto da praia e de muitos locais bacanas. Recomendo!
The location is perfect, one block away from the Copacabana beach. Clean bathroom and room and quiet space.
A Ane foi excelente conosco, simpática e prestativa, nos deixando muito a vontade. A localização é muito boa, lugar tranquilo e a dois minutos a pé da praia. Espero voltar!

Foi a primeira vez que utilizei o AirBnb e adorei. O prédio tem portaria 24h, a localização é excelente, fica do lado da praia e perto de tudo. O quarto era bom e tínhamos um banheiro só para nós.
A Ane foi muito simpática, deu várias dicas de lugares e informações de como chegar nos locais e também nos deixou com as chaves do apartamento. Gostei muito e pretendo voltar.

Adorei o tempo que passei com Ane! Muito solicita, amiga, fui a trabalho respeitou meu tempo e a minha privacidade. Me ajudou muito e tivemos bons momentos juntas, pena que não tive mais tempo.  Obrigada querida eu recomendo. E vou voltar. Bjs.
Ane nos deixou bem confortável, com a liberdade de uma chave para entrarmos e sairmos quando necessário! Recomendo!

Minha estadia na casa da Ane foi muito boa, concordo com os comentários feito pelas outras pessoas. Não nos vimos muito, mas ela foi muito gentil e nos deixou super a vontade. O quarto é confortável, possui portaria 24h com funcionários simpáticos. O bairro é bem localizado, perto da praia, farmácias, restaurantes, metro e de bike é rapidinho para chegar a praia de Ipanema :) Adorei e recomendo.

Ane é uma moça maravilhosa mesmo!  Super hospitaleira. Eu já conhecia ela é por isso voltei assim que soube que ia viajar pro Rio. Ela nos deixou sempre à vontade e ajudou a gente em tudo! O apto super bem localizado e prédio seguro. Recomendo totalmente! 
Ganhei uma amiga no Rio! Obrigada Ane!

name: NEW APARTMENT OPORTO
summary: In a quiet area, near the Boavista square and close to bus and 5 minutes from the metro, enjoy the charm of Porto.  Lovely and bright, with lift. Recently renovated, you will find a cozy apartment.
space: The accommodation is situated in a quiet area. A supermarket and a cafe with wifi is just downstairs. Very nice place to take your time to visit Porto.
description: In a quiet area, near the Boavista square and close to bus and 5 minutes from the metro, enjoy the charm of Porto.  Lovely and bright, with lift. Recently renovated, you will find a cozy apartment. The accommodation is situated in a quiet area. A supermarket and a cafe with wifi is just downstairs. Very nice place to take your time to visit Porto. The kitchen is fully equipped. 2 bus stations just down the building. One to go to the sea, and the other can reach the place boavista 2 minutes. Metro 5 mins walk.
transit: 2 bus stations just down the building. One to go to the sea, and the other can reach the place boavista 2 minutes. Metro 5 mins walk.
access: The kitchen is fully equipped.
house_rules: Comportement respectueux. Eviter de laisser les clés sur la porte d'entrée, régulièrement elle se ferme avec les courants d'air.  Ne pas oublier de fermer la fenêtre de la chambre quand vous sortez.  Ne pas laisser sa vaisselle. Les frais de ménage s'applique pour le nettoyage des lieux et des draps fournis.  Pour les fumeurs, fumer de préférence dans la cuisine.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Appartement tout nouveau et très propre, situé juste en face d'un supermarché et pas loin du centre (5 euros en taxi du centre ville). L'environnement est calme et l'accès en transport en commun est facile. Nous y avons fait un bon séjour !

Logement  bien situé à proximité du métro et 10mm du quartier historique. 
Intérieur très confortable et agréable .Propreté irréprochable et calme assuré.
Clarence a aussi été très attentionnée et arrangeante tout au long de notre séjour.
Adresse que nous recommandons.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Porto, l'appartement était spacieux et fonctionnels. Le centre historique se trouve à 15min en métro. La chambre était un peu bruyante.

Appartement conforme à la description. Très agréable à vivre, style "ikea". Facile à trouver. Quartier tranquille, métro, bus à proximité pour atteindre le coeur de la ville et le bord de mer... Bien pratique...
La chambre donne sur la rue, et donc un peu bruyant en soirée. Grand salon clair et ensoleillé. 
Superbe séjour à Porto ! 
Le plus : la superette face à la résidence, ouverte tous les jours et qui ferme tard le soir.

appart tres fonctionnnel tres bien fourni. tout est neuf et propre.
Clarence n'était pas sur place mais Diana(une voisine) s'est occupée de tout et à été dispo bien que ne parlant pas un mot de français ou d'anglais . appartement situé a 5 min a pied du metro , et arret de bus au pied de l'immeuble.
Beautiful, cozy, full equipped apartment, clean and light. 20 min walking distance prom Porto center.

Appartement tres agreable car bien équipé et spacieu, style ikea. la proximité du métro et du bus permet de se rendre rapidement dans le centre ville et vers la plage. Par contre, nous sommes tombés sur  une semaine tres bruyante car il y a un immeuble en construction coté salon (avec marteau piqueur des 8h du matin) et la chambre coté rue l est aussi.
Enfin, nous sommes encore mal tombé car l appartement ne semblait pas avoir été préparé entre les dernieres personnes et nous. Nous ne sommes pas maniaques mais les serviettes quasi toutes dépliées avec deux encore humides, de nombreuses miettes au sol ds la cuisine, taches dans la salle de bain et surtout, le pire, linge de lit pas propre. Illogique quand en plus on paie obligatoirement un forfait ménage.
Conclusion, cet appartement a un fort potentiel mais j espere qu il ny aura pas de ratés pour vous

Clarence se mostró atenta y comunicativa desde el segundo en el que me interesé por su alojamiento en Oporto. Estupendo piso nuevo y con todas las comodidades y más que excelente relación calidad-precio. Para recomendar seguro. Mil gracias por todo, y saludos desde España.

It was a very pleasent experience. Clarence was very friendly and ready to help us before the arrive in Porto. In the day we arrived Filipa, who speaks portuguese, was waiting for in her appartment that is in the same building us and was very helpful too. The appartment was even better than we thought, because the room with the sofa bed is sepparate from the rest of the appartment, so it looks like two rooms. The place is very spacious, clean and well equipped. The location of the appartment is good too, not very far from the downtown and easy to get there by bus. The neighborhood is also good.  We recommend the appartment and Clarence too.

Nous avons noté de nombreux points négatifs concernant l'appartement. En effet, nous déplorons le fait que l'annonce ne reflète pas la réalité sur certains points. Gros chantier au pied de l'appartement dès 7h30 du matin (marteaux-piqueurs, camions...). Accueil très froid de la part de Diana, l'hôte n'étant pas disponible sur place (impression de la déranger). Aucun effort pour nous intégrer dans l'appartement (peu d'explications). Appartement très froid le soir, les deux radiateurs d'appoint ont provoqué des coupures de courant. Malgré avoir payé les frais de ménages nous avons eu de nombreuses surprises à notre arrivée: poignées et petites fenêtres cassées, produits périmés (lait ouvert) dans le frigo, vaisselle sale et j'en passe... Impression que l'appartement n'a pas été préparé entre les anciens locataires et nous. 
Les lits sont plus petits que dans la description. Chambre bruyante dans un quartier isolé. 

Cependant nous avons passé une très bonne semaine à Porto, le plus possible hors de l'appartement. Porto est une ville au patrimoine très attrayant et très festive. 
En espérant que ces quelques détails pourront être améliorés pour les prochains locataires, car cet appartement reste spacieux et bien équipé.

Je recommande cet appartement plutôt et spacieux et propre. Il est exactement comme sur les photos. Il y a une petite supérette juste en face. Et aussi un arrêt de bus. La station de taxis est une minute à pied. Le métro est plus loin (15 min à pied).l'hôte est très réactive et répond rapidement aux messages. Un logement conseillé pour visiter Porto. Bon voyage!!!

Mes amis et moi avons été agréablement surpris par l'appartement, beau, spacieux, lumineux, bien équipé et bien placé si l'on considère les 10-15 minutes à pieds vers le centre ville comme une ballade.

Clarence n'était pas sur place et c'est une dame ne parlant pas français mais très sympathique qui nous a accueilli.

Nous avons tous adoré Porto qui est une ville magnifique et l'appartement a véritablement été un point fort pendant le séjour.

Great place - neat, in a fairly quiet neighborhood. A supermarket just in the front and a 15-20 minute public transport ride to the historical center of Porto. Parking spot was always available for free just in front of the building (on a safe street).
We didn't get to meet Clarence, but all went smoothly communicating over Airbnb and through her neighbor, who handed us the keys. I recommend this place especially if you are coming to Porto by car.

The listing description is accurate & the apartment is very nice. The area is quiet and pretty close to the subway station. Even though we didn't meet the host (instead, we met someone who manages her apartment), we talked via e-mail and everything was ok.

Nice and spacious apartment. 5 min by car from praça da liberdade.
Excellent value for money

Appartement suffisamment  spacieux pour 4personnes, très propre et bien agencé. Nous avions une voiture que nous avons utilisé pour nous rendre dans le centre.
Je recommande cet appartement pour un séjour de 2 jours  à 1semaine.
L ' échange des clefs s ' est fait sans pb.

This apartment was a perfect base for our two days exploring Porto.
We came by car and found free parking space all around. The neighbourhood  is safe, apartment is on one of the main streets.
It took us 20 minutes walk to main square, with bus stop right next to the apartment building.
The apartment itself is fully equiped, very spacious and bright, and everything was clean.
Un super appartement à un tarif très correct. Le contact est facile avec Clarence. Je vous conseil ce logement pour un petit séjour sur la belle ville de Porto.

Logement qui correspond aux photos, spacieux et propre ! Le salon est certes bruyant en journée (travaux à côté mentionné dans un autre commentaire) mais de la chambre ça allait.
Clarence n'était pas là (une voisine nous a accueillies) mais est très réactive par messages et compréhensive.

beau logement fonctionnel dans un immeuble récent, pas de wifi et un peu bruyant sur le boulevard.
attention appartement excentré et les transports en commun se font attendre au mois d'Août

Apartamento muito acolhedor, espaçoso e muito limpo. Foi disponibilizado tudo o que era necessário para uma óptima estadia.
Bem localizado, +/- 10min a pé da estação de metro (Carolina Michaelis).
Uma experiência a repetir.

We had a nice time in Porto! The flat was nice, big, clean and cozy. Everything you need for your stay is there. Metro and bus station are nearby and you can reach the old town within few minutes. Thanks for having us, we enjoyed it a lot :)

We stayed in a really nice apartment in Oporto. You had everything what you need and it was very clean. The city centre wasn't far away. All in all we had a great time and can recommend this accommodation! :)
El piso es tal y como se ve en las fotos. Esta muy bien, muy cómodo limpio y en una zona muy tranquila cerca del metro y del bus.

The flat is very nice and completely equipped! It's closer at the Casa da musica metro, but I prefer walk, so the centre of town is near at the apartment. Clarence is very kind and helpful for everything! I'm sure I come back here! Thanks!

Strongly recommended. We spent a few days in Porto and this apartment was perfect for our stay: clean, nice and spacious, with everything you would need, in a quiet area and close to the city center (you can walk, but there is also public transport close to the apt.). Clarence has been very communicative and helpful providing us plenty of information about places to visit in Porto, where to park, etc.  
We would definitely come back to Porto and to Clarence's apartment. 
Thank you for all, Clarence!

L'appartement de Clarence est propre, lumineux, spacieux et très bien équipé mais un petit peu bruyant. Prévoir environ 40 minutes à pied pour rejoindre le centre historique. Je n'ai pas rencontré Clarence mais si vous avez besoin de conseils, elle vous en donnera avec plaisir. Je recommande !

Super séjour à Porto chez Clarence : nous avons été bien accueillies, et Clarence a été très disponible pour répondre à nos questions par mail.
L'appartement est grand, lumineux, très propre et bien équipé. Compte tenu de la météo pluvieuse, nous avons bien apprécié les couettes et les radiateurs ! 
Petit détail très pratique : il y a un supermarché juste en face de l'immeuble.

Nous avons passez un séjour très agréable. L'appartement est spacieux, bien équipé et situé à quelques minutes à pied du métro. Mais le coeur historique de Porto peut tout à fait être rejoint à pied également (environ 25 mn). La présence d'un supermarché et d'un arrêt de bus en bas de l'immeuble sont un plus. Bien que Clarence était absente lors de notre séjour, elle a été joignable et très réactive pour répondre à nos questions. Je recommande!

Clarence's apartment was large ,clean, well equipped,  and modern (IKEA). A quiet neighborhood with access to public transportation.  The metro -Marques- is quite a distance so consider driving and parking nearby. Free parking at the apt was great.
Porto is a must see city
Apartamento muy acogedor con todo lo que necesitamos, barrio muy tranquilo no muy alejado del centro y con la ventaja de un supermercado justo enfrente. La estancia fue muy agradable

Superbe appartement, très bien placé! 
Un supermarché juste devant, la banque au coin de la rue et arrêt de bus et de métro à proximité! 
Un super séjour dans cet appartement très lumineux et agréable à vivre! 
Merci à Clarence pour cette semaine et aussi pour ses bons conseils! 
La ville de Porto est géniale

A casa tem uma área muito boa para 4 pessoas, bem conservada com uma pequena mas catita varanda. Tem todas as comodidades de um bom hotel com roupa de cama, toalhas, produtos de banho ☺ experiência a repetir

Appartement très agréable, spacieux et propre. Idéalement situé des transports en commun. Un peu loin pour faire plusieurs jours à pied (ou il faut de bonnes jambes).
Supermarché juste en face, le top.

Clarence's apartment was larger than we were expecting and had everything we needed. The supermarket across the street was very handy and we didn't have any problems getting into town by public transport. The little balcony in the kitchen was a bonus and nice spot for eating breakfast.

Long story short: I was looking for a nice place for a family with 2 children, which would be close to the city centre, safe and not too expensive. To be honest it was rather stressful situation for me ;).

But thanks to Clarence help, I was calmed very quick.

And apartment is just perfect. It is in a new building, flat itself must have been renovated recently and what you can't really see in the pictures: it is quite big(seriously telling from the photos, I thought it would be smaller).  It is not a strict city center but everything important can be reach on foot(Cedofeita is 20min walk) or by using close by metro. To get to the beach(Foz, which is my favourite one), you can take a bus from the stop just opposite the apartment.

Clarence answered for every of my question and even a little earlier check-in was not a problem. Thank you very much Clarence! :):)

Clarence was not there to give us the keys personally, instead a very friendly neighbor welcomed us. She couldn't speak English, but all communication needed was possible. The apartment itself is right in front of a super market which is really handy. It's a walk from city center, but that didn't disturb us. Everything was clean and basic. Enough fresh towels. Down the street is a typical Portuguese cantina with good prices and big plates. Porto itself is also wonderful to discover. Only wish We could have had of the apartment, if free wifi would have been available. We recommend this apartment to every couple. There is a sleeping couch in the living room. So with a close friend group, 4 people could also easily enjoy their stay there!

Appartement très spacieux et lumineux, mais mal isolé, entre route passagère, voisins et travaux, prévoir boules quies.
Logement assez propre dans l'ensemble mais pas dans les détails. On ne voit jamais Clarence mais elle est très disponible par sms et s'investie beaucoup dans les recherches pour nous satisfaire, merci

Clarence n'a pu nous accueillir mais une voisine a elle nous a ouvert.
L'appartement est propre et bien situé pour aller au centre ou à la plage. Le supermarché en face est très pratique . Très bon rapport qualité prix.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cet appartement a porto.

The apartment was very comfortable. Located in walking distance from city centre. If you don't like walking metro and buses are located closely:)
Market located opposite the street is a big plus. 
A possibility of parking a car in safe place was also very important for us - there is free parking behind the building and you can see your car from apartment.
I would highly recommend staying at Clarence's apartment.

L'appartement est super propre et spacieux . Clarence n'etait pas là mais Diana ,une de ses voisines nous a accueilli . Tres gentille, elle a meme essayé de nous parler francais . L'appartement est à 10 min à pied du metro et juste en face d'un supermarcheé. Tout pour nous faciliter les choses.
Appartement très pratique, grand et disposant de tout le nécessaire. Facilement accessible avec les transport (bus et métro). Un très bon choix pour vos séjours à Porto.

Clarence's apartment has a very good location (about 30 minutes walking to the riverside) and it's close to the metro station. There is a fully equipped kitchen and the whole place is renovated and spacious. The neighbourhood was a bit noisy due to some constructions made nearby, but it didn't cause a big problem. 
I would recommend the place for further Porto's visitors.
Great flat - big And clean. Near to center And metro. Five stars for sure! Recommanded.
Everything fine, thanks!

Mi estadia en la ciudad fue increible, bien ubicado el apartamento y muy agradable, todo bien confortable, un super mercado al frente y con una zona para parquear el coche en la calle, pero muy seguro.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Porto. Le logement était très spacieux et propre . Clarence s est montrée disponible et nous a conseillés pour l utilisation des moyens de transport pour rejoindre l aéroport.

We really enjoyed our stay in Clarence's place and in Porto in general. The flat is generally fine, we had some issues with the gas water heater, reported them and I hope Clarence will fix it soon. Also the ckeck-in took longer than usually, but apart of these issues we had a great time. We spent almost a week in the apartment, there's a supermarket in the front of the building, so it's super convenient. There's also a great coffee place down the road (3 minutes walk) with good coffee and pastry. We had a car and it was always possible to find a parking spot nearby. I really recommend Clarence's flat!

Apartamento limpio y cómodo que se encuentra situado en una zona tranquila de Porto, si quereis tranquilidad y no os importa usar el transporte público para acceder a los sitios de interés os lo recomiendo!
Apartamento perto de todos os serviços, prático e muito funcional. A exposição solar deste apartamento é outra mais valia.
Ótimo espaço
Piso muy básico pero soleado en zona tranquila. A quince minutos a pie de la casa de la música y con dos supermercados delante.
Great place, cozy, modern flat at good price, 4 metro stops from the center. Very much recommended

Alles super in der Wohnung, es war alles da was man braucht. Der Check in war sehr entspannt trotz sehr später Ankunftszeit. Die Lage der Wohnung war auch okay. Könnte noch etwas zentraler sein, aber eigentlich ist auch alles gut zu Fuß zu erreichen (ca. 20 Minuten) und es gibt direkt gegenüber einen Supermarkt.

Apartamento 100% recomendable para 4 personas. Muy limpio y acogedor. Para ir al centro de la ciudad nos movíamos en coche porque está un poco lejos aunque bien comunicado por transporte público (a 30 min andando según (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps pero no hicimos la prueba). Buena zona para aparcar. Clarence muy atenta y me aclaro todas las dudas que me surgian. El apartamento tenía mantas sabanas papel higiénico y toallas. Lo recomiendo. Tal cual las fotos. La única pega que el sofá cama era un poco incómodo porque estaba cedido el somier pero bueno para pasar dos días y por este precio no está mal.

Appartement conforme à l'annonce. Aucun problème de communication car Clarence vit en France. Clé remise par Diana qui vit dans l'immeuble. Deux supermarchés juste à côté donc très facile pour faire des courses et pour le pain du matin. Stationnement non payant. Seul petit bémol, il n'y a pas de wifi ( pas gênant pour nous mais un peu plus pour les enfants). Nous reviendrons avec plaisir lors d'un prochain séjour à Porto.
Nice and cozy place in a good location. We hope to come back again.

Ce sejour était parfait : l'appartement est magnifique. Nous étions 4 et pour le prix c'est vraiment superbe!! Je vous le recommande absolument. Nous mettions environ 30 minutes à pied pour aller dans le centre mais il me semble qu'il y a des transports pour y aller, mais nous avons choisi à pied et c'était très agréable. Merci à Clarence pour ce superbe logement.
Mieszkanie znajduje 800 metrów od stacji metra, jest bardzo czyste i zadbane. Na dole są 2 duże supermarkty. Kontakt z właścicielką bardzo łatwy. Polecam!

Clarence a été une excellente hôte et nous a bien arrangé à notre arrivé. Nous étions très tôt à l'aéroport et plutôt que de nous donner les clefs à 13h comme prévu elle a réussi à nous les confier à 7h le matin! 
L'appartement est conforme aux photos, simple, épuré mais pratique et sympathique. Les transports sont à proximité mais il est également possible de marcher jusqu'au centre ville compter environ 20 min. 
Nous avons passé un très beau séjour à Porto !

Clarence is a very nice host. The apartment is in a calm area and there are two big supermarkets nearby. 
The apartment is very big and clean and it even has a small balcony.
Check-out was very flexible, check-in was a bit late in my opinion. 
The apartment is not so close to the center but there is a metro station 10 minutes by foot.

Appartement très sympathique et propre ! 
Métro accessible à 5min à pied qui nous emmène dans Porto.
Le boulevard est un peu bruyant la nuit, malgré les fenêtres fermées.
Remise des clés par la voisine de Clarence, peu d'échange malheureusement, (peut être peu disponible ce jour ci). Clarence est par conte joignable si besoin.
Un grand supermarché juste en bas, très pratique.

Très bon appartement, spacieux, propre et bien équipé il nous a permis de passer de très bon jours sur Porto. Même s'il est légèrement excentré il est facilement accessible depuis les transports, à 10 minutes du centre. Et il y a un supermarché au pied de l'immeuble donc très confortable. Merci

I stayed in Porto for 5 days with some friends. Clarence's place was ideal.. Big and airy and very clean. It had all the facilites necessary to cook in also if you want. It's not in the centre but Porto is a very walkable city. I highly reccommend it!
logement quand même sympa beaucoup de calme les super marché a proximités sont un plus seul la pièce de vie ai monotone je pense qu'une télé ne serais pas de trop

Appartement propre, spacieux, bien situé, proche des transports.
Les 2 supermarchés en bas de l'immeuble sont un vrai plus.
À 20 minutes en bus de la plage. On se sentait comme à la maison et Clarence nous a donné des informations trés utiles avant notre séjour. 
Nous vous le conseillons !
Super rapport qualité/prix. Le logement est à 5 stations de la gare et donc du centre historique, ce qui est très agréable. Très calme. On recommande

Mieszkanie Clarence jest czyste, bardzo przestronne i wygodnie urządzone, nie brakowało nam niczego. Może nie jest położone w ścisłym centrum ale nam bardzo odpowiadała ta lokalizacja (bliski sklep i możliwość parkowania). Jesteśmy bardzo zadowoleni z naszego pobytu, serdecznie polecamy wizytę w Porto i nocleg u Clarence w mieszkaniu.

We loved that the supermarket was so close. Kitchen was fully equipped.  Place was large and in the winter months the oil heaters worked really well. Clarence was also super helpful with providing me local info before we got here.

Situé à 20-30 minutes à pieds du centre ville, et 5 min des transports en commun, nous avons beaucoup apprécié le fait que le logement soit spacieux.  Clarence n'était pas sur place mais a été très réactive par message pour organiser l'entrée des lieux.
Le logement est à quelques mètres du supermarché ce qui est très pratique.
Nous recommandons ce logement. A noter tout de même que l'on aurait au moins aimé avoir une télévision (car il n'y a pas de wifi)
Muy buen  apartamento! A muy buen precioi

Appartement confortable, informations de Clarence précises. 

Proche métro et à 20 min à pied du centre de Porto.

Proche commodités et juste à côté d'un supermarché ouvert jusqu'à 21h!

Bon rapport qualité prix. 

Julien et Sophie
Отличная квартира недалеко от центра, все есть, очень понравилось
Excelente apartamento, amplo, bem iluminado e com ótima localização. Todo equipado e funcional!
Appartement spacieux proche de commerces. Très lumineux et calme. Je le recommande. Petit bémol le  confort du canapé en tant que lit.

Il soggiorno nell'alloggio di Clarence è stato piacevole. L'appartamento è grande ed è ben fornito. é stato complicato aprire il divano letto, alché ci abbiamo rinunciato alla fine. L'appartamento dista circa dieci minuti dal centro. Di fronte casa c'è comunque un bus che in 20 minuti ti porta al mare, super comodo!
Clarence è stata molto disponibile e ha risposto sempre prontamente quando necessario.
Appartement très agréable, clair, propre, confortable, situé entre deux supermarchés et à 2 km du centre ville. A recommander.

The place is nice, spacious and clean. We didn’t meet Clarence, but the person who gave us the key didn’t know English so it was a little complicated to communicate. There is a bus stop near the apartment and everything is  reachable.

L'appartamento è situato al terzo piano di un grande stabile, nonostante ciò una della due camere si affaccia sulla strada e risulta un po' rumorosa nonostante i doppi vetri, tuttavia si trova appena fuori il centro di Porto ed è quindi facilmente raggiungibile in macchina ed è abbastanza semplice trovare parcheggio nei dintorni (il centro a piedi dista circa 15min).
Nella norma tutto quanto, compresa la pulizia. Non abbiamo conosciuto direttamente la proprietaria dell'annuncio, ma siamo ugualmente stati accolti nonostante il grande ritardo dovuto ad una serie di sfortune durante il viaggio di andata.
Logement agréable et bien équipé a une dizaine de minutes du métro, ce qui permet de relier le centre-ville historique de porto assez facilement.
Logement propre et spacieux, la literie est très agréable !!! Immeuble propre à 10 minutes du métro avec 2 stations avant le centre ville.

Skvělé ubytování. Vše potřebné bylo k dispozici. S hostitelkou jsme se nesešli. Klíč nám předal známý, perfektně zajištěno. Dostupnost do centra pěšky. Parkování autem možné u domu. Byli jsme spokojeni.
Genial!! Muy limpio, zona tranquila, muy bien para aparcar, con dos supermercados cercanos...

L'appartemento è più che discreto in una zona periferica abbastanza comoda per tutti gli spostamenti (macchina, metro, bus), eccetto forse quelli a piedi, la cui distanza dal centro è considerevole (almeno 20 minuti). Clarence è molto gentile e disponibile e risponde rapidamente a messaggi o mail. Al momento del check in lei non era presente e ci ha aperto una amica con un pò di ritardo. Eccetto questo il soggiorno è stato piacevole e sotto casa c'è un comodissimo  supermercato

Logement agréable, grand, bien équipé avec la wifi. 
Situé à 8 min du métro et à 25 min du centre. 
Nous avons un très bon séjour. 
Je recommande
Belle expérience à Porto! La localisation de l'appartement nous a permis de découvrir la ville avec simplicité
Localização excelente, exatamente como diz, 2 mercados na rua, um em frente, metrô próximo , super recomendo, vale a pena! Parabéns!!!!

Great place just a 25 min walk downhill into town. Full kitchen, easy off street parking out the back. Supermarket across the road. Large apartment. Would stay again. 

Shower temperature difficult to adjust and missing a kettle.

Apartamento incrível! Localização maravilhosa, mercados muito perto, caminha-se para duas estações de metro, para a Casa da Música e Mercado de Bom sucesso com muita facilidade. Diana é super atenciosa e garante a troca de roupas de cama e banho toda semana. Valeu cada dia!

O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos. Clarence responde muito rápido as mensagens e é extremamente prestativa. Apesar de não estar presente no checkin, a Diana que mora no prédio, me recebeu no horário e me deu todas as informações que precisei para que eu pudesse ter uma excelente estada no Porto! A localização é excelente e fiz muitas coisas a pé, inclusive conhecer inúmeros monumentos históricos. Em frente ao apartamento passa um ônibus que leva diretamente a praia, tudo muito fácil. O metrô fica ha uns 10 minutos a pé do apartamento, mas também muito fácil sua utilização. 
Amei tudo no apartamento e no Porto!

Nous n'avons pas rencontré Clarence mais tout était très bien organisé, ses indications étaient parfaites! (Mieux que (Hidden by Airbnb) Map) 
L'appartement est très bien situé, propre et conforme aux photos! Je recommande vivement!

name: Pyrmont Apartment. City meets Water
summary: Situated in the heart of Pyrmont, this room is a part of a large 2 bed, 2 bath apartment. The apartment is fully furnished, with full access to pool, spa, gym and more and in is just a stone’s throw away from the CBD and Darling Harbour
description: Situated in the heart of Pyrmont, this room is a part of a large 2 bed, 2 bath apartment. The apartment is fully furnished, with full access to pool, spa, gym and more and in is just a stone’s throw away from the CBD and Darling Harbour Pool, Sauna, Spa, Large 50" TV, Washing Machine, Dyer, Dishwasher, Bay Views, Large Balcony  It's so close to the city while being right on the harbour. Walks along the bay at night are the perfect wind down from a hard day at work bus, trains and light rail are all within walking distance
neighborhood_overview: It's so close to the city while being right on the harbour. Walks along the bay at night are the perfect wind down from a hard day at work
transit: bus, trains and light rail are all within walking distance
access: Pool, Sauna, Spa, Large 50" TV, Washing Machine, Dyer, Dishwasher, Bay Views, Large Balcony

reviews.comments: Great location for my needs with much needed parking. Pete was a great host who could accommodate my needs with no issues at all. Look forward to staying with him again on my next visit.

Pete is a young nice guy. Serious and hard worker he makes you feel at ease and home. The room was big and very comfortable. I got my own private bathroom which was big. Location was perfect too, 10min walking to darling harbor. The neighborhood is nice and cool.

name: Principito Apartment w/2 Ensuite Bathrooms
summary: For long-term stays (32 nights and over). Bright two bedroom and 2 bathroom apartment with very high ceilings, two open balconies and one enclosed balcony.The apartment sleeps 4 people on one Queen size and one double bed. The ideal occupancy would be 4 people. Both bathrooms are ensuite. Big kitchen.  Central Air conditioning.  Safe.  Balcony opens to street.
space: For long-term stays. Description of the apartment - Bright two bedroom and 2 bathroom apartment with very high ceilings, two open balconies and one enclosed balcony, on 2nd floor, with elevator. This apartment still has the 100+ years old mosaic floors (a different design in every room) and the original woodwork on the doors and windows. The apartment sleeps 4 people on one Queen size and one double bed. The ideal occupancy would be 4 people.  Description of location - In the historic Eixample, built (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) during the golden age of the city, when the emigrants to the Americas where returning and investing their earnings back in the city.  The beautiful buildings, most of them recently restored, reflect an age of plenty. Transportation - The apartment can be reached by taxi from the airport.  It is close to the Verdaguer metro station, which sits on two metro lines.  There are plenty of bus lines and also the taxi lane runs in front of the building. Nearby servi
description: For long-term stays (32 nights and over). Bright two bedroom and 2 bathroom apartment with very high ceilings, two open balconies and one enclosed balcony.The apartment sleeps 4 people on one Queen size and one double bed. The ideal occupancy would be 4 people. Both bathrooms are ensuite. Big kitchen.  Central Air conditioning.  Safe.  Balcony opens to street. For long-term stays. This apartment still has the 100+ years old mosaic floors (a different design in every room) and the original woodwork on the doors and windows. The apartment sleeps 4 people on one Queen size and one double bed. The ideal occupancy would be 4 people.
