host.host_about: We are from Barcelona, Spain, and Dallas, TX.

reviews.comments: Overall, I would definitely recommend this place.  It is well managed and set up to receive guests.  The apartment was very nice and well located.  It is about 3 subway stops to the gothic quarter and about a 6 minute walk to the Sagrada.   There was a safe box for valuables and the keyless (security code) system for the door entry was very convenient.   Fernando ensured there was someone to greet and orient me on arrival and the bottom line is that my stay was hassle free, in a nice accommodation, and with a good location.   I did feel the second bathroom was quite small by my standards but may be in keeping with bathrooms in Barcelona/Europe?

I found the apartment totally consistent with the description I read on Airbnb. My experience living in the apartment was fantastic. It's ambience, cleanliness and décor were both inviting and provided all that I needed for a memorable time in your beautiful city, Barcelona.
It was central to all of the tourist places in Barcelona and after a couple of days I felt like a local.
Fernando ensured he made contact with me on the day I arrived which was greatly appreciated. He was welcoming and very hospitable sharing some practical advise. His regular contact throughout my stay was generous. I highly recommend this apartment as it realised all my expectations and its level of presentation commendable. Thank you Fernando and Nermine.

The Principito apartment has perfect for our family of 4.  Great location, away from the Ramblas crowds, but an easy walk or metro ride to all the key attractions. The apt is an older unit in an older building, but had a lot of character and all the amenities we needed, and as described. The second bedroom was cosy, but worked well for our teen daughters. Fernando and his team were great to work with.  Reserving the unit was very easy. They also have a person on site who was very helpful. She stopped by after we arrived to give us information on the city etc, and also printed out our reservation tickets for the Sagrada and other museums. 

A great experience

When we arrive we were greeted by a very nice women. The location was centrally located. The apt was great in space, 2 bedrooms, two full baths, a TV/media room, a full kitchen, washer/dryer. They provided us with a map and a list of recommended restaurants, all the wifi passwords (only problem is the reception was bad and didn't have internet access for the time we were there), other than that everything was great. Everything was nice and clean. I would recommend this place and would definitely stay here again. We enjoyed our stay. The communication with the host was easy as they were extremely helpful with our arrival and questions we had. Very friendly.

We travelled as a party of 3 adults, my partner Lorraine, my son Ryan and myself.
It is a great apartment in a great location for getting around the city. 

We arrived at around 8pm and all details for the apartment were sent via e-mail before travelling, everything was very easy due to instruction received.
When we arrived in the apartment there was further information about getting around and local bars/restaurants that were recommended.
There was also a note to say that the greeter would come to see us at 10am the next day to make sure everything was ok.
The greeter arrived prompt at 10am and gave us excellent information regarding places to see, getting around and places to eat/drink.
The apartment was easily big enough for the 3 of us and would easily accommodate 2 adult couples.
Everything you could need was in the apartment including a safe which we found an added bonus as they are not always provided.
We would have no hesitation in recommending this apartment and indeed using it again ourselves.

Superbe séjour dans cette appartement vaste et frais! "clim" Très bien équipé avec des chambres éloignées l'une de l' autre! le système de digicode pour toute les portes est pratique! bonne ambiance dans la ville de jour comme de nuit! Barcelone la nuit avec les jets d'eau ; c'est magique!  Munissez vous d'une bonne paire de chaussure de marche; c'est conseillé!

Foi FABULOSA nossa experiência no apartamento de Fernando, principalmente em relação a localização, atendimento, benefícios e comodidade.
Por 60 dias nos sentimos em casa. 
Sugerimos apenas a troca do colchão por um mais "firme". 
Porém a atenção de Eduardo e equipe compensou qualquer necessidade adicional.
Excelente custo/benefício!
I had a great time. Excellent hospitality. Strongly recommend

name: Large Room in Penthouse Apartment
summary: This is a large fully furnished bedroom in my 4 bed, 2 bath penthouse apartment in Midtown Manhattan.  A very large window that provides plenty of light and a great view of midtown. The empire state building, times sq, union sq, and the UN are nearby. Please do not place a reservation without contacting me first as to inquire as to those dates. I may have conflicts that are not reflected in my calendar and might be forced to reject any reservations I did not clear beforehand.
space: Please note for people interested in new years reservations.  You may contact me to discuss proposed dates and prices for those dates.  I'm willing to consider various date ranges but the longer the stay the better for me, so please don't ask to book one or even just a few days around new years, I'm not likely to accept those short reservations for this popular holiday.  Also, ideally for me, I would like to get a reservation that ends on january 1st and is at least a week long.  I am willing to consider dates in january as well, but am giving preference to reservation requests ending on jan 1, as I am looking to put in a longer term roommate in this room starting from the new year.  Despite my preferences, feel free to contact me on reservations for a week or more for new years, I will consider all good offers.  If you happen to be looking for 2 weeks in december, ending on jan 1, please contact me, I'm more than willing to make a good deal for the remainder of december so I don't hav
description: This is a large fully furnished bedroom in my 4 bed, 2 bath penthouse apartment in Midtown Manhattan.  A very large window that provides plenty of light and a great view of midtown. The empire state building, times sq, union sq, and the UN are nearby. Please do not place a reservation without contacting me first as to inquire as to those dates. I may have conflicts that are not reflected in my calendar and might be forced to reject any reservations I did not clear beforehand. Please note for people interested in new years reservations.  You may contact me to discuss proposed dates and prices for those dates.  I'm willing to consider various date ranges but the longer the stay the better for me, so please don't ask to book one or even just a few days around new years, I'm not likely to accept those short reservations for this popular holiday.  Also, ideally for me, I would like to get a reservation that ends on january 1st and is at least a week long.  I am willing to consider dates in
neighborhood_overview: This area is close to pretty much all central parts of the city.
notes: I am available to show the space, before reserving, to anyone who is interested in a month or longer rental. Feel free to contact me about any discounts.  Depending on demand, I may be amenable to discounting the price on long term residencies or for bookings that fit in perfectly with other bookings that I may have or get.  However please keep in mind that I have already priced this room as the cheapest in the area for what you are getting, so as to encourage quick and continual bookings; furthermore most of the comparably priced listings do not match the amenities in this listing and are either in less desirable parts of the city or shared or incomplete rooms (such as living rooms). I have also started issuing foreign visitors with an american cell phone for emergency contact purposes. I do ask all guests to furnish a copy of their picture ID upon arrival.   Unlike some other area listings, this is a personal residence, with long term live in roommates, and as a result receives regul
transit: The subway is only a few blocks away and there is also frequent bus service right outside the building door.  You can also walk to most parts of midtown Manhattan.
house_rules: Please keep the place clean and tidy.   Please no smoking or drugs in the apartment.  Please keep this transaction confidential and do not share any details about your stay with any neighbors or anyone else in the building.  Please provide a picture ID when checking in.  I keep copies in case they may be needed later. Please lock the main door on the way in and out of the apartment. Please help keep the bathrooms clean by picking up your hair from the hair drain filter after a shower. If you use the bath rug, please hang it back up after its use so that it may dry property and be kept clean. If you use the kitchen, please clean up after yourself. Thank you.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Long time New Yorker, born and bred.  I can answer almost any question you may have about this city.

reviews.comments:
I visited New York for four days with a friend mid-August. We only met Anthony briefly as he showed us the apartment and handed off the key, and we really did not see that much of anyone else in the apartment during our stay. The apartment was nicely located, and we were both very pleased with our stay, especially considering the low price. 

The bathroom could probably have been more thouroughly cleaned, but other than that our bedroom was clean and it was spacious with plenty of room for two people.
Great location

Anthony is friendly, easygoing and you can come and go as you please. The building seems older but the room was big and bathroom was clean. It is in older shape but the price is inexpensive and if you are traveling by yourself or as a couple, this place can be recommended. The view was nice, AC little noisy but during summer keeping the window open is fine. Subway close by or you can literally walk to anywhere.

Staying at Anthony's was just wonderful.

The area is ideal with convenience stores and chemists right down the street. The neighborhood is quintessentially NYC which is what anyone would want. So many restaurants in the area for any foodies like me out there. Also there are always an abundance of cabs in the area which made my transportation easy. And if you don't want to cab around, the subway is a 4-5 minute walk away which is nothing in the city. 

The room was spacious and the bed was comfy. The air conditioning in the room was great especially since it was quite warm during the week we stayed. The addition of the small fridge was an awesome plus too. The closet in the room was great, and the dresser had more than enough room for all of our clothes. The room also gets awesome sun during the day, and at night,the lights from midtown buildings light up the sky and are visible if you open up the blinds. 

Anthony was a great host. The communication was fluid and any question we had, Anthony had an answer for. 

Definitely had an amazing stay.
Thank you Anthony for everything!

Anthony was very accommodating even though we had to change our arrival time a few times. The room is clean and the bed is super comfortable! The apt is in a good location and we will def stay here the next time we're in NYC!

I stayed with Anthony for a little over 2 weeks. Anthony came out to meet us and show us around the apartment. The apartment is lovely, and the room is quite spacious! Anthony is friendly, however we did not interact much as I was mostly out of the apartment during the day. The apartment is inhabited by Anthony and other tenants, however we rarely saw them at all so it felt very much as though there was no one home a lot of the time. The location is also great, just a short walk from the subway and around 10 minute walk from the UN. A great place, I would certainly recommend this to other travelers looking to see NYC!

I stayed at Anthony's place for 4days w/ my sister. It is located in a quite town and not that far from Times Square area. Room was exactly same with photos and clean and comfy.
Anthony was really nice and kindly gave me enough information when I asked various things.
I would stay here again if I visit in New York.

Anthony was very nice. We arrived very early and we asked him what we should do with our luggage because we wanted to go sightseeing till we were able to go to our room. He offered to take care of them and leave them in his car. When we arrived our suitcases were already up in our room. We didn't see much of Anthony but he told us to take the train to Newark Airport because it's much cheaper.
The room was big (for New York) and very clean. The sheets were  very neat. Some of the towels had stains on them but they were washed and cleaned.
There even was a little fridge which we didn't use. There were lots of channels on the TV. The wifi was awesome.
There were two bathrooms, we only used his bathroom. The bathroom was old (like always in New York) but it was very clean, which I liked.
You can not open the "whole" window (picture), so it can get very hot. You could use the aircondition though. You can see the Chrysler Building from the room if you look left.
The apartment building was very nice. There are a lot of shops and little restaurants in the neiborhood. I felt very safe in the area. A Starbucks is a block away. The Metro station is 3 blocks away (~7min walk) and it takes only 2 station to get to grand central or union square. 
The value-for-money ratio is very good for New York.

I need to go to the airport early in the morning and Anthony is very kind to brief me varied ways to JFK airport from his house on both time consumed and cost- metro, bus, taxi and blue van, to let me choose the most suitable and convenient way :)) That is very helpful! I really appreciate that!!

Chambre équivalente à ce que l ' on peut voir sur les photos, 
Pour nous nous avons un avis partagé sur le séjour. Le bon côté l emplacement du logement proche de pas mal d endroit à voir à New York. Le moins côté, les poils dans la salle de bain, les mouchoirs plein de sang à vu. Nous avions choisi une chambre chez l habitant afin de pouvoir échanger discuter le soir mais a priori antony est une personne très occupée.

Nice room on 16th floor with a beautiful view over Empire  State building. There was some noise from the trafic not much but you Could  hear it all day also at Night . The lock to the door was not ok, you could easy open it with a nail from outside. The appartment was ok but a bit old. There was no lock on the door to the bathroom. The neighborhood was a bit boring with few bars, restaurant  and supermarket. There was 500 m to the subway and 30 min walk to Penn station. So the location is ok. The host was very helpfull. We only saw him a couple times even though he has a room next door. In total a good place to stay if you only need a place to sleep.

El cuarto es muy amplio tal cual lo menciona el aviso, tiene una vista hermosa del Empire States y es muy cálido todo el edificio teniendo en cuenta las temperaturas que había en NY para la fecha que fuímos. Anthony fue muy amable en todo momento, ya sea cuando nos contactamos como cuando teníamos algún consulta durante la estadía. Lo veíamos poco, pero nos manejábamos casi siempre por SMS. Había otros roomates pero ellos y Anthony fueron muy respetuosos de la privacidad nuestra en todo momento, casi no los veíamos. La zona es buena y segura, aunque el subte esta un poco lejos ya que es a 3 cuadras largas (las que son de E a O, que son 3 veces mas largas que las que corren de N a S en Manhattan), por ende por las noches y por el frío siempre volvíamos en taxi, pero para una época mejor (verano), realmente las 3 cuadras largas no son un gran problema. Hay mucha oferta de restaurantes por la zona. El departamento cuenta con cable e internet de rápido acceso, y el cuarto tenia un refrigerador que funcionaba muy bien. Ademas y dado que el cuarto era grande, teníamos una mesa y 2 sillas como para poder comer ahí inclusive, y ésto fue muy bueno también. La limpieza del apartamento en general era buena así como la del baño, y Anthony nos recibió con toallones, toallas y un juego de cama limpio. Impecable. Inclusive Anthony fue muy flexible con nuestro horario de salida, ya que el ultimo día necesitábamos quedarnos y hacer late check-out y dado que no tenia otra reserva, nos permitió quedarnos sin costo adicional. Realmente volvería a hospedarme aquí y lo recomiendo.

anthoni was friendly, the room looks exactly like the pictures, clean sheets and towels, so it allowed us to use their coffee maker, he pay us a cell phone to communicate. I highly recommend everything was perfect!

Anthony was an excellent host. The neighborhood was nice. There is a protected bike lane on the main street and two bikeshare docks just three blocks. The room was very clean and had everything I needed. The bed was great. Would definitely book again.

Really nice apartment, everything was clean and as described in the listing. Anthony was a great host, worked with me for check-in and check-out. I felt comfortable staying there, felt like a nice apartment in a nicer area in New York City. I would definitely recommend staying here. really quick walk to the Subway and you get a great view of one of the most amazing buildings ever constructed.
Great stay at Anthony's house! The room was clean and anthony was very kind to help me with my luggage when I check in. Will stay at anthony's apartment when I go back nyc in the future!

Anthony was really nice. He met me downstairs and gave me some great tips on places to go around the city. He gave me a key and told me that he didn't have a curfew, which was nice since I was going to a show in Downtown. The room and bathroom were clean and looked just like the photos. Also, the room has a great view if you look out the side and includes a mini fridge. The bed was comfortable enough, and the radiant heat keep me plenty warm. The bathroom was a decent size with a large tub/shower and plenty of hot water. :)

The neighborhood is great! The place is located near a metro stop, Empire State building and tons of restaurants/bars including Joey Pepperoni's Pizza, Les Halles and Stumptown Coffee.

Check out was informal (I just gave him back his key). Overall, I really enjoyed my stay and would highly recommend him for single travelers visiting over a weekend.

He was very nice host. He replied my message so quick, so communication was very smooth.
The room was exactly same as the picture. He also placed one more airbed for my family since we were three. There was a small freezer, tv and heater which was working very well. The house was really nice apt and it was located in the center of city. We were able to go everywhere in the city in 20minutes even by walk. 
I will definitely stay Anthony's place again if I come back to NY!

Mi estadía fue buena, la habitación es tal cual se describe en el anuncio, amplia, limpia, con calefacción y toallas disponibles. El anfitrión nos recibió bien y después no tuvimos mayor contacto con él durante el resto del hospedaje. El televisor no funcionó, le avisé al anfitrión, quiso resolverlo pero la realidad es que no coincidían nuestros horarios. El barrio es muy lindo y muy cercano a la 5ta avenida y al Empirte State, lo cual nos permitió movernos a pie, ir y volver sin problemas al midtown; muy buena ubicación. Buena conectividad wifi durante los 8 días. 
Lo que faltó es una buena limpieza tanto en el baño como en  la cocina; ambos espacios son comunes para todos los habitantes del departamento. El anuncio muestra una cocina con un comedor y un balcón a la calle que nunca vimos. Tuvimos sólo 1 juego de llaves para las 2, lo que nos obligaba a irnos y volver juntas si o si. El anfitrión no reveló la dirección exacta del departamento, tuvimos que encontrarnos en una esquina cercana al edificio.

Anthony texted with where we could meet him and how we could get there for best at the time we arrived. He clarified his house rules when we arrived and showed us the room and bathrooms they were spacious and clean. The view every evening to see the empire state building change colour was great. The neighbourhood was good for us to walk everywhere up to Central Park or down to Battery Park  there were local supermarket close and several local other food shops. We enjoyed are stay here thanks Carol and family.
Anthony was a great host! The room looked just like it does in the listing. This was a great value considering the extremely convenient location right in the middle of Manhattan.

Gracias por todo Anthony.  La habitación muy bonita y limpia. El departamento es super silencioso. Antonhy fue muy servicial y nos ayudo en todo lo que necesitamos.  Tambien nos ayudo cuando queriamos ir a algún lugar y neceaitabamos indicaciones. 
Limpio, espacioso,  comodo, silencioso.  Thanks a lot for everything!!!
The room was exactly as shown and Anthony was very helpful in meeting up to hand off the keys and accommodating of a couple last-minute timing changes. Good value and good location in the city.

The place is good, localization is great. The bed is comfortable, has a old tv in the room that works fine. The bathroom is shared. The building is great and so is the communication with Anthony. Had a great time.

Found room to be exactly as described with bathroom down the hall. Clean and comfortable room with closet to hang clothes, TV, air conditioner and refrigerator.  Convenient to transportation and restaurants and visiting family.   Prompt reply to question about internet access from host. Towels and facecloth provided.

The place is nice just as described. During our stay, Anthony even borrowed us a U.S prepaid phone. 
Around 10 min walk to the nearest subway station and there are grocery store, pharmacy nearby.

I was pretty disappointed with my air bnb experience after reading all the positive reviews on here. I've only used air bnb one other time, and that was in Chicago, but the experience was completely different. I was scheduled to arrive Friday night at 11:30 pm and Anthony had said he would be available to give me the keys, etc. He also asked for my flight information, to know if my flight would arrive early or not. Then, Friday afternoon, he emails me and says that he has to drop something off for work between 10:30-11 and won't be home for midnight. He told me I could wait in a dunking donuts a few blocks away. (clearly,. an exciting nyc spot I was dying to go to.) I told him I had plans with friends at midnight and asked if either I could get the keys from a doorman or a friend of min could pick them up earlier. He told me doorman in NYC didn't do that (which is not true - I have stayed with many friends previously in Manhattan and their door mans have either given my keys or let me knot their apartments) and that I could carry my stuff around with me and check in later than midnight if I wanted to stay out with my friends because he planned to stay up a little later. 1. What kind of job gives a few hours notice that you need to "drop something off" at that hour on a Friday? It made me feel very unsafe. 2. It would have been nice to know that I would need to wait earlier than the day of arrival. 3. My flight arrived early (which Anthony should have known since he told me he would tack my flight) and I texted him before 10:30 saying that I was in a cab on my way, asking if I would catch him. He stated he had already left. A courteous host would have seen that my flight landed early, and waited. I arrived at the apartment area around 11 and had to wait over an hour (he got home after midnight) for him. 4. My host in Chicago had a lock box at the outside of his building with the keys and texted me the code. Anthony could have done that and avoided this whole debacle. My boyfriend and I had to wait in a bar with our stuff (which was awkward) and miss our plans with our friends. Then, the place was not as great as the reviews implied. The bed was uncomfortable and small (my boyfriend is 6'2" and his feet hung off the bed). The bathroom was also not as clean as I would have hoped. And there were several mops in the bathroom, creating a weird smell in it and taking up space. Also, the bathrooms have no locks. Also, Anthony told us he would send us the wifi code upon arrival but he never did. Otherwise,...
A good location in NYC. Easily accessible to metro & a safe place.. Felt a more convenient place to roam around in the city

Anthony's room was pretty much exactly as described - great location, large room (for NYC), nice neighborhood. Anthony's description of his busy schedule and possible slow response time is also just as described. If you want a lot of hand holding by a host this may not be your best choice. The building, room, and bed were all completely fine. Anthony gave a very short orientation before he left which left me having to figure out a few things on my own. All in all the room seems like a good value that I would use again.

Anthony s'est rendu disponible pour notre arrivée qui a tardé. La chambre correspond aux images et à la description avec un frigo. Il est bien situé. Anthony a été serviable en nous imprimant des billets pour le match de NBA.
Le lit n'est pas très confortable car très mou, l'appartement est occupé par plusieurs autres airbnb ce qu'il le rend impersonnel. Nous n'étions pas au courant, ce qui rend l'ambiance très étrange. La propreté est négligée dans les parties communes. La cuisine est en bazar, nous n'avons donc pas pu l'utiliser. 
Il manque un espace de renseignements pratiques que l'on retrouve en général dans les airbnb (clé wifi, lieu à visiter ou restaurant sympa dans le coin, bon plan, etc).

Anthony's place was in a fantastic location - a really great neighbourhood and easy to get around. There is a subway station very close by (green line) which is helpful - it is slightly inconvenient getting to Time's Square on the subway due to the way the subway lines work, but its a very manageable walk! We actually walked to Time's Square twice and it was fine! The room was very nice and Anthony was incredibly easy to communicate with :) The room is in the same apartment as Anthony, but I didn't see anyone apart from when I got the key - so it is incredibly private! Great experience, I would highly recommend.

Anthony was a nice host who showed us in and lets us go our own way. He also quickly replies to all questions asked.
It was a good room with a nice soft queensize bed. The room comes with a fridge, AC unit and a TV. Also an optional US mobile phone for emergencies or to contact Anthony.
In the appartment are two bathrooms so the sharing isn't a problem. The penthouse view of the empire state building is a big plus.

Anthony was a great host. He provided me with everything I needed and left me alone to do my thing. The room was great and came with a useful air conditioning unit. Got a good night's sleep there and was ready for my interview the next day!
Anthony was very objective and showed flexibility. The room is fine, the pictures are accurate. Location is good, very central to explore Midtown. Overall a good experience.
Good location and clean room. 2 bathrooms so it's very convenient.
Great location and room!! Host is very accommodating.  Would definitely stay again in the future. Thanks, Anthony!
Everything was as advertised. Big room, comfortable bed. Location and price were fantastic.
Anthony is a great host.  The apartment is a very good value for a stay in New York.

I had a great experience for my one night stay at Anthony's. The building is a nice apartment complex on 2nd and 28th (not the address that is listed). The bedroom and bathroom were clean and appeared exactly as advertised. Overall, a great place to stay for my interview at Bellevue Hospital, especially for the price. I would definitely recommend his place!
All was good.
Anthony is a good and responsible host, the room is clean. Bathroom is good. But the kitchen need to clean more. Overall is good, and good price!
very great experience, good room and comfortable.thanks Anthony!

Hola! Fue una gran experiencia para nosotros hospedarnos en la casa de Anthony! El fue un gran anfitrión durante nuestro viaje en Manhattan. Fue responsable en todo momento, ayudándonos con nuestra llegada. La habitación nos resulto muy cómoda y la ubicación es excelente. Kyps Bay es un muy lindo lugar para hospedarse en NY y más si lo haces en la casa de Anthony!

Anthony made me feel very welcome, the apartment was exactly as shown and the area was better than expected, close to subway and lots of facilities around.
Great for my first Airbnd experience.
Great stay!
Big, clean & cozy room! Help a lot about our first day mess. The house located a little bit further from the list but it's still convenient.
Anthony was very accommodating with my flight change. He's place is conviently located about 5 minutes (walking) from the subway and is relatively close to all the tourist attractions.

Anthony was a great host. He maintained open communication throughout an extended stay and always made himself available for any requests as they emerged. The room is as advertised and the bathroom was cleaned on a weekly basis. The location is fine if you need to be on the East side as you can get up and down with the 6 train.

The room was exactly as described. Met up with the host outside the building and soon got to the apartment.

The stay was comfortable and Anthony was a gracious host.
A very nice host and welcoming experience, Anthony was great!
This little room is a perfect space for my short stay in NYC!
A solid host. Anthony was really nice to take a last minute booking. The room was solid, the bathroom solid, a little cluttered but solid
Was here for work. Location was great, Anthony was fantastic with communication and helping with any issues.  Bathroom could have been cleaner, but my room was spotless. Would definitely stay again!
It was a fine place to stay for a night or two. Good location

name: Sıradan bir oda...
summary: Müsait olursam misafir agirlamayi severim...
description: Müsait olursam misafir agirlamayi severim...

name: Private room near Wanchai MTR station
summary: Our guesthouse is close to restaurants, pubs, supermarkets, family-friendly activities, nightlife, Bowen Road Fitness. You’ll love my place because of the coziness, cheap, friendly staff, proximity to Central, Hong Kong Stadium, Happy Valley Racecourse. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.
space: Our guesthouse has 8 rooms with private bathroom. We offer clean rooms and a safe space for you to keep your belongings. Our location is ideal for those who need to attend a fair at HKCEC and for those who want an easy access to the main attractions of Hong Kong such as Ocean Park, The Peak, Lan Kwai Fong, Times Square, Avenue of Stars in Tsim Sha Tsui, etc. If you are on a budget and wants a convenient location, this is a good place to stay on HK island.

neighborhood_overview: Wan chai is located in between Central and Causeway Bay which makes it a very active neighborhood. It is possible to reach many tourists sites by MTR, Tram or simply by foot from our guesthouse such as The Avenue, Bowen Road Fitness Trail, Happy Valley racecourse, Hong Kong Park, Tamar Park, Victoria Park, Peak Tram, Pacific Place, IFC, Wanchai Ferry, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre, Times Square, Sogo, Hysan Place, Lee Gardens, Hong Kong Stadium, Lockhart Road and Lan Kwai Fong.
notes: This is a guesthouse. Not a private apartment.
transit: Wan Chai MTR station is located only a short walk away from our guesthouse and it is the most convenient and easiest way to reach the airport, Tsim Sha Tsui, Chi Ling Nunnery,
access: You will have access to a private room.
interaction: There are people in the guesthouse available to help from 7am-11pm.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Good location. Small and basic but it is exactly what you'd expect for that prix in HK. Clean and friendly staff and host.

One of the worst experience of accomodation. As we walked into the room,I saw a bed sheet with dirty marks and  shoes step marks right on the top of bed . We kindly ask the receptionist to change new bed sheet but she refused to change it, instead she start explaining this is old bed sheet and a cleaner was here inside to clean window and he might have stepped. When reception refused to change sheet we asked refund back but she denied and ask us to leave the room .we asked her to let us contact host ,she said another  staff arrives soon. As i tried to contact host for help he dint receive my call.  After 30 min a  came and he agree to change sheet . 
If we pay for room accomodation not any proper facilities but at least  a clean bed and sheet is what everybody wants.  
When receptionist was changing bed linen i saw lots of dirty marks all over mattress ,by the way, the host never picked up my call and when i ask refund and stop replying ,no response.
I suggest everybody to Stay out of this place.
Bad customer service with dirty bed linens .
It was OK, cheap and OK location

Had a pleasant stay at the guesthouse right in the middle of Hong Kong Island. The location is very convenient and the description very accurate. 
Accommodation is very simple and the staff at the guesthouse was friendly and helpful when needed. Good place for someone looking for a couple of days authentic Hong Kong experience in a cheap and central location.

Clean, friendly staff, good communication, walkable to MTR and other public transits, it's in the center of everything like shops and restaurants. 

Though I had an issue on my first night. The room I booked online for 5 days was occupied so they had to transfer me to a small motel. Then next morning I check in. Worst travel experience for a first time tourist like me in Hong Kong.

Just make sure with George that the the room is 100% available before you book and pay. Honestly I like the place. If we never had an issue, I definitely give him all 5 stars.


Enjoy!

The feel of the guesthouse was very outdated. The staff were very friendly and accommodating, but there English levels were not very high on average. Not a super clean space when we stayed, but very close to public transportation and attractions. With a bit more thorough cleaning and the help of staff who speak more English would be a big benefit to this guesthouse.

summary: Located one road from Ipanema beach, stunning ocean view.  Fully equipped, this space has everything you need to feel at home. The location has beach, bars, restaurants, pharmacies, supermarkets, shoppings. Metro station right in front. The building has garage, front desk, cleaners, pool, steam room, internet, cable TV, security 24/7. The best WiFi for anyone who needs work then travels.

neighborhood_overview: Ipanema is a beautiful neighborhood in the South Zone of Rio. Famous for bohemia, where still resides the "Girl from Ipanema." The neighborhood is a real charm! In a few meters from the apartment you will find bars, restaurants, pharmacies, supermarkets 24/7, snack bars, cultural centers and much more! Just across the street there is General Osório square, where on sundays there is a hippie fair with handicrafts, local food and a lot of art, on tuesdays there is a food fair and on thursdays organic fair. The nightlife is intense in the area, with many good gay-friendly bars and nightclubs. Alot of options for fun and nightly entertainment. Even so inside the apartment is very quiet, at night it is possible to hear the ocean waves and sleep cradled by the noise of them breaking in the sand of the beach. The beach is beautiful and certainly the best area of the South Zone of Rio, with one of the famous boardwalks of the city beaches and the famous "Dois Irmãos" mountains view! Famous Bea
notes: PS: We are currently redecorating, renovating, recreating, re hosting! That means that you might arrive on the apartment and unlikely the pictures, there will be more art, more color, more fun objects, more useful things. And we will be ready for new pictures soon!
transit: The apartment is located right in front of a metro station that can take you pretty much everywhere in Rio. Touristic groups also pick up in Ipanema for tours around the city. The bus line is very good and you can get around really well without a car. However if you want a car, conveniently there are parking space for free on the building. My favorite way to go around south zone is by bike taking the bike from Itau bank. I love them, they are fun to ride along the beaches in Rio, you can get them in one point and leave it on another and they are pretty much everywhere. To know how to use the Bike Rio, please click on this website: Itau Bike.
access: 1) Ipanema beach less than 50 meters 2) Incredible view of the ocean and Ipanema beach 3) Swimming pool, sauna, gym, 24h reception 4) Free parking space 5) Great Wifi and Cable TV complete with entertainment for the whole family 6) Famous Hippie Fair happens on Sundays, food fair on Tuesdays and organic fairs on Thursdays, in the square in front of the building! 8) Bars, restaurants, nightclubs, market 24hrs
interaction: I am not living in Rio right now, so the contact with me will only be virtual, but I am here to help with all the tips and information you need. . You always can contact my cohost Dandara!
house_rules: There is a few house rules we would love if you followed! =) They are: 1) We provide bedsheets and towels, double times the number of the people on the reservation. Other than that, we do not provide washing them during your stay (except for reservations over 10 nights.) Reason: Guys, the ocean, the trees, our soil, our water, our earth which we all should and will care for. PS: For the same reason, we ask you to not take our towels to the beach.  =) 2) We value our little home, and clean it ourselves most of the time. It is very sad when we get home and there is sand everywhere, it certain damages the floor and makes it much harder for cleaning at your departure :((   So please, downstairs at the garage, (there is also a little gate so you can access the garage without going thru lobby area for convenience) there is a whole. Please wash your feet after the beach before going upstairs, this very important. 3) I am very allergic to cigarets. For this reason and for healthy of all our gu

host.host_about:
Hello Airbnb Community, 

My name is Carolina and I am... a little bit.... gypsy. I love to travel, to learn new cultures, study languages and people, get to know new people and new ways of living. I am currently living in Hawaii, studying to be a midwife, working as a doula (Angels who help sister deliver babies) and managing a few projects in Rio. So although I visit Rio for 3 months a year, Im based in Hawaii and also get to travel around the globe. 

 I can say I am a people's person and love to make people feel good, from hosting to cooking, to massage, thru teaching yoga... etc. I just love to share the things that make me passionate about life in this world. 

That's why I love to talk about Brazil, travel around Brazil and to share the features of this amazing country I am proud to be from. Brazil is my home and Rio is my heart. I am born and raised in Rio, and have experienced this city in a lot of different ways. Here I have been a Law student with long downtown areas and party scenes at night, I've been a nature seeker with long trail/nature hours and good sleep at night, I've been an artist with long days dancing and knowing the theatre/circus scene, I explored Rio as total tourist living in a hostel, and now I have been exploring it while working with education as a citizen and cultural productor. I grow up and its seems that Rio grows up with me. Its always different and better, everytime I come home.

When I travel, I like to feel like I am from there. I like to feel like I am doing what the locals do, feel that I am interacting with the place and its people in its fullest, and so I am a very open traveler. When I host, I like to understand peoples needs, a person who comes to Rio for a bussiness journey, will have different expectations of a person who is traveling for tourism. Or a person who is traveling with family, thinks different than someone who wants to enjoy the party scene in Rio, etc. So, I do love to hear from you, and I will do my best to accommodate your needs. 

Since I don't live full time in Brazil, and because together we can reach places we could never reach alone, I have lovely a co-host who helps me with this. Together we want to create unique ways for our guests to feel welcome.

That's why, we want to hear from you, your opinion is very important to us on this new journey. Our ideal is that the world can be only one, we are one and can live likewise, with love. A big community of people that altogether we can do beautiful things for ourselves, our community, our planet. We want to show love to people, and part of it, we will do by hosting you on the best way we can. 

What is your ideal? How can you feel home? What are things that could improve your experience in a new country? How do you like to meet people? What are your intentions with your trip? If you could choose something, anything, that would make your trip the most memorable, what would you envision? 

Love,

Carolina

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------







Olá Comunidade Airbnb,

Meu nome é Carolina, e eu sou... um poquinho... "cigana". Eu amo viajar, conhecer culturas diferentes, estudar linguas e pessoas, entender e conhecer pessoas e novas formas de viver.

No momento, me encontro no Havai, estudando para ser Parteira, trabalhando como Doula (Anjinhas que ajudam mulheres a dar a luz.) e gerenciando alguns projetos no Rio. Eu moro no Rio metade do ano, uma outra parte no Havai e alguns meses consigo viajar, quando meus desejos sao realizados. 

Eu posso dizer que sou uma "pessoa de pessoas", porque gosto de fazer pessoas se sentirem bem. De hospedar, a cozinhar, massagens, professora de yoga, etc. Eu simplesmente amo dividir com pessoas todas as coisas lindas que me fazem ser apaixonada pela vida nesse mundo. 

Por isso eu amo falar sobre o Brasil, viajar pelo Brasil e poder dividir essas experiencias por esse pais maravilhoso, o qual tenho orgulho de ter nascido em. O Brasil é minha casa, e o Rio meu coração. Aqui ja vivi diversas fases e conheço cenas diferentes. Desde de uma estudante de Direito com longas horas pelo centro, e conhecendo as festas de noite, á uma naturalista com longas horas no mato e em trilhas e dormindo muito a noite, á artista com longas horas de dança, teatro e circo, já fui turista por completo morando em um hostel, e agora tenho explorado o Rio com projetos pessoais, trabalhando em educaçao e as vezes produtora cultural. Eu vou crescendo e parece que o Rio cresce comigo, é sempre diferente e melhor quando volto pra casa. 

Quando viajo, gosto de sentir que "sou de lá". Gosto de viver a cultura e interagir com os lugares e pessoas ao maximo. Por isso, sou uma viajante muito aberta a experiencias. Quando hospedo, gosto de entender as necessidades pessoais de cada um, uma pessoa que procura meu apartamento para uma viagem de negocios, tem expectativas diferentes de alguem que veio á turismo. Pessoas viajando com familia, tem planos diferentes daqueles que vieram a procura da festa perfeita ou etc. Logo, eu gosto de escutar voces, e entender as suas necessidades, vou fazer o meu melhor para acomoda-las. 

Como não moro constantemente no Brasil, e como juntos chegaremos aonde jamais conseguiriamos chegar sozinhos, conto com a ajuda da minha Co-Anfitria. Juntas  nos queremos que os nossos hospedes se sintam em casa, o maximo possivel, queremos inovar e trazer experiencias lindas e diferentes pros nossos hospedes.

Por isso, queremos escutar voces. A sua opiniao é muito importante pra a gente nessa nova jornada.  Nosso ideal é que o mundo é só um. Somos todos um, e podemos viver assim, com amor. Uma enorme comunidade de pessoas que juntos, podemos construir coisas linda pra nós, nossa comunidade e nosso planeta. Queremos distribuir amor para as pessoas, e parte disso fazemos quando hospedamos nossos hospedes da melhor maneira que podemos. 

Qual é o seu ideal? Como você se sente em casa? Que coisas poderiam melhorar a sua estadia em um pais diferente, ou em uma cidade? Como você gosta de conhecer pessoas novas? Quais são suas intenções nessa viagem? Se você pudesse idelizar alguma coisa, qualquer coisa, que faria sua viagem inesquecivel, qual seria sua visão? 


Amor,
Carolina

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Ubicación, Ubicación y Ubicación.

Si voy nuevamente a Rio me quedaré en el mismo departamento.
Hubo una mala coordinación, afortunadamente Paula posee más de un departamento por lo que se pudo solucionar el inconveniente.

Passamos uma semana perfeita! Lindo o apto, tudo muito limpo, ótima localização, comércio e metrô embaixo de casa!! Foi a primeira vez que alugamos um apto, pois sempre ficávamos em hotel. Foi ótimo e queremos repetir a dose sempre que possível!!

Carolina was lovely to deal with: prompt, accommodating  and very kind. Attention to detail and great positive energy! The apartment too: very clean, light and breezy, very well kept and peaceful. Comfortable and excellent location. Highly recommended! Thank you Carolina for all your special attention! Will be back!

El departamento MUY SEGURO, ubicación EXCELENTE, todas las comodidades básicas perfecto, Internet OK, Muy COMODO, El check in y check out es muy eficiente y rápido, el personal de recepción muy amables todos.
Muy lindo detalle en la recepción !! Gracias !!!
El barrio muy lindo, la plaza excelente los fines de semana !
Carolina estuvo siempre atenta a nuestro alojamiento, respondiendo nuestras dudas.
Volveriamos sin duda a este departamento !!!! Viva Rio !!!
Gracias Carolina  por todo!!
Un gran saludo desde Mendoza, Argentina.
Everything perfect
Muy bien todo, de acuerdo a lo señalado. La zona muy segura.

I did like the appartment and the friendly reception at the entrance very much! Just a short walk to the nicest Ipanema beach as well as the whole district full of the bars, shops etc ) Would like to come back again.

Carolina is the friendliest host in the world. Although I didn't meet her in person , she was very friendly through messages. She replied quickly to any questions I had. 

The apartment is in the PERFECT location. Near the beach, right next door to grocery store, restaurants , shops, metro, bus. Everything you need in one place. If you are looking to go to Rio and experience it for the first time , this is the perfect place. If you already know rio and are just visiting again, this is the perfect place. The apartment has AC, wifi works well without any problems and also has a pool and garage. The garage is very tight but obviously not Carolina's fault. The apartment is clean and well kept. We stayed 8 days comfortably and I didn't even want to leave. Highly recommend. Thank you Carolina! Happy holidays to you and your family. Great work! Will be coming back.

Apto bem localizado a 1 quarteirão da praia. Não tive nenhum problema. Tudo conforme esperado.
Carolina sempre me deu retorno quando necessário 
Obrigado
The flat is very well located in Ipanema, near the beach and some restaurants and shops. Carolina was very welcoming and we enjoyed our stay there

THE apartment is perfect: clean, nice and perfect my located. Although I didn't get a chance to meet Carolina, communication was very good, and she was super helpful and nice! Would definitely recommend this apartment and Carolina as a host!

Our stay in the apartment was amazing! Everything went well, Carolina answers any messages, questions or concerns and the place is very comfortable. Best part is the location, you will very hardly find any place as conveniently close to everything you need. Overall fantastic, will come back!

I had a wonderful time staying in this apartment. It could not be located better (by the beach, grocery, metro, bars, restaurants, etc). I very much appreciated the 24 hour security and how patient the staff was when dealing with me not being able to speak Portuguese. 

I love the hammock on the balcony. Carolina was very accommodating and let me have a early check-in, as well as being fast to respond to any messages I sent to her. She had a lot of wonderful suggestions for local places to go. I would definitely stay here again!

Carolina was a great host. Although we didn't get a chance to meet, the communication before and during our booking was very easy and she was very helpful. The location is perfectly located. Close to restaurants and especially close to the beach! The apartment itself is as described and was convenient for what we needed. The stove broken while we were there and they came to fix it in a very short turnaround. We really appreciated that. The pool and shower that is in the building is a plus if you need to check out and have a later flight to catch in the day. Definitely recommend and will stay again if we come back to Rio. Thanks Carolina!

Carolina nos dejó recomendaciones de lugares y se mostró disponible ella y su colaboradora en toda la estadia (así como desde la primera consulta) preguntándonos si todo marchaba bien. Además, el edificio cuenta con porteria 24hs y estan disponibles también para ayudar y comunicar a Carolina.Tuvimos uno con la cocina y la luz de la cocina quemada y enseguida lo resolvieron. El departamento es como se muestra en las fotos, ubicación excelente a una cuadra de la playa de Ipanema y lleno de restaurantes y bares en el barrio además de muchas lineas de omnibus y el subte. 
Llegamos a las 10 de la mañana y tal como dijeron fueron super flexibles y como el departamento estaba vacío pudimos entrar. Lo mismo para el check out. Pero ademas en el edificio pueden guardar sus valijas y hay vestuarios y baños super limpios y la piscina que pueden usar del primer al último dia. Super recomendado!

Estuvimos dos semanas en el departamento con mi familia (somos 4), todo perfecto al entrar, hasta tuvieron el detalle de dejarnos una botella de vino :) 
El departamento es tal cual el anuncio, super limpio, cómodo, te cambian sabanas y toallas.
La ubicación es perfecta, a una cuadra de la playa, a media cuadra de un supermercado grande, y en frente a la Plaza donde pasan varios colectivos y esta el subte así que nos movimos en transporte público todo el tiempo. Yo llegue un domingo y el autobus del aeropuerto (Premuim) me dejo justo en la plaza frente al departamento, ideal!
Los recepcionistas del edificio muy amables, estan las 24hs.
Con Carolina hable durante la estadia y siempre me pregunto si estaba todo en orden o si necesitabamos algo.
Si volvemos a Rio definitivamente volveriamos a ese depto y lo voy a recomendar a conocidos que viajen.

El lugar es tal cual las fotos, tiene todo lo necesario y nos recibieron con algunas cosas para la cocina. El lugar muy céntrico a una cuadra de Ipanema en un lugar seguro y tranquilo, cerca de bares y restaurantes. A pesar que no vimos a Caro siempre estuvo disponible ella, las personas en recepción y su contacto en Rio.
perfect location in Ipanema!!!! and there is a sea view too! . Good for beach tourists. The best beach is only 1 block away. Cute apartment. I would go back!!

Great communication before arrival and after arrival by email but people on door at apartment dont speak english and we couldnt contact anyone when i arrived. This was not a problem though and I got in to the apartment quickly. The place is nice and clean and just like the photos. Great location. I stated three people were staying but only received two towels. This was fixed after a couple of days though.
Everything was good, great location, good service and a clean place

If you are looking for a very clean and functional apartment in a location near to the beach, restaurants, the Hippie Fair, and the metro and bus stations, you cannot possibly find a better one that this apartment.  It is exactly as described online and as shown in the photographs.  I have rented several apartments in the Ipanema area and this was by far the best one with the greatest location.  It is within a few steps of all public transportation and a myriad of great and reasonably priced restaurants.  Best of all, the owner, Carolina, is extraordinarily gracious and responsive.  Any small issue will be resolved to your satisfaction immediately.  I already have rebooked for next year at this time.  The only mistake you could make with this apartment is not renting it if you want a place in Ipanema for 2 or 3 people   It has a queen size bed in the bedroom and a sofa that pulls out into a separate bed in the living room.  Most importantly for someone like me, the wifi is particular fast and strong and always working.  You can walk to the beach in less than three minutes.  There is a supermarket about 200 meters away.  The Hippie Fair in General Osorio Square is directly across the street.  But there is absolutely no street noise as the apartment faces towards the sea and not the Square.  There is no security concern because the apartment is in a condominium building with a reception desk that is staffed 24 hours per day.  And while none of these folks speaks one word of English, they try their best to be of assistance in the rare situation where you might need something.   In addition, this apartment offers the unique plus of having daily maid service during the weekdays.  These people are extremely nice and efficient.  They clean the bathroom, throw out the garbage, and mop the floors and make the bed.  A really nice convenience!  Trust me, if you stay here you will love it.

Excelente estadía. Todo fue perfecto!!. Amabilidad y codialidad al recibirme (una gentileza el presente al entrar!!!), apartamento muy confortable, limpio y en la mejor ubicación de Ipanema (me fue super fácil llegar) y la seguridad espectacular!!!.
Disfruté mucho éste viaje a Rio.
Gracias Carolina por todo, y espero regresar en breve!!!!
great communication back and forth.  Area is within gayborhood with great restaurants, club and sauna nearby.

Muy buena ubicación. Todo al alcance de la mano.  Las ferias de la plaza le agregan otro condimento. Silencioso, pese a estar en un lugar en el centro de Ipanema. Recomendable en todo sentido. La limpieza y el servicio inmejorable.

El departamento es perfecto limpio,zona segura y con acceso a metro,camiones,tiendas de conveniencia y muy cerca de la playa 
Carolina muy accesible para la hora de check in y check out
Perfecto para  tu estadia en Rio

The pictures that are posted do not do the place justice. The apartment was much better looking and roomy than anticipated. We were also surprised to find a bottle of wine with two wine glasses to greet us. Very nice touch. 

The apartment is located at a very good spot in the city. Close to everything including public transportation.

We really felt safe and secure.
Apartamento arrumado, localização excelente.

Our stay was perfect! The apartment was across the park from the metro stop that went everywhere and made travel to the Olympic Games easy. They were also so sweet by having wine, chocolates, and flowers on our arrival for our honeymoon!

El departamento de Carolina es muy lindo, tal cual se ve en las fotos! Súper cómodo, limpio y la ubicación es excelente! La zona es ideal, enfrente está la estación del Subte, a una cuadra la playa y a media cuadra el supermercado 24 hs! 
Carolina se mostró súper atenta con nosotros, nos dio muy buenos datos para movernos en Rio! Incluso nos ofreció cosas para usar con nuestro bebé durante nuestra estadía! 
Recomendamos este departamento realmente! Nuestra estadía fue muy buena! Seguramente volveremos!!!

El departamento es tal cual esta publicado, fuimos 4 personas y estuvimos muy cómodas. La ubicación es muy buena y esta a solo una cuadra de la playa. Antes de viajar Carolina nos proporciono información para que nuestra estadía sea mas fácil, lo super recomiendo!

I really loved the place! The location is amazing, in front of one of Ipanema's main squares, which is also where a metro station is located and many buses stop there. A block away from Ipanema beach. The apartment is nice and comfortable, and it has its own balcony. Just a short walk away from Copacabana. There are a few restaurants and bars right there in Praca General Osorio and the supermarket is just 1 block away. The people at the front desk are wonderful and Carolina is very accomodating, she even let us do a late check-out which was very convenient to us since we had late flights.

cuando uno viaja con chicos la seguridad es lo más importante más cuando vas a otro país! todo excelente, limpio todo a mano! super predispuesta Carolina! la nueva decoración divina!  unas vaca maravillosas AAA y la playa a 100metros! !! hermoso super recomendable! !

El departamento de Carolina es tal cual como muestran las fotos, súper práctico y acogedor. La zona es inmejorable. 
Volveríamos a este lugar!

La anfitriona fue siempre muy solícita en responder a todas nuestras inquietudes antes y durante la estadía. La ubicación es inmejorable en el centro neurálgico de Ipanema, y a pasos a pie de Copacabana, pero tranquilo ya que da hacia la parte trasera que da a la playa. El apartamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, con limpieza diaria incluida si uno quiere, recepción las 24 horas, pileta en el edificio, contando con un placentero balcón que da a ella y con vista al mar que baña la playa de Ipanema. Tiene una hamaca paraguaya colgada allí muy bienvenida. Además de lo descripto y lo que se ve en las fotos, cuenta con un segundo A/C en el dormitorio y dos sillas plegables más un parasol para playa! Muy útiles!
El departamento es muy cómodo, completo, aunque algo justo si es para cuatro huéspedes como fue mi caso: solo se advierte la falta de una cuarta silla o banco que sería lo ideal! Igualmente, la evaluación fundada en la relación calidad/precio es ampliamente favorable. Volvería sin dudas

A Carolina foi ótima, nos deu importantes dicas de transporte, nos recepcionou com garrafa de vinho e as dependências do apto são fieis às fotos publicadas.
Excelente apto.
Muy buena ubicación. Departamento chico pero muy completo. Una sola critica, no limpian todos los dias.

great location - very close to Ipanema beach, subway to the city centre, big 24h supermarket... partial view to the ocean; the apartment is equipped with everything you need for a short stay (well equipped kitchen, deckchairs and beach parasol); small balcony with hammock, TV, good wifi and good double bed; the building is probably from the 70's that's why is the apartment pretty small but enough for 2 persons and there is no sound proofing... very good communication with the host
Carolina was generous enough to allow us late check out (nobody booked the day of our departure).  The apartment staff are as trustworthy as any.  Second time with a third in the distant future.
Great area...few steps from the Ipanema beach! Apartment good and cleaned!

Tudo ok, mas na hora de fazer o check out, não pudemos o sector da piscina, nem banheiro, nem utilizar o dto unas horas mais como fora oferecido, pelo que tivemos que ficar na rua con muito calor y crianças até o horário que paso nosso táxi para o aeroporto.
A Carolina foi muito atenciosa nas informações. A localização é excelente, o prédio ótimo, recepcionistas simpáticos. O apartamento corresponde ao anunciado. Recomendaria e voltaria, com certeza.
Estava tudo exatamente como descrito. Ocorreu tudo sem problemas. Voltaria e recomendo, a quem estiver procurando apto. no local e acomodações similares.
Localização ótima... próxima de tudo! Adoramos! Apartamento limpo e cheiroso, com limpeza diária.
Ubicación genial!!! Atención muy deferente y personalizada. Excelente lugar para uso de transporte público. Zona relajada y segura. Recomendable!!

Bel appartement conforme à la description.
Idéalement placé tout proche des bus et métros, de tous types de commerce et à 5 mn à pied de la plage d'Ipanema.
Appartement bien équipé et parfaitement sécurisé avec accueil 24/24.
Piscine bien agréable et propre.
Petit détail : il manque peut être une table sur la terrasse.
Pour le reste, nous recommandons sans réserve 
Merci à Carolina

Muy lindo el depto, ubicación genial, ideal para visitar Río y pasear, nosotros fuimos en auto, tenía cochera, nuestras hijas amaron la pileta. siempre limpio, venían todos los días a limpiar. Ipanema es bello y estaba cerca para ir a pie de copacabana.
Muchas tiendas, super en la misma cuadra, restoranes muchos todo tipo de comida.
Gracias Carolina, hermosa tu casa. Volveriamosssss

Everything was perfect, great location and lovely apartment. 
Ipanema beach is just round the corner and the Metro (General Osorio). 
There are lots of bars, cafes, restaurants and shops near by. And most important thing is very safe area. 
I really enjoyed it staying at Carolina's apartments and Carolina is very caring host. During my stay she was texting me and asking if everything was ok or if I needed anything.  Thanks a lot.

La casa de Carolina tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unas buenas vacaciones, cerca de la playa, bien ubicado en la zona de resto de ipanema y con facilidad para trasladarse hacia otros puntos turisticos

El departamento esta bien para ir a pasar unas vacaciones en familia, la ubicación es excelente, cerca de todo, lamenta mente sufrimos un robo en playa ipanema lo que  entristeció un poco el final de nuestra estadia( mucho cuidado a  la hora de ir a la playa, no llevar nada personal, lo indispensable) sobre todo frente al puesto 8
Excelente, el depto divino y la atención de Dandara excelente.

I had the pleasure of staying in 2 of Carolina's apartments, one on the 8th floor and one on the 5th. Both have sea views. The location is incredible: one block from the sea, a few minutes from the lake, metro 2mins away, a lovely park across the streets which has 2 markets a week, shops, bars and restaurants all nearby. The apartments are comfortable and homely; well maintained.

I would recommend this apartment to anyone I know staying in Ipanema. It's a great location with a supermarket nearby, close to the metro, in a safe neighborhood and a great nightlife or restaurants. I liked hearing the waves crashing on the beach as I went to sleep!

Minha mãe passou quase duas semanas e ficou impressionada. O apartamento é muito bonito, além de totalmente equipado e com limpeza diária. A vista para o mar deixa o ambiente ainda mais acolhedor e nos arredores é possível encontrar bons restaurantes e um supermercado a pouquíssimos metros. Carolina é uma anfitriã solícita e atenciosa.

Excelente departamento, muy cerca de la playa y también de una zona comercial cómoda para comprar comida, ir a comer y viajar a otras partes de la ciudad porque tiene a una cuadra el metro. El departamento es cómodo, bien equipado y ante cualquier problema Dándara se ocupa perfectamente. También la gente que trabaja en la recepción y hace la limpieza son impecables. Muy recomendable.
Ótimo apartamento super bem localizado. Recomendo.

Location! Location! Location! Across the street from the park where the Hippy Fair takes place on Sundays; and the farmers market on Tuesdays! Lot of restaurants and bars in a residential setting! Short walking distance to the beach!
Ótima localização e ambientes, tudo muito organizado e limpo!

We had a fantastic week at Carolina's place! It's right next to the beach and all the excitement Ipanema has to offer, as well as being clean and comfortable for two. Carolina was an exceptional host, who always answered questions right away and helped me in every situation. I can highly recommend this apartment for your stay in Rio!
Great location and place. Very accommodating!!!

Carolina's place was great! Very close to the beach, and though there is not s beach view, you can see part of the ocean and islands off shore from the balcony in  the back! It is also extremely convenient to public transportation. The plaza where the famous Hippie Faire happens is right accross from the building, but you are not woken up by street or faire noise because the apartment faces the back. The bed is queen size and comfortable, and  we are so picky about beds and have had trips ruined by bad beds. Both Carolina and Dandara were very helpful with tips about getting around, and we had some very serious business to take care of while here, so that was criticsl information to have from someone who lives here. Thanks!
The place is really nice. I stayed on my own so the space was more than enough, the hammock on the balcony made for relaxing reads and everything you needed was available.
This was a great location. We had a great stay here. Would really recommend.
El apartamento es precioso, muy cómodo y limpio, tal cual como se muestra en las fotos. La zona donde se encuentra es excelente.

The location is quite perfect. Markets, drugstores, restaurants, metro...all conveniently located. The place is very clean and kept so by daily cleaning service (when you leave during the day). The property itself (pool included) is also well maintained. There is someone at the front 24/7 to leave or obtain your keys during your comings/goings. The Wifi worked well (I used it for work & it was excellent). The Gym is small, but has a treadmill, bike, elliptical, weight machine and free weights to keep you occupied. A little deck w a lovely hammock to cool down in...all in all this place is very well thought out. Obrigada!
Muy lindo departamento y muy buen ubicado. En el edificio hay pileta y estacionamiento disponibles. También hay servicio de limpieza si uno lo requiere. Estuvimos muy a gusto. Gracias por todo.
Perfect apartment, wonderful host. I would definitely recommend staying here. We had a fantastic first time in Rio and for Carnival
Great apartment in a great location. A block from the beach and near many bars/restaurants. Would definitely stay again.

This is a delightful little apartment.  75 meters from a market.  One block from the beach.  Safe and secure.  I didn't use the pool, but people were there every day.  It is small, so I would not recommend for more than a couple, but otherwise it was just perfect!  Thank you so much for sharing your space!

Tim

Excelente lugar! La pasamos muy bien, Carolina y sus compañeras siempre muy atentas. El departamento tiene una ubicación inmejorable, a 1 cuadra y media de la playa y enfrente al subte, está cerca de algunos bares y lugares para comer al paso. El depto impecable, entran 3 personas cómodas y 4 personas muy justas, más allá de eso todo super bien.

Had a great stay at Carolina's place. Was in a great location and is a stylish cute place!
Some small miscommunication with her co-host on the check out but otherwise a nice place, nice location close to the beach and metro.
Apartamento muy como y muy bien ubicado ya que esta muy cerca de la playa y lugares para comer. Otro punto alto es que el transporte hacia otros lugares de la ciudad es muy accesible.
It's amazing!!

El dpto cumple con todo lo prometido en la publicación. La ubicación creo que es lo mejor, mas si se le agarra la mano al subte (Metro). La pasamos muy bien. El único inconveniente fue con la llave pero nos solucionaron rapidísimo. 
Totalmente recomendable el dpto.

Perfect apartment for me. Great location, a block from Metro, a block from the beach and great restaurants all around. Doorkeepers were awesome and around 24hrs. Apartment was cleaned daily. I just hope it’s available for my next trip to Rio!

Buena localización cerca de la playa y el metro. El personal del edificio muy amable. El apartamento es un poco mas pequeño de lo que se ve en las fotos y también un poco menos "moderno". De cualquier forma suficiente para pasar un semana en Rio.
Bon emplacement, personnel de l’immeuble sympathique et efficace.

Increíble departamento, con inmejorable ubicación. Solo hubo un poco de problemas de comunicación con el staff del edificio (portero), porque no hablan mas que portugués, pero solucionable con (Hidden by Airbnb) translate. 
La dueña del apartamento promueve el intercambio de libros, de haberlo sabido de antemano, seguro llevaba uno.

En la mejor zona de Río de Janeiro, un apartamento perfecto para una pareja. Muy bien ubicado, confortable y con todo lo que se necesita para disfrutar esa ciudad maravillosa.  La llegada y salida fueron sin problemas y la limpieza está disponible todos los días. Volvería sin dudas.
A estadia foi como esperávamos. Gostamos e recomendamos para quem busca um lugar para três pessoas em uma excelente localização.
A great apartment in the perfect location.
Just as described. Amazing location. Very clean. Best option for the price.

Carolina's place was a great launch pad for exploring Rio;  we particularly liked the proximity of the beach and grocery stores.  The apartment itself was very comfortable, and we enjoyed the space.  The communication with Fabi was excellent, thanks again for hosting us!

This was absolutely the worst Airbnb I have ever experienced -- it was a complete horror story. As someone who has stayed at many Airbnbs, all over the world, without any issues, and as a former Airbnb Superhost, I would strongly discourage people from staying here unless significant remediations are made. Even though there are many positive reviews, it's just not worth the risk.

- Security issues. A friend, who could have been anyone, walked up to the building's front desk, said the apartment number (without providing my or his name), and was handed my apartment key, no questions asked. The front desk did not ask for ID or try to contact me. When I told the host about this incident, she responded by suggesting I was lying. It was extremely concerning and uncomfortable, especially given the crime in Rio.

- Safety issues. The elevator broke down while I was inside it (coincidentally, only hours before midnight on New Year's Eve). We called for help using the in-phone elevator only to be connected with the front desk staff that was unable to provide any comprehensible instructions for how to exit. This was not a language issue; they just couldn’t say anything other than “a call was made to the elevator company.”  After several minutes, I was able to figure out, without their help, how to open a manual latch hidden above the door and jump up to safety (elevator was stuck mid-floor). Throughout my stay, one of the two elevators was often out of service. I have photos that show this. After my stay, rather than offer any refund, the host complained about needing to replace the elevator phone, which was broken out of panic, but not by me, but by someone else in the broken elevator during the incident (there is video evidence of this).

- Water issues. Only two of us were staying at the Airbnb, yet we regularly ran out of hot water when taking showers. The host responded by saying, since it's hot in Rio, people don't take showers with hot water.” This is not only false (friends staying at other Airbnbs had hot water just fine), but also totally unacceptable for an Airbnb at this price.

- AC issues. The bedroom air conditioner does not properly modulate temperature, so it is either extremely cold or extremely hot (despite changing the temperature on the remote control). When I told the host about this issue, she responded just by saying the AC was new and that couldn’t be the case.

- Linen issues. Several linens were soiled when I arrived. The mattress cover had rips and stains, the mattress was dirty, and there were no pillow protectors. I have photos that show this. When I told the host, she responded by telling me I was lying and that I caused these problems.

- Other minor nuisances (that I normally wouldn’t even bother to mention, and would still give 5 stars in spite of, but will note in the context of the other above problems): Electrical issues - multiple outlets did not work properly. The hair dryer broke after 10 seconds of use. Wi-fi went down during my stay. Given all of the other major issues and the rude and unhelpful responses from the host, I did not even bother bringing these other issues to her attention.

- Host. It should now go without saying that the host was both rude and unhelpful. Rather than offer any level of refund, apologize, or even just offer helpful solutions, the host generally responded to my concerns by claiming I was lying.

I strongly discourage you from staying here. There are other Airbnbs in the area that are safer and have significantly better value. Again, it's just not worth the risk.
Excelente lugar, cómodo, súper limpio y cerca de todo. La disposición del espacio es óptima y cuentan con servicio de limpieza

Very good apartment. Safe, clean, quiet and cozy. It has everything you’ll need for the every day life.
WiFi is very good!
Will be considered whenever I come back to Rio

name: Suite w/private bath, Forest Hills
summary: Bedroom (w/queen bed) & adjacent sitting room (w/sofa bed) & private bath w/walk-in shower, AC, in Forest Hills, Queens, on quiet street w/parking.  20 minutes by subway to Manhattan.  Close to US Open Tennis Ctr & Forest Hills Stadium. Lvg rm w/fireplace, kitchen, yard, TV rm. Walk to restaurants, shopping, etc.
space: This stately red brick federal on a quiet street in Forest Hills, Queens, is a perfect launching pad for all that NYC has to offer. See neighborhood description below. The suite consists of an air conditioned bedroom with queen sized bed and dresser, closet, private bath with walk-in shower, and an adjoining air conditioned sitting room with sofa bed.  There is abundant natural light in the room and throughout the house.  Several other bedrooms are available in this house and are described in separate listings. All guests receive fresh linens upon arrival. Guests may park in the private driveway.  Electric vehicle owners may use the Level 2 EV Charging Station (SAE-J1772).
description: Bedroom (w/queen bed) & adjacent sitting room (w/sofa bed) & private bath w/walk-in shower, AC, in Forest Hills, Queens, on quiet street w/parking.  20 minutes by subway to Manhattan.  Close to US Open Tennis Ctr & Forest Hills Stadium. Lvg rm w/fireplace, kitchen, yard, TV rm. Walk to restaurants, shopping, etc. This stately red brick federal on a quiet street in Forest Hills, Queens, is a perfect launching pad for all that NYC has to offer. See neighborhood description below. The suite consists of an air conditioned bedroom with queen sized bed and dresser, closet, private bath with walk-in shower, and an adjoining air conditioned sitting room with sofa bed.  There is abundant natural light in the room and throughout the house.  Several other bedrooms are available in this house and are described in separate listings. All guests receive fresh linens upon arrival. Guests may park in the private driveway.  Electric vehicle owners may use the Level 2 EV Charging Station (SAE-J1772). Gue
neighborhood_overview: It's easy to enjoy all that NYC has to offer from this Forest Hills location. Walk three blocks to the subway station and you can be in midtown Manhattan in 20 minutes on the express E or F train. Walk to a concert at the newly renovated Forest Hills Stadium.  Cycle through nearby Flushing Meadows Corona Park for a US Open tennis match or catch a Mets game at Citifield. Walk four blocks to the Long Island railroad for easy access to Penn Station or points east including area beaches. Eat at any number of vibrant restaurants on nearby Austin Street or venture by car or cab to one of the many ethnic neighborhoods in Queens for cuisine you just won't find anywhere else: Mongolian Hotpot, Korean Barbecue, and more. Business travelers will find within easy walking distance various banks/ATMs, a copy and print center, the US Post Office UPS/FedEx store, coffee shops and a large Barnes and Noble. Tweens, teens and young adults will enjoy browsing the boutiques and name brand clothing stores o
notes: The listed price of $125/night is for two guests.  An additional charge of $10/night/person is charged for up to two additional guests. Electric vehicle owners may use the Level 2 EV Charging Station (SAE-J1772).
transit: A three block walk to the Forest Hills/71st Rd/Continental subway station provides easy access to midtown Manhattan, the theatre district, Central Park, museums, and even Coney Island. A four-block walk to the Long Island Railroad gives quick access to Penn Station and points east including Jones Beach. The house is a 15-minute ($20) cab ride from LaGuardia Airport and a 20-25 minute ($24) cab ride from JFK Airport. Guests arriving by car may park in the private driveway.
access: Guests have access to the common areas of the house on the first floor which include a large living room with working fireplace, smaller sitting room with cable TV, dining room, full kitchen, breakfast area and laundry facilities. Wifi is available throughout the house. In good weather, guests may enjoy the backyard with patio, table and chairs, hammock, basketball hoop and gas grill. The fully equipped kitchen includes oven, range, microwave, refrigerator, freezer, dishwasher, coffee maker, toaster and all kitchen basics for meal preparation. Walk five minutes to the corner grocery store for fresh bagels or lunch fixings.
interaction: One of us will be present during a good portion of your stay, and we are available by phone, text or email at all other times.
house_rules: Guests are expected to respect others' needs for quiet in the evening and morning hours. No smoking. No pets. Alcohol only in moderation. Absolutely no recreational drugs. Our family of three splits our time between this home and our home in NJ. One of our guests serves as innkeeper for us when we are off sight. We have owned our home in this lovely neighborhood for 14 years and we will gladly share with you our favorite places to go and things to do!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Ruth and her husband Carlos were great. My daughter and I got in very late and Carlos was there to greet us when we arrived. 
Everything was very accurate, comfortable and clean. We slept very well after a long day of travel and it was nice to have a place to stay that we felt comfortable so that we could rest well. 
Ruth and Carlos were very helpful with local knowledge and enjoyed sharing what they knew. 
The neighborhood seemed fine we were in late and out early so we didn't spend much time. 
We were very happy with everything and would love to stay again if the opportunity comes up. 
Thank you Ruth and Carlos for being great host!
Chuck

I cannot imagine anyway in which my stay here could have been improved. The room was spotless, with its own private bathroom, the bed was comfortable and the house itself is gorgeous. Ruth and Carlos were generous with their time and their home and I was sorry to leave when it came time to fly home.
