Ruth and Carlos are amazing hosts. They are friendly and welcoming and they made us feel like home. The room was large and cosy. The house is conveniently located in the beautiful and safe neighborhood of Forest Hills just 2 blocks from the express train to Manhattan. I would totally come back. Highly recommended!!
这是我的第一次Airbnb经历,我觉得非常完美｡Ruth家距离地铁仅一个街区,整个社区环境好,安全｡房间布置干净,宽敞,在纽约能住到这种房子很不错,我是一个人入住,有家的感觉｡第二天一早的飞机,距LGA只有11分钟车程,Ruth一大早6点就送我离开,还送我一个饼干｡下次来纽约还会住这里,推荐!谢谢Ruth一家!

Ruth, Carlos and Miriam made our stay most comfortable. They opened up their lovely home to us and were extremely accommodating, often asking if there was anything more we needed. They oriented us, helped us with our transportation plans and made suggestions about what to see and do.

The suite was as clean and attractive as the pictures suggest. The attached sunroom was a bonus and probably even more enjoyable in the summertime.

The family friendly neighbourhood felt very safe even for us (2 women) walking at night. The subway is about a 10 minute walk from the house and a convenient way to get to Manhattan. There are stores, restaurants, banks, etc. nearby as well.

We were told to help ourselves to the breakfast foods that were thoughtfully and generously provided. We woke up each morning to the wonderful smell of coffee brewing. If you're lucky and Carlos is around, he might even make you one of his expert cappucinos!

All in all, a 5 star experience for a fraction of the price!
We had a very pleasant stay at their beautiful house and room! Great hosts and breakfast, we loved the bagels. It was fun to hang out with everyone.

Carlos was a great host. He gave us  a map of  the subway system to get around in New York.  We were able to park our car in his driveway which was great and a big help. Our room was nice and clean we felt  like we were at home.

Ruth and her family made us feel like we were part of the household.  We had fresh-ground coffee waiting for us along with breakfast choices every morning. The bed was extremely comfortable. The room was exactly as pictured, if not even better than the picture suggested!  We had no problems with other guests who were as courteous as our hosts. The home is beautifully furnished, but it was a real home, not a museum. The location is perfect for anyone who wants the essential NYC experience without the drawbacks:  we had no parking problems, were in a lovely neighborhood, and comfortably close to transportation centers, shopping and good restaurants. After having a few "bad hotel" experiences, we are in love with air bnb'ing for our stays thanks to Ruth & her family. We highly recommend this bnb for the all-important three c's: comfort, convenience and cleanliness.  Yes we will return!

Ruth is a wonderful and very accommodating Hostess with a wealth of knowledge. Quick to respond too! She made my business trip stay less like a work stay but more like a home. The space of 500 words can not justify how wonderful her and her family is. I would highly recommend a stay here to anyone and everyone. The location makes it an easy access to everything.  Enjoy the fast pace life of NYC and return to tranquility and peace here.

Very sweet family who welcomed me in and made me feel right at home.  Room, house, accommodations, family and everything else exceeded my expectations and I had a great experience.  Would definitely stay here again and recommend this place for others.

The room and the house were wonderful.  There were so many thoughtful details to make the stay easy and pleasant: a bottle of water, clear instructions for local transportation, restaurants, and how to use the homes amenities.  I would definitely stay again.
FABULOUS! Ruth is a pleasure and her home is beautiful. The house is very comfortable and well maintained, the bedroom and bath are functional and beautifully decorated.
Everything was great! Ruth accommodated me last minute with no issue. The room was perfect, I would stay here again for sure!

Ruth and Carlos were great host, the emails were timely and informative. The room is great and is exactly as pictured. The three season room is just an added bonus to the bedroom.
The location is just a few blocks from Austin Street which is filled with every type of store that one would need. 
Definitely worth stay there again.
We had a wonderful first experience with Air BNB! Ruth and Carlos warmly welcomed us into their lovely home. We loved the cozy and quiet suite, and we will be back very soon!

A lovely home and a great room in a great location! Easy to the subway and Manhattan and a nice neighborhood as well. The hosts, particularly Carlos, were gracious and very accomodating. The house is lovely, immaculately clean and the room was terrific! The bed was very comfortable, sheets and towels great, bathroom great and the extra sitting room was a welcome bonus! I really enjoyed staying here and would highly recommend it to anyone!

Our stay with Ruth in Forest Hills was wonderful. Ruth truly is the kindest of hosts. The room is beautiful, and so is the rest of the house. She even provided nice bagels and snacks in the morning, which makes you feel even more quickly at home. Mirjam is also very sweet, and gave me and my sister tips on where to go. I would recommend this room to anyone looking for a comfortable stay.

Wow, what a wonderful, relaxing place! And Ruth and Carlos are the best! I can't say enough nice things about this place, including the most comfortable bed I've had away from home. And I honestly can't think of any negatives.

At Yankee Stadium we call it a home run!  Our experience meeting and staying at the home of Ruth and Carlos this past Saturday was a winner.  We would stay there again the next time we go down to the Big Apple.  They are so friendly and the neighborhood was beautiful and we found them without using GPS.

I search for words to describe this experience, but I can only say I want it to go back:) The room is very comfortable, in a safe and nice neighborhood. Ruth not only gives clear and thorough instructions before the trip, but also looks out for my needs during the stay.  They also have their lovely assistant Miriam there for on site help. All the little details like morning coffee, fresh flowers in the room and so on made my stay very enjoyable. Thank you Carlos for helping me with my big suitcase. What a wonderful family, hope to see you guys again soon. All the best!

Ruth and Carlos are nice and delight people. They have a wonderful house in a nice community with convenient transportations. Me and my mom love the decoration of their house. The room that we were leaving is deserved the price. I will recommend all my friends who will visit NYC to consider leaving with them. Thanks. Ruth和Carlos真的是很不错的房东,他们的房子所在的区域离地铁非常近,并且有停车位,非常适合想要来纽约玩儿上一阵子的朋友居住｡很漂亮的放子,很热情的房东!

Our stay at Ruth and Carlos' home was great. They were very accommodating to our needs: early drop off of suitcases, coffee ready at 8am each morning and a lovely suite for our stay. We wanted to find a spot close to our son's home in Forest Hills and this fit the bill perfectly: 1/2 mile away! 
Barbara and Mike
Excellent experience. Ruth family are very rice. Room is clean, house is near subway station, the neighborhood is very safe. Highly recommend!
We had a wonderful experience through Airbub. Ruth and her family are very nice. The room just like as the photos. It's close the subway(E,M), just need 25 mins to Manhattan.

We stayed at Ruth's Airbnb for almost 2 weeks while our bathroom was being renovated.  It was extremely convenient to be able to stay in our community, expecially since there are no hotels in Forest Hills.
Ruth was very welcoming and accommodating.  She made sure I was comfortable and aware of everything.  She provided everything I needed.  A great host and a great room!

A huge thank you to Ruth and Carlos for being so accommodating during our stay in Forest Hills.  There home is well-appointed and is exactly as described.  The attached private sitting room was a bonus!  We needed to stay an extra night and when contacting Ruth to do so, she responded quickly and was able to oblige us.  Would definitely stay again!

Our host Carlos was perfectly welcoming. He showed us around the house and provided all the practical information that we needed. Our accommodations were as pictured and perfectly comfortable. The neighborhood is convenient for using the subway to travel to Manhattan.

The room was exactly as described.  The bedroom was a good size, the attached sun room was large and it was definitely a bonus to have our own private bathroom.

The house itself was very nice and sits in a safe neighbour, which is only a few blocks away from the express subway line.

It was out first Airbnb experience and we would definitely come back here again!

I booked this property for my in-laws from Hong Kong while my family stayed nearby in our family apartment. We registered four within the two rooms; tight but doable. 

We booked the property in three separate sessions over a period of two weeks. We also paid an understandable small fee for an extra person in the room. 

The house was very nice, furnishings quite cozy and the ground and 4-block distance to the train station optimum. The laundry machine and dishwasher were very nice though a bit hi-tech for the less technically inclined. My wife had to help when the in-laws needed to wash.   I do have a few comments. 

Air-conditioning was inadequate. There was a low btu unit in the living room that serviced that room, the dining room,  kitchen, foyer and TV room. Even in moderate heat, the capacity would have been insufficient and NYC was suffering a heat wave at the time. Our folks' boiled lobster, combined with another group of guests' cooking pungent Texmex tacos probably didn't bode well for an odorless environment.   

The beds were comfortable and room quite pleasant but there was no window aircon. Instead, there was a very noisy standalone room blower. My in-laws elected to keep it off and open the windows. Two of them further elected to hang out on the livingroom sofas until midnight where there was some respite from the heat.

Ruth was incredibly hospitable, and my mom and I had a lovely stay. The room was as advertised, with a sitting room attached. The bed was fantastic and incredibly comfortable. We greatly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it
Ruth is an excellent host. We enjoyed our time a lot. The place was clean and quiet.

My room was fantastic and actually exceeded my expectations because of this beautiful sun room that was accessed via my bedroom.  The water pressure was just what I needed after a long day at multiple tennis courts and walking through the city. 

Ruth is a gracious host, the neighborhood was convenient to everything including the metro.

I hope to be back next year!  Same time same space
Had a very nice stay.  Room was just like pictures - very cozy and comfortable.  Would definitely book this again!  Only got to meet Miriam this time.  She was very sweet and informative.

We had a nice stay here for our U.S. Open trip. The room was exactly as described and the space was neat and clean. Ruth and her husband are kind hosts and made sure we had everything we needed. They left some breakfast foods for guests each morning. The short walk to the subway was perfect for us. The only thing we would have liked to know ahead of time was that we wouldn't be able to lock our room from the outside when we were out. We would absolutely stay here again. Thanks Ruth and Carlos for a great experience.

Our experience here was very nice. The house is what appears in the photos. We didn't get to meet Ruth or Carlos, but we did meet Miriam. She was very accommodating. We had our stay during a hot spell so the AC was not working adequately or we didn't properly set it up. The room was very warm.  The shower was great and access to a kitchen was great.  We would definitely suggest the AirBnb.  The subway is a few blocks away which we used extensively.

The room was exactly like the pictures.  It was truly like being at home.  This is a great centrally located spot for navigating around the Queen, Bronx and NY areas.  I was in NY for a couple of day on business and Carlos and Ruth made me feel right at home.  The communication was quick and clear as well as any questions I had in regards to where to eat and what to do.  The place is only a couple of blocks from the subway system and you can be in Manhattan in about an half hour.  I will definitely stay here again when I need to come and work around this area.  5 Star Rating

Ruth's suite in Forest Hills suited us perfectly.  We wanted a central location in Queens near the U. S. Open site, and this spot was it.  It is within 3 blocks of the subway and within 4 of the railroad.  The local grocery store is super convenient and also close.  This is a very safe neighborhood and very close to Austin Street where there are tons of small shops and restaurants. Fantastic food and baked goods available everywhere. 
Ruth and Carlos were around just often enough to be convenient but not too often to interfere with our privacy.  And Miriam, the housekeeper, was very friendly and helpful.  
We walked through three different parks within walking distance and discovered things I am sure most of the residents of Queens are too busy to know about. Because we like exercise, we would stay in this location again without question.  It was just as advertised.
Ruth and Carlos were great hosts - very welcoming and accommodating.

Nice district and nice house, well located for our purpose, close to the subway. A little bit disappointed that our hosts had not much time to welcome us with something to drink when we arrived after this long trip from France.  Besides that Ruth and Daniel are very nice.
Michel
Ruth and her husband were very helpful to us as we arrived and very warm and helpful to us in getting our bearings in the area.

Delightful family.  Beautiful room with AMAZING sunporch.  Close to subway and LIRR. Close to LGA/JFK - I took bus and subway from LGA.  Charming neighborhood.  Nice commercial strip nearby on Austin Ave.  I live in Chicago; Forest Hills sort of reminds me of Evanston.  I'll be back.
It's a good experience, Ruth is very nice and room is comfortable.  I will be there if I will go to New York again.

Ruth was great! She worked with me on booking this for my parents who were visiting from Canada. They wrote: "We were very pleased and delighted with our stay with Carlos and Ruth at their Airbnb.  Our hosts were warm and friendly and ensured that we were aware of all of the amenities available to us.  It felt like a home away from home!   A spacious and comfortable room which included a private sun room, large and comfortable common living room and dining area, and kitchen access.   The location was ideal for us - a short 10 minute walk to the subway, 20 minutes to mid-town on the express train, and close to anything we may have needed.  I would recommend their Airbnb to anyone and look forward to staying there again on our next trip to NYC." Thank you Ruth and Carlos!

I reserved this beautiful private Suite for a couple of friends who travelled to the US for a wedding. Since the beginning of the dialogue with Ruth, it simply became very easy. I accompanied my friends to the property on Saturday evening. We immediately felt very welcome and were offered a tour of the entire house: Immaculate, warm, ...... 
My international friends felt immediately very relaxed. They enjoyed the 1st night, the breakfast on the next morning. Idem for the 2nd night. 
As it was the 1st time I was booking a room in this property, I know now that  I can repeat the same scenario any time we will have guests.

Another great stay with Ruth and her family.  Her home is always welcoming. The location is great for anyone needing to be in Forest Hills and/or wanting to explore NYC since the subway and LIRR are a few blocks walk. The room was bright and cheerful.

We very much enjoyed our time with Ruth and Carlos.  They were extremely friendly and made us feel very comfortable.  The public living areas were huge and served more than our needs.  Our room was wonderful and together with the adjacent patio, we felt we were staying in luxury. We would definitely return.  As a matter of fact we showed all our family members our room and they were jealous not to know about it!  We wish we could have stayed longer.  We recommend it highly, particularly for a family celebration as there are many rooms.  Thank you so much, Ruth and Carlos!

My parents had a lovely stay at Ruth's home when they came to visit. The room was very well taken care of, clean, with lots of private space. They are actually returning to stay there again in 2 months! Two thumbs up!

Ruth and her husband gave us a very warm welcome. She send all the information to me before we arrived.The room is just as the pictures, nice and clean. Thanks for the toys which helped me a lot to keep my daughter busy. That's a great experience stay with Ruth! All the best!

We had a terrific stay with Ruth and Carlos.  We were welcomed by Ruth who was able to answer any questions that we had.  The information we received before we arrived was very thorough and helpful.  The accommodations were so comfortable and true to the descriptions and photos.  The location was perfect for us.  We were so close to family, restaurants, the subway, and more.  The off-street parking was the icing on the cake.  We look forward to staying with Ruth and Carlos again.

Ms Ruth and her husband are extremely friend, room is beautiful and convenient to train station, a   Cafe, restaurant and shopping street are just few minutes away, the lady who serve us with breakfast was very helpful and offered us a lot of city explore information, we had enjoyed our stay.
These are wonderful people and a joy to be around. They are the perfect family to share a house with.
The best place to stay.  The area and the place.  Thanks Ruth.

Staying at Ruth's house was wonderful! Ruth was a great host, as was Miriam, her AirBNB assistant. Ruth stayed up late until we arrived to show us around, where the coffee was, etc.

The room looks just as it does in the pictures, the shower was hot and had great pressure. The little sitting room was nice to have, too - we loved the couches so much we're considering buying our own of the same brand :)

We used to live nearby, so we were familiar with the neighborhood and loved being back there. Austin Street is within walking distance with really great restaurants! Try Bareburger (7 minute walk), and Hot Bialys and Bagels down in Kew Gardens (15 minute walk). 

For first time visitors to NYC, Forest Hills is a bit of a trek to Manhattan (30-45 minutes at a minimum on subway). It is very safe though, and one of the best places to stay in Queens. I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Ruth's beautiful bedroom is exactly as the picture shows, right down to the placement of the pillows on the bed.  What you don't see is that there is a fabulous sleeping porch with huge couch and lots of windows and natural light!  Everything was perfectly clean and neat.  Ruth's kitchen was available all day, with English muffins and granola bars.  Even though I don't drink coffee, I saw the set-up and an espresso machine.  A young woman named Miriam lives in the house, even though Ruth and her family are not there during the week.  The house is in a great section of Forest Hills - it's safe and walkable right up to Queens Boulevard, for everything you might need.  Keyless entry to the front door is easy and really safe. Because I'm a B&B owner, I think a 'vacation' breakfast might include fresh fruit and eggs, but location trumps all of that.  It was an easy walk to see my new grandbaby!  Thank you, Ruth.
We had a great stay! This was our third time staying at Ruth and Carlos' place, and the hospitality and room was great as always.

Carlos, Ruth & Miriam were hospitable and friendly.  It was very easy to come and go, and we loved the bedroom with the large sun porch.  It was a bonus to be able to use the kitchen; coffee, cereal, etc. were conveniently available for breakfast.  The house was in a great location for us with very easy access to the LIRR and Metro trains into Manhattan. Thank you!

Ruth and Carlos were great hosts.  Answered all of our questions about  our travels.  Helped us find a local bakery to help us satisfy our sweet tooth.   Easy proximity to the subway.  The room and bathroom were clean and perfect for our visit.
房子与描述地完全一样｡离地铁站和超市都比较方便｡附近有个学校,放学后的时间孩子们可以进去里面玩｡房子里的公共空间非常大,厨房的东西也很全,可以自己做东西吃,房主提供牛奶/面包/果酱｡房主热情温和,给人很舒服的感觉｡

Perfect for our needs. Such a lovely and welcoming home and hosts. Neighborhood is safe and wonderful as well. We simply don't have a bad thing to say! We never dreamed we could feel this "at home" in New York!

The room/suite was comfortable, tidy, and peaceful. I enjoyed the sunroom as an extra spot to relax. Overall, the house is charming and in a nice, residential area. The ability to park in the driveway was a major plus. The subway is only a 5 minute walk away as is a grocery, pharmacy, and bank. There are also plenty of restaurants within walking distance.
Carlos was there to greet me, give me a tour of the house, and answer any questions. Staying here was an easy, comfortable, and stress-free experience.

Miriam and Ruth were the best. Miriam was the one looking over the house while Ruth was out of the country (she was only a text or phone call away) but they were both welcoming and very helpful during the entire process. The room and house are exactly as they are pictured. Such a cozy and quaint environment. The sun room was our favorite part of the stay. So much lovely sunlight. The neighborhood is also nice and quiet. There are many shops, restaurants and cafes within walking distance. We were always comfortable walking back to the house during our late-night-out's. It was a very pleasant experience and we would stay here again. Thank you!

Ruth & hosts were extremely welcoming and went out of their way to make our stay very positive.  loved having access to the kitchen for quick breakfast.  the common areas are lovely as is the bedroom we had.  we will definitely be staying here on our next NY visit.  great access to subway and local restaurants.  even though we saw Ruth & Carlos in passing, I felt as though I was in my own home, thanks so much for your lovely accommodations.

Ruth and Carlos were wonderful hosts!  They made us feel right at home from the moment we arrived. Everything was exactly as described. Our room was great and the bed super comfortable.  The shower is amazing. Their home is located in a very nice neighborhood and we felt completely safe late at night walking back from the subway. It is in easy walking distance to restaurants, bakeries, grocery stores and subway.  Both Ruth and Carlos were very helpful with directions and suggestions for everything we inquired about. It was great waking up to the smell of fresh ground coffee to go along with bagels, muffins, cereal etc.  If you are in the New York City area this is the place to stay! You can easily get anywhere that may interest you and then return to the comforts of a home away from home. Thank you Ruth and Carlos! You provided us with an amazing first Airbnb experience!!  We will be back.

Ruth is a wonderful host on this property. We did feel "Home" during this stay. The location is very convenient, and the environment is also feel safe. Ruth is also very responsive even it's a little bit late around 10pm. Appreciate that I can have this awesome experience to stay in this house.

The home was as described... I loved it!! Great area close to everything within walking distance. The home is very welcoming and inviting after a long day in the city I was able to snuggle right into bed and feel like I was at home. Great host recommend hands down!! I will be back and I know I have a great place to stay when I go back up north! Thank you Ruth and Carlos for everything!! Ps not that it was required on her part but she graciously took me to the airport and did not have too , that was a life saver in itself !! The best host ever!!!

It had been a difficult time for me to find a home stay in NYC until I met Ruth's house. I, together with two classmates (we're three exchange students in US), went to NY for a three-day trip and we'd like to find an Airbnb safe, comfortable and convenient for our tour in downtown Manhattan, but most of the home stay we found before didn't meet all those requirements. Ruth's house surprised me at first: super host, five-star reviews and fair price! I booked the room immediately cause I'm sure it must be a great deal. And sure it is. 

We arrive on the Friday evening at around 10 pm and Ruth was just there to welcome us. She was such a kind, easy-going person and she introduced us around the house with great patience. The room is perfectly matched with the picture and since we were three people going there, the host even made the bed for the sofa bed so that we could take a rest the moment we entered the room. Everything is just as described, clean, quite and extremely comfortable. There were plenty of foods and drinks in the kitchen and you can satisfy your stomach easily every morning. What impressed us most is that the guests in Ruth's house are all in great manner and the common space are always clean and in great order. What's more, the communication between us and the host (no matter Ruth or other two assistants) were pretty smooth and they're always keen to help.

Overall, highly recommend to everyone going to NYC for travel or work! I'll definitely stay in Ruth's house again if I will be in NY again! Thank you so much Ruth and wish you all the best!

all of our stays with Ruth and Carlos have been wonderful. We call it our home away from home because it is a stress-free way for us to visit with family in Forest Hills.  The room is airy and clean. And there is always a fresh pot of coffee ready in the morning.
This was our second stay with Ruth and Carlos.  We felt right at home.  Bree and David were very welcoming and helpful.  We love the neighborhood and hope to visit again.

We arrived late, and did not see our host until the next morning. We communicated by text that we had arrived, and were able to easily access the house with the keypad code that we had been provided.  Our room was just as described in the photos. The next morning when we went down for breakfast, we met Brie, the resident caretaker, and she welcomed us to the residence.  Our room was very comfortable, and we loved the sunroom that came with our room. The common areas of the house were beautifully furnished yet they made you feel comfortable. It was a short walk to the subway for a 30 minute ride into the city.  Austin Street, a trendy shopping and eating area, was about a ten minute walk away.  The neighborhood was very nice and we felt safe walking around day or night. We visit NYC often, and we might have just found our favorite place to stay. Can't wait to stay here on our next visit!

I can advise to stay in Ruth's house!
There were four of us and we were pleased with the accommodation and the area!))

Thank you to David, Bri & Taco for providing a comfortable, clean and welcoming environment. Thank you to Ruth and her family for sharing thier charming  home with us.  I really felt like I was at home. The sunroom was a perfect place for me to work from. The neighborhood was quiet and peaceful.  I had one of the best sleep. Thank you for the bagels and juice in the morning to help start my day. Everything was terrific.
Walkable to lots of restaurants, gracious host family, short walk to LIRR and subway. A few blocks off of the GCP. Off street parking is a plus in this area.

Ruth's home is in the perfect location close to public transportation and lots of restaurants and shops.  My Mom and I stayed here to visit family in Forest Hills and we felt at home the entire time.   Dave and Bri were great hosts.  The bagels/cereal and coffee were a great way to quickly start our day.  Ruth's home is clean and beautiful!

Ruth's place looks exactly the same as in the picture. The location of Ruth's place is great, it's about 15 mins drive to JFK and is also close to Laguardia airport. The subway station is 10 minutes walk away. There is also a private driveway for parking, which should be a big plus for travelers who drive cars. The price was reasonable considering about the location and the room condition. I would recommend Ruth's place for you!
Great location and very nice house. David and Bri are very nice hosts!
Her place was very quiet and   Lo
Location is safe and quiet.  Facilities are clean and well furnished as advertised.  Hospitality is warm, friendly, timely, informative, and responsive.
It was my second time staying at Ruth's place with my parents and a friend. It was as great as the first time. Highly recommended.

Great place to stay!! Subway was close and 20 min ride straight to Manhattan! Recommend this place to everyone. Plenty of space and exactly like pictures :) you'll rest comfortably after a long day of walking!!

This a wonderful, warm home with a nicely appointed suite.  Very clean and comfortable.   Within walking distance to public transportation and the downtown area around Austin St.   The hosts clearly wanted you to enjoy your stay.  They went out of their way to get us to the train station on time when we had a storm that would not end!!!
Exactly as pictured...comfortable, clean, convenient and enjoyable place to stay.

This is our first AirBnB experience. We are lucky that Ruth and her team have prepared with their heart and soul for our stay in their sweet home!

What delighted me during our stay: the breakfast with coffee, milk and orange juice; hair dryer; facilities for laundry and shampoo / conditioner / soap / towels. I brought some redundancies which could have had not brought with me after 15 long hours' of flight and cross border processes.

Ruth & the team have been very responsive to our queries and they are very friendly, which really makes me feel at home away from home. We hope to get back when the weather is cooler.

Excellent Forest Hills location with easy access to NYC.  Lovely home with private sleep and bathroom and use of kitchen , dining room and spacious living areas .  Great hospitality of hosts with coffee/tea  and breakfast items provided .  Would definitely return!
It was excellent!
You will not be disappointed in your stay here. Beautiful home; warm, welcoming hosts. I look forward to when I can come back.
Leider haben wir Ruth nie getroffen. Aber tolle Lage und fairer Preis.

这间Airbnb地理位置很好 离地铁站,超市,药店,餐厅大约步行5分钟路程 里面装修也不错 房东也很友好 

但是这间房子有些年头了所以会有一些问题 1.我们入住的时候房间内的厕所马桶开关坏了 不能冲水 但是房东第二天就修好了 
2.房间内基本没有wifi信号 想上网只能坐在楼梯上或者下楼呆在客厅内
3.房间的门只能从里面锁住 如果外出是不能给房间上锁的 所以对于物品安全问题有一点担心 
4.房间内床头没有插座 不能躺在床上用手机这个很不方便
5.另外这间房子里有狗狗 在房屋介绍中并没有提及 之后预定完成房东私下有沟通告知

总的来说作为superhost 的Airbnb稍微有一点点不是那么满意 但是作为正常的airbnb来说还是不错的选择
Ruth's home is beautiful and has everything you need for a getaway in the city. I highly recommend her home!

Ruth was really good in her communications with us prior to and during our stay. This included recommendations for restaurants especially The Jade. We did not know the area at all but after walking around Forest Hills on our first evening, it became apparent that we had an excellent location for our first time experience in attending the U.S. Open. The travel to / from The U.S. Open via Uber or Lyft worked well. Although we did not need to do so, trains were convenient for travel to NYC. Ruth provided thorough information to make sure we had the correct address of her home and numbers to call if we had any questions. She also gave us approximate costs of transportation from the airport which was helpful to us to gage our budget
Worthh

Great location, easy access to the subway, many restaurants in the neighborhood, lots of stores within minutes, and if important to anyone a lot of churches within walking distance of this Airbnb. Would highly recommend this property if visiting NYC. Home has everything you would expect, clean, comfortable, and convenient.

The house and our room were well appointed, roomy and clean.  It was a perfect location for us as we were visiting family down the street.  
Ruth and her family were very accommodating and available and responsive with all of our needs.  
We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others.

跟照片与描述一样｡
他们家的狗很可爱,因为一直都牵着所以不会有安全问题,也不常看见,如何你不喜欢狗的话｡
与地铁站与超市的距离只需要五分钟步行,地铁能到纽约岛内的任何地方,超市很大,能买到水果等等,但没有熟食｡
唯一的问题是红沙发的那个房间有点冷,似乎没有暖气,冬天订的话最好先和主人沟通一下｡
3rd time's the charm! sun porch is the best. will be back again. forest hills is delightful.
Great, quiet location at the end of a street next to a school. The other people in the house were friendly and unobtrusive. Very convenient and pleasant place to stay!
Second time staying here while visiting NYC for quick weekend getaways! I bring my friends all the time. It’s convienent,comfortable, clean, warm and safe!  I love it, and will be back!!
Great location for our needs. Clean, well maintained. Safe location. Dave, the on-location manager, was very helpful.
Everything as hoped for and expected!  Thanks

Another fabulous stay with Ruth and company.
Hospitality and Consistent High Quality are the trademarks of this wonderful BNB.

I was the only guest in the house.  I met David, the inn keeper,  in the mornings as he was making coffee.  I had my own space and quietness which was good. The bedroom is very nice & the bed, comfortable.  The bathroom was clean and amenities were provided.  I highly recommend the place to stay in Forest Hills.
This place is as advertised and well worth the value.
This is a spacious set of 2nd floor rooms in a large home located in a quiet neighborhood and a short walk to retail areas of Forest Hills.  The host is gracious and the caretaker Dave very helpful.
The description was very accurate. The bed was extremely comfortable, excellent location, the suite was very rooming and the host was wonderful.

We loved our stay in Ruth’s house! The location was perfect, on a quiet street but only few blocks away from Queens Blvd and Austin street, with all the shops, restaurants and subway. The rooms were very comfortable and the kitchen has everything you may possibly need.  All the living areas are so nice too, really feels like you’re home away from home.  I would definitely recommend Ruth’s house to others and will stay here again.  PS we stayed with 2 children and it was very comfortable!
We had a good experience. Everything was as promised.

This was my second time staying here. Ruth is very communicative and the space was clean, comfortable, and peaceful. The sun room is a nice extra space attached to the main bedroom. Parking in the driveway is a huge benefit in my opinion. Everything you could need is within fairly short walking distance including a subway stop that will take you to Manhattan. Overall, a great value in a nice, roomy home.

My family and I had a great experience staying in Ruth’s place in forest hills. The location is very convenient (only a few block walk) to the subway, good restaurants and attractions. We were warmly greeted by Ruth upon our arrival. Ruth welcomed us with open arms. The place is located in a very peaceful and quite neighborhood. This is the most convenient place I have ever stayed in New York.

Forgot to mention the free breakfast, (juice, milk, tea, coffee, bread) and a lot more. I will fill a book if I want to write about all the wonderful things about Ruth and her place. Reserve this place, you will not be disappointed. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you Ruth.
I highly recommend Ruth's place.  The accommodations were excellent and easily accessible to restaurants and shops. A great place to stay!
A lovely, comfortable home on a quiet side street with very welcoming hosts.
Great location.  Very clean and comfortable.

My parents stayed for one week at this house in June 2018 and they really enjoyed their room and all the public areas in the house. Great location, comfortable bed, beautifully designed house and responsive/caring host - Ruth. Highly recommend for those who want to stay close to the city and not spend a fortune on hotels in Manhattan.

If you are looking for a place to call home during a visit to NYC, you can't go wrong staying at Ruth's place in Forest Hills. Any of the three bedrooms are comfortable, and use of the common areas: living room, tv room, dining room, and kitchen, truly make you feel as if you're staying in a family member's or friend's home. The master bedroom has a comfy king bed with an unbelievable bathroom. We were spoiled using the fantastic shower and jacuzzi tub! Our son and daughter-in-law enjoyed the ensuite bedroom with the queen bed and wonderfully private attached sun room. Finally, the bright and cheery double bedroom has a nice-sized hallway bathroom for its use. Each morning, you awaken to freshly-made coffee and breakfast items such as bagels and English muffins at your disposal. Having a driveway in which to park up to three cars is a big plus so you don't have to hassle with on-street parking. The closest subway stop is a few short blocks away which will connect you with anywhere you wish to travel in the city. If you catch an express train, you'll be in Times Square in about 30 minutes! We made two trips to JFK airport, which is only a 12 minute drive with no traffic (not counting time spent trying to pull up at the arrival terminal...have fun!). Austin Street with its great variety of restaurants and shops is a short walk away. It's also nice to walk in the more residential section of Forest Hills where the former U.S. Open stadium is located. Even though the house is located near the highway, the school next door buffers the noise, so it's very quiet at the house. One day, we even walked to Citi Field to watch a Mets game. It's about an hour walk, which takes you through the old NY World's Fair grounds and past the current U.S. Open Tennis Center. Do not hesitate to stay at Ruth's place for a visit to the Big Apple!

July 2018

It's the little touches that make the biggest differences like having coffee made in the morning. This location is ideal if attending the US Open at Flushing Meadows and close to transportation if visiting Manhattan.  Thank you for making our visit such a memorable time.
I’d recommend staying at Ruth’s place while in NY.
This is the second time I have stayed here this summer.  It was great per usual.  Very convenient location and comfortable room.  Thanks again!
Probably my 5th or 6th time staying there. Need I say more???
My go to AirBnB when in Queens :) comfortable space in a great neighborhood.
Great home we have stayed with Ruth several times it’s a great location and always special and it has parking

This was an amazing BNB that actually felt like the old-fashioned BNBs with all of the amenities, social interaction with host(s) and wonderful touches throughout the spaces.  It was INCREDIBLY comfortable in all regards.  Private spaces were roomy, clean and well-stocked with everything we needed -- and the beds were exceptionally comfortable.  My husband wants to find the same mattress for home!  Our teenage daughter enjoyed having her own little suite adjoining our room to lounge and sleep comfortably on her own.

We were lucky enough to meet the homeowners during a busy holiday weekend and they were delightful and as kind as could be.  We also enjoyed meeting their resident helper, Dave,  a member of the family (and therefore well-invested in our comfort and positive experience) and a joy to spend time with, along with his trusty companion, Taco -- an absolutely beautiful rescue dog who made missing our dog back home much easier.  If you are not a dog person, Dave is extremely conscious of your comfort and keeps him on a leash and constrained to a 3rd floor living area away from guests unless you indicate a comfort level with the dog -- so no worries if you don't want a dog around (though for us it was truly a bonus!!).

The home is beautiful, conveniently located, includes generous amenities and easy neighborhood parking (and the driveway is available to share with proper organization/arrangements with keys if you need).  We hope to make this a regular spot when we are visiting family in NY.  It was easy enough to get on highway to Little Neck or Brooklyn, and just SO comfortable.  Ruth and Carlos, the homeowners, are kind and seemed genuinely happy to have us. 

I would not hesitate to recommend this AirBnB to anyone at any time.  Just the best!

Super comfortable and cozy to stay! Ruth's place is exactly as it is described in the pictures and it's super convenient to get to the city from there! Just barely a 5 min walk to the F/E trains and a very safe neighborhood so you don't even feel unsafe walking back in the late evenings.  Ruth's place is so cozy it feels like home away from home, and after spending a full day out walking NYC, we felt so relaxed coming back and sleeping.  Would definitely stay here again!
Хорошее место для проживания. Очень близко к метро, район чистый и безопасный. рядом есть магазины и рестораны. Рут очень быстро реагирует на все просьбы и пожелания. Рекомендую.

name: The Balcony Apartment
summary: Bright and pretty two bedroom apartment with 1 bathroom with shower, on the 4th floor (with elevator). This apartment has a glass-enclosed balcony off the main bedroom, as well as a small balcony off the living room.
space: 2 bedroom newly remodeled apartment with 1 bathroom. One full bathroom, with shower, toilet, sink. Complete kitchen including oven, microwave oven and full-size refrigerator. Master bedroom with 140 x 200 cm bed. 2nd bedroom has two single beds (90 x 190cm). The apartment is ideally suited for 4 people.
description: Bright and pretty two bedroom apartment with 1 bathroom with shower, on the 4th floor (with elevator). This apartment has a glass-enclosed balcony off the main bedroom, as well as a small balcony off the living room. 2 bedroom newly remodeled apartment with 1 bathroom. One full bathroom, with shower, toilet, sink. Complete kitchen including oven, microwave oven and full-size refrigerator. Master bedroom with 140 x 200 cm bed. 2nd bedroom has two single beds (90 x 190cm). The apartment is ideally suited for 4 people. For maximum comfort this apartment has central gas heating and air-conditioning. Our greeters help us and take care of our Barcelona apartments and they will take care of your stay. The apartment is in the historical part of the Eixample area, at short distance and midway from the Sagrada Familia temple and Passeig de Gracia shopping. Near Verdaguer metro station (on yellow and blue lines) and several bus lines. Very easy to get to by taxi. The apartment faces the street. A
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the historical part of the Eixample area, at short distance and midway from the Sagrada Familia temple and Passeig de Gracia shopping.
notes: The apartment faces the street. All facade windows have double glazing, but there may be some street noise (traffic) in the master bedroom and living room.
transit: Near Verdaguer metro station (on yellow and blue lines) and several bus lines. Very easy to get to by taxi.
access: For maximum comfort this apartment has central gas heating and air-conditioning.
interaction: Our greeters help us and take care of our Barcelona apartments and they will take care of your stay.

host.host_about: We are from Barcelona, Spain, and Dallas, TX.

reviews.comments: Excellent location apartment, I would recommend to stay here. Very good host and looks after his guests... Nice apartment with free wifi and easy access to the city anywhere.. Bus stops just few meters anywhere you want...

Apartment is in a perfect location, within 10-15 minutes walk to Sagrada Familia and Passeig de Gracia, also 2 minute walk to metro and bus stops.  Very clean apartment and well equipped. It was smaller than we had expected, in particular the bathroom which is quite tiny. The noise from the street was quite loud but this did not bother us, in fact the hustle and bustle was nice, but could prove problematic for people with difficulty sleeping or small children.  The host gave us perfect directions and instructions for the apartment, we were very pleased overall.

Great location, perfect for 4 people - the bathroom is pretty tiny but we only stayed for 7 nights and were barely there so it was ok. The apartment is close to many shops and metro stations, but also due to the Main Street right outside the door it can get a little noisy at night. 

We really enjoyed our stay though and would love to come back!

Fantastic flat fully equipped with everything needed for a short stay. Good modern features like air conditioning but retained lots of period charm. The beds were very comfortable and the list of local restaurants to try was also really helpful. The flat is in a great location, just 10/15 mins walk to the centre of town and a taxi to the beach was only 8Euros. There's also a fantastic creperie right next door that does delicious smoothies! 

Thanks so much Fernando, we loved the flat and Barcelona, we'll definitely be back!

Fernando and his staff were very helpful upon check-in and check-out, answering any questions we had. The apartment was in great shape, a couple floors up from street level, but still close enough to feel a part of the city. The Metro is only a few blocks walk away for getting to various tourist sights, and we would definitely rent this unit again!

Love the neighbourhood, the flat's patio, and old charm touch. Very conveniently located and within walking distance to Gaudi's. Four of us stayed here comfortably and have no problem telling the taxi driver how to get here. Restaurants recommendation also very helpful. Thank you!

We had the best stay. The apartment was lovely, really clean. The host was really friendly lots of great information for us when we arrived! And helpful information for how to find the apartment. Just loved it! Would highly recommend.
We found this flat to be exactly as advertised. It is in a great location, is clean and well stocked.

The neighborhood and location were excellent. We were in walking distance to Sagrada Familia and about a 10 minute walk from nice restaurants and bars. Personally we liked the neighborhood more once we crossed over Passeig de Gracia. The apartment was as pictured and very clean. The bathroom was small but manageable and 3 of us fit comfortably in the apartment. We especially loved the roof top terrace! Very helpful that guide books were also provided in the apartment. Instructions on how to get into the apartment via key pad were clear and easy, which was helpful since we arrived late at night. The only issue was the key to access the apartment (which was recommended to use in addition to the key pad) did not work. We would spend 5 - 10 minutes each time we entered and left the apartment trying to get the door to lock with the key. We did call the number provided to us and reported the problem, and they responded right away and were very pleasant. They were unable to fix the lock before we left but I assume the problem has now been fixed. Other than the one issue with the key, the apartment was lovely and I would recommend it.

We were made welcome and had occasional emails to check all was ok while we there which was reassuring. Everything was pretty accurate. The flat was comfortable and in a reasonably good location. It was sometimes noisy in the early hours of the morning - people coming back from clubs and bars I guess. 

The kitchen facilities were generally good. The bathroom was pretty small, but adequate. Living area was reasonable.

Overall, for value for money in central Barcelona it was acceptable without being spectacular. 

The list of wifi connection options wasn't perfect (and wifi connection generally was a bit sporadic which was a problem for us sometimes as we were researching places to live for our daughter). We found that in other parts of Madrid the wifi was sometimes better, sometimes worse.

The location was great.  We loved that there is a market nearby with great bakery (wonderful croissant) and deli. Fernando gave us very detailed instruction about the apartment,the house rules and its animeties. It was particularly useful to have washer/dryer with English translation stickers. The air con and wifi worked fine. Fernando send us an American girl to greet us who answered questions and booked a taxi to the airport on our departure day. The apartment was big enough for two of us, has old charm but the bathroom was super tiny and rather old, so it may be challenging to stay for a long period. It is facing a busy street so there are some traffic  noise as well.

We arrived with easy instructions for access to the apartment.  We were greeted later that afternoon by Marielle, who was very friendly and helpful.  She was able to answer all our questions and make recommendations. Later questions were promptly answered by email. The apartment was great.  It was very roomy for just the two of usand the location was perfect.

I never actually met Fernando, but he was very courteous in all of our communications. He responded immediately to all of my texts and emails- I don't think the man ever sleeps! His staff was also great. I met both Azra and Marielle and they were very helpful. They will print tickets/boarding passes for you, help you get the layout of the city, and help quickly with anything else that you need. 

The apartment was cute and, in addition to sheets and towels, provided amenities that other airbnbs haven't, including dish soap, laundry detergent, hand soap, and lots of kitchen utensils. It was really nice to have the washer/dryer. The apartment is a little bit tight, except for the master bedroom which is very spacious; the pictures posted here are very flattering. The beds are really comfortable and the apartment was exceptionally clean when we arrived. 

The location is good if you don't mind taking public transport to get to the beach and the majority of the sights. We like to walk, so it was a bit far from the Gothic Quarter, Las Ramblas, and other attractions. However, you can always get a taxi from the front door, and they are pretty cheap, even to get across town. 

My only complaint would be the noise. Upon arriving, you will be assailed with warnings that you need to be quiet at night. If only the other tenants had the same warnings. The second bedroom has a window into the building's "courtyard", which is really a fancy way to say fire escape, and kitchen access for a restaurant in the building. It was extremely loud with drunk tourists, babies crying, dogs barking, whooshing water going through the retro-fitted plumbing, and the kitchen staff yelling at each other in all hours of the night. However, I would still recommend this apartment to others, just take your ear plugs.

Although we never actually met Fernando his emails were always polite, courteous and  helpful. We were given clear instructions on how to enter the building and apartment using pass-codes. Once we had the keys locking the door was a bit difficult as the lock was stiff but thankfully it held out for our stay. 

We found the location was good and taxis were very easy to acquire outside the front door. If we were to stay again however we would try to be closer to the gothic quarter as it has far more charm than the new town.

As others have stated previously the apartment can be a bit noisy. We were only woken once by what seemed to be a group argument on the street. The rest of the time we did not have any trouble sleeping.

Fernando had sent Azra to meet us and help us to settle in. She was very helpful and was extremely prompt with her replies.  If there was a problem we were confident Azra would help us. It was great to have this level of security.

The apartment itself is not as new as I had expected but then the price reflects this. The photographs are very flattering. 

Overall we had a very enjoyable stay as Barcelona is an amazing city.

Fernando and his staff were incredibly welcoming and helpful. Not only were resources provided about Barcelona, good restaurants nearby, and travel guidebooks, they also helped provide a space for us to store our luggage for the day after we had checked out while we wandered the city before our flight. 

The apartment itself was beautiful - two balconies, comfortable bedding, and very clean. The shower was a little small, but worked well. The wi-fi was available and a good speed. The apartment was very centrally located and we spent most of our time walking from there to the waterfront, to La Rambla, to restaurants, and to Sagrada Familia. It was a wonderful stay and we'd recommend it to others! We were only two, but the apartment slept four - tons of space for a larger group.
Location was very convenient.

Minha sugestao para o anfitrião, dizer ele tem uma pessoa assina no nome dele,  outra coisa o apartamento é antigo por fora e por dentro, pedi tivesse cafe da manha, mas no caso nao explicou, e tambem na frente do predio com obra, o valor cobrado fora do padrao, sem elevador ate o terreo, como disse nossa mala nem passava pela porta, e ainda tinhamos subir lances da escada com ela. Foi nossa primeira vez utilizando o Airbnb, e nao foi boa experiência

We had a wonderful time staying in The Balcony Apartment and I highly recommend it. Our family is two adults, two full-grown teenagers and it was the perfect place to stay. We were happy to be a bit removed from the crowds in the Barri Gotic--L'Eixample has a definite Upper West/East Side of Manhattan vibe and for architecture buffs there's lots of interesting buildings in addition to Gaudi's work. There are nearby metro stops and cafes and others have remarked about the market a few blocks away. A short walk down Passeo St. Joan toward the arc de triompf will land you in comic book store/manga heaven. Fernando was very easy to work with. His instructions were very clear and he was responsive to questions. The apartment is well furnished. Especially helpful were the travel books and maps. The beds were comfortable. As others have remarked, the bathroom is compact typical of retrofitted European apartment buildings, but it's clean, the water pressure and temperature are good and Fernando provided lots of towels. A big plus was the washer/dryer.

Une personne était présente lors de notre arrivée et a répondu très gentiment à nos questions.
L'appartement correspondait en tous points à la description, il y avait plusieurs plans de la ville à notre disposition, ainsi que des cartes postales si besoin.
Le quartier est proche de tout, nous appréhendions un peu le bruit le soir par rapport à la chambre donnant sur la rue mais dans ce quartier la nuit il y a très peu de bruit et de circulation, donc nous n'avons eu aucune problème.

L'ACCOGLIENZA E' STATA PESSIMA SONO ARRIVATA ALLE 19,50 STANCA DEL VIAGGIO HO DIGITATO IL CODICE FORNITO DALLA STRUTTURA PER IL PORTONE E PER L'APPARTAMENTO DENTRO IL PORTONE SONO ENTRATA DENTRO L'APPARTAMENTO NON CI SONO RIUSCITA PER FORTUNA MIA SORELLA ABITA A BARCELLONA E CONOSCE LA LINGUA HO FATTO CHIAMARE UNO DELLO STAFF CHE E' ARRIVATO E FINALMENTE CI HA APERTO , L' APPARTAMENTO E' VECCHIO E PICCOLO LA BELLEZZA DELL'APPARTAMENTO E' SOLO FOTOGRAFICA , TRA LE COSE NEGATIVE L'ASCENSORE , QUANDO SONO ARRIVATA , NON FUNZIONAVA, LA COLAZIONE COMPRESA NON CI E' STATA FORNITA , O MEGLIO , IL BUONO PER POTERNE USUFRUIRE , IL SIGNORE CHE CI HA APERTO NON CONOSCE LO SPAGNOLO MA IL RUSSO E QUANDO SONO STATE FATTE DELLE CONSIDERAZIONI LA RISPOSTA E' STATA : " SE NON VI VA BENE ANDATEVENE " QUESTO ATTEGGIAMENTO NON E' PROFESSIONALE , SANNO BENISSIMO CHE QUESTO SAREBBE STATO POSSIBILE,.PER L'ALTRA DOMANDA POSSO RISPONDERE CHE IL QUARTIERE  E' BELLO

My experience was a easy and frictionless. I did not have to worry about the house at all, easy check-in and easy check-out. They provided us with a baby cot that reduced our luggage traveling to bcn.

L'appartamento è comodo e gradevole, perfette le info che abbiamo ricevuto. 
Gli aspetti migliorabili sono il piccolo bagno che puzzava, gli asciugamani non pulitissimi (o forse vecchi quindi macchiati) e la porta che non si chiude con la chiave (abbiamo sempre usato il codice per entrare, ma la notte non ci sentivamo tanto sicure).
Abbiamo molto apprezzato la cortesia di lasciare le valige fino alla partenza del volo.
In definitiva il soggiorno è stato piacevole, la location è perfetta, a 2 passi da tutto e di fronte a un simpaticissimo affittabici che ha reso l'esperienza di Bcn ancora più divertente!
we had a very nice time in the balcony apt, very central, comfortable, clean. the communication was perfect, very fast and friendly. We really recommend the place, thanks!

This apartement is really well located. A lot of sighseeings can be visited just by feet. The rest you can go by taxi, which is well priced in barcelona and they make no difference between tourists and habitants. The apartement itself is nice. Just a tip: turn off the air conditioning in the night, if you don´t want to be sick next day :D

Around the apartement there are also a lot of restaurants and shops. If you want to visit barcelona and want to see sagra familia etc., than this apartement is a good deal

We loved our stay in Barcelona. The apartment was in a perfect location within walking distance from most of the sites. Lots of options for food, drinks and shopping. We stayed for 4 nights in September with our 15 month old son and loved it! The location was quite and family friendly. Hope to return someday.

Appartment was very vell situated, but the noise from the street was a tiny bit irritating. Wlan was a tad bit slow but worked. The view from the roof terrance was amazing. The neighbourhood felt safe. There were some restaurants and cafes around, and a really good market hall.
Todo bien.

Great and pleasant location, easily accessible to the Metro station  (4 min walk). Not far from Sagrada Familia (walkable) or central Barcelona. The house was clean and everything worked inside. Kitchenware and utensils available, lots of guide books about Barcelona and Spain, which we found very very useful as we didn't have any books. We arrived late into Barcelona, Fernando messaged us with instructions on how to get into the flat - as all the doors are key coded. Flat doors also have keys, so that you can dead lock the door aswell. We had absolutely no problems. We were also able to leave our luggage in the flat on the day of check out as no one had booked to check in on that day, this was a massive help as our flight to leave Barcelona was in the evening.

Saying that Locking the door with the key was a problem. It was impossible for my girlfriend to lock it on her own, I had to do it all the time and it took a bit of force. We actually thought we were going to break the key on a few occasions. Wifi is 'workable' and is enough for the normal email and smartphone social media use. Anything major might prove difficult or slow. This apartment is on a main road- perfect for location, not so good for early morning traffic noise if you are a light sleeper.

All being said, we would definitely stay again.

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in Barcelona!!!! Die Stadt ist toll, die Wohnung sehr zentral, man könnte alles super erreichen. Fernando ist uns mit allem sehr entgegen gekommen, vielen Dank dafür!

Leider war die Wohnung nicht  ganz so chic wie auf den Bilder, das Bad und die Küche vor allem sehr unsauber. 

Wem das aber nicht ganz so wichtig ist, wird hier sehr glücklich.

We had a great stay in the balcony apartment, which has a great location. We we're to adults and a two-year old, and the apartment was perfect for this constellation with the two bedrooms etc. The host was amazingly helpfull and all the logistics worked perfectly.

15 Oktober tot 18 Oktober 2016

We hebben het heel erg naar ons zin gehad in het appartement 
van Fernando, de Metro is ca 10 minuten lopen, maar 
door een super mooie en schone buurt, dus geen straf!

Was voor ons de eerste keer Barcelona met Airbnb,  was echt heel benieuwd hoe dit zou verlopen, we blijven namelijk Nederlanders he.

Voor iedereen, gewoon doen !! je krijgt een code voor de ingang en 
Fernando geeft perfect uitleg hoe het dan verder gaat, het appartement is schoon met een prachtige vloer (al is wel alles het een groothoeklens
gefotografeerd, maar dat is volgens mij alles op Airbnb

Over Barcelona kan ik alleen maar zeggen dat het een hele mooie
schone stad is met prachtige gebouwen, eigenlijk is het een super stad.

maw top!

I appreciated the great communication through email with Fernando and Lauren.  Their directions ahead of time were kindly provided far in advance due to my travel plans.  I was met on arrival by Eduardo, who was friendly and accommodating.
The apartment is lovely.  There was nothing we needed that was not provided.  As my luggage was delayed by the airline, having a washer/dryer was so helpful   My adult son and I enjoyed it as a very comfortable home base.  
The location is fantastic!  Just a 10 minute walk from Sagrada Familia, and right in the middle of many restaurants, markets and shops.  We walked to Las Ramblas and around l' Eixample neighborhood  Cabs, bus and metro are all very close.  
I highly recommend this listing.
Everything  went very smoothly and we appreciate how clean the apartment was. Fernando was a very good host.

El apartamento Balcony, por foto parece que está meor y parece más moderno. Pero visto es más viejo. .Principal pega, el baño, que es minúsculo, y el plato de ducha también pequeño. En cambio el apartamento Rooftop, si que tenía un baño más grande, y elçn general el piso estaba un mejor. La comunicación con el propietario en mi caso fue mala, ya que estaba fuera del país y sólo podía contactar con eeçllos por emial, quedandome casi 24h esperando contestación.
Una vez contactas con ellos, aunque sea por email, muy cordiales.
Puntos positivos:
La situación, a 10' de la Sagrada Familia.
Negativos:
Baño muy pequeño, y comunicación con propietario.
Everything was good. I can recommend it.

Nice flat rent for 3 days. The greeter is very welcoming and we appreciated he let us stay after the scheduled check out time. It can be quite noisy as it is located on a street with some heavy traffic in the morning. The kitchen already included all you need to cook (salt, oil, etc.). A bit smaller than seen on the photos, but the overall is positive

Отличные апартаменты с гениальным расположением: близко и при этом тихо, без толп людей (были в начале февраля). Рядом уютный старинный рынок, где можно найти свежайшие и вкуснейшие продукты.
Потрясающий старый дом с аутентичной отделкой, при этом оборудован всем необходимым. Есть доступ на террасу на крыше, где отлично можно провести вечер с книгой или за тихой беседой.
Ну, и конечно, веранда и балкон. Уверена, будете пить свой утренний кофе именно там.
п.с. Удобный доступ в апартаменты, нет проблем или тарифов на позднее прибытие. Эдуардо всегда на связи и готов ответить на все вопросы/решить Ваши проблемы. Очень бережно отнеслись к нам в связи с нашим поздним вылетом: предоставили возможность задержаться и передохнуть вечером.
Обязательно сюда вернемся!

Autenthetic apartment with great location! There is a old market in 2 munutes walk where you can find fresh and delicious food. Sure you will have your breakfasts sitting on balcony and enjoy old buildings and sky. Apartment is clean and well-equipped. No problem with late arrivals. Eduardo is always online and ready to help you with any issue you have! Appreciate his care on our late leaving as well. Going to visit Balcony apartment again

Really nice appartment in a central location.  Grand view across the passage San Juan from the enclosed balcony.  Check in and check out were smooth and easy.  The traffic on the street below can be loud in the evening and the bathroom is very small and cramped.  But we would stay there again.

The appartment is very well located, close to touristic places by foot. 
However, I find the check out time is very early and strict from the host 11am.

Highly recommend this apartment. We stayed for 10 days and it was the perfect location from which to see every part of Barcelona with ease on foot,  cab or subway. Check out the great Mercat on Valencia about 2 blocks west for great fresh groceries.

My mother, sister and i staid at the apartment for 3 days. the  plaice was clean and gave a good homey feeling , the location perfect,  10min by foot from the center and 3 min from a metro station. fernando kindly advised us how to travel from the airport and it was a big help. i will come back and recommend friend to take this place on there trip to the city.

Photos were a bit misleading. This place is one of many owned by this company and the personal touches were missing. Not dirty, but definitely not well kept. Location was great as long as you like to walk a lot. Safe neighborhood.

Loved the central location. You may want to be prepared with alternative to wifi which is often challenging in EU anyway. Lots of little stores nearby for any little "needs".
Be prepared for elevator access up a short flight of steps first.

Muy buena ubicación, me iba a casi todos los lugares a pie. Todo funcionó bien: aire acondicionado, agua caliente, microondas, nevera, tv. Todo el procedimiento de llegada y salida fue muy facil. Me quedaré de nuevo cuando vuelva a Barcelona.
Prestation décevante. L'appartement est très Bruyant. La salle de douche est minuscule. Les murs sont sales et abîmés. Le mobilier est cheap. Literies de mauvaise qualité.
The flat was excellent, the location too. All went very smoothly and the pictures were the same of the flat- Defo come back, great place.

Amazing location for seeing all the sites in Barcelona. Checkin and checkout couldn’t have been easier, they also let us stay a little later as we were running late. We could also leave our bags in the office just around the corner from the Appartment. Good value for money. Would recommend.

Fernando's apartment is a lovely place in the centre of Barcelona and from the balcony you have an amazing view of the great architecture. From the terrace you can even see La Sagrada Familia. Despite not meeting him personally, Fernando was so pleasant and very quick to respond to any query we had, and the apartment was well prepared for our stay. We were able to walk to El Born, The Gothic District, Las Ramblas, La Boquería, etc. If you are in Barcelona, stay here. It's quiet, and cute, and secluded just enough, with the most attentive of hosts. Muchísimas gracias Fernando!

Great location, easy walking distance to Sagrada Familia, etc.  Secure and comfortable two bedroom apartment, with good size refrigerator, 4 burner gas stove, TV (didn't try to use it).  Bathroom and shower are small but adequate.  In good condition.  Small balconies overlood the street.  Roof top terrace.

The location is extremely central, safe, and walking distance from many attractions. The apartment was very clean and beautiful, with lovely tiled floors and a balcony overlooking the street. Fernando was very responsive and accommodating, and Madara (who checked us in) was very friendly and helpful. Overall a wonderful stay. I highly recommend Fernando’s apartment!

We (4 people) loved staying at this place! The whole apartment ist beautiful with mosaic tiles on the floor, high ceiling and big windows. It was beautifully furnished as well. Another plus is that the AC works very well and cools the whole place down which came in handy during the stay. 
It is located in a beautiful area with lots of cafes around. It only takes 10 minutes to walk to Sagrada Familia and it was very easy to get around the city from there in general. 
Our greeter, Madara, was amazing. We could check in early and she was always easy to reach and eager to help out with recommendations and questions.
We definitely recommend staying at this lovely airbnb and if we'll ever be back in Barcelona we'd definitely come back to this place.

Fernando and Lauren were amazing hosts! 

Every detail has been meticulously thought out from access, to amenities, local sites and food suggestions. 

The apartment is SO charming! Comfortable beds, a clean space, full service kitchen.  And the balconies.....wonderful! 

So looking forward to using Fernando and Lauren’s properties for future trips!

Fernando's charming apartment was a great place for us to begin our vacation.  It was lovely waking up in the morning to views of Barcelona's beautiful architecture and walking to a cafe across the street for breakfast before exploring all that Barcelona has to offer.  Fernando's place is walking distance to many of Barcelona's attractions, but it's in a neighborhood, enabling us to easily explore markets and restaurants outside the tourist areas.

Fernando’s place is in a great area, close to passeg de gracia and at a 20 minutes walking distance from plaza de catalunya. Great coffee shops nearby! The apartment is old so don’t expect nothing fancy. Still, it is very charming and cozy! Be prepared for a really small bathroom and a bit uncomfortable double bed. Other than that the self checkin service is very convenient and the host was very helpful via whatssapp! Muchas Gracias!
Fernando's place is 100% worth your money. Just book it.

Очень удобное расположение квартиры. В районе много кафе и магазинчиков. Буквально в нескольких минутах рынок, где можно купить свежие продукты. Хозяева пошли на встречу (у нас был ранний придёт и очень поздний вылет) и мы смогли заселиться в квартиру сразу по приезду и оставить вещи до вылета в соседних апартаментах. За это большое спасибо! Очень понравилось, что владельцы вели себя тактично и быстро отвечали на вопросы. Лифт и близость к достопримечательностям серьезные бонусы! Квартиру рекомендую.

Lovely neighbourhood and perfectly located in the heart of Barca! Pretty nice contact but the interior of the balcony apartment was disappointing: the bathroom is super super small and not very nice, the shower head was almost broken, the interior of the kitchen was rudimentary, it’s almost impossible to lie with to persons on the very small sofa ... we missed the feeling of being home - absolutely nothing in the fridge, just enough towels, cheap tablewear, grubby bathroom, Barca was awesome but the apartment overall was disappointing.

Это прекрасная и уютная квартира, вокруг всё очень тихо, но при этом 5 минут пешком и ты в центре. До пляжа идти примерно 30 минут, но мы отдыхали в январе и прогуляться с дочкой и подышать свежим воздухом - милое дело! Хозяин очень гостеприимный, всё чисто и уютно. В квартире тепло. Спасибо тебе, Барселона, благодаря этой квартире мы почувствовали себя местными жителями и влюбились в этот город!
Nice apartment, warm and comfortable. Very good location with many restaurants around and easy to go to Metro.

We enjoyed very much our Barcelona journey and this house is in a very good location and easy to access the city centre and touristic areas of the city. Very cute , comfortable and clean apartment. Every facility of the apartment like hot water, heating, kitchen and the electronic devices works without any problem. We would like to stay at this apartment next time in Bacelona again. 

EREN family from Istanbul

Location is fabulous for walking to Sagrada Familia, Park Guëll, and even to the beach. Close to metro, great restaurants, and food markets. Cozy balcony to enjoy being in the city. The access to the rooftop terrace was a perk too!

Good city location close to La Sagrada Familia, adequate and covers all the basic necessities.  If you are an average sized person, it will be hard to move around the shower stall because it is very small.  The second bedroom faces into a small courtyard where one can hear the plumbing noises of other tenants.  WiFi was a bit spotty even though there were a lot of connections to choose from.  Roof deck is nice, can see spires of La Sagrada Família.  Overall, it met our needs, just don’t expect a lot of frills.  Host let us check in earlier which was great and the clothes washer is a plus.  You need to walk up a small flight of stairs to get to the elevator.  Fernando was very responsive to emails.

name: Cozy apartment
summary: This is a one-bedroom apartment with generous areas and intense light. Equipped with washing machine and electrical cooker, fridge and microwave. It has all the kitchen equipment needed for everyday needs and tasks.
space: It's affordable, well-served by public transport and nicely decorated. The owner is also very helpful.
description: This is a one-bedroom apartment with generous areas and intense light. Equipped with washing machine and electrical cooker, fridge and microwave. It has all the kitchen equipment needed for everyday needs and tasks. It's affordable, well-served by public transport and nicely decorated. The owner is also very helpful. Guests may use all the equipment provided. The bus stop is 3 minute walk from the flat and is served by 3 different bus routes every 15 minutes which take you to the centre in no more than 10/15 minutes. I reccomend guests to buy the Bus/Metro ticket (named ANDANTE) in the airport, and from there , get the metro to Trindade Station, and then get another one to Combatentes Station (direction Hospital São João) thats the yellow line.  I usually meet gusts there. Guests can easily park the car in the street outside the flat. The Paranhos parish - located northeast of the city centre - is the site of the largest concentration of higher education institutes in the city, concent
notes: The Paranhos parish - located northeast of the city centre - is the site of the largest concentration of higher education institutes in the city, concentrated around the Pólo Universitário. This area includes the Universidade Portucalense Infante D. Henrique, the Universidade Católica do Porto (UCP) Institute of Biotechnology, the INEGI, the Universidade do Porto (UdP) School of Economics, and even the Contemporary University for Seniors! Served by the Yellow metro line at three different stops, you can easily get around the city from this student-favourite area.
transit: The bus stop is 3 minute walk from the flat and is served by 3 different bus routes every 15 minutes which take you to the centre in no more than 10/15 minutes. I reccomend guests to buy the Bus/Metro ticket (named ANDANTE) in the airport, and from there , get the metro to Trindade Station, and then get another one to Combatentes Station (direction Hospital São João) thats the yellow line.  I usually meet gusts there. Guests can easily park the car in the street outside the flat.
access: Guests may use all the equipment provided.
house_rules: Minimum stay: 2 nights. Please respect the check out time. If you start reading one of the books in the apartment and cannot finish it, take with you and leave one of yours instead.

host.host_about:
Hi, I’m Luis, born and bred in Porto and a true tripeiro (the nickname given to the people of Porto who, during the Discoveries in the 15th century, gave the ships sailing off to the New Worlds all the best meat, and kept only the tripe for themselves). That means we love our city and are very proud of it, perhaps especially its football team – the best in Portugal! It’s also evidence of how friendly and hospitable we are, and I’ll do my best to make your visit to Porto really enjoyable. Advice on where to go, the hidden gems that most tourists never get to see, the best places to eat, the best bargains and ways of getting around on a budget – just ask.

I used to live in this apartment, but when my daughter was born, 10 years ago, I moved around the corner. That means I’m readily available to help all I can – it’s what I do for a living, so you’re sure to get my undivided attention.

I may have lived in Porto all my life, but I’ve also travelled a fair bit, to the United States, to Asia and, of course, to other parts of Europe, so I understand what travellers need, and will always do my best to make your stay go smoothly.

reviews.comments:
Nous avons terminé notre voyage au Portugal chez Luis à Porto. Et pour être honnête, cela s'est très très bien terminé. Pour commencer, Luis a été super facile à joindre et toujours disponible et réactif quant à nos nombreuses demandes avant notre arrivée. Par exemple, le wifi n'était pas encore disponible quand nous avons réservé (c'était en cours), et Luis n'a pas hésité à nous prêter sa clé wifi avec son pc pour que nous puissions avoir accès Internet. Luis a vraiment été l'hôte parfait avec sa disponibilité et sa gentillesse. Il nous a également donné quelques conseils sur Porto. En ce qui concerne l'appartement, il est super. Très propre, grand, lumineux, calme. Il se trouve à environ 10mn du centre ville en bus. Le bus est à 2/3mn à pied au bout de la rue, et il y en a régulièrement jusque tard dans la soirée (un bus de nuit y passe aussi). Le centre de Porto est donc très facile à joindre. Cela n'a pas été un problème. La chambre est très bien et donne sur une rue calme où nous pouvions voir notre voiture garée (parking gratuit). La salle de bain est grande, propre, avec une baignoire. Le salon est très bien et très lumineux avec tout ce qu'il faut. Quant à la cuisine, nous y avons cuisiné les 3 jours où nous étions et tout était disponible à l'intérieur. Pour conclure, si nous devions retourner à Porto, ce serait chez Luis sans hésiter !

We finished our journey in Portugal at Luis' place in Porto. To be honest, we finished our journey very very well. To begin, Luis was very easy to reach and always available and reactive to our many questions before we arrive. For example, the wifi wasn't available yet (was in progress), and Luis didn't hesitate to borrow us a wifi pen with a computer for us to get Internet access ! Luis was the perfect host with his availability and his kindness. He also gave us lots of advices for Porto. Regarding the appartment, it is great. Very clean, big, bright, calm. It's located about 10mn from the center by bus. The bus stop is 2/3mn walking, at the end of street, and there are buses regularly till late (night buses also pass there). So the center of Porto is really easy to reach, wasn't a problem. The bedroom was very nice and overlooks a calm street, where you can check your car (free parking). Bathroom was big and clean. Living room was also bright and clean with everything you need. And for the kitchen, we cooked 3 days there, it's fully furnished. To end, if we had to pass in Porto again, we would stay at Luis' place without any hesitation !

Luis hat mit uns alles vorab super abgestimmt, uns Reisetipps gegeben, unserer Anreise spät abends zugestimmt und angeboten, uns vom Bahnhof abzuholen. Er hatte Träger-fahrkarten für uns besorgt und uns die Wohnung mit Ihren Details persönlich gezeigt und Fragen beantwortet. Außerdem hat er nach der ersten Nacht nachgefragt, ob alles in Ordnung ist. Die Wohnung ist superschön, ruhig, hat ein großes bequemes Bett und viele persönliche Details wie Gesellschaftsspiele und Bücher in verschiedenen Sprachen. Wir fandens super!! Buchen!!
