L'appart est super et tranquille. Le centre-ville plus touristique est facilement accessible avec les transport en commun. Luis est vraiment très sympa. Nous avons aimé notre séjour à Porto.

Everything was awesome! We liked this place and felt ourselves like home. Wooden floor and shutters create unique atmosphere. Fresh fruits and delicious ice-cream, waiting for us in the fridge were the one thing, we've been dreaming of after the long flight. The area is quiet, but not far from city center. We've spent the happiest days there.

La estancia en casa de Luis fue perfecta. El un super anfitrión, nos fue a buscar al metro y nos dio todas las indicaciones necesarias para que pudiéramos disfrutar de nuestro viaje.
El apartamento es tal cual en las fotos, está totalmente equipado y ubicado muy cerca de una parada de autobús, con 3 lineas que llevan al centro, pasan con bastante frecuencia y hasta la 1:00 am, lo que permite moverse con facilidad.
Recomiendo y repetiré si vuelvo.

Everything was great. The apartment is large and spacious . Clean and cozy. We felt right at home. Is close to a supermarket , lots of shops and cafes. Luis was very polite and told us to do in the city and how to spend your time.

Mi experiencia en el apartamento de Luis fue genial. El lugar está muy limpio y con todo lo necesario para cocinar y pasar un tiempo agradable.ademas Luis fue muy gentil y nos busco de la estación de metro y nos explicó lo más importante de Oporto además de preocuparse de nosotros.Todo un acierto de apartamento!

Luis est arrivé avec le sourire, malgré que je sois arrivé avec environs 2 heures d'avance sur l'horaire.
J'ai du le rappeler suis a un soucis , il est revenu directement sans râler mais avec et toujours le sourire. 
Les photos correspondent parfaitement avec l'appartement.
Le wifi fonctionne nickel, la télé aussi même si je ne l'ai pas regardé.
La rue est très calme, j'ai très bien dormi.
Au bout de la rue il y a quelques commerce pour dépanner.
Le logement est très propre, la literie est bonne. une baignoire, toilette plus lavabo.
Je n'ai pas cuisiné, mais il y a tout ce qu'il faut.
Pour se rendre a Porto (centre ville) le métro n'est pas très loin.
En voiture il y a quelque bouchon au heure de pointe, mais pour ceux (comme moi) qui connaisse Porto, on peux les éviter.
Tout est parfait.
Si j'ai l'occasion je retournerai chez Luis.
Obrigado por todo e té a proxima

Luis was very nice with us. He gave all the information to meet us and then he took us home in his car. He recommended us the best spot in Porto. The house is not so near the city center but we can reach it in 15 minutes in bus. The house is big, light and clean with all the equipments. The area is very quiet. We enjoyed very much stay in his apartment.

We arrived quite late in the evening due to a delay with our airplane, but even then; our kind host Luis waited for us at the nearest metro station to take us to the apartment! 

We had two awesome evenings completely thanks to Luis and his friends. Upon arrival in Porto my girlfriend and me wanted to have a beer so Luis brought us with him to a cafe (in an apartment complex!) that is owned by one of his friends. Turned out to be a very fun evening! Same goes for the second evening, also here Luis was kind enough to take us with him to see his friends restaurant where we had a very good fish soup and a sandwich that I can't remember the name off, but it was delicious! Here we met a few of Luis his friends and some were quite crazy, which resulted into another awesome evening! 

As for the apartment itself - it's a very clean and spacious place within walking distance to the nearest bus stop that takes you directly to the city centre. We felt very at home thanks to our host and would definitely recommend it to other travelers!

Luis a été très agréable, souriant et s'est rendu disponible rapidement pour toutes questions pendant le séjour.
L'appartement est très agréable et commode. Il est un peu éloigné du centre, il faut prendre un bus puis un métro pour s'y rendre. Si on rate le bus pour rejoindre le métro il faut compter 25 minutes en marchant mais pour des vacances le temps et les kms à pied ne comptent pas!!

Luis was very friendly. He took us by car from the nearest metro station and brought us (late at night) to the apartment.
The flat was very cozy, it was easy to reach the center either by bus or by foot.
I can highly recommend the apartment!!!!

Luis was a great guest to us. He was waiting for us and directly gave us as many information as we needed (transportation, touristic attractions etc.). He was taking care that everything was going great and sent us more recommendations during our whole stay .

The apartment is great, spacious and clean. The area is quiet and easily  accessible from the city center.

I definitely recommend this place!

Had a great stay in Luis' apartment. He was waiting for us outside of the apartment when we arrived by taxi. Showed us around and helped us get a transport card as well as some initial groceries.
The house was very clean and comfortable, and we were able to use all the amenities. 
The house is close to a bus stop with busses frequently going to the centre. There is also a taxi stand close by. 
Definitely recommend :)

Luis a été très gentil !
Nous sommes arrivées avec près d'une heure de retard et il nous attendait encore comme convenu au métro pour nous amener à l'appartement. Il a été très serviable et s'est rendu disponible en cas de nécessité.
L'appartement est très propre et assez spacieux. Il est à quelques minutes seulement d'un arrêt de bus qui rejoignent le centre.

Un séjour court mais très agréable !

Luis was an outstanding host. I asked him if he could pick me up at the metro station and he was there when I arrived, as agreed. He also brought me some snacks since it was already late when I arrived, which I really appreciated. He was also available when I needed him. There was a bit of a glitch with the Internet but he immediately came over to the apartment and requested for the provider´s technician to be there next day. It was resolved within 12 hours. I would recommend staying at his place. You can get on the bus and be in the center in no time or if you like to walk like me, you can walk to the train station (about a 20-minute walk) and go directly to the center. I will definitely stay there again. Thank you Luis!

Luis fue muy amable y nos dió toda la información que queríamos saber!!
El apartamento estaba limpio y era bonito! :) hemos estado muy a gusto

Luis was a great host. Although we arrived late, he was very kind and even brought us breakfast for the next day. He was available to help us with directions and queries. The apartment was great - very comfortable, well decorated and beautiful. We loved our stay there and would be happy to come back.
Luis was a great host! Picked us up and took us to the flat. It was really tidy and well prepared for us. We had a really good stay!
일단 가격대비 너무 좋은 숙소였어요! 비록 시내 바로 근처는 아니지만, 3분거리에 있는 버스 정류장에서 아무거나 차면 시내로 바로 갈수있는거리에요. 특히 luis의 친절함은 10점만점에 10점이에요. pick up 뿐만 아니라 문제가 생기면 바로 와서 해결해줬어요 . 포르투에서의 좋은기억을 남겨줘서 고마워요!

It was a very nice stay. 
Luis was a very thoughtful host and his flat was tidy and you'll find everything you can ask for. The City centre is easily reached by metro, bus or taxi (approx. 7€)  and there are all kind of shops nearby. We recommend the bakery that is close-by, (it's near to the bus station) for sweet delights and good bread. 
If you come to Porto in wintertime don't forget to bring some warm clothes, because it can become quite chilly in the flat, even with the two heaters. Nonetheless we had a wonderful time. 
A big thanks also to his parents for picking us up at the metro and driving us to the flat on the first day. We would come back!

Luis's father picked us up at the metro station. We have been very pleased to visit the appartment which was faithful to the description.
This apartment gave many advantages, there is all you need to enjoy a pure journey in Porto. Well designed and very lighted. I recommend this place and Luis as an host. Thank you Luis for this first rent experience!
O Luis foi bastante prestável e o seu apartamento é extremamente acolhedor.

El apartamento de Luis nos pareció muy bonito, grande, muy cómodo y nos gustó mucho la cocina, que estaba muy bien equipada y a nosotros nos gusta cocinar. Si bien no está ubicado en la parte más céntrica de la ciudad, está bien conectado por autobus y un poco más lejos el metro, aunque se puede llegar a pié también. El barrio es muy tranquilo y tiene comercios y supermercado en las cercanías. Tuvimos un problema con el agua caliente pero probablemente haya sido algo eventual e inesperado, y Luis se ocupó de ello y estuvo comunicado con nosotros todos los días.

Luis is a very nice and humorous person, thé flat exactly like photos even better,with beautiful furnishings, there is fully equipped in the kitchen,you will have totally privacy here,quiet area but is also convenient, very comfortable bedding, as if to return to home, whole-floor apartment clean and tidy, although relatively far away from the subway station, but very close to the bus station to downtown, very fortunate to have this B & B experience, definitely recommended! !

Luis was very welcoming when we met him and while he was showing us around the house. He helped us out a lot by providing numerous brochures about Porto which we took full advantage of. The house was perfect for our stay and Luis was very generous to us. He even gave us a ride to the supermarket when we arrived!

Luis nous a bien accueillies, l'appartement, spacieux, lumineux, propre et agréable, était conforme à la description. Luis a eu la bienveillance de nous fournir des chauffages d'appoint ce qui nous a permis de limiter le froid dans l'appartement (surtout chambre et salle de bain).
Nous étions en voiture et nous n'avons eu aucun souci à nous garer en face de l'appartement. La voiture nous a bien servi pour aller tant dans le centre (parcmètre pas très cher 2h maximum pour 1€) qu'à l'extérieur de la ville.
Petit bémol, un contre-temps que Luis n'a pas pu régler pendant notre séjour d'une semaine, une fuite d'eau dans la cuisine que nous avons dû éponger chaque jour et qui avait, avant notre arrivée, déjà un peu abimé le parquet.
En résumé, appartement parfait pour circuler en voiture et profiter pleinement de Porto et ses environs, peut-être à une période un peu moins hivernale !
Merci à Luis pour son appartement !

Luis was a great host. My arrival was at midnight and he picked me up, at a station, quite in the near of the apartment and even showed me the nearest supermarket, stations and an outstanding bakery. A great surprise was that he even bought some food for breakfast. 

I stayed there for one week and Luis always asked if there is everything alright. 

The apartment was beautiful and was even bigger than it seems on the pictures. Everything was like described and very welcoming. The surrounding was calm and a great place to relax, after a day full of impressions in Porto. 

Thank you for this great experience.

Luis was a great host. My arrival was at midnight and he picked me up, at a station, quite in the near of the apartment and even showed me the nearest supermarket, stations and an outstanding bakery. A great surprise was that he even bought some food for breakfast. 

I stayed there for one week and Luis always asked if there is everything alright. 

The apartment was beautiful and was even bigger than it seems on the pictures. Everything was like described and very welcoming. The surrounding was calm and a great place to relax, after a day full of impressions in Porto. 

Thank you for this great experience.

We had a fantastic stay in Cozy-apartment in Porto. Luis is a very good host. He was waiting for us at the metro-station with his car  in the night en brought us to the aparment. The house was clean and comfortable. We had a very good time.  Thanks Luis.

Luis was very welcoming, he picked us up from the metro and took us right to the apartment. The place was lovely, just like the photos and description. Luis thank you for everything! We had a great time! I highly recommend this place! Its very clean, and its on great location.

Nice Appartement a little bit outside the centro. Kitchen is good and has anything u need. Internet was good. Luis was a nice host. The Appartement was little bit cold, but there is a heater. 700m far from the Appartement is supermarket called "Pingo Doce".

Es hat alles wunderbar geklappt, Luis ist super nett und hat sich große Mühe gegeben, es uns so gemütlich wie möglich zu machen. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und sieht genauso aus wie auf den Bildern, wir freuen uns schon auf das nächste Mal!

La estancia en el apartamento de Luis ha sido muy agradable, Luis se ha mostrado como un gran anfitrión. Las descripciones se adaptan a la perfección a la realidad del apartamento, que tiene todas las comodidades necesarias para la estancia en Porto. El barrio está un poco alejado del centro pero en transporte público, que está a 200 metros del apartamento llegas en 10 minutos. Además la zona tiene mucho encanto, porque es un barrio tradicional de Porto. El apartamento estaba muy limpio y los detalles muy cuidados. Repetiría de nuevo la estancia sin pensarlo.

Luis was a very nice host,
he made us feel at home and took us to the supermarket the minute we arrived after guiding us through the appartement. The last day he printed a flight ticket back for us and brought it.
We loved staying in Porto!
El piso excelente, muy acogedor, limpio y en excelente estado.

Luis nous attendait. Hote très sympathique
Logement très propre et lumineux, beaucoup mieux que ce à quoi nous nous attendions.
Merci Luis

Luis made us feel very welcome, and generously provided some staples for breakfast until we could go out and get groceries the next day.
The apartment is exactly like the photo and description, and has all the  necessary supplies and utensils that are needed. 
It is located a little outside the centre of town, but there are three buses that go directly downtown , so it is very easy to get around. There are lots of shops to get groceries in the area, as well as a few cafes. We were very comfortable and enjoyed our stay very much

Luis was very welcoming . He even provided a lovely bit of breakfast food, fruit , milk and water for us, so we had something .
The apartment is very comfortable, and has the essentials that one needs. It was very clean . It looks exactly like the pictures.
The location is bit out of the way of the centre of the city.but you are only one block from 3 buses that take you into the downtown area. There are plenty of shops in the area to buy what ever you need.
We found it a very pleasant place to stay.

Louis's flat is really great! Very beautiful, welcoming, clean and bright. Louis was very nice and came to pick us up at the metro station (Combatentes) and got back to us fast when we interacted via e-mail. No need to call or SMS as there was no reason to, all was perfect. We had everything we needed - even coffee and milk were provided. Internet worked really well, no headaches about the basics (hot water, towels, clean sheets etc.), they were all in order.
The flat is indeed a bit far from the metro station - about 15 min. walk, but for us this wasn't an issue at all, it's a pleasure to walk around, it is a very quiet and nice neighbourhood. For the less willing to walk around, there's a bus station with 3 different buses going to the city centre literally 2 min away - however, they tend to stop around 8 PM, so night bus does it then. There are also quite a few shops around - bakery, supermarket, restaurants, etc., so everything one might need. 
All in all, this was a great experience, I would recommend Louis's flat with all my heart. Thank you for having us!

Luis is a very polite host. The communication with him was good. He explained us all details about the apartment and the area of our accommodation. The apartment was clean and had all important things for daily use.  We enjoyed the time in Porto.  Thanks Luis.

Everything was perfect as described by Luis's airbnb. The house was clean, spacious and beautiful! It didn't have shampoo/soap though so remember to pack them when you come! Luis was very nice and flexible with our arrival time. I would definitely come back to Luis's place again in the future if I come back to Porto!

We spent 4 lovely days in Porto in the appartment of Luis. Luis has been really nice and discreet. We had one minor personnal problem during the weekend and Luis solved it in only few hours. We will come back for sure in that appartment. Thanks !
Nice and tidy apartment. Would definitely stay again

I had the pleasure of staying in Luis´s apartment for 5 days during my recent trip to Oporto.

The day of my arrival, Luis kindly collect me at the metro station and drove me home to his flat, and while the cleaning woman was still putting the place together he offered to take me to the supermarket in order to purchase heavy items like water..

The flat is basic, but nice.. It has all that one would need for a weeks stay..And for those wanting to avoid tourist it is great.. It the apt is located in a typical neighborhood.  The nice part is the tranquility of the flat and the surrounding area.

Just for info.. The nearest metro is Combatantes which is a good 15 to 20 min walk.. But there are three bus lines a 7 min walk way that take you right to the centre in 15 to 20 mins.. 

I would without a doubt stay here again when visiting Oporto.
The flat was lovely and clean in a quiet area! Would recommend the staying here especially as it is closest to one of the best restaurants in Porto!
Thanks to Luis for really nice stay in Porto. The flat was extremely nice and clean, big and cozy, had everything you might need during the stay. Would come back if in Porto again.

This Spacious appartment is located 20 mins from center, the transportation by frequently running bus is way more easy than we thought! 
There are also several local cafe, take away grill restaurant and grocery shop near by the neiborhood .
We enjoyed the convenience, nice food,  and local gentle ppl a lot.
Luis is very helpful gentle man , we've already started missing the city a lot ! Thank you and See you soon on our next holiday ;)

Most places are meant to stay overnight. In this apartment you want to live :)
It is just as bright, spacious and cozy as it looks on the pictures. It has a kettle, toster,hair drier and almost any other thing you might need. We even found a jar of Nutella in a cupboard!
Luis is a very nice guy and a great host. He was always in contact when we needed his help. On our first day we arrived a bit earlier than we expected, but Luis organized everything really fast so we almost didn't have to wait to get to the apartment.
The area is nice and quiet. To get to the city center use buses 701, 702 or 703 that go from the bus stop near the house. It's only 15 minutes ride.
I recommend this place to anyone who's looking for a nice and comfortable place to stay in Porto.

Luis est un hôte très accueillant. Nous sommes arrivés 30 minutes plus tôt que prévu et Luis est arrivé très rapidement pour nous ouvrir. L'appartement est très agréable et correspond très bien à ce que l'on voit sur les photos et à la description. Il est situé très proche du centre. Il est possible de faire le trajet en métro mais alors il faut marcher 10 minutes pour s'y rendre. En combinant le métro et le bus il y a un arrêt au bout de la rue. 
Appartement très propre.
A recommander!
Merci Luis pour le sejour.

First time airbnb, great experience. Luis was on holiday, but a friend of him took great care of us. The communication went excellent. The apartment itself is great and super clean. The location is not that exciting, but the bus stop is around the corner and the metro a 10 minute walk. We had a great time. Thank you Luis!
Lovely and spacious apartment, easy to get into the centre of Porto, and supermarket about a five minute walk away!

Buen anfitrión, el apartamento recomendable. Lo malo es que estaba un poco lejos del centro pero no está mal comunicado aunque es difícil comprar los billetes del bus. 
Lo mejor la  churrasqueria que estaba al lado y muy barata y  sobre todo rica jajaja

Luis was very attentive and did his at most possible to make my trip pleasant and easy. One of the best hosts I met.
Flat was exactly as in the photo, big and clean, with everything you might need. As well as extras like( oil,coffee,tea,..) 
Bed was comfy, good linen and towels.
Overall good experience.

Merci Luis pour son accueil.
Le logement est fidèle à la description sur le site. Très beau logement, propre et confortable. Je le conseille vivement.

Virginia
Luis is a very nice host. The apartment was clean and very confortable. The bus stop is at 5min walk from it and the metro at 15min. We enjoyed our stay at his place.

Accueil très agréable, malgré la barrière de la langue. Hôte très prévenant.
Appartement très très propre ! Très bon état général, très fonctionnel, parfait pour des longs séjours.
Très bien placé, dans une petite rue très calme, et à moins d'un kilomètre de l'autoroute.

Luís es un buen anfitrión, simpàtico y amable, enseguida te ofrece su ayuda. El apartamento esta genial. Es grande y esta muy bién equipado. Esta en una zona muy tranquila y se duerme muy agusto, fuera del barullo del centro. Esta a unos diez minutos del centro en autobús , lo único que la targeta del dia de autobús y metro, debe comprarse en el metro y no se puede directamente en la parada de autobús. Apartamento bién comunicado y agradable, lo recomiendo.

Appartement très grand pour 2 personnes très agréable et calme. Un peu loin du centre mais en taxi  à plusieurs c'est tout à fait rentable. Entre 5 et 7 euros le trajet vers le centre de Porto. 
Luis a été un hôte très prévenant et arrangeant et extrêmement réactif quand aux messages.

Appartement idéal pour 2 personnes.
Bien située !
Globalement satisfaisant (linge de maison propre, etc ...)

Néanmoins quelques points à améliorer : 
- verrouillage des fenêtres à réparer
- ampoules à changer
Pour plus d'intimité, il faudrait rajouter des rideaux épais aux fenêtres.

Hôte accueillant, sympathique et rapidement joignable.

My girlfriend and I had a great time in Porto. Part of that was because of Luís his place. Great location and nice apartement with everything one would need. Luís was a great host as well, making sure everything was in order.

Luis came to pick us up at the nearest metro station. His flat was very cozy as it was described and was very clean and tidy. All the necessary appliances, cleaning agents and towels were available. It was located near the bus stop to the Bolhao market, so it was convenient. We had very comfortable time there.

Das Apartment sieht genauso aus wie auf den Fotos. Luis ist sehr nett und hat uns von der Metro Station abgeholt. Die Wohnung ist mit allem Ausgestattet was man so braucht. Zur Metro Station sind es ungefähr 15 min zu Fuß. Das Apartment liegt leider etwas abgelegt und drum herum sind viele Ruinen (die sind aber in der ganzen Stadt). Wir hatten eine wundervolle Woche in Porto und sind mit dem Zug für 20 Euro pro Person noch eine Woche nach Lissabon gefahren. Danke Luis für den schönen Urlaub.
We enjoyed our stay in Porto at Luis apartment, nice place, nice host - thank you !

Luis was very kind and picked us up from the metro and took us to the apartment. 
The area is very quiet and calm. The flat was a bit bigger than we expected, but very nice and clean. It was a bit cold though, but there is a portable radiator and some candles. 
Luis provides clean towels, toilet paper, but you should take your own soap etc.
We would recommend using the buses 701, 702 and 703 which are much closer than the metro, also the neighborhood is not that nice if you would like to go to/from metro. 
All in all, it was a great experience. Great thanks to Luis, once again!
Luis his house was very beautiful, clean, and close to the city center. The house is perfect for relaxing and has everything you need for a stay in Porto!
The House looked exactly as expected from the pictures. Luis is a very educated and kind host. Metro (Combatentes) is not that far walking distance. Recommend
O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotografias, muito confortável, e espaçoso. O Luis mostrou-se receptivo e atencioso, disposto a ajudar no que fosse necessário.  Recomendo!
Everything as it should be. Luis was very nice!

We enjoyed our stay at  Luis's flat. It only has  3 flats in that building and in a quiet street. Easy parking and get by. Luis picked us up from the metro station and showed us around the area. He has been very helpful and friendly. We will definite go back for our next holiday in Porto.

A casa corresponde ao descrito no anúncio e justifica o valor.
O anfitrião é simpático e disponível.
Pequenos detalhes a melhorar.

Obrigado,
Inês e Fernando

We had a great stay at Luis's apartment in Porto. The apartment is nice and cozy, it looks exactly as at photos. Luis is very kind and helpfull host, he resolved all our little problems. Definitely I can recommend this apartment.
Luis ha sido atento y amable, el apartamento esta en muy buenas condiciones, pero algo alejado del centro.

Luis was very welcoming and very hospitable. He was waiting for us outside the apartment on our arrival and he went through all the local facilities and apartment information with us in detail. The location is quiet as there are only 3 apartments in the whole complex (Luis is on the 1st floor).  The wi-fi was excellent with no loss in signal at any time during our 9 day stay. He even gave us details of taxi to use, how to catch the bus to town, where to visit in Porto and where the local shops were. We linked up on (Hidden by Airbnb) as that was the best way to communicate with him (due to free wi-fi). The apartment was very clean and he gave us plenty of towels (which was unexpected). There is a lot of amenities near the apartment, there is a launderette nearby which we used near the church a few streets away, plus supermarket, local fruit and veg shops, local bread/pastry shops and plenty of coffee shops. My Dad even got his hair cut locally! People of Porto are very friendly and most of the young people speak English very well. We travelled in early January where the weather was very rainy and cold, but the heaters and extra duvet Luis provided made the apartment warm. Overall we had an excellent, safe stay which was brilliant as it was the first time I used airbnb.

Adorei a experiência, a casa é muito bem situada no Porto, super limpa, com uma decoração confortável e minimalista e muito quentinha graças aos aquecedores que temos ao nosso dispor. Perfeita para um casal! Fomos muito bem recebidos e o Luís mostrou sempre uma enorme simpatia e disponibilidade para qualquer situação. Obrigada por tudo e até uma próxima!

For starters, this was my first international trip! As there were many variables I couldn't have anticipated, such as a 5+ hour delay resulting from flight delays and missed connections, my hope was that my lodging accommodation would be great. Luís' place is nothing short of amazing! He was very flexible with regards to meeting me at his place to let me in at a later time. He gave me a walkthrough and explained some differences which may not have been readily apparent to travelers visiting from other countries. He assured me that if I needed anything, that I could reach out to him at any time. He's a model host. The pictures for this post are EXACTLY what you get. The space is absolutely amazing. I was able to host friends and cook dinner very comfortably. Walk for about 5 minutes (maybe less) and you're at the bus stop! The ease of getting around using their transportation system is incredible. I strongly recommend the app, "Moovit", to assist you. If I ever return to Porto, this will always be my go-to spot as long as it's available!

Luis was a great host. He came with his car to bring us back from the metro to the appartment. The appartment was a little bit far from the center, and 10minutes from the metro. Everything was fine and as announced.

We had a wonderful stay in Porto. Luis was very kind and gave us some practical tips for getting around in the area. Furthermore, he always responded very fast and made sure that we feel comfortable during our stay. I can definitely recommend Luis' apartment as it is only 10-15 minutes from the city center. Thanks again for everything, Luis! :-)

It was great Luis picked us up from the metrostation! He explained the things well, though quite fast, and gave us a great advise for a typical good fishrestaurant downtown. All was clean in the house. Only there was a leak in the sink of the kitchen, and that's why the floor was wet, but that will be fixed. And there is no central heating, but electric heating. So it was quite cold in the house. But i can imagine that's a plus in the summertime.
The neigherhood itself was quiet and a little bit deserted. If you take a bus you are in 10 min downtown. The busses come often, so that's very practical!
Merci à Luis d'être venu nous chercher comme convenu à la stations de métro.
Optima estadia no Porto, casa bem localizada, muito espaçosa e confortável. Recomendo muito. Luís foi sempre prestável.

La casa es tal y como se ven en las fotos. Todo estaba muy limpio, el piso es muy acogedor y para una pareja es perfecto. La única pega que se puede poner es que la casa es fria pero tiene radiadores que se enchufan a la luz y calientan la habitación, baño y salón! Obrigado Luis!

Very nice apartment, just as in pictures! Its in a nice quiet neighbourhood within easy reach of the centre on buses or metro. 

Very friendly host with some good tips on places to go.

Mi chico y yo hemos pasado unos días muy buenos en Oporto, en la casa de Luis. Nos recogió un amigo suyo para llevarnos al piso y después nos acercó a la rivera del río. Hizo un día estupendo y pudimos aprovechar el sol. El resto de días llovió, pero es algo normal y forma parte del encanto de Oporto :-).

La casa corresponde 100% con las fotos. Es muy acogedora e ideal para una pareja. Muy cómoda y limpia. Es amplia para estar y dejar las cosas colocadas. Nos encanta cocinar y pudimos aprovechar la cocina muy bien, pues tiene todos los utensilios necesarios.

En cada estancia principal hay un radiador que hay que utilizar sobre todo si hace fresquito, como nos hizo a nosotros. 

Aunque parezca que la casa está alejada del centro, está bien comunicada con metro y bus, aunque no tienen tanta frecuencia (como por ejemplo en Madrid). También hay que decir que a nosotros nos gusta andar bastante con lo cual casi siempre fuimos andando de la casa al metro.

Had a great time staying at Luis' apartment! Due to flight delays we arrived late and he still came to pick us up with his car and drive us all the way to the apart. Great guy!

The place itself is roomy, comfy, clean and has all the things you need. Nothing to ask for except maybe bring a pair of slippers if you visit any other time than summer - since the apartment takes a day or two to heat up!

Other than that, close to great stores, great communications into the city center, the area feels safe and Luis answers quickly if you have any questions. Would absolutely use this place again if ever revisiting Porto!

Luis was so kind to take us from the metrostation. The apartment was fresh cleaned and full equipped. But after the cleaninglady has left, there was immediatly a very bad smell in the kitchen and the living room (the kitchendoor was blocked, so that we couldnt close it). We avoided these rooms and left the windows open the whole time. Unfortunately it was cold outside and the walls and doors not isolated. We took breakfast in the bed with an electric heating in the room, than it was even cozy.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour à Porto. Luis nous à attendus à la gare de métro de Combatantes, et il nous a ramener à l'appartement. C'est un immeuble tranquille dans un quartier calme. L'appartement correspond aux photo. Le métro n'est pas loin, à pied maximum 15 minute et il y à un market pas très loin ou on peux faire des petits courses. Même si nous n'avons pas passé beaucoup de temps dans l'appart nous sommes tout à fait contents de notre choix.

My parents stayed at Luis place and were more than happy about the accomodation. Clean, tidy and lovely flat! Luis was also helpful for them who didn't use to be oversea. Thanks to have been part of this wonderful memorie of Porto!

O apartamento é lindo e muito aconchegante. Os transportes públicos para o Centro da cidade são de fácil acesso. Para além disso, o Luís é um anfitrião atencioso, sorridente, prestativo, enfim, uma verdadeira simpatia. Super recomendado!
Très bel appartement, un hôte disponible et serviable! Bonne expérience à Porto!
Lovely clean apartment a short journey from the centre, everything worked perfectly, exactly like the photos! Luis is a very helpful host too.
Luis is very kind and the apartment is very beautiful and big.  I recommend it!

Luis a été disponible pour nous recevoir, et nous a donné toutes les indications pour arriver. Il est très gentil.
L'appartement est super, et les photos sont fidèles à la réalité.
Il est un peu excentré mais tout de même très proche de Porto qui est relativement une petite ville, puisque l'océan est également très proche.
Logement et hôte à recommander vivement.

Il a eu la gentillesse de venir nous chercher à la station de métro pour nous amener à l'appartement.
L'appartement correspondait parfaitement à la description.
Lovely apartment. Great to cook in and wonderful location--close to a grocery store and bus stop. Would recommend.

appartement conforme a sa description, confortable et accueillant, proche de l'aéroport (15 min de voiture) et à 5km du centre ville
très facile de se garer devant, quartier calme

Nous avons été reçu par Luis à l'heure prévue dans un appartement dont la description était tout à fait exacte, très propre, très confortable et spacieux dans un quartier très calme à 4 ou 5 km du centre-ville. Nous avons passé un séjour (1 semaine) très agréable dans cette ville où il y a 1000 choses à découvrir et dans cet appartement où on se sentait vraiment "comme chez soi". Si, à l'avenir, nous retournons à Porto, nous n'hésiterons pas à recontacter Luis, et si vous cherchez un logement top et pas cher... nous le recommandons vivement.
Dominique et Philippe - Liège - B

Luis was a great host. He came to meet us immediately when I got the arrival time wrong and gave us the tour of the flat. 
We was helpful with local places to eat, and transportation links and gave us a number for a cab and said to call him if we had any problems. Great host!

We had a very pleasant stay at Luis' apartment! The house is beautiful, stylish, and well equipped with everything you may need for a cozy stay. Luis is a very nice host who gave clear instruction for us to get to his house, and pick up us at the metro station (truly thankful). Though it is a bit far away from the so-called touring-centre-area, we had no problem of traveling around. Bus stop is right at the street corner by 2 minutes walk. All buses at the stop are going to the city centre, so no need to worry about their route. Mini store is also there while you can also take few minutes walk to the big supermarket. You will find everything there. We particular like the restaurant nearby the bus stop. It offers fresh grilled food (in reasonable price) and the cooker, waiters are nice. Neighborhood is nice too. Every morning when we were going out, both the neighbor lady and her big dogs were greeting to us at her balcony, indeed feel so warmly stay there. 
The day when we were staying, it was a bit cold at night.  We found two heaters at home, so it was not a problem too. 
Besides, if you drive, then it is a plus that you can easily find a parking nearby.
Last but not lease, we might carelessly missed out to switch off some lights when rushing out. Luis gently reminded us about the environmental concern of the future ---- for which we indeed appreciate! I think only those who truly love his flat and care about his guests would do so.  
I would highly recommend Luis' house.

Luís's place is just awsome. Sparkling clean, full equipped, very comfortable. I loved the bathroom. It feels like a real home. 5 min walk to the bus station and about 15 min walk to metro. Absolutely no problem to get to the center. If ever back to Porto, surely to his place again!

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour dans cet appartement ! très bien situé pas loin du centre ville et facilement accessible. je n'hésiterai pas à recommander Luis et son appartement à des amis. Le logement était très propre et il y avait les éléments essentiels pour vivre un séjour à Porto. 
Merci encore à Luis !
Grand appartement spacieux et lumineux, les planchers de bois sont magnifiques. La communication avec l'hôte était bonne. Éloignée du centre mais facilement accessible en autobus.

Luis a toujours été à notre écoute et nous a donné les renseignements que nous lui avons demandés. L'appartement correspondait à nos attentes car bien situé ( bus au bout de la rue) pour se rendre facilement dans le centre et sans aucun problème pour stationner notre voiture.

Luis is a great host! He helped us when ever we asked for.
The apartment is really clean and comfortable.
It's close to public services so you in the center of beautiful Porto in no time.

I really recommend this apartment and it's great host!

it was a very easy and swift communication with luis, he even picked us up with his car at the metro station. the apartment is really nice and well equipped. definitely recommend. thank you very much.

A notre arrivée, nous avons trouvé le quartier un peu "tristouné" mais très calme et sécurisant. 
Appartement agréable, spacieux , bien équipé et à proximité des commerces.  
Accueil sympathique de la part de Luis qui nous a témoigné toute sa confiance.
Large spacious and very clean apartment. Luis was helpful and available too

louis apartment is ideal for 2 people. Large and spacious , there is everything you need !
Practice with the bus to visit and stroll into the center. We advise !

Séjour agréable dans l'appartement de Luis. L'appartement correspond à la description que Luis en fait, est bien équipé.  Même s'il est un peu excentré, le bus pour le centre ville se trouve à quelques centaines de mètres,  au bout de la rue. Il est facile de se garer juste devant l'appartement.

The apartment looks exactly like you can see in the pictures. It's quite nice and really big, even the bathroom. The bedroom and the bed are really comfy. The only bad thing is the position and surroundings of the apt because it's not in the centre of Porto, so you cannot walk to it, but there are public transportations.
At the end i will surely recommend this place, expecially if you have a car.
Luis is a perfect host! Thank you so much.

The apartment was great! it looks exactly like in the pictures. Its huge and as we were traveling by car it was easy to find a parking. there is a bus stop nearby so it is easy to get to the town center as every bus stops there. Carlos,Luis uncle was really nice and helpful even as we arrived one hour earlier because we forgot that portugal is in a different time zone. Nevertheless we as well noticed a weird smell after the windows were closed for a longer time. as we didn't spend much time in the apartment there was no problem !
The appartement is great. Very clean and even with Dutch tv.  We felt realy at home. The neighbourhoud is typical for Porto.  Nice restaurant nearby is Yuko and alsi cerveceria Blue is realy good.
We stayed 3 nights. It was nice.
A nice and very clean appartement. Luis even picked us up at the metrostation.

Appartement très agréable, spacieux, lumineux, bien équipé  et très calme.  
Si il n'y avait qu'un point négatif serait qu'il est un peu loin du centre ville.
Luis est accueillant et réactif à toutes vos questions - Merci à lui pour ce séjour dans sa belle ville.
Elisabeth et Gérard

the appartment is great! As a couple we had all the compfort we needed, also its very clean and spacious, just as the pics show.

The neighberhood is very silent and peacefull.

Its only 10 minutes with the bus to porto city center, they drive all night! And if you dont have the time for a bus, its only €5 for a cab/taxi ride.

The only problem was that we couldnt do the dishes because we couldnt find the stop. But thats only because we didnt know how the sink works i guess :p.

We had a great time here, Luis, is a great host!!

We had a really nice time in Luis apartment. In 15 minutes you are with the car or the bus in the city center. Everything went fine. The apartment is really clean and Luis helped us wherever  he could.

Had a great stay thanks to Luis! We were amazed by the size of the appartment and how clean it is. Even though the appartment is not directly in the city center we had no problems :) 
On top of that it was great that Luis is spontaneous and picked us up at the Metro Station.
Thanks for erverything!
Grazioso appartamento situato in alta periferia nel nulla!con il bus arrivi in centro e ci devi rimanere
Appartamento pulito e ben fornito.Il centro è raggiungibile facilmente con bus e metro,Consigliato.

Sauber und gemütlich...Luís war sehr sympathisch und hilfsbereit ich empfehle gerne der Wohnung von Luís gerne nur 15min mit Bus von Zentrum von Porto!

Apartamento limpo e confortável, Luís um bom anfitrião e muito simpático, de Ônibus apenas 15 do centro do Porto!

Recomendo o apartamento do Luís pra quem quiser ter uns dias agradáveis no Porto!

Obrigada Luís!

A very nice and tidy place to stay. The room is exactly like what the pictures show. it takes around 10 mins from accommodation to central Porto by bus. Thanks for hosting me and recommending me o' Buraco. That is my favorite in Porto now. ^｡^

We had a short but comfortable stay. Unfortunately we did not meet Luis in person but the cleaning lady opened the door for us. Luis was always available when we had a question and even a later check-out was possible. A small disadvantage was the long way to the Metro station.
Luis was welcoming us at midnight. Thanks for that! He showed us the apartment and explained us how to reach the city center. He is a friendly host.
Espaço agradável e bem localizado. Luís foi muito prestativo é simpático.

The apartment is really spacious and clean. We had a perfect stay in Luis apartment. Luis was very flexible with the check-in and check-out. If you have a car, you can park directly in front of the house. The next supermarkt is nearby. 
We could really recommand you the apartment although the neighbourhood is not so charming at the first sight.

When we arrived at the apartment Luis wasn't able to meet us, but his friendly house keeper was there to let us in. The apartment looked exactly like the photos and is very very spacious! It's in a very quiet neighborhood a bit off the beaten path, but it's a pretty quick commute to  the city center. Not far from the apartment are some shops, restaurants and full size grocery store. Since the apartment is so big and has a fully equip kitchen, we decided to cook several meals there to save some money. There's even a great restaurant up the street that sells Brazilian style chicken, ribs and other delicious meats and sides to go.
Nice apartment, good size and well equipped. Luis is a good host and very helpful and responsive to questions
5 estrelas

It was a beautiful apartment, it had everything we need, but it was really cold. But that is the problem of every apartment, which we have stayed at during our November trip in Portugal, so i guess its normal here :) 

And Luis was great - he picked us up at metro station in the middle of the night. Thank you for that!

Luis picked us up at the metro-station with his car, he was really friendly, explained us everything and we could ask him anything about Porto (How to get somewhere, what to do, where to find shops.... )
Great trip and stay!

Luis was very responsive and punctual regarding the check in time! The apartment was a great price for the amount of space you are getting with all around clean and cozy atmosphere. The only downside was the apartment being a little far from the main attractions of porto and the metro station not being that accessible. On the bright side there is a bus near by. All in all a great stay in this beautiful city!

Appartement spacieux , propre et bien aménagé. Nous avions une voiture de location, et c'était très pratique pour le stationnement et pour rayonner à partir du logement. Mais nous avons également rejoins le centre de Porto en bus, en 15 min de trajet. (arrêt de bus entre 5 à 10 minutes à pieds de l'appartement): très pratique!
Nous n'avons juste pas eu très chaud, nous y sommes allé une semaine assez froide et pluvieuse de Novembre.
Luis est un hôte très serviable.

It was very, very cold in the apartement because there is no heating installed. We could see ourselves breathing.
Carpet in living room stinks like pee so we picked it up and putted it into kitchen because we didn't use it.
By the way we really enjoyed our time in Porto and probably come back to Luis flat when it's wormer outside.
5stars .

Aunque el barrio está alejado un poco del centro, hay autobuses que te dejan en Bolhão en 12-15 minutos. Eso sí, para llegar al metro hay que caminar unos 15 minutos desde la casa.
La casa es exactamente igual que en las fotografías, limpia y amplia.

Nous avons bien évidement passé un super voyage. En revanche peut être que Luis devrait préciser que l'emplacement du logement n'est pas du tout attractif, de plus même si on était a 10 mins de métro du centre, il faut quand même faire 5 mins de bus pour y arriver. Hors le bus passe toutes les 20 mins et il n'est pas tout le temps a l'heure ! En bref l'emplacement complique un peu les choses mais ce n'est rien de grave ! il  faut juste avoir le temps de prendre ses marques et partir  au moins pour une semaine, de peur de perdre trop de temps. De plus pour sortir le soir c'est compliqué étant donné que le métro finit a 1h et les bus a 00h00. 
Pour ce qui est de l’intérieur du logement, tout est très propres, rangé, et de plus il est très vaste et bien équipé ! mais faites attention a la particularité du fait qu'il n'y est pas de chauffage ! car en hiver, il fait 10 degrés dans l'appartement. Heureusement Luis ainsi que le service Airbnb ont été remarquable ! il nous a fallut attendre seulement une nuit pour bénéficier de plusieurs chauffages portatifs et ainsi pouvoir vivre sainement. L'appartement de Luis regorge de livre très intéressant et dans toutes les langues! ce qui n'est pas négligeable. De plus Luis a su être a l'écoute de nos problèmes et nous a donné toutes les informations nécessaire pour se déplacer dans porto et pour faire nos courses. Il est aussi très serviable car il venu nous chercher a la bouche du métro pour nous ramener a l'appartement.

All was good accept for the heating but it is the same in 99% of the houses in Portugal, plus who needs heating in warm time which is most of the year in Portugal :) The flat is not far form the bus stops that will take you to metro and you can easily go wherever you want around the city. The flat is big and you have all the necessary for your stay. Luis is kind and welcoming.

Upon arrival, we are immediately welcomed by Luis who showed us around the house. The place is very nice and clean, but is quite cold at night even with heaters. It's a bit far away from centre but is easily accessible by bus.

Wir hatten ein angenehmen Aufenthalt in Luis Unterkunft. Die Zimmer sehen genauso aus wie auf den Bildern. Alles war sauber und Luis empfIng uns auch zur späten Stunde noch sehr freundlich. Leider bekam die Heizung die Wohnung nicht ganz warm. Das war aber auch das einzige Manko. Gerne wieder.
Luis was super nice and the apartment is just perfect
Porto is a great city and very beatiful! Luis is very kind and is a nice person and his house is great to spend a weekend!

Luis was great 
He picked us up at the station 
House was clean and we can use everything
Nice experience
Luis' apartment was very nice, spacious and had everything we needed four our stay. Luis was easy to contact when we needed to.
Casa 5*, nada a apontar pelo contrário, recomendo vivamente.

A casa é exatamente como nas fotos! 
O bairro é silencioso e próximo de transportes públicos para chegar a cidade. 
O aquecimento da casa não foi um problema, tive acesso a muitos aquecedores... 
O anfitrião foi muito prestativo! 
Recomendo e voltarei

Everything went much better than we expected. Luis is a very hospitable, kind and really helpful person. He even came to us in the middle of the night when we lost electricity. The flat is clean, nice, fully equipped. The bus stop is right behind the corner. Thank you once again Luis for hosting us in your beautiful place!

We had a quite common stay @ Luis' apartment. Little traffic around and a calm neighborhood. The next bus stop and bakery are a 3 min walk away.
The apartment was as described and Luis very helpful. An earlier check-in was no problem and as we had a problem with the key Luis was with us within 5 minutes.
Superbe appartement à  voir!

O apartamento fica em uma localização de fáceis acessos, é limpo, organizado, tem tudo o que é necessário para uma estadia agradável. O bairro é calmo e silencioso, a hospitalidade e disponibilidade do anfitrião foram perfeitas. Fotos reais! Irei voltar com toda certeza e super indico

El piso es tal como se ve en las fotos, limpio, recogido y acogedor. La parada de bus está a unos 10 minutos de la casa y hay un supermercado muy cerca. Luis muy simpático y amable nos vino a buscar a la parada de metro y nos enseñó un poco la zona. Sin duda un buen sitio para pasar unos días en Oporto.
O espaço é amplo e bem aconchegante. Só fica um pouco afastado das principais atrações da cidade. O Luis também é super atencioso. Próximo a padaria e supermercado.

Recomendo. ]
O apartamento é confortável e atende à todas as necessidades de alguém que esteja viajando. É bem equipado e silencioso.
It was perfect because it is near to university. Thank you Luis for your hospitality :)

Hemos estado 4 días en el apartamento de Luis y la experiencia ha sido fantástica! La comunicación con el ha sido prácticamente inmediata y el apartamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Está retirado del centro pero muy bien comunicado por transporte público, nosotros nos hemos movido en metro y hasta la estación de Salgueiros son 15min exactos andando, desde allí otros 15 a Aliados. El autobús está más cerca de casa. Viajamos hasta Porto en coche y el barrio es bastante seguro como para aparcar el coche allí varios días. 100% recomendable

Luis was very helpful host, he tooked us, when we arrived from the subway station. He showed us flat around and gave us many informations about Porto. Flat was very clean, bigger than we thought and good located( just few stops by subway to city centre), or 10 min by bus. Thanks for everything.

Parfait appartement pour un couple ou même une petite famille. Magnifique cachet avec les planchers et les volets en bois. Utiliser l'autobus pour aller au centre-ville est très accessible et rapide. Belle luminosité et tous les services sont fidèles à la description. À relouer si l'on repasse par Porto un jour

Wir waren 2 Tage in Porto und hatten einen schönen Aufenthalt in Luis Apartment. Die Wohnung ist zwar nicht unbedingt Zentral gelegen, allerdings erreicht man die Innenstadt schnell mit dem Bus. Dieser fährt auch regelmäßig und ist fußgängig innerhalb weniger Minuten erreichbar. Luis war ein super Host mit dem die Kommunikation gut verlief und der uns für Rückfragen immer zur Verfügung stand. 

Gerne wieder!
El departamento esta perfecto. Tiene todo el equipamiento y es muy cómodo.  Super recomendable !!! Luis nos recibió con  mucha amabilidad !!

Luis é um anfitrião atencioso e simpático. O apartamento é bem localizado, com fácil acesso a padarias, mercados, farmácias, onibus e metro. Fica em um bairro residencial tranquilo, a 10 minutos do centro historico de Porto. Foram dicas sobre o comércio mais próximo e sobre o transporte público, que foram muito úteis e tornaram a estada mais confortável para nós. Recomendamos!
Muy cómodo y espacioso. Muchos artículos de cocina. Ideal para ir y venir en taxi. Barrio tranquilo

Luis's place was much better than we expected, Very large, lots of light, and well equipped. Luis was super helpful and was able to meet us and check us in after a late, delayed flight. Neighbourhood is a bit sketchy, but there is a bus to downtown within a 5 minute walk, as well as a nice bakery/cafe. We had an excellent stay.
가깝진 않지만 정말 좋은 집이였어요. 청소상태도 훌륭했고 시트에도 섬유유연제냄새가 났어요. 밥해먹기 정말 편하고 왠만한건 다 있었어요. 사진보다 집이 상당히 넓었고 흡연도가능해서 편했어요. 추천!!

A descrição e as fotos do anúncio correspondem correctamente ao espaço. A zona é sossegada, próxima de supermercados e transportes públicos e tem estacionamento à porta. A casa é bem equipada, confortável e limpa. O Luís foi muito simpático, a comunicação foi fácil e mostrou-se disponível para nos ajudar durante a estadia.
Apartamento luminoso, muy bien equipado, ubicado en una zona tranquila con todos los servicios. Está bien conectado con el sistema de transporte público. Muy recomendable.
Vi kan varmt rekommendera Luis som värd, lägenheten ar jättemysig, ren och hade allt man behövde. Gångavstånd till tunnelbanan, buss, lungt område.

Flat is spacious and bright and airy, and also very close to public transport that takes you into the centre of Porto. There's a good supermarket in walking distance, as well as smaller shops around. The amenities in the flat are good, it is well-equipped with everything you could need. Though our check-in and meeting was brief, Luis was understanding when we were late. All in all, I recommend this place.

Muito Boa estadia! Fica perto dos autocarros que vão até ao centro da cidade. A casa é exactamente como nas fotos, impecável e muito aconchegante!  O Luís é muito prestável,  sempre pronto a ajudar, até nos foi buscar à estação de metro. Muito obrigada por esta excelente estadia.Recomendo vivamente!
Es totalmente como en las fotos. Todo muy limpio y ordenado. Piso amplio y luminoso. Para acceder al centro se tarda 15 minutos (en coche). Todo muy bien!

A casa é incrível, precisamente como nas fotos. Aconchegante, confortável, situada num bairro silencioso mas ainda assim localizada perto de serviços e transportes. Acabei por não conhecer o Luís mas mostrou-se disponível para o que fosse preciso. O espaço é bastante iluminado, amplo, limpo e com todas as comodidades que possam ser necessárias durante a estadia. Não tenho nada a apontar pela negativa, recomendo vivamente.

I recommend Luis's flat.
Great appartement. Porto is a wonderful city and Luis was kind to us.

Hemos estado 4 días con nuestro hijo de 2 años. La casa es exactamente como en las fotos, incluso más grande de lo esperado. Estaba todo ordenado pero había un olor horrible que 2 días más tarde descubrimos que venía de la alfombra!!! Si intentábamos poner la lavadora se iba la luz pero Luis nos indicó donde estaba la lavandería más próxima. 
Lo que menos nos ha gustado es el barrio, alrededor del apartamento hay muchas casas como abandonadas y justo enfrente una fábrica también abandonada. Eso sí, puedes aparcar justo en la puerta de casa y las noches son muy silenciosas. 
En general la casa está bien pero necesita un buen repaso a temas como lavadora, tostador, algunos enchufes colgando, el mando de la televisión, el tendedero (está roto y tampoco hay pinzas) y, por supuesto el terrible olor de la alfombra!!!
Luis ha sido flexible con las horas de entrada y salida pero no nos dio solución para el problema de lavadora (solo la dirección de la lavandería), creo que si la casa se ofrece con lavadora, debería arreglarse la situación sin coste ni traslado para el huésped.
Very warm greeting from our host on arrival and we were late! Very clean large apartment. We had a lovely time. Only concern a little too far out of main town for a weekend break.

Piso grande y exactamente igual que las fotos , estaba en un barrio tranquilo donde se podía dormir perfectamente ya que está algo alejado del centro , 10-15 minutos de autobús.
Recomendable
Luis speaks perfectly english. The room was nice and clean :) very recommendable !
The place is amazing ,got everything you will ever need. The only issue is that its a bit far from center
The place was definitely well located with public transport connections very close from the flat. Luis was lovely and well educated. I highly recommend this place.

Apartamento muito agradável e com uma sala espaçosa! A localização serviu perfeitamente para o que procurava (perto do pólo universitário)! 
O Luís esteve sempre disponível para qualquer coisa que fosse necessário.
Great flat, spacious, very clean and comfortable.

Piękne mieszkanie z wygodnym salonem i przestronną sypialnią. Apartament ma świetnie wyposażoną kuchnię, a na półce znajdziecie sporo ciekawych książek po angielsku. Doceniamy też instrumenty muzyczne i kilka reprodukcji malarstwa zgromadzonych w mieszkaniu (Picasso, Mondrian). W łazience jest wanna i kilka ręczników. Do centrum jest 15 minut autobusem. W okolicy znajduje się sporo sklepów. Nie przestraszcie się tylko starego budynku obok. Luis to bardzo miły gospodarz - dziękujemy za Twoją gościnność :)
사진보다 훨씬 넓고 방 상태가 좋았습니다. 위치나 근처에 있는 건물이 무서운것 빼고는 다 좋았어요. 비행기 연착으로 늦었는데도 호스트가 기다렸다 마중나와주셔서 참 감사했습니다.

Нам очень понравилась квартира Луиса, она была чистой, очень уютной и полностью соответствовала всем нашим ожиданиям. Мы приехали в Порто в низкий сезон и хотя по вечерам уже было прохладно, но каждая комната, даже ванная, была оборудована обогревателями, так что было очень комфортно. Довольно тихий район и не было проблем с парковкой. Но если вы без машины, то до центра едет много автобусов, а пешком чуть больше получаса. Сам Луис был очень гостеприимен и общителен, спасибо ему за теплый прием.
Luis à été un hôte formidable,l’appartement était spacieux propre et agréable ! Il y a tout l’équipement (Website hidden by Airbnb) Luis je vous le recommande !

Apesar de a rua parecer estranha com casas abandonadas, é um ambiente seguro e a localização é (Website hidden by Airbnb) acesso ao mercado ao lado e fácil acesso ao centro (de carro), não encontramos problemas. Luis foi um anfitrião muito atencioso e acessível para qualquer necessidade. Recomendo a estadia!
Great apartment. Beautiful wood decorated. Clean and quiet. A little far from the center but near a supermarket.

Наш рейс задержался и мы приехали очень поздно и Луис нас все равно дождался и тепло встретил.
Апартаменты просторные с дополнительными обогревателями, если ночь выдастся прохладная. Тихий район, безопасно оставлять машину напротив дома на улице. Есть все необходимое для комфортного и полноценного проживания.
Спасибо большое за гостеприимство!
The place is as pictures. All clean and quiet. Luis had help us and he is so flexible and patient. Will com back for sure!!

Отличное жилье, недалеко от центра, можно очень хорошо выспаться, вдалеке от шумной дороги.До ближайшего большого супермаркета, который работает до 11 или 12 вечера и кафе - 5 минут пешком, до остановки автобуса - примерно 500 метров, автобусы ходят круглосуточно (после 12- раз в час), на автобусе до центра ехать 15 минут.в квартире очень тепло, есть обогреватели в каждой комнате. Очень понравилась удобная кровать, уютная гостиная .
Excelente apartamento, tudo perfeito, o Luís sempre prestativo com informações que precisamos. Recomendo 100%.
Without doubts, it's a great place to stay. Host is a really friendly guy and apartment has everything you need - it's cozy and conditions are nice.

Espaço bastante agradável, com conforto e muita luz natural. Sem dúvida um espaço de referência.
De salientar a simpatia do Sr Luís.
Cidalina & Pedro Tomaz
Lovely place! Everything you need! Just a little far away but there is close enough transport

Bel appartemmét , à peu près bien déservie pour aller au centre ville (mais moins facile pour le retour ).
NB : difficile de comprendre le fonctionnement des bus

숙소는 사진 그대로입니다. 호스트의 세심한 배려가 돋보입니다. 시내와 이동거리가 있긴하나 넓은 집과 저렴한 가격으로 만족합니다.

세톽끼는있낀허나좍동이되지않습니다.교울에는집좌체가마니추울껍늬당.주방은깨끗하나엄식을해뭑을수있는기본푸라이판,퐁퐁세재가없었고있어도췅결하지안으니깐촴고하세요.
Lovely place, very confortable, excellent bed, very cozy, silent and whit a good space. A little bit far from The metro station, but whitout problems to go. We recomend!
La casa es exactamente como pone en las fotos aunque está algo alejado del centro pero en autobús se llega rápidamente.

Ótimo  lugar, perfeito pra quem estuda nas Faculdades próximas. Espaço amplo e com todos os utensílios, roupas de cama, tudo bem limpo. Confortável. Supermercado próximo. O Luís recebeu a gente super bem. Recomendo!

Encontra-se numa área calma mas perto de tudo. Apartamento muito acolhedor, com boas áreas, uma luz magnífica.  O Luís é um anfitrião atento e disponível sempre que necessário. Nada de mal a apontar. Muito bom. Voltaremos.

We had a lovely stay in the apartment. We found all the necessary service, shops, cafes and restaurants  in the near vicinity. There is a bus stop near by and it takes about 15 minutes to downtown. Very good convenience.
les photos du logement sont bien réelles, pas de tromperie et luis est très accueillant
Adorei a estadia neste alojamento com ótimas condições. Embora nao tenha tido contato pessoal com o Sr. Luís,  esteve sempre prestável a responder a quaisquer duvidas via mensagem.
O Sr. Luis foi sempre simpático e disponível

Luis’s flat is brilliant! My boyfriend and I loved it! The house is located 15 minutes to the city centre but public transports are really close to it! Luis has been very kind to us, he let us check in one hour early!
We stayed here for 2 nights. It is a good apartment for this price. Located not in the center but reachable by public transport. Cold inside, but thanks to the host who provided us with heaters
Casa super bem equipada, muito acolhedora e com transportes públicos nas proximidades. No apartamento do Luis sentimo-nos como se estivéssemos em casa.
En general todo muy bien
Foi incrível a minha estada neste apartamento! Obrigado!
Luis' house is very cosy and big. Enough for 2 people. It's really cold but he has some heaters which we can use ;)

Luis was such a nice host and we felt very welcome in his beautiful apartment. (It looks exactly like on the pictures) Luis picked us up from metro station late at night and took us to the flat - thank you for that as well! By metro you‘re within a few minutes into the city. I really recommend this host and his flat ! ☺️  Greetings from Germany ‍♀️

The Haus is really big for two people. It’s super clean and tidy. Luis is really nice and easy to communicate. We spent sweet two days. Since Porto is not so big , so the location is convenient. It’s pretty worth experiencing it
Muito confortável e de fácil acesso, hóspede muito prestável e sempre disponível.
The accomdation was very pleasant . Proper heating equipment present for the cold . 13 mins in bus to city centre . Thank you Luis
Der Strom fiel gelegentlich aus bzw. die Sicherung raus. Einige Steckdosen funktionierten dazu nicht, aber alles kein Drama. Er hatte genug Verlängerungskabel etc. vorrätig.

Logement très propre. Luiz a été très réactif face à nos différents problème. Cependant le logement n est pas chauffés seulement des chauffages d appoint ce qui n a  réellement pas été suffisant lors de notre sejour. Le logement est dans une rue calme  et près de la ligne de bus et du métro. Je recommande ce logement hors période hivernal!

Wir waren nur für 3 Nächte in Luis‘ Apartment und haben uns tagsüber die Innenstadt von Porto angeschaut. Die Wohnung ist nicht ganz zentral gelegen, aber das Zentrum ist zu Fuß locker zu erreichen. Dafür liegt sie in einer recht ruhigen Straße mit guten Parkmöglichkeiten direkt davor! Ein größeres Einkaufszentrum mit Supermarkt ist circa 20min zu Fuß entfernt. Die Wohnung ist mit allem ausgestattet, was man im Alltag so braucht. 
Leider war die Wohnung im März jetzt ziemlich kalt, auch wenn uns mobile Heizer zur Verfügung standen. 
Kommunikation hat super geklappt und Check-In auch reibungslos, obwohl wir mit unserem Flieger über eine Stunde Verspätung hatten. 
Super netter Gastgeber, vielen Dank!
Estuvimos muy agusto, no obstante, era una casa bastante fría.

Adorei o apartamento. Super confortável e com todas as comodidades necessárias para uma estadia tranquila. 
O Luís é também super acessível e bastante hospitaleiro.

Очень добрый и коммуникабельный хозяин, сразу вёл диалог и встретил лично, хоть мы и опоздали на час. Жильё находиться достаточно далеко от центра, но туда ходят автобусы 701,702 . Само жильё очень просторное и чистое. В ванной бойлер, так что особо не покупаешься . Мы были в середине апреля и было прохладно - в каждой комнате стоял обогреватель.
Its really cozy apartment with all important things. The flat fully corresponds the description. We have spent good time there and enjoyed Porto.

This apartment is a good value, and great location for use of the bus with a stop just two blocks away.  There are three buses which come every few minutes with this stop being one “end of the line” and the other end being in the center of the city area.  There you are two blocks from the metro if you wish to go further.  You cannot get lost.  There is a large grocery store a few blocks walk and a good restaurant, cafes, little shops very near.  The neighborhood is not attractive but it is safe feeling, the apartment needs a bit of upkeep but basically it serves well for the low cost.

Het verblijf bij Luis was zeer aangenaam. Het was een zeer proper, ruim en mooi appartement. De buurt was zeer rustig. Op 10 minuten ben je met de bus in het centrum van de stad. 
Luis heeft ons goed ontvangen en kwam ons opwachten bij de metrohalte en bracht ons met de auto naar het appartement.

Un logement avec de l'espace,  de la lumière et du coup, agréable en ce sens.  Mais nous avons été surpris les deux nuits par trop de bruit de la part des voisins. ..du bruit jusqu'à minuit et plus quand ils rentrent tard. Sans suffisamment d'attention aux autres

The apartment is really big, there is a heater if it is cold - good plus for it, because during our stay (May) it was pretty much cold outside and in the apartment so we could use it. :) 

The apartment was clean and fully equipped. Sometimes there was a problem with good internet in the bedroom but in living room the internet was great.  It was about 10 minutes walking to bus station and the buses were every 20 minutes and it last about 15 minutes by bus to get into the city center. 
We recommend!
Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und geräumig. Obwohl wir zu spät eingecheckt haben , hat Luis uns dennoch freundlich empfangen. Wir empfehlen die Wohnung weiter.

Bel appartement très propre, agréable, un peu excentré mais proche d une petite épicerie et surtout une boulangerie, salon de thé excellente et très peu chère, bien desservi par le bus. Merci de nous avoir accueillies.

Luis was a very accomodating host, who answered all of our messages directly. Even tough we arrived later than expected, the check-in was no problem at all. The flat itself is generously cut, 5 minutes away from a big supermarket and around 10 minutes from the university. A bus stop, with verious busses that drive into the centre of Porto, was around 5 minutes away and it took about 15 minutes to get their. We would recomment this place and definitly stay here again.

Luis war ein sehr freundlicher, zuvorkommender Gastgeber, der auch eine Kleinigkeit, die zu reparieren war, sofort erledigen ließ. Busanbindung gibt es in ca 300m. Die Wohnung und das Bad sind sehr geräumig. Einzig die direkte Umgebung ist optisch nicht sehr ansprechend. Wenn man nicht vorhat selbst zu kochen, ist die Unterkunft in jedem Fall sehr empfehlenswert!
Отличные, просторные и стильные апартаменты. Квартира находится в хорошем состоянии, очень удобная кровать. Единственное что, wi-fi не дотягивает до спальни, но в столовой ловит отлично.

The apartament is great, very well equipped, comfortable and clean. Luis was excellent, always quick to answer our questions. The only downside is the location. It is quite far from the city center and a bit of a walk to the subway, going through a not so nice neighborhood. However, we had already looked it up on the map, so we knew what to expect. Also there was a good offer of uber cars around anytime we needed. We would totally stay there again.
Luis is such a nice person, and his place is so pretty
Good, the location wasn’t great, but I knew this when I booked it. The house is quite cold. But very spacious and has everything you need.
Lovely large space for two. Very nicely decorated, all necessities provided and birds chirping in the morning will wake you up.
The apartment is spacious and cozy. We had a great time there. The apartment was clean and full equipped. Flaws are bad internet connection in the bedroom and some problems with check-in.
Logement propre en général, proche des bus et stationnement en face du logement très simple.
The appartment was bright and spacious, it provided us a great stay in Porto! I could really recommend this to any other who wants to visit Porto.
Luís apartment is just great!! Very clean and a lot of space. We really enjoyed staying there and would definitely come back :-)

Great well-appointed apartment. Clean, peaceful retreat with easy parking on the street. Communication with Luis was great. 100% recommended if you have your own car and need a good base from which to visit Porto. Maybe less so if you have to rely on public transport as it is on the outskirts of town (nearest tube station is 20 minute walk but there are buses also).
Тихий район. До центра 15 минут на автобусе. Уютные и комфортные апартаменты. Вай фай не дотягивал до спальни.
Luis is a wonderful host and staying in his apartment is a pure pleasure. Kitchen is wonderfully equipped, apartment is very clean and sunny and bed are amazingly comfortable! Highly recommend.
Great spacious place and localization.  15 minutes walk to metro station that will take you to the center of Porto.
Ótimo anfitrião (prontidão de resposta, muito prestável); ótima localização

地點其實滿偏僻的,到公車站也要走10幾分鐘｡然後公車有時也不好等,到市區要15-20分鐘｡
但是空間非常寬敞,有廚房跟飯廳可以使用!床也滿舒服的
只是洗澡有時會突然沒熱水,然後水龍頭的水壓很低,要洗很久才洗的乾淨｡

Nice flat. Good connection to public transport (bus). Ca. 20min to Porto Centrum. Luís gave us a warm welcome and responded quickly to questions. A few things in the flat need to be fixed, but it‘s ok for the price. We had some nice days there. Thanks Luís!

Luis‘ Apartment is a really nice place to stay if you want to explore Porto! The Kitchen is well equipped and the bed really comfy. Sadly, the communication hasn‘t been good all the time, especially our questions concerning the check-out have not been answered, which left us very unsure how to check-out.
But all in all, we had a very good time and would come back :-)

Luis ha sido amable y correcto, muy atento en cada momento. El apartamento es tal cual se ve por dentro, lo peor es la zona en la que está, aparentemente es una zona tranquila pero yo diría que es un barrio con muchas carencias, teníamos el coche aparcado justo en frente del apartamento, nos han roto el cristal y han robado todo lo que teníamos dentro del coche, al parecer y según nos ha dicho una vecina, esto es muy común en esa zona y si os fijáis os vais a encontrar muchos cristales por las calles de alrededor. En general, aunque el apartamento haya sido de 10 también es muy importante la zona en la que se encuentre, y en nuestro caso eso ha sido lo que ha fallado.
Luis ist ein sehr sympathischer und freundlicher Gastgeber mit super Tipps für die Freizeitgestaltung
Die Unterkunft entspricht voll und ganz den Erwartungen.  Sogar besser als gedacht.
Não se vai arrepender! Excelente estadia.

It was really nice to stay in Luis’s place. Apartment is very spacious and cozy. Luis has answered my messages really quick and has been liberal with check in, what made my trip much easier :) 
Great place! Definitely highly recommended!
El alojamiento de Luis cuenta con una cama muy cómoda en la que descansar tras un largo día recorriendo Oporto.
Como se estivesse em casa!
Correu tudo muito bem

Luis’ apartment is really nice - the pictures are actually telling the truth. It’s in a quiet, but not boring part of Porto. Check-in was very easy and uncomplicated, communication went quick and without problems. We can totally recommend the place, it is beautiful, cozy and very clean.

O apartamento é excelente. Espaçoso e bonito. Tem muita louça. Porém é bem frio. Há só um aquecedor portátil e não conseguimos tomar banho quente2 pessoas seguidas. Acabamos indo tomar banho na casa de um amigo que mora no porto.
Luis é pontual, atencioso e gentil. Além do excelente espaço do apartamento, ele sempre esteve disponivel para responder no mesmo momento. Recomendadissimo.
O Luís é um ótimo anfitrião, nos deu todo o apoio necessário para que a nossa estadia fosse incrível.
Localização ideal para quem se queira hospedar perto da UP. Estacionamento fácil, supermercado perto, apartamento espaçoso e excelente anfitrião, sempre prestável e disponível.

The house was different than it showed in the ad, much more older. It only had a big gas portable heater which was not only difficult to turn on but also very inneficient in keeping the house warm. The WiFi only works on the living room. If we hadn't brought our own portable heater and wifi extender we would be in trouble. The location was good and the place was very clean. It's reasonable for it's price.
Lovely apartment and right beside the University of Porto!

name: Romantic and quiet apartment with Air Conditioning
summary: Cozy apartment, newly reformed with air conditioning and heating, for your own use. Located next to the very famous Park Güell with very good bus connections to the beach, the city center, the lively Gràcia district and the Paralel.  With terrace on the roof top and spectacular views. New: fast WIFI from December 2018. License HUTB-012081
space: Incredible views of Barcelona from the roof top terrace and from the apartment. Furthermore you can see the Sagrada Familia, the port of Barcelona, the sea, the mountain Montjuic, the Hotel W and much more. Enjoy the city of Barcelona from your own flat! There is a public parking, free from 20hs to 8hs morning, located near the apartment where the neighbours park their cars. You can park your car also on the apartment street or adyacents streets, parking on the street is free, if you find a free spot you can park your car there. Ask please for the public parking instructions if you need to park your car there. The wireless connection of the apartment is a mobile connection it is not fast but allows you to e.g. send (Hidden by Airbnb) s or emails. The closest touristic points are: The famous Parque Güell:  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  and the viewpoint 360° (el mirador 360°) of Barcelona which has been recently restored and prepared to be discovered by the citizens and tourists. More inf

With terrace on the roof top and spectacular views. Furthermore you can see the Sagrada Familia, the port of Barcelona, the sea, the mountain Montjuic, the Hotel W and much more. Enjoy the city of Barcelona from your own flat! There is a public parking, free from 20hs to 8hs morning, located near the apartment where the neighbours park their cars. Ask please for the public parking instructions if you need to park your c
neighborhood_overview: It is worth highlighting the spectacular views of Barcelona, the tranquility and the several touristic points close to the apartment. The lively Gràcia district with its bars, shops and leisure area is only a 15 minutes’ walk away and less by bus.
notes: The building where the apartment is located has only 2 floors. Therefore the terrace is almost for exclusive use for the tourists. We kindly ask for good behavior given that nearby there are other buildings and neighbours. It is planned to reform the staircases of the building and the façade given that the painting is degraded. The staircases are narrow and have no elevator, but the apartment is located on the second floor… but the views from the apartment and the terrace are spectacular. Enjoy Barcelona!
transit: Cost of bus and subway T-10 pass (valid for 10 journeys): 10,30 € Subway: Stop "Lesseps" L3-green and take bus line 24 Stop "Alfons X" L4-yellow and walk for 15 minutes Daily bus lines: Line 92  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Main stops line 92: - Vallcarca and adjancent gardens - Lesseps Metro L3 and future L9 to airport - Gràcia neighbourhood (restaurants and leisure area) - La Sagrada família - Glòries square (Torre Agbar) - Poblenou (restaurants and leisure area) - Zoo and Ciutadella park - Torre Mapfre - Puerto olímpico (restaurants and leisure area) - Barcelona beaches Line 24  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Main stops line 24: - Gràcia neighbourhood/Gràcia district - Passeig de Gràcia (Famous building as La pedrera, Casa Ametller, Casa Batlló...) - The best shops in Barcelona - City center and Plaça Catalunya (Las Ramblas) - Paralel (restaurants and leisure area, near the Barcelona Harvour and the leisure area called Maremàgnum) Night bus lines: All of the night bus lines of Barcelona
access: Views of the entire city directly from the apartment and from the roof top terrace. It is a two-family house divided into two floors, with only one neighbour on each floor. You have to share the building with only one neighbor.  Adjacent Park to the Park Güell, with free entrance, ideal for walks and sports activities.
interaction: All kind of tourist information is provided after booking: maps, guidebooks, public transportation, public transportation schedules and prices, how to reach the apartment, parking, etc. Operating manuals for household appliances (all new) are in the same apartment. A contact phone number will be provided and a person welcomes the guests in the apartment at the previously agreed time of arrival.
house_rules: HOUSE RULES On the day of arrival and prior to the handout of the keys it must be paid in cash: - Touristic tax Barcelona city: €0,75 per person (> 16 years) and night   - Check-in before 9:30am or after 7pm has an extra fee of 25€, depending on availability. USE OF THE APARTMENT: -Smoking in the apartment is not allowed. Smoking is allowed on the little balcony in the apartment or the terrace. -No animals allowed in the apartment. -Having parties in the apartment or on the terrace is not allowed. You can always use the terrace, for example to read, eat, drink as long as the neighbours of the annexing buildings are not disturbed and  it is cleaned after use. -Any caused damage or extra for cleaning will be deducted from the deposit or paid before leaving the apartment, like e.g. dirty dishes left which must be cleaned by the guests. -all the windows in the apartment must be fully opened at least twice a day for aprox. 10-15 minutes in order to air it. Above all the door of the bathroom

host.host_about:
