Somos Stefanie y Joan y nos gusta viajar por el mundo. Joan nació en Barcelona y Stefanie es de Alemania. Cada vez que visitamos Barcelona, ​​disfrutamos mucho de nuestra estancia allí. Bonitas playas, un montón de ocio y cultura y muchas cosas que ver. En caso de que quieras reservar el apartamento estaremos ahí para darte un consejo de la ciudad y las llaves de este recién reformado piso con una excelente ubicación, cerca del Parque Güell.

Está situado cerca de barrio de Gracia (a 10 minutos) y tiene todo lo necesario para disfrutar de la estancia ... incluyendo las mejores vistas de la ciudad y el mar.

¡Disfruta de Barcelona!

reviews.comments: The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Stefanie and Joan are the perfect hosts. Quick respons, helpful, friendly and flexible.
The apartment is exactly is you can see on the pictures and has a stunning view over the city. The neighbourhood is a popular but quiet area of the city with the local people warm and welcoming. Shops and a few local restaurants are close by. It's very easy to get to the city center and all of the tourist atractions, as there is a bus station about 200m away from the apartment and busses run approx every 10 to 15 min even during the weekend. Nightbuses are also available. I totally recommend this place to everyone who wants to enjoy all that Barcelona has to offer all the while enjoying the tranquility of this area.

Nous avons eu un accueil trés chaleureux par joan, l'appartement est sympa avec une vue splendide dans un quartier calme. Les photos correspondent tout à fait a l'appart. Joan est de trés bon conseil.

Appartement conforme à la description, propre et fonctionnel, avec une vue splendide sur Barcelone. Magnifique vue de la terrasse. Appartement un peu excentré du centre ville mais très facile d'accès par les transports en commun. La proximité du Parc Guëll permet un accès gratuit tous les soirs et le restaurant traditionnel du bout de la rue mérite qu'on s'y arrête. Accueil très chaleureux des propriétaires. En résumé, un séjour des plus agréables. Nous recommandons cet endroit.

Thank you very much Joan !!!
For our family - it was a good holiday !!!!
Special thanks for a cot for our young son !!! It was very nice))))
Special thanks to your mum))) very nice woman)))
The apartment fits the description. Located in a quiet area. Nearby is a beautiful park - Park Guell. All small shops (bakery, fish, meat, vegetable), a pharmacy, a restaurant and tapas bar - located 2 minutes from the apartment.
The balcony offers a beautiful view of Barcelona.
The center and the sea, can be reached by bus.

Thanks again.
All the best, 
Irina, Sergey and Ilya.

We hebben een topverblijf gehad, werden warm welkom geheten door de (schoon)moeder van Stefanie en Joan. We voelden ons direct thuis.
Het appartement ziet er precies zo uit als op de foto's, is schoon en van alle gemakken voorzien. Van afwasmiddel tot handdoeken en van toiletpapier tot broodrooster.
Een heerlijke hoekbank waar je na een lange dag lopen heerlijk op kunt bijkomen.
Het appartement is wat hoger gelegen en ligt niet heel dicht bij het centrum maar is snel en goed te bereiken met het openbaar vervoer (bus en/of metro). Door de hoge ligging heb je een prachtig uitzicht over de stad.
Het appartement ligt circa 5 minuten lopen van Park Güell, absoluut de moeite waard om te bezoeken. 
Stefanie en Joan zijn zeer hulpvaardige en attente gastheer/vrouw.
Vooraf ontvang je van hen heel veel informatie over bijvoorbeeld het openbaar vervoer, bezienswaardigheden en eetgelegenheden.
Heb je tijdens je verblijf vragen kun je hen heel makkelijk bereiken.
Prijs/kwalititeitverhouding een dikke PLUS!
Appartement conforme aux photos. Propre, confortable avec une très belle vue sur Barcelone!

Nous avons passé un excellent voyage à Barcelone qui est d'ailleurs une ville splendide. Christina était très sympathique et nous a bien accueillis. Grâce à la description précise de Johan nous n'avons pas eu de mal à trouver l'appartement, qui très bien desservi par les transports en commun et qui a de nombreux commerces de proximité. L'appartement est fidèle aux photos fournies sur le site et nombre de petits détails nous font sentir comme chez nous. La vue est incroyable et les commerçants du quartier adorables. Johan & Stephanie nous beaucoup aidé à préparer notre voyage grâce à leurs nombreux mails détaillés des environs et de Barcelone. Ce sont des hôtes très sympathiques, disponibles et accueillants.
I can't describe how beautiful the view from the window. You can enjoy the whole BCN just sitting in living room. Joan is a very nice host, very sweet. It's definitely a good place for all airbnbers.

Our host was very responsive and his mother, who checked us in, was wonderful. She was very friendly and helpful, and made my boyfriend feel very at home. The apartment was lovely and well decorated; however, we had some big problems. First, the cleaning fee and tourist tax were not included in the listed price, which surprised me and raised the price. Second, the location was very hard to reach - it is in the very far edge of the city, a twenty minute straight uphill walk from the nearest metro stop. the bus is very close though. Third, the wifi did not work well enough to do more than send a text message, even when we took t upstairs as our host suggested. Finally, upon checkout, we were informed that we would have to pay 20 for leaving the apartment not up to standard, a complaint I have never had before.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour! L'appartement est vraiment très bien , la vue est magnifique , nous avons été bien accueillis et avons eu toutes les informations nécessaires notamment sur les transports !
On reviendra !!

Appartement avec vue splendide sur Barcelone ,mention particuliere pour la terrasse sur le toit.
Quartier calme,à  l'écart de l'agitation du centre ville,tout en étant  bien desservi par les bus.
Accueil très sympa de Christina ,la maman de Joan..
Appartement à  recommander.

Accueil très chaleureux, appartement propre et tres fonctionnel. La vue du salon est superbe avec aussi une terrasse qui donne sur la ville - idéale pour le petit déjeuner!
Carmel se trouve à flan de colline, c'est accessible à pied mais assez intense apres une dure journée de visite, il vaut mieux utiliser une des 2 lignes d'autobus qui relient l'appartement au centre ville pour la remontée.
Le logement est à 15 minutes à pied du Park Guell et du quartier Gracia avec un voisinage tres pratique (primeur, pharmacie et restos: ne pas manquer las delicias!)

Superbe expérience!

We had such a lovely time in Barcelona and a lot was due to the flat (super clean and tidy and very comfortable in a quiet but lovely neighbourhood close to Parc Güell), the amazing view we woke up to every morning, the warm
welcome &the best tips given to us by Joan (we particularly enjoyed the local tapas bar down the road from the flat which was delicious and truly authentic). Muchisimas gracias, volveremos!!!

Me and my husband had an amazing holiday in Barcelona. Stefanie  and Joan are the perfect hosts, very friendly and informative. Joan's mother gave us the warmest greeting. She' s such a lovely lady. The flat was really clean, cozy and so nice. We felt at home. The view from the living room was stunning. The wifi was enough for texting and reading e-mails. The area is super calm with a great bakery, little stores and tapas bars. You can easily reach the city center by bus and 20 minutes walk to the nearest metro station. Park Güell and a wonderful 360 degrees city view is at the neighborhood. Best choice if you want to enjoy this great city. Thank you so much again!

Wij kwamen 's avonds aan in het appartement en werden enthousiast welkom geheten door Joan. We werden meteen verrast door het fantastische uitzicht op de stad Barcelona, dat zichtbaar was vanaf het dakterras maar ook gewoon vanaf de heerlijk luie zitbank.... Het appartement ligt in een rustig gedeelte van de stad en heeft een perfecte busverbinding met het centrum (iedere 10 minuten komt er wel een bus langs). Ook zijn er een paar buurtwinkeltjes waar je alles kunt kopen wat je nodig hebt. Park Guëll (met de moziëken van Gaudi) ligt op nog geen 10 minuten loopafstand!  Het appartement is van alle gemakken voorzien en 'huiselijk' ingericht. Barcelona heeft veel bezienswaardigheden die de moeite waard zijn om te bezoeken (Park Guëll, de Sagrada Familia, de zuil van Columbus, het 360 graden uitkijkpunt, de kabelbaan naar Montjuïc, de Arc de Triomf,  de Golondrinas, de Ramblas en nog veel meer (maar daar hadden wij zelf helaas geen tijd meer voor....).
Leuke tip: vanaf de zuil van Columbus bij de haven kun je als je goed kijkt het appartement zien liggen! Let op de letters DBLS op de muur....... Wij hebben genoten en bevelen dit romantische en rustige appartement bij iedereen aan!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour à Barcelone. Nous avons été très bien accueillis et renseignés par Cristina, et eu aussi Yoan au téléphone à notre arrivée. L'appartement situé non loin du Parc Guell est bien desservi, avec un arrêt de bus proche. La place Catalunya est à environ une demi heure et l'aéroport environ 1h (bus et ou bus+métro). Le quartier est calme, et l'appartement très propre (malgré la façade ancienne). La vue qui domine Barcelone est très agréable. La literie était confortable et nous avions tout ce qu'il nous fallait, avec en plus des commerces proches. Nous recommandons cet appartement!

Stefanie and Joan were very helpful and friendly. The view in the apartment was great and the neighborhood was quiet a felt safe even at night. Wifi was slow which was admittedly frustrating at times. However, overall it was a very pleasant stay.

Hôte très sympathique, nous a apporté beaucoup d’informations à notre arrivé.
Appartement très agréable et très bien situé, un peut loin du centre mais très bien desservit par les bus.
Je recommande.

Nous avons passé notre séjour à Barcelone, accueillis par la Maman très sympathique de Joan car il travaillait. 
Appartement très bien situé sur une colline surplombant Barcelone, la vue de l'appartement est vraiment incroyable surtout à la nuit tombée.
Nous étions à 10 minutes de marche du Parc Güell, et même si l'appartement est un peu loin du centre, les nombreux bus permettent de s'y rendre assez rapidement 30 minutes de la Place Catalunya.

A faire petite ascension de 10 minutes à pied à partir de l'appartement pour rejoindre un ancien bunker qui est l'un des points culminants de la ville et qui permet d'avoir une vue sublime de Barcelone à 360° degrés... Parfait pour assister au couché du soleil.
Séjour parfait grâce à un appartement fonctionnel. Merci à Joan pour tous les conseils et renseignements qui nous ont permis de préparer notre séjour avant notre départ.
La estancia me encantó, las vistas son espectaculares, ideal para pasar unos días de vacaciones y no estar en una zona muy ruidosa.

Very beautiful flat!! And very nice hosts!! Now, my comments following will be in French to ensure that all trippers French find the better place when they move to spend their time in Barcelona.
Appartement parfait, un simple regard par la fenetre et vous avez impression de regarder une carte postale de Barcelone... Quartier magnifique permettant la tranquillité des vacances en gardant une proximité du centre ville et des plages.. Un appartement à ne surtout pas manquer ! Si vous venez dépenser votre temps en petite famille ou entre amis.
Les hôtes sont également géniaux !
The only problem regarding the low wifi in the flat but why to be connected when you leave in journey? 
Thanks Joan and Stefanie

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cet appartement. Il est tout à fait conforme aux photos et descriptifs. La vue est vraiment à couper le souffle. Nous avons été très bien accueilli par la mère de Joan. Joan nous a bien aidé à préparer l'organisation de notre séjour.

Were warmly greeted by the hosts mom and friend. They could not speak english, but we got along on my school Spanish. The place was nice and tidy. The only thing missing was an air conditioner, too hot in the night with just a fan. We rented a scooter, so getting to and from the place was relatively easy. Would recommend. Very nice view from the terrace and the nearby Búnkers de Carmel.

Stefanie and Joan gave us a lot of information via e-mail about Barcelona. When we arrived at the apartment we were welcomed by Joan's mother and a friend. They do not speak English, but we have agreed with hands and feet. The apartment was not fully cleaned, so we enjoyed the view from the rooftop terrace which is awesome!
The apartment was clean and adequate for two people. You get by bus or metro in the city. The bus often stops and the journey takes. Better to use the Metro. With Metro you come directly to Barceloneta (beach).
Joan's mother is very warm. We felt very welcome! Thank you.

We had a really nice time in this apartment. It's clean and even if it's a small apartment, everything you need is there. The bed was not very large for us (we are both 180cm and not very skinny). The view is beautiful and the point of view nearby must not be missed. All explanations you need to go down in the center. Well perfect place to stay in Barcelona if you don't want to be in the center.

We stayed in Barcelona for 4 days to visit the city.

We were welcomed by Joan's mother and her friend. Both were very nice and kind. Joan and Stefanie were available for any question during our stay. The flat was tidy and contained everything you need.

The location is good, in a quite neighborhood next to the well known park Güell.

We recommend this place if you plan to visit the city.

communication and email  pre-arrival was regular, friendly and very informative on local area, close tourist attractions, transport system and Barcelona in general. 
Arrival was welcoming and friendly. Apartment looks identical to photos , very clean , spacious and bright.  View from apartment and terrace was amazing. Kitchen well equipped with utensils for cooking. Amazing shower.
Short walking distance to Park Guell.

This is a great place for visitors who have been to Barcelona before and want to discover new parts of the city, away from the Ramblas and Gothic Quarter. The view from the apartment and surrounding hills over the city is impressive and the area itself, around the corner from Guell Park, is quiet and feels "real". There's a fair bit of hill-climbing and walking involved in staying here, though the local bus route takes you right into town in 20 minutes. 
The hosts, Stefanie and Joan, could not be more helpful. They provide guides to the city by email and are always available via (Hidden by Airbnb) to answer questions. 
The flat itself is small, but very clean and reasonably well equipped, with coffee maker (Senseo), oven and induction hob.  It's quiet, so a good night's sleep on the comfortable bed is guaranteed and the shower in the tiny bathroom is powerful enough to clear away the cobwebs in the morning.

Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Barcelona. Aufgrund ausführlicher Informationen zu den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln konnten wir die Wohnung problemlos erreichen. Dort wurden wir sehr freundlich von Joans Mutter empfangen. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber. Jeden Tag erfreuten wir uns wieder über den tollen Ausblick auf Barcelona, den man von der Wohnung aus hat. Bei Fragen waren unsere Gastgeber stets erreichbar und hilfsbereit. Fazit: Wir würden auch noch ein zweites Mal Stefanies und Joans Wohnung mieten und können diese folglich mit gutem Gewissen an andere Barcelonareisende weiterempfehlen.

Joan y Stepanhie han sido un encanto, disponibles desde primer momento mandándonos correos con información de Barcelona y facilitándonos absolutamente la estancia. Trato de amigos más que de anfitriones, muy cercanos. Piso acogedor y con buena comunicación de autobuses para llegar al centro.
Apartamento tranquilo y muy práctico, y con unas vistas inmejorables de Barcelona. Los hosts ofrecen una gran cantidad de información de la zona y de la ciudad y una amabilidad y atención ejemplares.
L'appartement est conforme à la description, propre, bien agencé et bien équipé. L'appartement est situé au fond d'une impasse au calme sur les hauteurs de Barcelone. Je recommande !

The host was extremely communicative and friendly in letting us know about the flat and flexible in discussing when we could arrive or check out. They have an incredible knowledge of the local area and Barcelona as well and provided a wealth of information to refer to in advance which was very useful.

The flat was very comfortable. The beds, toilet, shower and living space were as described and overall, it was a very good stay. The views from the flat are incredible. I would definitely recommend this flat to anyone looking for a place to stay in Barcelona.

Lived here for 1 month with girlfriend.
Fine little apartment that has everything you need for long term stay. 

The good: 
Good overall value
Quiet neighborhood
2 great local restaurants around the corner + bakery. 
Great views. 
Good bed + shower. 
Very helpful and friendly hosts. 

The bad: 
Bad wifi (but was warned beforehand)
A bit outside of centrum and 15 mins walk to the metro. 
The apartment is cold when it's winter in janaury/february. 
The kitchen is very small.
Used furniture. 

Overall a good experience since I prefer to live in a more quiet and local area.
Appartement conforme aux photos. Propre, idéal pour un couple qui souhaite rester au calme...

My stay at Stefanie Y Joan’s place was very enjoyable. Apartment was as advertised in a nice quiet area of Barcelona, with easy public transport into downtown Barcelona. The views were great as well! I would recommend their place for anyone visiting Barcelona. Thanks Stefanie Y Joan.

彼氏と二人で､5日間利用させていただきました!とても親切なﾎｽﾄのお母さんで､素敵な出会いでした｡場所も安全な閑静な住宅街で､お部屋も清潔で､安心して過ごすことができました｡ありがとうございます｡Wi-fi は確かに弱くて困りましたが､先に知らされていたので大丈夫です｡でも､お部屋にはやっぱりWi-fiが完備されていたほうがよかったなと､個人的には思います､､､(特にﾊﾞﾙｾﾛﾅは､街中のWi-fiがあまり発達していなかったので)｡
ですが､総じてとてもいい滞在でした!

Una casa bastante bien y fresquita, acogedora y muy bien comunicada con los buses. Hay unas vistas súper bonitas de Barcelona desde el sofá.
Joan y Stefani nos han tratado de maravilla desde un primer momento, nos han facilitado la llegada en bus desde Sants, y explicándonos como movernos por la ciudad. Hay una guía turística en el apartamento por si quieres ver los mejores sitios de Barcelona y como llegar a ellos. Era la primera vez que utilizaba esta aplicación y si la gente que se muestra en esta app son como ellos, nos gustaría seguir viajando así. Gracias.
Very nice and helpful hosts

Fui três dias a Barcelona com uma amiga e ficámos alojadas em casa do Joan e da Stefanie. 
Logo desde o início eles enviaram toda a informação sobre a cidade, tanto de transportes como os sítios mais importantes para se conhecer.
A casa é exactamente como mostram as fotos e é extremamente limpa!
Quem nos fez o check in foi a mãe e uma amiga do Joan e elas foram extremamente simpáticas e disponibilizaram tudo o que precisamos! 
Foi uma experiência muito boa e certamente que lá irei voltar e ficar em casa deles!

If your looking to stay in a safe area and experience Barcelona like a true local this is your spot! Terra Mia is walkin distance (AMAZING sea food), local transportation around the entire city is at the end of the street. Breathtaking views, overall a wonderful experience!

Tykkäsimme asuinalueesta sen vuoksi, että se oli melko rauhallinen eikä turisteja näkynyt paljoa, näki aitoa barcelonalaosta elämää. Sieltä oli hyvät julkiset yhteydet kuitenkin keskustaan, rannalle jne. Maisemat asunnolta ja lähialueilta olivat upeat! Asuinalueella oli raskasta kulkea

Super Apartment mit Top Aussicht ! Extrem bemühter Gastgeber , hatte auf alle Fragen und Bitten sofort eine Antwort.

Sehr empfehlenswert !

Sehr schöne, ruhige Unterkunft etwas außerhalb mit toller Sicht! Sehr ruhig und hübsch. Alles was man braucht erreicht man gut zu Fuß, per Bus oder Metro. Sehr gute Restaurant in der Umgebung. Die dachterasse ist unschlagbar! Wow

A very nice apartment near in a charming area ! It's a bit far from the city center, but at least the neighborhood is very local, and quiet during the night ; and with the metro not far away it's kinda easy to reach the city center.
And close to the apartment you can visit the park Guell, beautiful, and former bunkers now open to public which are not full of tourists, very pleasant.
Communication was very easy with Joan and Stefanie, they are very helpful and always did their best to improve our stay at their place ! So I strongly recommend it ! :)

Tout est parfait, accueil, logement, propriétaires, conforme à la description, je recommande  !

ps: le logement est dans les hauteur, les transports publiques sont nombreux et régulier mais il faut compter 45min de bus pour aller jusqu'à la plage.

Merci à Joan & Stéphanie pour le magnifique séjour que j'ai pu passer grâce à eux.

Great hosts, lots of communication before, during and after our stay. The apartment has the most amazing views and is beautifully clean and tidy. The local bus is only a few min walk and takes you straight down through the city and to the beach. Fantastic hosts and beautiful apartment. Will definitely return.

Ha estado fenomenal la experiencia, si volvemos a Barcelona repetiremos. El barrio está algo apartado pero muy bien comunicado por autobús y las vistas son ESPECTACULARES. La comunicación con Joan insuperable.
Es waren sehr nette Hosts. Sie waren sehr zuvorkommend und immer für Rückfragen erreichbar.

Nous avons été accueillis par la mère de Joan, qui a été très chaleureuse avec nous. L'appartement, situé à côté du Parc Güell, offre une belle vue de Barcelone et était conforme aux photos. Plusieurs lignes de bus sont proches de l'appartement et permettent de rejoindre le centre rapidement (un métro est situé un peu plus loin de l'appartement). Nous recommandons cet appartement pour un séjour à Barcelone.

Le logement calme est situé sur les hauteurs de Barcelone donc avec une vue imprenable sur tout Barcelone avec un acces sur toit terrasse .
Si vous voulez passer des vacances inoubliables en laissant votre voiture en bas de l'immeuble et circuler qu'avec les bus et métro cet endroit est fait pour vous.

The apartment is small but okay for two persons. Our hosts were easy to deal with and always reachable. We got sooo much useful information about Barcelona per e-mail in advance. The view from the apartment is amazing, there is a roof terrace as well. Parc Güell is in a walking distance of 20'. The bus station at the end of the street serves two important bus lines which take you directly close to the Sagrada Familia, to Casa Mila & Batllo, to Plaza Catalunya and to La Rambla. The 3G internet device is useful for messaging but not for surfing, but it is portable (battery for half a day). We would certainly stay there again.

Joan is awesome also his apartment. 
Great view from the flat and the district where it take place is very pretty and caratteristic... 
All was perfect! 
Thanks

Heerlijk rustig appartement in buitenwijk van Barcelona. Goed te bereiken met openbaar vervoer en op steenworp afstand van Park Guell. Uitzicht is grandioos omdat appartement hoger ligt, tegen helling op. Geen steile helling overigens. Vooraf veel nuttige informatie toegestuurd gekregen wat de aankomst en het verblijf ten goede kwamen. Winkeltjes in directe omgeving om noodzakelijke boodschappen te doen. Bakker aan begin van de straat verkoopt heerlijke broodjes.
Accueil chaleureux, hôtes agréables et attentionnées, vu imprenable et appartement ensoleillé, idéal pour un séjour en amoureux ! un grand merci
Joan und Stefanie sind sehr nett, entgegenkommend, antworten bei Fragen sofort und haben viele Tipps parat! Die Wohung ist einwandfrei und bietet ein tolles Preis-Leistungsverhältnis!

Nice flat, great views, amazing hosts.
Flat as described, plenty of info by the hosts once we booked the flat.
A quiet residential area, 10 minutes walk from Park Guel.
An enjoyable 50’ walk to the city centre, which we enjoyed every day. For our way back we either used the bus (25’) or a taxi (13€).
Pros:
Great hosts, communicative and rapidly responsive.
Views from the flat and terrace
Clean and cosy flat.

Cons: 
Heating ( as we visited in December ) needs to be improved.
Thank you Stefanie and Joan, we enjoyed our stay and will definitely visit again in the future!

Rápida y fluida comunicación con Stefanie y Joan. El piso genial. La ubicación en el Carmel fabulosa para relajarse un poco. Muy bien comunicado con líneas de metro L4 y L5 eso si por escaleras pero bien y autobuses.

This was the perfect apartment for my girlfriend and I as we explored this amazing city. The place was lovely and clean and easy enough to get in to the centre. The hosts were very helpful and communicative and made this trip one we want to make again and again. Excellent all around!
El tratooo muyy hospiralarioo

Le logement de Joan et stefanie est tout à fait conforme aux photos et la terrasse a une vue imprenable.... petit bémol la grande montée pour y arriver... mais nous étions prévenus! De plus ils ont été très attentifs au bon déroulement du séjour! À refaire

Nous avons passé un très beau séjour à Barcelone. Stefanie et Joan sont des hôtes formidables. L'appartement, placé sur les hauteurs de Barcelone, offre une vue imprenable sur la ville. Idéal pour découvrir la ville et passer un séjour à deux sous le soleil catalan ! 

We had a very nice stay in Barcelona ! Stefanie and Joan are really great hosts. The appartment offres stunning views of the city. Perfect for couples to spend time in Barcelona !
Excellent place to stay for a few days in BCN. The hosts are really welcoming and the apartment is uniquely located with a beautiful view on the City. Top rating!

We got a lot of tips about Barcelona (really a lot!) it was a great help for us! The flat was as nice as we expected, clean, comfortable, and had a nice view to the city. The flat is not in the center of the city but the local transportation is really good from here it wasn't a big deal to get in the city center every day.

The tidy tiny apartement is very cozy and perfect for a couple. modern and smart refurbished in one of the old little village like houses in the quarter can baró upon the hill, amazing panoramic views on the city and very quiet at night. 
the kitchen is very well equipped and we did love the shower :) there is access to a little balcony directly from the apartement and the roof top terrace is to share with the neighbours, which is something commen in bcn. the walk downhill to the metro is quick and L4 connects you directly to barcelonetta and the sea. mar y monte ! the hosts Stefanie, Joan and Cristina are very caring and provide you with a lot of helpfull information.
for colder periods be aware there is no central heating ( not unusal ..) , but there is a fan heater and amazing electric blankets to pre heat your bed. and unless you have to work, you won't miss the wifi, better have a look outside the window and enjoy the magic view !!

Hosipitality is out of this world. Such a warm welcome and lively women Cristina <3 
Communication is amazing and the appartment is so cozy. Perfect getaway for couples!

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in der Wohnung von Stefanie und Joan. Die beiden haben uns immer super schnell geantwortet und auch der Empfang durch Jonas Mutter war sehr herzlich. Die Wohnung hat eine tolle Lage und eine unbezahlbare Aussicht. Es ist alles vorhanden, was man so braucht: Handtücher, Föhn, Geschirr, Töpfe. Außerdem haben uns die beiden tolle Tipps zu den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel und Sehenswürdigkeiten in Barcelona gegeben. Wir würden jeder Zeit wieder die Wohnung der beiden buchen - hier kann man nichts falsch machen :)

Der Aufenthalt war super. Die Gegend ist etwas abgelegen von der City, aber traumhaft durch die Lage und den Ausblick auf Barcelona. Geht man die kleinen Wege noch weiter hinauf, dann kann man einen noch schönere Aussicht genießen, mit Sonnenuntergang und Blick auf ganz Barcelona! Wunderschön! Auch sonst war check in sowie check out unkompliziert und sehr herzlich. Wir haben viele Tipps und Anregungen, was unseren gesamten Aufenthalt anging, bekommen und hätten uns jederzeit melden können. Die Wohnung ist klein, aber fein, sauber, es ist alles da, was man braucht und noch mehr! Einfach sehr zu empfehlen!!!! Und wer am Morgen nach dem Wachwerden oder am Abend zum Nachhausekommen eine traumhafte Aussicht von der Wohnung aus genießen möchte, sollte sich für diese entscheiden! :-)
great apartment walking distance from park güell. WiFi didn’t work at all.

A friend and I stayed 3 days at Joans and Stefanies apartment. On the day of arrival Joans mother Christina welcomed us very friendly and open hearted and showed us the apartment. The apartment was very clean and has everything you need. The view on the terrace is beautiful especially at night. Before our trip they send us lot of information about attractions in Barcelona and the area (supermarket, restaurants, bus etc.). Whenever we had any questions we could write Joan via (Hidden by Airbnb) and mail and he helped us immediately. They were always very kind and helpful. We want to thank Joan and Stefanie for this amazing visit in Barcelona.

Best regards,

Joshua ans Philip

Nice apartment in a quiet residential area in Barcelona. Incredible views over the city and down to the sea, very close to Park Güell and a lovely viewpoint at Bunkers del Carmel. Easily reachable by bus and by subway (although the walk is up a big hill!). Would highly recommend.

Stefanie and Joan, whilst we never met them, were very responsive and got in touch with us very early on to arrange check-in information and offer loads of local tips and guides. This was a lovely touch and was very helpful. The apartment has two folders full of tourist information.

Cuando llegas no creerás que espera un bello departamento una vista espléndida creerás que estarás lejos de la ciudad parq güell podrás llegar caminando y el resto en 2 rutas de buses que están a una cuadra llegas en menos de 20 min excelente departamento

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par la mère de Joan. Elle nous a bien expliqué le fonctionnement de l’appartement et les services à proximité. L’appartement est propre et conforme aux photos. La vue sur Barcelone est magnifique. Il est en retrait du centre ville, il faut prendre les transports en commun proche de l’appartement. Nous avons passé un bon séjour !

We had a lovely stay at Stefanie and Joan's apartment! His mother greeted us when we first arrived and she was very sweet! Wifi only allows for messaging but we managed to navigate and find out other information thanks to Joan's assistance and quick responses. Be careful with the steep stairs leading up to the apartment especially if you have a rolling luggage. The apartment had everything we needed and bus stop is close by to get to the city centre.
Studio apartment overlooking Barcelona- very clear communication and clean place, overall really great!!
Zeer hartelijk ontvangen. Heel veel tips gekregen over de buurt, zoals lokale shops en restaurants. Daarnaast heeft de gastheer ons ook enorm geholpen om de taxi te reserveren. Is zeker een aanrader.

El trato con los anfitriones ha sido bueno. La localización del apartamento muy lejos de la zona centro de barcelona y las calles con mucha pendiente, no obstante las vistas son espectaculares. El apartamento por fuera  daba miedo, al igual que la escalera. El interior de la vivienda esta completamente reformado y equipado, no tiene nada que ver con el exterior. El precio excesivo para la localización.

Joan and Stefanie were great hosts. we were given a great welcome to the flat, and fantastic communication before and during our trip, the hosts have great local knowledge, including the best tapas restaurants!

Located within a quiet and relaxed residential area of Barcelona, but only 20 minutes from Passeig de Gracia by bus. very close to Park Guell. Local shops at the end of the road, including a fantastic pastry shop!

The flat is very comfortable and well appointed. incredible views from the flat and the roof terrace

Book today if you are looking for a quiet flat in Barcelona but only 20 minutes from the vibrant city! Thanks again to the hosts!

We really enjoy our time in Joan house, her mother was very nice and explain everything to us. 
Negative aspects was that it was far we need to take a bus and the metro to get to places.
wi fi did not work at wall

Квартира расположена в тихом месте на холме. Рядом парк Гуэль. Вид с балкона и террасы просто потрясающий. Ходят два прямых автобуса до площади Каталонии и порта. Если немного спуститься, есть остановка автобуса D40 до площади Испании. В 15 минутах ходьбы улица с сувенирными магазинами. Поблизости есть супермаркет, аптека, булочная и парочка баров-таверн. Квартира на втором этаже, без лифта, лестница узкая и крутая, имейте ввиду, если вы с тяжелыми чемоданами. На наше пребывание пришелся жуткий ливень, в гостиной подтекают окна, но хозяин сказал, что после нашего отъезда исправит эту проблему. Хозяева очень приветливые и внимательные, быстро отвечают на любые вопросы, всегда на связи. Присылают кучу интересной и полезной информации. И в целом искренне желают замечательного отдыха. WiFi в квартире только для отправки сообщений в мессенджере и проверки почты, какой-нибудь сайт врядли откроется.

La atención es increíble por parte de Stefanie y Joan. Te quedas tan a gusto que te sientes como en casa. Te quedas con la sensación de volver pronto. Mi agradecimiento a Stefanie y Joan por por todo.

L'appartamento è accogliente con un'ottima vista sulla città. Si presenta grazioso anche se al primo impatto può sembrare il contrario. Il bagno è piccolo ma completo di tutto il necessario. L'impianto di aria calda/fredda funziona benissimo, letto grande e comodo, cucina con tutto il disponibile. Host davvero molto gentili, accoglienti che ci hanno mandato ogni tipo di informazioni sulla città, sul quartiere e su ogni cosa possibile. Davvero gentilissimi e squisiti! L'appartamento è in zona residenziale e tranquilla, un po' fuori sulle colline di Barcellona ma con il bus, che passa sotto casa, in venti minuti si è in Plaza de Catalunya.

Very nice and accommodating hosts.
Helped us a lot when we reached on Christmas day and shops were closed.
Location is a bit out of the way; takes around 45 minutes to go to city center; but good bus connectivity.

What a great apartment! We stayed a month in this but great apartment, and we enjoyed it a lot. This apartment has an amazing view of the city. I could just sit for hours looking out of the window, enjoying the view. It is a very local area away from tourists - and still, just 10 mins walk to park güell. It is easy to get to downtown, with one of the the two buses that go just from the end of the street. And be sure to take them back as well, it will save you many stairs and hills :)

name: Beautiful -  Upper West Side
summary: Bedroom is available FOR ONE PERSON ONLY. The living room is separated shared bathroom clean bed sheet and towels, this a doorman building one block from subway station 1, 2 & 3 and great places to eat and Central Park/Riverside/Museums
space: 900 square feet 1 bedroom and a ultra modern ultra clean super quiet you can hear a pin drop- tons of light! close to the subway. washer dryer. miele appliances. This is a share space... you take the bedroom and I sleep on the sofa...
description: Bedroom is available FOR ONE PERSON ONLY. The living room is separated shared bathroom clean bed sheet and towels, this a doorman building one block from subway station 1, 2 & 3 and great places to eat and Central Park/Riverside/Museums  900 square feet 1 bedroom and a ultra modern ultra clean super quiet you can hear a pin drop- tons of light! close to the subway. washer dryer. miele appliances. This is a share space... you take the bedroom and I sleep on the sofa... Apple TV and internet access, you have cable TV HBO, SHOWTIME, THE MOVIE CHANEL & MAX - HD Gym and swimming pool in building  Great area very quite at night and very safe Very easy to get anywhere...  The subway is located just around the corner, steps from the apartment. Lines 2 and 3, Express, take you to Times Square in less than 10 minutes or any other touristic area within minutes.  Besides, you have more subways lines and buses nearby. I'm staying In the living room on the sofa sharing my apt for your stay.
neighborhood_overview: Great area very quite at night and very safe
notes: I'm staying In the living room on the sofa sharing my apt for your stay.
transit: Very easy to get anywhere...  The subway is located just around the corner, steps from the apartment. Lines 2 and 3, Express, take you to Times Square in less than 10 minutes or any other touristic area within minutes.  Besides, you have more subways lines and buses nearby.
access: Apple TV and internet access, you have cable TV HBO, SHOWTIME, THE MOVIE CHANEL & MAX - HD
interaction: Gym and swimming pool in building
house_rules: No pets, no smoking in apartment, residential building very quiet please do not disturb other owners.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am easy going person. Professional, fun and respectful person in late 30's.

reviews.comments: Michael was enormously accommodating and great in every way. His place was amazing. I especially enjoyed the gym and saltwater pool located in the building.

The apartment has everything you need and is in an interesting, easy location. The building has a very nice gym and a spectacular rooftop with an amazing view on Mahattan. Subway is super close as well as Hudson River Greenway in case you want to go running. The apartment is well above the expectations, nicely furbished (the owner is a desigenr) and super clean.
Michale, the owner, is a polite smart guy...I couldn't expect more!

Michael's apartment is an elegant, sumptuous, impeccably well-designed space, with all the mod-cons from flat-screen TVs in the bedroom and living room, to LED lights in the kitchen and a monsoon shower in the bathroom. With elevators and many other facilties such as a rooftop garden and gym on site, this listing is truly a treat. Michael was a very easy to reach host, answering any questions asap, and took me on a detailed tour of the apartment and building. He is a great person to talk with and extremely knowledgeable about the Upper West Side and New York in general. Overall a really outstanding space. Cheers, Michael!
Micheal is a great host, his location is ideal and very nice, clean and comfortable style, a great option for the city. The views and accommodations in the building are excellent!

Michael the host was easy-going, flexible, understanding, and a very interesting person. 

The apartment was luxurious,  comfortable, well-decorated, quiet and perfectly clean. Five stars. 

As a solo traveler I would definitely stay here again.

I thought the photos were too good to be true but Michael's place was exactly as it shows in his pictures. I was traveling solo and it suited my needs perfectly. Very well located and great facilities with a roof top lounge that offers amazing views. He even had an umbrella for me to use for unexpected rain. 
Michael was friendly and answered texts and emails quickly. (That matters people!!) He was very patient when I was having trouble getting myself verified. Thank you Michael!! 
I would definitely stay again.

name: Cozy Cabin w/Sauna & Lomilomi - Steps to UH
summary: Private guest cottage that sleeps 6 people. Lush, peaceful and tranquil Manoa Valley, just 10 minutes from Waikiki!  Very breezy throughout, with tropical tradewinds, and an organic garden and koi pond. I have a dog and birds in the main house, but won't bother the cottage. Please ask about the student massages available every Tuesday, Friday, and Sunday for just $35 ea! Professional Lomilomi massage with chanting, hot towels and salt available. $150/90 min. Single or couple.
space: We have several lovely private rooms conveniently located in Manoa Valley within a 2 min. walk to the University of Hawaii, a 10 minute walk to the grocery store, coffee shop, restaurants, pharmacy, a 20 minute walk to the bottom of the amazing Manoa falls hike, and a 15 min. drive/bus to Downtown/Waikiki/Ala Moana and the beach. It's close to everything, but just far enough to escape the noise and enjoy the true beauty of Hawaii. The cottage has 2 Queen beds in the sleeping area, plus a leather sofa bed in the living room, so the cottage can accommodate up to 6 people. We also have air mattresses in a pinch, to accommodate more, but there is extra charge for >6 people. We also have a pack-n-play for infants. There is a full bathroom and fully stocked kitchen in the cottage. It also has access (in the main house)  to a full bathroom equipped with an infrared sauna since we often use it for massage and aromatherapy sessions. You will also have access to free wifi, a washer and dryer. De
description: Private guest cottage that sleeps 6 people. Lush, peaceful and tranquil Manoa Valley, just 10 minutes from Waikiki!  Very breezy throughout, with tropical tradewinds, and an organic garden and koi pond. I have a dog and birds in the main house, but won't bother the cottage. Please ask about the student massages available every Tuesday, Friday, and Sunday for just $35 ea! Professional Lomilomi massage with chanting, hot towels and salt available. $150/90 min. Single or couple. We have several lovely private rooms conveniently located in Manoa Valley within a 2 min. walk to the University of Hawaii, a 10 minute walk to the grocery store, coffee shop, restaurants, pharmacy, a 20 minute walk to the bottom of the amazing Manoa falls hike, and a 15 min. drive/bus to Downtown/Waikiki/Ala Moana and the beach. It's close to everything, but just far enough to escape the noise and enjoy the true beauty of Hawaii. The cottage has 2 Queen beds in the sleeping area, plus a leather sofa bed in the li
neighborhood_overview: This is an older, upscale neighborhood, next to the University of Hawaii. Very peaceful and calm. Shops, bus, schools, and library are all walking distance away. There is a beautiful Japanese Garden on the grounds of the University, just 5 minutes walk away.
notes: PLEASE don't disturb the neighbors! You MUST find the house number - 2636 - ON THE HOUSE before you knock! Our house is two stories, and is the only GREEN AND WHITE house in the vicinity. Look for the red curvy concrete stairs going up to the second story porch. Thank you for keeping peace with our nice neighbors!  Note: A dog and some birds live in the main house. Not suitable for people who are hypersensitive to animals. It is almost impossible to eliminate bugs from a cottage in the rainforest. The house is professionally cleaned every other week, or sometimes more often. Check in is at 3pm. Tax ID: W-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: Bus stops are about 1.5-2 blocks away, about 5 minutes walk. Easy access to Ala Moana Shopping Center and Waikiki. You can catch a bus to anywhere on the island from Ala Moana Shopping Center. Just know that traveling by bus usually takes 2-3x longer than driving by car. Uber of Lyft is available, and there is speedishuttle service to/from the airport. I don't recommend taking the bus if you have luggage in hand, but for day travel it is fine.
access: We just ask when you book, to please state your expected arrival and departure times, so we can coordinate cleaning and greeting. We are very flexible about that, unless there are back/to/back bookings. Normally check out is at 11am, and check in is at 3pm.
interaction: We basically respect your privacy and space, but are happy to answer any questions you may have. . I have been a local in Hawaii for over 60 years (born and raised here). Happy to chat if you would like to chat as well.
house_rules: Aloha, House rules are simple: 1. Just show respect, treat the house as if it were yours, respect other people's property and space 2. No smoking on the premises. Also be courteous to neighbors with cigarette smoking. Best to walk to UH. 3. Washer and dryer is located outside, that may be used by others at times. 4. Office contains a printer that may be used by others at times. 5. Sauna room is located in the main house and is open to be used by anyone at any time. If necessary, you may wander the house for a bathroom to use in emergency (except for cottage or master bedroom bathrooms, which are for private use) 6. Kitchen upstairs is open to be used. We can clear a space for you if you like. 7. Please park on the grass in the front to avoid tow away. The street parking is free, Sat, Sun, and holidays, but there is a school tow away M-F 7:00-8:30am and 2:00-3:30pm. *** Please park properly on the lawn… up to 5 cars must be able to park at all times! Parallel park with the front or back

host.host_about:
I teach people how to heal themselves naturally, and drug-free. I also operate a Holistic massage school. Student massages available on Tuesdays and Fridays for only $35/hr. I enjoy gardening, music, and have a passion about brain, consciousness and neuroscience, especially in relation to the Quantum Field. I am working on my PhD now, for Doctor of Natural Medicine. I have a son upstairs, who is studying Electrical Engineering at the University across the street. He is very knowledgeable and eager to help you out!
Our house is very relaxed, and laid back. Not perfect, but not bad. No OCD, please. My motto is: "Enjoy the journey! If it's not FUN, I'm not doing it!"

reviews.comments:
Finally made it back home to Oklahoma...
Much Mahalo to Lucky and Edgar for their Aloha and Hospitality! 
Truly enjoyed being back in Honolulu and especially in tranquil Manoa Valley. 

This is a must place to be if you want to be away from the Waikiki scene.
Quiet, peaceful, convenient, and just comfortable. Cozy Cottage as describe!

We have enjoyed staying at cottage. Reasonable price, good location, beautiful natural environment as it was surrounded by mountain. One thing my mother felt unsafe was the type of bed, which was not regular matress we usually see. We were satisfied with overall aspects of cottage though. Thank you!

Casa ubicada en un barrio tranquilo pero cercano (en coche) al centro de la ciudad. La casa es óptima para 4 personas pero algo justa para 6 personas. La limpieza y la comodidad de las camas eran mejorables, pero el baño está muy bien. 
Lo único que no entiendo es que se anuncia como una casa con sauna, ya que ni tiene ni necesita.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Cosy and comfortable place..clean (Website hidden by Airbnb) ideal base camp for four scholars from Korea to travel in O'ahu area after a conference!! Thank you, Lucky!
We had an enjoyable experience and the location is excellent. Very close to Waikiki but not in the hustle and bustle.

사진보다 못해서 실망했네요. 에어베드도 불편하고.
위치는 주변에 마트 베이커리 등 편의 시설이 많아 편리하네요.

This was a friendly, warm and homey place to stay.  University neighborhood was nice and easy to walk to restaurants and stores.  Host was friendly and welcoming.  The rental was just as advertized -- a cozy cottage, 2 BR and access to sauna.

We chose Karen's cottage because of it's proximity to an event we were attending.  It was perfect for what we needed.  We did not spend much time on the property so it worked great.  Karen was a wonderful hostess and we felt very welcome. The beds are air mattresses which were comfortable.  The kitchen was not set up for cooking full meals, but fine for light food prep.  The access to washer and dryer were wonderful.  The place seemed a little dirty and in disrepair.  If you want a place to lounge in that is more a vacation cottage this is probably not what you are looking for.  The koi pond was a nice touch.  There is no air system and we got very hot, but fans were provided.

host welcomed us.
However,  place was not quite similar as photos what they posted on airbnb website.
My family couldn't sleep at all because uncomfortable mattress(2 air mattresses and one futon), bed sheets were not clean. Smell was really bad.
Also bathtub seemed not clean. Because used water and some hair in there.

Nuestra estadía fue muy buena. Desde el momento en que llegamos nos recibieron muy bien y no tuvimos problemas para acomodarnos. Edgar nos explicó el funcionamiento de la casa y del barrio de manera excelente. 
Encontramos lo que buscamos que era alojarnos en una casa, en un barrio tranquilo pero cerca de Waikiki, la playa y los restaurantes.
Alquilamos un auto y estacionar en la casa fue muy cómodo. Pero estacionar en Waikiki puede ser complicado o costoso. 
La casa cumplió con nuestras expectativas aunque si bien los colchones de aire son cómodos, preferimos un colchón tradicional. Fuera de ese comentario el resto de nuestra estadía fue muy buena. Totalmente recomendable.

Die Unterkunft ist sehr gut beschrieben und auch die Anreise war sehr einfach. Edgar hat uns sehr nett empfangen und uns alles gezeigt. Wenn man auf seinen Geldbeutel achten muss und relativ jung ist, kann man dort gut unterkommen. Das Schlafen auf einer großen Luftmatratze zu zweit ist nicht wirklich etwas für einen europäischen Rücken. Die Einrichtung und die Sauberkeit entspricht auf keinen Fall dem deutschen Standard, wir haben es überlebt, wir haben aber auch schien viel gesehen auf dieser Welt. Für ein sanftes Gemüt und jemanden, der nur mit Sauberkeit leben kann, ist hier fehl am Platz. Auf jeden Fall ist Hawaii eine Reise wert, das nächste Mal aber im Hotel.

This is a great little place to use as a central spot for going about town.    The neighborhood is quiet, and the many birds and roosters nearby act as a nice natural alarm to get you moving in the morning.  Lucky's housemates welcomed us and were very accommodating.

The house and furnishings are older and well-used, but it is clean.  There are a few windows without screens, so you see a bug every once and a while, but we weren't bothered by much.  There were a few ants in the kitchen, but they stayed there and we didn't need to use the kitchen anyway.

The futon bed was pretty thin, but my housemates made no complaints about the air mattresses.

Overall, a nice place for a few nights of sleeping while seeing the sights.
Great host, great location, and a great place. They were especially accommodating given that we booked at the very last minute. Thank you!

The hosts were very inviting and helpful as far as where to go in the area. The cottage was in a great location, very quiet and a nice neighborhood. It had everything you would need, even the air mattresses were surprisingly very comfortable! I would stay here again.

Lucky's cottage is exactly as advertised.  It is very clean with large air beds, updated furnishings, and wide louvered windows.  The spacious kitchen area has an island for eating.  The sauna is very nice, and having a washer and dryer available was a big help.  Lucky is a gracious host who provided lots of helpful information.  The cottage is in her backyard, in a quiet neighborhood close to the university and to a local shopping area.  We highly recommend it.

The host was extremely horrible very unfriendly. However one of the workers named Edgar was amazing he was very nice and kind and made us feel welcome. Karen "lucky" never came to introduce herself we only met her the next day after we complained that the place was filthy. The house was absolutely disgusting it smelled the floors were so dirty that our feet would turn black and feet would stick, there was so much dirt, dust, and cobwebs that it seemed the place was never cleaned in years. The bathroom was worse than a public restroom it was so dirty that we did not want to take a shower in there, there were globs of hair in the bathtub that made it clog up and there was dirt and just disgusting stuff caked up in the bathtub and around it. The beds had crumbs and the pillow covers had stains and smelled, the sheets were dirty and the beds very uncomfortable and kept on deflating. I have traveled a lot in my life and have never ever encountered a place as filthy as this. The only positive thing was that Edgar was a very amazing person. Our host Lucky was very rude and lied about us being able to use the main house. She would not even say hello as we passed by. She is a very dirty person with a very rude attitude.  The place had no air condition and the kitchen was so dirty along with the dishes that it felt unsafe to eat or cook in their. They also BBQ right by the back window and when they do this all the smoke comes into the cottage making it black and unbareable to be in their. Please beware and do not waste your money or ruin your vacation by staying at her place it will make you feel disgusting and ruin your vacation and the fact that Lucky is soo rude with bother you even more. Her towels smelled the washer was filthy and over all it was a horrible experience. The only thing is the Edgar was a amazing person. Other than that I will never ever stay at her place. As a host you expect people to be polite and nice and have a clean place ready for you I don't think she should be in the business because she does not possess the skills needed to be host. Please beware of her place. Also there were bugs in the place and that was due to the filth of her cottage. There were roaches, flying tiny gnats and bugs because the place was so very dirty. Please consider my review before deciding to stay at her filthy place.
We had a great stay at Luckys! The house was clean, they were flexible on arrival and departure. Location was perfect! We would love to stay again in the future! Thank you

Aloha,
thank you for a nice time staying at the condo. The owner was kindly and gave us a lot of information about your area. The condo had everything you would need.
Only the beds were uncomfortable for us.
Mahalo
faamilies Sindelarovi and Huzovi

There were 5 of us on our trip to Honolulu. We enjoyed our stay at Karen's place. Edgar was also there and was entertaining and blessed us with his golden voice. The cottage was very comfortable with everything we needed. At night even without air conditioning, the cool breeze and rain was so pleasant and were able to rest well for our next adventure! Overall, two thumbs up and I highly recommend the cottage for groups or families traveling to Honolulu.:-)

The cottage is in a really great location in Manoa and very cozy.  We never had a chance to meet Karen,  but everything was great.  Edgar showed us around the place and made us feel right at home.  Would love and stay there again!
Very nice night. Very detail introduction about the apt and environment.

Our stay with Karen was perfect.  Edgar was great at check in.  The beds were comfy, the room was clean and it was in a beautiful, quiet location yet near to downtown & Waikiki (if that's you're thing).  She put together a great informational package with maps to local destinations.  I'd definitely stay here again.

The transactions was great! 

1. When booking, we received a response within a few hours. Things went very smoothly

2. When we arrived, our plane was delayed 3 hours, so we ended up arriving at 1230AM vs 930PM. Edgar (who was hosting during our stay) made it very easy for us by leaving the place open, and to our surprise he was still awake to greet us and welcome us. 

3. Edgar was a great Host. Very friendly, sociable, and easy going. He gave us a very warm welcome and made sure we knew all the resources that we had at the place, then he respectfully gave us our space while making sure that we had access to him whenever needed via phone. 

4. The place was as listed. I really liked our room. Its unique in that when the glass windows are opened, it almost feels like you are outside. 

5. Edgar and Karen were very gracious in letting us stay until 7PM on the last night, as our flight out was not till later in the evening.

Thanks for a great stay, would highly recommend!

Our stay with Karen was great! The cottage is close to Waikiki and many popular attractions for tourists. The neighborhood was nice and quiet and the cottage was cozy and clean. Edgar helped us settle in and was very welcoming and friendly. They were also very flexible on check-in and check-out times. Would recommend to anyone! Thank you for the stay!
Neighborhood is very quiet and cozy, never met Karen face to face but another tenant by the name of Edgar. Overall experience was good and would repeat the stay if another chance to visit Oahu rises.

Lucky was very welcoming. The cottage was sparkling clean and comfortable. I was dreading not having AC but found out that the cottage has many windows and the breeze was wonderful. She also had several fans available. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. On a personal note, I'd like to say that Sunny (Lucky's pup) is one cute doggie!

The cottage was nice, clean and in a very convenient location. I was just in town for one night for a a work conference and it exceeded all of my needs. The bed was comfortable and I loved all of the windows throughout. Karen's communication was great. I'd definitely recommend staying here.
I rented this house for my cousin. The host was very nice. Always willing to help us.

Karen made us feel very welcome.
The neighborhood is quiet and close to shopping - very convenient.
Her cottage is extremely comfortable, with two roomy bedrooms with comfortable queen beds.  
Central living area with couch, eating area and full kitchen.
There are windows thru out to catch all the breezes, plus fans in all rooms.  Lovely fountain outside cottage.  We were extremely comfortable and will stay there again, as we have family nearby.
It was great!  No A/C but who needs it. Located in a great spot with easy access to Waikiki. I would stay again

Wir haben Karens Cottage nur für eine Nacht gemietet, weil wir nach der lange Reise eine Unterkunft in der Nähe des Flughafens brauchten. Dafür war das Cottage perfekt. Karen war sogar so freundlich, bis gegen Mitternacht persönlich auf uns zu warten. In ruhiger Lage so nahe an Honolulu findet man wahrscheinlich nicht so schnell etwas besseres. Das Haus ist zweckmässig eingerichtet, die Lage in einer Mittelklasse-Wohngegend, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in der Nähe.
very nice place,quit,comfortable.but wifi can't go into internet.
We had a great time. The house it is really nice, good localization and it have a good vibe.

Clean and convenient.  Quiet residential neighborhood.  It's behind the main house where the Quantam Institute for Hollistic Health is run so there were lots of towels for our large group staying the night before our flight back to the mainland.    I wish there was air conditioning but it wasn't too bad with the fans after sunset.  Thanks, Karen, for accommodating us!

Initially, the absence of AC made our group wonder if we had made the right decision, but all of our doubt was washed away by Lucky's charm. Her warm hospitality, generous amenities, and authentic atmosphere makes her place the ideal stay to enjoy a real Hawaiian experience. Also, the guest house has plenty of windows that allow for a refreshing breeze throughout the day. Overall, this is a decent place with an even better host that will ensure that you enjoy your trip.

Working with Karen was easy. She made personal contact immediately when we arrived and also before we arrived email contact was quick and easy.

The house is nice and comfortable. The master suite was particularly nice. Please note that the house has two bedrooms and a sleeping couch in the living area, but is more deigned to accommodate 4 people. All rooms had windows that allowed a breeze throughout the day and there were fans.

We enjoyed the location as it was close to a shopping centre for groceries and breakfast and dinner options. The neighbourhood was very peaceful and quiet.

Bottom line, we enjoyed our stay and would recommend the rental to family, friends and strangers alike, but up to 4 people.

Thanks, Karen, for accommodating us.

Great place to land after a long flight with tired kids. Even on a hot summer night this place is very comfortable due to excellent fans and breezy valley location. No curtains, so be prepared to wake with the sun. But that's what you should do in Hawaii, so just run with it. :) Would definitely stay there again. Lovely host. Mahalo!

We had a comfortable stay during our stopover in Honolulu for our trip back to Australia. Great value for money. Karen is very easy to communicate with. Would recommend the cottage for a one or two night stay.
Nice and comfort place. Recommend

Location was perfect. Manoa is 5min by car from Waikiki beach. The appartment was really clean and well equipped. There is a parking lot. Karen was always helpful when we had doubts. I stayed there for a week and I would definitely recommend this appartment.

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at the Cosy Cottage. We particularly enjoyed the feeling of being 'at home' that it generates; having all the bits and pieces around us that we might need made for an easy holiday with two young children. The area is great; next door to the Uni campus with plenty of opportunities for walking and picnics, walking distance to a good shopping centre, excellent Thai (Bangkok Chef), good sandwich shop (Andy's) and the fabulous Boulangerie (try their Wagyu sandwich - yum!). We enjoyed feeling part of the local community rather than one of the teeming tourist crowd in Waikiki. We would stay here again, and will recommend it to our friends. Oh, and the beds were really comfortable and we enjoyed a lovely cool breeze during our stay.

I didn't get to meet Karen in person but her communication was very friendly and welcoming, and she was flexible with check in and check out times which is always appreciated. I recommend doing the walk to Manoa Falls which is in the area and is very lush and beautiful. Karen's cottage is not 'new'  or ' trendy' so if that is what you looking for then this would not be the place for you. If you are after basic accommodation away from the bustle of Honolulu but still within a short drive then Karen's cottage does the job.
Nice place to stay for a (Website hidden by Airbnb) second time with Karen though in a different tool. Nice people and place to stay I would happily again.

Karen was very friendly and accommodating. She provided ample information and great communication before, during, and after our trip. The location was very convenient and the cottage had a great cozy feeling. It was a bit hot (mid November) and there were a lot of bugs, but both are to be expected with the geographic location of the listing deep in manoa valley.

The house was very cozy, tidy, and quaint. There were extra towels and blankets for us, and the owner was kind enough to have left some essentials for our use in the refrigerator and cupboards. She also offers us the use of the shower in her own house for our convenience. The location is great, in beautiful Manoa valley but a short trip to downtown, Waikiki, and the airport. Overall, the house was too small for our group of six, but would be great for 2-5 people.

We really enjoyed staying in the cottage; it was so peaceful and quiet. We loved the cool breezes and being surrounded by the green garden. The beds are very comfortable, the rooms spacious and the kitchen stocked with basic tools. We walked to the shops and restaurants nearby when we needed. It is a very clean, well maintained and comfortable place to stay in the best neighborhood on Oahu.

We had such a wonderful time in Lucky's Cottage. here are my take aways from our experience:

1) Location was ideal. Close to the motorway that took us everywhere we planned.

2) The Cottage was very clean, well maintained, well stocked with all needs (and more), very bright, and very peaceful.
One thing to note is  that we encountered a few bugs and a lizard that came out to greet us the four evenings we were there. Although it is understandable given the location is really close to the mountains and nature. It would be difficult to repel all critters. 

4) Karen was terrific in communication and we felt we could have asked anything and would be looked after for if needed. 

5) When we get the chance to visit Hawaii again, we would definitely request to stay in the same location. This is a hard gem to come by and would recommend anyone to lodge in this location. Thank you Lucky!

Hawaii was beautiful. The house was centrally located for easy access to major tourist attractions. Although it seemed a bit smaller than the pictures we still slept 4 kids and 3 adults ok. The kids especially enjoyed the fish pond.

I really enjoyed how there was an open door policy at Cottage. We showed up late but walked right in to this charming cottage, with linen and even food in the fridge. We had access to the front house s kitchen and bathroom if needed. People were checking in and out smoothly and friendly. We were rehearsing our lines and competeing for shows at the university s for Kennedy Center Theatre Fest. we had other actors visiting and we even rented Popeds she has parking in front of the house on the lawn. She is warm and genuine I enjoyed the whole Island Vibe.
We have a nice stay, thanks. The cottage is near Wikiki and shopping area, very convenient.

We arrived late in the evening. The house was as described and ready for us to ,climb into bed after an 8 hour flight. House very clean and everything we needed. The house was very private and off the roadway. Lovely and quiet location.

Karen was super friendly, helpful and waited for us at the door.
Her house is clean, familiar and we felt like home! We don´t miss anything! We would come back everytime again!
Very comfortable and peaceful. We had a wonderful time at the cottage. We hope to visit again

This is a little granny cottage behind a home in a residential district. You will need a rental car or a scooter to go to the beach and other areas. 

The cottage is small but comfortable. There is everything you need in there for an extended stay, including a stove, microwave and a full size refrigerator. The kitchen is fully stocked with plates, silverware, etc. 

There are plenty of towels and extra blankets if you need them. The unit is spacious enough if you have kids and can accommodate a family comfortably. 

It's an older home so don't expect luxury accommodations but it's perfectly nice for the price and the hosts (Karen and her son) are very attentive if you need anything. 

The main benefit for us was that there is a washer and dryer on site that we can use right outside the unit, and Karen is nice enough to provide laundry soap and everything else you need at no charge. There is also a clothesline outside if you want to hang your towels or swimsuits to air-dry, which we did several times. 

Between going to the beach every day and all the sweaty days, we did laundry three times and it was a blessing to have clean clothes the whole time we were in Oahu.

Great location, away from busy Waikiki and the city, but still a close drive to many of the places you are likely to go to on that side of the island. 

The place itself fit 7 of us comfortably. She had two extra air mattresses for us to use, though we only used one (blowing up two would have taken up a lot of space). There is no A/C (so far, a common theme in the Hawaiian Airbnbs we've stayed in so far), but it is very cool in the evening, night, and early morning. We were about there island during the hot times of the day, so no A/C was no problem. 

The cottage is on the same property as the two-story house, so while the cottage is private, it is a shared property. Still, we never saw any of the other guests on property except when parking.

I would have no problem staying here again.

This cozy cottage was perfect for my 4-day, 5-night stay in Honolulu. It was clean, well supplied (plenty of fresh towels, dishes, etc) and the bed is comfortable. I loved falling asleep to the intermittent Manoa rain, and waking up to the birds. The cottage is situated in the backyard, which is a lovely location--you'll be surrounded by green! The neighborhood is absolutely beautiful. I loved to take walks in the morning and evening in this quiet space. The cottage is a 7-minute walk from the Manoa Marketplace, which is a perfect spot to stock up on some groceries, get a slice of pizza, or take advantage of the amazing farmer's market on Tuesdays, Thursdays, and Sundays. With guidance from Karen's informative binder, I even walked from the cottage to the Manoa Falls. When I wasn't exploring the neighborhood or surrounding area, I was at a conference at the university. I was so excited to realize that I could access campus across the street from the cottage! At first I didn't even realize campus was *right there* since it's such a quiet area. I highly recommend Karen's cottage, especially if you need to be on campus and want to avoid the high-traffic tourism near the beach.
Very convenient for Honolulu Airport and Waikiki. Comfortable, self contained accommodation for family of 5 adults.  Easy parking.
Lucky's place felt like home from the moment we arrived, it is  located very close to downtown Honolulu great place to stay my family and I had a very positive experience, thanks lucky.
it was a great, quiet, serene place to stay after visiting friends and family in Oahu. Unfortunately it was a short stay for us to really experience being a local but loved it regardless.
nice lady!

너무나 조용한 동네에 편안하고 안락하게 가족들과 쉴 수 있는 공간이었습니다. 여행을 가게 되면 부득이하게 물건들을 많이 사게 되는데, (설거지 용품 같은..) 그러한 것도 전혀 새로 구매할 필요가 없었고, 숙소에서 모두 제공되어 가족들끼리 안락하게 집에서 식사를 하기도 하였습니다. 아침에 일어날 때 새 지저귀는 소리와 맑은 공기가 너무 좋았습니다. 잘 지내다가 돌아갑니다.
We had a great time at Lucky's cottage. It provided us with enough space and privacy for a family of four.

Booking with Karen for the 2nd time and there will be for sure a 3rd time. This house is just perfect for everybody who needs to be close to UH , but still not too far away from Waikiki or other "important" places in Honolulu.
What an amazing location and cottage in Manoa Valley! Everything is thought of and provided- a wonderful landing pad in Honolulu! Mahalo nui!

Our stay at the cottage was wonderful. Lucky is an awesome host, she's helpful an if you need or have any questions she's a call or txt away. The cottage itself is very local kine Hawaii. Centered out in Manoa behind UH. Still close to tourist attractions if that's what you're looking for but tucked away for quiet, peace & tranquility. Birds chirping in the am light showers. Along with super comfy beds. We loved an enjoyed our stay. Can't wait to return :)
在火奴鲁鲁,此房价格算便宜的,厨房配套好,什么作料都有,房子大部用来出租,显得有些拥挤｡

Karen's cottage was perfect for my family of 5 adults and 1 child, plenty of sleeping. Privacy and parking were big for us, as well as internet. Neighborhood was quiet, loved that it rained every night and had nice breeze flowing through. Grocery/coffeeshop were nearby. Neighborhood was perfect to go running or walking, with a popular waterfall less than 3mi away. She had all the gear for snorkeling and beach. Karen was available if we needed anything during our 10day stay.
Karen's place is easy to get to, spacious, lovely. Thank you!
We had a great time at Lucky's cottage. It provided us with enough space.
Our two small boys loved the yard and we liked being able to cook in the fully equipped kitchen. The use of the washer and dryer were a plus.

My parents enjoyed Karen's cottage very much.  There was even a duck family that visited the back of the cottage daily, which was really amusing.  The cottage was very clean and equipped with almost everything necessary.  The cottage is secluded in the back of the main house and is very quite except the sounds of nature.

The two beds are very comfortable and could easily fit four people nicely.

There are many places to eat and shop within walking distance.  Although there is traffic during peak hours, Karen's place is at the beginning of Manoa Valley so you can get in and out quite fast even with traffic.

Overall this is a great place to stay.  Thank you Karen!

This is a very local place.  Easy in and out and SUPER affordable.  But maybe more for someone who has been to Hawaii.  Bring your own soap and shampoo.  Better if you have a car.  Also has fans, but no central air.  Spacious.   No TV.  We enjoyed it.
Slept 6 comfortably 2 beds, 1 futon. Nice accommodations, no TV but then again it is Hawaii. Thanks Lucky.

Karen is the kind of host Air B&B is all about. Great comunication and gauged what kind of needs we had
Nice place to get away from Honolulu rat race. 
Mahalo
This is a great, quiet location perfect for a few close friends traveling together - good value and relaxing environment. Thanks Karen!
a relaxing place close to town

The place was older but still very clean kids loved the bright green lizards every where. And the sound of the pond outside was beautiful.  Didn't have aircon but with the fans and all the windows didn't even miss it.  Was a bit far for no car and three young kids but with a car would of been great.
Comfy clean place for a reasonable price.

This is a nice place if you want to stay away from the noise of the city. The marketplace is about a 10 minute walk away and the city is 15 mins away by cab. The beach is close to the city than it is to Pamoa Road. 
The host is great. There's a certain good vibe to this place
Nice air circulation in the cottage with the various windows.

Very comfortable stay for all 5 of us. The house was equipped with everything we could've needed and the neighborhood was nice and quiet. Uber trips were relatively cheap for trips to the beach and close restraunts but renting a car for us ended up working better.

The cottage is just as described... Suited our Ohana of 6 just right.  Peaceful nights, you'll wake up to birds singing,  bright and airy during the day with lots of fans, convenient kitchen and laundry right out side.   Location is fabulous...beautiful Manoa valley!  No one bothered us at all, we felt at home:). Mahalo Lucky, you were a fabulous host!  We look forward to another visit!
The location was quiet and we felt secure. There was ample street parking on the weekend. The facility meet our needs and the price was reasonable for Honolulu.

A cottage in Manoa Valley was the perfect alternative to the expensive & crowded Waikiki hotels.   Manoa Valley is a wonderful neighborhood right next to Honolulu.   Can't say enough about the location.  
The cottage has enough privacy and amenities to take out the worry of staying outside of the known value of staying at a a major hotel chain.  If you are looking for a TV and being right in the heart of Waikiki shopping and  beach then this is not for you.  
My only regret is not having more time to spend, but certainly not a knock against Karen's cottage.

What a lovely experience! We moved to Hawaii from Florida and Ms. Lucky and her cozy cottage made it a very smooth transition for us. It is a very quiet yet convenient location with lots to do and see. We are thankful that we were blessed with such a great place and people ( Thornton family) to help us! Highly recommend this cozy cottage!
The Lewandowski Family
Stayed the second time, was just as great as last time. Cabin, was nice and cozy and held me and 5 other people comfortable. Would come again.
Great place to stay. Everything needed is provided.
Friendly, prompt responses, quiet.

Karen's cozy cottage was indeed cozy and located in a great neighborhood.  Very convenient: close to shops, restaurants, cafes, UH Manoa, etc.  There's no TV to distract you from your peace and solitude.  Great value overall and will definitely stay there again.

Karen was very accommodating for our large group. We arrived earlier than expected and she made sure the home was super clean before we arrived. Her home is located behind the main house so it provides a touch of privacy. The neighborhood is peaceful and parking is more convenient than it is in downtown.

Her place is lovely we stayed in the back part of the house the they call the cabin she provided pretty much everything towels , amenities and much more it was close to Manoa Falls hike as well which I totally recommend only 7 mins away from her place. Waikiki was close as well for night life. Totally awesome place

This was a wonderful place to stay!  The location was extremely convenient! 
 It made it easy to get around and visit friends and favorite places.  The garden space around the cottage was beautiful -- full of greenery and flowers!  This also meant lots of birds and birdsong - which we loved!  Communications before and during our stay were prompt and clear.  The cottage had everything we needed to be comfortable.  The only reason we did not write "exceeded expectations" is that we already had very high expectations, based on the ad.  We hope to be able to return.

My 5 year old daughter and I rented the cottage for a few days while visiting family on Oahu. The cottage is large and comfortable and a great place for kids. My daughter loved looking in the fish pond and at the avocado tree. It was very easy to find, to check in, and most importantly very quiet for sleeping. Lucky is kind and super laid back and very responsive. If you want a nice place away from the craziness of Waikiki this is a fabulous option.

I loved this area -- Manoa is fantastic and fairly close to central Honolulu/beaches (10-20 minutes depending on traffic). Nice mountain (mauka) views. Karen is very kind and check-in was a breeze. She is flexible (early check in is possible) and is communicative. The neighborhood has many UH students but is quiet.
 
This is a typical 'local' house complete with shutters and some clutter (not a deal-breaker for us but may bother those leaning OCD.) This is Manoa, meaning there are bugs/ants and you will need to put everything in the fridge and might need bug spray. (We didn't.) 

There are plenty of outdoor toys for kids, and a koi pond. If you have adventurous young child or are a free-range parent, know that there are breakable items in the cottage and some cleaning containers and the like are in an open area under the main house (the cottage itself is fine.) My 4-year-old was perfectly safe on the property and enjoyed the trees. 

I enjoyed the cottage, the rain (this is the rainforest area of Honolulu), the environment. I used the washer/dryer and it was great, even removed some stains.
Close to Waikiki. Lucky responded really fast.
Nice place, great value

Great location. Not far drive or moderate walk to Waikiki. Quiet neighborhood away from the busier tourist scene of Waikiki. Close to shops (Safeway, Starbucks, Gas station, restaurants and take outs) and local attractions(Manoa falls/Lyon abortoreum) (Website hidden by Airbnb) Cottage has all the necessary amenities and extras required for a comfortable stay. Nice comfortable beds. Running hot water. Access in and out of cottage was hassle free. Lucky was always nearby or there to help and assist. Adult group of five enjoyed our stay.
Thank you Karen for the nice quiet stay
We really enjoyed our stay. Nice, quiet neighborhood! It was so relaxing
We had a great time staying at Karen's cottage.
