This was a perfect place for my 'young' adult children (19-26 yo)  to stay while visiting family in Hawaii.  Very welcoming.  Everything you need groceries/pharmacy/café are all within walking distance.  It's like staying with an auntie--very much a home.   A car is very useful. 

We loved staying with Lucky and will return.

We absolutely loved Karen’s place.  Having stayed at the hyatt, doubletree, embassy suites and the likes in waikiki, i can say we’d much rather stay at karen’s place.  Unlike the draining atmosphere of a hotel, where the AC never quite works, the elevator shaft is on the other side of the wall, or the neighbors next door have a 4am departure and keep banging doors, karen’s place is serene, breezy, and at night you can listen to the rain and breathe the ginger fragrant air. For a family of 3-4 it is just perfect. Parking is very convenient and free (unlike the $37/day in waikiki) and you are in the sought after manoa valley, with a few restaurants, a nice farmer’s markey, and a starbucks and a bakery so many japanese tourists must visit and take pics of (why?! Because i did see them all the time doing just that, there must be some historical importance to the place). 
The towel supply is ample, the shower pressure strong, and karen is a lovely host.  If you are lucky and the place is available, do not hesitate, stay there! We stayed in late July and were not bothered in the least by the lack of AC, because the place is so airy and breezy.
Very nice location.

Karen place is nice if you want privacy in and out, the cabin is very spacious. Very airy we didn’t even use the fan at night when we sleep.
Thank you Karen.
Wonderful place,easy to find. Clean.
Everything as advertised was correct.
Great place for travel on a budget. Clean and comfortable. Quiet neighborhood close to the city. We really enjoyed waking up to the sound of songbirds. Open air feel to the place. Mahalo Lucky!

Life in the Manoa valley is beautiful - fall asleep to gentle rains every evening, and wake up to the sound of tropical birds each morning! Karen's home is right next to the University of Hawai'i Manoa, which meant the perfect place to go running each morning. While the street she is on is quite quiet, the home is also close by to a small mall full of great restaurants, too.
Great location and setting. Convenient to UH campus and shopping.
a gem in magical manoa

It was nice to have  a functional space in Manoa, which was a quiet and comfortable neighborhood. The space was well-stocked with towels, dishes, etc., and the shared laundry was helpful. If you are bringing a lot of people on a budget, it could work nicely.

However, the space was pretty run-down. The fold-out couch did not fold back properly and was terrible for seating. Veneer in the kitchen (and particleboard under the counter) were peeling and crumbling. A couple of louvers of glass in the lanai windows were missing. The fridge was old and rusty and tempermental about closing properly. There was a smoke detector mouting bracket, but the smoke detector was missing. The kitchen/living area lighting was a couple of overhead fluorescent tube fixtures. The chairs on the patio were indoor upholstered style and kinda moldy. These kinds of problems made the space unpleasant to hang out in when we weren't sleeping.

On the plus side, the beds and the sleeping area were comfortable, and the garden outside was lush. And again, the space was probably capable of hosting many people in a functional way. But for the price we paid, it was disappointing to have a space that was poorly maintained.

quiet, private, not elegant or charming, but adequate.  
comfortable bed with adequate blankets.  Not much contact with the hostess or other guests.

I stayed a Karen's 10 nights in February. I had to work at the University of Hawaii which is a just a few minutes away from Karen's so the location in that sense was perfect.

The space is very comfortable, has all the amenities I needed, and the garden absolutely delightful to rest on. I found Manoa also a very nice neighbourhood. 

I will definitively stay again if my travels bring me back to o'hahu.
Everything was as described. It was a calming and peaceful retreat. Would stay again.

name: Ohana Haven
summary: Stay In the heart if Kona, the entire upper level, 3 bed/ 2 bath home with beautiful ocean views.  Extremely close to restaurants, stores, and the LDS temple.  Can sleep up to 12 guests.  Equipped with every time you need to have a fabulous vacation.
space: So close to everything you need.
description: Stay In the heart if Kona, the entire upper level, 3 bed/ 2 bath home with beautiful ocean views.  Extremely close to restaurants, stores, and the LDS temple.  Can sleep up to 12 guests.  Equipped with every time you need to have a fabulous vacation. So close to everything you need. Free WIFI, cable television, free parking, fully stocked kitchen, comfortable beds and furnishings, free use of boogie boards, coolers, snorkel equipment, beach towels, etc. etc. etc. We do not bother our guests but we are available by phone, text or email at any time. Quiet and peaceful.  Not more happy and friendly people on Earth.
neighborhood_overview: Quiet and peaceful.  Not more happy and friendly people on Earth.
access: Free WIFI, cable television, free parking, fully stocked kitchen, comfortable beds and furnishings, free use of boogie boards, coolers, snorkel equipment, beach towels, etc. etc. etc.
interaction: We do not bother our guests but we are available by phone, text or email at any time.
house_rules: This is not a party house, and we don't allow smoking, anything illegal, or pets.  You do not need to worry about disturbing tenants in the studios below, they are extremely accommodating...

reviews.comments:
申込時から問い合わせに対し､ﾎｽﾄのﾒｰﾙのﾚｽﾎﾟﾝｽが良かったので助かりました｡
ｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑのﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは､ｺﾅ中心街から近く､ｺﾅ･ﾌﾞﾘｭｰﾜﾘｰまでも徒歩圏内でした｡
部屋は清潔感があり､生活必需品はほとんど揃っていました｡
6人の友人と宿泊しましたが､皆大満足でした｡また宿泊したいと思います｡
The town was nice. Spacious tons of beds.

We arrived in Kona in the early evening.  Christy called me the night before to give me the code to the key box, because she wasn't in Hawaii when we arrived.
The house is well marked with a banner, which was very helpful in finding it.  The rental we had was upstairs, the downstairs tenants are pretty quiet.
We were very pleased with the house, it was clean and well stocked with kitchen tools, towels, & beach gear, etc.  It provided the space our party of five needed to regroup after traveling for 5 days. The cable TV was a plus because we got to watch a soccer match. There is an onsite coin op washer & dryer that is shared with the building.  The main room and the master bedroom both have air conditioners. There are also ceiling fans in all the rooms, and plenty of floor fans for use. Parking is easy in the driveway.   Half a mile to the center of Kona for shops and restaurants, we walked down there quite a bit.

Ohana Haven was exactly that ... a safe comfortable place where our "family" could retreat to after a long day of visiting island sites. Conveniently located, Ohana Haven made it easy for us to participate in the events we were in Kona for and get back to the house to freshen up for evening events.  Cool, comfortable and convenient. More importantly Christy was so accommodating and supportive. We definitely  plant to book again in the future.
The host canceled this reservation 154 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We were very happy with Ohana Haven and our host Christy.  The home was easy to get to and centrally located. We could easily walk into town as it was just a few blocks away.  The home was spacious and included everything we needed even for the beach eg. Coolers, beach towels, beach toys etc.  It was also clean and well maintained. The view of the ocean from the lanai was beautiful and often enjoyed during our morning coffee.  The air conditioner in the living room was enough to cool down the whole space including  the bedrooms which came equipped with fans (just keep the bedroom windows & blinds closed to keep the heat out in the summer months).  Christy always replied promptly to my emails and inquiries and happily provided suggestions and information on the island.  We would definitely return and stay at Ohana Haven again.   Thank you Christy for making our first visit to Hawaii enjoyable.  Anna & Family, Vancouver, BC, Canada

In a quiet neighborhood several blocks to downtown. Close to everything. The house is nice and clean with ample supplies. Ten of us slept comfortably. The boogie boards, snorkeling gears and water shoes are perfect for our beach days.

This was a great place to stay!  The location was very convenient and the apartment was lovely, clean and comfortable.  We had two families stay there with a bunch of kids and had lots of space and hot showers for everyone (a miracle to me) after our daily adventures.  The kitchen/dining/living area was nice and spacious, even bigger than I was expecting.  We folded out the two futons and put up the queen air mattress in the living room and weren't crowded at all.  
We went to many nearby beaches that had excellent snorkeling and saw lots of big fish, many sea turtles and even a pod of dolphins!  

Next time we visit Kailua-Kona we will stay here!

Everything was as described and fit our situation perfectly.  We were within easy walking distance to our activities.  The deck was an ideal place for our group to gather and just relax even with the afternoon rains.  I highly recommend staying here both for the location and the assistance the hosts provide.

The place was clean. Fully air conditioned and in a convenient location, close to town. We did drive to the beaches further out that were highly rated.

They have beach gear available. Body boards, chairs, mats, snorkel were all put to good use.

It was also nice to have the coin laundry on site so you don't have to travel for laundry. Christy was very responsive, no issues whatsoever.
Kona is fantastic made even better by this lovely apartment in a great location

Christy and the Ohana Haven were great! She made booking and all communication with her super easy. We ended up having a group of 9 people traveling with us over to the Big Island, and the place had plenty of space for all of us to sleep and hang out both day and night. There is a family below you, so don't stay here if you plan on partying! I did not meet them, but a few of my friends did and said they were very nice. There is ample parking if you travel with a few cars which is great. Good size kitchen/dining room/living room area, and a sizable porch for hanging out on as well. It's also in a great location and has a nice view of the ocean. You are within a mile of anywhere in Kona, which makes getting around super easy. She also has lots of toys which is fun if you want to snorkel or boogie board but don't want to travel with your own stuff. Definitely choose Ohana Haven if you're traveling to Kona!

We stayed at Christy's little Ohana Haven for 4 nights and it was a blast!  What a great space conveniently within walking distance of everything in Downtown Kona.  We were able to house 12 of us with ease and would definitely love to come back.  There are tenants that live downstairs but we never had any issues in terms of complaints from them or complaints about them either.  Mahalo for such a great time!

部屋はとても清潔でした｡
大人8人子供2人で滞在しましたが､とても快適でした｡
鍵の場所がわからず電話をかけましたが､すぐに電話にでて話ができ解決しました!
(目の前にあったのにこちらが気づかなかったので､ｸﾘｽﾃｨの落ち度はありません)

玄関前にﾃｰﾌﾞﾙがあるので
夜はみんなで外で食べたり､
とても静かで落ち着いて眠ることができました｡
Comfortable house. Go to any place very convenient.

Nice, clean, spacious home that was perfect for our group of 12. The playpen in one of the rooms was perfect for the baby, and there's an air mattress in one of the closets. Very convenient location - walking distance to downtown Kona. Lots of snorkel gear (snorkel masks do leak though), boogie boards, sand buckets, and life jackets for adults and kids. Downstairs tenants are friendly. Thank you for the wonderful stay, Christy!

The unit was sufficient for our family gathering. Location was great for us. With two other rentals on property parking became an issue at times. There were a couple of issues which we had to make owner aware of. Overall I'd recommend this property.

The house is very confortable, it has everything you need to cook and to go to the beach. We were very confortable there. Christy was very helpful with everything. The house has a family living in what used to be its garage and that might be a bit awkward.  The house is very close to downtown and you have a couple of supermarkets nearby.
Wonderful location, spacious rooms, comfy beds, very clean, we highly recommend this property.

Our experience in Kona will go down as a very pleasant and memorable time!
Christy helped make it that way with a very clean and spacious place to stay. Our group of 7 enjoyed not only the facilities and what they had to offer in the way of extras but we all liked the price as well!!!!!
Cudos To Christy & her husband for making this a time to remember. . . Bill Baker

Thank you Christy for allowing us to stay in your beautiful home! Christy's home is  conveniently located in Kona. It's close to everything...food, shopping, beaches, farmers market and so much more. The home is quite cute with supplies for everything and enough room for our group of ten. There were extra things left over from previous visitors such as snorkel gear, beach chairs, kitchen goodies, towels, etc. Here home is wonderful and would recommend to anyone. ^-^ Mahalo Nui Loa!!

We were welcomed with fresh, exotic flowers. Any issues or questions were answered in an extremely timely manner. The kitchen was well equipped, even though it worked out that we didn't cook much other than breakfast.  The location was absolutely perfect for those in our family who had not been to Hawaii or the Big Island before this trip. Easy walk to the market, shops, restaurants, and even Starbucks. The view of the water from the lanai was so inviting in the morning and relaxing at sunset! The boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach mats, chairs and cooler were well utilized by my family.  Thank you for helping to make my Hawaii 5-0 comfortable and memorable.
Everything was perfect. Location was perfect and close to everything we did.
Easy check in, clean place, great location that's walkable to everything, thank you for a great stay. AC in master and living room made it an awesome stay!

The house is centrally located in Kona. Near to Alii Drive and shopping. The property is well maintained and had all we needed to accommodate our large extended family. Air conditioning in the main room and master bedroom was a nice surprise as well.

We would defiantly recommend this property to others and would likely stay ther again on a future trip.

Christy was great to work with and everything went off without a hitch.

My friends and I loved living at Ohana Haven in Kona. The house is really cosy and comfortable with a fully functional kitchen with abundant supplies. It is centrally located, very close to the hustle bustle of Ali'i Drive but far away to be in a quiet neighbourhood. Christy was a great host, making sure we had all supplies, even beach towels and snorkeling gear. Would highly recommend to large groups planning to visit Kona.

We had a great time. There was plenty of room for 6 adults. The view from the lanai was beautiful. The kitchen was well equipped. We even baked pies for Thanksgiving! the air conditioning was wonderful to come home to after a day of adventuring around the island. We used the beach towels and the snorkeling equipment. We would come back to Ohana Haven!
We enjoyed our stay. The house was spacious and clean. It is close to the town / ocean even if the neighborhood was a little run down.

This was a great value.   Great location, stocked kitchen, walkable to grocery store, shops, restaurants, coffee shops, coast.  Great communication.  With a view of a huge cruise ship in the distance from the lanai!  Nice!   Friendly community and great market within walking distance for gifts and fresh fruits/veggies/fresh fish.  We love to support local.  I'm hoping we did.  Plenty of room with 3 bedrooms and 2 futon/beds in the common area.  Large, open kitchen.  And a large lanai to see ocean front and drink coffee or ???.   
Downside:  We never found the laundry.  That could have just been us.  And the place is not new.  Everything worked, just dated.  It was clean.  Not fancy.  And it's on a hill where motorcycles and cars need to rev up engines in order to overcome it.  That was loud at night from the back bedrooms as we slept with the windows open.  All in all a great stay.   We loved Kona!  And enjoyed our visit to the Thunder Mountain Coffee.  And exploring.
Christy's place is very reasonable price, provides rooms like in the pictures, and very good  location for a family staying Kona, HI.
It's only suitable for 8 people, not 12. We also ran out of hot water. Otherwise great value.
Everything was as we hoped.

Very nice view, well located. A lot a beach gear available,  even a cooler. Enough place for our crew of 9, even a the table. Cool ice cream and grocerie stores close. 

Around 20 min of the airport.
It's a nice house

Our stay was great, plenty of room for everyone! I would definitely stay here again in the future. It is a bit of an up hill walk to get back from town, but for us it was not an issue. Christy was so easy to work with!
Great house and awesome location! Only about a 5-10 minute walk from downtown Kona.
在这个地方很不错了 价钱公道 下次再来

Great location.  Walkable, just a few blocks, to the water, downtown area and many restaurants.  Grocery store just a short drive away.  Well stocked with kid stuff (highchair, lifejackets, etc) and kitchen items.  Clean.  Air conditioned and wonderful view of the water from the lanai.
Great location nice house very roomy.  The view was magnificent we felt at home coming from the other islands.  Neighbor downstairs was cool

We were a family of 8 with a total of 3 kids and slept comfortably.  It was great to be able to walk to the market and to the main strip of Alii drive in the heart of Kailua, Kona where you can find restaurants, shops, and beaches.  You have the use of boogie boards, cooler, (Website hidden by Airbnb) make a great family vacation.  The water view from her lanai is fantastic.

Functional living for 6 people - three bedrooms and plenty of space in the kitchen and living room. This place is centrally located in Kona, so you get the advantage, but it is in a residential neighborhood and the houses next door are not so great. Just something to be aware, not a hit on this property. The laundry is an issue, it is outdated and rusty and the dryer did not work while we were there. It is reasonable value for money. Since we stayed just the one night, it looked 'expensive' because of the cleaning and service fee.  This is not secluded (but it is a great central location).
Great value for being right in kona town would definitely rent out this house again
Our family of five spent a comfortable night at Christy's place. It was spacious and clean. The only minor downside was that it was a bit expensive for the space and amenities it provided.
Close to everything we needed. We used the snorkeling equipment a lot. Very convenient location. Had a very enjoyable stay.
Great place and location

Perfect for a family vacation. Stop searching, just book it! Why?
-Location: quiet and with beautiful view of the ocean, a nice 5 minute walk to the center of town + beach + food.
-Inside the home: many cooking appliances, dishes, etc, and food preparation items. Clean and large rooms, lots of sleeping options. AC and Dana.
-Extras: Tons of snorkel gear, boards, Angel umbrellas, chairs, etc. This was a huge help for us!
-Host: Christie was always able to help with questions and make sure we were happy and comfortable.

Thank you very much, we had a perfect stay! GW
Great location and house! The central location was perfect for our first night in Kona. Finding food around 11 PM would've been a pain, but the McDonald's (5 min. walk) was a blessing.
Nice home with great location to the Kona airport and downtown Kona.  Plenty of room for the nine members of our family.  Port-a-crib was great to have for our grandson.

This is an amazing place to stay at for a couple of days. Christy is very helpful and accommodating. Perfect location with a great view of the ocean. The 3 bedrooms are spacious as well as the living with a a fully equipped open kitchen. I would definitely stay here again. Thanks

Great location close to many restaurants and the beach.
Very spacious accommodations with everything one needs.
Great hosts who respond very quickly to any requests.

Christy was incredibly quick communicating with us and helping us make all our arrangements. We VERY comfortably slept 7 adults, two sharing one bed and one sleeping on an air mattress. Could easily accommodate a few more if you are comfortable or have children in your group. Place was very clean and comfortable, well working AC, easy parking and access. Would stay again!

Everything was as quoted and fun to use some of the beach equip. 
Saw the whole island and just had fun all around.
Thanks to Christy all was smooth sailing.

very nice house,on the second floor, close to the market and beach 
非常好的房子,步行几步就到海边,海边有很多餐厅可选择

The house is in a great location located very close to Kona town. There's grocery stores just a few minutes drive away and a McDonalds literally at the base of the street. Easily walking distance. The house was more than enough room for 9 adults and 1 3yr old. It was fully stocked with beach toys, blankets, board games, life jackets, beach mats, the works! That was a huge help! 
The lanai was a very comfortable and nice space to view the water and enjoy the evening. 
The laundry was having an issue while we were there but Christy had it quickly repaired the next day. A side note, the laundry is shared with the entire house and coin operated. Just an FYI for those trying to prepare for their trip, take detergent and quarters. 
Overall,  the house worked perfect for our stay and was a comfortable place to come home to after our long days out. I would stay again!
Nice clean home. The AC was nice as most homes on the island don't have it. It was a short walk to shopping and restaurants which was great because parking could be expensive.

Christy's place was more than we expected.  Great, convenient location, spacious and well equipped. On short request, Christy arranged a late check out for us which was most helpful for our last day.  Ohana Haven was clean and ready for us.  I highly recommend it!  Mahalo Anthea

The house was perfect it was fully equipped with everything we needed and more it was clean and very comfortable everything was close and walking distance like shops restaurants, farmers market, and the beach. there's a Walmart and a Safeway near by and a Costco not to far away the neighbors downstairs were really nice and are very chill we had such a great time and we look forward to staying here again soon thank you Christy
Nice house in a declining neighborhood.  Walking distance to shops and restaurants
Cute home. Great location to downtown Kona. So it's very convenient to everything. Can walk if you wanted too. Thank you for a lovely stay.
This place was large and central for all of our activities. Christy was very easy to deal with and very accommodating and helpful. She has some great tips on the area of things to do as well.

清潔でｺｽﾊﾟは良いです｡
ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰが1階でやや使いにくかった｡
ｺﾞﾐの分別を表示しておいて欲しかった｡
2階に宿泊しましたが､居間と寝室1部屋にはｴｱｺﾝあり､寝室2部屋にはｴｱｺﾝなし｡
包丁･ﾅｲﾌの切れ味が悪い｡砥石があれば嬉しかった｡
TVやWi-fiは快適でした｡
Christy was a very responsive host, and our group enjoyed staying at her place, which was a short walk from the farmer's market and beach.
Our family had a pleasant stay at Christy's place. The unit is clean and the location is very convenient, there are a lot of dining options nearby and Walmart is a short drive away.
Christy's place is great! Plenty of space and a good location within walking distance of everything Kona has to offer.
This trip was canceled.
Loved the location of this house. The AC is great too! Exactly what we needed for our stay.
Had a great time!

Overall the property is clean and tidy and stocked with the essentials.  Check in was super easy.
We had a couple of issues with linen shortage and broken items on arrival.  Christy was very responsive to address the issues raised and although the broken items couldn't be addressed in our short 2 night stay, the linen was addressed very promptly.
There were 6 adults and 4 kids in our group and we found the size of the property suitable for our needs.  The bedrooms are generous and the open living space, with the veranda, provided lots of different seating spaces for members to occupy.
The first night we ran out of hot water however the 2nd night, with a bit of staggering, it coped with out any problems.

This place is great for families or several couples, with plenty of space and lots of amenities for your use.  Close to the downtown, almost anything you want or need is within easy walking distance, or a quick run in a car.  Makes vacationing easy for the whole family!

Such a great place to stay with family!

Great location too.. walking distance to any places
超棒的房子,位置好还有海景可看,真的超好的｡房子非常干净,房主为房间做了精心的布置,还贴心提供了很多地图和旅游资询,有住在自己家的感觉｡阳台不是很大,但是可以看到非常漂亮的落日｡房子周边的餐馆超市快餐店很多,用餐选择很多很方便｡如果再来,还会选择住在这里!!
Great place and great location. We were able to walk everywhere with any problems
Great views,  awesome location. House is set out really well. Loved our stay

Great place to stay and close to the main part of town. 

Highly recommend!!
広々としていて快適でした｡設備も充実していて何も不便はなかったです｡
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房子很大,很干净很舒适,离古镇也很近,地段超级棒!感谢CHRISTY的帮忙!我们家人都非常满意!THANK YOU SO MUCH.

Very clean, and a fantastic location. Check in and out was easy breezy, and Christy was very responsive!  My family of 5 had a wonderful few days, wish t was longer, and we would certainly stay here again.

Christy house is in a fabulous location very close to downtown well within walking distance of downtown attractions - we stayed upstairs which had 3 generous size bedrooms and large living and kitchen area and pack and play cot for our baby traveller.
Located close to McDonalds was handy for breakfast- thank you for taking our booking which was made at late notice.
Great location for sunset! Just nice for 6 adults. Nice host. For additional guest, the 2 sofa beds located at hall area are dirty n not comfortable to sleep in.
Great location, plenty of room. Furnishings a bit worn, but serviceable. Christy responds to questions very quickly and check in was super easy.
Great location, great hosts. Perfect spot for a work trip!
We had a great time at Christy’s place, would definitely stay again on a future trip. The location worked great so we could walk to town.

So many great things about Christy's place. Location is absolutely amazing, Perfect walk to the downtown Kona area (the hill can be extreme for little tiny kids though). We loved the ocean view from the place. The A/C in the living room cools pretty much the whole apartment, it was impressive. It was awesome to come home to a cooled down place after being in the sun for hours. Theirs another A/C in the main bedroom--we didn't use it too much because the fan there was good enough for us, but it was a nice touch as well. The swimming and beach accessories were awesome too! She had boards, snorkeling gear, beach chairs, kids beach toys, life vest, floaties, and much more. We def enjoyed them. 

The only downfall that we had was the washer and dryer. Not only is it coin machine ran, but also Both the washer and the drier weren't functioning very well. We ended up handwashing our laundry and hanging it to dry. It honestly wasn't much of an issue to hand wash, but it would have been more convenient to have a working W&D.  I did let Christy know about this and she contacted me quickly, and she said she'd get on it soon when she visits. So that's great to hear because we are interested in coming back to this place next year when we visit again! YAY.

Great location, a short distance from the heart of Kona and a great ocean view. Not a new house but has a very homy feel, which is great for vacationing. The downstairs tenants were friendly. Christy gave us all the details we needed for a smooth experience and was responsive and available.
Great service!

Great central location on the Kona side -- everything was no more than a 20-minute drive away. There was even some beach equipment for us to use! The air condition definitely made our stay much more comfortable.
初めてのAirbnb 利用でしたがとても良かったです｡部屋は綺麗で設備も充実していました｡ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝもｽﾑｰｽﾞにできましたし､ﾎｽﾄへ連絡してもすぐに返信が来たため安心して利用できました｡特にﾃﾞｯｷで食べた朝食の時間が素敵でした｡
Located about as close to the heart of Kona as you could ask for, with a beautiful ocean view from just up the hill

This unit was is a good location, was clean and had plenty of space for our group of 9 extended family group.  It was not stocked with all of the basic amenities we needed but most was delivered quickly after communication.  The 2 air conditioning was helpful.  The unit is very basic and a little worn and tired but comfortable except the for one bed.
Good

It was the best place and perfect for my family. It had everything we needed and other tenants were amazing as well. If you ever visit Kona I suggest you Christy's place/Ohana Havens will make you want to stay. We spent more time at home then we did sight seeing. It felt like we were still at home but better. We were close to everything. The stores, the parks, etc... Just amazing.
The location was great, super close to many restaurants and the beach. The place is spacious for a large group and the self check in is convenient.

This place is in a really convenient location close to downtown, and provides supplemental gear for snorkeling and boogie boarding. We very much enjoyed our stay, and definitely recommend it for families or larger groups!
The place was clean, although slightly dates. We didn’t see how it could comfortably fit more than 10 people - we only had 8 and it was fine. The host was lovely and accommodating.
The place was in a great location and very clean and lots of beach stuff. Only thing we missed was there was no cable tv. Would stay again

Location is great. If you want a place close to most things in Kona- this is great. We walked a ton. 
My group was there for the Ironman and this fit the bill for access to the race and course.
Christy was also super responsive to messages!!
Great location, we have a lots fun staying here.

Large comfortable top floor unit fully self-contained and convenient to central Kona. Excellent layout for a family group. Interior is a bit dated and the kitchen has some cleanliness issues - hopefully the owner can rectify this promptly.
Nice location near town.  Christy was very helpful with any needs we had.
Thanks Christy! Great stay!
Christy’s place was very clean and perfect for a group. Would recommend!

사진보다 더 좋았어요.
특히 바다가 보이는 전망이 좋았습니다.
에어컨도 유용했습니다.
전기밥솥도 있었어요.
침구도 많이 갖춰져 있어요.
주차도 편리하고 체크인도 편리합니다.
화장실은  어매니티가 업서서 ㄷ다로 준ㅂㅣ해야해요. 하와이 전체가 느런것 같습니다. 위치좋아요. 렌트로 월마트 쉽게 다녔습니다. 잘 지냈습니다. 감사합니다.
Very conveniently located. The place could use some updating. There was plenty of space.
You really can’t ask for a better location given the cost per night.  Not the most lavish, but will def meet your needs. Would stay here again for sure!
Great location quick walk to shoreline and amenities, ocean views from top deck, super quick responsive friendly hosts to deal with. Clean and well stocked house. Thankyou for a great family stay.

name: Stylish Gramercy Park Duplex LOFT
summary: This Modern beautiful duplex loft is  located in a private and coveted boutique condominium in the prestigious and centrally located Gramercy Park neighborhood. Situated on a quiet three filled block, this beautifully decorated open plan duplex has a newly decorated granite kitchen and bathroom.  The double height living room
description: This Modern beautiful duplex loft is  located in a private and coveted boutique condominium in the prestigious and centrally located Gramercy Park neighborhood. Situated on a quiet three filled block, this beautifully decorated open plan duplex has a newly decorated granite kitchen and bathroom.  The double height living room Most major subway lines are just a 7 minute walk from the apartment. Union square: 7 minute walk The park, the gramercy hotel, and Irving street are just a couple of blocks away. Plenty of great parks, cafes, restaurants, and bars surround the apartment. Ultra fast WiFi and cable are available in the unit Bathroom, desk and seating area, Queen size bed, and small changing area are located upstairs on the second floor.
notes: Ultra fast WiFi and cable are available in the unit Bathroom, desk and seating area, Queen size bed, and small changing area are located upstairs on the second floor.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm from New York City. 
I'm Into music, sports, drinks, traveling, and meeting new friends

reviews.comments: good

My Stay at Esmond's Place was AMAZING!
Esmond was very helpful, Kind and easy to get a hold of!
I was Welcomed with a Basket filled with Champagne! :) What More could You ask for?!!
The Loft was immaculate and  Looked Just like the Pictures displayed but even better. The Furniture, (bed and Sofa) are extremely comfortable and give a warm feel to the loft! Esmond also has a beautiful Piano, That Brings  an awesome Creative vibe to his place. The Neighborhood is very peaceful and Serene and well kept. The Block almost feels like a suburb in the middle of the city. Getting anywhere in Manhattan from Esmond's place is quite Simple. There Are many Nice Restaurants In the Area, My Favorite would be a well known 24 hour spot, called "Cafeteria" less than 5 minutes Away. There's  also a Pharmacy and Grocery Store a block away from the Apartment! It's the Perfect place to Stay! I definitely would Stay there again!
Lovely apartment - clean, comfy and great location. Esmond was very friendly and helpful - an excellent host! The flowers and fizz on arrival was a really nice touch. Thanks!

A great stay in a great appartment, nice (identical to the photos), comfortable and well located! Thanks to Esmond for his warm welcome with champagne and his availability during our all stay in his place, very appreciated. I recommend!

This was my first time using AirBnB and my first time in NYC. Esmond was prompt in responding to my queries before booking and just as helpful in the lead up to my trip with arranging to meet at the apartment and handing over keys etc.

The apartment was exactly as described and in the photos. It has everything you need for a stay in the city and is the perfect size for a couple. Location is great for local bars and diners and it's only a short walk to the local subway.

Overall if you're looking for great communication, perfect apartment and a prime location this is your place. I would definitely visit again.
Esmond was a great host. My flight was late and he was there to help me get settled. The apartment was as clean and the location was great. I would stay there again!

The apartment is really nice and comfortable. Furthermore, it's warm and spacious and the location is great to walk to almost everywhere in Manhattan. 
Esmond was  always available to our questions. We didn't meet him in person, but he seems to be a really nice guy. 
A good choice with no doubt!

It was great staying at Esmond's place. He communicates well and made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment is really comfortable and the neighborhood is very convenient. Would stay there again.

Fantastic loft. My wife and I loved having a kitchen and a bedroom space whilst we stayed 16 nights at the apartment. Great spot to get the feel of New York. About a 7-10min walk to subway. Very clean and very comfortable. 

Great experience overall!!

A notre arrivée nous avons été accueilli par Esmond. Nous avons fait un rapide tour de l'appartement et nous avons ensuite pris possession de celui-ci. Nous avons adoré l'appartement d'Esmond. Il correspondait à la description. Il avait même pris la peine de fleurir l'appartement. Le quartier est calme et très sur. L'appartement est très bien situé : il est proche de Union Square, de Madison square Park, de l'empire State Building. Nous recommandons cette appartement.

Esmond was very welcoming and made sure I was well acquainted with the place before he left. He was always reachable if I had questions. The place is wonderful and in a very ideal location, I highly recommend this to solo or duo travelers.

Esmond was very communicative, key exchange was seamless, and the apartment itself was great, just like in the photos and description.  Short walk to the subway, several bars, restaurants, and parks.  Really positive experience overall, 5 star all 'round.

We booked Esmond's place for just over a week and couldn't have been happier with the stay! The apartment is unique in itself, and very very comfortable, spacious and clean. I had been trying to book this for a few months now (as we had other employees traveling to NY) and will certainly be in touch to book this again in the future.

Perfection! Esmond's place was our home away from home! It was beautifully furnished, spotless, very comfortable, quiet, private yet in the perfect spot close to everything!  The location was close to a market, bank, laundry, several neat restaurants, coffee and pastry shops!  We felt very safe and comfortable! We loved the multi level and especially the fact that you don't have to wait for elevator and just steps in the front door of the building!  We are already planning our next trip and will definitely be staying at Esmond's!   Thanks for a wonderful long weekend--- M  & J

Staying at Esmond's place was a great experience altogether. The apartment is very bright (a real pleasure in NY), tastefully furnished and clean and moreover featured everything we needed during our stay.
I loved staying at Esmond's! His apartment is amazing and he is a great host i will book again for sure!
Esmond is a great host! Communication was very easy and friendly. The apartment is cozy, very neat, spacious, and stylish! The block was quiet and beautiful. I totally recommend it!

Really good place.
Esmond was available all the Time for any question during our stay at the apartment.
The place is confortable, Clean and cosy !
Everything you need is around, super location close to everything by Walk ! 
I will return for sure

Thanks Esmond for having us at your apartment. We really appreciated your cheerful welcome, and having a cosy, stylish and clean space to call home for our holiday in New York. We found the location of the apartment very convenient - about 7 minutes walk to the 4,5,6 metro and same again to the L to get over to Brooklyn or to the west side. Your dining recommendations were fantastic - Eataly and Gramercy Tavern were particular highlights. Thank you again!

The neighborhood was beautiful, with ample parking and only a 10 minute walk from where I work in Union Park. The listing was exactly as it was described, and was extremely clean and well-maintained. I'd definitely be interested in staying here again for future business trips into New York :)

Esmond è un ottimo padrone di casa,educato,puntuale e disponibile. L'appartamento è spazioso,elegante e ben attrezzato. Appena entri trovi la cucina,ben attrezzata e con lavastoviglie. Proseguendo c'è il salottino con un pianoforte Yamaha mezza coda,televisore grande e due divanetti. Salendo al piano superiore c'è un grosso specchio utilissimo ,il bagno ben attrezzato( shampoo e balsamo,fon,asciugamani ), una piccola zona studio divisa dalla camera da letto con una libreria. Il letto è molto comodo. Difetti? Credo che in estate si muoia di caldo in camera da letto ed in bagno. C'è l'aria condizionata in casa ma non raffredda la camera da letto quindi tutto il piano superiore. L'unico modo è accendere il ventilatore che fa molto rumore e smuove solo l'aria calda. Per quanto riguarda la pulizia la casa speravo meglio.

It was my second time in the apartment and for sure will have the 3rd...4th...5th.

Great apartment, host, location. Thank you one more time!

Esmond was a great host, waiting up for us when our plane was late and was quick to respond if we needed anything. I had a lot of questions before staying here as it was the first airbnb I've done and Esmond was patient and very easygoing. The only negative feedback I will have to say is it did get quite hot in the bedroom loft. We were staying over the thick of summer and most nights the a/c didn't reach the loft so we had a few sleepless nights. Also it is on the ground floor so we had some privacy concerns but all in all we loved the apartment and felt safe in the area. Easy to get anywhere in NYC from here! Thanks Esmond, I'd definitely stay here again!

My boyfriend and I had an amazing Labor Day Holiday in New York. Esmond's place is gorgeous and listed as described- piano and all!  The location made it a perfect home base as Gramercy is easily accessible by the subway and the neighborhood felt really safe.  Esmond was a gracious host, especially when we asked to check in close to 1am in the morning. I wouldn't hesitate to stay at Esmond's place again. Thank you, Esmond!

Esmonds place was amazing. We loved the loft style of the apartment, It was large, so clean and very nice decor. It has a piano in it! We met Esmond and he was very easy to communicate with, very nice and very helpful. We loved our stay and would stay again and recommend it to others. Thank you Esmond!

My first stay using Airbnb and the place was fantastic! Esmond was already waiting for me when I arrived and the exchange of keys was quick and easy. The place is in a lovely and quiet neighborhood with short walking distance to plenty of subway lines; nearly all of the major sights in Manhattan can be accessed by a single subway line if you plan properly. The place looks exactly as it shows in the photos as well. The bed was comfortable and living in a time zone 12 hours away, my jet lag was gone right away. My highest recommendation.

Esmond's place was awesome! I stayed here for a month while job hunting in New York. Close enough to the 456 and the NQR subway lines, close to Union Square, plenty of places to eat/order Seamless from around. Super well located. The apartment itself was very comfortable. I stayed in a number of Airbnbs for almost two months spanning Chelsea, East Village, Hell's Kitchen and this place, and it was definitely my favorite unit. 

Had no issues with the check in/check out, everything is pretty much straightforward, just the way I like it.
Absolutely loved the place. Central and well equipped. Would definitely stay again when visiting New York. Thanks, Esmond!

Will recommend this apt to my friends! Very cozy and close to everything. Although we didn't have a chance to meet Esmond, he well assisted us check in/out through text messages, and replied to our questions asap.

I rented this place for my parents stay while they visited me in New York. They loved the place, it was very spacious and comfortable. The neighborhood is great with several good restaurants nearby, and it's also very convenient to walk around the city. Esmond is a great host, and he was very responsive whenever we had any questions.

Esmond is very responsive and helpful. The apartment is well located and close to amenities. The building heat made the apartment very warm when we stayed there, though the weather was unseasonably warm. Thanks for having us.
Stedet er som på bildene, rent og pent. Leiligheten er i første etasje. Madrassen er på den fastere siden.

I've stayed in several NYC Airbnb's for work this year and this was by far the nicest and the QUIETEST.  Amazingly quiet street, walkable to the 6 and close to grocery stores etc.  Fully equipped kitchen which I loved.  We had a little plumbing issue at the beginning but Esmond took care of it within a couple of days.  Only bit of caution--even once the super turned the heat off during my second week, the bedroom upstairs was very toasty--even with the downstairs AC on!

Edmunds place is beautiful.  There is a firm mattress if you like firm. The bathroom is very clean and large. The floor-to-ceiling windows were wonderful.  I love natural lighting. I also loved the dimmed Chandelier at night that hangs above the living room.  The kitchen is large with a very large refrigerator for Manhattan. It really was a great stay and I'd recommend it to anybody wanting to stay in Manhattan at a convenient place that's close to everything.

Esmond was a lovely host, friendly and flexible with check in and check out times which we appreciated. The apartment is a good space for a couple, even with the grand piano it was spacious enough (especially as we had 4 suitcases!). During our stay there was a bit of a heat wave in New York and being a ground floor unit with a big beautiful window with just a sheer curtain, which let in so much light also made it very warm even with the air conditioning - this might have been a building issue as we found the hallway of the building to be extremely humid during the hotter days. In saying that it would be really cozy in the cooler months. The area was one we'd not explored previously - more on the quiet side (if that's even possible in New York) but very close to the Flatiron, Union Square and also East Village which are more lively. I'd highly recommend the burgers at Ampersand Bar which is walking distance from the apartment.

Esmond's place was incredibly beautiful. From the large windows to the grand piano, he delivered a wonderful apartment in the Gramercy Park neighborhood. The apartment was indeed wonderful with just a tiny dust and heating issue. My roommate has severe asthma and non severe sleep apnea. On our first night she didn't sleep. She couldn't breath as it was roughly 80-85 degrees upstairs. She ended up sitting in the kitchen all night as that was the least problematic place, for her, in the unit. After a couple nights of not sleeping for my roommate, we decided to purchase an air mattress so she could sleep downstairs and breath comfortably. When placing the air mattress we had to move the coffee table over an inch which revealed a massive amount of dust everywhere. It was probably one of the worst dust situations I had ever seen. This was especially surprising since I was just informed of the recent cleaning. However, all it took was a few boxes of wipes, which I purchased, and a broken vacuum, that we found in the home, to fix the issue. Unfortunately and unbeknownst to me, I had a roommate who was unaware of the contract I had signed with Esmond and  slipped on a few of Esmond's rules : such as having house guests one night and placing materials on the piano.  When Esmond brought it to my attention, he dealt with it effectively and with kindness. Along with the rules mentioned above, he also said that the air-mattress was not permitted, although I couldn't find that rule on the Airbnb website nor the sheet he left me.  That was cleaned up between Esmond and I and we were back on the road to a good stay. Until I experienced a small amount of despair when the building  informed me that, per Esmond's contract with the condominium, Airbnb's are not ever permitted in the building. I went to look for the sheet Esmond had left me, upon arrival, and it did state for me to tell anyone, if asked, that Esmond is my cousin. I would've rather Esmond messaged that to me prior to the stay, or listed it on the site, as it possibly would have changed my mind when deciding to stay at an Airbnb where I would have to, for lack of a better word, lie to someone. With that said, I apologized for his inconvenience as I, in retrospect, ideally should've communicated with my roommate the specific details and inquires set forth by Esmond prior to our stay. None the less, I am pleased with the stay I had with Esmond and the issues we experienced throughout the stay were simply a small line of communication errors.
I definitely recommend it
Esmond and the apartment are truly amazing.

Esmond was very accommodating - very responsive, check in/check out was so easy, our interactions were pleasant, he was friendly and helpful throughout my entire stay. I would highly recommend booking with Esmond - I will definitely book again for business trips in the future.
Esmond was such a great host! The home was beautiful, clean and located in a central part of Gramercy. Will rebook next time I'm in the city. Thanks again for such a wonderful stay!

Esmond was a responsive and friendly host, though check-in turned into a hassle to coordinate through his friend who was meant to let me in. The apartment is a stylish space that was well equipped. However, the other reviews were unfortunately accurate in that the loft area became unbearably hot. Since the apartment is facing the street and is on the first level, I could only keep the windows open when I was close by. Also be cautioned that AirBnbs are not allowed in Esmond's place, which became uncomfortable a few times since I had a longer stay (two weeks). 

I would consider staying here again since it's close to my work and provided a better solution were worked out to deal with the heat upstairs.
Such a wonderful 2 week stay! The apt is so stylish and spacious. Great amenities and incredible location. I’ll definitely be coming back!

It is pretty much as advertised. Very very stylish apartment. It was super clean. I liked the neighborhood, kind of quite but there are a also a ton of places near by and they are not too crowded.

The only terrible part of the apartment is the heat. The a/c is useless. It gets really really hot in bedroom and sometimes it is hard to sleep (and it was not even hot weather outside when I was staying there).
Beautiful apartment on a quiet street!
Great place, clean, central and feels spacious. Highly recommended.

Wonderful experience, good location, stylish loft, very kind.
주변에 다 있고 위치가 좋아요. 집도 깨끗하고 2층공간이 넓어서 머물기 좋은데 3주 있는 동안 바퀴벌레가 크기 별로 나왔네요..... 그것 말고는 다 좋았습니다.

This apartment is fantastic. My wife and I stayed here on our honeymoon for 2 weeks over Christmas and it was perfect. Great location short walk to the Subway which is the only form of transport needed.Franks around the corner is a fantastic little Italian restaurant for great Italian food. There is a heap of variety of shops at your fingertips supermarkets, restaurants, laundry ect. There is a great kitchen also. We would 100% recommended staying here it was great for us. Thank you again Max.
Had a great stay at Max's place. The location is fantastic and the area has a lot to offer. The one thing to be aware of is the sleeping quarters (upstairs) tends to get VERY WARM.

summary: Accommodation just off the buzzing Istiklal Caddesi and a stone’s throw from Taksim Square.  Along with wood furnishings and designer interior  has all Hi-tech amenities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioner in it.

name: Casa da Nininha
summary: Casa da Nininha it's a rustic house (with stone walls) of XIX cent.  Situated in the 'Portuguese Switzerland "due to its Serra da Freita- Natural Reserve with Water Falls. Come and see Terras de Cambra, its landscapes as well as the fantastic food.
space: The ideal place to relax with your family of stressful day's work.  We have 6 different apartments, two T0, three T1 and a T1 duplex.  The quietness and silence are a constant in our house.  In the mountains of Freita can accomplish great hiking!

name: 1BR+BA IN LXRY CONDO W POOL+PARKING
summary: 1 Bedroom (Queen Size Bed) with full Bathroom in well appointed Hotel-Style Condo at the heart of Williamsburg and Greenpoint is steps from Cooper Park with views of the Manhattan skyline from every window.
space: A Beautiful Bedroom and Bathroom with Shower + Deep Tub in well appointed Condo, including Hotel-Quality Amenities, 24/7Doorman/Concierge, Heated Swimming Pool, and a Parking Garage.  The 5 year new Building overlooks the Oak Trees of Cooper Park, and has views of the Manhattan Skyline from every window. --1 BEDROOM Queen-sized bed, television, dresser, wardrobe, closet with two large windows.  --KITCHEN  Fully-equipped with Gas Stove, Stainless Steel Appliances, Stone Countertops, Dishwasher, Tea & Coffee. --BATHROOM  Big and Bright with deep bath tub and shower. --LIVING ROOM  Large sofa, entertainment console, desk, and balcony. --SECURITY & SERVICES  24/7 Doorman, Concierge, with Video and Intercom. --AMENITIES  Heated Swimming Pool, Gym, Parking Garage, Rooftop Cabanas, BBQ Area, Sundeck, Reflecting Pool, Courtyard with Garden, Billiard Room, and Bicycle Storage Room. --ADDITIONAL  WiFi (High speed) internet is included.  ALL Towels & Linen provided.  Laundry Washer/Dryer in close

The 5 year new Building overlooks the Oak Trees of Cooper Park, and has views of the Manhattan Skyline from every window. --1 BEDROOM Queen-sized bed, television, dresser, wardrobe, closet with two large windows.  --KITCHEN  Fully-equipped with Gas Stove, Stainless Steel Appliances, Stone Countertops, Dishwasher, Tea & Coffee. --BATHROOM  Big and Bright with deep bath tub and shower. --LIVING ROOM  Large sofa, entertainment console, desk, and balcony. --SECURITY & SERVICES  24/7 Doorman, Concierge, with Video and Intercom. --AMENITIES  Heated Swimming Pool, Gym, Parking Garage, Rooftop Cabanas, BBQ Are
neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg-Greenpoint is the best Neighborhood in America for young people. Business Insider Magazine April 21, 2004 (website hidden)
notes: Indoor Pool and Private Parking
transit: The apartment is conveniently located a few minutes walk from 3 subway lines and within a mile of the Brooklyn Queens Expressway (BQE/I-278) providing easy access for guests who drive. -L SUBWAY LINE (10 min walk)  1 stop to the East Village, 3 stops to Union Square and 4 stops to Meatpacking District, West Village, and Chelsea). -G SUBWAY LINE (15 min walk)  Operates between Court Square in Queens and Church Avenue in Kensington with Barclay Center and Park Slope in between. -J/M/Z SUBWAY LINE (20 min walk)  1 stop to the Lower East Side and 3 stops to the Financial District (Wall Street, Freedom Tower, WTC Memorial and Staten Island Ferry).  These subway lines make commuting across to Manhattan and anywhere in NYC extremely easy from here. Less than a mile of the (BQE/I-278)
access: All-Access

By staying in the apartment you assume all liability. Owner is not responsible for any bodily harm or accidents by visitor. 6. If anything breaks notify owner immediately. 7. No smoking indoors. 8. Call or email with questions or concerns at anytime. 9. Restaurant Menus, Maps, and City Attraction Brochures in Kitchen Drawer. 10. Internet UN1J4 Password EB39F4E916

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a writer living in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

name: Clean One Bedroom Apartment
summary: Clean 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of the East Village, right on Tompkins Square park. Apartment includes separate room with queen size bed, living room with long and comfortable sofa, bathroom (w/ shower and tub ), kitchen, and wifi internet.
description: Clean 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of the East Village, right on Tompkins Square park. Apartment includes separate room with queen size bed, living room with long and comfortable sofa, bathroom (w/ shower and tub ), kitchen, and wifi internet.

reviews.comments:
Michael was a great host. Arranging to get the key was easy, he showed me around the apartment and even had a couple of beers in the fridge in case I wanted one on arrival. 

The apartment was just as described. Everything was very clean. I was travelling with my boss, so I opted for sleeping on the couch. Very comfortable.

The neighbourhood had everything you could need. 

Michael also left his contact details in case we need anything. 

I'd love to stay here again.

This apartment was amazing. It was clean, bright, and we truly got the true Manhattan experience. what you see in the pictures is exactly what you get.

You truly can't go wrong being hosted by Michael. If you are looking for an easy experience where whatever concern you may have is dealt with immediately, someone who is flexible, accommodating all while being extremely cordial, you can stop looking right now. His pricing compared to many of the other listings was also extremely fair.

Had an amazing New Years in a premium Manhattan neighbourhood thanks to this man. 

Keep up the good work Michael, and keep on making your guests feel welcome.

L'ambiente è caldo e la location è molto buona, comodo dalla casa raggiungere il centro di Manhattan. Peccato per l'accoglienza che può essere migliorata; forse c'è stato poco tempo per attrezzare l'appartamento per nuovi ospiti, ma non era molto pulito. in particolare se si ricevono tre ospiti, è poi importante garantire a tutti almeno un cuscino da notte e lenzuola adeguate. Il materasso della camera va bene per due persone ma la rete sottostante non lo sostiene interamente. Recuperare la chiave è stato molto semplice, Michael si è spesso sempre sincerato che andasse tutto bene e che fosse tutto ok.

Michael's apartment was very comfortable for three of us! We loved having our own little home to come and get a feel for living in East Village just a stop away from Brooklyn, and right in the center of everywhere you'd want to go. It's a great location 6 short blocks from the Ist Street station on 14th, the L line. Take L to Union Square station to transfer anywhere (downtown for little Italy, Chinatown, Soho, WTC, Liberty, Brooklyn Bridge), or uptown for all the other touristy things. The apt. Is adjacent to a Park, and we loved the cafes and tapas places nearby. laundry, if needed, is about a block away. The flat is on the fourth floor of a quaint bldg. The inside is upgraded modern, clean, no bugs. The temperature inside was perfect and comfortable. The host keeps the place clutter free and perfect for guests with cleaning supplies available if needed. He was extremely flexible, working with our flight arrivals and departures. It was such a pleasure staying there! Thank you Michael!

Michael was very kind. Our plane was delayed and we arrived at 1am instead of 11pm, but Michael waited for us and checked all way through our stay whether we needed anything. The flat is really simple but so well located. It's perfect to enjoy lower east side/ Bowery/ noho/soho////
Overall, we had a good experience. The apartment was adequate for our needs and Michael was very helpful to sit down and tell us about the neighborhood and things to do.
Best location on the park - plenty of funky restaurants and bars in the area

name: Stunning room in Darlinghurst
summary: We have a lovely room and bathroom with wine bars, theatres, shopping and the markets close by. We own a cafe called Sticky Fingers.  We throw in a free coffee if you head there.  Beach is 15 mins by bus. We have a little puppy so you must like dogs.
space: We have a modern, eclectic style, we provide bathrobes, toiletries and even a pre packed beach bag and your very own bathroom.  We also have tea and coffee making facilities in your room for first thing in the morning and lovely bath products.
description: We have a lovely room and bathroom with wine bars, theatres, shopping and the markets close by. We own a cafe called Sticky Fingers.  We throw in a free coffee if you head there.  Beach is 15 mins by bus. We have a little puppy so you must like dogs. We have a modern, eclectic style, we provide bathrobes, toiletries and even a pre packed beach bag and your very own bathroom.  We also have tea and coffee making facilities in your room for first thing in the morning and lovely bath products. Your room and bathroom as well as a pool, sauna and gym just out our door!  No guest access to kitchen and living, We are pretty busy so more often than not you will find yourself having a lot of space.  We are around though for tips on where to go and what to do.  We would love you to come say hi to us at our cafe, Sticky Fingers Kitchen and Bar. We love everything about our hood and have a tonne of recommendations. We have bars, cafes, shopping, great restaurants and the harbour and beautiful park
neighborhood_overview: We love everything about our hood and have a tonne of recommendations. We have bars, cafes, shopping, great restaurants and the harbour and beautiful park just down the road. It is a 10 min walk to the city and a 15 min bus ride to the beach!
notes: We have a little puppy. He will bark and want to play and loves attention so be prepared to give him cuddles and sometimes be woken up by his puppy sounds in the morning.
transit: Buses and a train station are close by. From the airport you can catch a train to town hall then change on platform 5/6 to kings cross station. It takes you about 15 mins and costs about $12-$15 per person. A taxi from the airport is about $50 and will take you about 20-30 mins.
access: Your room and bathroom as well as a pool, sauna and gym just out our door!  No guest access to kitchen and living,
interaction: We are pretty busy so more often than not you will find yourself having a lot of space.  We are around though for tips on where to go and what to do.  We would love you to come say hi to us at our cafe, Sticky Fingers Kitchen and Bar.
house_rules: No use of kitchen and living.  Also close your bedroom door so our little puppy doesn't steal your shoes!

host.host_about:
A lawyer who loves to travel. 

I live in Darlinghurst with my lovely husband, Tristan, a cafe manager and photographer and our little Cavoodle, Felix.

We love our city and our neighbourhood and want to show it off.

reviews.comments: Excellent location to great cafe and restaurants.  Apartment is very modern and comfortable.  Excellent hosts.

Naveen and her husband Tris were exquisite hosts.  We were welcomed by Tris who working in the restaurant biz is a connoisseur of great eats and recommended some rad cafes.  The room was absolutely stunning, you wake up to a beautiful view of the rooftops and city, it makes it hard to want to get out of bed.  You are walking distance to quite a lot and have easy access to the train.  Naveen is super on top of checking in to ensure your needs are met and has great energy.  She invited us for a glass of wine when she arrived home from work and it felt like we were catching up with a friend.  I highly recommend staying here, it was a really lovely experience!

Naveen is so good n very careful person, even i was staying only 1 night. She will msg me make sure im alright. The house is very very modern and there is a gym room...view is awesome...could able to see both harbour bridge n opera house. I like the room soooo much with a big window ...could see the city view all the day. The doggy felix is so cute,.i love him so much...very very good dog n love to play with it.i highlu recommended people to stay here.
The hosts are very friendly and helpful. Great location and a real stunning room!

Naveen and Tris are fantastic, and their dog Felix is precious!  The apartment is decorated perfectly and feels like home. We had a great dinner together, and I learned a lot about Sydney from them. A great stay!

Naveen and Tris are absolutely delightful hosts. I had such a great stay with them. This was my first airbnb experience, so I had no idea what to expect and I was blown away by how well it all worked out.

Their place was exactly as described and as per the pictures. Location is fabulous - right in the thick of all the action in Darlinghurst and walking distance to everywhere I needed to go during my stay. 

The guest room is stunning - super comfy bed with high quality linen etc. Spotlessly clean and the most amazing view from the floor to ceiling window. Guests have their own private bathroom which again was spotless, great water pressure etc. Naveen has thought of all the little details - there is even a box of hotel style toiletries/amenities for guests to use. Their dog Felix is super cute and very well behaved.

I was very busy during my stay, but Naveen and Tris were very relaxed about me doing my own thing. They took me to a local cafe for a great coffee on my last morning and it was really nice to get to know them a bit. 

Tris even went out his way to drive me to the airport when we found out that trains weren't running. I really felt like I was staying with friends. I found them very easy to communicate with when booking and Naveen responded promptly to all of my messages. 

Would absolutely stay here again and have already recommend this property to friends who are planning trips to Sydney.
I have stayed for one week with Naveen and Tris. The flat is perfectly located and really nice. Naveen and Tris have been really helpful and were great to hang out with.
Naveen and Triston were awesome hosts! They're place is in a great location in Darlinghurst with many things to explore. We had great time hanging out with them and thoroughly enjoyed their home.

Even thought I barely met Naveen, Tris, her partner, was very kind and helpful showing me around their place and giving me advices about the neighborhood. The room has a great view, and their place was clean, organized and very well decorated. I really felt comfortable and well hosted. The location is also very nice with good restaurants, bars and cafes just around the corner. Would definitely go back if I had the chance.

We absolutely loved Naveen and Tristan's place, it is very well decorated and was always kept very neat and clean. We felt super comfortable and at ease. The guest's bedroom and bathroom are upstairs so you definitely get your privacy. They prepared everything you need, shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer, towels, body wash, etc. And you'll find plenty of pillows and a very comfortable bed, plenty of closet space, and A GORGEOUS VIEW! Naveen and Tristan are both very kind and helpful, and you will LOVE their dog Felix my goodness such a bundle of joy. Location of the b&b is very convenient, you are just 1-2 train stops away from the major scenic spots. You will find the best Gelato shop just down the road. There are plenty of restaurants super closeby. The neighborhood felt safe and welcoming. We loved Sydney because of this b&b :)

Naveen and Triston were lovely hosts.  Phil and I enjoyed their place and their company, especially dinner at the Metropole.  They are good company and easy conversationalists.  We traded many enjoyable travel stories and their kavoodle "felix" is also a delight.  It took us only 25 minutes to leisurely walk to the City from their apartment.  Our room had a huge window view and own bathroom.  The pool and gym are right next to their apartment - very handy.

Naveen and Tristan were absolutely amazing hosts. Very helpful and understanding, I get my bearings in this new city very quickly thanks to them. Their place is also so nice and next to everything! Not to forget the BBQ we had on the terrace ! I really enjoyed my stay and I wish we'll have the opportunity to meet again !

I have stayed at a lot of Airbnbs over the past year or so, and Naveen's place was definitely the most special. The apartment itself was lovely, modern, great décor, awesome building w/ a pool and gym, etc. The location is also superb, super easy to get to the CBD and plenty of bars and restaurants and shopping close by. Most importantly, Naveen and Tristan are just the loveliest hosts, so gracious and inclusive, and I genuinely felt welcome in their home. Their puppy is really cute too :)
Stylish apartment with a lovely dog. This place is awesome and it is super clean and convenient. Highly recommend everyone to consider this place when browsing in Airbnb.

Amazing hosts! Best air BnB yet. In a great location for food drinks coffee and transport. They have an adorable dog, a gorgeous apartment and a view to die for from the pool.

We were encores down for a beer and a wine and had a great conversation.

I am likely to be going back on my next work trip in a few months.

Naveen and Tris are great hosts! We felt welcome right from the minute we entered the door! 
The room is clean, modern and has a great view! 
We went out for dinner together in Kings Cross and enjoyed the nice atmosphere a lot! 
All in all once can say that this is a perfect place to stay, even the location of the flat is excellent!

I stayed at Naveen's place for three nights in December, one for work and two for pleasure and it was great! Excellent location, lovely host who was extremely helpful and welcoming. I wanted to stay away from a hotel and have a less solitary experience and I couldn't have asked for a better place. The room is a little noisy on a weekend night which is to be expected for the area and I didn't realise there was air con which probably made it a little worse with the windows open. Otherwise it was perfect, clean, well maintained, stylish and with a personal bathroom. I look forward to returning!

We enjoyed the time staying at Naveens' and Tris' apt and can highly recommend staying with the two. Location was great, easy to achieve all sights in walking distance....both were very friendly and helpfull and when it came to picking up our rental car at the airport, Tris was giving us a ride...isn't this nice??? Thank you again for the time and for the hospitality. Stay in touch. Xoxo Bettina & Sam

This definitely falls into the 'must stay' category! Not only was the room and accommodation well above expectations, but the neighborhood is great and very good for walking around to enjoy everything including the opera house, botanical gardens, and great restaurants. Naveen and Tristan were perfect hosts and it was a real treat talking to them and sharing in a great dinner Naveen made.

Tristan made us feel very welcome upon arrival, showed us everything we'd need and recommended a great place to have breakfast! Although we unfortunately didn't end up meeting Naveen, she was very helpful over the phone! 

The apartment was exactly what we were looking for, the use of the gym and outside pool (with stunning views across the city and harbour bridge) are a great addition! We loved the style of the apartment too, very cool. 

Loved Darlighurst, conveniently located when travelling into the City and not too far from Bondi. 

We would highly recommend staying with Tristan & Naveen!

We had an awesome stay at Naveen and Tristians. It was really easy to get to, excellent access to public transport, all the city sights and places we wanted to go. There is a wealth of good cafe and bars in the area and we were given excellent tips on which ones to go to. Friendly, clean, welcoming great amenities and views! lots of personal space or good chats.

We had a wonderful stay at the stunning rooom in Darlinghurst.  Naveen was a terrific host providing a beautiful room with great views of Sydney, a very comfortable bed and linens, excellent and abundant organic toiletires, and an affectionate dog named Felix.  We worked out in the gym, used the sauna and swam in the pool. the location was close enough to walk to the CBD  or Sydney Opera House,and yet, feel like we were in a neighborhood that had lots of stores, restaurants and shops. Naveen gave us excellent suggestions about restaurants to eat in and we felt totally welcomed and comfortable during our 3 day stay.  If you go to Sydney, stay with Naveen.  You will be very happy.

Naveen and her Husband Tris were beyond amazing hosts!  I arrived in Sydney with my partner for our birthdays, and he had to leave that evening due to work commitments, leaving me to stay in Sydney alone for the night.  Naveen invited me to eat the most delicious dinner with them and we stayed up talking.  I was very grateful for the company!  They gave me the perfect amount of privacy when needed.  The apartment was in an amazing location, easy to wander in and out of the city in 15 minutes walking time.  Felix the dog is an additional bonus to this adorable city stay and won me over very easily with those puppy dog eyes!  Thank you for making my birthday such a pleasurable experience. x

We had a wonderful stay with Naveen and Tristan. They were terrific hosts and made us feel very welcome - providing lots of great tips on nearby cafes and bars, and even bathrobes. The bedroom had an amazing view and was large and spotless. The apartment is in a fantastic location - close to the city and lots of great places to eat and shop - and is really comfortable and super stylish. Definitely would stay with Naveen and Tristan again!

Naveen and Tristan have a stylish and cozy apartment in a cool neighborhood. They are very nice and make u feel like home. Always ready to give me travel tips. Love their dog Felix! Plenty restaurants, bars selection around and 5 mins away from train station, bus station, 2 mins to supermarket. And thanks for Naveen's recommendation of gelato which were really good! Great stay. Hope go back one day to play with Felix again. :)
Great hosts - loved it!
Cozy apartment and nice host. Everything was so comportable. Location is also convenient to access everywhere.
Location close to train station.

I only got to spend one night in this house but it was definitely a great experience. Naveen and Tris were very accommodating and friendly. They invited me out with them but also gave me my own space.  The house is as described. It is renovated and a lovely modern look. The apartment is very clean throughout and the bed is very comfortable. I loved the floor-length window and loved having my own bathroom. All in all, I felt really at home there and it made my short business trip to Sydney much easier.  I would very happily stay there again.

Perfect host! Naveen&Tristan were awesome!They were always very friendly and helpful. The apartment located in a great neighborhood. Lots of cafes,bars,supermarket are nearby. Walking distance to the train station, very convenient to everywhere. Their dog felix is a cute friend, love to play with new guests. Hope to see Naveen&Tristan again in Beijing.
Fantastic place to stay - beautiful apartment in a top location. Hosts were very accommodating Would definitely stay there again. Thanks Naveen!

Super séjour dans une chambre en hauteur avec accès à une piscine et une salle de sport au 6 ème étage!!! depuis la piscine vous pourrez voir l'opéra de Sydney!
Située au centre de Sydney nous avons pu tout visiter à pieds! plein de restaurants très bons dans la rue.
Merci beaucoup à nos hôtes, qui sont charmants, à l'image de tous les australiens!
En espérant pouvoir revenir un jour en Australie...
Nous recommandons largement la chambre de Naveen!!

The location was perfect and close to so many restaurants, cafes, and grocery store. Within walking distance to the train/bus stations and a nice walk to downtown to the Opera House and Harbour! The apartment itself is beautiful and unique! Definitely recommend this place and would stay here again! Naveen made the room very welcoming by providing us with lots of amenities and even a bottle of champagne to celebrate our honeymoon! Lots of maps and booklets available in room for those first time to Sydney.

Naveen's place was a great stop over in our trip to Australia. Our only regret is that we didn't stay longer! Great communication during the booking and Ricky was a fantastic host during our stay. Felix is a lovely little dog, very well behaved and a lot of fun to be around. Really lovely, clean, modern apartment block. I highly recommend to stay here.

We were received by Ricky, which was dog-sitting for Naveen, and he was always happy to help. 
The place is gorgeous and exactly as displayed in the pictures. Really close to King's Cross Station, where it was easy to take a train to go anywhere.
Hope we will be able to meet Naveen the next time we will be in Sydney!

We loved our stay at Naveen's apartment. It's a beautiful space in a great location, and the best coffee just a few floors down. :) The checkin couldn't have been easier and communication with Naveen was very quick. The apartment is stylishly appointed, and every little convenience considered - there was even a power adapter for international guests.

Sadly our hosts were travelling so we didn't meet them this time, but Naveen's friend Ricky was available to assist with any queries. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Naveen was very communicative, making sure I was okay with the place I was staying in and the over all accommodations all the way through until I showed up.  The location is fantastic. A bunch of awesome eateries with a stones throw and a 25 minute walk from the Circular Quay.

The apartment is a great choice if you would like to stay near the city centre located in a chic neighborhood scattered with nice little cafes.  

Ricky, our host is very friendly and helpful which made our stay very enjoyable!
The room and location were stunning. So comfy.
I had the most enjoyable early morning swim to wake me up. I felt very welcomed and would happily stay again.

A great place to stay in. Very nice apartment! Comfy bed, with a fantastic view from the room. There are nice cafes just below the apartment.

Ricky our host was friendly, and Felix (very excited dog) made our stay better :)

Recommended to stay. I would stay here again if I'm in Sydney.

Naveen and Tris have a well-appointed place in the cozy Sydney neighborhood of Darlinghurst. The area is bustling with cafes and well-rated restaurants. Naveen and Tris were attentive hosts even though they had just come home from a long trip themselves. They went out of their way to interact with us and we even stayed up late one night chatting over wine. 

The location is very close to King's Cross station which makes it a breeze to do day trips (we did Blue Mountains and Bondi) and get to/from the airport. However, the only con is that there is no direct subway line or bus to Circular Quay/the Rocks area. Walking 20min, you're in the city, but it probably took us 30-40 min to walk to the Rocks area.

Overall it was a pleasant stay!
This is obviously a great place to stay. Stunning room, comfy bed, convenient location... Naveen is very nice and friendly. The cute doggy Felix makes it even better to stay here. Very recommended !

It was a lovely experience staying at this AirBnB.  As soon as you walk in the room you are struck by the wall to wall window looking out onto the city and to the street below.  Loads of great cafes are right nearby.  Naveen and her partner (Tristen?) were wonderful and helpful.  Their dog was gorgeous!! The room was very comfortable.  As long as you sleep with the windows shut you will not get much noise (there is a fan if you need it).  We had a great time!

This is a very beautiful home and we felt very comfortable staying here. We met Naveen and Tristan as our paths crossed briefly during our stay, yet this was no hindrance and it was lovely to come and go as we pleased and still feel so welcome. 

Felix is a massive draw card (if you like dogs/animals) and was a delight to come home to each time!

The room is lovely, the bed very comfortable and the amenities well maintained. Overall it is a great example of quality Airbnb accommodation.
