Location-wise it is fabulous. Wonderfully close to many of Sydney's highlights and with instant access to great coffee, food and bars. 
It is on a main road and a stone's throw from Kings Cross, so be aware that if you are a light sleeper you will need earplugs to help reduce the noise. However, this doesn't diminish the appeal of the place but rather just something to be prepared for.

We would happily stay here again whenever we are in Sydney and highly recommend it to all fellow Airbnb-ers.
Naveen is a nice host. Her apartment located in the hart of Sydney ,is convenient for walking around the CBD. But the dog was smelled,and the room too.
6 stars from us! Thanks Naveen, Tris, and Felix. Loved your home, and your hospitality!

"Exactly what airbnb should be!" Fantastic location, only 5 mins to the city. The room and private bathroom were was amazing. Lots of places to eat out or go for a drink nearby. Great hospitality.

Thank you Naveen, Tris, and Felix.

We excellent communication right from the beginning. We arrived late on our first night but Neveen happily made alternative arrangements for our key collection. Both Neveen and Tristan were exceptional hosts, who went out of their way to make us feel welcome, right down to the last detail. They were also more than happy to point out the best local coffee and restaurants. It was an absolute pleasure staying with them and Felix was an added little treat to our stay. We highly recommend this gorgeous apartment for anyone staying in Darlinghurst.

My first trip to Sydney plus first Bnb experience were perfect thanks to Naveen and her husband Tris.  The neighborhood  was a great one where everything were so close and convenient, I actually had a number of my meals nearby and they were all very good.  The train was just 5 minutes away and we could get to almost anywhere within 40 minutes.   
Naveen and Tris are a cute couple, they were super helpful, I think I must have messaged Naveen 30 times throughout the trip asking questions from places to eat, to places to shop and visit.  They knew almost all the answers to my inquiries and on the rare occasions they would find it out for me in no time.  The main problem was not having enough time and appetite to visit all the great restaurants they recommended. 
As for the apartment, it is exactly what it looks like in the pictures, (which for me was the main reason I chose their place,) living in tiny apartments in Hong Kong, I find the place very spacious and all the necessary amenities were their for you on your arrival.  Their little pet Felix was also very friendly and is a great companion when the couple is out for work.
All in all, my first bnb experience was perfect and thanks to the couple, airbnb has a new loyal customer.

Bel appartement et bonne localisation. Très bien desservi aussi. La sdb privative est un pluS.  Un poil bruyant pour ceux qui ne sont pas habitué aux ambiances urbaines nocturnes mais rien de rédhibitoire.

lovely host, lovely house and lovely puppy~~
great geographic position and adequate sunshine~~

It's a great experience living at Naveen' s cozy apartment. Everything is as satisfying as the description and the pictures, the neighborhood, the good location and the nice apartment. Naveen and Tristan prepared some useful maps, guides and even a photography album of Kings Cross ;-) All of those what they have provided are thoughtful and sweet. And their doggy Felix is so lovely! Wish we could visit her place again.
room is amazing and hosts are great (including the lovely pet - Felix!)

Naveen and Triston were lovely hosts. The guest room is stunning!! It is very well decorated and was always kept very neat and clean. We felt super comfortable and at ease. The guest's bedroom and bathroom are upstairs so you definitely get your privacy. They prepared everything you need, shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer, towels, body wash. Location was great, easy to achieve all sights in walking distance.
A really nice room with a great view. Location was very convenient too, close to CBD and train station nearby. Naveen and Tristian were very welcoming and responsive.

Perfect location which close to the train station with nice cafe and bar nearby.

Both Neveen and Tristan are very friendly and willing to give useful advise for us when to travel around.

We would love to stay here again whenever we are in Sydney and highly recommend it to all of you.

The wonderful expenrience has made our tour Sydney a memorable one. Not only the amazing appearance of the modern apartment but also the cozy home-like atmosphere make it suitable for tourists travelling in this city. It's been surprising to find very single that may be needed durig the stay are provided and placed in immediate reach. Thanks to Naveen to make it nicely. I bet this is exactly the  accomadation everyone is looking for!

The place is exactly as what the pictures show. The dog, Felix is so friendly and would lie down besides us just taking a nap. Also the guest room is quite cozy and faces the street with a french window. Everything, shops, cafes, stations are within a couple minutes' walk. It is very convenient to get to the tourist spots. Lovely apartment! Plus: the cafe downstairs, named Latteria(if my memory serves me) is s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) nice! You shouldn't miss it!
Everything was great, lovely couple and cute dog :)

Naveen & Tristan were awesome, 
they were such great host's. 
it was our first Airbnb & recommend this for sure, you have your own  space with bedroom and bathroom, so cool!!  
loved it.
Ash&Jas

Naveen and her husband have been one of the most patient hosts we had in our trip and was also the last place we stayed in Sydney before leaving. We want to thank her graciousness and consideration towards us as we fumbled through our last few days, trying to say bye to the amazing city. Naveen and her husband were also nice enough to provide interesting guides to cafes, maps and provided a thorough walk through of the neighbourhood which incidentally is - we believe to be - one of the cooler neighborhoods if you enjoy pubbing and cafe hopping.

Her home was exactly as described in the listing if not better and wowed us the moment we entered the house. We had our own private toilet just outside our room and was delighted with how immaculately clean the it was. Our room was cozy and the mood lighting light (that amazingly has 6 colors to choose from) made the room funky yet extremely homely. The space in the room was spacious enough for two people and 3 luggages. The bed was also extremely comfortable and to top it off was provided with comfy bath slippers and robes. Her living room is definitely one to check out and her husband Tristan gladly talked to us about how the design came about.

It was a pity we did not get to try out the gym, the pool and the sauna which was literally the adjacent room from the house.

Lastly, Naveen's dog has got to be the friendliest and cutest dog we have met in our travels, being extremy warm and cuddly and perhaps only barked once throughout the entire stay to greet us when we came back. It really gave us no trouble at all despite Naveen's joke on being a threat to our shoes.

Overall, the stay was good and we would recommend the place to anyone who wants to be close to the city but yet need an affordable place to stay. 

Thanks Naveen!!

Had a lovely stay with Naveen et all. The perfect spot for access to the City, the cross and New Town. Easy to find, easy to access via the concierge service and exactly as described

Great bars and restaurants nearby and fantastic recommendations from Naveen! Both Naveen and Tristan were very welcoming and helpful from start to finish

Staying at Naveen's place was wonderful! When you arrive, you are welcomed by the very cheerful little Felix, so prepare to cuddle him! Had no problem to get from the airport to Kings Cross station and then from the station to Naveen's place, and the concierge knew I was coming, so everything went well.
The room is beautiful, the bed hard to get out of and the view amazing. Naveen gives a lot of attention to details so you will find everything you could ever need in your room. Naveen and Tristan were very nice and I enjoyed talking to them, even though I didn't see a lot of them because I had so much to do in three days.
Besides, the place is close to a lot of touristic areas. You can walk to  the museum (around 15 min if you stop at redlights, 10 min if you're not patient), Sydney tower (25 min, and you walk through a park), then continue through George Street to Circular Quay, the Opera House, and then walk through the Royal Botanical Garden to go back home. 
This place is definitly a good pick.

Fantastic apartment, super hosts and very friendly dog. The flat is well positioned for access to the trains and buses making travel to CBD easy yet far enough out of the hussle and noise for a quiet mooch around Darlinghurst and Woolamooloo.

It had been 3 wonderful nights stay at Naveen's place. The environment was very comfortable and it looked just the same as the photos shown. The view from the bedroom was absolutely brilliant, especially at night, where you could actually see stars if the sky is clear enough. Being away from home, it felt warm to be greeted by the lovely puppy, Felix. Moreover, the location is perfect as it is extremely near the Kings cross train station and only 2 stations away from the city. Would definitely recommend to friends!

Naveen's place is beautiful and very clean. She is very welcoming and was open to all of the questions we had about the city. She also had a little box filled with all sorts of toiletries for us, which we loved! The apartment itself is located near lots of restaurants and bars and it was very easy to get around the city with the train station being close by. I definitely recommend this place!

Everything is more than satisfied and amazing in Naveen and Tristan' s apartment! Me and my sister have spent three nights in their lovely home, they have prepared everything we need in our specious room as well as the private bathroom. We enjoy all the details and atmosphere, it is exactly looks the same as the photos.
The gym and swimming pool just 3 seconds from home, super convenient. There are lots of designable café and bar on the street nearby, train station just 5mins walk.
It definitely is the best choice for everyone who have a plan to stay in Sydney. Highly recommended.
Naveen's place was awesome. Near Kings Cross and in 20 min walking distance to the CBD. Having a little dog in the apartment was a nice plus :) .

This is our first Airbnb and it is definitely a wonderful experience. Location is perfect as city is just within walking distance. Naveen and Tristan are both very accommodating and responsive, and prepared all we need in the bedroom and private bathroom. Love the little cute dog Felix too!
Highly recommend this place to all of you!

What a perfect place to stay in Sydney. The room is exactly how it's pictured, so funky and modern. My partner and I stayed for two nights and we had a great time, Naveen, Tristan and Felix are very accommodating and the room is perfectly located. Will be back for sure.

The apartment is awesome and the hosts are very welcome. The view of the room is perfect and clean. The host are thoughtful and prepare many stuff that I can use.
In particularly, the dog is so....o cute and friendly.
If I have a chance to go to Sydney, I will choose this again!

We were welcomed by Felix when we arrived, check-in was easy as key was left with the concierge and Naveen was very flexible with the check in timing :)

Home is just a stone's throw away from King Cross Station, which made it very easy for us since we were departing Sydney from Naveen's place. King Cross is on a line that links to many places you'd wanna visit when in Sydney. There are also many cafes + Coles near Naveen's apartment so that's where we settled most of our breakfast + groceries.

Room + Home looked exactly like the pictures, tastefully decorated. Bed was indeed super comfortable & hard to get out of every morning.

Naveen left us with our own little space (room + bathroom) which gave us enough privacy but also helped us when we approached her for suggestions on things to do /places to visit in Sydney. 

Overall a great host & we would highly recommend this place especially for its location when you're visiting Sydney. Thanks again Naveen :)
Naveen, Trista and Felix are very nice hosts. Their apartment is lovely and just as described. Room for us is tidy and clean and we love the view of that room!

The Apartment was great, the location is ideal for sightseeing and going out. There are a lot of bars, restaurants and a great Ice cream shop nearby. The room looks like on the pictures. Naveen was very nice and check-in and out was easy.

I loved everything about Naveen and Tristan's home - amenities, decor, location and their cute puppy, Felix. 

Naveen was a great host - providing toiletries, sunscreen and aloe Vera (just in case) and even a beach bag! Both Naveen and her husband were very hospitable; offering places to go and even inviting you along for a drink. 

Their home is in a great location: close to the train station, beaches, CBD, Opera House/Harbour Bridge and fantastic cafés/restaurants.
We had a fantastic stay at Naveen's place. Everything was exactly as described and communication was very easy. Close to everything in the city and a great view from the room.

Loved the location of this place. It was very comfortable and I felt great coming home to a nice room. I appreciated having my own bathroom and access to the gym/pool/sauna, which look over the harbor. 

Hosts were helpful and the stay was easy and stress free. Would stay here again for sure.

Absolutely loved staying with Naveen! The room was incredible (even better in person), apartment was stunning and she went into every detail to make sure we had everything we could possibly need. Having our own bathroom was so convenient as well and the location was great - everything you could need was close by and the train station was a short walk. Naveen was also great help with transport & places to go and eat. Will definitely be staying again next time I'm in Sydney!

We had a great time at Naveen and Tristan's place! We arrived in the morning, and they had already left for work by the time we got to their place, but the concierge knew we were coming and everything worked out very smoothly. The room has a gorgeous view, and we woke up to a beautiful sunrise each morning. Naveen and Tristan were very friendly and gave us lots of good information about the area. Our room was well-stocked with all supplies we needed during the stay, which was very useful. It was my first Airbnb experience and it was definitely a good one! Oh, and their dog, Felix, is an awesome little buddy who loves to just sit next to you and snuggle.
我们在这里住了两晚,男主人非常友善｡房东的作息规律,所以晚上整个屋子都很安静｡卧室和卫生间干净,步行至city需要20分钟｡
The room was very clean and they had a nice set of clean towels on the bed when we arrived. The view was amazing and the concierge was incredibly helpful.
I like everything in the house: the design, color, the lovely dog!  Naveen and her husband are very friendly !

This apartment/room is a great place to stay in Sydney for the solo traveler or for couples.  It's a 5 min walk from the Kings Cross subway station.  The neighborhood has a bunch of great bars and restaurants.  It's centrally located and you can easily walk to many parts of the city.  If you are a light sleeper (I am not) then the street noise could be a bit bothersome on a Friday or Saturday night because the windows are single-paned (I did not have any problems with the street noise), but otherwise the accommodations are exactly as described and shown.  Comfortable bed, private bathroom, workout room and pool on the same floor.  Staying at this place felt like staying at a nice hotel in many ways.  Naveen and Tristan's wifi signal is strong and fast.  They provide soap, tea and fresh towels in your room should you need those things.  You can come and go as you please and Naveen and Tristan are a wonderful couple and excellent hosts.  They are easy to talk to and they offered many good suggestions about restaurants, bars, and sites to see (thank you for the Lil' Darling and ferry to Manly Beach recommendations!).  Naveen even graciously invited me to dinner with her friends; who were just as enjoyable to talk to as N & T.  And for dog lovers, little Felix will warm your heart.  I would absolutely recommend this room to a friend or any person looking to stay in the heart of Sydney with three wonderful and interesting hosts.

Naveen and Tristan were absolutely wonderful hosts (as was Felix - who is adorable and cuddly).  The room and amenities were even better than I expected, and I would whole-heartedly recommend this listing.  The location was perfect for quickly getting to Sydney's hot spots, and the local restaurants and coffee shops were a delight to wake up to every day.  Even the concierge/doorman went out of his way to be accommodating in any way possible.  If you are considering staying with Naveen, book it now.  You won't regret it.

Absolutely ideal. Amazing location, STUNNING home, hospitable hosts, staggering view from the room! Can not fault this experience, whatsoever. Super cute puppy, too! Thank you very much, Naveen. I'll be back.
Nice home in a great location.

The room had all the facilities needed and the location was superb. Being a busy street, it can get a little noisy at nights. In the mornings, there are many cafes right across the street and even sightseeing spots with museums and cathedrals nearby.
Nice room with spectacular view. You get what you see from the photos. Cute dog - Felix.

Naveen and Tristan were great hosts from start to finish. Though we didn't cross paths much, my partner and I felt really welcomed and looked after through our week.
Upon arrival, we were greeted by Tristan and the lovely puppy Felix. Tristan was sure to give us advice and recommendations for the local attractions and where was best to set up our banking and mobile networks. This was really helpful to us.

The room itself was perfect, fit with a very comfortable double bed, a huge window looking out onto the neighbourhood, and all the amenities we could possibly need.

I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to explore Sydney and the surrounding areas, real value for money.

Our stay was fantastic, the room and bathroom were private and extremely clean and comfortable. The location is only a min from the train station and centrally located to bars, cafe's and restaurants.  Our stay was completely hassle free and very convenient.

Naveen and Tristan have a great airbnb setup perfect for someone who just needs a place to stay close to the city. They prefer guests don't use the public spaces or kitchen which is fine however wasn't mentioned before booking. 
They've thought of everything else one might need, we appreciated the beach bag tremendously! 
Would definitely recommend for people who travel independently.

Extremely assisting host we arrived early morning after an overnight flight and we were welcomed to the unit
Great room with private bathroom and a very friendly felix the dog
Building has own gym and pool if inclined to use
Great location on the edge of the cross with many cafes in the same street  5  minutes to the station for easy access to the  city

Great spread in a lively neighborhood. Walking distance to train and myriad bars/restaurants. I've been to Sydney 10 times, but somehow never visited Darlinghurst till now. (Thanks, Airbnb!) Naveen could not have been more accommodating--she even helped me sort out the train times for my pre-dawn airport schlep. Will return!

Thanks for taking us in on such short notice! We stayed just one night and it was a great experience overall. The bedroom and bathroom were very clean. Naveen is extremely organised and thoughtful, providing a number of things for guests to use from bathrobes to a beach bag to quality bath products to a candle and mood lighting. A unique room with floor to ceiling window overlooking the street. And a gym, sauna and pool! (Be sure to check out the view from the pool). Naveen was flexible with our requests, including a late check-out, and check-in was easy - they have a concierge desk where we picked up the keys as they were not home when we checked in. Tristan is also a great guy. One thing to beware of is that you may be tempted to steal their dog Felix - friendliest dog ever! Only thing to note is that the downstairs kitchen, living area and balcony are off limits so it's just the room and bathroom - kind of like a hotel set-up, but the location is extremely convenient with lots of cafes, supermarket, bakery, juice place etc. all very close by :-)
Great room in a great location, can't recommend this highly enough. Naveen and Tristan were fantastic hosts. I would recommend you book with them.

Great location with cafes, bars & restaurants right on your doorstep. Very convenient apartment with room & bathroom next to each other. Arriving late was no problem and convenient access via concierge. Highly recommend for a business traveller. Felix the friendly dog came to say hello in the morning which was a nice reminder of home.
Naveen's place was clean and nice, conviently located near the train station. Naveen and Tristan were lovely hosts and their dog, Felix, is a delight too. Great stay!

We had a great time staying with Naveen and Tristan. Their place is in a great location to eat or drink in Darlinghurst or to explore the city. They gave us great recommendations on ways to get around, where to eat and to shop. We would definitely stay with them again!

Fantastic clean apartment and great hosts! The room has an amazing view of the neighbourhood and sunrise. Naveen, Tristan & especially Felix were very welcoming, helping us out with local info and towels for the beach. The location is perfect for exploring sydney and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

We LOVED staying with Naveen and Tristan! They have an amazing home in an ideal spot for exploring the city. They provide so many great added extras like a beach bag and bath robes.... you wouldn't even get that in hotels! The sauna and pool were great to relax in every afternoon and they have the cutest dog who is super friendly. Thanks for being so warm and friendly, you really made us feel at home:)
Fabulous apartment & fabulous hosts! Look forward to staying here again!!!

The room was incredible. The wall to wall glass panorama view of Darlinghurst was beyond compare and looking out at that view each night before bed was a joy beyond compare. I really appreciated having a bathroom to myself and the amenities provided by the hosts were perfect. I especially appreciated the filtered water in the room after a long afternoon walking around the city. The room was large and spacious and access to wifi, fresh towels, cups and a pedestal fan for when the room got too hot really made it feel like home and made it easy to settle in. Overall, this was an amazing place to stay. I have no complaints.
Naveen apartment is very nice! Very well decorated and walking distance from everything. They have been very gentle and helpful to us. We miss Felix a lot!!! He is a very friendly and beautiful dog!

My experience at Naveen's place was the best I've had with Airbnb, from making the booking to checking out! The place was clean, spacious and tidy, provided with more than just the essentials! The location was amazing with everything you need at your doorstep from grocers to cafes, bakeries, restaurants and more.
Not only was Naveen well organised but her communication was flawless which made the whole experience easy, comfortable and memorable. We initially booked for Saturday to Monday but ended up extending another night and checking out Tuesday evening. She was really accommodating considering my friend had a late flight and even let us check out at a time suitable to us even upon a late request. Checking in and out was a breeze! We had no issues with anything whatsoever!
Being able to catch Naveen and Tristan, though briefly as they are very busy, made it even more pleasurable! I highly recommend this place and will definitely book again!

Excelente cuarto, tenia todo lo que esperábamos y hasta mas. La ubicación del departamento es excelente, tiene cerca varias paradas de buses y la estación del tren, también esta rodeado de excelente restaurantes y cafés. El departamento es increíble y aunque nos vimos poco con Naveen y Tristan siempre nos hicieron sentir como en casa, Felix salía a despedirnos todos los días y siempre nos recibía de la mejor manera, es un perro muy simpático.

Naveen is so considerate and helpful. It is really a nice experience while staying here,enjoying the lifestyle of them. The room is tiny n clean,and what surprised us most is the puppy FELIX! Love here and I will be sure of coming back again

Great communication with Naveen beforehand, felt very welcome & good quality inclusions with our stay!!! Fantastic neighbourhood, cafes galore at our doorstep & reasonably priced parking nearby. Good private room & bathroom with toiletries supplied & Naveen was very friendly. 
We come from the country so the road noise of the inner city was noticeable but if you are used to a bit of city buzz noise at night it's fine!!

Naveen was a lovely host and her puppy was adorable! The room has a stunning view, the facilities were clean, easy check in/out, great location and overall I was super happy. Can't wait to come back again :)
Naveen is friendly and professional. The room is private and the location is great for exploring Sydney. I would recommend it.

Amazing. Private room with everything you would need and more. Naveen and Tristen are both super sweet. They treat you like you're one of their own guests and genuinely make you feel like that. I highly recommend!

It is my first time been to Sydney. Everything just wonderful really good start from this apt, just my journey really comfortable and really just like wifi name there is no place like home ,the renovation is totally my dish. It's just so good , and so many nice details , opal cards  food and travel guide tea coffee shampoo everything I need here , and when I was in the name. Navieen walks like a cat try not make any noises on the staircase  which it's really make me feel touched. Love it. Was going to book another 3days when I back in Sydney , but all booked out this month. But when I have a chance. I need to go back here play with Felix have a nice sleep!

The room was great, exactly as it was described.
Naveen had everything set up for a great stay. The room had an amazing view towards the ocean (you can't see it, but amazing views of the sunrise and sundown).

Best local tip - drink coffee and eat breakfast everyday across the street at LATTERIA - get to know the locals!

I had a LOVELY time staying here! We kept to ourselves in the private room which overlooked the city.

The coffee machine was an awesome touch and we felt very welcomed the entire time. Looking forward to staying again!
Lovely room, view and a great way to wake up with a full floor to ceiling window facing East! Naveen & her partner are wonderful, friendly hosts!
Great location in the center of the city. Awesome views and a cute puppy. What more could you want? Thanks again Naveen!

Stayed for my second time with Naveen, this time shorter but just as lovely as the first!

We first visited her for the location and keep going back for the amazing vibe and also Felix. Looking forward to future visits too!
Fantastic location to explore Sydney... thanks Naveen for all your recommendations and making us feel welcome. Loved being so close to the sauna!. Cheers Heather

Naveen's place was amazing and the room had a beautiful outlook with one of the comfiest beds I have ever had the privilege to sleep in!

Would happily book again next Sydney trip!

We had a great stay and was made very welcome . The stunning room was excellent and more than we expected. 
Naveen's place was 100% accurate to profile description. The place has a chilled & relaxed vibe to it. It is well presented, clean and thoughtful too.
Thank you
Sophie&Vincent
Lovely place, great area! Will be staying here again :)
We felt right at home in Naveen's place and they were very welcoming. As expected the room was fantastic and she had supplied everything we needed and more! We really enjoyed our stay :)

There are a lot of amenities there. I really like soap and body balm. I think the room is alittle bit cold but there is a heater, tea and coffee for you.

Regarding the location, it is not far away fron CBD. You have to take a bus or the train. During this period, it has some construction. So, you may use the replacement bus or taxi to Naveen' home.

Last but not least, I am really impress the view of Darlinghurst from our room.

My sister and I stayed here and loooved it. The view from the room was incredible. And it is so close to the station and surrounding cafes and restaurants. Super easy to get around the city from here too. Naveen and Tristan were incredibly accommodating; answering all of our questions promptly prior to arriving and welcoming us warmly when we final arrived late at night. Their little puppy was so cute and loving! We really enjoyed staying here and it would definitely be our first choice for next time we come to Sydney!

This is a beautiful room in a great location! The views can't be beat and the bed is so comfy. 

Most importantly, Naveen and Tristan were kind a gracious hosts. They had great food recommendations in the area, Naveen outlined a lovely long day trip for me to take (in detail!), and I was messaging her every 5 minutes with questions which she answered promptly and kindly. 

She even invited me to the markets with her and arranged for me to take a free yoga class in her studio (unfortunately I couldn't make it to either bc I got a bit sick)

I'd definitely recommend this place and/or stay there again.
Perfect stay, friendly hosts, lovely bedroom and well located. I highly recommend it!
We really enjoy our stay at Naveen's home,the stunning room is amazing!! the room is clean and bright,has everything we need. Naveen is also very nice and friendly.

The room really has a great view and the location is perfect. 
But we were not really impressed since it was fairly dirty (dog hair in the room, on the bed, hair in the sink, dust) which just didn't fit the to the otherwise very modern place. 
Then what I found most random and I have stayed at many many airbnb, that 6 out of 8 pictures of the place are of parts which you never going to see. Its totally alright to say "we do not share kitchen and living room" and the apartment is perfect for that since you have your own space upstairs but why advertise then with all these pictures? I think that is a bit misleading. 
Otherwise it's a great place but needs some improvements again after a high number of guests.
The best place with amazing view. Thx for preparing a lots of staff in the room. Wanna back again:)
5 star hotel room! Don ' t miss it!

The best parts about Naveen's place was, for me, the location and the wonderful view. It's near everything and there is lots of great eating around. The floor-to-ceiling window gives a lovely view of the neighborhood. The place seems very popular, so check in and out might be a bit less flexible than other air b'n'bs, but communication was great and everyone (including the pup!) was very nice.

This was perfect for my short weekend stay in Sydney. Comfortable, really conveniently located, and check in/check out was a breeze. It's a lively neighborhood, so, expect a little street noise. Would definitely stay again, thanks!
Naveen was very hospitable, the description as listed is spot on and the location was very close to downtown and a close walk to the pier, Harbor bridge and Opera house.
It is just the way it is at the picture and felix is the goddest little cute creature.
房间超级明亮!床前就是大落地窗!!房东住在楼下所以不会互相打扰到,狗狗很可爱喜欢舔我的手,楼下客厅设计也很棒,有机会还会再来!
Great area to stay in Sydney! Loved the open windows in the bedroom.

I had a fantastic stay at Naveed's home. The room was exactly as it looks on the picture, with a stunning view. Very comfortable bed. The location is excellent as well and allows you to explore the inner city of Sydney by foot.

I have spent 3 nights at the room.
Overall I has a very good experiance. The room looks just as advertised. It's big enough, view is great and I found the neighborhood great to grab a meal when coming back in the evening. Location is nice as well.

I had a lot of privacy during my stay. Naveen and Tristan where away for the most part and when they are in, they are usually hanging out in the leaving room down stairs. 

The building is a bit on the fancy side with a concierge downstairs (which kept an eye on my language during the last day) and a swimming pool and a gym with a fantastic view of the harbor and opera house.
Really enjoyed my stay, great location and lovely bedroom, would definitely recommend!

Great location in Darlinghurst. Super close to Kings Cross station. Didn't get a chance to meet Naveen as we were hardly around but she was really helpful via message beforehand. Everything was in place for us. Felix is a total sweetheart and we miss him already! Will definitely stay again when in Sydney.

Great stay in Sydney and couldn't be happier with the acomodations. Even though this was a shared rental, it felt incredibly private. Upon showing up accessing the unit was super easy, and everything a hotel would provide for was provided by this rental. Overall very happy with the experience and would stay again!

name: Sydney City Apartment  Petersham
space: Hi, my kids are now grown and living on their own so I am keen to share my Sydney apartment. It is located parkside in Petersham with a great view of the surrounding area and City Skyline. It is a modern, bright large split level space, with living areas upstairs and 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2  veranda's downstairs. The complex has a lift and is security coded. There are 2 train stations and a bus stop within 5 minutes walk. all of which are 10 minutes from the centre of the City. It is an easy walk to the restaurants and cafes of eclectic  Newtown or the sensational tastes of little Portugal in Petersham and little Italy in Leichhardt. Bookshops, curios and arthouse theatres are all in walking distance. Your accommodation is a large well appointed air-conditioned bedroom, complete with a new Queen size bed, beautiful linens, wardrobe space with generous mirrors.Your room opens onto a private balcony where you can enjoy your morning coffee. You will have your own newly renovated ele
description: Hi, my kids are now grown and living on their own so I am keen to share my Sydney apartment. It is located parkside in Petersham with a great view of the surrounding area and City Skyline. It is a modern, bright large split level space, with living areas upstairs and 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2  veranda's downstairs. The complex has a lift and is security coded. There are 2 train stations and a bus stop within 5 minutes walk. all of which are 10 minutes from the centre of the City. It is an easy walk to the restaurants and cafes of eclectic  Newtown or the sensational tastes of little Portugal in Petersham and little Italy in Leichhardt. Bookshops, curios and arthouse theatres are all in walking distance. Your accommodation is a large well appointed air-conditioned bedroom, complete with a new Queen size bed, beautiful linens, wardrobe space with generous mirrors.Your room opens onto a private balcony where you can enjoy your morning coffee. You will have your own newly renovated ele
access: I provide generous breakfast provisions  for guests to prepare at their leisure ..for other meals I can make recommendations for any type of budget or style of cuisine locally. The washer and dryer are always available to use and wifi is included.
interaction: Happy to share a chat over a wine in the evenings or leave guests to discover the City in their own time. I work full time close by and am generally home in the evenings.
house_rules: No Smoking

host.host_about:
Hi, I'm in my early 50's and enjoy meeting people. I love my home and enjoy entertaining when time permits. I am an avid reader and movie goer and enjoy trying new local restaurants. I spend the weekends at markets, the movies or with friends sharing a meal.
I'm hoping to travel a lot more in the next few years and I'm keen to hear of other peoples travel experiences.

reviews.comments: Stayed with Kerri as we needed somewhere close to the family (who have grown too much to fit us into their small house). Beautiful apartment and a lovely bedroom and bathroom for our use.  Kerri is a great host and a really nice person - with excellent taste.  We'd be happy to recommend her place to anyone and be happy to stay there again.

Rather than an awesome room, Kerri was really an amazing host, very supportive and sociable. 
I enjoyed staying with her, it was a nice experience.  She would never hesitate to answer any question or even to offer any kind help.

The flat is as per the pictures: decorated with taste, offers nice spaces and is very clean. The room is very pretty and the double bed has a super comfy matress- good sleep guaranteed. It was also much appreciable to have a own bathroom&toilets.
Kerri is welcoming and communicating with her was easy (i needed a room for the following day and she replied straight away). I felt comfortable as soon as I arrived, she is such a nice and warm person.
Moreover she is full of attention, I did not stay long but the bathroom had been cleaned and new fresh towels provided. It was no problem to use the washing machine (There is a tumble dryer, but also the possibility to have the clothes dry on the balcony). Just felt like home.
In short, a quality and easy stay with a fantastic host. I highly recommend anybody to stay at this place.
Kerri, I will remember the discussion we had around a glass of wine! Thanks for having hosted me.

l'hôtesse très sympathique , accueillante, serviable,  nous a fait découvrir la ville et les environs le jour de notre arrivée, l'appartement est confortable, propre et bien décoré, le petit déjeûner copieux, nous avons eu le plaisir de voir avec Kerri le feu d'artifice du 31/12/12 sur sa terrasse ;nous sommes très heureux de l'avoir connue Katia et Pierre

It was a great pleasure to stay in Kerri's house. Everything looked like on the picture. The flat was very tidy and clean. Kerri is a kind, open and helpful person and she knows a lot about the life and the world which means you can have very good discussions with her. I will never forget my stay and I can highly recommend to everyone to stay in Kerri's house!
Kerri's apartment in Petersham was comfortable and convienient for our stay in Sydney. Everything was beautifully presented and the bed was very comfy!  We would stay again.

Staying with Kerri was my first airbnb experience and it could not have been better. Right from the moment I made the reservation, Kerri welcomed me with an offer of directions, which as it turned out I didn't need as her place was very easy to find. The apartment is beautiful and comfortable with much attention to detail. I was given a great bedroom with a very comfy bed and had my own beautifully appointed private bathroom. The place had the feel of a five star hotel, but with the added bonus of Kerri's friendliness. Immediately downstairs is a very cool cafe serving awesome breakfasts, so I ended up passing up the generous continental style breakfast that Kerri had offered me. The apartment location is perfect, as just down the road is the lively area of Newtown with its many bars and restaurants. I highly recommend staying with Kerri and look forward myself to staying there again in the future.
Perfect host, perfect house and perfect cat! I would stay with Kerri without hesitation. Clean, tidy, modern, friendly, welcoming and relaxed. Perfect!

Kerri hosted my Mother In Law while we had an overflow of guests in our house. We couldn't have asked for a more perfect experience than she got with Kerri. The apartment is like an immaculate hotel, with a very good sized bedroom and uber-modern bathroom for my MIL. Kerri was the perfect host and friend to my MIL, sharing movies, wine, stories and friends with her. Can't quite believe how perfectly it all worked out. Thanks so much Kerri!

Loved the stay at Kerri's place. Beautifully appointed and fantastic location. The view from the apartment was incredible. Great also having a cool little caf right alongside a gorgeous park. Thanks Kerri for providing a high quality bnb stay. It was really appreciated.

Staying at Kerri's was my first experience with Airbnb. It completely exceeded my expectations! I had such a fabulous experience thanks to Kerri. Her home is beautifully decorated and quite comfortable. I immediately felt right at home. Kerri couldn't have been more gracious. She is a very bright, fun-loving person and she made my stay in Sydney very special. I highly recommend staying at Kerri's place!
Second time staying with Kerri. What can I say? Best place to stay in the Sydney area. Not only is this a comfortable, clean home, Kerri is the best host EVER! Absolutely loved my stay here!

It was great pleasureto stay with Kerry.We felt as we were in our home.Kerry was supportive,friendly,kind and lovely.Her home was not less than what has been shown in the pics.You get all appliances and amenities without trouble.We loved our stay too much amd highly recommend it to anyone.A+++++:)

We are an elderly couple (but not old) from Finland visiting Australia and Sydney for the first time. Staying in Kerris place was also our first airbnb experiance and it is hard to imagine any better place and host for us. We were so pleased and happy all the time, 8 days. It was easy to use public transportation from Stanmore railwaystation. We used everything train, bus, ferry and even light rail. Kerris home is beautyfully furnished, just for our taste. And she had everything in order, very tidy, very organized. We had a very good brekfast and we even enjoyed two dinners with Kerri. Kerri helped us in every way even when we had some problems. We felt like we had visited a good friend. We can warmly suggest Kerris home for everyone. If we ever come to Sydney again we will try to meet Kerri again.
Kerri was a wonderful, very friendly host. The apartment was spotlessly clean and the bed very comfy.

I visit Sydney for work a few times a year and previously have stayed in motels. It is extremely difficult and expensive to find anything close to the city. So I thought I'd give airbnb a try and Kerri's place looked and sounded great. 

I was really pleased to have found Kerri's lovely apartment. Very comfortable and well designed and Kerri is the perfect host: even cooked me a lovely meal when I arrived and provided secure parking for my car. Kerri is very friendly and easy-going and you quickly feel like you're staying at an old friends house.

Thanks Kerri. I'm sure I'll be looking to stay again on future trips to Sydney

Kerri is a wonderful host, she made me feel very welcome and comfortable in her beautifully decorated and clean apartment. 
Kerri is very accommodating and thoughtful and would totally recommend staying at her lovely home.

I had an amazing stay with Kerri. She has a beautiful place that is walking distance from Newtown, a hip neighbourhood where you can spend many hours wandering and discovering quaint shops. Kerri is very hospitable, she picked me up at the train station, and made me feel right at home. The room and the apartment overall are out of a design magazine. Beautifully done. Thanks Kerri!
Staying with Kerri in Sydney was wonderful!  She is a lovely hostess whose home is beautiful and comfortable.  Indeed it was my very best Airbnb experience and I have use these listings many times!

We had a wonderful stay in Kerri s home. She is a great host, all the comments so far speak for themselves. Great location close to the city and the airport, nice neighborhood, wonderful Appartement, everything clean, you'll have your own bathroom. It was perfect for our stay. Kerri responds quickly and was really trying to make everything work out for us. Recommended to everyone.
Kerri was an amazing host! She immediately made us feel right at home and treated us like family. I highly recommend her very nice apt for anyone wanting to stay in a central area in Sydney.
Kerrie is a wonderful host, could not have asked for better. Beautiful apartment, very clean and great to have your own ensuite. Would love to come and stay again one day!
We've stayed a few times with Kerri.  She's a great host and her apartment is lovely.  We're happy to recommend and look forward to our next visit.

Kerri's place was conveniently situated only about 20 minutes walk to theatres and restaurants in Newtown and about 20 mins drive to the airport for Saturday morning pick up. The bed was very comfortable, lovely bathroom and living area and Kerri was a helpful host. Being under the flight path was a novelty for our very short stay (and no planes overnight). However, the traffic noise from the busy main road was a bit of a problem for us and woke us up early. Although for convenience of location I would consider staying there again.
Kerri is a very nice person and a great host. The location was simply perfect for me…everything was how Kerri descried. I can recommend Kerri.

Great host, great time!! We really enjoyed our stay in Petersham, we discovered Sydney by train and bus - erverything close by. Kerry gave us a lot of brilliant tips and made us feeling like home. Thanks for everything, looking foreward to see you again, Thomas and Margarteha from Germany

Kerri was the perfect host kind and couldn't do enough for us we felt like part of the family .
The apartment was gorgeous  and central to railway and shops our bed was very comfortable and ensuite  was nice and fresh and recently renovated .
We enjoyed our stay in Sydney and will come back and hopefully come and stay with Kerri again .
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is everything you would want, clean, well designed and close to shops, cafes and train.  Kerri is a very gracious and friendly host, we enjoyed our stay and would most certainly come again.  Thanks Kerri!

Kerri's was a lovely place to stay and she was both friendly and helpful too. It was only a short 15 minute train ride to the centre of Sydney so with a my multipass it was easy.

Listen to kerri's hints and tips as Watson's bay was truly fabulous.

I arrived at Kerri's place, and thought, Hmmm...when can I move in? This is a fabulous apartment, and Kerri is a generous, thoughtful host who contributed a great deal to making my stay in Sydney very enjoyable indeed. Plus, we had a lot in common, which made for some lovely conversations! I would heartily recommend this place to travelers seeking a fine welcome in a beautiful apartment. Only word of note: if you're someone who needs absolute quiet, it's a bit noisy on weekday mornings (not weekends, which are much quieter).
Another great stay with Kerri, room lovely as always.
Kerri was very nice and accommodating. Unfortunately I was unable to stay last omits but she was a pleasure to communicate with and will definitely be a place for next time! Thanks Kerri!

A wonderful first AirBNB experience for us. A beautiful welcoming home with charming decorations and Kerri is an excellent host. She greeted us with a glass of wine and gave us good advice on trains and where to eat.  We slept in a comfortable big bedroom with good lighting and elegant furnishings. Will stay there again.

My husband and I spent four nights at Kerris.The accomodation was great,lovely bedroom and bathroom,clean and uncluttered.Kerri was a warm and friendly host and very welcoming- nothing was too much trouble.The location is fabulous,cafés and transport on the doorstep.Even the cat was friendly.

Our first australian experience was at Kerri's home. The place is located at 20 min from CBD and 2 train-stations from a vibrant and colorful place called Newton. Kerri has been more than helpful, provinding us with usefull and detailed information about Sydney and its surbubs, places of interest and much more. Everything was exactly as described. We are really looking forward to spending some more time in her apartment in a fortnight.

Kerri is a wonderful host! She is warm, friendly and helpful. She even drove us around to visit Sydney. Her apartment is nice and spacious enough to enjoy a comfortable stay. The location is on walking distance to public transportation. 
If we are ever back in Sydney, we would have no hesitation to stay with Kerri again. Highly recommend! 
Thanks for a great stay !
Kerri was the most wonderful and accommodating host I could of wished for.
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Kerri’s place and Kerrie are special, even better than the pictures.  I selected Kerri’s accommodation for ease of commuting by train and the beautiful décor.  I balked at the prospect of hauling all my luggage up a slight hill to her place, and Kerri cheerfully was at the Petersham station in 5 minutes on a Saturday afternoon to drive me to her apartment.  I found the Stanmore Station (less than a 15 minute walk past some nice houses) easier, and walked it at night and felt safe.  I was at Kerri’s for a demanding conference, and being at her place was like a relaxing resort.  The home ambiance is so beautiful and the plant and sun make it a very special home away from home.  Some of the memorable touches:  really soft sheets, a well-appointed private bathroom, a friendly cat, the self-serve breakfast of fruit/cereal/yogurt laid out in the morning (one morning she left eggs and a tomato with a pan and spatula too), the plants and view from the veranda where I ate and read, and the lovely decorations from her travels.  There’s also a nice, upscale grocery just down the street.  We didn’t see too much of each other, and the lengthiest time we spent was when Kerri generously took me to my rental car office in Mascot near the airport.   Kerri’s friendly and adaptable when you have odd plans like I did.  It was a treat to stay here!
Great place and a lovey apartment! Highly recommended! I would definitely stay here again in Sydney!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Kerri's place. She is a wonderful host and very welcoming. There was a delicious cooked dinner on my arrival and a lovely Breakfast laid out for me to help myself in the morning. I enjoyed sitting on the spacious balcony looking back towards Sydney. The whole place is very clean. The bedroom is spacious and the bed very comfortable. I enjoyed my own bathroom with plenty of fresh towels. Kerry's place is a lovely peaceful home away from home.  I would come back anytime I am in Sydney. Thank you very much Kerri.

Staying at Kerri's place was absolutely wonderful! Kerri is an awesome host, very friendly, warm, welcoming and great to talk to. She always ensured I was comfortable and even drove me to the next place I was staying in Dulwich Hill. A lovely breakfast of fruit, cereal and yoghurt was laid out for me to help myself every morning and Kerri made a yummy cooked breakfast for me on my last morning. I also enjoyed dinner a couple of times with Kerri which was great, she is a fantastic cook! The room was lovely, clean, really nicely decorated and with its own modern bathroom. I also loved the chocolates! Wish I could have stayed longer, I would definitely stay again. Thanks Kerri!

Kerri was very welcoming for minute one,the apartment is lovely & nothing is to much for kerri,she always helps & advises which is a great help,kerri joined me & my family for dinner out one evening which says how easy a person she is to get on with,I fully recommend a stay here & will defiantly stay here again when I come back to Sydney

My 2 nd stay in the space of 2 weeks this time for 7 days,another pleasant experience,no probs just left to do my own thing,kerri was always there for advice of places to see & things to do.the apartment is a fab place to stay & a steak in the newington hotel opposite is a must.
Fab host def recommend

Our first ever Airbnb experience was just perfect.  Kerri is a lovely host, the apartment is very stylish and we had a yummy breakfast too.  We couldn't have asked for anymore.  Kerri was very efficient from the first point of contact and we were made to feel very welcome.  She gave really good restaurant recommendations which is always nice when staying in a new area.  The train station is close so  it made everything accessible.  We will definitely stay here again.

Had a great stay with Kerry who is a wonderful host. The location is excellent, just a short walk to Stanmore or Petersham stations with quick trips to the city and airport. 
Kerry's home is very clean and well laid out with plenty of privacy and your own bathroom. A great video and book library, beautiful deck area for meals and just relaxing...what more could you need? 
Breakfast was laid out and Kerry even cooked me a meal on arrival and picked me up from my daughters place. A wonderful host, beautiful home..... I'll be back!   Thank you so much Kerry
Another great stay. Thanks for looking after us again.

We had really good time in this beautiful house. The pillows, sheets and towels are clean and smell good. Its location is good. We walked less than 10 mins from Petersham station. The host prepared some fresh fruits, milk and toast for us for breakfast and we liked it very much. We will choose here to stay if we come Australlia again.

It was the 3rd time we stayed at Kerri’s place and it was as perfect as the 1st time.
The room is nicely decorated and big enough for accommodate comfortably 2 people and the bathroom next door was for our private use only. 
Kerri is a very communicative and interesting person, always ready for a chat and a glass of wine on the terrace or in the large living area.
The apartment is well located, on walking distance from Stanmore train station, which is at about 20 min from CBD.
I would recommend this place without hesitation to anyone who is looking for a comfy stay in Sydney.

We stayed with Kerri after we had moved house and before flying to Europe for a holiday and it was exactly what we needed! Kerri is a lovely, thoughtful host, offering us breakfast for the morning and making sure we were comfortable. Her place is really lovely, the bed is very comfy and the shower is the best! It's also very conveniently located to the cafes, shopping and nightspots of Newtown and Enmore, with the city a short train ride away. I would highly recommend Kerri's to others looking for a Sydney stay.

It was very fun to stay at Kerri place, Very nice house, to share time talking at night with Kerri on her balcony with wine was just perfect and lovely. Kerri make you feeling at home. She also help me to be able to find the way to see the koala refuge. Thanks Kerri, for sure if I have the chance to go to Sydney again I will ask you if a can stay at your place again.

This is the second time I've stayed at Kerri's place.  Kerri is a friendly and generous host who takes great care with the appearance of her beautiful home.  Easy to organise a check-in time.  Handy location only a 5 minute walk to Petersham station.   Good value.
Kerri is a fantastic host and I truly enjoyed my visit. I would recommend Kerri and her apartment to anyone.
Kerri is a wonderful host and I always thoroughly enjoy her hospitality and friendliness. Cheers Lynette
Clean and comfortable room, renovated apartment in modern style, excellent balcony space.

Excellent and friendly host with a beautiful apartment and excellent room and bathroom. Recommend to anyone looking for a clean, neat and well maintained apartment in a good neighbourhood for shops, restaurants, public transport.
Excellent host. Fantastic property. Clean and beautifully appointed. Handy for public transport & shops.

We had a wonderful time staying with Kerri for almost three weeks.  She is a fantastic host and made us feel truly welcome in her lovely home.  We especially enjoyed the delicious fresh fruit salad prepared freshly every day to accompany breakfast.  The property is only a few minutes away from the train station, just 15 mins to the centre of the city, ideal for Sydney sightseeing.  Newtown, with its vibrant shops and estaurants is just a short walk away which was excellent for us as we became regular visitors to the Cow and Moon (voted best ice cream in the world).  We have no hesitation recommending Kerri and will definitely stay again when we next return to Australia.

Beautiful apartment with a great balcony looking out to the lights of the city , where we enjoyed one or two wines . Kerri's hospitality was outstanding.Very close to the train station,take aways,restaurants.   This will be my first choice of accommodation when I next visit Sydney .

Kerri was such a welcoming and friendly host who went out of her way to ensure my stay was comfortable. The apartment was immaculate, the bedroom spacious and the facilities modern. The location was perfect, with everything I needed within walking distance. For my first airbnb experience it was perfect, would highly recommend and will be staying there again!

What a pleasant surprise after a string of "less than expected" experiences on air BnB.    

The secure parking and lifts are just the beginning.  Kerri has created a delightfully modern and stylish home that lends itself to being shared.   Truly tasteful and functional bathroom, and it was all mine.  It all continues upstairs with the perfect kitchen, a sun filled dining and lounge area, flowing  out onto large private deck with views of a vast city skyline, including the harbour bridge, which is probably ten kilometres  away.   Truly magnificent.  Yes there are some big noises from the road out front  and the jumbo jets above, but it really isn't a problem.  Kerri loves this space and who wouldn't.

Kerri's apartment is in a very handy location to restaurants,shops and trains. Easy to get into the city. Great views from the balcony.  Kerri's hospitality is outstanding . I had a wonderful time . Thank you.

name: Entire 2 bdrm/2 bth UWS/RiversdePrk
summary: Spacious 2bd/2bth apt convenient to Riverside Prk, Columbia and UWS restaurants/subways. Conviences include wifi, plenty of closet space, quiet street, 2 X cable tv's. Close to Zabars-Fairway, and Citarella. Bedrooms have 2 queen szd beds. LR has SS.
space: Truly homey safe neighborhood apartment with cable tv, washer dryer, inbuilding laundry, wifi internet access, plenty of closet space, modest kitchen. Guests have access to entire apartment and all the amenities. I will be reachable by cell. The building is right across from the Joan of Arc small park. This is a great place to have coffee outside. Riverside Park is a block away for biking, jogging and exploring the beautiful Hudson River/green necklace. The 1,2,3 are wo blocks away. The buses run north and south on Broadway and Riverside. The location is within walking distance to Columbia University and a subway stop to Lincoln Center.
description: Spacious 2bd/2bth apt convenient to Riverside Prk, Columbia and UWS restaurants/subways. Conviences include wifi, plenty of closet space, quiet street, 2 X cable tv's. Close to Zabars-Fairway, and Citarella. Bedrooms have 2 queen szd beds. LR has SS. Truly homey safe neighborhood apartment with cable tv, washer dryer, inbuilding laundry, wifi internet access, plenty of closet space, modest kitchen. Guests have access to entire apartment and all the amenities. I will be reachable by cell. The building is right across from the Joan of Arc small park. This is a great place to have coffee outside. Riverside Park is a block away for biking, jogging and exploring the beautiful Hudson River/green necklace. The 1,2,3 are wo blocks away. The buses run north and south on Broadway and Riverside. The location is within walking distance to Columbia University and a subway stop to Lincoln Center. I generally am a couple of blocks away  when guests are staying in the apartment. Guests can take advant
transit: Guests can take advantage of the 2, 3, and 1 subway lines. There is also a bus for the cross town requirements and the 104 for north south travel.
interaction: I generally am a couple of blocks away  when guests are staying in the apartment.
house_rules: This is a very neighborhoody building so no parties allowed. I prefer extended rentals such as for the whole summer including June , July and August. And quiet time after 10:00 is a must for the neighbors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a sane well mannered Dad with a college age son. He is now living in Brooklyn. I am good for advice on the city restaurant/jazz clubs/broadway shows scenario. I stay right up the street so can assist with questions and advice.

reviews.comments: A roomy and comfortable apartment in an ideal location for visiting our daughter at Columbia, near the 96th Street subway stop and opposite Riverside Park. Mike was very helpful in sorting out the WiFi for us long distance on the first day. I think this may have been the first time he'd rented the place; an extra front door key would be handy for the future, as there is no intercom.

Mike's apartment was the prefect location for  visiting NYC. It was extremely easy to catch taxicabs and major subway lines are a short distance away.  The neighborhood was fantastic and much quieter than had we stayed closer to midtown.  Since we were traveling with our dog, Java, it was wonderful to have a park just a few steps from the apartment, not to mention being able to take longer walks in Central Park.  The apartment was very spacious which is very unusual for New York City.  The kitchen was large enough that you can actually cook a meal in it and easily set 4 people.  Mike was a wonderful host and made our stay very comfortable and check in with us to make sure things were going fine.  He responded to our messages/calls very quickly.  We highly recommend Mike's apartment!

The apartment has an excellent location, near to a subway station line 1, several restaurants, farmacies and coffee shops.
It's a very quiet neighborhood, first time I sleep in NYC without any sirens.
My only concern are three, it could have been cleaner. Especially the main bedroom shades, bathroom courtains and second bedroom bed sheets, we had to buy new ones and kitchen (the garbage can was full).
The second bedroom window needs a courtain or shade.
We didn't have a problem with the fact that Mike has a dog, but leaving the dog bed in the bedroom, and the plates with food and water... Was not cool.
I will definitely stay there again.

We were delighted with the apartment on riverside drive! The apt is in a quiet neighborhood, right across from riverside park, but 2 blocks from Broadway with tons of choices for dining. Mike is an excellent host.. He met me in the lobby and gave me a tour of the apartment. The kitchen is fully equipped for guests if they chose to cook. The towels were new and mike had extras set out for us.  The photos are accurate. The apartment was very warm and when we contacted mike he responded immediately although in the building individual apartments do not control the temperature.  We will definitely return to Mikes apartment again.

Mike's apartment is good, near the park next to the river, walk to the subway station for 15 minutes. Accommodation suitable for family travel. Second bedroom, kitchen and living room have no curtains.  And it could have been cleaner.  Mike is very nice. On arrival that day, we arrived at midnight, and Mike had been waiting for us.
Mike's place is located on a quiet, beautiful street close to so many things, including the subway.  He was responsive and accomodating with our delayed flight.  We would definitely stay here again.

The Apt. It's in a Great Area, Close to Parks and Subways, and Broadway St. We Enjoyed our Stay a Lot. You will not have any issues communicating with Mr. Mike, He Is very Responsive. he is Very Flexible with the check in time, when

Mike is a great host. His location is perfect quiet safe neighborhood. Park right across the street.  Large rental space for the price.  It is and old apt with great character. Would have liked it to be a little cleaner. But Mike was very accommodating in getting the things we needed to get it the way we perfected. Excellent stay would stay again if I come to NY. Highly recommend it.
Great location..spacious apartment with nice light!

This is the best value on the Upper West Side and he allowed a dog!  however this is a Man-Cave even though on Riverside Drive.  Cleanliness is a problem.  The cleaning lady cleans with Dupont- bomb it with deodorants and  the rest of it looks great to any man.  Women however see neglect.  MY son said it right "We saw it as a little dingy, but dad recalled his graduate school days and it was fine".  Come on 96th and Riverside drive, a great bike available in the living room, huge rooms with TV and ELEVATOR  and you get to take your animal  along.  True he could have put brighter bulbs in the lights and fixed the furniture but this was a week stay and not meant to supply all needs for everyone.  My advice to Mike is the raise the price and expect complaints but for now yu get what you see.
C'est un belle un partement et une bonne situation, mais il lui faut un Grand Netoyage.

Really nice apartment, in a quiet residence and close to a park, nice for breakfast in front of the Hudson river ;) A very appreciable comfort after hard days walking in the city.. Thanks a lot for our great week-end in NYC

Mike is a great host with a super spacious and homey apartment. The location is just awesome and the accommodations are well set up: perfect for us with two small children, room to move inside and parks (including great playgrounds) and shops steps away outside. We had a few maintenance issues but Mike was quick at working on them and will surely find solutions before he rents out again. If you are expecting something pristine and show-roomy, take a pass, but if you want to pretend to be a local and to have lived in the upper west side your whole life, this is it!

Mike's apartment is in a nice building right across the street from Riverside park. There is a very nice playground there that our children really enjoyed. The apartment is very accessible to the subway and Ubers are plentiful in the area. Many good grocery stores in walking distance. The apartment itself is very spacious and has a nice feel to it. The only downside was that there is really is no place to put your things except to keep them in the suitcases, as the dressers and closets are full. The kitchen could be better equipped and organized, but we were still able to manage to cook our meals there. Mike was very courteous and helpful. We will definitely stay here again when we return to NYC. Great value and location!

El departamento es amplio y cómodo, tiene una buena ubicación y se encuentra a pocas cuadras del metro. 
Necesita un poco de limpieza 
Mike fue un buen anfitrión y bien dispuesto. Volvería a alojarme en este departamento
The location is a great upper west side residential area. The apartment itself is very spacious. Only issue is its not very clean. Mike is a decent host.

What a great find!  The Upper West didn't disappoint.  Mike was a fantastic host, and made sure we had everything we needed. He also touched base throughout the stay to make sure everything was ok.  I would definitely stay here again!
체크인 및 키 반납시간에 늦은 것 빼고는 좋았습니다.
Mikes place was great! Everything was well worth the price and it was super close to the subway. Only recommendation would be a more comfortable bed.

Apartment excellent being that the owner Mike is very polite and available to help. He always asked us for messages if everything was all right and if we needed anything. Great space with excellent functionality. The apartment is located near the subway being serviced by the express line. I'll be back for sure.
Mike has city maps and entertainment information at the apt.

The apartment was much better than we expected for the price. It was roomy and clean. Also it’s a short walk to the nearest subway which made it easy to get around the city. Overally a great experience!

Excelente!
O Mike é uma pessoa muito gente boa e responde as dúvidas sempre muito rápido.
O apartamento é maior do que eu esperava e fica muito bem localizado, perto da estação da via expressa do metrô. 
Ficaria novamente!
The location was great. The space was great. Mike was super easy to get in touch with. Good all around.
Place is awesome, quiet, and a short walk to the nearest subway. Cannot wait to be back again here in NewYork.

Favorite part was that it was only 2-3 stops away from Times Square. Loved the apt, big enough for a family of 5, nice and cozy. Host did an awesome job making sure we were comfortable. Price was outstanding. Only downfall was that one of the beds was a tad uncomfortable. Other than that, loved everything else about the place and location
Mike was terrific, very accommodating.  Quick and clear communication.  Thoughtful hosting.  Big 2BR/2BTH apartment.  Nice location, nice building.
Excellent place and nice person. This place is better than I expect, have near public transportation, it's really nice option

Mike was a great host! He went above and beyond in accommodating my friend and I and even offered us an earlier check-in. 

I had also been hit with jet lag super hard and got sick and was super tired. Mike was kind enough to let me sleep in past normal check-in.

The place was clean, there were plenty of entertainment options such as Apple TV and cable. It was nice and warm, beds comfy. Very close to the train. Mike is available and very communicative. 

I will definitely stay again when I'm in NY next time. Highly recommend.

Mike's place was wonderful! It's just twi blocjs away from the nearedt subway and the neighborhood's quiet. The place is far bigger than what's shown in the photo and his response to my questions were on point! 

Really enjoyed this place and I hope anyone who's going will have an awesome time!

We had a great stay here. The apartment is very spacious and is perfect for three. The location is also great - super near public transport and an easy walk to Central Park, with plenty of shops and restaurants close by. Mike was also very helpful with any questions we had. Overall a very enjoyable stay - would recommend!!
A good place to live for travel, quiet and clean. And there’s plenty of room. Ultra high cost performance. Mike is a very nice person and he give us a lot of suggestions for trivial.

El lugar fue asombroso, bastante limpio. La zona dónde se ubica el apartamento es muy residencial sin embargo esta muy cerca al metro (2 bloques), tiene restaurantes y bares cerca y en promedio está a 10 min de Times Square.
Todo genial. Un lugar súper recomendable!

Mike’s home was very nice and in a great location. We were able to grab the 96 train and ride to everywhere we needed to go in Manhattan and in Brooklyn. There is a beautiful park right across the street or if you walk about 15mins E on 96th. you’ll reach Central Park. Mike was a great host. He was very helpful and quick to respond to questions. He also gave us great restaurant recommendations. It was very nice coming back to such a cozy home after long days of sightseeing. We would happily stay again.
Mike's place was perfect.  Close to the subway, and so close to the park.  Mike was very accommodating and helpful.  We would stay here again.
Muy buena ubicación, cerca a comercios, restaurantes, bares, Subway y Estación de Buses

We really enjoyed our stay at Mike's place. He was an excellent host and went above and beyond to ensure we had a great stay. The apartment is located in a great neighbourhood, only a few blocks from the subway and Central Park. It is very spacious and the pictures do not do it justice. I would definitely stay here again!

El departamento es más grande de lo que se ve en las fotos, y tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia agradable, cocinar, etc. el edificio tambien cuenta con lavadero en el sotano. La ubicación es excelente, frente al edificio hay un parque de juegos para niños, a dos cuadras un CVS abierto 24hs (aunque es mas conveniente pedir por Amazon now), en esa misma cuadra hay una pizzería italiana con una pizza riquísima. 
El subte al downtown está a 3 cuadras y el colectivo también para cerca. La zona es muy tranquila de noche, y los vecinos son muy amables.
Mike es muy amable y se ocupó siempre de chequear que estuviésemos a gusto, nos recibió su hijo Gene a las 2am por una complicación que tuvimos con nuestro vuelo, y nos permitió dejar el departamento al mediodía. 
Nos encantó el lugar y volveríamos sin dudarlo! es 100% recomendable! 
Gracias por todo Mike!
Great area with a wonderdul spacious apartment with a great living area. Nicw neighborgood too
Posto meglio che in foto, ma in generale non molto pulito, posizione ottima, lavanderia che alle 19:30 chiude, host molto disponibile
Donde Mike todo esta cerca...parkes..museos...trenes...lo q quiera.  Ademas Mike es muy interesado porque el vije salga bien.
A great location and a very warm welcome from Mike. Its a spacious apartment and worked well for our family of four.

Excelent location. 2 rooms and 2 bathrooms isnt easy to find. It is a great place with an wonderful location. Very near subway station. Everything was working properly. There are AC in every room, which  is very important in summer. I would definitely come back again.
Great place! Spacious and comfortable, we’d love to stay again!
Mike was very kind and uncomplicated. The apartment is really spacious, calm and close to the metro. We enjoyed our stay!

Die Wohnung hat zwei  Schlafzimmer, zwei Badezimmer, ein großes Wohnzimmer und eine große Küche mit Mikrowelle etc., Klimaanlage, exzellente Lage im Upper West. Sehr ruhig, dunkel, wenig Platz für Klamotten in den Schränken und Schubladen. Im Großen und Ganzen eine empfehlenswerte Wohnung. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen.

Mike's place was perfect for our week away in NYC. It had all the amenities we needed and our stay went without an issue. Mike was helpful and adaptive even when we were running a little late for check-in. I can highly recommend this place, many thanks Mike.

It is difficult to find a place to stay in New York city but Mike's place offered a great value, spacious, safe place that was close to the train stop which provided easy access to the rest of the city.

Mike is a friendly and accommodating host. The apartment is basic but comfortable, with plenty of space for our group of travellers. The neighbourhood is quiet and close to metro links. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would return in the future.

Spacious accommodations---two bedrooms, two bathrooms---in a quiet building and neighborhood with all the necessary amenities, and then some.  Just two blocks from a subway station and plenty of breakfast options.
This is a great space in a fantastic location. Minutes from the subway and on the edge of great park. A large apartment that easily accommodated or family of 4 with lots of space for everyone.
o Mike é muito simpático e atencioso...o apartamento tem uma ótima localização, sem problema de barulho. farmácia, mercado e metrô bem próximo
Mike's place is in a great location and Mike kindly let us leave our luggage on our last day as our flight wasn't till the evening.
Great apartment. Great location

Mikes place was fantastic value. A large apartment that easily accommodated our family. It was a nice quiet location in a lovely building and close to subway and Central Park. We really felt like we were living like locals while there.
Mike’s apartment is located in convenient position. Also, CVS and many delicious restaurants exist near his apartment too! Above all things, Mike is so kind and thoughtful of his guests.
Mike’s place is very spacious, has everything you need and is in a nice, safe and quiet neighbourhood.
Very convenient location and only take around 10 minutes to the subway.
Complains only with bedrooms. Old mattress and pilows.
Mike’s apartment is very spacious and comfortable.  It’s in a great location, perfect for our needs. We were sad to leave but will definitely return when possible.

Mike's flat was perfect for our family of four. Two bedrooms, two bathrooms and spacious common area. Also it is located in a very nice area near Central Park and the Subway. Mike is very kind and responsive and helped us getting the most of our vacation. Thanks for everything.
The location was amazing and the house too.

name: Manhattan Private Room15min=TimesSQ
summary: We have turned a walk-through, or shotgun apt, (RESEARCH it!) into a great home in Manhattan. *This room is completely private! Tiny, but Cozy! This room is not part of the shotgun layout. PRIVATE ROOM! Yes PRIVATE ROOM!
space: We are in historic Hamilton Heights, 1 block from a/c/b/d/1 subway trains. Also very close to lovely Convent ave and Hamilton Terrace. (make time for a 15 minute walk; you'll love it!) This is a gorgeous brownstone with a large private yard. The only downside is that it's a railroad apt. Walkthrough / shotgun style.  But good news, this PRIVATE room is not part of the walk-through! It is a small room (think harry potter's room) but it is completely private.
description: We have turned a walk-through, or shotgun apt, (RESEARCH it!) into a great home in Manhattan. *This room is completely private! Tiny, but Cozy! This room is not part of the shotgun layout. PRIVATE ROOM! Yes PRIVATE ROOM! We are in historic Hamilton Heights, 1 block from a/c/b/d/1 subway trains. Also very close to lovely Convent ave and Hamilton Terrace. (make time for a 15 minute walk; you'll love it!) This is a gorgeous brownstone with a large private yard. The only downside is that it's a railroad apt. Walkthrough / shotgun style.  But good news, this PRIVATE room is not part of the walk-through! It is a small room (think harry potter's room) but it is completely private. We provide towels sheets and blankets and a great continental breakfast. Please bring your own toiletries. We aim to stay out of your way here, but we will be here. But we're not nosy. It's your vacation!!! Happy to give recommendations or directions, or have pizza and wine anytime. We love everything about our hist
neighborhood_overview: We love everything about our historic and quaint neighborhood! Ask us about the gorgeous walk you can take, right behind our street! Famous! In movies! Magnificent! !
transit: 1 block to subway express!! We're 15 minutes to Times Square, or Central Park in 8 minutes!!
access: We provide towels sheets and blankets and a great continental breakfast. Please bring your own toiletries.
interaction: We aim to stay out of your way here, but we will be here. But we're not nosy. It's your vacation!!! Happy to give recommendations or directions, or have pizza and wine anytime.
