The apartment has a living room with dining area, including a big table that seats 8, a well stocked kitchen, 2.5 modern bathrooms, and 2 separate bedrooms. You'll be comfortable with central A/C and heat that you control. It's an ideal space for 4, but comes with a queen sized air mattress and sofa that can sleep up to 6.   You have access to the backyard which has been designed as an urban oasis: a shaded patio features a large table and a grill, or take a short stone path to the sunny garden where you can lay on a hammock or hangout at a bistro table.  Restaurants, bars, coffee shops, yoga studios, are all within a few blocks of the apartment! The apartment features:  > Lots of light and exposed brick in the living room and dining room > Modern bathrooms with towels and linens provided > Gourmet kitchen (granite counter-tops, stove with oven, full-size fridge,
description: This 2-bedroom, 2-floor home is the perfect home away from home. Located two blocks from the subway, with beautiful decor, antique rugs and light filled rooms, featuring: private entrance, fully-stocked kitchen, 2-bedrooms including a master suite and a kid's room with crib plus a single bed, a spacious, open living and dining room, and a spacious garden -- a rare find in the city! 20 minutes to downtown Manhattan. Perfect for 6 or less. Please note, there is a cat who lives here. A sweet 2-bedroom, two-floor apartment in a private, two-family house on a quiet tree-lined street with a private entrance. The apartment has a living room with dining area, including a big table that seats 8, a well stocked kitchen, 2.5 modern bathrooms, and 2 separate bedrooms. You'll be comfortable with central A/C and heat that you control. It's an ideal space for 4, but comes with a queen sized air mattress and sofa that can sleep up to 6.   You have access to the backyard which has been designed as an u
neighborhood_overview: Bedford–Stuyvesant (colloquially known as Bed-Stuy) is bordered by the neighborhoods of Williamsburg, Clinton Hill, Bushwick, and Crown Heights.  A historic neighborhood that boasts pristine brownstones, a tight-knit community, a great culture of artists, writers and real New Yorkers, and a wonderful collection of locally-owned bars, restaurants, cafes and wine bars. Within 6 blocks of the apartment there is:(URL HIDDEN)great library, yoga studios, playgrounds, cafes, and shops     > Lunatika, a great bar and cafe with live music     > Saraghina Bakery/Restaurant, the best bread in NYC & wood-fired pizza     > Peaches restaurant, with Southern American soul food Our favorite local neighborhood celebrities are Tracy Morgan (actor/comedian), Chris Rock (actor/comedian), Bobby Fischer (World Chess Champion), Jackie Robinson (baseball player), The Notorious B.I.G. (rapper), and Mike Tyson (boxer).
notes: There is a cat, Gigi, who lives on the premises and may require food & water
transit: The apartment is in walking distance to a several great restaurants, wine shops, library, live music, grocery stores, and an excellent Italian bakery.  Easy access to A and C subway trains -- 5-minute walk to the C-train, 8-minute walk to the express A train. 20 Minutes by subway to downtown Manhattan. JFK/ La Guardia airport is 30 minutes by taxi. Free street parking is available. The Long Island Rail Road (aka LIRR) is a few blocks away at Nostrand Ave: a quick trip to JFK. Ride it a bit longer for beaches on Long Island, including the Hamptons.
access: Hosts Pervaiz & Laena live in the apartment with their daughter (but will be away during your stay). We are friendly, and happy to suggest fun things to do and see in New York. The apartment is close to the A and C subway lines, trains that take you directly to Manhattan, other parts of Brooklyn, and JFK airport. Exclusive access to your own apartment, with private entrance. Also private entrance to the backyard garden that is shared with an apartment downstairs. Please treat it with care and respect. We are happy to direct you to our favorite places in the city. We provide guests with our own neighborhood guide, along with NYC maps, NYC guidebooks, etc.
interaction: We will be away during your stay, but will be reachable by phone, and the host's sister will be on-call for anything you may need.
house_rules: Must be okay with a cat being on premises, and feeding her during your stay.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Pervaiz, Laena, and Safia are guests when they adventure, and hosts at their home in Brooklyn. Pervaiz is a journalist who writes about crime and food (most often, separately). Laena has a food company that makes jam, marmalade, and mustard. 

We love to travel and cook, and share these experiences. Our most recent travel adventures were in Mexico, Colorado, Italy and France -- we love going to the Yucatan in Mexico and go almost every winter. When we're not traveling, we can often be found cooking at home for friends and family. Pervaiz can cook a perfect steak, no hyperbole, and Laena is skilled at curries, chicken wings and dumplings. Pervaiz can often be found watching Homeland or catching up on the news, while Laena is reading the novels of Calvino or Murakami, and trying to finish the Knausgaard series.

We are American, Canadian mais français aussi y hablamos espanol muy bien. Asi que podeis escribirnos y preguntarnos lo que quereis saber sin problema.

Vous pouvez poser toutes les questions que vous voulez en français ou en anglais.

Per il italiano, valesse la pena tentare.

reviews.comments: We are thankful that Pervaiz and Laena trust us to stay at their house in (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a large house with 2 bedrooms, each of them with bathrooms, 3 floors, complete kitchen and a garden in the back. For us coming from Europe, it was staying at a tipical Brooklyn house!!!! The metro is close by and it takes about 30-40min to get to Manhattan. The area is safe. We came by car and we could easily park our car in front of the house and leave it for our entire stay, very convenient. Pervaiz and Laena have 2 cats and we took care of them, our son (6 years old) was delighted to play with Lulu. Pervaiz was very resposive on emails prior and during our stay, this was very helpful as this was our first airbnb experince. Thanks to him, it was a positive one!

I was on vacation with my family, the apartment is a specious apartment in a classic Brooklyn neighborhood. I liked the neighborhood, it felt safe to me anytime I'm out. I liked that we could find everything around the corner. the subway station is very close (less than 5 minutes) which you can take to Manhattan on a single train. The host was very responsive to our questions and he tried to help with all of our needs.
Something to keep in mind is that this apartment is the apartment where the host family live and they only rent it out when they're on vacation, so it will have their stuff in there.

Great base to explore NYC especially with kids. Staying in this part of Brooklyn added another dimension to our experience of New York. The house is very cozy and comes with a cat which our kids absolutely loved. Laena and Safia welcomed us and made us feel like old time friends staying for a weekend. This is (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was easy and fast. Great place for a family with kids if you want a home away from home.

We stayed at this place during NYE. They even had an tree! Amazing place! So stylish and thoughtful touched. I fell in love with this place. You will definitely enjoy it! It’s close to groceries stores, cafes and bars. Metro accesible within 2 blocks. Definitely one of the best airbnb’s I’ve stay at! No complaints at all. Great communication.
Lovely hosts, spacious house and  a cute cat.
This is the perfect place right next to everything.The house is beautiful and the cat is so sweet .They are always available if you need them and they have a very fast response.
We had the pleasure to stay at Pervaiz, Laena and Safia's place. It's a beautiful home away from home and only a few minutes from the subway.
Must experience this gem for yourself. Even though the purpose of our stay in NY was for a funeral, the energy of the house was healing and comforting. Thank you!

The good:

Location - pretty close to the subway, so great connectivity to NYC and beyond
Adorable cat - Gigi, their cat was adorable. 5 stars for her!
AC - we visited on a very hot, humid weekend. The effective and strong AC was a life saver!
Kitchen: The kitchen was well stocked and we appreciate the fact that they were ok for the guests to use kitchen stuff.

The bad:
Cat litter/poop smell: The living area smelt of cat litter/poop for the whole of our stay. And there was litter on the floor. As cat parents ourselves, we didn't mind having the cat around, infact we enjoyed it. But having to spend 4 days smelling (rather trying not to) unchanged smelly cat litter was painful. 

Cleanliness: Dry splotch on the kitchen counter, used underwear hanging in the master bathroom, stained (looked like blood) pillow cover in MB, untidy backyard - nowhere as clean as the photos suggested. On the whole place was unclean and untidy, pretty disappointing.

This is my first not so good experience with Airbnb, in our 8+ experiences so far.

name: Room in a LOFT 4000pi2 Downtown
summary: I rent my lovely private room. I live in a huge industrial and arty loft in downtown Montreal. My roomates (4 persons around 30, young professionals (art direction, motion design, architecture, medicine) + our cat are easy going, discret, independant and welcoming. Clean&quiet person requested !
description: I rent my lovely private room. I live in a huge industrial and arty loft in downtown Montreal. My roomates (4 persons around 30, young professionals (art direction, motion design, architecture, medicine) + our cat are easy going, discret, independant and welcoming. Clean&quiet person requested ! Free access to the entire loft : kitchen, bathroom, toilets, open-space etc. Le loft se situe en plein centre-ville à deux pas du Palais des Congrès et de la place des Arts, proche des métros Square Victoria et Place d'armes (ligne orange), du métro Places des Arts (ligne verte), et du large réseau de bus.  accès par métro, bus
neighborhood_overview: Le loft se situe en plein centre-ville à deux pas du Palais des Congrès et de la place des Arts, proche des métros Square Victoria et Place d'armes (ligne orange), du métro Places des Arts (ligne verte), et du large réseau de bus.
transit: accès par métro, bus
access: Free access to the entire loft : kitchen, bathroom, toilets, open-space etc.
house_rules: respect, propreté, calme, joie de vivre !

reviews.comments: Très bonne expérience au centre de Montréal! Colocs sympa et appartement très chouette!

The perfect place in the perfect location of downtown Montreal.  The online pictures match the spacious loft apartment, and my room was ready with fresh sheets and bath towels.  The host left post-it notes with tips throughout the apartment - include an empty shelf in the refrigerator and kitchen cabinet for me to leave things.  There is no better location for jazz fest, and we walked everywhere from this very central location.
A great place to stay, great location with very welcoming and friendly hosts. Thoroughly recommended.

Great place full of unique furniture and art. I found it to be a productive writing space and ended up getting a lot of work done in the communal areas while I was there. Everyone living there was respectful of my space and delightful to talk to on occasion. My room was super quiet, practically sound proof, which is nice. The neighborhood is close to several train and bus lines that connect to other parts of the city, right in the heart of downtown, which was very convenient for me.

My stay at Pauline's and Thomas's place was very pleasant. Their spacious and sun-filled loft is full of character and charme. I was allowed to fully use their kitchen, washer & dryer and got a fan in my room which was pleasant after a warm day. Pauline & Thomas are nice people that are very easy to get along with and are very warm.
Conveniently located close to old town and the Palais de Congres one can also easily go grocery shopping and quickly reach Ste-Catherine and the Arts district around UQAM.
I'll be happy to stay at their palce again.

I stayed about two weeks in this awesome loft and I can totally recommend it! Thomas, Pauline & Ben were very nice and helpfull and the loft looks even better than on the fotos! Not to forget Cousecous, propably the cuttest cat I ever met. Merci!

Pauline and Thomas were very friendly, gracious and hospitable hosts during my stay, and it was a pleasure getting to know them and their fellow roommate Benoit. It's important to note that Pauline was very accommodating to my arrival schedule and had a high degree of organization, which I appreciated greatly, given the much different experience I had earlier with a neighboring hotel. The loft was much larger than I expected and situated perfectly within reach of Montreal's major points of interest. Cous Cous was probably the most chill and relaxed cat I've ever seen. I'd most certainly recommend the experience to anyone, including my own return visit to Montreal.

I stayed at this place for 3 weeks. Pauline and Thomas (and also roommate Ben) were very friendly and hospitable. They have an unique and gorgeous loft, which they have furnished and decorated in their own artistic styles. The place has huge living area and a kitchen - and bedroom was quite cozy as well. The location of the place is very convenient with metro and grocery shops close by. Cous Cous and Sid are probably the most relaxed and friendly cats I have ever seen, who I guess have learned a thing or two about hospitality from their owners :-) Overall I had a wonderful time in this charming loft and I would definitely stay here again.

J'ai passé une semaine super. Pas vu le temps passé. Colocataires ultra-sympas. Mention spéciale pour les parties de PS4 sur rétroprojecteur et pour les deux chats : monsieur Paul et couscous (alias maître du cosmos).

I spent a weekend here. The loft is great. It got so much space in the living room. And the private room is nice and tidy. Roommates were friendly. They are bilingual which is sweet for a English speaker in Montreal. Great weekend for me.
Très grande chambre dans un loft immense. A deux pas du Palais des congrès et du complexe Desjardins!

It is a really good place, very creative furniture set up and unique. Pauline responses really fast once I had questions, and her roommates were really friendly and helpful. This place located down town, close to everywhere. I like everything there.
Very good

Pauline's place is one of the most special Airbnb I've ever stayed on. The flat is mega cool and has all amenities you need and it's very central and convenient if you are arriving by bus from the airport. Check-in couldn't be easier. I would definitely stay there again.
Super loft à la déco vintage !!! :)

Couldn't have chosen a better place to stay in Montréal. Pauline was so kind and considerate. The space so clean, homey and cozy. The suite had tons of natural light. Couscous was the sweetest cat we've ever met. Pauline has a very impressive plant collection. The location was perfect for all the sights we wanted to see. There were restaurants, galleries, bixi stations and the metro nearby. We would definitely recommend staying here on your trip to Montréal.   Thanks Pauline!

Pauline’s place is perfect for stay one or two persons, the bed and the room are cosy and comfortable. The rest of the apartment, which is shared, is beautiful and clean. The location can not be better. Everything was as expected and Pauline is such a great host, I have to do a last minute change and we agreed immediately, she was comprehensive and nice. So I recommend this place.

My stay at Pauline’s was fantastic. From the incredibly clean environment, the wonderful location, the great people, to Couscous, the friendly and cuddly cat :)
If I need a place to stay in Montreal again, I wouldn’t hesitate to stay at Pauline’s again. I absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for a room in Montreal.
Pauline's place was spacious and artistic, Couscous was the most loving cat, had a fun stay over in Montreal!
Pauline est très attentive et tout était en ordre. L'appartement est vraiment charmant et bien situé.

name: Contemporary Studio Heart Ipanema
summary: A newly refurbished studio apartment in the heart of Ipanema and just two blocks from the beach. Designed by renowned Brazilian architect Sandra Brandão, it has all the comforts of a top quality hotel room with the privacy of home.
space: Refurbished Contemporary Studio. The apartment is fully equipped with air-conditioning, wi-fi internet connection, cable tv, safe and a kitchen and bathroom designed in carrara and nero marquina marble. PLEASE NOTE that the rate is inclusive of everything except for electricity which is charged separately. Brazilian electricity prices have increased by 75% since November 2014  and, to avoid having to increase our rates accordingly, we feel the fairest way is to keep it separate. We take a meter reading on check-in and on check-out and charge exactly the value per KW/h as charged by the energy company LIGHT. Air-conditioning units are what use the most energy, so we would encourage guests to switch them off when they are out of the apartment. Brazilian electricity prices are among the highest in the world (50% higher than the US average) but, with normal use, guests can expect to pay around R$20 (twenty Brazilian reals) per day in the summer. In the winter, if the amount is very low (le
description: A newly refurbished studio apartment in the heart of Ipanema and just two blocks from the beach. Designed by renowned Brazilian architect Sandra Brandão, it has all the comforts of a top quality hotel room with the privacy of home.  Refurbished Contemporary Studio. The apartment is fully equipped with air-conditioning, wi-fi internet connection, cable tv, safe and a kitchen and bathroom designed in carrara and nero marquina marble. PLEASE NOTE that the rate is inclusive of everything except for electricity which is charged separately. Brazilian electricity prices have increased by 75% since November 2014  and, to avoid having to increase our rates accordingly, we feel the fairest way is to keep it separate. We take a meter reading on check-in and on check-out and charge exactly the value per KW/h as charged by the energy company LIGHT. Air-conditioning units are what use the most energy, so we would encourage guests to switch them off when they are out of the apartment. Brazilian elect
neighborhood_overview: This is a lovely little corner of Ipanema. The building is on Rua Visconde de Pirajá on the corner with Rua Garcia D'Avila. Garcia is the swish street of Rio, if you have money to spend. It's where you'll find Cartier, Luis Vuitton, H Stern, the jeweller, Nike, among other international labels. But there's also a great bakery and grocery store, KiKarnes, just opposite - if you like coconut, I highly recommend their "quejadinha" (like macaroons). It's just one block from Praça Nossa Senhora da Paz, where they are building a metro station. The square is home to my favourite market of all - the fruit and veg market on a Friday morning. See how many fruit and veg you can find that you've never seen before: jabuticaba, piranga, cajú, cajá, jaca, chuchu, inhame. The neighbourhood has a great village feel to it. All along Visconde de Pirajá in the direction of Praça General Osório, there are shops, cafés and juice bars. Praça General Osório is the heart of Ipanema. It's where the metro is. On
notes: PLEASE NOTE that the rate is inclusive of everything except for electricity which is charged separately. Brazilian electricity prices have increased by 75% since November 2014  and, to avoid having to increase our rates accordingly, we feel the fairest way is to keep it separate. We take a meter reading on check-in and on check-out and charge exactly the value per KW/h as charged by the energy company LIGHT. Air-conditioning units are what use the most energy, so we would encourage guests to switch them off when they are out of the apartment. Brazilian electricity prices are among the highest in the world (50% higher than the US average) but with normal use guests can expect to pay around R$20 (twenty Brazilian reals) per day in the summer. In the winter, if the amount is very low (less than R$30) we will usually waive payment.
transit: ADVICE ON HOW TO GET HERE FROM THE INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (GIG).  I would recommend using the yellow Aerocoop taxi service. The stand is outside the terminal building to the right. It should be easy to spot. Please, whatever you do, do not take a taxi driver who comes up to you and asks "Taxi?" - even if they have a genuine yellow taxi. They are likely to have fiddled their meter so that it comes out to double - or more - than the real fare. This has happened to two of my guests recently. One paid $100 (US dollars) from GIG - four times more - R$75 is $25 at the moment. The other paid R$75 from the city airport SDU (it should have been half that.) Both of them got into taxis after being asked if they needed one. Just ignore them, walk to the right inside the terminal building until you see a yellow Aerocoop/AeroTaxi booth still inside the building. The queue should be just outside those doors. On the meter, it should cost you around R$75 to get to Ipanema. Don't agree a fixed fare with
access: Wifi, Cable tv, safe, hair dryer, microwave, coffee machine, double glazed windows.
house_rules: 1) The property is for the exclusive use of the number of guests listed on the reservation. 2) Please remember you are staying in a residential building so please do not play loud music or make a undue noise between 10pm and 7am. 3) Please remember that electricity is charged separately (see "Other Things to Note" above) and thus turn off all air conditioning units and appliances when you leave the property every day. 4) Please DO NOT take bath towels or linens to the beach. 5) Please respect the weight limit as described in the elevator. 6) When returning from the beach, please wash excess sand off your feet using the tap in the garage.

host.host_about: Brit journalist and translator living in Brazil since 2009.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Muy bueno todo! Jan muy buen anfitrión! :)

This apartment is amazing!  It is very modern and extremely clean.  The bed is super comfortable, the bathroom is large and ultra luxe, the wifi as fast as we anything we have in our own apartment in NYC, and the kitchen / dining area much bigger than it looks in the photos.  

The location is absolutely perfect, right in the hippest part of Ipanema -- 2 blocks from the best part of the beach, surrounded by amazing shopping (the Louis Vuitton store is 1/2 block away along with plenty of more within-reach brands), with both a large grocery store and fabulous bodega (try the baked goods!) on the corner, and only a 5 min walk to the metro & main square at General Osorio not to mention plenty of fast city bus lines running right in front.  Oh -- and the apartment has a view of the Christ statue!  

For city & beach lovers, this place really couldn't be more perfect. 

Plus, the owners were super helpful to us through the entire process.  Jan was out of town when we visited, but his colleague Pedro couldn't have been lovelier.  Our shuttle into town got stuck in horrible traffic, forcing Pedro to wait almost two hours for us.  But he was upbeat and gracious and so welcoming.  Then when we accidentally locked our valuables in the safe (be sure to press the reset button - doh) he made two separate trips to the apartment to work out the master key.  

Seriously, this apartment is like a luxury hotel, for a fraction of the price.  I can't recommend it enough.  Thank you, Pedro & Jan!!

Accueil très chaleureux de notre hôte qui s'est rendu disponible, d'autant que nous sommes arrivés à l'appartement plus tôt que prévu, ayant récupéré très rapidement nos bagages à l'aéroport et n'ayant pas eu de trafic sur le chemin nous menant de l'aéroport à Ipanéma.
L'appartement est très confortable et idéalement situé, à la fois dans une artère commerçante et à 5 minutes à pied de la plage d'Ipanéma.
La description sur le site correspond exactement à la réalité.

We loved staying at Pedro's place. It is very tastefully decorated and equipped with everything you will need. Location is fantastic! Wow! Everything around the corner. Ipanema beach Posto 9/10 is just one block away. Pedro was a responsive and thoughtful host. Check-in/-out easy. Highly recommended staying here.
We had a wonderful time in this beautiful  appartment. Great location and very friendly host! Wished we could stay longer!

A nossa estádia no apartamento do Jan foi maravilhosa!! Gostamos muito do apartamento e do bairro. O principal diferencial desse apartamento é a sua localização, pois é perto da praia e de diversos bares/restaurantes e lojas. O apartamento é muito funcional, perfeito para um casal que quer pegar uma praia durante o dia e se divertir a noite. Além disso, o Pedro, que foi quem nos recepcionou na chegada, foi muito atencioso conosco. Nos deu diversas dicas e sempre nos atendeu quando tínhamos alguma (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, na nossa próxima viagem ao Rio de Janeiro, iremos ficar nesse apartamento novamente. Abraços.
Departamento en la mejor zona de Ipanema. Es pequeño pero coqueto y muy funcional. El dueño nos trato muy bien y nos ayudo en todo momento. Super recomendable!

Salve, Maria Laura, la ragazza che ci ha accolti é stata impeccabile nel spiegarci il funzionamento di ogni singolo elettrodomestico. La casa uguale alle foto dell'annuncio. Bella e ben arredata e ben pensata "pensiero del mio fidanzato architetto".  Pulita e fresca grazie all'aria condizionata. Rumori nella norma, siamo a Rio de Janeiro....Collocata in zona abbastanza strategica per visitare i quartieri limitrofi. Un pò lintana dal Centro Santa Teresa e Lapa. Ma luoghi facilmente raggiungibili con il seevizio bus che funziona alla grande, almeno dal punto di vista di un europeo/italiano. 
Quindi grazie grazie grazie. Consiglio vivamente questo appartamento

We had very positive experience.  Apartment was as described.  Location very good.  We used public buses as well as metro.  Jan left us information on  local markets and restaurants.  It is very close to the beach.
Absolutely no complaints.  Thanks Jan.
The reservation was canceled 524 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great apartment in the perfect, charming location of Ipanema. Only two blocks away from the beach surrounded by many shops, cafés and restaurants. The apartment is secured by a 24h door man and has everything you need.
Thanks again, Pedro, for welcoming us and making the stay uncomplicated and easy. 
We would come back any time.

Excelente departamento en la mejor zona de Rio!! A todo aquel que dude de alquilarlo mi recomendación es absoluta. Estuve 15 noches y ya sentía que era mi casa. El departamento es igual al de las fotos, esta en una zona inmejorable, bien cerca de todo lo que uno busca en Rio, playas y diversión nocturna. Tanto Jan como Pedro, quien es el dueño del apartamento son personas encantadoras que se esmeran en hacerte sentir comodo y te brindan todo lo que necesites.

This apartment is wonderful. It's cozy, clean, safe, and in a perfect location in Ipanema. The owner of the apartment, Pedro, coordinated timing and met us upon arrival. He was kind, welcoming, and a fantastic host (and new friend!). 

His hospitality and generosity truly made our Rio experience the trip of a lifetime. 

Many trendy restaurants are within walking distance of the studio and delicious. In fact, my mother and I walked to dinner every evening - and the beautiful beach was only two blocks away. You can't get much better!

Highly, highly recommend this apartment! Can't wait to return!

O Pedro foi super legal! A minha conducao atrasou e ele me esperou no apartamento sem problemas e batemos um papo super bacana quando cheguei. Ele me explicou como ligar e desligar todas as utilidades no apartamento e tambem me deu varias dicas de onde ir conforme eu dizia os meus interesses. O apartamento e super bem localizado e confortavel.
O quarto condiz com o anunciado. Sua localização é perfeita para quem quer se hospedar em Ipanema.
O apartamento é muito  bonito e a localização não poderia ser melhor,  perto da praia e dos melhores restaurantes de Ipanema.

This studio was perfect.  Jan was out of town so Lordes met us upon arrival. While there was a bit of a language barrier everything worked out, she was super sweet and tried her best explaining things with our limited portuguese.   Despite Jan being out of town, he was quick to respond to all our messages and inquiries about our stay.  We were able to do a late check out on the day we were leaving which was nice since our flight did not leave until 9pm.    

The studio was exactly as pictured on the website.  The location could not have been better.  The building and location felt very safe at all times.  The 24 hour doorman was nice.  There were tons of restaurants, bars, shops, etc. within walking distance.  The metro was just a few blocks away, we only took it once to the Centro but it was nice to have it so close.   We went to the fruit/veggie market and the sunday Hippie market, both awesome.  Tried Nectar for breakfast/lunch, delicious lunch plates.  One of our favs was on the beach, Posto 9 at the Uruguay flag, the carne sandwich, so good.  

I can not wait to visit Rio again, it was such an amazing city.  I would def stay at this studio apartment again if it is available!

Jan was always available and answered to my emails very quickly. The flat is very well located. The flat is perfect, modern and clear. Plus, there is a guard at the entrance of the building for more safety.

Had a great stay at this wonderful apartment in Ipanema.

Check-in went absolutely smoothly with both Jan and Pedro being at the apartment to let us in, show us around, and give recommendations on what to eat and where to go. They are wonderful people! 

The location is absolutely perfect - on busy Rua Visconde de Piraja with tons of shops and trendy restaurants and cafes around. The best part of Ipanema beach is 2 blocks away. The area is very safe and there is a 24 hour doorman (at least one of whom speaks English, if you need help and aren't great with Portuguese) around. 

The apartment itself is clean and modern and has everything you could need!

Would stay here again when I visit Rio next! Highly recommend!

A experiência no RJ foi incrível, grande parte pela localização do apartamento. Existe toda a infra-estrutura ao redor com supermercado, padaria, farmácia, etc e vc faz tudo a pé na região. 

Fomos a  praia de Ipanema e a lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas varias vezes e nos sentimos bem seguros.

Definitivamente voltaríamos a nos hospedar neste apartamento.

Adoramos o apartamento em todos os sentidos. 
Localização fantástica, na principal avenida de Ipanema e perto de vários restaurantes. 
Muitas coisas é possível se fazer andando e caso precise de transporte público, não tem o que reclamar também.
 O apartamento é exatamente como nas fotos (até maior do que esperávamos): confortável, limpo e super aconchegante. 
Há porteiro 24 horas.
O Jan é uma simpatia de anfitrião, tanto ele como o Pedro (que iria nos receber mas devido a atrasos de voos, não tivemos a oportunidade de conhecê-lo ao vivo). Foram muito solícitos e atenderam todos os nossos pedidos.
Indicaria a todos o apartamento e com certeza voltaremos outras vezes.

Tudo aconteceu conforme o combinado (entrega das chaves, orientações sobre o apartamento, etc). O apartamento também estava conforme as fotos postadas. Os pontos não tão bons, não estavam fotografados, como box do banheiro, armários, etc.
O apartamento está muito sujo. Não sujeira aparente, mas falta mais ventilação e arejamento. Eu e minha esposa tivemos muitos problemas alérgicos por conta dos travesseiros, roupa de cama e colchão. A cozinha cheirava a urina. Não poder utilizar o A/C quando o chuveiro estivesse ligado também não constava da informação prévia. Só se descobre estando no apartamento. Numa cidade quente como o Rio, esse ponto ganha importância.

We love, love, loved our trip to Rio! This was a clean, good looking apartment, well designed, even had blackout curtains, equipped with everything we needed, AND in a great location in Ipanema, with a very short walk to the beach. The apt. even has a great view of the Cristo, we were so surprised, looks beautiful lit up at night. :) Jan was a great host & very responsive, he even provided great advice on all types of activities. We love Rio, listened to live music & danced every night. We will definitely be coming back! Thanks for making this such a great experience Jan!

What a place! There is not a hotel in all of ipanema or zona sul with as perfect a location. You are literally meters away from the beach in posto 9, and all the best restaurants in Rio (zaza, entrecote,  etc). On the weekends you simply walk out onto the streets and soak in the beautifula atmosphere. Go to the fruit and hippie markets,  so much fun. Then hit the beach or one of the kiosks and take it all in. 

Pedro and Jan are superb hosts that love their city and will give you all the best information on where and when to go.  Even the doormen of the building are all smiles. The whole experience was the quintessential personification of the joi de vivre of the Brazilian people. I don't think we could have picked a better place and we were extremely lucky in finding it.  If the dates are available,  book it now you will not be disappointed. Big thumbs up to this place,  best ABB yet. We will definitely be back.

O Jan é um optimo anfitrião, estando sempre disponível para ajudar e solucionar problemas.
O apartamento está muito bem localizado. Dentro da melhor zona de Ipanema e bastante próximo da praia. 
A cama do apartamento é excelente! É o apartamento é exactamente como nas fotos. 
Concerteza voltarei.

Agradecerles sería poco. Jan y Pedro fueron extremadamente atentos y predispuestos durante toda nuestra estadía.
El departamento es HERMOSO, tal cual se ve en las fotos y la zona es inmejorable.
Estamos inmensamente conformes y  agradecidos. Espero podamos volver.
Un gran saludo para ambos!

The flat is well situated close to ipanema beach. A lot of shops, bars and restaurant and a very safe area. The flat is beautiful and Jan explained us very well to come from the airport. It was a pleasure to be here for six marvellous days :)

Great location, great place to stay. We had a blast and were very comfortable. Everything you need is walking distance. The beach, the market, and food to eat. Come stay here if you want to visit ipanema!

Mi experiencia en el departamento de jan fue increible !La ubicacion es perfecta,por la cercania a la playa y la cantidad de lugares para comer todo tipo de comida,cercania a supermercados y a locales de alta moda.
El departamento es igual a las fotos del anuncio,comodo,limpio  y moderno.
El check in y check out fue perfecto y nos indicaron como irnos en taxy al aeropuerto,como orientarnos en el barrio,etc .
Volveria !:)

Excelente ubicación, mejor imposible! En la mejor zona de Ipanema. El departamento era tal cual se veía en las fotos, muy completo, cómodo y lindo. Jan y Pedro nos recibieron de madrugada cuando llegamos y con mucha amabilidad nos explicaron todo. Cada vez que visite Río iré a este departamento, sin dudas!!

Location, location, location! This place has the best location ever! Couple blocks from the beach and around the best shops, cafes, restaurants and everything you might need on your vacation. The building is safe and has a 24 hours doorman.The studio is beautiful, clean, and looks just like the pictures. Pedro (the owner) was super helpful and easy to reach. I would highly recommend this place to any friend and will most likely stay here again in the future. The only thing you might need is an extra bed sheet, we should have asked Pedro for one but we didn't, there's only one sheet and is kind of tight for two people, I would rather have an over-sized sheet or an extra one. Besides that, this place is perfect for a couple on vacation! Looks just like a fancy hotel room with a great price! Loved it!
A localização do apartamento é excelente e, por causa da janela dupla, é bem silencioso. Tudo lindo, limpo e exatamente como apresentado nas fotos. Adoramos!!!!!!
Perfect location, beautiful apartment and great hosts. Could not have been better. Thank you Pedro and Jan!
Great studio flat in great neighbourhood.  Lots of restaurants nearby, safe to walk about at night and a 2 minute walk from Ipanema beach. Check in and check out very smooth. I would stay here again.

Great location, very nicely decorated in a clean, modern style, and surprisingly quiet considering it overlooks a busy intersection -- I slept really well! (and I'm a light sleeper)... Pedro was extremely helpful and friendly, and made me feel very welcome. Highly recommended!

Todo muy bien según lo ofertado. Departamento limpio y bien equipado. No tuve oportunidad de conocer a Jan pero tuve respuesta oportuna a mis mensajes y resolvió con rapidez mis dudas. El departamento está muy cerca de playa, comercios y restaurantes, así como de transporte. Ubicado sobre una avenida principal, por lo que se debe tener en cuenta que no es silencioso, con ventanas cerradas y aire acondicionado hay buen silencio.

This is an absolutely fantastic apartment right in the heart of Ipanema.  Pedro was fantastic and very accommodating with requests.  Excellent hosts with a great apartment.  The beach is 2 short blocks away, lots of great restaurants nearby, and an easy jump off point to explore the rest of the city. Highly highly recommended, as we're already making plans to come back.

A localização impecável é o maior diferencial deste apartamento. Tudo foi conforme combinado - anúncio claro e com fotos fiéis a realidade. O anfitrião Pedro foi muito simpático e flexível com relação a horários, visto que tivemos atraso na chegada devido ao cancelamento de um vôo. Ótima experiência, assim como esperávamos!
The flat was exactly as described. Great host and made me feel very welcome. The location was perfect!

My partner and I stayed at Jan's place over the Carnival and had an absolute ball. The apartment was so central and convenient. Pedro was at the apartment to arrange keys when I arrived and could not do enough to make us feel at home. Total delight.. I'll be back :)

Prettig modern appartement voorzien van alle luxe. Mooi ingericht , met veel liefde. Met name badkamer. Erg leuke en levendige buurt. Dichtbij het strand. Een aanrader voor iemand alleen dan wel een stel.

Great stay in Rio. The apartment is well located, a short walk to the square in Ipanema and only 2 blocks from the beach. We felt safe and feel we had everything required for a 4 night stay. The only negative was that there was construction on the building next door which was noisy. Of course out of control of the owner, but we had not been made aware. Thank you Jan, Pedro and Maria for your help!

We had a great stay at the apartment. It was very nice, exactly as pictured. The location was top, prime Ipanema location within walking distance of all the Ipanema spots. As an extra bonus you can see the Christ statue on clear days. Highly recommended!

El dto es tal cual se ve en las fotos, ubicado en pleno corazón de ipanema y a dos cuadras del mar. Nuestro vuelo llegó a las 9 de la mañana y Jan nos permitió entrar antes de las 14hs ya q no tenían huéspedes

Siamo arrivati a Rio alle 5 del mattino, jan e Pedro super gentili ci hanno lasciato le chiavi in portineria. La casa è bellissima e in centro a ipanema,a circa 100m dalla spiaggia.  Siamo stati benissimo, ed è super apprezzato che siano così gentili anche con chi, come noi sconvolti dal fuso orario,perde le chiavi. Grazie mille

Lovely apartment in a great location, close to the beach. Easy access to the metro aswell. Both Pedro and Jan were very helpful when we arrived and made us feel very welcome!  Slept well for the duration of our stay and the apartment was very comfortable. Would definitely recommend!

I didn't meet Jan in person but communicated before and while my stay. He is very responsable and nice as well as are Maria Laura (check-in) and Pedro (check-out).

The aparment is nice and offers all you need. In additon, the location is just perfect.

I can recommend this place!

Thanks a lot!

Both me and my partner had an amazing time staying here. The apartment is exactly how it was described on the pictures, spotless and has everything you need. It is in a prime location, in the midst of all the shops and restaurants and is only a couple of blocks from the beach. 

An additional bonus is that you can see Christ the Redeemer from the apartment which is lovely especially at night time with it all lit up. 

We didn't get to meet Jan however he did stay in touch if we needed anything throughout our stay. On our arrival at the apartment we were met by Pedro, who is fantastic and couldn't make us feel anymore welcome and excited about our stay in Rio. He gave us some suggestions for places to eat and visit around the area of which we enjoyed very much. 

Jan and Pedro, thanks again, we would definitely come back here and would recommend this place to anyone.

El anfitrión súper amable y eficiente 
El departamento lindisimo 
Poco espacio para guardar la ropa 
El barrio buenísimo ,seguro ,animado ,muy buenos medios de transporte 
Lo recomiendo 
Gracias Jan ,Pedro y Laura

La descripción era correcta. La ubicación muy buena y el depto. muy lindo. Al ser 1er. piso un poco ruidoso.  Un súper muy cerca y ferias, comercios y restos también
A dos cuadras de la playa y muy cerca de Leblón. En definitiva todo muy bien.

Fue una muy buena estadía.
El departamento está muy bien ubicado, y es tal cual se ve en fotos.
Pedro fue muy amable con nosotros.

Ótima localização. As fotos correspondem à realidade. Anfitrião bastante atencioso nos recebeu na chegada e passou as orientações gerais.
O fato do apto ser de frente para uma avenida de intensa movimentação pode causar certo incômodo aos que dormem mais cedo ou acordam mais tarde. Mas nada que tenha interferido na qualidade do nosso sono (fechando a janela e ligando o ar condicionado o barulho melhor bastante).

Our host was extremely helpful. We are very thankful for all the help the host gave us. We loved to stay in this property. Our only comment is that it can get noisy but the truth is that you get used to it really quickly and the fantastic location makes it worth it even with this minor detail. We highly recommend it and plan to come back in the future!

Buena atención .
Cerca de la playa .

We had a most excellent time. Jan place is ideal. Greeted warmly by Pedro the apartment is in the heart of Ipanema. It is well equipped ,very tidy stylish ,quiet, modern apartment . Thank you very much we really appreciate your hospitality.
We would not hesitate to recommend  this place.
Localização excelente, decoração muito bonita e de bom gosto, um pouco barulhento apesar das janelas especiais, anfitriões atenciosos, poderiam haver mais canais disponiveis na tv a cabo.

I had a enjoyable time at Jan's place. Pedro was there to greet me and had a special gift for me. I can recommend this place highly. The location is superb close to the beach, restaurants, shopping. The place is clean and trendy. I don't cook when I'm on vacation so I didn't have a need for the kitchen. The doormen in the building are nice and very helpful. Flávio and the other gentlemen are wonderful. Definitely stay there again.
Great location close to everything. Comfortable bed. The apartment has just one window and is difficult to ventilate. Safe neighborhood.
The place was great, perfectly set up for a short term accommodation and close to everything. The host was very responsive - in summary, we had a great time and it quite felt like home.

A localização do apartamento é o diferencial. É próximo a bares, pubs, restaurantes, lojas, farmácias, mercados. Fica duas quadras da beira da praia de Ipanema e algumas quadras da lagoa. O apartamento é adequado para duas pessoas e supre as necessidades. O apartamento estava limpo e arrumado no dia da chegada e o anfitrião foi muito solícito. O chuveiro poderia ser melhor, a água é um pouco gelada para os dias de temperatura amena. Importante mencionar que o valor gasto de energia elétrica (quando considerado excessivo pelo proprietário ?) é cobrado a parte, nunca havia visto isso nas demais locações. No mais, recomendo.
Excelente ubicación, dpto muy moderno!

The apartment, although small, is perfectly suitable for two.  It is modern and well functioning.  And, above all, it is in a great location.  Two very short blocks (no more than two minutes walk) from a great stretch of Ipanema beach, between the famous Posto 9 and more laid back Leblon.  Everything is literally within sight of the apartment, great shopping, terrific restaurants and well provisioned supermarket.  Definitely, a great place to stay in Rio.

Hermoso departamento muy bien ubicado y conectado con el resto de la ciudad. La zona inmejorable. Lleno de tiendas y lindos lugares para cenar. Nos recibio Maria Laura super atenta. Y Pedro super atento y respondiendo siempre a nuestras consultas. Super recomendable. En el momento de nuestra estadia estaban realizando trabajos con respecto a la electricidad que genero algun ruido molesto pero nada grave y se entiende que es para una mejora! Tuvimos una hermosa estadia. Les recomiendo acercarse a la lagoa a caminar en el atardecer con la vista del cristo q ademas se ve desde la ventana!

El departamento está muy bien. El departamento está muy bien refaccionado, es moderno y cómodo.
La ubicación es inmejorable! Sólo dos cuadras de la playa y en la mejor zona de Ipanema, con muchos negocios, facilidades y medios de transporte cerca. A pesar de ser un primer piso se puede descansar muy bien.
Tanto Pedro como Ma Laura han sido excelentes anfitriones! Siempre ocupados en que todo este bien! Hemos pasado una excelente estadía! Sin dudas volvería y lo recomendaría!

Apartamento recente, com decoração de muito bom gosto! A localização é óptima, a duas quadras da praias e a uma quadra do Metrô. Prédio com porteiro de forma permanente e muito próximo de lojas, restaurantes e lanchonetes. 5 estrelas pela experiência e pela simpatia do Jan e Pedro!

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, próximo a panificadora, supermercado, restaurantes, cafeteria, confeitaria, livraria, 2 quadras da praia e comércio abundante.
o apartamento é perfeito para um casal, a cama é firme e tem black out eficiente. 
O ar condicionado funcionou normalmente quando necessário.
A tv a cabo tem os canais básicos.
o banheiro é moderno com bom chuveiro para banho.
a parte da cozinha tem panelas de qualidade e demais louças para refeição. importante salientar que o fogão é de 2 bocas.
a recepção de Pedro e Jan foi simpática e eficiente desde a reserva até o check out, foi uma experiência de qualidade a hospedagem, recomendo.

Tive uma experiência maravilhosa no apartamento, tanto o Jan quanto o dono do imóvel se mostraram sempre a disposição. Pedro, o dono do imóvel, foi extremamente prestativo e presente. As únicas observações são a ausência de frigideira e liquidificador, que geralmente encontro nos apartamentos que alugo, e o ar condicionado que é mais antigo, por isso tivemos algum trabalho até nos adaptarmos a ele, mas nada que prejudicasse a estadia. Recomendo!
Apartamento bom e bem localizado.  É um pouco barulhento por causa da rua movimentada.

Die Kommunikation mit Jan war super, beim Check In war dann Laura vor Ort und hat das perfekt gemacht. Die Lage ist genial, 4 min zum Strand, vis a vis eine feine Bäckerei... sehr empfehlenswert! 
Einziger Nachteil es ist ziemlich laut in der Nacht!
Muy recomendable, excelente mobiliario y ubicación.
Excelente departamento, muy bien ubicado, cerca de todo. Nos atendieron bien, muy recomendable!!
Localizacão é o ponto forte, apartamento confortavel e equipado, ideal para duas pessoas curtirem a cidade maravilhosa. Comunicação facil e descomplicada, recomendo!
Ótima localização. Porteiro sempre na entrada. Cama confortável, boas toalhas... a hospedagem nos atendeu muito bem.
Excelente apartamento para quem pretenda aproveitar as facilidades de Ipanema e não pretenda cozinhar na estadia.
Espectacular!!!para pasar unos días descansando en Rio, queda cerca a todo lo que necesitas, comida, shopping Leblon, bancos, playa Ipanema. Excelente muy recomendado!!!!
Muy comodo el depto, es tal cual se ve en la publicación, nos dejaron entrar antes, excelente la ubicación y lo mejor es que desde la ventana de ve el Cristo. 100% Recomendable!

Amazing location; close to the beach, the lagoa and conveniently located for shops and restaurants. 

The apartment is clean and comfortable; perfect for a short stay in Zona Sul of Rio.
Nice apartment, fantastic location with a friendly host who ensured we had a great stay.

Yo recomiendo este apto
Está muy bien ubicado y tiene todo para pasarla bien me fui y ya lo extraño!!!!
Nice place, well located, nice people.
Small but very comfortable apartment with a perfect location in Ipanema. Easy access to the metro one block away and the beach two blocks away. Jan is a great and responsive host!
Perfect location. Vibrant safe area of the city. Pedro was a great host. Very easy to contact him and ask for his help. Would stay here again for sure. Enjoy Rio!

Excelente Departamento...como se ve en las fotos. Jan y Pedro muy amables y atentos a todas las solicitudes... como la de recibir nuestro equipaje perdido en el viaje. Muy recomendable!!! Y la (Website hidden by Airbnb) mejor de Rio para disfrutar de todos los atractivos.  ☆☆☆☆☆

La ubicación es excelente y cómoda tanto para la playa como para tomar transportes públicos.
El apartamento no se encontraba en condiciones de limpieza aceptables, lo cual fue corregido parcialmente ante nuestro reclamo. El servicio de televisión es extremadamente limitado.

Nice appartment in very nice area. We definitely would recommend Ipanema above Copacabana. Nice restaurants, supermarket and metro very close to appartment.
Everything you need is available in appartment.
Excellent English speaking Pedro was our host and he takes the time to explain all you need of Rio. During our stay we could ask anything we needed to know.
Highly recommend the place when visiting Rio.
Un lugar excelente, en una zona inmejorable y muy buena atención por los anfitriones. Volveremos.

El departamento es espectacular! Está ubicado a dos cuadras de la playa y a la noche tenes muchas opciones de restaurans a media cuadra! Lo ideal es no caminar mucho de noche en Rio por lo que la ubicación es perfecta. Sobre la avenida hay locales de ropa, farmacias, supermercados y casas de cambio. Todo lo que necesitamos, lo encontramos a dos cuadras a la redonda. Tiene un kiosko 24hs al lado y portero 24hs también. 
El departamento es exactamente como en las fotos. Muy lindo y limpio. El anfitrión es muy amable, predispuesto a ayudar, da muy buenos consejos y te hace sentir como en tu casa. 
Sin dudas volvería a quedarme acá en caso de volver a Rio!

No conocimos a Jan, pero si a Pedro! Realmente un anfitrion con todas las letras!!! Nos explico muy detalladamente todo lo que tienen el dpto, que en si no le falta nada, coincide tal cual como se describe! Lo mejor, la ubicacion (a pcos metros se encuentran bares, supermercados, metro, y la playa!!) Sin duda que volveriamos!!

Overall it was a great stay, ideal for my partner and I. Great location and apartment was equipped with everything we needed.

Thanks Pedro and Jan!
Muy buen anfitirion. El studio muy bien puesto, completo. Excelente ubicación en el corazon de Ipanema.
Excelente alojamiento , muy buena ubicacion , moderno , un barrio super seguro , Pedro excelente anfitrion , volveriamos sin dudarlo
It’s a great place, really good location. Lots of bars and restaurants on your doorstep. It’s safe too - just be sensible. The metro is a block away as is the beach. Great place to stay in Rio.

Perfectly located in Ipanema, comfortable for two people, new and stylish space. Great communication with the host, who even allowed me to do a very late check out. Will definitely try to book here again.

Overall we enjoyed staying at Jan’s apartment as the location is perfect and the space is very functional.
If you don’t fear a bit of noise (the apartment is on the first floor and windows are on the main road) it is a great spot to stay in Ipanema!
Nice place, good location. 2 blocks to the beach, 2 blocks to the Metro — very convenient. Checking in/out was easy, prompt communication. Thank you.

La ubicación del departamento es muy buena, esta en la mejor zona de Ipanema para cenar, ir a la playa, y moverse por la ciudad ya que el metro esta a un par de cuadras. De noche la zona tiene excelentes lugares para cenar. El dpto pertenece a un edificio viejo pero remodelado 100% a nuevo. El socio de Jan (Pedro) no recibió conforme lo planeado y ayudó a ubicarnos con algunas sugerencias!! Gracias!
Ótimo studio! Recomendo! Localizacão perfeita, próximo a praia e restaurantes. Apartamento super compacto, somente para um casal. Bem equipado.
Todo excelente!

Excelente propiedad! Viajamos con mi mujer y pasamos unas vacaciones soñadas. Ubicado en lo mejor de Ipanema, es muy limpio, prolijo y acorde a lo que muestran las fotos. Esta a solo dos cuadras de la mejor playa de Río (Ipanema), con dos supermercados muy completos a solo una cuadra y una gran variedad de restaurantes o bares en una distancia realmente mínima. Sin contar que la propiedad es muy apropiada para unas buenas vacaciones en Río la recomiendo sin dudarlo por su ubicación. 
Tanto Jan cómo Pedro (la persona que nos ayudó) fueron altamente atentos y rápidos en resolver nuestras dudas y consultas.
Volveríamos sin dudarlo.

Best Location, Safe and close to Metro ( which is very Safe all Day ) and Beach .  Grocery Shopping is half a block and tons of Restaurants in the neighborhood. Smart Fit Gym half a block away is 19.90 real a day . You are also close to a beautiful park and church if that important to you . 
Thank you Jan & Petro great Host
Excelente localização, lugar agradável e próximo aos postos 9 e 10.

O apartamento é delicioso, moderno e equipado com o que precisávamos para uma curta e agradável estadia no Rio. Localização fantástica, proxima à praia, mercados, lojas e diversos restaurantes e metrô. Vizinhança segura e com porteiro dia e noite. Host extremamente prestatativo e rápido em responder às nossos contatos. Recomendo e espero voltar em breve! Obrigada Jan e Pedro. Foi top!

El departamento es tal cual aparece en las fotos! Una joyita! Nos recibió una chica amorosa. Tiene todos los detalles, la cocina es peque pero tiene todos los utensilios para cocinar. La cama súper cómoda. Espacio para acomodar la ropa y demás. El único detalle es que cuando te bañas a veces salta la llave y empieza a salir fría, si son dos no hay drama porque le avisas al otro y ya. La zona es bellísima. Tenes un súper enfrente, Mc Donalds, de todo! A dos cuadras de la playa de Ipanema hermosa! La verdad es que fue una estadía soñada, lo súper recomiendo!

Apartamento muy recomendable. La ubicacion es perfecta para ir andando a muchos sitio. Nos recibio a la hora acordada y se tomo las molestias de darnos mucjas recomendaciones y responder a todas nuestras dudas. El apartamento en si esta genial tal y como se ve en las fotos y en zona muy segura. La unica pega es que tardaron bastante en respondernos tras la estancia cuando preguntamos si podiamos quedarnos una noche mas que nos tocaba pasar por Rio. Excepto eso, muy recomendable.

O espaço é ótimo, bem decorado, muuuito bem localizado, faziamos tudo a pé em ipanema, praia mto perto e a lagoa tb. O proprietario se comunicou mto bem comigo, sempre me ligando e dando instruções, tirando minha duvidas e alem de tudo ele permitiu que eu ficasse um pouco alem do horario do check out porque meu voo era mais tarde. Recomendo muito e espero voltar em breve
muy hospitalarios-super ubicacion

Infelizmente minha estada no apartamento foi bem tumultuada. Houve um desencontro de informações no check in e pedro foi um pouco rude ao telefone. Apos entregar o apartamento, assim que saiu, ocorreu um curto circuito no apartamento e ficamos sem energia por quase 6hrs até tudo se reestabelecer, infelizmente acabei perdendo meu compromisso aguardando resolução do problema. Após isso, passamos por 2 dias mais frios e nublados no RJ e infelizmente o chuveiro (que funciona de acordo com aquecimento central por caldeira) não esquentava (tivemos que tomar banho beem frio nesses dois dias). Contatei o Pedro perguntando sobre a possibilidade de fazer uso do chuveiro eletrico e o mesmo me afirmou que este não funcionava, que nunca ninguem havia falado sobre o chuveiro não esquentar (mesmo tendo mais de 2 hospedes abordando isso nas avaliações) e novamente foi rude falando que o chuveiro poderia não estar tão quente quanto eu gostaria (a agua estava gelada!).
Enfim, o apartamento tem uma localização excelente, porteiros muuito simpáticos. Apartamento um pouco sem cuidado (cortina do banheiro suja, pia não funciona direito, falta pastilhas no box, rejunte enegrecido...) embora muito bonito e de bom gosto.
Excelente lugar para alojarse en Ipanema. Ubicación inmejorable.
Great location! Two blocks away from the beach. There are many options of restaurants and bars. A pharmacy just beside the building. I would definitely stay there again :)

name: Beautiful 1 bedroom in NYC
summary: Beautiful one bedroom just a few stops from the city. Located a half block away from the 7 train you are only a few minutes away from manhattan. Newly renovated and furnished, cozy apt with private balcony
space: The apt fits 4 comfortably but we are looking into getting extra beds incase you have more guest then 4. I believe it can sleep 6 comfortably.
description: Beautiful one bedroom just a few stops from the city. Located a half block away from the 7 train you are only a few minutes away from manhattan. Newly renovated and furnished, cozy apt with private balcony The apt fits 4 comfortably but we are looking into getting extra beds incase you have more guest then 4. I believe it can sleep 6 comfortably. Will be available to hand you the keys and give you some guidance on where to go. And answer any questions The apartment is located in woodside, very close to manhattan, close to pharmacy and supermarket in a nice neighborhood. The 7 Train is a half a block from the building and it will leave you in the heart of manhattan, time square within minutes!
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in woodside, very close to manhattan, close to pharmacy and supermarket in a nice neighborhood.
transit: The 7 Train is a half a block from the building and it will leave you in the heart of manhattan, time square within minutes!
interaction: Will be available to hand you the keys and give you some guidance on where to go. And answer any questions
house_rules: Please be respectful of the apt and treat it as if it were your own home. Thank you

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: I stayed at Eliana's property this weekend with my spouse and another couple, and we had a lovely time! The apartment is exactly as pictured, extremely clean, and in a convenient location. We especially appreciated the fully working kitchen and pull out in the living room - it suited our needs perfectly. Eliana and her son were flexible with check-in and out times and were quick and helpful with responses. They also left us a bottle of wine and chocolates to enjoy - so sweet! I would definitely recommend staying here!

This was the first time using AirBnB, so Alex was very helpful in guiding me through everything.  I was in a party of 5, and he did a lot for us when we arrived.  The apartment was as shown in the pictures.  It was cozy and perfect for our stay.  The apartment is next to the 7 train line, so it makes commuting to Manhattan really easy.  However, you can hear the train throughout the night.  It didn't bother us, but if you're a light sleeper, it may be something to consider.  I'd say everything about our stay was perfect.  Alex was wonderful and very kind.  I would definitely recommend him for anyone who's visiting New York.

Alex and Eliana are the best!!!! I can't thank them enough for making my parents first visit in NYC the best. The apartment was extremely clean, spacious, and convenient.  I appreciate how considerate and kind they were to my elderly folks. Will definitely refer this rental. Can't be more grateful for finding this gem!!!!
Nice and clean apartment. Good hosts.

My 1st airbnb experience was great. Alex was the perfect host, accommodated our late check in as we flew in at 11pm from London and was always available when we needed him. The apartment is modern, clean and spacious, it has everything you need for a stay in NY, we really appreciated the lil amenities that made it feel like home. I usually stay in Manhattan but I'm pleased to say that Woodside is a great location; 7 subway line is conveniently 2minutes walk from apartment which takes you directly into Manhattan within 15minutes. 
Will definitely be my first choice when I'm back in the city, i didn't want to leave!
Our host was very responsive to our emails.  We were met at the apartment and greeted very warmly.

Alejandro was a great host; generous and gentle, and the apartment is great.  I like the neighborhood (1am taco truck, etc.), and proximity to the city and personally don't mind the elevated train noise but could see how a light sleeper may.

My wife and I had a wonderful stay at Alejandro's place. The place is very clean and designed beautifully.  Everything you could possibly need is of walking distance. The train station is literally across the street. There is no noise whatsoever in the building. Alejandro was great and only one call or txt away if there were any questions. We will definitely be staying there again!
Alejandro's apartment is just as advertised. Him and his mom were great hosts and the apartment is very nice and clean. We would definitely recommend it and plan to stay there again.
This is a comfortable place to stay.  The hosts are cheerful and helpful, and we would stay there again when we're in the area.

I loved staying in Alejandro's apartment. It was so clean, expertly decorated, has everything that you need and is in a prime location for the subway and most everything you need. I will definitely rent this place again if it's available. You will not regret it. The hosts was super helpful and really communicative. Great experience.
A pesar que no conocimos a Alejandro, nos sentimos muy bien porque su mama nos recibio muy bien y nos entrego las llaves del apto.

La mama de Alex nos acogió en un apartamento bien limpio, a 20
minutos de Times square con transporte durante todo el dia. El unico pero es el ruido del tren, recomiendo tapones

We had a very nice stay at Alejandro's place. The apartment was really clean, comfortable and well equipped. It was only a few mins walk to the subway, fast connection to Manhattan. The hosts were so helpful, easy to communicate. We would definitelly stay at Alejandro's place again.
The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great apartment! Very roomy for a 1BR, tastefully decorated, super clean! Alejandro very graciously accommodated our need for an early check-in, and was responsive and helpful in all our communications with him. The neighborhood is vibrant and diverse, and feels perfectly safe. As other reviewers have noted, the sound of the 7 train (half a block away) could be a problem for light sleepers, but it didn't bother us at all. The location is perfect -- 15 min on the 7 to the U.S. Open, about the same to Manhattan. We'd definitely stay again!

We thoroughly enjoyed staying here. The design of the space was perfect and made a small place seem spacious.  We loved having a large TV with cable in the living room to unwind in front of after being out all day or to watch the news while working on my laptop at the dining room table. My wife was able to use the bedroom closet for her luggage and I was able to use the main closet for my luggage to keep our stuff out of the way.  Being able to get on the 7 train in less than 2 minutes was a huge bonus.  LaGuardia Airport was only 15 minutes away when taking an UBER.  The host was very helpful during check-in and we were happy that there was 2 sets of keys in case we needed to split up (some listings we have stayed at only had one pair of keys which made things difficult).  The bed was comfy and there were plenty of pillows to suit our needs (4 big pillows and a small pillow).  The WIFI worked wonderfully and that is always a big plus as we always need to be connected.  The fridge has ample storage for left overs or if you want to store groceries and there is a stove/oven/microwave/toaster to use for cooking.  The balcony was a nice feature so we could step outside to check the weather in the morning or to sit outside at night and have a glass of wine.  Being on the second floor was also great as it was easy to get our luggage in and out without getting too tired.  Anytime we had a question, the host was quick to respond through the AIR-BNB message system.  The neighborhood had plenty of places to eat within walking distance if you wanted a bite without venturing out.  Totally loved the place and would definitely recommend it to anyone!

Alejandro communicated with me ahead of my stay and accommodated my request to check in early. The place is exactly as described in the listing. It is in a good area right next to the 7 train station and close to a lot of restaurants and I always felt safe.  

The room is great.  Everything is new, clean, and there's a lot of space. The pictures are spot on.

It was a great experience and I will be looking to stay here again in the future if I'm in the area.

Perfect Queens and NYC apartment! Super comfortable, clean, located right around the corner from the 7 train and 10 minutes ride into Manhattan. The apartment is newly renovated, beautifully decorated with a very comfortable Queen bed. You are very close to the train, but the windows are sound proof and it's very quiet when you have the windows closed. Alejandro and his mother were very nice and accommodating hosts. This is now our favorite place to stay when we visit NYC, and we can't wait to return!

We had an enjoyable stay at Alejandro's place. He was prompt with any queries we had during the booking process. Check in was smooth.

Place was pleasant and homely. Bed was comfortable. There were many TV channels on cable TV which was much welcome. Small bottles of water were also provided.

Location was good. Just a few steps from the subway station. There's some noise from the trains running but it did not affect our sleep.

Beautiful and perfectly sized apartment! It has everything we needed. It's safe with intercom entry - It's a block from the subway, right near a 24 hour pharmacy and only a ten minute walk from the main shopping hub. Highly recommend this place!

We were pleased with Alejandro's apartment. 
When we arrive we were received by his uncle and his lovely mother that explained us everything.
We found the apartment very clean and as the photos showed, comfortable and very warm that made us feel like at home (our son after visit NY always said, let's come back home).
We will repeat if we come back to NY.
Many thanks to Alejandro and his family!!

Thank you to Alejandro and his mother for a lovely stay. We received a   warm welcome from  his mother Eliana. The apartment was spotless and fully equipped with everything we needed. Lots of nice small touches made us feel extra welcome. We were only 1 minute from the subway which is very convenient. Any queries we had were dealt with very promptly. We would have no hesitation in recommending this apartment to others and would definitely stay there again.

Alejandro's apartment was a perfect fit for us. Elena was there to meet us and her greeting made us feel at home. The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures, in a great area and just a stones throw from the train. We would stay there again.

This apt was very beautiful, nicely decorated, and very clean. All the little amenities were included, and they even left wine! The patio is nice too. Everything was perfect although my only hesitation to book again was the subway noise. It was definitely loud and one reviewer mentioned "soundproof" Windows....well there's definitely a rumble when you're trying to sleep.

This apartment is fabulous! The location is so convenient for both the bus and train and easy walking to restaurants and shops. The apartment itself is downright spacious and looks just like the photos, including the bonus of a little porch. The building and apartment both are immaculate and Alex provides a lot of extra amenities like toiletries, coffee and filters, bottled water, etc. There were three of us and we all loved it.

This is a fantastic apartment.  It is beautifully appointed, spacious and super convenient.  The mattress is very comfortable and the pillows are great.  The towels are plush.  The kitchen is stocked with dishes and flatware and basic cooking utensils...everything we needed to make this a great trip.  Alejandro was very welcoming and easy to contact and very responsive.  I will keep this apartment on my speed dial.
Great place!! My parents loves the apartment! Great location just a few steps away from train station. Love the filipino restaurants nearby!!! Will definitely come back next time. Thanks!!!

Incredibly friendly host! the apartment is spotless and looks exactly as described and seen on the photos. The neighborhood is fine - nice restaurants nearby. So close to a convenient Subway Stop of the Number 7 Flushing line which takes you to midtown Manhattan in no time. The noise from the elevated Subway is not at all disturbing. The host is very helpful, as we were needing heat and did not know how it worked - he came over immediately to set it up.

Wonderful host. The apartment is beautiful, clean, and exactly as depicted on the photographs. Very conveniently located. Nice restaurants in the neighborhood. The number 7 Subway line very close. It would be a good idea to make guests aware, to look up possible Subway changes and alternatives especially on weekends. Both weekends my brother and his wife stayed at the apartment, there were major Subway repair works going on, which meant that there was no service to Manhattan all weekend. There is the Q32 bus stop nearby which goes to Manhattan. All in all a great place to stay at! Highly recommended!  My brother and his wife visiting from Austria, Europe enjoyed their stay at the apartment very much. They mentioned that they thought that the bed/mattress was great and that they slept very well.
Fantastic place in perfect neighborhood - super close to great ethnic food, local bars, and the train for commuting elsewhere. Alejandro was responsive and friendly and we had a great visit.
It is a nice place for my family. Close to the subway station, small grocery, pharmacy, and restaurants. The apartment is new and the host prepared nearly everything for us. I love his sofa bed!

We loved Alejandro's place. It was extremely clean and had everything we needed. The location was super convenient as well - right next to the subway station, but we could hear the trains coming and going. I would definitely recommend this apartment, just keep in mind you might need earplugs for a good night's sleep.
Fatastic apartment and location. Very helpful host. Clean!

I immediately felt welcomed.  My host was there to meet me and ensured that I had all the information I might require to make my stay as comfortable as possible.  The apartment was exactly as described and the location was perfect being near my family whom I was visiting and near to the subway so that Manhattan was in easy reach.  There were extra touches such as shampoo, soap, coffee etc. left for my use and plenty of the other essentials. I couldn't fault this listing and would gladly stay here again.
Alejandro was a great host,  very responsive and helpful in recommendations on neighborhood.   Couldn't be closer to 7 train to get into NYC.  Neighborhood also is fun to explore,  lots of good food!

Alejandro was a great host with fast responses on all of our questions/messages.
The apartment was very clean and cozy with all the amenities we needed and the bed was very comfy.
Check in and check out was very easy, although we arrived late at night.
The train station is very close(you can hear the trains - didn't bothered us at all) and it took only 25min to Manhattan.
We would definitely stay again at Alejandro's!
Very nice place. Would recommend to friends.
Very clean and have everything I need even something I can't find in a 5 star hotel

Alejandro is a great host.  We enjoyed our stay at his apartment.  The apartment is steps away from the 52nd St/Lincoln Ave stop on the 7 train, but you would not know it by how quiet and peaceful it is in the apartment. We had no trouble finding local stores, food, and coffee shops. The apartment was clean and had many of the comforts of home available to us (well appointed kitchen, clean bathroom, quiet bedroom, living area with TV and Wifi, and more). Getting around the city was easy, since the subway and a constant flow of taxis are literally steps from the door of the apartment building.
Alejandro was very professional.  The apartment was clean and comfortable.  The check-in process was easy and smooth.  Great experience.

Great clean and tidy apartment and really close to the subway. Perfect location as far enough out to not be in busy manhattan but easily and quickly accessible.

Would definitely stay here again if we come back to New York :)

Absolutely perfect place to stay. We were greeted my Alejandro's mom, who was one of the nicest ladies I've met. The apartment was a little ways away from Times Square, but nothing less than perfect for what we were wanting. Very diverse neighborhood with many delicious Hispanic and Asian restaurants.

This airbnb was perfect, it was super clean and organized as well. I didn't get to meet alejandro because he was out of town but his mom did let us in and gave us a mini tour of the apartment. My flight had been delayed but when i got to the apartment everything was perfect. i would definitely stay here again.

What a wonderful place and terrific hospitality! It was so clean and updated, and it was conveniently close to the train and lots of bars and restaurants. There were thoughtful amenities like toothpaste, etc. - a very nice touch. Thank you so much for letting us stay!

This was our first stay using Airbnb.  This was a nice apartment, very clean and extremely close to the 7 train.  Just a few stops and you can be in Manhattan, however there are plenty of bars and restaurants close by. You can hear the train in the distance but it was only noticeable to me in the morning as I was waking up.
We had a great time at Alejandro's place, he responded immediately to concerns that came up. A great host we highly recommend.
very easy check-in and communication. apartment was very clean, safe. definitely recommended.

Alejandro and his mother were really helpful to help me settle in the apartment with fast and good replies to my questions. I really appreciated that the place was exactly as pictured and in a pristine condition. A great stay!!
Great location super clean
We had a great stay!   Great apartment, clean and cozy.  Fully equipped.  Thank you!
这是一套非常舒适的小公寓,交通非常便捷,离曼哈顿很近,且出门两分钟即刻可到达地铁站｡走路到超市也只有五分钟路程｡室内干净,日常生活设施基本齐备,房东热情周到｡非常适合小家庭或小团伙入住｡

The apartment was well appointed and comforable. Shower was good. It was very close to the train line which made it noisy at night. We had a problem with the window air conditioner on the bedroom which vibrated intermittently so we did not sleep well. Hopefully the landlord will get this fixed in time for the next guest.

This place was amazing!! The host was on point. Very accommodating and helpful. The apartment was super clean.. Quiet.. Private.. I did NOT want to leave at ALL. Totally recommend this place again. And I'm looking forward to renting this spot again!!! Thank you sooo much!!
Just as advertised, well-equipped for a long stay, and very quiet despite its proximity to the train. Highly recommend!!

We had a wonderful time staying in Alejandro's apartment his mother was very welcoming and so helpful! The apartment is so close to the subway and so many great bars and restaurants. We will definitely be staying here again the next time we come to New York!

Fantastically appointed and located apartment. A great space, well decorated and with thoughtful extras to make the stay here really easy. Loves having the balcony to sit out on in the summer evenings and watch the people of Queens go by. Check in was easy, air conditioned, comfy furniture and lovely kitchen. 
It's so great being close to the train station. It is a 10 to 15 minute train trip to Times Square and all the major stops in the centre of Manhattan. Plus many option to changes trains to every other Subway line. 
It was a little noisy, being close to the train line and light sleeper might have some trouble. But all the good things far outweighed this issue for us. 
Thank you!
The apartment is in a great location in Queens! Alejandro was flexible in the check-in process, which we really appreciated :-)

Excelente alojamiento y anfitrión. Nos recibió la mamá de Alejandro quien nos entregó la llave del departamento y estuvo siempre al pendiente durante nuestra estancia. Estuvimos alojados 16 días, 3 adultos y un bebé de 1 año. El departamento es tal cuál está descrito, nos interesaba mucho poder cocinar y la cocina está muy bien equipada. La lavadora de platos también fue muy útil. No cuenta con lavadora de ropa pero hay una lavandería grande a 1 cuadra, así como farmacia y supermercado. La estación del metro está a media cuadra y no se escucha tanto si todas las ventanas están cerradas. La línea 7 del metro pasa por ahí, y conecta con la mayoría de las demás líneas del metro. Recomendamos este lugar si visitas NYC.

Beautiful place that was very clean. The host was very nice and accommodating(we were arriving late in the evening and they waited to give us the keys and told us where we could park). Very safe area and the place is within a one minute walk to the subway and great eats.

Fab apartment in a great location in Queens near 7 train station only 15 mins from Grand Central station. Would advise ear plugs given trains run most of the night! 
Apt was clean and comfortable and welcoming after long days doing the tourist trail. / shopping. Plenty of reasonable priced eating options within 10-15 mins walk also. Used Uber to get around locally at night.
