neighborhood_overview: [LOCATION] The apartment is conveniently located in the hustle & bustle area in Kowloon surrounded by numerous tourist attractions, shopping arcades, fine restaurants and fabulous night entertainment.  Just close to Nathan Road ( which is the main thoroughfare in Kowloon and lined with shops and restaurants and throngs with tourists). This is friendly decorated apartment with an excellent location which provide you a decent stay during your holiday or business trip! -2 minutes walk to Yau Ma Tei MTR station (Exit A1) -5 minutes walk to Temple Street -5 minutes walk to Sai Yeung Choi Street South (where many shops and local shopping mall are on both side) -5 minutes walk to Woman Street/ Ladies Market ( a famous place where you can buy budget clothing and soft goods) -10 minutes walk to Langham Place (the most popular and biggest shopping mall in Mongkok!) -12 minutes walk to Mongkok Computer Shopping Center -15 minutes walk to Sneaker Street - Winthin 20 minutes MTR to business distric
notes: [What I have PREPARED for you] Free WIFI * Bedrooms: - Clean Bed Sheet / Pillows / Covers  , blankets - Double bed 4' x 6', Bunk Bed (upper 3' x 6', lower 4'x6') - Clothes rack - Air-conditioned Bathroom: - Towels - Hair dryer - Hot Water Supply - Toilet Paper Kitchen: - Cutlery Set / Bowl / Mug / Cup  - Dinnerware (knife, fork, spoon, cups, plates) - Electric Water Kettle  - Gas stove/ Induction stove - Refrigerator - Washing machine Living room: - TV - Table with Chairs  - A Sofa bed - Air-conditioned [Easy check in and check out] Check in time: 3:00pm Check out time: 12:00pm Late check in charge after 9:00pm: HK$200 The above is the normal check in and check out time, but the time is flexible actually if it is possible! Ask me for details! ^^ We started our airbnb-activity in summer 2011. Since then we could welcome visitors for family holiday trip, business trip, long vocation in Hong Kong, etc. from various countries.  Making our guest to stay as enjoyable as possible is our main
transit: [TRANSPORTATION] - 45 minutes take A21 direct express bus from HK airport to my place.  (Drop at Man Ming Lane, Nathan Road) - 40 minutes take Airport Express train from HK airport to my place. (Drop at Mongkok MTR Station) Then it is round 5-8 mins from the dropping point/MTR Station to my place.  Don't worry if you are not familiar with Hong Kong. :) I will provide you the transportation information and the meeting point for you!!
access: Location : The apartment is conveniently located in the hustle & bustle area in Kowloon surrounded by numerous tourist attractions, shopping arcades, fine restaurants and fabulous night entertainment.  Just near the Nathan Road ( which is the main thoroughfare in Kowloon and lined with shops and restaurants and throngs with tourists). -5 minutes walk to Sai Yeung Choi Street South (where many shops and local shopping mall are on both side) -5 minutes walk to Woman Street/ Ladies Market ( a famous place where you can buy budget clothings and soft goods) -6 minutes walk to Langham Place (the most popular and biggest shopping mall in Mongkok!) -6 minutes walk to Mongkok Computer Shopping Center -6 minutes walk to Sneaker Street -8 minutes walk to Tample Street You can find various restaurant from resonable prices to fine dining nearby. Everyday you have many choices for your meal! Of course, if you wanna make a quick meal yourself, you can buy the ingredients in the supermarkets nearby! -
interaction: What I have prepared for you :  Air-Conditioner  in living room and each bedroom  TV   Table with Chairs   Hair Dryer   Standard Bed & Mattress   Induction cooker   Refrigerator   Electric Water Kettle   A sofa bed   Cutlery Set / Bowl / Mug / Cup   Free Wifi   Hot Water Supply   Clean Bed Sheet / Pillows / Covers   Toilet Paper   Lift Access   Washing machine Mongkok/ Yau Ma Tei Check in time: 3:00pm Check out time: 12:00pm Late check in charge after 9:00pm: HK$200
house_rules: NEVER WAIT in the LOBBY or JUST OUTSIDE THE ENTRANCE. PLEASE WAIT IN THE SPECIFIC PLACE I STATED IN THE EMAIL as the residents will complain about it to the property management. Thus, when you check in and check out, please not to wait your friends in the lobby or the entrance! THANKS FOR YOUR KIND UNDERSTANDING! Check In Time: after 15:00 Very Late Check In Charge After 21:00: HKD200, after 00:00, HD300 MAKE SURE (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or call me when you land Hong Kong or at least 1 hour before you arrive such that I can prepare well for the key passing to you.  Wait in the specific place, NOT enter the building without me to avoid unnecessary misunderstandings with the property management.  Check Out Time: before 10:00 Late Check out Charge: HKD300 (need to check with the availability) You can also do the Town check in for your flight, or I can also recommend some places for you to store luggage. Again, NEVER wait your friends in the lobby while checking out.  Keep SILENT, NO T

host.host_about:
Sharing happiness to others is the thing I try to do everyday.

Once you spend the days and nights in my place, I hope you can feel the warm environment provided from me. I will try my very best to be a good host! People coming from different countries are very welcome and culture exchange is one of the thing I eager from being a host.

If you have any questions, drop me a line. I look forward to hosting you!

Love travelling.
Love the World.
Love communication.
Love making friends.

Enjoy the life and treasure what we have.

reviews.comments:
Cathy is very kind! We arrived at 8:30PM, but cathy did not complain, still hospitality to us!
The room is very nice, my two sons like the safa in the dinning room!

Thanks!

Cathy is a responsible and responsive host.  We had a good experience from booking,  communicating as well as in getting direction from her.  She took care of us in our arrival as well as departure.  The apartment is clean,  comfortable and located close to MTR station which is really convenient.  The airport bus is located very close by,  i would recommend anyone to stay here.  Thanks for hosting us Cathy.
The place was very neat and well kept- it had everything you need a good wifi, working air conditioners and hot water - we had a great stay n would definitely recommend- also near mtr
房間跟照片一樣漂亮,位置也很不錯｡

The apartment is just like the picture.  
The neighbourhood is not perfect.  Like those in the typical hong kong drama, with dark alleys and wooden door.  From the MTR, we need to walk across 2 streets.  However, the entrance to the apartment is behind. we actually need to walk round the row to get to the apartment.
Location is good near to 7-11 , near Tsui Wah.  

Hot water is perfect.  Beds and aircons are perfect.  
Toilet space is small.  But its a typical hong kong apartment, so pls do not have high expectations in terms of space. 
The beddings are comfortable.  But pillows are too soft.
Perfect for 3 person.  
Pls take note that there are no towels provided.
The house just absolutely like in the photo., clean and comfortable. For a group of 5 to 6 person, the house would be satisfied. Location is good also, very near to MTR station.

Very convenient location and great place to stay, within less than a 2 mins walk to Ya ma tei MTR with nearby supermarket and many eating houses downstairs and less than 5 mins to temple street market.  Free Wifi, kitchen provide basic need with washing machine.  Both Cathy and Hazel are very helpful to provide information to my enquires before my stay trip, and co-ordinate very well on the check in day.

Hazel's sister was very welcoming, she fetch us right exactly at the meeting area and instructed us everything for our entire stay. Although one of the room's light wasn't working, we didn't mind since the whole flat is very homey! Thank you for letting us stay in your home, Hazel!
Very convenient to YMT MTR. Decent place. Good WIFI connection. Hot water in bathroom not that consistent. Overall satisfactory.

Don't expect posh with the price you r paying. Nice and cosy enough but abit noisy as the street was mainly hardware suppliers in the early morning. Got everything u need as at home. WIFI was fast, place full of small eataries, stores and etc. Hazel was very accomodative and allowed me to check in early. Place was very near to ymt mtr no doubt. Worth the price for your trip but not for fussy ppl. My only concern is need better floor mat as floor tiles in living room is very slippery when coming out from bath.
房子对出行相当便利...离油麻地地铁站相当的近...步行去旺角也不会很远...房间相当的干净也很明亮...房间里基本的设施都很齐备...充电的插头也非常的充足...唯一不足的可能就是出行的时间里香港的晚上比较凉~洗澡的热水不太足够~房间真的非常温馨~对出行而言这样的体验实在很珍贵~~

the location is perfect, just 2 mins from YMT exit A. hot water is only last 5-8 mins so you must take bath very quickly. the traffic is very heavy here so it is hard to sleep well at night. however, the price is worthy in HK you know the hotel in HK is really expensive and it cost more than 1000HKD for a 200 square feet room in 3 or more stars hotels, and it can be accomodated at least 5 ppl.

Hazel is so friendly, and her apartment was neat and cosy. The location is wonderful and near to the metro. I love this place!!

Hazel是一个非常友好的主人,她的房子非常舒服,重要的是地点非常方便,离地铁很近｡我爱死这个地方了!!

Hazel was friendly, helpful and promptly replying to our enquiries either via email or watapps. No doubt her apartment are small (HK standard flat size), her place are clean, very well maintained and it look exactly as in the picture. Her apartment was also less than 5 minutes walk to the MTR. We will definitely stay here again for our next visits. Thank you Hazel.

We had a wonderfull stay in Hazel's appartment. It's smart and clean. As a  big group we share two rooms and the living room, the bed clothes are enough for us and clean. only 3-5 min to MTR You Ma tei and there is also restaurants and supermarket nearby. Before we arrived Hazel sent all cear info how to arrive there and contact info.I'll 100% recommend Hazel's room.:)

Easy to communicate with the host. Checking in and out was easy. Host was friendly but was busy I guess so she didn't meet us personally, it was her dad that picked us up. However, it will be good if her dad could pick us up from the station as its our first time in Hong Kong. 

Overall, the home was small yet cosy. Extended for half a day for additional 300hkd. 

Anyway, thanks hazel for the homestay:)
Hazel was very friendly and accommodating when we arrived. The place was very convenient and close to the station. Clean and quiet area.

Hazel was very friendly and provided ample information regarding apartment location, where to meet up, check-in and check-out procedures. Apartment was true to pictures, clean and very short walk from the Yau Ma Tei MTR station! The apartment had enough beds for 7 of us, though it was rather cramped with all our luggages. 

Overall, wonderful experience and had a very pleasant stay :) Thank you Hazel!

Hazel's sister (Tammi) picked us and show us the way to the apartment. My friends and I booked Hazel's apartment near YMT mtr. Indeed it's convenient, 3mins walk to mtr, however  besides the rundown toilet (small pathetic mirror in bathroom, water heater inconsitent) n kitchen, response time my Hazel's sister was delayed. No additional lock at main door. Security might be a concern for ladies. It's 2nd level, near roadside, it could be noisy at night and early as 6am. Her service and attitude was rather unacceptable. She told us the wrong direction to mtr from apartment, my friends and I walked round and round at night. I did if towels would be provided,she said yes, She did not show us where. When we got back to the apt after our dinner, we Texted her to ask where the towels were kept, no response from her at all. We're rather disappointed.
房间很干净,地点也很便利,让我和小伙伴们度过了非常快乐的几天!
House was exactly the same as photos and it is very convenient from Yau Ma Tei MTR :) House was also very clean!

We never met Hazel but she was friendly and responsive with her messages. Her flat is nice and clean and comfortable! The only thing i woudl say is the noise in the mornig can be disruptive, and the outside looks a little old and run down. Other than that, a great stay and would come here again.

We confirmed through 2 (Hidden by Airbnb) message that our check in time was at 12:30pm before we arrived at the meeting point. When we arrived, no one was there and then called Hazel 2 times before her cleaning maid show up 15 minutes later. (Keep in mind it was very humid and hot already and we're all sweating at that moment) when we arrived at the flat, the maid then told us that she will need another 2 hours to clean the place. She said we can leave the luggage but cannot stay at the place. (We were all very frustrated and just wanted to take a shower but instead we had to go back out for another 2 hours until the room was ready. Hazel said she mentioned in the email that we can leave the luggage only when I booked this place but I don't remember seeing it and I think she could have reminded me while we were talking through (Hidden by Airbnb) again.) The location area was dirty, a lot of hardware stores and lots of banging and machinery sounds. Especially at night, there is lots of guys standing around on the street. We were at the 2nd floor,you can smell people smoking from the ground floor and I think because it's an old building in a hot weather. The sewer from the bathroom has a bad odor coming back up from the sewer hole. It's disgusting and it bothers us to fall asleep at night. No soap or shampoo provided, they have the washing machine but no washing detergent. You have to buy everything your own. It's very inconvenient. From my experience with airbnb, they have lots of better hostels with same price range and better location. We quickly realized picking Hazel's place this time around wasn't a lucky choice. I do NOT recommend this place. Sorry!

We had to wait a while for the helper of the host to come and fetch us, host is generally contactable and nice. The room is to the pictures, but the corridor and the building was abit run down (usual hk apartments blocks i guess) the neighbourhood is good, with afew places for supper and near to MTR!

The host was efficient in replying email queries and the host's helper was fast in fetching us from the designated pick up location. The place was true to pictures, a really clean apartment. The only downside is that there isnt a proper mirror. The host could put up a proper mirror on one of the walls in the living room. The location is really accessible, just a 3 minutes walk from the yau ma tei mtr with a nearby supermarket. It was a nice stay.

Meet Up: Hazel helper came to pick us up from the designated area 15 min. Hong Kong weather is really hot and humid. After a flight and lugging luggage there, the last thing you wanna do is wait by the streets with all your luggage. Her helper is a lady of few words. If you plan to outsource your check in and out process please do train them in hospitality. The apartment: The apartment was as advertised. Be reminded to future visitor to bring toiletries and perhaps a mirror as the whole house has 1 palm sized mirror. Also note that there is only 2 towel should you have more then 2 guest. The coridor looks really creepy and the downstairs is hardware shop. There were no noise problems and the corridor was to be expected of hong kong but it did made me a little anxious when I was brought to the apartment with someone who barely spoke other then explaining the keys and wifi. Water heater and pressure was fine despite previous comments. The Cons: Let's start with the biggest issue I have with this apartment. Privacy/ Safety. In the 4 days 3 night I stayed here 3 people has came to the house. The helper twice And a couple of people trying to convert me to Christianity Mid afternoon when we were out one day I managed to get wifi. So I check my (Hidden by Airbnb) and what not. I got a message from hazel that she needs to let herself in to fix the aircon. First of all I slept in that room the night before and there seem to be nothing wrong with it. So I quickly tried to recall if I left any valuebles out and asked my family if they have any stuff out. They said they think it should be alright but by then they have already let themselves in and I had no more wifi so I texted her an hour later that she could but she has already let herself in. Which to me I guess is alright since she did inform me. I did come back with debris on the floor but thats a small matter I guess. When the Christian came to the door we kind of panicked abit cause it was in around afternoon and we didn't expect anyone to come. They started out with saying 'they are our neighbours'. So I thought maybe they were here to complain as I think it's not allowed to sublet in hk. So we followed the instructions given which is to say we are hazels friend. Then they went through the motion of the whole conversion thang anf we kinda got the jist that they were not complainy neighbours. I guess they state they are neighbours because it's a gated apartment complex and didn't want to be thought of as trespassing. So they left eventually I think the scariest experience is when her helper came into the house unannounced. My parent...

So, you're wanting to experience Hong Kong from the local perspective, possibly wanting to get off the beaten track and have a more authentic experience? Well this is the place the do it. My daughters and I spent 3 weeks in this apartment and we found that it met all of our needs. The check in process was clearly explained and we were met promptly. The communication with Hazel was great. It was easy to understand and follow accurately. 
The apartment itself is clean and comfortable however you should note that this is in the hardware area of Ya Ma Tei and the building itself is quite old. But wait!! The location and neighbourhood (pending the usual common sense) is safe with great access to the MTR and buses. The building has security and the apartment is double dead-locked. We felt very safe during our stay.
The apartment does have WiFi and you can pick up pre-paid 4G sim cards nearby. TV is in Chinese though.
Nearby there are a host of great places to eat albeit you must understand that there is not much English spoken in the immediate area (you wanted authentic right?). This didn't pose too much of a barrier as a number of places have an English version of their menu, and there's some really cool apps for your smartphone. If you eat local you can eat very cheaply. For the essentials there is a Wellcome supermarket (2 min walk) on Shanghai Street and a Park'n'Shop on Canton St. You also have the Canton St Wet Market with a great selection of frest fruit & veg plus very nice cooked meats. Within a 5-10 min walk you also have the Temple Street & Ladies Markets which are great for a look. 
Foodwise, the local area offers a feast for the senses. Download the Open Rice HK App so you can get a comprehensive listing of cuisine and quality (its free). The price and quality in Hong Kong generally is very good value. We spent a lot of time eating in the numerous little street kitchens and hole-in-a-walls in the local area. Use the 'if the locals eat there- its OK' rule and you rarely go wrong. Loads of fun too!!
Coffee enthusiasts can get espresso from Pacific Coffee in the Langham place basement from 8am and also from Knockbox coffee on Hak Po Street from 11 am. Knockbox is excellent and highly rated. 
For craft beer enthusiasts "Tap - The Ale Project" is also on Hak Po Street with a great range of International and local brews. 
For photo enthusiasts the local area is full of personality and great photo opportunities. The area surrounding the apartment is a very interesting people watching experience. We learnt a lot during our stay.
Remember, the apartment is clean and comfortable but its not a 5 star experience. It was however good value for money and we really enjoyed our stay. Hazel is a very good host.

Hazel's quick response to my messages gave me assurance that we deal to the right person altho I haven't seen her during my stay but she quickly send Lily to guide us to her condo. The condo unit itself is clean and comfortable but outside of it is quite a mess. There's an ongoing construction/renovation on the building but it's fine with us.

Location is good, 5mins walk from the nearest Yau Ma Tei exit. There's a nearby restaurant, 7eleven and bakeshop.
The house was very dusty due to the construction outside. Aircon was not cooling. Also, there should be an extra fan in the house especially during summer. Location was convenience.

I didn't get to meet Hazel in person, but she was a great host! very helpful and her replies were quick! Her mom, who picked us up was very friendly too. Although there were some renovation going on in the whole building, room is accurate as seen from the photos, neat and clean, except that  the living room air-con needs abit of cleaning up as its not cool at all. Location very convenient, close-by to Yau Mei Tei Mtr and easy to get around. We truly enjoyed our stay. Thanks for hosting us!
房间真的很棒,干净整洁,交通也很方便,附近还有一家翠华,房主很热情,强力推荐
非常感谢hazel的招待,非常棒的两房一厅,干净整洁,样样俱全,出入有电梯,地段非常好,离油麻地地铁站很近,价格又很实惠,值得多住几天哈哈!
很乾淨,交通也很方便!唯一是沒有衛生紙及全身鏡,稍嫌不方便!
很不错,房主一直用 (Hidden by Airbnb) 跟我联系｡离地铁近,附近有翠华711
地理位置非常方便,购物吃东西都比较便利,屋内配套设施也算齐全｡就是大楼外墙正在装修外部环境不太理想,略吵｡
房子在一栋居民楼大厦里,楼里有固定住户,比较安静｡屋内宽敞｡适合四个人小住｡住起来蛮舒服的｡地理位置不错,交通很便利｡
房子交通很方便,麻雀虽小五脏俱全,可以煮饭可以洗衣服,就是镜子太小了,要是客厅可以拉一根晾衣绳就好了,房东很好很赞
公寓不大 室内干净 靠近油麻地地铁 交通方便 但是希望房东在我们预订时要告知我们公寓大楼外墙正在装修

Hazel was responsive at first but she became unreachable when our travel date came close which made us nervous. We wrote her 3 emails, 2 Airbnb messages, and even sent a whatapp message (which was shown as read) but did not seem to to able to get her attention. It was until the night before our departure that I asked my HK friend to help call Hazel's cellphone and we  finally came to an agreed meet up time. Thankfully, Hazel became responsive again on the day we arrived HK. 

The apartment is spacious compared to standard HK apts and the bedding was comfortable. However, we wish that the listing would indicate the fact that the outside of the building is under construction. Basically we were told and did not open the windows at all during our stay because of all the dusts. Given the humid weather in HK and minimal air circulation, there was a smell in the apt when we first arrived and it lingered for the following 3 days. 

All furniture shown in the pictures are there but many of them are pretty worn out. The cover of a drawer in the bunk bed room would fall of if you try to pull it. But for a short stay, furniture is not an essential in our opinion. We did appreciate that there is an air conditioner in each room.

Check out process was simple and smooth.

地點很方便,Hazel很融洽,很容易溝通,資訊準確!
A+++ Host
乾淨的房子,有機會會再去的^__^
还不错啊,地理位置很好,交通便利,房间配备很齐全,很干净,就是地方小点,大床的垫子太软了,客厅沙发不会整成床

地方离麻油地地铁站出口走3分钟就到了,算是相当方便的了｡由于是老城区了房子都比较破旧,楼道也比较窄,电梯优点摇摇欲坠的感觉｡
房间家具比较齐全,住的也还算OK,可能是香港本身湿气比较重,房间略微有些味道｡
总体还算ok
good location, just 2 minutes walk to the metro station. Good place for traveler.

Arrived to a pleasant surprised that Hazel sent someone to meet us at the MTR station. The apartment was very close to the MTR indeed and not difficult to get around as everywhere surrounding the apartment is convenient, especially food and MTR ride not to mentioned there are numerous access to the public bus nearby. The apartment is clean and exactly as how it was posted. I would recommend for anyone whom are visiting HKG to stay here. We enjoyed our stay at this apartment. Thank you Hazel and Lily for hosting us.
Although the house is not as imagination,but it is quite good..convenient..

離地鐵非常近~很方便的一個地方
房間不算太大但非常的乾淨
She was friendly and her room was cozy. Her house is convenient as well around 5 minutes walk from the MRT.
She is very nice. The room is clean and cozy. It's nearly MTR station just walk around 2 mins.

The location is really near to the Yau Ma Tei MTR. The house is spacious and generally clean. Host provided towels, hair dryer and comfy quilts which is pretty thoughtful. Host is also prompt in her reply and systematic when come to making arrangements for check in and check out.

The host was very nice to accomodate my last min request to check-in in the morniny. The place is very accessible, about 3 mins walk from Yau Ma Tei MTR Station. There are also many good eateries around the place, including Tsui Hua. The home itself is considered quite spacious given HK standard, with complete amenities and area is clean. Just that it takes 10 to 15 mins to warm up the water heater, which will last for about another 10 mins before reheating again. Overall the place is great to stay in given its highly accessible location, spacious rooms and cleanliness.
地理位置去哪都很方便 ,房间在香港也算得上不错了,可以住得下五六个人,性价比高

The host was very communicative - it was very easy to get in touch with her when needed and she was very helpful in making sure that we were comfortable in her home. The location was decent, only a 2 minute walk to the MTR ( which easily took us to all the main areas in Hong Kong) and a 10 minute walk to Mong Kok. The house was very clean when we arrived, however, the refrigerator wasn't cool enough to store food in and the house itself was extremely humid even when it wasn't outside to a point where nothing that was wet could be dried. It was a bit uncomfortable to shower in the small bathroom as well, as the toilet and shower head are only inches apart. Other than that, everything that was needed was provided for us and Hazel tried to make sure everything in the house was running smoothly, which we are very grateful for! When a piece of furniture broken down, Hazel made sure to have someone come by and have it fixed as soon as she could. We would recommend this place for those who are considering staying for short term / a couple of days. Thank you Hazel!
公寓乾淨整潔,吹風機,WiFi什麼的都有,熱水也有,床鋪也收拾的很乾淨,交通很方便,離地鐵口和公交站都很近,附近有翠華餐廳,順義牛奶公司,許留山都不是很遠,check in的地方很好找,checkout也很方便｡Hazel人也很nice的解答我的問題｡第一次在airbnb上定房子,真是很好的體驗~~~
Hazel is awasome, nice and always available if someone need something, I recomend her so much !
房间很温馨,也很干净,购物出行都很方便
在油麻地地铁站附近 出行很方便｡房间跟图片一样 挺干净的｡Hazel提前几天就和我联系 沟通入住时间~是个多人出行的不错选择
Great location

Host met us about a block away from the building and showed us how to get in. Great room, perfect for the three of us (we left the top bunk open, could have easily had more people). Very, very close to Yau Ma Tei station, easy to walk around and see Mong Kok and about three stops to central HK which was great. All around had a good stay and would absolutely use Hazel again if I come back.
Hazel was wonderful! She arranged for her helper Lily to meet us at a time convenient for us. Highly recommended. Good location, convenient and close to everything.

The host was very accommodating. Her helper, Lily, met us at the 7-Eleven and took us to the apartment. It was basic, but clean with wi-fi and air conditioning. The neighbourhood was not quite what we expected and it was a little difficult to find a cafe or restaurant next to the hostel. However, a few blocks away, there is a mall with a lot of options.

The only major issue was the hot water. The explanation on how to use it wasn't very clear. The knob was left on "cold", and when my friend turned it on, she burned her feet. I think this could be a danger, so there should be a warning regarding this.
Hazel is very accommodating. The unit is very accessible near the mrt. Big unit compared to other units. Will surely recommend it to my friends.

It was a rather enjoyable stay for us at Hazel's apartment. Hazel is nice and easy to talk to. Thus, making any special arrangements were not much of a hassle. Another plus point is that the apartment is located near the MTR, which really make things so much more convenient!
房间还算干净,交通也方便,房东人也很和善｡不足之处,床上用品,有污点及异味｡
Hazel人很nice,回復速度快,入住當天接待的是Hazel父親,非常熱情,耐心講解,and一見面就幫忙提行李,真不好意思(行李太重)^ ^｡室內衛生乾淨,和圖片上的一致｡旺角,廟街,果欄街,等地非常近｡逛街逛得根本停不下來｡^_^

It's my first time of using Airbnb and feel very lucky meet Hazel as a host. Satisfy with everything and Hazel provide us a convenience way to check in. She is efficient and punctual on message reply, we are worry could not reach Hazel when we are at HK, but feel so lucky she was always follow up us and guiding us to check in. Overall great experience and would come back visit again.

This apartment is small! Like only 2 people are fitting on that couch; but thats alright cause this place will just about hold 3 people and their bags. The 'sofabed' is useless as the pullout section is several inches lower than the sofa part.... both of which are harder than concrete so you wouldnt get much sleep if you managed to prop the pullout piece up anyway. As for the bunk the top one was just about wider than me and im not broad. That too was as hard as rock. Also that room sounds like there is a msrble stuck in the aircon unit just rantling around. Max comfortable stay in theres 1. The other room is big enough to house 2 and is comfortable but we did both get bitten. The bathroom has all the basics, water pressure is good, temperature is a little fiddly. There is mould in the grout however... and the drainage is poor. The neighbourhood is a bit shady. Theres a sign on the inside of the door that says dont wait near the building with bags and if anyone asks who you are you have to say you are "Hazel's friends" which is dodgy af. Overall i feel there is little value in this listing and would not recommend.
Not recommended for light sleepers… The flat is right above some metalware stores which work through the night uploading goods with workers yelling out loud…It happened every night during our stay…

Hazel is very nice and patiently answer my questions. The flat is located in Yau Ma Tei
,  so the transportation and shopping is very convenient. But I don't recommend to light sleepers.
整体感受一般,卫生条件一般,本身对灰尘和螨虫过敏,入住期间就犯了过敏性鼻炎,难受得不行｡没想到香港民宿就这种条件……无语

The prior Airbnb reservation, which was booked and confirmed weeks before, was cancelled by the host 3 days before the arrival date of our 11 days trip to Hong Kong. We had to scramble. Luckily, Airbnb has quite an extensive listings at HK.  Finding an alternate at last minute while still dreadful, is possible. 
Hazel's 2BR's listing at Yau Ma Tei fitted our need. I sent the booking inquiry. We are very grateful for the host's prompt response as we really had not time to wait for an answer. Subsequent communication was also prompt and straight forward.
The Host was also accommodating in allowing us to leave the luggage at the unit prior to the 3pm check-in time.
The unit is roomy in the living room. The couch/sofa bed is big, but has a bigger stain. The TV has a few channels to pass time while the wife/kid is getting ready. But one should pack accordingly, HDMI cable and a properly loaded laptop for example, if more big screen time is expected. Also, pack your own power adapter. 
The bedrooms are adequate. The queen bed is too soft for our taste. Accessing one of the 3 A/C requires stepping on top of the bed.
The place locates on an industrial/commercial part of town. There are multiple hardware stores/distributors at street level. All these businesses get re-stocked between 3am to 6am Monday thru Saturday. Trucks engines, air brake releases, back up beeps, hydraulic tailgate, dropped pipes, workers yelling, and many other sounds are vividly clear from unit as it's 2 floors up from the actions. BRING EARMUFFS.
On the plus side, empty street on Sunday.
The kitchen has the basic cookware and silverware, though without any cooking essentials such as oil & condiments. Other than boil something, there isn't much one can do there. 
Along with no dish soap to clean the dishes, there is no laundry detergent to go with the in-unit washer.
The bathroom is small, does the job, typical of HK. Though a bigger mirror would be nice. Also be sure to leave the window open at all time. Lacking P-trap on the shower floor drain, which likely shares the same pipe as the toilet, trace of sewer odor is an ever presence at the bathroom.
Overall, it's an old building on an older part of Hong Kong in one of the most expensive part of the world. One should really be realistic with the lodging depending on the price one is willing to pay.
跟HAZEL的沟通还算顺畅,房间比图片看起来要小一些｡一个房间的床里面的弹簧好像爆出来的,在床的边缘坐下时一定要小心,被戳痛两次｡抽屉需要大修一次,大部分都是坏了的｡清洁度还行,我们这样的粗人也不是特别介意

Hazell is very nice person... The accomodation space is big enough compared with other accomodation at the same price in HK... The facility is very complete, there's a kitchen set, refrigenerator etc... The location also very strategic, near from MTR station, near from Mongkok tourist area... Nothing more I can say, it's totally recomended acomodation if you visit HK with 3 or more people.

Hazel's place at Yau Ma Tei was very cosy for 5 of us and was located near the mtr! The facilities were mostly as shown in pictures. Hazel was vey accommodating and even though we did not get to meet her, we communicated online and she was of great help:)

Hazel was really organized and getting us prepared for our stay in HK. The unit is likely large for HK standards, but for a first time visitor, it was not what we expected. The street is lined with metal worker shops and is very loud and noisy in the middle of the night while trucks are prepping for delivery. We adjusted after one sleepless night, but may not be suitable for light sleepers. The bathroom is tiny - the shower is about 8" from the toilet, and not separated by a wall, so the whole bathroom gets wet when the shower is on. The unit itself is more aged in real life than the photo depicts. If you're looking for a real "local" experience, this may be a good choice.

Hazel had been very accommodating and informative before and during my stay at her place.

Apartment was well kept and clean, water pressure and heater was good.

Overall a good location - near to Yau Mei Tei station and many eateries.
It is very convenient location which close to train station. Not recommend to light sleeper but it is a good experience for hk life style.

Hazel has been nothing but polite and courteous. Whole process of booking the stay was straight forward and arriving at the meeting location to pick up the keys was easy. The suite was very clean with exception to towels provided. May want to bring your own towels for ease of mind. The location is great, convenient and close to transportation, restaurants, street food, and convenience stores. Stay here and you will get the full Hong Kong experience.
Very convenient location and great communication with Hazel. Plenty of space for multiple people to sleep and so close to the mtr.
Overall good. Just a bit too noisy.
挺方便的,房間在香港住過的裡面算大間的!

Hazel's place is greatly located 2 minutes away from the MTR. The home is really comfortable. There are supper places available around the location for the night owls and even a hotspot restaurant that opens till 4am in case you're really hungry! There's also a 7-11 located nearby in case you need to get any necessities. I highly recommend this stay to those reading up the reviews! (:

The apartment is very near the MTR station and a walking distance from many eateries, convenient stores and Nathan Road where you can get your shopping done. Was a little noisy due to the traffic and the apartment is smaller than in the photos. Nonetheless, Hazel was a very responsive host, flexible with the check-in arrangement and her helper Lily was friendly in receiving us too.
地理位置还是不错的,有一个大床,一个双人床,沙发床还不错,不过太短了翘着脚睡了4晚,在香港算是性价比很高的了,油麻地出口5分钟就到了,要是再加几个转换器就更好了｡

地段可以 离油麻地地铁站很近
但是浴室没有拖鞋
然后晚上噪音有点厉害
房子很好找,挺市中心的,在2楼

Great location with easy access to MTR and lots of local restaurants nearby. Downside is that it is very very very loud all day everyday and even through the night. Not recommended for light sleepers. The space was good though, we had 4 people and the space was enough for us plus all 10 of our suitcases! Her helper was very nice and so was she!
a little noisy outside the room

숙소 찾기 힘들었고 입실시 미팅을통해 들어가야하는 부분이 번거로움
숙소 방음 하나도안됨 밖에 소음 다들림
房间很不错,带着爸妈出来旅行的,跟姐姐和小侄子,一共5个人,挺适合这种家庭旅社的,交通也很方便

Thank you very much for such a nice host..Bruce is helpful, informative, and kind. Love the service and would love to stay there again if I visit Hongkong again. The place is strategic near from mtr. Maybe a little bit too small for me and my friends (5of us) because we shop alot lol..
Overall, it was an excellence service from bruce. Keep up the good work. If you have another apt with larger, affordable and strategic place..please let me know
Location comfortable & Cleaning
The host is very friendly and helpful. There is everything you need in the apartments including air conditioning, TV and other stuff (except for iron)
交通方便但窗户不隔音
Fun stay

I am on a 3-pax trip. I love the spaciousness of the accommodation as compared to the other cramped HK apartments I've been to, also on a 3-pax trip. It's what you get from the photos shown. 1 Master, 1 Guest (where there is a bunk bed). 

However, be mindful that there'll be no space in the guest room, for your luggage but no fear, the living room is one good solution. Should you be more than 3-pax, fear not, there's a sofa bed right in the living room! 

One downside during our travel is probably the spoilt bi-fold door to the toilet.

Other than, everything has been great. Location is perfect, couple of streets across (5mins) and Yau Ma Tei MTR you'll be at. It is a walkable distance to Mong Kok too. 

Did I mention? There's a lift up to where this apartment is. No crazy carrying of the luggage up to the storey, whew.

Thanks to the Host.
Not big, but clean and comfortable apartments. If you do not plan to spend much time at home - a perfect solution!
Everything was okay for me not much expectations from this apartment.
Ok for short stay. It was very noisy during the night. Judging from the pictures we expected something larger. The furniture is old and cheap.
房东很热情,房子在繁华地段,交通便利

Our family of 2 adults and two children stayed in Hazel's apartment in Hong Kong for two nights in early June/17. We didn't meet Hazel, but texted back and forth during the weekend about various things. She was always quick to respond and attempted to fix the most of the issues we had. Having said that we believe that the issues we had with the apt. should have been looked after before we checked in.  These things all could have been checked ahead of time. 

When Hazel's helper checked us in, she did not notice that the A/Cs in both bedrooms were not working. (outside temp in the 30's C.). Hazel did send someone to repair them, but only managed to fix one and we had to go without the other for the whole weekend because since it was Friday here was no one available till Monday to replace the damaged one.  The solution was to compensate us with a free pocket wifi. The helper brought this over and it was not working. We waited 45 minutes or more for another and that one only worked for about 3 hours. Do not rent these in Hong Kong! They are unreliable and wifi is at many places in the city.

We travel a lot around the world and all four of us said the apartment reminded us of a dormitory or hostel, with the dresser being broken in the bedroom with the bunks and a sharp spring sticking out on the mattress in the bedroom. I scratched my leg on this twice. The furniture is basic as you would expect in a dorm.

 My wife insists I mention the brown water leaking from the ceiling into the kitchen. It only happened for a few minutes, but she found it unsettling.

Also, it seemed quite unusual that we were instructed to let the next group of guests into the apt. if they arrived before we checked out even though they would be with the helper.  My wife was still there when the next group arrived and in they came to an uncleaned apartment. This was surprising.

This is our first stay overnight in Hong Kong, so I am not sure about the standards for the price you pay, but this apartment is just O.K.  Our family recommends you try somewhere else. It wasn't horrible, but we think you can do better for your money.

very good host, responsive and attend to all our request promptly!
AC was not working in one of the rooms and she immediately arrange for repair the next day. near to Yau Ma Tei station, walking distance to many places like ladies street, mongkok, langham place.

The place is actually a good size for its price considering that HK is pretty expensive and the average size in HK is quite small usually. Can be a little bit noisy outside some days at night but it didn't really impact me if I had the window closed ✌

Home is very close to station and minutes of walking to busy mong kok area.  Hazel was very responsive whenever I sent her a text with questions.  Will definitely consider this place again in the future!

위치가 역 바로 옆에 있고 방도 크고 깨끗해서 매우 좋았습니다 
clean, big, nice
清洁,大房子,善良
Big enough for 7 people and the wifi is fast too! Walking distance from the MTR station and is very accessible.

Hazel's place is quiet good because in the heart of city and just minutes away from mongkok. The amenities is completely good and the staff was helpful to explain it to us, subway yau ma tei station just 1 minute away its very near but the neighbor quite not much good because there are many metalworks and another heavy stuff store there but overall this place gives me nice experience while in hongkong
hazel的房子 地段交通便利,性价比OK,建议客厅沙发床整体清洁加强,hazel态度很好,值得赞赏
房子距離旺角和港鐵都很近,步行即可到達,內部整體來說也乾淨,唯一不足就是鄰近街道,房子隔音較差,晚上睡覺會有點嘈雜｡與房東溝通一切都較順利,適合家庭或三四好友一同入住｡是一次不錯的入住體驗!
完美本来是3点入住的,但是我们早班机,跟房东沟通了一下,房东人很好,让我们12点多就放行李了,然后开始打扫卫生
走五分钟就到地铁站,都很好
Good location. Walkable distance between home and mtr. Host is really friendly and nice. Recommended!
只是洗澡空間狹窄少少,大致不錯,有機會的話會再來哦!
離地鐵站非常近,非常方便｡房間在香港來講已經比較大了,仲好乾淨,室內設施也比較齊全

The room that Hazel allowed us to use was very good. Under the hot weather, the room was the cool place to rest, and we four were satisfied with the enough space in the room. We also could sleep deeply although Hong Kong was under signal 10 by the typhoon 'Hato'.
房间很干净,距离地铁站也比较近
体验感一般

We stay at Hazel's place for 3 night, in summary it was a pleasant stay. location is great, 5mins walking distance to YMT station. her place consider relatively big for 4 of us as compared to other unit in HK. i would recommended those who are planning for their upcoming trip to HK.
舒適的環境很適合入住,希望有機會能再來一次
Warm and homely. Clean and true to pictures.
home wifi and pocket wifi not stable.. sometimes can connect sometimes can't.. others than that is ok..
房子很干净,价格在香港也算便宜的,周围比较热闹,吃的很多,不远处有电影院,很好
总的来说不错,交通便利,就是噪音挺大的,我父母睡眠不好听得到外面车来车往的声音,但对于睡眠不错的我来说,没什么影响,哈哈.性价比挺高的,推荐!
Near to restaurants, convenience location which can arrive MTR within 5mins
房子的地理位置挺好,离油麻地地铁站最多就走路五分钟,房东的态度非常的好,和蔼有耐心｡房间非常整洁干净,在香港这个寸土寸金的地方,这间是个理想之选!
入住前有進行很好的交流,Hezel非常善解人意｡ 房間很大,非常適合一家出行,綜合性價比很高｡ 下次集體出行還會選擇的^_^
Strategic location
The host is very friendly, she made arrangement for our early check in request.
Generally everthing is great ! Host is responsive and friendly. Place is clean. Wifi is working well. Just expect a little bit of noise in the morning from the neighborhood.
Great place to stay, perfect location!
Clean and comfortable
Easy to access... good place, worth for money

We enjoyed staying here for our 7 days 6 nights stay.  This place is only 3 minutes walking distance from Yau Mah Tei A2 exit and its very close to Shanghai street which is famous for kitchen wares. Inside the apartment, it was exactly as described as the picture and the size of the apartment was just nice for 4 people (Hong Kong standard).  Love the small little touches Hazel prepared such as instructions to use water heater, air conditioning and resetting wifi (when required). The only downside is the noises from the street at mid night, light sleepers may wanna take note of this. Overall, it was a great stay.

If you are sensitive to noise be warned that the shop houses below has early morning deliveries and created quite a lot of noise If you are the type who like a spick and spank place note that thw cleaniless level is not high
Good service and friendly host. Room was nice and suitable for family. I will be there agynext year !
Near MTR, very convenient

地理位置不错,但是晚上非常嘈,楼下商铺卸货,车辆通行的声音在紧闭窗户的房内都听得一清二楚,严重影响睡眠｡
沟通尚可吧,老板非常忙,在 (Hidden by Airbnb) 沟通过,又在airbnb上问我怎么不提前跟他沟通,然后有换到 (Hidden by Airbnb) 上,是否可以用一个既定的平台呢??
热水只能用10分钟,就冷了,完全不能满足正常的沐浴时间,另外,民俗没有提供如牙刷之类的用品也无提早告知｡

The apartment location is near ladies market, and there are restaurants and shops around here. It takes only 3 minutes to the airport shuttle bus A21. Although the apartment can accomodate up to 7 people, but the room with bunk bed only fit for 3.
The host is friendly, good at communication, and respon fast whenever we need her.
This is enough for less than 8 people although the experience and quick response of the host is great. Thank you Hazel.
Location was central; older style building with some attempt to modernise ; communications excellent; shower could be improved; mattresses could be of better quality.

Convenient location, very near MTR. There's a lift up to the apartment

As noted by some of previous guest, the bi-fold door's lock is spoilt, you can't lock the door. The heater for the shower can get erratic and requires constant fiddling with sometimes to prevent the water from becoming too hot or cold.

Otherwise, it is still a good place to stay in
숙소가 사진만큼 크고 쾌적하지는 않습니다. 벽 곳곳에 균열도 있고 그러니까 쾌적하려는 안 쾌적한 숙소 느낌? 그리고 락스로 집을 청소하는지 락스 냄새가 많이 나고 한쪽 방에 콘센트가 없습니다. 뭐 한 박 자는 거라 나름 괜찮긴 했지만 이 가격에..? 싶네요
little bit small for more than 4 ppl, but cozy and quiet place
The apt at the centre for shoppaholic,the place is self is enough for us,2 kids and 2 (Website hidden by Airbnb) issue

겨울에 가는건 별로 추천드리지 않아요.
우선 난방도 안될뿐더러 작은 난방기가 있긴한데 집 전체를 데우기에는 턱도 없이 작습니다. 그냥 추워요...
집 위치는 정말 좋아요 몽콕야시장 레이디스마켓 정말 그냥 집앞 마실정도라고 생각하시면 될듯하고 맥도날드, 맥도날드 옆 지하에 햇반을 제외한 김치 신라면 한국 술까지 대부분의 한국 먹거리가 존재하는 슈퍼? 마트?도 있어서 음식이 맞지않아도 걱정할필요가 없었다는 점은 좋았던거 같네요. 그리고 처음에 엘리베이터타고 올라갈때 엘리베이터가 너무 덜컹거려서 엘레베이터 떨어지는줄 알고 무서웠네요. 잊지마세요 출발할때 한번, 도착해서 한번 문열리기전에 한번 총 3번 덜컹합니다. 날이 따뜻할때 가면 괜찮을거 같으나 추운 겨울에는 추천하지 않습니다
Lovely place, close to MTR and main street.
Hazel is a great host and she will response soon whenever you contact her. The place is near MTR and Bus. Also, near to ladies market.

Very good location,  3-5min walk to Yau Ma Tei MRT, and 10min to ladies market. Literally next to Mongkok area. Clean and spacious apartment. Easy check in,  fast response. Highly recommend this place
ห้องพักอยู่ใกล้กับ mtr ก้อจริงแต่เวลากลางคืนชอบมีโสเภณีมายืนแถวบริเวณใกล้ๆที่พัก รู้สึกไม่ปลอดภัยมากๆ
Clean place.
屋主友善,但屋子環境不好,洗手間有異味,房間有點髒,沙發有一半是下陷,不好坐
Place ia good near downtown
Great location; very near Mongkok and MTR station. Host was very responsive and welcoming.
Super easy check-in, host was great at communicating. Close to MTR, just as described
ｽﾃｷなお部屋でした｡

We enjoyed our stay as a family of four. Close to MTR station and lots happening locally. Very clean and AC was turned on before we arrived so it was already cool inside,  bliss. Fast communication, flexible and friendly when we had to move our meeting time back by 45mins as we misjudged travel times. We will be staying there again in a couple of months and are happy to do so as it worked well for us.

Great place. Very accessible and the host is really nice. There were 9 of us who stayed there and we fitted in very comfortably. The location is perfect because its so near the MTR station and Airport Express Buses. Going to the touristy places are of walking distance from the flat, especially The Ladies Market/Sneaker Street in Mong Kok. Local cuisine and internationally influenced dining are also available around the neighbourhood. I would definitely consider going back to this flat for future trips to Hong Kong.

Highly recommended!! Place is near to everywhere, the room is very clean. So after exploring the beautiful places in HK you will find out that this place is very relaxing, though we had a hard time getting directions.

Overall the place and location are okay. 5 of us able to stay comfortably. It is just a few minutes walking distances to MRT station which allows us to travel with ease. There are many cafe and convenience store nearby. For the future guest, please be extra careful when using the water heater. On the 3rd night, while one of us taking the bath, the water which we adjusted as warm temperature suddenly rise up and we not able to react quick enough to avoid the first touch of the hot water. It causes burn on my sister skin. Afraid that this will happen again, we switch off the heater for the remaining days.
The location is good, with a group of 5, everyone get their space to sleep. With hongkong being so packed, the space is okay, just that the toilet door could not be locked.

The beddings for both rooms were not changed. We could smell a strong odor of medical ointment from the linens. The host was not helpful at all and refused to change the linens.

The unit is located in a noisy area, especially at night where we could hear loud noise of trucks, dropping off steel or metal pieces to the store in the lower unit.

We ended up have to stay in the hotel at night, as the host refused to changed the linens, even after i contacted her through (Hidden by Airbnb) .

VERY DISAPPOINTED. DO NOT STAY HERE

I was in touch with Linda. She is very responsive on our communication. I had no problems cheking in and out of her place. The apartment size is okay for a group of 7 adults. Wifi is fast! No problems at all. Aircon was really cold. Pefect for the hot and humid weather. Location is nice as well. Near the bus stop and MTR line. Overall, a great place to stay.

Second time for our family staying here in two months. Very clean, easy access to MTR, AC in two bedrooms and living room. Great communication, flexibility and a bit of luck meant we were fortunate to access this earlier than normal, at midday, after an early arrival in HK. Thank you Linda.
Exactly as pictured, comfortable and well-appointed! It was very easy to find and in a great location near a wet market, many great restaurants, and a few minutes walk from the metro!
Susan place was a real Hong Kong experience which ticked our boxes. I saw a review stating the aircon was noisy however it must have been replaced as the air con was perfect.
地段蛮好找的｡和上海街平行,走到旺角就十来分钟,公寓很香港,不大但温馨｡四人住很舒服｡油麻地地铁站啦,旺角地铁站呀｡双层巴士站都m蛮近｡linda小姐姐回复很快很快哦!谢谢｡

一次非常不好的住宿經歷,直到現在我的皮膚還是在過敏感染狀態,因為這一個房源十分不衛生｡毛巾和床單都是有污漬的,地面也是不乾淨的,你能夠肉眼看見沙發有很多髒東西,看出來每次只是擺放整齊並沒有清潔,特別是沙發下面的床,我之前住很多房都不會這樣,我這次住的時候身體就開始發癢,甚至长了很多东西,醫生說是住的地方不衛生導致皮膚敏感,我住完到現在都已經好幾天都還是不好,我从来沒有試過如此嚴重｡還有,個衛生間洗澡時熱水很不穩定,會突然出來並且關不上,實話說很危險,我的家人都住得不愉快,謝謝,希望能改善衛生問題

The place is bigger than expected and really appreciate the host telling us about the space constraints before hand. Place is near mtr and the town area so its really convenient. Found a supermarket nearby as well. The place is really clean and well kept!

Great location, good food around, easy to access, spacious for a family of 3A + 1C (max), live like a local environment. 

2-3mins walk from YMT Station/ Nathan Rd. 2-3mins away from 24/7 supermarket. 

Side note: double decker bed mattresses are v hard and the big mattress in the other room is very soft. I have 4 adults including me so my Brother have to sleep on the v hard mattress at the common area living space as the bigger bed bedroom mattress is for 1A+ 1C, not ideal for 2A.

If the side notes are not issue to you, it’s a perfect Airbnb.
Good and comfortable
干净,整洁,房间布置简单清楚,配套齐全,距离地铁口近很方便!
Very near the MTR and MongKok. A lot of convenience stores nearby. We had cleanliness and bed bugs issues though but I hope these can be addressed soon. Otherwise, our stay was OK

十一期间到香港,第一次在爱彼迎定房,比较了很多家,也看了很多评论后最终选择了这家｡
因为心里底线已经降到很低,对房子要求没那么高,所以就觉得这次的房子还算不错,整体比较干净,虽然床褥有点旧,但都是刚洗过的味道｡我们是五个大人入住,有一位男生睡沙发床,说实话沙发床有些脏,并且睡起来腰部很不舒服｡但房子周围交通和日常生活都还挺方便,所以,预算一般的情况下,这个房子还是很不错的选择｡
另外,我觉得我跟房东之间沟通貌似有时差,回复消息间隔一小时左右,也是略苦恼了｡

Terrible place at weird location, hard to find. Lift is horrible, really old and scary. Stairs are dirty. Bedroom linens have stains, bathroom has leaky taps and pipe, there was a tub below the sink to contain the leaky water and its was very smelly. Walls are not painted for years. Host didn't make any efforts to fix things once we complaint. All she said you can check out if you want. Looks like she didn't have any defence left as probably she herself knew this place is not well kept and not at all hygienic. We had to find another place same day in the late night. We couldn't risk it. We had a year old baby and house was not suitable for her. For 275+ SGD a night this was a big let down. Airbnb should take a serious action against the host.
Susan's place is a good place to be Hong Kong. She is amazingly helpful, totally recomendable place if you want to know beyond the typical places such as Central, TST, Wan-chai... Thanks Susan
Good place. Lots to see and do there. Near mtr.

Only good thing I can say about this place is that it is bigger than most places you'll find in HK, and that it's close to Nathan st and MK area.  

Yes everything you see in the pix is there. With that said, everything is so worn out and dirty looking we were scared to even sit or lay down. We even searched up other places to book that same night because it was just so disgusting and scary. 

Couch looks like its gonna break in half if you sit on it. Bed linens look so dirty like it's never been washed. What looked like it was a white is now a shade of gray. Bring your own towels because the ones they provide for u look like rags that will rip when you try to use it. The tv is like a puzzle to turn on. 

Apt is on a street that sells all hardware. There is banging, clanking and delivery truck noises AROUND the clock. 24/7.  Make sure you bring ear plugs. 

And make sure u check the check out time. When we booked it said 12pm check out but she was telling us we have to be out by 10am. Luckily we had a screenshot of the ad so she let us check out at 12pm. But apparently she didn't mention it to her crew because her clean up lady showed up at 10:20am wondering why we're still there then someone else came at 11:15am also confused as to why we were still there. 

All in all... if you want to be close to Nathan St and MK area then I would recommend this place. As long as you don't mind the the disgusting bed that looks like you might catch something from it, spend 5-10 mins trying to figure out the tv, risk the couch breaking if u sit on it, don't mind using rags as towels or the noise that is heard 24/7.

Susan and Linda's place is near MRT and a lot of food stalls around the area. They are very responsive and provided necessary details needed to locate the place. we didnt have any hard time finding the place. we really enjoyed our stay!
fast response and strategies place for guest who will visit Hongkong
great location, easy to find

name: Cozy double room in a sunny flat
summary: Cozy flat in the quiet neighborhood of Gràcia, we are a couple of professionals always willing to discover new places, people and stories, we like to host and to be hosted all over the world, feel free to ask whatever you need to make better your stay.
description: Cozy flat in the quiet neighborhood of Gràcia, we are a couple of professionals always willing to discover new places, people and stories, we like to host and to be hosted all over the world, feel free to ask whatever you need to make better your stay.
interaction: Always used to help in your stay
house_rules: Most important rule, be openminded, gay friendly and respectful, from this point everything is possible. We know you are on holidays, so relax and feel comfortable, as if you were in your home.

host.host_about: Young professional, traveller and culturally open.

address.government_area: el Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova

reviews.comments:
La estadía fue fantástica. La ubicación es buenísima, cerca del metro y de la parada de bus pero en general íbamos a todos lados caminando. El barrio de Gracia es céntrico, con muchos bares y tiendas y a la vez tranquilo. El departamento de los chicos es tal cual en las fotos y todavía mejor, lleno de luz natural y tiene absolutamente todas las comodidades, además de un espectacular gusto y dedicación por el diseño y la decoración. 

Gracias Gabriel y Diego por la hospitalidad generosidad y confianza, nos encanto conocerlos y disfrutamos mucho estar en su casa! Un abrazo y éxitos.

Gabriel was very hospitable and thoughtful. He always answered my messages on time and was very kind in providing precise information about the city and his place before our arrival and during our time in Barcelona.  Once at Barcelona and due to an unexpected early arrival of our flight,  me and my girlfriend were warmly welcomed even before the arranged check-in time. At Gabriel's place we felt at home, even if it was one of ours first experiences at an shared Airbnb we felt that we had both, privacy and spaces to socialize with Gabriel. The room and apartment are even nicer than what is shown in pictures. I specially like the decoration and the amount of sunlight that there is in the apartment, specially in the living room. Also, we thought that the neighborhood was excelent (10 minutes walking to Sagrada Familia, 25 minutes walking to Parque Guell, 10 minutes walking to the hearth of Gracia and 25 minutes walking to the Barrio Gotico), with some nice restaurants and bars but in a non-very-touristic and calm area (also the metro and bus stations are very close by). In sum, I defenetely recommend this place.

Everything went well. Flat was really clean and is located in a place that feels very safe. The balcony was a great addition, it let us start the day by looking over the lively city while eating breakfast. Gabriel was helpful and responded to all our needs.

name: Located in the heart of NoLita.
summary: Newly renovated, modern and well cared for one-bedroom apartment located in the heart of NoLita. Great location with easy access to all that this very cool area  of the city has to offer - bars, restaurants, cafes and shopping.
space: Newly renovated, modern and quiet space in a building with an elevator located in the heart of NoLita. Great kitchen and living space, big bedroom and a large bathroom with a great shower. The apartment also has access to a large and well maintained roof terrace with great 360 degree views of downtown Manhattan.
description: Newly renovated, modern and well cared for one-bedroom apartment located in the heart of NoLita. Great location with easy access to all that this very cool area  of the city has to offer - bars, restaurants, cafes and shopping.  Newly renovated, modern and quiet space in a building with an elevator located in the heart of NoLita. Great kitchen and living space, big bedroom and a large bathroom with a great shower. The apartment also has access to a large and well maintained roof terrace with great 360 degree views of downtown Manhattan. Guests will have full access to the apartment and will also have access to a shared roof terrace. Limited interaction anticipated. The neighborhood has a lot to offer with some of the best bars, restaurants, cafes and shopping in the city. SoHo, NoHo, Little Italy and China Town are also a short walking distance away and there is a Whole Foods within a 5min walk. There are also a number of museums and art galleries nearby.  Brooklyn is also a short subw
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood has a lot to offer with some of the best bars, restaurants, cafes and shopping in the city. SoHo, NoHo, Little Italy and China Town are also a short walking distance away and there is a Whole Foods within a 5min walk. There are also a number of museums and art galleries nearby.  Brooklyn is also a short subway ride away.
transit: There are a lot of public transport options close by that will provide access to all parts of the city as well as Brooklyn, Queens and The Bronx. The B, D, F, M, N, R and 6 subways lines are all within a very short walking distance. There are also plenty of cabs nearby at all hours of the day.
access: Guests will have full access to the apartment and will also have access to a shared roof terrace.
interaction: Limited interaction anticipated.
house_rules: Please make yourself welcome and treat the apartment with respect - as you would your own place. Also please no smoking and no pets in the apartment.

host.host_about: Professional, non-smoker, white collar worker living in Sydney.

reviews.comments: This was a lovely apartment, in a perfect area. We stayed for a week. Stuart had a lovely welcome basket of wine and snacks for us. His place was comfortable, clean, and with lots of room for clothes and stuff . . . and that amazing shower! There are lots of restaurants, cafes, and boutiques in the area. I was so sad to leave!

name: Autèntic Monumental 32
summary: Refurbished apartment that mixes the classic with the comforts of the modern, 7 double bedrooms, 2 of them with double bed and the others with two single beds. Large kitchen and living room, plus 4 full bathrooms, one with bath and the other 3 with shower.
description: Refurbished apartment that mixes the classic with the comforts of the modern, 7 double bedrooms, 2 of them with double bed and the others with two single beds. Large kitchen and living room, plus 4 full bathrooms, one with bath and the other 3 with shower.
