Prices: - up to 4 people 40€ - 5 people 45€ - 6 people 50€ - extra luggage 5€ Private parking available under request - 20€/night
notes: HUTB-007783 CHECK IN Check in from 13:00h to 20:00h Late check in from 20h to 22:00h has an extra charge of 30€ Late check in from 22:01h to 8h has an extra charge of 50€ CHECK OUT Check out until 11:30h CITY TAX 2,25€ per person and night (older than 16 and until 7 nights) Taxi service available from and to the airport. Prices: - up to 4 people 40€ - 5 people 45€ - 6 people 50€ - extra luggage 5€ Private parking available under request - 20€/night
house_rules: Se ruega no hacer ruido molesto a partir de las 22:00, por respeto a los vecinos.

host.host_about: I'm in charge of Autèntic Barcelona, own company which offers quality touristic apartments all around the city, either for short or long stays in Barcelona.

reviews.comments:
My family and I would like to thank Nuria!!!
Lovely, clean and bright apartment, very Central and convenient location, friendly and very caring, considerate Nuria - what better way to complement the impression of magical Barcelona! 

The apartment is fully corresponds to the photo, clean linen, appliances in excellent condition, tableware enough even for a large family (4 adults and 3 children).
To get to the apartment easier by Purple line, the station La Monumental.
Host was great!  House was lovely!
Really great stay, well located and a great host.
Nice place, with basic neccessities, close to public transport. great communication from the host. Left my mobile after checking out, friend collected it no problem after couple of days.

Very smooth check in and out -clear and responsive communication from the host in English - the apartment was immaculate when we arrived, the air conditioning was powerful, rooms were sizeable - experienced signal issues with the wifi but were able to find a bar nearby (Bar Monumental) that had a strong signal for a party of 6. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a weekend away with their friends.
Very good location in central Barcelona. Easy to navigate and between a lot of restaurants.
Un apartamento de gran ubicación y excelente espacio.

Excelente experiencia, lo recomendamos cien por ciento especialmente A grupos o familias numerosas, puesto que el tamaño y la cantidad de camas se adaptan muy bien. Muy buena ubicación y con comercios para desayunar y realizar compras de alimentos muy cerca. Nos sentimos muy a gusto. Solo recomiendo abastecerlo de toallas y sabanas, para que las personas que va a durar varios dias como nosotros tengan acceso a cambiarlos. 
Muchas gracias por todo.
Super appartement, qui est en fait deux appartements rassemblés en un. Nous y avons passé un super séjour.
The apartment is in good conditions, our group of 12 people enjoyed our stay, thank you:)

name: SPACIOUS STUDIO-HIGH END FINISHES
summary: Sleeps 4 people (SAME COST). architectural details from 1800s.  NATURAL SUNLIGHT, fully equipped PRIVATE kitchen & marble bathroom. Bottled water at check in, towels, linen, hair dryer, iron board & iron provided. 2 MINUTES WALK TO SUBWAY & FOOD.
space: Located on a quiet/ SAFE tree lined street in historical Harlem,this apartment is ideally situated for travel throughout NYC; it is 15-20 minutes train ride to most tourist destinations. Because of the many historical buildings & establishments along with the most diverse population in the City this spot is well sought after by many travelers.  There are 24 hour restaurants and transportation service available and best of all the SUBWAY IS RIGHT AROUND THE CORNER from the apartment (2 MINUTES WALK) so you won't have to worry about carrying those heavy packages far.
description: Sleeps 4 people (SAME COST). architectural details from 1800s.  NATURAL SUNLIGHT, fully equipped PRIVATE kitchen & marble bathroom. Bottled water at check in, towels, linen, hair dryer, iron board & iron provided. 2 MINUTES WALK TO SUBWAY & FOOD. Located on a quiet/ SAFE tree lined street in historical Harlem,this apartment is ideally situated for travel throughout NYC; it is 15-20 minutes train ride to most tourist destinations. Because of the many historical buildings & establishments along with the most diverse population in the City this spot is well sought after by many travelers.  There are 24 hour restaurants and transportation service available and best of all the SUBWAY IS RIGHT AROUND THE CORNER from the apartment (2 MINUTES WALK) so you won't have to worry about carrying those heavy packages far. You will have access to basic cable tv, wireless internet service, full private kitchen (with dishes, pots, microwave, coffee maker, and utensils). Also for your convenience there i
neighborhood_overview: Harlem is truly the best kept secret in NYC; we boast a very relaxed atmosphere, our residents are friendly, open, hospitable and always willing to help others.  Apartment is located in the historical district of Harlem.  The area is vibrant, rich with culture and an amazing night life; entertainment prices are very affordable.  Supermarkets and restaurants galore (if you love to eat great affordable food this is the place for you.)  Tree lined street, safe anytime of day/night.  Also a family friendly environment.
notes: 1)  ***VERY IMPORTANT*** FOR SECURITY REASONS WE ARE UNABLE TO RECEIVE ANY PACKAGES FOR YOU AT THE APARTMENT !!!
transit: The number 2 and 3 train is around the corner, most people walk to the abundant shopping and restaurants (many are open 24 hours). Yankee Stadium is approximately 10 City blocks away.  Large mall with various retailers, Burlington Coat Factory, Target...etc. is nine blocks away.
access: You will have access to basic cable tv, wireless internet service, full private kitchen (with dishes, pots, microwave, coffee maker, and utensils). Also for your convenience there is an iron/ironing board, hair dryer etc.
interaction: We allow our guests to enjoy their vacation and we respect their privacy.  We always strive to respond quickly to any request; you can always call our phone or send us a text through ArBandB it is a great form of communication as it simultaneously texts and email us so we can respond from any of those devices.
house_rules: ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING in room.  Packages can not be delivered to the building.   Please place dirty linen and towels in bathroom upon departure, empty trash in designated areas by the mailboxes downstairs.  NYC is a recycle City so please place recyclables in the correct trash receptacle outside.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I am a very down to earth person, I love to meet people from all walks of life.  I am a Tax Accountant and Real Estate Broker.  Married over 3 decades, both my husband and I are former U.S. Marines and parents of three wonderful adult children (my oldest daughter is an Attorney, my son a Software Engineer and my youngest is presently pursuing her Law degree).

My husband and I do our utmost to live by the "golden rule"!!!!

reviews.comments:
First guest! :) My days couldn't be better. Patricia is a great host. She helped us since the first email. The apartment is clean, cozy, spacious. It's super close of the subway: right at the corner. 

When we arrived, she was waiting for us in the apartment. We keep contact by email and cellphone since when we did the reservation. I believe some people may have a little fear of pay everything before get in the apartment, but you can trust. We had a problem with our dates right after the payment, and she was so comprehensive and helped us to find another days.

I highly recommend, and definitely we will return on my next visit to NY.

I stayed in this apartment from 15th December to the 4th January and cannot find one fault with-it! 
The apartment is absolutely beautiful and in the most convenient location.
All amenities were provided (towels, sheets, pots and pans, hair drier, iron, ironing board, wifi, cable and so much more) and were all brand new.
Patricia was an absolute pleasure to deal with. My flight landed at JFK at 4:30am and I called her when I landed. She left the key for me and I was able to get inside the apartment and take a nap before exploring the city.
She has stocked the fridge with water and orange juice – a lovely surprise after 2 days of traveling from Australia! 
The apartment is literally a 2 minute walk from the 135th Subway station with express trains 2 and 3 – You will be in Times Square within 15 minutes and for only$2.50 on the 3 train.
At the other end of 135th you can catch the B and the C train… it’s only a 5 minute walk.
Harlem is lovely, I loved my experience and will be back for sure!

Muy buen apartamento.
No nos vimos con patricia pero nos atendió su hija de manera excelente.
El apartamento un poco chico pero tiene todo lo necesario.
Es muy bonito.
El internet no tenía buena señal 
Las camas muy cómodas nos permitieron un buen descanso
The studio is very well located. It housed comfortably three friends and I. Patricia was super helpful on our arrival. I recommend to all who want to spend a few days in NYC.

Patrick welcomed us warmly in this nice apartment in a quiet street close to the metro station. The place was very clean and after we requested we also got a little heater and another blanket. In the kitchen and in the bathroom we found everything we needed and they even provided water bottles and orange juice for us. Their daughters were living a level under us and we were able to contact them any time needed. We were happy to have been there!

We had a pleasant time at Patricia's apartment. A pretty clean and cozy place as well as the photos. Too close to subway, restaurants and markets. We recomend IHOP Restaurant to breakfast... too near and cheap.
When we arrived at the apartment had water and juice available in the refrigerator. We were received friendly and whenever we needed Patricia she was always ready to help us.
My family and I had great time in NYC. Thank you once more Patricia!!

This place was really great! Comfortable & clean. Great communication. The street was quiet. Very short easy walk to subway right around the corner. Great subway line to get to all major city locations. We would stay here again if we return to NY!!

Siamo stati nella casa di Patricia dal 29 aprile al 5 maggio 2015, eravamo  2 adulti e un ragazzo di 13 anni. La casa è perfetta, pulita e accogliente e ha tre belle finestre che danno sulla strada  (silenziosissima di notte).  Malgrado sia uno studio lo spazio è ampio anche con il divano letto aperto. Sia il letto matrimoniale che il divano letto sono comodi....fondamentale dopo le giornate di estenuanti camminate per New York.... 
Come descritto nell'annuncio la metro è dietro l'angolo, a 2 minuti a piedi e il quartiere di Harlem tranquillo e piacevole. Per arrivare a Time Square occorrono circa 15 minuti. 
Abbiamo avuto le chiavi appena arrivati e abbiamo avuto contatti con l'host via mail quando necessario
Insomma positivo e consigliato
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Bei unserer Ankunft war zwar der Schlüssel nicht am vorgesehenen Ort, wir wurden aber von einer freundlichen Person, die sich um das Objekt kümmert eingelassen. 
Das Zimmer ist geräumig, das Bett bequem, ein Esstisch mit 4 Stühlen und die kleine Küche im Zimmer ermöglichen den Gästen sich prima selbst zu versorgen. 
Die Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und die U-Bahnanbindung perfekt. Eine Gehminute entfernt ist die nächste Station und es ist sehr einfach in's Zentrum zu gelangen. 
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt in diesem so typischen Townhouse. 
Fußläufig sind diverse Geschäfte vorhanden um sich mit ein paar Lebensmitteln einzudecken. 
Wir waren insgesamt 6 Nächte in diesem Appartement und würden unseren Aufenthalt gerne wiederholen. 
Es mangelt vielleicht ein wenig an Besteck, aber Handtücher waren reichlich vorhanden, ebenso Toilettenpapier und der Kühlschrank war mit einigen Flaschen Wasser befüllt. 
Das kleine Bad ist völlig ausreichend, einzig fehlt etwas Ablagefläche für die diversen Toilettenartikel. 

Now I'll try it in english. 
When we arrived, the key wasn't in the key box we got the code for, but Sharleen, the housekeeper was there, very friendly and she gave us the key and explained everything. 
We stayed for 6 nights and had a fantastic time in New York. The neighborhood is quiet and it's only one minute to walk to get to the next train station (subway) and it's comfortable and easy to get downtown or anywhere else. 
The apartment is in an old, typically townhouse. The room is big enough, also the bed which is really comfortable. 
There is a table with 4 chairs and a small kitchen with the mostly used items like microwave, toaster, tableware and cutlery, the cutlery and tableware could be a little bit more :), but it's easy to be self-caterer. 
The big refrigerator was filled with some bottles of water - very nice and comfortable as we arrived at a hot day. 
The bathroom is not so big but big enough and there where enough towels and toilet paper. 
I just missed a little more shelf space for our toilet articles. 
Around the corner are different shops to buy food and other important things. 

We felt very good in the apartment and the area and we would like to come back whenever it's possible. 
Thank you Patricia.

This was our first trip to NYC and we had a great time.  Patricia's preliminary emails were informative and helpful. She responded quickly by text whenever I had a question or issue.  The apartment was clean and spacious and had everything we needed; no frills but good quality.  The subway is only a block away.  I was very pleased with our experience.

L appartement est conforme au descriptif, propre et fonctionnel. Situé dans le quartier de Harlem à 2 pas d'une station de métro. Nous avons échangé avec Patricia par sms ou mail dès que nous avions besoin de renseignements. Patricia a toujours répondu rapidement à nos demandes toujours dans un souci de confort pour le bon déroulement de notre sejour. Rue très calme loin du tumulte de Manhattan.

Le studio était comme dans la description et propre. Il est au premier étage d'une maison typique de Harlem, dans une rue calme (très peu de bruit, ce qui est exceptionnel pour New York!), et très bien situé: à 2 minutes à pied des lignes de métro express 2 et 3: on est à Time Square en 20 minutes. La wifi marche bien. Patricia nous a expliqué comment entrer dans le logement, et a répondu rapidement à nos questions sur le supermarché le plus proche, le supermarché biologique etc. Le lit et le canapé dépliant sont confortables. J'ai apprécié le sèche-cheveux et le fer à repasser (nous sommes restés 11 jours). Il y a une laverie avec des machines à laver à 5 minutes à pied, et des commerces à proximité. Il manque toutefois des ustensiles dans la cuisine: 3 fourchettes, 1 seule grande cuillère, une petite casserole, c'est un peu juste et c'est dommage. Et il n'y a que très peu de cintres dans le placard. Il est vrai que nous ne l'avons pas signalé à Patricia. Elle nous en aurait peut-être donné plus.
Only have to thank Patricia. I and my family love your attention and all the more that nis provided. The location is great and very well located. Brilliant!

Nous sommes arrivés un peu tard dans la soirée dans cet appartement à trois quarts  d'heure du centre de Manhattan et à moins de 150 mêtres de la sortie du métro. Tout a bien été organisé par le propriétaire et notre arrivée fut sans encombre. Nous y sommes restés treize jours dans un quartier trés calme proche de toutes commodités. Nous avons très apprécié cet endroit. La literie était fort confortable. La cuisine sommaire manquait peu être d'un peu d'équipement pour pouvoir diner à 4 voyageurs. Mais à part cela tout était parfait. Je recommande cet appartement.
A very good place with very convenient transportation. Patricia is a very nice person who helped us a lot.
Thank you for everything, Patricia. The place was great!

Good things: the location is very close to metro station. Towels were provided. Water bottles were provided. No problem for midnight check-in. Bed is nice.
Things I didn't like: the location didn't feel safe. The wardrobe came crashing down on my 3 year old when he tried to pull a hanger from it, he was saved by his grandfather standing beside him by holding the wardrobe. It again came crashing down when we tried to put it back. No soaps were provided.

Patricia a ete charmante, depuis le debut a toujours repondu a mes questions, m'a aidé a plusieurs reprises, les descriptions conforme le quartier aussi
absolument rien a redire super a recommander

I appreciated the locality- subway, eateries, grocery stores & more were all in walking distance. Quiet neighbors. Felt safe at all hours. Detailed directions made staying there simple and stress free. Thank you for sharing your space with us!

The location is good. The apartment is nice and clean. The communication was great. If nighttime noise will be a problem for you then you should request an apartment in the back of the building away from the street. The street noise is all night long. Or bring earplugs with you.

A perfect place to go to New York! The house is very useful and very close to a subway stop! Patricia was very kind and she gave us all the facilities that we needed. I hope to repeat next year in this house.
awesome experience. everything was great. clean and organized. will recommend and definitely use again. Thanks again for everything.

Patricia was quick to reply to any questions I had prior to the trip. She also let me know that if there was an emergency or anything else needed, her adult children were also in the complex. The accessibility to the subway was excellent!

Check in was a breeze--super flexible with the time (flight and transportation delays are getting worse getting into Manhattan -- Patricia made it super simple!)

Ultra clean apartment on a quiet street with comfy bed and awesome kitchen!

Everything was amazing! Patricia replied to every question rapidly. Close to subway, express trains, really good!!!
Nice to walk around, good place to stay while we explored the city, and it was awesome to have a kitchen to cook for ourselves whenever we wanted to.
Really great place. The room and bathroom were spotless. Easy check-in. Located right around the corner from a subway station. Had everything we needed. :)
It was everything we expected.   Spacious, clean and convenient.   We would definitely stay again.   Host was very accommodating and helpful.

Close to all commodities, a really great apartment.
Very clean, in a very quiet street, to have a perfect journey in NYC.

Very fast answers by Patricia who has been very kind and available for everything! Wonderful stay in Harlem! A little bit far from downtown but well served by 2 lines of metro! The apartment is perfect for 3 people! There's the fridge, microwave, hair dryer, coffee and all you need to cook by yourself! 
The check-in has been very easy and fast!

Estuvimos con dos amigos la primera semana de mayo la verdad la pasamos muy bien el departamento muy cómodo para tres personas el baño de la cocina en la heladera el comedor muy bien todo según lo indicado en la publicación el departamento es un mono ambiente Pequeño pero totalmente funcional. El vecindario muy tranquilo sin mayores inconvenientes en Harlem muy cerca de la estación del subte de la 135 donde para las líneas uno, dos y tres rojas. No podemos ver la Patricia pero nos deja las indicaciones para poder entrar sin mayor inconveniente pasamos una excelente semana en Nueva York ese estuvo muy atenta a todas nuestras solicitudes que fueron muchas y siempre predispuesta solucionar cualquier inconveniente totalmente recomendado.

I haven't met Patricia in person but she gave us all info and advice we needed - great communication over e-mail! The apartmemt was close to the underground station and deli - very convinient if u are a tourist. We were very happy to find the fridge to be packed with water - something we really approciated after a very long flight.

El departamento es muy cómodo y limpio. La zona es tranquila y agradable y hay un subte a una cuadra que te acerca a todos lados. Patricia es muy buena anfitriona, respondió a nuestras dudas rápidamente, muy buena predisposición. La mujer de limpieza muy cordial y cooperativa. Un departamento super recomendable para poder disfrutar de esta ciudad increíble.

El lugar es perfecto para unos días de turismo, hay muchas opciones para encontrar comida, es acogedor y tranquilo, tiene varias opciones de transporte en Bus y Tren, totalmente recomendable, Patricia estuvo pendiente de nosotros y atendió nuestros requerimientos muy rápido.

Apartment is great, perfect for two people, comfortable, quite and close to the metro station. Harlem is very characteristic, great place. We will consider again the zone and, if possible, this apartment at our next visit in NY! *****!

Génial, dans le bruit ambiant de la ville de new York, cela fais du bien de venir se reposer dans cet appartement simple mais au calme et avec une literie très très confortable ! Après les journées de marche c'est agréable ! Je recommande fortement cet appartement ! Merci à Patricia pour sa réactivité dans ses réponses ;)
Fue un alojamiento perfecto ,todo igual que en la información y muy bien comunicado.gracias por todo

Muy buena estadia en el dto. de Patricia. siempre ha respondido a mis consultas. muy atenta. no nos encontramos con ella debido a que tuvo  un problema familiar, pero tampoco fue necesario.Ubicacion excelente  , a 100mts de unas lineas de subte que te llevean a todos lados!!!! Lo recomiendo !!!!!

La estancia fue buena, pero para 4 personas el apartamento resulta demasiado pequeño. Para dos está bien. 
Los colchones eran muy blandos y le faltaba un poco de limpieza en general.

The appartment is well located and very near of the metro. 
It makes it possible to go discover the city if you go for the whole day and eat outside.

We did not meet Patricia who but she has always answered very quickly to our requests.
Great space in a very accessible location. It is a great place for a family to stay in!
Good connection to City, great location

Camera indipendente  ubicata in un  fabbricato del 1800, molto accogliente e  con lo spazio necessario per una famiglia di quattro persone.  Il luogo è molto tranquillo ed è vicinissimo alla fermata della metropolitana. Harlem è  un posto stupendo e non ancora inflazionato dal turismo.  La gente è cordiale e non ho sentito nessun pericolo neanche di notte.  Consigliatissimo!
Well located, reasonable value, somewhat barebones unit amenities. Quiet building among charming brownstones. Close to transit.
Great location,  handy to metro, short hop to Central Park,  and 17 minutes to Times Square.
Great location near the subway.

This place is in a fun area.  The people in Harlem are so friendly.  The grocery store,  transit,  and some restaurants are within easy walking distance.  If you happen to be in town on a Thursday check out Harlem BBQ between 137th and 138th on Lennox. They have a karaoke night that is bumping and amazing ribs and chicken. The bed is really comfy and the upstairs location makes it so that you barely hear street noise.

Dès que je suis entrée dans ce studio, je me suis dit que les photos ne le mettent pas assez en valeur. On s'y sent immédiatement bien tellement il est cosy, propre, chaleureux, pratique et spacieux pour un studio new yorkais. Le lit est grand et confortable. Le convertible offre aussi un bon couchage et vaut mieux que certains matelas. Le frigo a une partie congélateur de bonne taille et nous avons vraiment apprécié qu'il soit approvisionné en petites bouteilles d'eau. Machine à café, micro-onde, grille pain et vitrocéramique offrent le nécessaire pour prendre ses repas. L'appartement est calme et lorsque d'autres locataires ont été très bruyants, Patricia a su régler le problème dans les meilleurs délais. Nous avions de nombreux bagages et ce studio est grand, ce qui ne nous a pas donné l'impression de vivre dans nos valises. A noter qu'il y a des marches sans ascenseurs, pour les personnes ayant des difficultés. Le logement est très bien situé et le quartier de Harlem est très sympa, avec de nombreux restaurants, snack, épiceries, supermarchés etc. Sans parler du métro très accessible, bien desservi et très proche. Nous nous sommes senties en sécurité dans l'appartement et dans le quartier. Patricia est très réactive dans la communication, la concierge est très sympa et efficace. Nous avons pu rester un peu plus tard que midi afin de prendre notre avion sans avoir à attendre des heures dans l'aéroport. Je recommande vivement cet hébergement et j'y retournerai avec grand plaisir.
Cerca del metro, funcional

Le logement est un studio spacieux, adaptés pour 4 personnes (et les valises).
La cuisine est petite mais très bien équipé(micro onde/grille pain/cafetière).
La salle de bain avait suffisamment de linge de toilette pour 4 et pour 10 jours.
Les 2 couchages étaient très confortables.

L'appartement est très bien situé près de la ligne 2 et 3. Super pratique!
Le quartier est sure avec de nombreux commerces à proximité.

Patricia est très réceptive et répond très rapidement par sms.

Ce fut une très bonne expérience pour mes amis et moi.
Si vous rechercher un pied à terre à New York et pas les moyens de loger dans le Sud de Central Park. L appartement de Patricia est un SUPER rapport qualité/prix.

My husband and I stayed here the first week of December. As mentioned in other reviews, the location is fantastic! You are only a few minutes walk to the Subway, which will take you anywhere you need to go around the city (Subway rides varied anywhere from 20 minutes to 35 minutes, depending upon where you wanted to go in the city). My husband and I felt safe in the neighborhood, even when we came back in the dark, after exploring the city all day! The bed was incredibly comfortable and the apartment was just as pictured. Patricia checked in with us after our arrival, which was thoughtful. We had a question during our stay and she responded quickly to that as well. If you are looking to save money, I would highly recommend staying here verses in a hotel.  On a side note, after talking with several locals, we discovered that the New York neighborhoods have changed so much. A lot of the neighborhoods that were once thought to not be "good, safe" neighborhoods, now are. Many people have moved out of the city (so expensive) into these neighborhoods, changing the neighborhood dynamics. 
Wonderful stay! Wonderful experience! Thank you Patricia!

es un apartamento comodo y limpio,los propietarios son encantadores.
las fotos son (Website hidden by Airbnb) calefaccion estupenda y fuimos en diciembre.
ideal para una luna de miel o familia.
en el vecindario tienes todo cerca y el subway esta a una cuadra.
las camas super comodas y la ducha muy confortable....dos cosas importantes cuando una llega cansado de pasear.el centro de manhattan esta a 20 minutos.Las casas decoradas para navidad y la nieve son inolvidables.
gracias por todo.

We accomplished our goal.  We lived like true New Yorkers for a week.  The apartment is close to transit, 2-3 blocks making it very easy to begin our days to the city.  The local restaurants and stores were very friendly.  We even did a load of laundry at the local Laundry Mat.  
The apartment was clean and easy to access.  We loved the bottled water! It was the perfect size for us and our 2 pre teen kids.  Very comfortable!
We would definitely stay again.
I suggest this house!! Thanks Patricia see you soon!!

We had a lovely stay at the studio. It's a quiet area not far from the city centre using the metro. The place was big enough for 3 people with everything necessary for a short/medium stay. Very clean and pretty. Patricia was very quick in replying when the communication was needed. I definitely recommend Patricia's and Patrick's studio!!
Ubicación excelente. Patricia responde rápido a cualquier duda que tengas. Muy acogedor, buen barrio, la gente muy amable.

지하철역과 가까워 교통은 좋았습니다.
집은 옛날 집이라 생각보다 춥고 조명이 한 개 뿐이었는데 밝아지는데 시간이 걸려 좀 어두웠습니다. 완전히 켜지더라도 어두운 편이라 좀 답답했습니다. 집이 좀 더 밝았으면 더 좋았을 것 같습니다. 와이파이는 잘 연결될 때도 있고 느릴 때도 있었습니다.

Patricia's place is a nice apartment located in Harlem, with all the necessary utilities nearby and some great places with food. The home is clean and well protected, we had no issues in the neighborhood being outsiders, there are metro and bus stations 5mins walk away. There is a kitchen with utensils that you can cook in. The only drawback was extremely slow wi-fi, that was barely usable. It was not a deal-braker for us, but might be a problem for others that want to get some work done. Recommended place for seeing NYC, as going places is relatively fast since the location is pretty good.

We stayed at Patricia apartment for 6 nights. The room located on the 2nd floor. Facing the street. Room was clean , functional ,plenty of towels ,wash clothes and quite a few water of bottles provided. Location is good..a couple minutes walk to subway 2,3 lines which is directed to time square without changing train. She also accommodate an early check in and held our luggage for a couple hours and allowed us collect them after check, which we are thankful for. However, her communication on these requests was not prompt and made me feel like I was in limbo to a certain extent. 2 Internets provided were unusable ( couldn’t get connected) so we roamed the whole stay. Overall, we enjoyed our stay.

The appartment is a great choice for a short stay in New York. It offers sufficient space, is clean and very close to a subway station. Patricia's descriptions were very accurate and helpful. The only negative point I can think of is, that the fridge can get quite loud and disturbed our sleep from time to time.

Logement d'un excellent rapport qualité / prix et refait récemment. Situé au nord de Harlem, il est à 40 minutes en métro de Times Square (c'est le seul bémol pour ceux qui veulent rentrer en cours de journée) : très bien desservi par la ligne 2 ou 3. Il dispose d'une pièce centrale et d'une salle de bain correctement aménagée et plutôt vaste (un lot serviettes propres est mis à disposition, c'est appréciable) . Nous étions 4 avec 2 ados : limite en place une fois le canapé lit déployé. Par contre nous avons trouvé que les matelas étaient confortables. Pas de volets mais des stores, donc lever avec le jour. Un wifi un peu anémié, ne comptez pas faire du streaming. Sinon, quartier globalement tranquille, les habitants sont charmants et toujours prêts à vous aider. Côté supermarché, il faut aller à la 125èm street (possible en métro ou à pied) au Whole Market pour avoir du choix et une cafèteria qui dépanne bien (les épiceries locales sont vraiment riquiqui).
Great.

Studio très bien situé, propre et fonctionnel, nous avons passé un agréable séjour.
Patricia est une hôte très sympathique qui répond très vite à nos questions.
Séjour parfait sauf la wifi qui n’allait marché pas mais ce n’était pas de leur faute et Patricia et son mari on tout fait pour quelle refonctionne ! Ils sont super réactifs !
Alloggio in posizione ottimale per raggiungere il centro, a pochi passi dai servizi necessari (supermercati, farmacia) pulito e ordinato stile vintage.

Nous sommes restés dans ce studio pour notre semaine à New York. Il est dans le quartier de Harlem qui est plutôt sympa et vivant surtout lorsqu'on descend sur la 125st où vous trouverez différents commerces restaurant. On peut accéder rapidement au métro qui est très bien desservi. L'appartement était au calme et confortable. Patricia est très réactive et très sympathique (nous avons pu laisser nos bagages plus tard que l'horaire prévue car notre vol était au soir).
Bon rapport qualité prix nous recommandons.

It was our first experience in New York and using the Airbnb platform. The apartment is as described. It has an excellent location and very accessible to get to different tourist places. Patricia is very attentive and answered our messages quickly.
Excelente estadía, la volvería a elegir!!!!!!!
Logement correspondant à l’annonce. Il est suffisant pour 4. Situé près du métro, très pratique. Patricia est une hôte réactive.
n
Excelente, Tudo ocorreu conforme o combinado!

The studio unit is nice looking, quiet, comfortable, and clean. It has all the amenities you need for a New York stay. Right down the street on the corner is a nice Deli and a well-priced fruit stand and the subway is just a few steps away from that. very convenient to the 2 and 3 Subway. We stayed with our 11 year old son and it was perfect for us, we would definitly stay there again!
Had an awesome stay

We loved this quaint little Harlem suite.  Location was perfect for heading downtown on the Subway every day, and the space was great.   We really enjoyed our stay.   The only inconvenience - and it was small so not worth a downgrade from 5 stars - was how long it took to get hot water.  Such great value in NYC and we would definitely recommend.
We had a great stay! Close to the subway and markets. the bed was super comfy. It was a great value.

Très bien. À quelques pas du métro.
Patricia est très réactive aux messages.
Nous avons adoré

Appartement très bien situé (proche du métro 135th street - 20 minutes de Times Square en métro) et conforme à la description.
Patricia, la propriétaire, est très sympathique, réactive et efficace.
Nous recommandons cet appartement.
Great place located in a very convenient area , as restaurant, markets, and fármacy.  just 5 min walk away from the subway .
El apartamento en cuanto calidad precio está bien y buena ubicación, es ideal para dos , para cuatro personas es un poco pequeño !!!

siamo arrivati a new york sotto una tempesta di neve.
abbiamo avuto qualche problema nello sblocco del box per via del cambio codice, ma è stato ottimo il supporto che ci ha dato Patricia.

I travelled to NYC with my husband and daughter and staying at Patricia’s place added great value to our holiday. The place is perfectly suitable for three people just as advertised, it’s clean and the beds are very comfortable. You can find many restaurants and supermarkets around the block and the subway station is literally around the corner, which takes you to Times Square in 15 minutes! In addition, the check in was very easy. We got there an hour earlier and she aloud us to leave our bags as the cleaning lady was still there (she was very welcoming). We also found quite few bottles of water in the fridge which was a nice touch! 
I definitely recommend Patricia’s place and would like to thank her for her great hospitality!

Such an amazing place, safe and clean. Patricia accommodated to our needs and question in such timely manner. Great local feeling and beautiful home. The photos are pretty exact and the beds were great! I would definitely come back again!
Great place to stay!

summary: warm and bright apartment with terrace, wi-fi, fully equipped, in the heart of the plateau trendy Montreal, 10 min. from downtown center, metro and all services. This appartement is a place for quiet and respectful people (No party, no celebration, no visitors) Price depending on the number of bedrooms you will used, go to ; "Description + / Accès des voyageurs" to see all the option and tell me your choice. You have access to the bedroom reserved according to your number of traveler.

reviews.comments: Dominic was friendly and helpful! We were not in the unit much as we were out for the whole day.

name: Prewar classic NYC apartment.
summary: Cozy, classic american.
description: Cozy, classic american. Neighborhood is very close to two parks. Riverside drive with a view of the Hudson River and New Jersey. Train ride up to Fort Tyron Park and the Cloisters. You are nearby the 1 train just one block away, and 3 blocks away from the c local train.
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood is very close to two parks. Riverside drive with a view of the Hudson River and New Jersey. Train ride up to Fort Tyron Park and the Cloisters.
transit: You are nearby the 1 train just one block away, and 3 blocks away from the c local train.
house_rules: Please utilize the dishwasher for all dirty dishes.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am in the performing arts and travel a great deal for shows and or vacation. I am a great lover of life and everything beautiful but keep to myself when at home. Love to watch great movies and or television series. Netflix and HBO are a staple. Good food, a cocktail and a great soundtrack sounds like a Good Friday evening to me.

name: Warming & cosy 1 bedroom apartment
summary: Welcome home :) !! Warming apartment with hard wood floors, two balconies, full equiped kitchen, washer and dryer, big bedroom with a queen size bed and unlimited wifi
space: Luminosité omniprésente avec des fenêtres dans toutes les pièces, internet sans fil illimité, bien chauffé pour les nuits froides d'hiver, couleurs chaleureuses, confort, propreté, tranquillité et proximité (du métro, des pistes cyclables, du parc Jarry et de ses saules pleureurs, du marché Jean-Talon, des épiceries, bistros et cafés de quartier et même du glacier quand la saison le permet!!)
description: Welcome home :) !! Warming apartment with hard wood floors, two balconies, full equiped kitchen, washer and dryer, big bedroom with a queen size bed and unlimited wifi
neighborhood_overview: Moins achalandé que le Plateau Mt-Royal mais tout aussi animé, j'aime mon quartier pour sa tranquillité autant que pour son ambiance conviviale et chaleureuse ! Il y en a pour tous les goûts ; de la fameuse poutine à la cuisine gastronomique, du bar branché au bar tee-shirt et basket ; c'est un quartier dynamique, en pleine effervescence et multiculturel ! J'y suis depuis 5 ans déjà et je découvre encore de nouveaux cafés, bistros et commerces tous plus charmants les uns que les autres !! Il me fera plaisir de vous orienter vers les endroits sympas selon vos envies et intérêts !!
notes: Il y a toujours de la place pour se stationner gratuitement juste en bas de l'appartement pour ceux et celles qui sont en voiture
transit: Mon appartement est situé à 5 minutes à pied du métro Jarry. De l'aéroport, vous pourrez y accéder en voiture ou en taxi en une vingtaine de minutes en empruntant l'autoroute 520, puis la 40. Vous trouverez toujours une place pour vous garer, la plupart du temps en bas de l'appartement ou à quelques mètres plus loin. Si vous préférez prendre le bus, une navette est également disponible de l'aéroport jusqu'au centre-ville pour 8$. De là, vous serez au métro Jarry en 15 minutes.
interaction: L'appartement sera entièrement à vous lors de votre séjour. Je serai toutefois disponible à tout moment si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit ! Si mon horaire me le permet, je me ferai un plaisir de vous faire visiter le quartier !
house_rules: L'appartement est non-fumeur.

host.host_about:
Parlons voyage :) !! Voyager est pour moi la meilleure façon de s'enrichir, de se découvrir et de s'inspirer !  J'ai habité un peu partout dans le monde, dont au Sénégal pendant 7 ans ; expérience qui a grandement contribué à changer ma façon de voir les choses et de vivre ma vie. Aujourd'hui je la vis à la "hakuna matata", un jour à la fois et je continue d'explorer notre vaste monde dès que j'en aie l'occasion !!!

J'ai posé mes valises à Montréal il y a 10 ans et il y a encore tellement de choses que je n'ai pas encore découvert !! C'est une super ville ; belle ambiance, belles personnes, belle énergie !! 

Mon appartement est mon petit nid douillet que j'ai aménagé au cours des années, décoré de tout plein de petites choses ramenées de mes voyages. Je vous souhaite d'y trouver calme, confort, chaleur et bien-être :)!!! 

Et parce qu'une citation vaut milles mots ; j'aime beaucoup celle-ci de Gandhi ; "soyez le changement que vous voulez voir dans le monde" !!

Au plaisir de vous accueillir !!!

reviews.comments:
Un grand merci à Anouchka !
Très gentille et très prévenante, Anouchka nous a envoyé un mail avant de partir pour s'assurer que nous sachions comment rejoindre son appartement. Elle nous a même proposé de nous attendre à la station de métro pour nous y conduire. Elle nous a remis les clés en personne et fait visiter son appartement. Elle a même prévu de nous laisser tout ce qu'il fallait pour prendre le petit déjeuner le lendemain matin, ce qui est appréciable quand on arrive dans la soirée. Le lendemain, elle nous a envoyé un SMS pour savoir comment c'était passé notre première nuit et nous demander si on avait besoin de quelque chose pour parfaire notre séjour. Le logement est très chaleureux, conforme en tout point aux photos, propre et très acceuillant. On s' y sent très bien !! Nous n'hésiterons pas à demander à Anouchka de nous le relouer lors de notre prochaine visite à Montréal ! Le quartier est très agréable et la proximité du métro très appréciable. Merci encore Anouchka et à bientôt !

Anouchka's wonderful apartment is really a home away from home. Bright, colorful, full of natural sunlight and fully equipped with everything you need to make your stay in Montreal incredibly enjoyable. Her place is located within walking distance of great places to eat and visit, including the Jean-Talon Market (a must see for anyone visiting the city). Anouchka was very responsive and accommodated my late arrival without any issues - I'd highly recommend her place for anyone visiting Montreal!

L'appartement de Anouchka est vraiment un 'home away from home'. Lumineux, coloré, plein de lumière naturelle et entièrement équipée avec tout ce que vous aurez besoin pour rendre votre séjour à Montréal très agréable. Son apart est situé à super proche de bons endroits pour manger et visiter, y compris le marché Jean-Talon (un must-see pour tous ceux qui visitent la ville). Anouchka été très réactif par SMS - je vous conseille de rester a sa maison pour tous ceux qui visitent Montréal!

We had a lovely time staying at Anouchka's place! The apartment was clean and tidy and looks exactly as it is portrayed in the pictures. Anouchka was very welcoming and knowledgeable about her neighbourhood. She was very flexible with check in and check out times to accommodate us. Would definitely stay at Anouchka's place again!

Accueil très chaleureux d'Anouschka, appartement calme, cocooning, bien décoré; lit confortable; appartement près de tout et bien localisé.
Pour tous ceux qui aiment des lieux ou l'énergie est joyeuse et douce!

Notre séjour s'est parfaitement bien passé. Anouchka est une hôte très accueillante et souriante , ce qui nous a tout de suite mis à l'aise. Nous avons loué l'appartement pendant 1 semaine, je le recommande vivement à tout ceux qui cherchent un toit chaleureux, accueillant et surtout plein d'énergie. 
L'appartement est à proximité de lieux intéressants et on s'y sent comme chez soi. J'y retournerai avec grand plaisir !!!!!!

I always feel cozy and comfortable at the airbnb's I stay in, but there was something about Anouchka's that really made me feel like I was at home, like no other time has. My boyfriend and I took the train up from NYC, and I was planning on updating Anouchka on our arrival time using the wifi on the train-- since we got transferred to a bus in Albany, I had no way of contacting her once we crossed the Canadian border. I was so worried, since the unexpected change caused us to arrive later than expected-- but Anouchka was completely prepared to handle every situation and left the keys for us in a convenient place even though we weren't able to meet her as planned. Nothing beat waking up in that beautiful, warm, comfortable haven each morning and seeing the snowfall outside. Thank you, Anouchka, for giving us the perfect home during our short but memorable stay in Montreal!

Anouchka met us at the apartment as planned.  She is a very gracious host and made us feel welcome.  All of our questions about the neighbourhood were answered in a notebook complete with maps.  The apartment was clean and was well equipped .

We would certainly stay here again.  Thank you Anouchka.

Great neighbourhood, lovely home, very welcoming. Anouchka was very gracious and friendly. 

Would love to stay here again on my next visit.
The reservation was canceled 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Anouchka was very nice and gave us a list of things to do in the neighborhood. We had some confusion checking in, but otherwise no problems at all! Great host and a cozy stay very close to the metro.
We loved staying in Anouchka's charming apartment apartment and she made sure everything went smoothly for us. Highly recommended!

Nous avons passé un excellent moment à Montréal ! La maison de Anouchka est très jolie, calme et reposant dans un quartier à la fois central mais pas trop. Anouchka est très réactive et disponible. Merci à elle.

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay. Good bed with nice linens. Apartment decorated in nice colors - nice and bright! The kitchen was equipped and the bathroom had good water pressure. The book left in the apartment described a bunch of places to check out - came in handy as we visited a local bakery and coffee shop (really nice). The neighborhood is classic Montreal. Tree lined streets with three story walk-ups. Very close to Jarry metro and Jarry Park. Lots of local shops  close by including grocery and pharmacy. We had no trouble finding street parking. I always travel with a sleep mask and it did come in handy as the apartment is nice and bright and the curtains in the bedroom lets light come in. If you are there in the summer months and have the windows open there is a bit of street noise, not a whole lot but a bit. This wouldn't apply in the cooler months when the windows are closed. Overall I recommend this apartment - it's very clean and quaint and the neighborhood is classic Montreal and close to metro, with easy street parking and lots around!

Notre arrivée a été bien préparée par Anouchka, merci à elle ! elle a été très disponible, réactive, sympathique. elle avait aussi préparé une farde avec des informations pratiques pour notre séjour. 
L'appartement est bien situé, une station de métro à quelques minutes à pieds, puis de là, accès facile au centre. 
au final, bon rapport qualité/prix !

Anouchka's apartment is an oasis! It is absolutely warm and cozy and also very peaceful and relaxing. We weren't sure where to look for places to stay in Montreal. In fact, we only picked Anouchka's apartment because of the great pictures and glowing reviews -- we had no idea where it was in Montreal in relation to attractions/restaurants/etc. I'm glad we chose this place to stay!

Anouchka left a great traveler's guide complete with suggestions of where to go in her neighborhood. The neighborhood is not in Old Montreal -- you need to take the metro which is located right down the street. I found the location to be perfect. Good restaurants and cafes; tree-lined streets and cool looking apartments; a great bar with local craft beer; etc. There is also a great balcony off the kitchen where you can enjoy breakfast or a book or a drink. The neighborhood was quiet when we were there and even with a party going on downstairs, I couldn't hear them at all when I went to bed. 

Anouchka's apartment is incredibly clean. The decor is bright and cheery (I loved all the plants!). The bedroom is huge. The bathroom is huge. The sitting room is cozy with a nice, big couch. The kitchen is full sized. It felt like home!  The pictures here on AirBnB are a great representation of this apartment.

Thank you for opening up your home to us! We truly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this flat to anyone!
L'appartement était propre et sentait bon. Un cartable nous attendait sur la table de cuisine et nous y avons retrouvé toutes les informations nécessaires sur le logement et le quartier.
L'appartement était propre et très bien situé. La communication avec Anouchka était parfaite, c'était simple et rapide. Bref nous avons vraiment aimé notre séjour! Je le recommande

Anouchka's apartment was just great, exactly what we wanted in Montreal. Cozy, funky, and with everything we needed. The neighborhood is good, residential with enough bars and restaurants around to make it worth exploring, and with easy access to the metro to get to the center.

The listing was described exactly how it looks-- very colorful and welcoming. The location was a 5 minute walk from The Metro, which was very convenient. A great coffee shop was a 5 minute walk away as well, it is called Cafe Larue & Fil. Anouchka was super flexible, friendly, and easy to get a hold of. We enjoyed our stay very much!

Le guide du voyageur réalisé par Anouchka était juste parfait et ça m'a permis de découvrir les bonnes adresses de Montréal :) le quartier est juste sublime et l'appartement correspond en tout point aux photos et à l'annonce.

The apartment was as depicted in the ad. It was clean, comfortable, bright, colorful, and really seemed to impart a sense of the host (whom we did not meet this trip, but I spoke with on the telephone). The arrival arrangements were as promised, even though we were later than anticipated. Having a washer and dryer in the apartment was great. The weather was hot and humid but there was a rotating fan in the apartment that helped a great deal in that regard. We felt comfortable while there and were able to enjoy coffee on the terrace in the mornings (at least when it wasn't raining =)

The neighborhood was as described by other reviewers -- quiet, residential, diverse. A short walk to Jarry street presented a side array of options for dining, coffee, and drinks. There were several Vietnamese restaurants, Greek, Italian, and a couple of bars. We returned again and again to EtOH, which was on Jarry and St-Denis, as they had twenty craft beers on tap and good pub food. Java Mythe, which was marked in a Traveller's Guide Anouchka has put together and placed in the apartment, had excellent coffee. A bit of a walk first thing in the morning, but worth it. A walk to Parc Jarry turned up a free concert Friday evening; and over on Villeray we were able to get our poutine fix at Frites Alors. The subway, also on Jarry, was a short walk, and between that, our feet, and the 193 and 30 buses, we were able to go anywhere we wanted without having to touch the car for five days. Downtown, the Old City, the Plateau and Parc Mont-Royal, the waterfront and Atwater Market -- for the most part, were within half an hour without needed the car. We would not hesitate to return to Anouchka's apartment.
Anouchka was very helpful. The apartment was small but cozy. It is well-situated, close to the Metro.
Appartement chaleureux et relaxant et très bien situé . Anouchka est toujours disponible pour nous lors de notre séjour. Je conseille cet endroit fortement.

Anouchkas apartment was wonderful. Bright, exceptionally clean, and everything the pictures portrayed it to be. We were able to relax, and she was always prompt with responding anytime we needed something. We would  recomend this place to anyone.

Anouchka offers a very friendly and thoughtful experience to travelers. She maintained contact with us before we arrived, made sure we were clear about how to enter the apartment, and left many interesting maps and brochures about the area. She also created a neighborhood map that pointed out various locations for meals and shopping. The apartment is very clean, and super energetic and colorful. The kitchen is well stocked with necessary items and allows for comfortable meals and socializing. The rest of the apartment offers comfort amidst a creative décor. There are many lighting options, which is nice when you just want to hang out or relax. The little porch provided a great place to find fresh air while sipping on drinks or reading a book. The surrounding area, while further away from the hub of Le Plateau or Downtown Montreal, provides quick access to the Jean Talon market --- an amazing must see place --- and the #30 bus which can transport one to more bustling areas rather quickly. For the past decade or so, we have tended to stay in Le Plateau region, and were a little worried about being so far out. But in the end, this was an amazing choice because we explored the Villeray/St Michel area, as well as Mile End, places we had ignored in previous visits to Montreal. As a result of the switch, we found great bagel and gift shops in Mile End, and appreciated a week long supply of fresh berries and veggies from the Jean Talon market.  When we wanted to go out for dinner or to a museum, we found the bus (with a stop just on the corner) to be incredibly convenient, and the metro a short and interesting walk away. We did not get a chance to explore the restaurants in the immediate area, although there are many. For us, being able to spread out, to relax, and to savor foods prepared at home was a real treat, which was made even more incredible by Anouchka’s decorating talent. We hope to return next year for a longer stay, and will definitely first look to see if this apartment is available. I am now a huge fan of Airbnb and Anouchka’s hospitality!

Great stay! Comfortable apartment full of character and not too far from the sights. Anouchka left a book full of neighborhood tips and useful information. We didn't have the pleasure of meeting her, but she made it easy to get the keys and was very flexible on the departure time. We felt really at home during our stay!

We really liked how bright and colorful the apartment was!  The welcome info and maps really helped us take advantage of the neighborhood. The free street parking was also a perk! Overall it was a great first Airbnb experience! We would definitely recommend this apartment.

I had an amazing time in Montreal anchored by Anouchka's beautiful apartment. I found her apartment  spacious, colorful and inspiring  with two balconies and it was situated close to station Jarry, which was one stop away from beautiful Jean Talon & little Italy. Getting downtown and to old Montreal was also a short ride away. Anouchka was a wonderful host, when I arrived she had a booklet with suggestions about the neighborhood, and apartment rules and even maps and tour guide pamphlets about the city. I could've asked for a better experience.
Anouchka's apartment was exactly what we were looking for on our first trip to Montreal. It was a nice size in a quiet neighbourhood away from all the tourists. I recommend it highly.

Anouchka's apartment was absolutely fantastic. The neighborhood is beautiful and welcoming, and Anouchka's "travellers guide" is incredibly helpful; it has complete instructions on everything in the apartment (including how to fix the Wifi if it broke!), and the local recommendations are useful and fantastic (especially Java Mythe and El Rey Del Taco).

Overall, I could not imagine a better place to stay in Montreal.
Appartement tres agreable, lumineux, ou l on se sent bien. Conforme a la description.

My fiancé and I had a wonderful stay at this beautiful apartment in Montreal. It was near transportation, clean, and comfortable. Our host's information binder of maps and suggestions was perfect! We followed many ideas from the binder and were pleasantly surprised by the Java Myth Cafe, Tapeo, and Le Coin G. Thanks to Anoushka's reccommendations, our experience in Montreal was exactly what we wanted: a short visit to a wonderful city without being in the touristy area. We would absolutely stay here again. Thank you for opening your home to us!
Anouchka  has a lovely spacious and colorful apartment.  Very clean and comfortable!  Enjoyed meeting her and felt welcome from the start!

Très bel appartement ,très  bien situé, proche du métro, quartier calme !une très bonne adresse. Nous nous sommes sentis comme chez nous. Dommage que l'organisation de notre séjour ne nous ait pas permis de nous rencontrer.
Anouchka was warm, friendly, and welcoming. The space was very clean and tidy.
We had a wonderful time!  The apartment was clean, welcoming and easy to find.  We would definitely recommend!

The apartment was amazing. My boyfriend and I were really impressed with how unique and colourful the apartment was. We felt extremely welcomed and the host provided us with a travellers guide, along with brochures for events and places to visit while in Montreal. The apartment was conveniently located around a convenience store, and supermarket. The neighbourhood was lovely and very peaceful. Definitely at the top of our list and hope to visit again soon!
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Tout était bien: propreté, tranquille avec accès facile. MERCI !!!!

It was a pleasure to stay at Anouchka's apartment! It was just as described and pictured, very conveniently located near the metro station, and affordable. We didn't get to meet Anouchka in person but she was very responsive and attentive to our needs/questions, such as confirming we had parked in the right place (and on that note, it was very easy to find free street parking!). Definitely recommend!
Colorful room and the host is well communicated.

This was as described and was an great experience. We are frequent visitors to Montreal and were there for a wedding in Laval so needed something on the north side of the island. This was a new neighborhood for us and it was lovely, all we needed at hand, easy street parking and just minutes from the autoroute for our exit. Highly recommend this great apartment, you would be a fool to stay in a hotel!

Anouchka est très soucieuse du bon déroulement du séjour de ses hôtes (elle a rédigé un "guide du voyageur" très utile) et très réactive aux demandes qu'on lui fait.
L'appartement est agréable, lumineux, fonctionnel. 
Bref un séjour agréable. 
Je recommande chaudement l'appartement d'Anouchka

Merci Anouchka de m'avoir permis de relouer votre bel appartement !
L'appartement était très propre, chaleureux et accueillant.On se sent vraiment très bien chez vous ! Proche du métro et dans un quartier très agréable.
J'espère pouvoir revenir chez vous lors de mon prochain séjour à Montréal. Merci encore !!

name: Recién Re1 Apart delS.18 Núcleo Bcn
summary: Lovely Flat/Apartment, which has just been completely renovated. Is located in the heart of Barcelona close to many attractions and entertainment venues, as well as PLaça Catalunya, the Boqueria market, the Liceu theater and the port,
