reviews.comments:
It is exactly what we expected to be and Isaac is a very respectful and word-keeping person. We got everything we asked for.

Just a word of caution: the unit is at fifth floor (forth+main), so one has to be able to climb up five floors.

The unit is totally renovated, all is brand new
Isaac is a very helpful host.  He was always easy to reach and attentive to all my questions.  The location is excellent.  I spent most of my nights only 2 blocks away at MACBA.

name: Holiday Villa - Casa do Sobreiro
space: Only 20 minutes from the city of Oporto, " Casa do Sobreiro" was recently renovated and managed to keep the original structure and architecture, which is typical of the Douro region. An old mill for the production of olive oil was kept intact and is certainly an interesting feature of the Casa do Sobreiro. In the surrounding area, the focus is on the beach and a small marina with restaurants where you can enjoy the best Portuguese gastronomy. You can also explore the Douro river cruises. Accommodation Casa do Sobreiro offers self catering accommodation for up to 8 propõe. The house compromises: - Four bedrooms - extensive loung and dining area - full equiped kitchen - three bathrooms - cable tv - fireplace - hifi and dvd - swimming pool - barbecue - car park Outside In the garden there are sunshades and sun loungers and 2 swings located near the swimming pool. There is also a terrace with a barbecue.
description: Only 20 minutes from the city of Oporto, " Casa do Sobreiro" was recently renovated and managed to keep the original structure and architecture, which is typical of the Douro region. An old mill for the production of olive oil was kept intact and is certainly an interesting feature of the Casa do Sobreiro. In the surrounding area, the focus is on the beach and a small marina with restaurants where you can enjoy the best Portuguese gastronomy. You can also explore the Douro river cruises. Accommodation Casa do Sobreiro offers self catering accommodation for up to 8 propõe. The house compromises: - Four bedrooms - extensive loung and dining area - full equiped kitchen - three bathrooms - cable tv - fireplace - hifi and dvd - swimming pool - barbecue - car park Outside In the garden there are sunshades and sun loungers and 2 swings located near the swimming pool. There is also a terrace with a barbecue.
notes: The house is in a rural area and the last fifty meters is an old access with some inclination which sometimes makes it difficult to climb. However  , with some advice we always find a way.

host.host_about: We are a happy family. Isabel (mother), Diogo (son) and Luís (son). And now we found the pleasure of hosting people in our house.

reviews.comments:
Nous sommes allés du 9 au 14 juillet 2013. 
La maison est superbe, ainsi que la vue. L'intérieur dont on voit peu sur les photos est très grand et fonctionnel. Les chambres ont été refaites il y a peu de temps. Il y a vraiment 3 salles de bain ! 
Luis nous as conseillé un petit resto à 5 min à pied qu'on avoue être un très bon rapport qualité prix plaisir, nous y avons manger 3 fois et avons payé à chaque fois environ 50 euros pour 7 personnes. Nous vous conseillons de goûter les Pataniscas ! 

Les seuls remarques négatives mais qui sont que des petits détails :
- les moustiques comme tous les endroits chauds mais Luis nous as donné un produit à pulvériser qui marche très bien
- le champs du coq du matin ;O)
- et pour ceux qui veulent visiter les caves à vin au milieu des vignes, il faudra faire 1h30 de route en suivant le Douro en direction des terres. Mais vous trouverez des dégustations de porto à Porto à 20 min.
Si nous retournons à Porto, nous reviendrons certainement dans cette maison.

We had a great time at Luis's place, the house is amazing and the view is awesome! We had a tiny problem and Luis was really available and helpful, he and his mum are great hosts! Great holidays in a great house. Lis had even found a bed for our baby, which was really nice!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour en famille. La prestation est excellente, la maison est encore plus surprenante que sur les photos et la vue est magnifique. Bien situé dans un endroit tranquille et à une trentaine de minutes du plein centre de Porto.
Comme d'autres, nous conseillons le restaurant plus bas prés de la marina. 
Nous la conseillons et si l'occasion se présente, nous n'hésiterons pas à y retourner!
Beautifully located, large house with spacious  rooms and enormous kitchen. Very good value for money. Recommended!
This lovely villa is absolutely great! Magnificent view, great pool, spacious kitchen. We would love to come back here!

Amazing view! Huge house (much bigger than it looks in the photos) with brand new modern bathrooms etc. Luis was very helpful throughout at stay offering any advice we needed. We had a great time staying here and would recommend it to everyone.

Merci pour ce séjour, la maison est splendide, la vue est incroyable! Tout a été parfait .Le tout situé à 20 minutes du coeur PORTO .
L'accueil a été chaleureux et nos hôtes ont su répondre à toutes nos attentes. Nous y retournerons et le recommanderons vivement à nos amis! 
Obrigado por tudo Luis !

A great holiday retreat with absolutely marvellous views over the Douro river! Luis is a nice host, providing all useful information to help having a great holiday. The house is much bigger than on the pictures and is comfortable. Inside, the first floor was our preferred hideout, completely renovated it comprises a (second) living room, balcony and three bedrooms, all of them having the great views over the Douro river.
The house is conveniently located, about 25min from Porto and, with the new A41 highway (access about 8km from the house), trips to many other nice cities are easy  (e.g. Amarante, Guimaraes...).

Fantastic villa! Stayed for 3 nights, the pool, gardens and view are stunning. The house is huge and very nicely furnished. The cafe a short walk into town was great, good cheap beer! Would love to return again soon!

belle maison spacieuse agréable calme à 30 mn du centre de PORTO
La vue digne d'une carte postale, la vue sur le Douro est magnifique. Un intérieur spacieuse agréable. des salles de bains et des chambres climatisées super. une barbecue pour de longue soirée cool. Je reviendrais des que possible

Luis is very friendly and helpful, as is his mother who met us at the house. The house was even bigger than it looks like in the pictures and the pool is great! We were three familys with 3 small children and one 12 year old and 6 adults and it still felt spacious. Maybe it´s good to know that it is a bit steep and rocky road the last metres to the house.
The house was clean.

The sourrundings is very beautiful and there is a nice restaurant in walking distance and a small supermarket a bit of a walk away.

Onze vakantie in Casa do Sobreiro was fantastisch. Het perceel is afsluitbaar met een automatisch hek, en de oppervlakte daarbinnen is veel groter dan de advertenties doen vermoeden. Hetzelfde geldt voor het huis, dat echt heel erg ruim is. Met 8 personen hebben we twee weken lang genoten van de ruimte, het lekkere weer, het zwembad, het buitenzijn en de privacy. Bij aankomst was het huis netjes schoon, alles werkt, en ook de service bij vertrek was perfect. Ik zou iedereen een vakantie bij Jose en Antonio aanbevelen, en zou het zelf ook zeker nog een keer over willen doen.

Really nice hosts and a huge house with a great view. We specially liked to enjoy our meals outside :)
The only part of the house that would get a bit too warm at night was the bedrooms upstairs but they bedrooms have Airconditionate so this is not an issue at all.
Nice and clean villa not far away from Porto. Good value for money!
A Casa do Sobreiro é espectacular, maior do que parece nas fotos e com uma vista fantástica. Uma excelente opção para quem quer ficar perto da cidade do Porto mas sem o reboliço da cidade.

Perfect description.
Very pleasant people, give you some advice.
I will probably come back

Extremely responsive and accommodating, Luis was waiting there for us, and gave us instructions on the phone, on how to find the house. The house is bigger and better than in the pictures. Everything is meticulously clean, including the pool. The kitchen was large and well equipped.  The views of the Douro River are simply majestic. Check-out was just as easy, his mother stopped by to pick up the keys. Thank you for sharing this amazing home. We plan to go back again next year.

What a beautiful home! We spent four incredible days at Luis's "villa" and felt as if we'd found a secret treasure. All communications wei Luis were very fast, easy, and friendly. Luis's mother met us at the house, giving us a warm welcome, and showing us through the home. From that point there were no hitches or problems--the home is fully equipped with everything you might need--plenty of kitchen utensils and supplies, plenty of towels linens etc. The bathrooms were clean and modern, the pool fantastic, the view superb. All communications with Luis were very quick, easy, and friendly. And restaurants and cafes nearby, with Porto only a 20-minute drive away. Just a wonderful place.

The house is absolutely fantastic - it's really spacious (there were five of us staying and there was plenty of room for several more).

The view is INCREDIBLE and the photos really don't do it justice.

Our hire car (which was admittedly terrible) struggled with the last few metres of road outside the house, but we were able to park a minute or so away from the house without any trouble.

The hosts were great and I would hugely recommend a stay!

The place is huge and very nice, with a beautiful view. Not too far from Porto and the beach, with the ability to go swimming in the Douro in less than 5 minutes.
Communication with Luis was always quick, and his mother was at the house to welcome us and show us around.
Just the road to get to the house is quite rocky, 4x4 is nearly needed

We had a wonderful week in this vila! We enjoyed the stunning views of the Douro, the air-conditioned bedrooms (so we didn't suffer from the mosquitoes), the comfortable bathrooms, the pool and the spacious kitchen. The owners were very friendly and flexible. In the morning we walked along the river in fifteen minutes to the small village where you can find a delicious bakery. When you walk a little further down to the river, there is a natural bay with a nice restaurant where you can eat very tasty. We were five people 40 euros lost! Also there is a nice restaurant in the opposite of the house. In short...we will definitely come back again !

Disponibilité exemplaire. Belle propriété, très belle vue
Chemin un peu compliqué d'accès.

The house is renovated with much taste. 
We loved the stay. Everything was nice. 
Especially we loved the pool and the outside table and sun beds very near to the pool. And we loved the house. We have 5 kids and the house has plenty of space so the kids has own rooms or slept 2 and 2 together. 
Eating at the outside table makes is very nice to be one 10m from the pool, so the kids jumped in the pool very often. 
Luis was there on the phone everytime we had questions. His mother was there in person when we arrived and when we left.

The view is splendid. Cannot be beaten!

The house is huge, the living room and the kitchen alone is maybe (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) . 
There was an outside barbeque too. 
200m away there is a very nice cafe with high quality food and service. It is called Figuera. I nearby city Melres (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) m) there is a nice baker and a supermarket. More nearby (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) m) there is a small super market, but we did not use this. 

We would love to come back.

Tres belle maison au bord du Douro avec une vue magnifique. Les photos reflètent tout à fait la maison qui est grande et spacieuse. Nous étions 5 adultes, 2enfants et 2bebes. La piscine était très agréable. Seul bémol, nous avons eu un problème d'alimentation en eau. Notre hôte a été réactif. A savoir, l'acces a la maison est tres difficile mais ca vaut le coup.

Really big house. For 7 we had lots of space. 
There is an amazing view on the douro river. 
We stayed one week and we liked the location, between Porto and the Douro valley. 
The Villa provides well furnished kitchen and large bbq to enjoy the terrace.
However when we arrived the swimming pool was dirty so we could not really enjoy it completely. José reacted quickly though.
Another drawback would be the almost impractible road to access to the villa.

This is a really nice house, It is very large and comfortable and was really good value.   The view is simply incredible and is a major attraction to take into consideration.  The area is lovely and the people at the cafés and shops are very friendly.  The whole family had a wonderful stay.

Great house, even nicer than it looks in the photos. Location is perfect: ~10min walk to village (baker, butcher, mini supermarket, cafe, marina, beach/river), ~20min drive to beaches (Espinho, Miramar etc), and ~30min drive to centre of Porto. 
House is well equipped with everything we needed. 
Contact with Luis was easy and he responded straight away.

Fantastic villa in a beautiful location. Looks so much better than in the photos. Lots of living space and all very comfortable. Good location for exploring Porto and the vineyards. Luis was very responsive via email and phone, if we needed anything he was only too happy to help. We will definitely return and explore this region in more depth.

Really beautiful place. Very clean house, nice and helpful owner. If you'll use a Map point from AirB&B there is no problem to find the place! We have stayed for the weekend and everything was just great.

Great apartment!!
 Only 20 Minutes from Porto and very close to the main highway. The house was Beautiful, large lining room, very well equipped, spacious living rooms and a huge kitchen. Very Comfortable! Ideal for two families like we were. 
Great pool outside over looking an breathtaking part of the Douro River. (This can also be 
Easily reached).

Highly recommended!
The host canceled this reservation 95 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Luis and his mother were top class hosts. The house was also incredibly. Highly highly recommend this wonderful house and destination

Nous avons très bien été accueillis par la maman de José,la maison est très jolie et très grande au calme avec une vue magnifique!
La description est conforme il y a la climatisation des serviettes de bain,de quoi faire un barbecue,un village à proximité.
Merci pour ce séjour!

Cette maison est tout simplement sublime, la vue est à couper le souffle! 
Luis a été très facilement joignable, toujours prêt à nous aider et à répondre rapidement aux messages.
Située à 20km de Porto, la maison est très bien située. De plus certains bonus ont été très appréciés des petits comme des grands (le babyfoot, la maisonnette dans le jardin, la supérette d'urgence...)
C'est exactement le genre de maison que je visualisais lorsque j'imaginais des vacances sous le soleil portugais!

An absolutely amazing house, a lot bigger than expected, don't be fooled by the pictures, they really don´t do the house justice. The kitchen is amazing, industrial scale and quality, cooked my best meal on the entire trip here. We stayed there two families (8 peers.) and had room to spare. There is also a stunning surprise from the past times in the house ;-). Our host, Luis, has been top notch, extremely helpful and good communication.

Thanks a lot from the eight of us.
We once again had a fantastic vacation at Luis' house.   The location and view is wonderful. The house is very comfortable.   The weather was amazing.  We plan to come back again next year.
Très belle maison, avec un emplacement de rêve: surplomber le fleuve, que du bonheur. Seul hic: l'accessibilité, il ne faut pas avoir peur d'une sacré monté mais ça vaut le coups ;-)
La casa es como muestran las fotos y pasamos unos días estupendos. Lo mejor las vistas del Duero. Luis estuvo atento y disponible en todo momento.

Notre séjour c est tres bien (Website hidden by Airbnb) maison correspondait à ce qui était annoncé, avec une vue superbe sur le Douro.
Porto, sa région et la vallée du Douro proches pour les visites.Une très belle region!.
Nous regrettons de n avoir pas pu faire la connaissance  d Antonio Luis ( nous avons ete reçus très gentiment  par sa maman)  
Mais antonio Luis etait joignable et a tres vite répondu  quand nous en avons eu besoin (changement bonbonne de gaz ). 
Belle maison, belle région, beau sejour.
We had a great stay! Lovely villa with a beautiful point of view. It looks beter then the pictures! I would come back.

Really big and beautiful house, and fully equipped. A big kitchen, a nice pool and a beautiful garden, with an amazing view. 
My friends and I had a great time here.
Porto is less than half an hour away by car. So we had some sightseeing there and some lazy sunny afternoons by the pool.
Luis was helpful with giving us tips of some nice things to see and do in Porto.

There was only one small disadvantage: there was a problem with the water supply. 
But the gorgeous house and surrounding made up for it. 

We would definitely recommend this house to our friends!

Casa do Sobreiro is an amazing villa to stay in. It's big with beautiful views that the the photos don't really reflect. The villa is clean and has everything you need for a relaxing stay. My advice for anyone staying is to rent a car, the location is quite secluded and getting around is not that easy.

Fantastic place more room than 2 couples required. Beautiful views of the river. Romantic old olive oil mill attached to the house. Private and secure. Jose, Antonio' younger brother and mother greeted us. Jose spoke perfect English and demonstrated great culinary skill in preparing a traditional Portuguies dinner...perfect hosts, photos don't do it justice.  Thanks, Terry

The villa is lovely and spacious and with a view to absolutely die for (over the river Duoro).

It is well equipped and generally comfortable. However, we found that some of the items were broken or not maintained as well as we would have hoped. I'm sure these will be attended to shortly and we still had a lovely stay and would recommend it to others.

We have just finished a two week stay in Luís' lovely house. Sitting on porch with a glass of port wine while enjoying the splendid view over the Duoro river was really nice. 
The house is very spacious. Staying there two families with each two children was fine.
Porto is less than half an hour away by car, if you choose the highway. Anyway, try also the main road along the Douro which is a beautiful trip.
We had some trouble finding a decent place in the nearby to eat everyday local food. I suppose Luís may have some suggestions, we forgot to ask him. Though, we would like to recommend the "Figurino do Douro" ten minutes walk away (you can actually see the restaurant from the house). We spent around 115Eur on a dinner for six persons. Both food and service was excellent.
All in all, we will recommend this fine house for anyone who is planning to visit the Porto area in a group of 6-10 persons.

- Thorstein

A wonderful house in the most beautiful environment. Don't believe the pictures, the view from the house is far more beautiful than a camera can catch.
There are shops (supermarket and bakery) less than a kilometer from the house.
Several restaurants and cafes are close to the house, they are cheap, and 
most of them with a wonderful view over the river.
We were a family with four small children, and we had lovely time there,  especially did everybody enjoy the pool.

Une maison juste Exceptionnelle de part son emplacement et sa vue unique sur le Douro. 
Je recommande a tous les voyageurs cherchant cadre super agréable et jolie espace intérieur et extérieur cette Casa. 
Antonio est un Hôte très sympa. Et toutes les conditions pour un moment de détente sont réunis.
Parole de Globe Trotteur ;-)
je ne veux pas partager cette super adresse! tout est magique!!
We enjoyed yet another stay in this lovely house, will be back again next year.  As always Luis was very helpful and provided some extras which was specially requested.

The views from the house are AMAZING! The house and grounds are very spacious and lived up to expectation, it had everything we needed and more. We found it easily accessible by car from Porto. The supermarket and cafe are only a 10 min walk, however the main road is busy and there is not much of a path. We were impressed with area and had a very enjoyable stay!

An amazing villa with an amazing view. Has everything you could want with plenty of space both in and out. The pool is not really big enough for swimming in if that's what you're after but perfect for lounging around in when the sun gets too hot. Definitely represents great value for money

Beautiful home, beautiful city!  This home has the best views.  It is perfect for large families.  It's close to Porto, and has a great restaurant literally walking distance from the home.  I would recommend everyone to stay here.

A fine  spacious house in an area of outstanding beauty with an excellent views of the river and  very good restaurant close  by. The surrounding area is  delightful and there are lovely towns close by but a car is probably essential. It is a 40min bus ride into Porto.
However, we experienced problems re heating and water during our stay. We had no hot water at all for the first 20 hrs. Sinks in the downstairs bathroom and one upstairs  bathroom ran only cold water. 

During our stay (first week in June) the weather was very inclement - several very wet days that were cool. We didn't have ready access to fuel  for most of the time we spent there and were unable to buy any despite numerous trips to a number of supermarkets near and far. Given the weather the house was uncomfortable and cold without a fire.

We arrived around 8 pm thirsty and peckish. There was no milk, bread or coffee.We were directed to a supermarket, 20 mins walk along a main road  but  when we got there the supermarket was closed! 
You might bear this in mind if you are arriving  here in the evening.
Some  clarity is needed about what is available and what is not eg fuel. Attention to the problem with the water alongside a little more hospitality could make this a fabulous place to stay.
Had a great family weekend in this house, lots and lots of room, very private, good pool and priceless views.

House in Porto

Huge house with spectacular views from all bedrooms, and a small but lovely pool and deck area.  The two upstairs bathrooms are modern but the rest of the house is quite rustic.  There are two sitting areas (one downstairs and one upstairs), a huge dining room with seating for 12 I think, and plenty of space to spread out.  Three of the bedrooms have air conditioning but the one on the main level did not.  It was not an issue since the evenings were cool so we didn’t really need AC.  This house has a kitchen like in a restaurant which feels a bit odd but has everything you need: gas stovetop, a full size fridge, an oven, and lots of dishes.  There is no dishwasher though.  There was also a clothes washer which was very handy, but no dryer.  The house is about 15 minutes from downtown Porto, and there is plenty of parking in the city so it was no problem to drive there. 

One downside was a persistent unpleasant smell coming from a utility closet.  I am not sure what the smell was exactly (perhaps mold?) but the house has lots of huge windows to let in fresh air so it wasn’t too bad once we let it air out.  We also would have appreciated a couple of extra towels and pillows since one per person isn’t quite enough,  but perhaps we are used to North American style lodgings since the other 3 houses we stayed at in Portugal had the same towel to person ratio, even if there was a pool onsite.  One last note is that there is a single tiny hair dryer and it is not great so if you are many people who need to dry your hair, you are better off bringing one.
Great location and architecture. Some touchups to be improved. Enjoyed it.
We had another great holiday and we hope to be back next year

Le lieu est exceptionnel.
La vue est splendide et reposante. Peu de voisins, peu de bruit malgré la route sur le bas côté. 
Piscine petite et profonde d'à peu près un mètre. 
Nous n'avons pas pu profiter pleinement de notre séjour pour les raisons suivantes  :  
. climatisation d'une des chambres en panne alors qu'il faisait 35 degrés et ce pendant 9 jours sur les 14 réservés
. fuite de la salle de bains du haut dans la cuisine engendrant des courts-circuits et des coupures de courant les 4 derniers jours
. Cafetière en panne et non remplacée
La maison est superbe c'est vrai mais il y a des fils électriques qui pendent un peu partout et dans la cuisine il faut debracher un appareil pour en brancher un autre. Des multriprises qui ne devraient pas exister particulièrement sur une machine à laver le linge
La cuisine - très grande - a un grand besoin d'un nettoyage profond et total. 
Le congélateur ne congèle pas les produits placés en bas 
Et enfin, changer tous les matelas est indispensable  !  
Un réel coût de neuf est nécessaire à cette maison pour devenir idéale 
Il est à noter que la Maman d'Antonio Luis et lui-même sont charmants et on essayé de pallier à tous ces inconvénients comme ils le pouvaient mais le résultat est là  :  nous n'avons pas eu la quiétude escomptée pendant ces vacances.

nous étions déjà venus en aout 2017, la maison est idéalement située, une vue superbe .... MAIS : le ménage!! ( la cuisine est sale) . Il faudrait un nettoyage en profondeur des ustensiles .... De plus, la literie devrait être changer.  Attention, vous avez une belle maison mais il y a du laisser-aller.... Dommage!
A great place for family or couples. Plenty of space to spread out and enjoy the scenery from every room.
très belle maison avec une vue à vous couper le souffle !!!!

name: Historical big flat@city center
summary: The flat is at a historical Greek building and locat at Beyoglu district. It is 5 walking distance to Istiklal Street which is the center of Istanbul's cultural life with many cafes, bars, shops,cinemas and cultural centers.  The flat has 3 bedroom
space: The flat is found in a historical Greek building. Each of the 3 bedrooms have double beds (King-Size) and one of them also has a sofa bed. There is also a living room with  2 double sofa-beds. It is very suitable for groups up to 11 people. There is 1 bathroom and a kitchen. There are air-conditioners and 2 televisions at the flat. Fully equipped Kitchen:  Fridge, Kettle, Crockery, Cutlery, Cookware, Teapot, French press, Kitchen Utensils, Coffee, Tea Bathroom:  • Shower  • Hairdryer  • Towels  • Toilette Paper  • Soap  • Washing machine/dryer  • Iron&ironing board Other location features:  5 minute walk to Istiklal Street and Galatasaray Square.  12-13 minute walk to Taksim Square.  15 minute walk to Galata Tower.  45 minute walk to the historic Sultanahmet area (including Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia and Basilica Cistern)  5 minute walk to the bus stop.  10 minute walk to the metro stop.  1 minute walk to the supermarket.  1 minute walk to the local bazaar on Sunday. I c

neighborhood_overview: This flat located in the Beyoglu district is a 5-minute walk to Istiklal Street, the heart and soul of Istanbul's cultural life with many cafes, bars, shops, cinemas and cultural centers.

host.host_about: I am from Istanbul, Turkey. I like to travel and meet new people. I lived and studied in Sweden and Spain and traveled to many European countries, I would like to visit South American countries in the future.

reviews.comments: Garen been extremely helpful during our stay, his flat is brand new with everything you will required for holiday! The location very close to the heart street of Istanbul, highly recommend for Garen's place. 房东人很好,很热情,英语也很不错,我住的几天,一直在帮我当翻译,帮了我大忙!!

Garen was an amazing host. He accommodated every single wish of ours. He responded to my text immediately and helped us book several activities in the city including eating at an authentic Turkish restaurant nearby and attending a Dervish dance event that was overbooked. I highly recommend staying at his place. It's super clean, it has everything you need and best of all it's very centrally located, only 7 min walk to the most famous boulevard in Istanbul "Istiklal Caddessi". We will return again and will book the same place again if it's available. Thank you Garen for everything.

Great location next to the lively main pedestrian street (Taksim to Tünnel) with its crowded life from early afternoon until late night. The way there is about ten minutes from the flat. There's a bus stop on a main road on this way, but we couldn't really figure out which bus to take

Very nice apartment in a great location. There is a good opportunity to experience the local flavor. The street on which the apartment is located, runs every Sunday street market. This is impressive. Responsive host. When he learned that we were going with the kids bought an extra cot. Here live impurity residents and diverse population. The area is not very clean, but in many places in Istanbul. During their stay there were problems with the plumbing, but Garen repair it. And still need to use mosquito repellant. We were bitten by some insects. Overall, I recommend everything else is great and very pleasant and friendly host.

Acceuil très sympatique, Garen nous a organisé un transfer du aéroport ce qui était très confortable en voyagent avec des enfants.
L'appartement est propre, bien rénové et agréable à vivre. Bien situé.

Garen arranged an airport taxi to the flat and met us half way. He was extremely nice and sent us additional information about places to go.

The flat was well equipped and located very centrally.

La rencontre avec Garen a été facile grâce à un point de rendez-vous fixé à l'avance. Mais Garen peut aussi organiser l'arrivée à l'appartement. Garen a répondu rapidement à nos différentes questions. L'appartement était spacieux, confortable et proche de la rue Istiklal, ce qui permet d'avoir presque tout ce que l'on veut proche de soi.

Garen was very kind and flexible with our check-in and check-out. The apartment is exactly as described and pictures are accurate. It is clean and has everything necessary. There is a parking just next to the building which is very useful. We loved our experience in the authentic area of Istanbul. Sunday market on our street was nice surprise for us.

Garen is very nice guy and great host!
The apartment is spacious, super clean and located just few minutes from the center (by walk).
I would love to stay there again when I come to Istanbul next time!

Thank you Garen ;)

Garen war uns ein sehr guter und zuvorkommender Gastgeber. Er hat uns super Informationen über Istanbul gegeben und war immer gut erreichbar. 
Die Wohnung ist sehr zentral und super eingerichtet. Sie hat ausreichend Platz und verfügt über alles notwendige, das man so gebrauchen könnte. In wenigen Minuten zu Fuss ist man im Stadtzentrum.
Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Istanbul und ich hoffe das es eine nächstes Mal in Garen's Wohnung geben wird!

L'appartement est parfaitement situé, en plein centre de la ville (place Taxim) ou on trouve le côté moderne et le côté historique et vieille d'Istanbul. 

Les chambres sont très propre, avec des draps, serviettes, et oreillers. 

Un grand séjour et un salon sympa ! 

Le métro est a la place Taxim avec une correspondance vous pouvez visiter la ville en toute tranquillité ! 

Pour les fêtard la nuit, l'avenue istiklal est parfaite ! Pleins de pubs de boîte de nuit l'une derrière l'autre. 
Garen le propriétaire a organisé pour nous le transfert de l'aéroport  à l'arrivé et au départ à un tarif correct.
Appartement à conseiller pour ceux qui veulent bien visiter la ville

Хочется поблагодарить хозяина квартиры!
Жилье превзошло все ожидания! Хозяин (Гарен) очень вежливый и тактичный человек. Квартира большая, просторная и чистая. Есть все самое необходимое и все работает и исправно. Видно, что не так давно в квартире был сделан ремонт, причем, достаточно качественный. Есть wi-fi и цифровое телевидение с российскими каналами. Везде кондиционеры.
Поразила улица, на которой находится квартира. В воскресенье из обычной улицы она превращается в большой торговый ряд, где можно купить любых свежайших овощей и фруктов. 
Очень удобная геолокация. Пройдя по улочке вверх, сразу оказываешься на крупном проспекте, где легко взять такси и за 15 лир оказаться в историческом центре. Рядом хамам и магазины, где можно купить продукты. Прямо под окном есть паркинг, где можно оставить машину.
Конечно, в полной мере присутствует национальный колорит турецких кварталов. Но это не портит общего впечатления от квартиры.
Очень рекомендуем. Близко, недорого и качественно!
Garen was a great help welcoming us to Istanbul, giving us information about the area, and arranging airport transportation! The flat was beautiful, very true to the photos!
His apartment is clean and comfortable as introduction in web. When we met he explain informations and make us feel free.

Это было прекрасное путешествие! Квартира точно такая же как на фотографиях - даже лучше! Гарен отличный хозяин - очень гостеприимный и переживающий, он даже оставил нам тарелку с фруктами и шоколадки в холодильнике!
Квартира очень чистая, уютная и стильная - иногда даже никуда уходить не хотелось))) Находится она в самом центре и добираться очень удобно куда угодно. Возле дома огромный рынок с очень приятными ценами, а также рядом есть круглосуточная дешевая кафешка с вкусной едой и приятными хозяевами. А еще Гарен может вам посоветовать очень многие приятные и безопасные места - рестораны, клубы, кальянные и тд. Очень все понравилось! Приедем еще обязательно!
όλα ήταν μια χαρά!!!!

The host welcomed us warmly, though we arrived late in the night. The flat was as nice as it was described. Especially nice was the central heating system in the flat, since the weather was unfortunately pretty cold. 
The neighborhood with the narrow steep roads bordered with historical buildings gives the feeling of old Turkey. Istiklal Caddesi is only 8 minutes on foot away from the flat, perfect for long and relaxed (window) shopping or taking the Tunnel tram and train to reach other historical parts of the city like Galata Kulesi, Galata Kopru, Hagia Sophia, Sultan Ahmet Cami, Grand Bazaar and others. In short the location is perfect to explore old Istanbul.

Garen is a perfect host, he was always helpful. There were some problems with the shower's sink in the flat though. The flat itself is ok. Rooms are not big but there is enough of space. However I would recommend this flat to young guys who are looking for something inexpensive not far from Istiklal. If you travel like we did with lot of kids, you'd better think twice: the neighborhood is rather dirty and doesn't look safe.
Apartment was clean and equipped with everything you may need. Great location. Garen was incredibly helpful and responsive.

Гарен очень гостеприимный и отзывчивый хозяин. Нам квартира очень понравилась чисто, уютно, супер. Все соответствовало описанию. Гарен был очень заботлив, оставил нам фрукты и шоколад, было приятно. рассказал куда можно сходить в Стамбуле.

Garen прекрасный хозяин. У нас был поздний checkout в 16:30 без дополнительной платы. Трансферт из аэропорта Ататюрк был  организован идеально, на большом автомобиле и во-время. Я не мог включить стиральную машину,  там все надписи по турецки, он сразу мне ответил и проблема была решена. Квартира соответствует заявленной. Район немного отдает турецким колоритом, но жители района весьма дружелюбны. Местонахождение квартиры и район соответствуют описанию. Интернет быстрый. Квартира подходит для семей и компаний. Буду в Стамбуле остановлюсь в ней еще раз. Всем рекомендую.
very nice host apt like fotos definitly a central and very good place to stay

Garen was nice and welcoming. The place was quite clean, although the whole building and the neighborhood was not. This gave us a true experience of living in Istanbul. In general if you want to see real Istanbul I recommend to staying at Garen's.

Garen was a very nice and welcoming person. He arranged our transportation from and to the airport and was very reactive.

His listing is exactly as presented in the photos. The apartment is 10mn to the central Istiklal avenue in an old neighborhood.

Garen was an amazing host. We were an admittedly demanding bunch, but he responded quickly and generously to all our requests (help with transportation, apartment needs, etc). Staying in his apartment was a great option for us during out stay in Istanbul. The apartment is somewhat smaller than it appears in the photos, but it was clean, modern, attractive, and well-stocked. Thanks Garen!

Special Thanks to Garen, Everything was easy with him.  The flat was amazing just like in the pictures. very easy to contact him. we were 08 persons And Garen has arranged the transfer from the airport to the flat. Nexte I want to travel to istanbul he will the first to know. so I recommand Garen for all people who are looking for a nice appartement. he's a very nice man.

Our stay at Garen's apartment was wonderful. We arrived late into Istanbul and Garen organized a private transfer from the airport which made the transition very easy. The apartment is conveniently located in Taksim in a local area. There was plenty of room for 6 people and although there is just one bathroom, it didn't pose any problems!

We went to Istanbul with a group of 6, so the flat was perfect for us. I didn't meet Garen personally because I arrived after my friends already had a key, but I can say that Garen is a great host, he gave us a lot of advices and also helped with airport transfer. The flat is great and is very well located.

Accompagnés de nos deux enfants de 5 et 8 ans, nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Istanbul. Garen est un hôte attentif, qui nous a accueillis à l'appartement et nous a fourni nombre de bons plans pour découvrir la ville. 
L'appartement est grand, clair, très propre et très fonctionnel. Il est aussi et surtout très bien situé pour visiter la ville, non loin de l'artère principale de l'Istiklal, à proximité de la place Taksim et non loin de la tour de Galata.
Bref, un excellent séjour !

We travelled in winter and arrived after dark, it was in an old building in what we later discovered was a rough part of town. Had to walk up steep rough roads to reach public transport, not ideal if you have any mobility issues. The flat was clean but small. Our main issue was with the hot water which we could not get to function properly, none of us had a pleasant shower, it was either boiling or freezing and ran out after 1-2 minutes. The kitchen was small and poorly equipped with only one small sharp knife. Overall it was an average experience

It was a really nice stay in Garens flat. It was really clean and safe. The flat is well located, to taxim square it's just 5 min walking. The flat has a nice balcony where you can sit. Bathroom and kitchen was really clean and everything was working. At Sunday there is a big market directly in front of the house where you can buy fresh foods and otter stuff. Garen offers us a transfer from the airport to the flat, that's a really good idea to use it. Thanks for everything!

We enjoyed our almost 2-week stay in this spacious apartment. Garen was very helpful and responsive from the very first day. He showed me around the neighborhood and gave excellent suggestions for places to visit in Istanbul. The apartment looks exactly as shown in the pictures. Everything was renovated and in working order. The neighborhood looked safe to us, although not well-taken care of. The neighbors were very friendly and helpful. The Sunday market right outside our doors was a pleasant surprise :)!

Best of the best! 
I would like to express my gratitude to you for providing us with a wonderful house to stay in while our time in Istanbul . We had a great time.If i will be lucky enough to come to Istanbul once more i will most definitely try to rent your appartment .Many thanks, Garen.
Garen was a great host, thank you for every thing.
Nice and central place to stay. Garen was very responsive and helpful. Clean and quiet appartement. It's a working class neighbourhood though,   but friendly and safe.
Perfect place for bigger groups

Garen was a great host. The flat is in a hilly section of Istanbul that is a working class neighborhood, but my family of six loved it. Each day we would stop at the corner market half a block up where my kids gave the owner hugs and the owner gave my kids candy. We become good friends with the store clerks about a half block away at the main supermarket and keep up with them on (Hidden by Airbnb) . The flat had everything we needed to stay their for a month and was very new and well equipped. The market literally right outside your door step every Sunday is something not to be missed. You are within 5 minutes walk of Istiklal street and all the night life you could want. We were very happy with our stay and plan on going back next time we are in Istanbul.

Ça restera sans doute le meilleur voyage que j'ai jamais fait ! La Turquie est un pays magnifique et son peuple très accueillant et serviable ! Garen a été très à l'écoute et très arrangeant.
Le quartier est calme et vraiment pas loin de taksim et de l'arrêt de bus. L'appartement est bien équipé et correct niveau propreté j'ai quand même dû nettoyer le micro onde pour pouvoir chauffer les biberons de mon fils car il y avait des éclaboussures à l'intérieur, mais sûrement un oubli de la part de la dame de ménage. Le quartier est un peu bizarre au premier abord mais on s'y habitue très vite. Nous avons vraiment apprécié le marché en bas de l'immeuble tous les dimanches ! L'appartement est grand bien éclairé et beaucoup de place pour que les enfants puissent jouer.
Encore merci à Garen pour son hospitalité !
Je le recommande à 1000%!
Nous reviendrons certainement ! Gros coup de coeur!
the flat was great and we close to most busy street in istanbul

The apartment is great, it had no surprises, i.e. exactly like the pictures. It's in a good location, metro stations are near. Most of all, Garen was very responsive and helpful whenever we had questions.

Arabic and German versions are below :Since it was one of my best trips I will make it an extensive review!
1-Garen as a host:
Garen was a very nice person from the day of booking the apartment to the end of our stay. He gave nice hits and suggestions to enjoy our stay in Istanbul by providing helpful websites.  During our stay, the communication with him was really perfect in terms of language and being kind to us.  In addition to that, he offered us to help in booking our transportation from the airport to the aprtment.

2- The apartment:
The apartment was nice and clean. It was sufficient to accommodate us (9 people) without any problem. The location was not far away from Taksim area (Istiklal street) where people can find a lot of shops, restaurants, cafe's, clubs and pubs.  The apartment is around 2-4 min from the bus station (Ömer Hayyam) which can take you to many places in Istanbul and 15 min walking from Taksim metro station. 

3-The area:
The area was hilly ( which is also the topology of a lot of places in Istanbul) which makes the movement with a baby trolly a bit difficult(as in our case). Next to the apartment, there is a market which opens on Sundays. You can get nice fruits vegetables and much more for cheap prices. However, the people leave the place with a lot of garbage and wastes ( it won't be cleaned before the next day by the city).
The buildings and streets in this area are pretty old. You can hear the sound of neighbors till late ( even after 10 pm).
The building where Garen has his apartment does not have an elevator, which can be difficult for old people or little children in the trolly. As well as the lights in the building ( along with the stairs ) were not working properly.    الشقه ممتازة ونظيفه كافيه لمجموعه كبيره تصل إلى تسعه  أشخاص يوجد فيها كل ما يلزم.  غارن صاحب الشقه لطيف ومتساعد جدا ولم نواجه ايا مشكله بالتواصل معه باللغه الانجليزيه . موقع الشقه استراتيجي ولكن سلبيتها الوحيده انها بمنطقه شعبيه جدا .قريبه جدا من السوق(سوق تقسيم ،سيرا خمس دقائق) والمواصلات العامه(من اثنين لأربع دقائق) ، أنصح بالاقامه  بسبب قربها من   الاماكن السياحيه . die Wohnung liegt in Top Lage und entfernt nur 2-4 min zur Bus Station . Sie geeignet für große Gruppe . In der Wohnung befindet sich alles ,was jemand braucht. Die Wohnung is sehr empfehlenswert.
Garen is more than perfect host really friendly great apartment everything you need is available hope everyone try there at least one time in life

Garen is a very friendly and nice host. He offered to order a transfer for us from the airport, met and led to the apartment as we would have simply got lost without any guidance even with GPS. The flat was very neat and clean. There is everything you need for a comfortable stay, sometimes we forgot that we are not at home but rented this apartment. Also, Garen provided us with a number of must-visit places and we were very pleased to go there. Any questions and inquiries were answered and assisted in time with a great empathy. If you wish to stay in Istanbul downtown for a week, Garen's flat is a great place to live in.

The flat is amazing! Very big, bright and clean. Garen is a great host who is always willing to help you out with an excellent attitude. The flat is located close to Istiklal street but in a working class neighborhood so it’s best to not walk alone at night.

It was nice staying at Garen flat. It is not far from Istiklal street and Taksim square. In the evening was very nice to walk in Istiklal street. He was very friendly and available when I asked him any question. He arranged for me  and my parents airport transfer and the driver was on time. Thank you Garen.

Am Anfang hat uns der Ort also die Straße und das Haus von außen nicht so gut gefallen. Aber die Wohnung ist echt sehr schön und groß. Es war alles sauber und bequem. Garen hatte uns am Anfang viele Fragen beantwortet und sich Zeit genommen. Er kann gut Englisch. Leider gab es für 5 Personen für 2 Wochen nur 2 Rollen Toilettenpapier. Die Wohnung ist ganz in der Nähe von Taksim und einer Shopping Straße Istiklal. Das ist sehr gut. Nach einer Woche Aufenthalt funktionierte eine Klimaanlage nicht mehr. Garen hat sich direkt darum gekümmert, den Service angerufen und uns einen Ventilator vor eingebracht. Ich würde auf jeden Fall wiederkommen.

Garen’s apartment is really looks like photos,
It is clean , wide and comfortable ,,, just 7 minuets from taksim street ,,,, Garen was very nice and kind host I recommend this apartment.
Garden was nice and friendly. The house was sparkling clean. We would highly recommend his place
Garen its a really good host, nice and attentive. His apartement  its really good located near to Taksim. Moreover his recommendations were amazing!

Apartment is very nice and clean. It is what you see in the pictures. It was cleaned prior to our stay and it was not smelly or dirty. Everyone was very satisfied with that. The apartment is very close to Istiklal st and Taksim square. It was very convenient to walk there and stay out late. The neighborhood is not the best but we did not have any issues with safety. It is close to two grocery stores and a bakery which was convenient. It was easy to get a taxi. The host helped us with transportation from and to the airport which was nice. He also was very helpful with tips about places to go and visit.
Garett’s place was close to the center and pretty accurate to pictures also very clean.

I had a family reunion at Garen's place last week. It was great. The apartment is super clean and comfortable. The building is kind of old but inside the unit is very well-renovated. The area is also an old area and we got a chance to see the Sunday market in the neighborhood with so many fresh fruits and vegs. 

You need exactly 7 minutes walking to reach Istiklal Street which is great. The only thing is that the way is little bit hilly, we didn't face any problem but you might want to consider it if you are traveling with children or elderly people. 

Garen is such a nice, responsive and friendly host which never says no to anything! I really really thank him for his hospitality and I hope to see him again soon :-)

Very tidy and spacious AirBnb apartment equipped with everything you need. Three bedrooms, a sitting area and nice bathroom. It was more than enough space for my husband and I. Garen is a great host and there when you need him, Very nice and quick to respond to messages. The neighborhood is very conveniently located- we walked everywhere. Would absolutely recommend to stay there!
Large clean apartment with everything we needed. Easy walking distance to Istiklal Street and Taksim square. Good communication too.

Appartement spacieux, literie confortable et propreté irreprochable. Un confort correct pour passer un bon séjour à Istanbul. Le quartier peut surprendre au début car trés populaire donc un peu vétuste mais c'est relativement calme et securisé. Garen est trés attentif et réactif. Ses recommandations sont interressantes.

Logement très propre, bien situé 10 min de taksim, Garen été très  réactif quand nous avons eu une fuite d’eau a notre arrivé, sympathique et serviable il nous a donner une liste de resto et endroit a visiter.
Adresse à recommander.

Garen was really helpful and nice , 
i recommend his place for big groups and families.
it's good for the price and the place...but very old building with noise from other apartments....

Appartement bien situé, propre, sécurisé dans un quartier typique, proche de place Taksim et tour Galata !! Garenne est un hôte disponible sur place et agréable à la conversation !
je recommande

Хорошая квартира за свою стоимость, без излишеств, но есть все необходимое, чисто, светло, горячая вода и отопление через проточный водонагреватель, без перебоев. Две небольшие комнатки с двухспальными кроватями, одна из комнат без окон + одна комната просторная, также с двухспальной кроватью, гостиная с диванами, небольшой совмещенный санузел с душевой, маленькая кухонька с газовой плитой (есть вся посуда в большом количестве, сковороды уже немного подубитые), большой обеденный стол во входной зоне. Дом может показаться расположенным в достаточно специфическом месте: настоящий старый жилой квартал, выглядит местами заброшено, несколько полуразрушенных домов вокруг. Но мы чувствовали себя безопасно, вечерами было тихо, а буквально 10 минут вверх по улице пешком - и ты попадаешь в совершенно другой мир на Истикляль с модными кофейнями и кучей туристов. В пяти минутах ходьбы от квартиры два небольших супермаркета. Интернет работал без проблем.
Garen оперативно отвечал на сообщения, встретил нас в квартире, не было никаких вопросов с заселением, при выезде мы просто оставили ключи на столе. Кроме того, он посоветовал нам закусочные и кафе в районе проживания, два ресторана из них мы посетили и остались очень довольны. Спасибо за рекомендации!

name: Wow!  Two Bedroom Apartment in Safe Neighborhood!
summary: The apartment is located in a safe residential area of Brooklyn between Prospect Park and Green-Wood National Historic Landmark.  Subway station is 4 blocks away and it's only 25 minutes to lower Manhattan via subway.  Entire apartment has kitchen, living room, bathroom, and 2 bedrooms which makes this an incredible deal!  No smoking. No Parties. No Pets.  No Loud Noises/Music. Check-in and check-out times enforced, so please let us know if other arrangements needed.
space: Nice apartment with 2 spacious bedrooms, bathroom, full kitchen, and dining area.   Neighborhood is very safe! There are two bedrooms in the apartment.  Larger bedroom has a queen size bed and 2nd bedroom has a double-size bed.  The apartment ideally accommodates 2 person or to 2 couples.  We can offer a portable mattress to accommodate extra kids or guests. Exposed ceilings in the living/dining area for a unique feel.   On-street parking available. Free wi-fi and TV. Dishwasher. Clean linens and towels provided at check-in. (Please be aware the washer/dryer shown in the kitchen photos is no longer available for use.)   Apartment is on 2nd story of a two-family house.  There's a family on the first floor apartment and guests stay on 2nd floor apartment. The house is located on one of the safest neighborhoods in all of NYC.  Area is very kid and family friendly.  Walking distance to supermarket, 24-hour convenience store, subway, yoga, gym, a few restaurants, and Prospect Park (zoo, ska
description: The apartment is located in a safe residential area of Brooklyn between Prospect Park and Green-Wood National Historic Landmark.  Subway station is 4 blocks away and it's only 25 minutes to lower Manhattan via subway.  Entire apartment has kitchen, living room, bathroom, and 2 bedrooms which makes this an incredible deal!  No smoking. No Parties. No Pets.  No Loud Noises/Music. Check-in and check-out times enforced, so please let us know if other arrangements needed. Nice apartment with 2 spacious bedrooms, bathroom, full kitchen, and dining area.   Neighborhood is very safe! There are two bedrooms in the apartment.  Larger bedroom has a queen size bed and 2nd bedroom has a double-size bed.  The apartment ideally accommodates 2 person or to 2 couples.  We can offer a portable mattress to accommodate extra kids or guests. Exposed ceilings in the living/dining area for a unique feel.   On-street parking available. Free wi-fi and TV. Dishwasher. Clean linens and towels provided at check-i
neighborhood_overview: One of the safest neighborhoods in all of NYC.  Area is very kid and family friendly.  Walking distance to supermarket, subway, yoga, gym, a few restaurants, and Prospect Park (zoo, ice rinks, botanical garden, nature hikes, etc.).  Tree-lined block away from the hustle and bustle and noise of typical NYC, but close enough via subway (20 minutes to downtown Manhattan) to enjoy all the excitement.
notes: The apartment is the upper unit of a two-family house so there will be stairs walk up to the apartment.  Guests stay in the apartment upstairs and owners live in the apartment below.   To keep things simple, we'd prefer to have guests check-in after 4pm and to check-out before 12pm (noon).  However we can be flexible with check-in and check-out times if requested in advance.  Please let us know the check-in and check-out times with your inquiry or reservation requests.
transit: Three blocks to F/G subway line.  Four blocks to Manhattan express buses.  Also a 24-hour car service company available to take you anywhere.
access: Guests will have access to free wi-fi internet, tv, dishwasher, towels, linens and everything else inside the apartment. **We won't accommodate "guests of the guests" so please make sure you plan your visit with your local friends or family elsewhere.
interaction: I'm available for any questions, but will typically provide guests their privacy unless further interaction is required.
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment.   No parties. No loud music. No loud noises. No pets allowed. No visitors/guests allowed on premises. We reserve the right to keep your deposit for any unregistered guest(s).  Minimal cleanup is expected upon leaving. Check-in: 4pm or after.  Check-out: 12pm (noon) or earlier.  Other times may be available after confirmation only.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi.  We're a young family that enjoys traveling and meeting new people.  We love our neighborhood and agree with neighbors that it's Brooklyn's best kept secret.  It's a friendly and quiet area with easy and quick access into Manhattan and other areas of Brooklyn.  We're happy to answer any questions you may have.
Regards,
Steve

reviews.comments: Our host made a point of being there to meet us and show us the ropes; the apartment is beautiful, spacious and quiet and the bed was very comfy! The house looks unimpressive on the outside like most in the neighborhood, but inside it all appears to be newly rehabbed with all new appliances, skylights, and tasteful furnishings. We know this neighborhood from visiting family here. It's a great combination of mixed ethnicities, parks closeby and you feel safe on the streets. there are an ever-increasing number of cool restaurants and great coffee shops nearby. The subway is a 5 minute walk and you can easily hop up to Park Slope or get to Manhattan. We would love to stay here again!

I would like to thank Steve and his wife, Anna, for making their  place available during my trip to New York on business. The location was ideal for me and the fact that there was parking easily available during my stay, made the whole venture less stressful. The apartment was as advertised and the pictures of their place show exactly what was there. I would definitely stay there again and hope to again soon. I gave them a 4 star only because it will keep them improving and make whoever stays there have a pleasant experience. Thanks Steve & Anna.
Ed Soto

Steve and his wife were wonderful hosts! My parents and mother-in-law stayed at the apartment and had lots of wonderful things to say about it. The apartment is beautifully decorated and very spacious. Steve was great at communication throughout the entire visit and very accommodating with the key exchange. We live around the corner so it was super convenient. We would definitely recommend the apartment to anyone staying in Windsor Terrace or others who want a relaxing apartment to come back to while visiting the city.
Excellent! Very good location and we really enjoyed the quietness of the neighborhood highly recommended!

I made this reservation for my parents, who are seniors.  They loved the large space (actually larger than the photos make it look, even) and complete privacy.  Steve and his family were warm and helpful.  The place was clean, newly renovated and beautiful - really a great spot at a reasonable price.  The neighborhood is manageable with coffee shops and restaurants just half a block away. I highly recommend this apartment.

Wonderful apartment in Windsor Terrace!  Very well equipped, sunny, quiet, clean, and easily accessible.  Exceeded our expectations!  Steve and Anna were very helpful and responsive.  Will definitely stay here again.  Thanks!

After a great welcome we going up into our beautiful apartment. It looks real like the pictures per 100%. All what you need is there without anything that will be missing. The Position is perfect for people they will be 5+ days in New York. To Manhattan you drive with the Local Train F 20-30 Minutes (like the place you will see)The Train Station is nearly of the apartment, you have to go only 5-7 minutes. A big supermarket with the Name Foodtown you can arrived in 10 minutes. Bars and Restaurants are 2-3 minutes away. The prospectpark is good for do some Sports. When you run you need 5 minutes, you will walk, than you be there in 15 minutes. Anna and Steve are very great and help us with Informations for the Electro devices like TV or the dishwasher and of we need help to find the right way in a simple english, because our english isn't very well. 



Nach einem sehr netten Empfang, bezogen wir die wirklich schön eingerichtete Wohnung. Entspricht den Bildern zu 100%! Alles was man braucht ist hier und es fehlte uns an nichts. Die Lage ist super für Personen die 5+ Tage hier sind. Bis nach Manhatten fährt man mit dem F Zug ca. 20-30 Minuten (je nach Zielort). Die Haltestelle ist 5-7 Minuten zu Fuß vom Haus entfernt. Zum einkaufen ist der Foodtown Markt in 10 Minuten zu erreichen. Bars und kleine Restaurants sind in 2-3 Minuten zu erreichen. Der Park zum joggen ist von der Haustüre ca. 5-15 Minuten entfernt. Anna und Steve sind tolle Gastgeber und es gab nie ein Problem. Auch bei Fragen nach dem Weg oder Bedienungen der Elektrogegenstände (TV, Spülmaschine) konnte uns auch mit eher mittelmäßigen Englischkenntnissen verständlich gemacht werden, wo es in die richtige Richtung geht, bzw. wie die Bedienbarkeit zu händeln ist.
Steve was a very accommodating host and the apartment was wonderful! The neighborhood was quiet and a very close walk to the subway. I would recommend this apartment to anyone!
Steve was a great host! This unit is in a great neighborhood and was extremely clean. Would definitely stay here again.

Steve could of not made us feel anymore welcomed. The apartment was exactly as on the website. Loved where it was located! Could not ask for anything better. We will definitely return there and have told all our out of town friends and family about it. Best experience ever on accommodations!

Appartement magnifique très bien équipé (sèche cheveux, aspirateur, fer et table à repasser, wi-fi...) dans un quartier résidentiel. accès en métro très proche direct Manhattan. Les propriétaires nous ont réservé un très bel accueil et sont très sympathiques.

Steve was a great host!  Very accommodating and helpful! The apartment felt like home-very clean and nicely decorated! The beds and sheets were awesome! The neighborhood was quiet with friendly neighbors. We were only 2 blocks from the subway and close to great restaurants, coffee shops and grocery stores. A great place to relax after a busy day in the city! We would definitely stay here again!
Excellent experience.  This unit is light, airy, spacious, well furnished, quiet, close to train, bus, shopping, and our Brooklyn family.  Will be glad to rent this unit again.

Anna and Steve were so accommodating. Very caring people. What a fun and great place to stay. The apt Was fully ready to stay in. Comfortable beds. They had anything you might need! Very clean and inviting apt. Close to subway and local eateries and stores. Very safe area. We were there for our daughters wedding and it was around the corner from their home, it was so helpful. Thank you so much for allowing us to have stayed at your place. Everything was fantastic! We hope to see you again! We would definitely recommend your place! Ray and Corinna Vereb (Tampa,Fl.)
Steve and Anna were very friendly and accommodating.

This was a touring vacation with our two grandsons. The apartment had more than enough space for all of us including so many amenities as described.  Steve and his wife were more than accommodating.  The apartment is a couple of blocks from the subway, and about a 20 minute ride into Manhattan.  The neighborhood is lovely and convenient to restaurants and a grocery store.  My husband and I will most assuredly stay at this apartment again.  On a scale of 1 to 10, I would, without doubt, score this apartment at 10.

Cet appartement était idéal pour nous durant notre séjour de 7 jours à NY en famille (deux adultes et deux ados). Il y avait une canicule et nous étions ravis de pouvoir compter sur l'air climatisé dans chacune des pièces. L'appartement est propre, joliment décoré, aéré, bien équipé, et bien illuminé. Le quartier est adjacent à Park Slope et à Prospect Park. C'est très calme, paisible, résidentiel et sécuritaire. Il y a un super café (Steeplechase coffee) et un traiteur (Brancaccio's) à un coin de rue de l'appartement,  ce qui est très pratique pour le déjeuner et le dîner au retour des longues journées de marche à Brooklyn et à Manhattan.  La ligne F qui est à 4 minutes de marche nous transportait au coeur de Manhattan quotidiennement alors que la ligne G nous a permis d'explorer les quartiers branchés de Brooklyn.

Steve et sa conjointe ont été à la fois très accueillants et discrets tout au long de notre séjour. Le choix de lecture qui était à notre disposition nous a donné un sentiment d'être chez-soi. Si la façade extérieure ne paye pas de mine, il ne faut pas s'y arrêter car une fois à l'intérieur, c'est un petit havre de paix idéal pour décompresser en fin de journée.

A great place with wonderfully welcoming yet discreet owners. Clean, beautiful, lots of natural light, comfortable, design conscious yet humble appartement in quiet, residential and safe area. We discovered a new neighborhood adjacent to trendy Park Slope and Prospect Park, the F and G lines (perfect for getting to the heart of Manhattan without transfers or for discovering trendy neighborhoods in Brooklyn). Air conditioned, great choice of reading material, well equipped, a corner way from fairtrade Steeplechase coffee and Brancaccio's take out meals. We have only great things to say about this place.

Élisabeth, Michael, Romane, Loïc

What more can I say! Steve and Anna were the perfect hosts. So friendly and there when you need them yet always allowing for your privacy. 

The apartment is incredibly beautiful! Spotlessly clean and well equipped for any length of stay. Steve had so many great recommendations for local restaurants and the best ways to get around and both he and Anna were only ever a phone call or text message away. 

Everything that you could ever want in accommodation is right here. My stay was absolutely perfect and my friend and I cannot wait to visit New York again! We are absolutely in love with Brooklyn and highly recommend staying at Steve and Anna's. 

The apartment is close to the F Line of the Subway which takes you directly to all main attractions like Coney Island, the Brooklyn Bridge, the Rockefeller centre and more. It is no more than a 4 minute walk from the apartment itself and the streets around this area are all tree-lined with local parks and convenience stores also a mere 2 minute walk down the street.

If I could give any advice to anyone else who is interested in seeing New York it would be to stay in Brooklyn and visit Steve and Anna's. The neighbourhood is safe, close to everything yet far enough from the city to come 'home' and relax after all the adventuring around New York.

Lots of love and well wishes from Mary, Serene and Jayne (Melbourne, Australia)

Carole, Bruno, Alexiane et Pierre - juillet 2015

Notre séjour à New York a été formidable.
L'appartement de Steve est conforme à la description et aux photos. Très agréable, fonctionnel et très bien équipé (climatisation, machine à laver le linge et la vaisselle). Il est parfaitement situé à moins de 5 minutes à pieds du métro, sur la ligne F qui dessert tout Manhattan et d'un supermarché.
L'accueil de Steve a été très agréable. Nous n'avons pas eu à faire appel à lui durant notre séjour car tout avait été parfaitement prévu et expliqué.
Merci à Steve et sa famille.
Le quartier est très sûr et calme après une journée dans le tumulte de la ville.

Lovely place, good location, very generous, welcoming and perfect hosts. The apt is exactly what you expect - clean, spacious, nicely designed rooms, with a kitchen and bathroom. It had everything we needed to completely enjoy our stay in NY. We highly recommend it!

Accueil discret mais efficace, tant check in que check out, dans un appartement vaste et clair. Le quartier - résidentiel - est très calme, à quelques stations du Brooklyn branché et 20 à 30' de Manhattan par le ligne F...idéal pour décompresser après visites et autres virées / 
Discreet and effective welcome, in a large and bright apartment. The neighborhood - residential - is very quiet, only at a few stations from the trendy Brooklyn and 20-30 ' from Manhattan by the F line... ideal for chilling after tours and other trips.

Steve and Anna were such wonderful hosts. My expectations were exceeded. They were very accommodating in allowing us to bring our luggage before check-in. The place was very spacious and clean. It's located in a nice quiet neighborhood that's great to come back to from the hustle and bustle of the city. I recommend and would love to stay again when I come back to the area!

Très agréable séjour dans l'appartement de Steve et Anna à Brooklyn. L'appartement est très confortable avec beaucoup d'espace. Il est très bien décoré. Il se trouve à 3 minutes à pieds de la station de métro avec une ligne directe jusqu'à Manhattan. Nous le recommandons!

The apartment was lovely and in a great location for our visit to New York. Steve and Anna were brilliant hosts and were always quick to respond to any questions. We really enjoyed our stay in New York and the apartment was a great base to have whilst exploring the city.

We couldn't be more pleased with our experience. We came to Brooklyn to visit our daughter and grandchildren. Steve made us feel welcome upon arrival and supplied us with everything we needed. A book on the coffee table showed us many places to eat, how to get around, places to visit in NYC. The apartment was comfortable and roomy with beautiful and interesting decor-a mix of new and mid-century. The neighborhood is pleasant with a few coffee shops, restaurants, and yoga nearby and steps to beautiful Prospect Park where we spent most of the time playing with our grandchildren. The F train to Manhattan is near (not too long a walk for us) and we took the subway a few times. We had our daughters car for our stay and had trouble parking only one night when we came back late. Otherwise parking was easy in the neighborhood. Overall our stay couldn't have been better and we definitely would stay at Steve's again!

We had a very, very pleasent stay at Ann and Steve. The apt was very cozy and comfortable and they had all the information we could need readily available. Communication before, during, and after was great!
 We'll be staying here again should we get the chance! Thank you Ann and Steve!

Steve's apartment was so wonderful. We decided to stay in Brooklyn to experience both the quiet side and the hustle and bustle of New York. We were also here to get married at City Hall. The apartment provided a great setting, especially on the day of the wedding as the rooms were comfortable, clean and spacious. The local Subway station, Fort Hamilton Parkway (F line - straight to Manhattan) is only a five minute walk away through a very nice neighbourhood, which includes a nice independent coffee shop, a great pizza restaurant and a small convenient store that doubles as a deli. Food Town, a large supermarket with excellent produce is approximately ten minutes walk. Steve was very helpful and flexible with check-in and check-out and communication was quick via the Air B&B app. There was an informative welcome pack and a complimentary bottle of prosecco on arrival. Also provided was a hairdryer, iron and ironing board, large HD television with HD cable box (there was always lots of films to watch with the ability to restart the programme if you happened to walk in halfway through the feature), a small Bluetooth speaker, microwave, central heating and air-conditioning. We whole heartedly recommend this apartment. We had such a wonderful week in New York which was made particularly special staying in this lovely apartment. With any luck we will stay here next year on our anniversary.

Sehr gute Unterkunft auch für einen längeren New York Besuch.
Die Wohnung entsprach voll den Beschreibungen, war vollständig ausgestattet und hat gerade in den Schafräumen großzügigen Platz für eine Familie geboten.
Sowohl die Seitenstraße, in der die Wohnung liegt, wie auch im Haus war es immer ruhig.
Die nächste U-Bahn Station ist in wenigen Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen und bietet eine direkte Verbindung ins Zentrum von Manhattan.
Der Vermieter wohnt mit seiner Familie auch in dem Haus und steht bei Fragen gerne zur Verfügung.
Insgesamt auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen.

This was the best AirBnB experience we have had!  Anna and Steve were just right in being attentive but not imposing.  The apt is a delight, tastefully furnished and with every amenity--they even left 2 large bottles of water for us on the fridge. Apt has great light and is on a charming quiet street.  
Makes us want to go to Brooklyn again soon!

I live nearby in Brooklyn and four out of town friends (two couples) visited. It was really nice for me that they could visit, yet not crowd my own small apartment. It was very easy getting together with them every day. 

Here's what they had to say:

The apartment was stylish, comfortable, and well located to several amenities including restaurants and the subway. The bedrooms were quite large so both couples staying had a lot of room and privacy. Anna and Steve were very welcoming and made clear that we could contact them if we needed anything, but the apartment was so well appointed and the arrangement so easy that we never felt the need. We really enjoyed our stay!

Our experience staying in Steve and Anna's Brooklyn flat was wonderful in every way. They were great hosts and provided excellent communication at every step of the way. They left us a nice "welcome" box with water, tea, coffee and snacks, and a printed guide on using the flat, as well as navigation tips and delivery menus for local restaurants. On top of that, Steve was super-flexible in accommodating our less-than-optimal travel schedules to make our stay and travel plans more convenient. He met me in person to check in very early in the morning after a red-eye flight, and my friend and I were able to check out late on the day of our flights out of NYC. The flat itself was spacious, super-clean, comfortable, tastefully decorated, and well-stocked with essentials including a fitted-out kitchen with dishwasher and a washer/dryer combo that came in useful. I was not at all familiar with the Windsor Terrace neighborhood before our stay, but it is a nice, safe and easily accessible neighborhood within walking distance of Park Slope and Prospect Park. It was a very quick 5-minute walk to the F and G line subway station, which we used frequently to make trips into Manhattan and other areas of Brooklyn. We also enjoyed trying a few of the local food options, including Hamilton's, which had good burgers and craft beers. This was a great AirBnB experience, and I'll definitely be staying at Steve and Anna's flat again the next time I'm in town.

We stayed over Thanksgiving and can't say enough great things about this apartment and Steve. Fantastic location very close to the subway. A couple of good restaurants within walking distance if you don't want to travel anywhere. The apartment itself was spotless, bright and airy. Very comfortable beds, just a great place to come back to after long days of sightseeing. Would definitely stay again.

Steve and Anna were great hosts and very helpful with navigating the area.  The apartment is light and airy and quite spacious.  Nicely appointed (thanks for the coffee!).  Nice residential neighborhood, several good places to eat nearby.  Subway is closeby.

I am a neighbor of Steve's, and used his gorgeous apartment to house some colleagues who were coming into town. They could not have been more pleased. Absolutely stunning apartment, perfectly equipped, great location, and warm and easygoing hosts. Steve was in excellent communication  throughout and I hope to use his apartment for future out of town guests.

We love Steve's place - a thoughtfully appointed, spacious apartment on a quiet street in a Brooklyn neighborhood convenient to the subway and buses. Steve lives downstairs and is very accommodating and easy to contact. We have stayed here twice while visiting family and hope to return many more times!
Must say we felt very safe and enjoyed having a clean & comfortable place in the heart of Brooklyn. Enjoyed walking the neighborhood & close dining choices.  Thank you Steve & Anna!

Wir haben uns auf Anhieb sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung war wie unser zweites Zuhause und entsprach genau der Beschreibung. Hoher Wohlfühlfaktor! Steve und seine Familie haben uns herzlich empfangen und waren absolut hilfsbereit und jederzeit ansprechbar. Angenehme und ruhige Nachbarschaft und sehr gute Anbindung an Manhattan.

Steve and Anna were very communicative and let me in when I arrived including showing me how everything worked. The apartment is beautifully decorated, clean and delightful to stay in. The wifi is fast, the kitchen and bathroom are immaculate and the beds are very comfortable. The subway is just a few minutes walk away. My friends and I really enjoyed being there and it's great value if you plan on spending time in Brooklyn or don't mind a bit of a commute into the city.

Steve and Anna were really great hosts. The apartment had snacks, coffee, water, all the extras that we needed. They also were very accommodating with providing a futon when we realized we couldn't sleep in the same room with our baby. The place was clean, bright and quiet. Loved the neighborhood, on Ft Hamilton Parkway there is a great italian shop, falafel shop and great coffee shop.
This is still our very best Airbnb experience, and we had a great time!  Steve and Anna continue to be ever thoughtful and kind.  We have already booked again for October!

Great apartment to explore Brooklyn and visit Manhattan from. The neighbourhood is safe and surprisingly quiet, easy access to Manhattan via subway, and it's close to Prospect Park. The place is as spacious as it looks in the pictures.

Thanks Steve for accommodating us, the apartment was just what we hoped for. Would love to come back one day.

It was me and five other ladies staying in Steve's apartment and we all really loved it. There was more than enough space for all of us, and the apartment had everything we could possibly need. The rooms were bright and spacious, the beds extremely comfortable for a good night's rest after a long day of exploring New York. 

The kitchen is well-equipped, which was really important to us -- we made breakfast at home every morning and enjoyed it in the lovely breakfast nook by the kitchen window. 

We loved the neighbourhood as well. It was always quiet and felt super safe, even when we were coming home late at night. The subway is just a short walk away and so was the convenience store and supermarket. 

Steve is an incredible host. He really went above and beyond to make things easy for us and to make our stay an enjoyable one. We really could not be more thankful for all his help and generosity. We hope we can stay again soon. :)

Steve & Anna's apartment is spacious, clean and in a perfect location for getting around Brooklyn or into Manhattan.  It is in a safe and quiet neighborhood and was well appointed for our 4-day stay. We will definitely be coming back as we pass through Brooklyn to visit family!

We had such a wonderful time at Steven' s place. We were four girls staying there, from France ( Paris).
Everything was absolutely perfect.
Steven is a very kind host, helpful.
The house is sweet, very comfortable, bright, clean, exactly as showed on the pictures.
The area is quiet and safe.
Around, there is a big supermarket and some nice restaurants( we particularly liked a Thaï one).
The location is great. Only 5 minutes away from the tube station. There, you take the F line to go to Manhattan. Very easy.

We highly recommand this fantastic place.
Don't hesitate to book here.
Thanks a million to Steven.
For sure, if we have the opportunity to go back to NYC, we will stay again at Steven's place.
Stevens apartment was great! It was clean and convenient, exactly as described in the listing. Would definitely recommend.
