We had a great time in NewYork; a lifetime experience!!
Our stay at the appartment in Brooklyn was perfect and Steve was a kind, friendly and helpfull host. The appartment was tidy and clean and everything was available to garentee a carefree stay. In particular the beds were very comfortable. Also the subway is nearby and within a 5 minutes walk. We recommend the appartment for everbody who wants to discover New York.
Greetings from the tiny villages Jonkerslân, Holland; H&H + E&P

Notre séjour chez Steve de 10 jours au mois de Mai 2016 a été parfait, c'est un hote très chaleureux et vraiment agréable. L'appartement qui se trouve au 1er étage dans la maison familiale de Steve est vraiment génial pour une famille, nous étions 5 et Steve nous a fourni un matelas pour notre fille de 9 ans. L'appartement correspond vraiment aux photos faites par le photographe Airbnb, il y a 2 grandes chambres, une cuisine équipée, un coin repas très agréable pour le petit déjeuner ou en fin de journée pour manger et discuter de la journée passée, une salle de bain spacieuse, une connexion internet très rapide, etc.. Le quartier est très calme, il y a un supermarché à 100 mètres, une très bonne pizzeria a l'angle de la rue et la station de métro la plus proche se trouve à  5 minutes (Fort Hamilton ou Church St), où le métro vous emmènera à Time Square en 40 minutes.
Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable. 
Merci Steve.

Steve heeft ons op het afgesproken tijdstip welkom geheten. Hij heeft ons een korte rondleiding in zijn appartement gegeven. Steve is een zeer vriendelijke jonge man met gevoel voor gastheerschap. 
Het appartement is van alle gemakken voorzien, zelfs met een haardroger! De ruimtes waren schoon, er werd voor onze komst goed gelucht. Het is een rustig straatje met heerlijke bomen. De subway was op 5 minuten en winkels voor dagelijkse boodschappen waren op 20 minuten loopafstand. Goede prijs kwaliteitsverhouding. Een adres om te onthouden. Een appartement waar wij gasten konden ontvangen en waar wij ons meteen thuis voelden.

Lovely, light-filled apartment with spacious bedrooms and well-equipped kitchen. Subway is a short walk (5 minutes). We really enjoyed Brooklyn too; the area was safe and quiet with great parks nearby for our kids. Steve was on hand to meet us, and say goodbye and super-helpful.

Steve was very helpful and understanding especially given our plane was delayed and we were five hours late getting to the apartment.
The apartment was very pleasant and comfortable and we really liked the modern decor. We liked the quiet neighbourhood and its proximity to Prospect Park and to the F subway line which got us into Manhatten very easily. We enjoyed getting to know Brooklyn and hadn't realised how big and diverse it is.  Would definitely go back.
It was a wonderful home for us. Cosy, clean and comfortable! They were really friendly host too!

Steve and his family were so incredibly welcoming and kind, and accommodated our every need (even unreasonable ones, ha ha.) The space is extremely well laid-out, and a toddler was able to sleep soundly while adults were awake in the living room (and vice-versa). The bedrooms were large, the beds were comfy, the kitchen and living room were perfect for our family of 2 grandparents, an adult, and a 2-year-old. Despite visiting in the sticky heat of NYC's summer, it was cool, quiet, private, and comfortable.

We loved the beautiful, minimalist design sensibility. The neighborhood is great--super close walking distance to coffee shops, restaurants, take-away spots, and more. Ample street parking and very very close to trains and buses. 

We stayed in the apartment for a month and loved our entire  experience. Our space always felt very private but when we'd run into Steve and his family coming in and out they were always so friendly, helpful, kind, and welcoming. Would absolutely recommend without hesitation, especially for families.

Steve and Anna are great hosts! They made our stay very comfortable. 
The modern and spacious apartement was clean and tidy. It is located in a rather quiet neighborhood. It's located a 5min walk from subway lines F or G to Manhattan. There are restaurants and a supermarket (Foodtown) nearby. 

If you like cooking you'll find a well equipped kitchen with a dish washer, coffee machine, fridge and freezer and a few basics like coffe, tea, spices, oil, vinegar,....

Nous avons passé chez Steve un très bon séjour,la deuxième semaine d'Août 2016, dans un quartier de Brooklyn très calme et très bien placé (à proximité du métro direct vers Manhattan et d'un super marché de bonne qualité).
Le site Web reflète exactement la réalité des prestations. L'appartement situé au premier étage est très propre, très lumineux et bien climatisé (ce qui est très important en été).
La famille de Steve qui habite au rez de chaussée est très discrète.
Hébergement à recommander en toute confiance.

We didn't meet Steve,  but his wife showed us in, the apartment was just as described & super clean.  There were notes with directions to nearest tube/supermarket /cafe etc, which was very useful, phone numbers left if we had any queries,  lovely friendly neighbourhood

I am writing this review on behalf of myself, my partner and best friend.

Although our flight was severely delayed in arriving, Steve met us with a warm welcome, beers were cold in the fridge and even a local late night take away menu in case we were hungry. 

Having aircon in every room was a godsend, especially with the New York summer heat. 

The apartment was adequately furnished with plenty of storage to be able to un-pack completely, with the fully kitted out kitchen and satellite TV, it was a home away from home. 
The bathroom was well fitted out with a huge sink, shower and storage.
The whole apartment had a great feel with some of the decorations/art being "New York themed"

Plenty of information was left with regards to sight seeing in New York and the surrounding areas.

Towels were changed mid stay.

We were left to ourselves but knew that help was downstairs if needed.

We had dinner at Hamilton's down the road and also use Mr Tong's Chinese, both of which were excellent.

We cannot recommend Steve's apartment enough!

Go stay!!!

Wir hatten zu viert einen einwöchigen, tollen Aufenthalt bei Steve in Brooklyn. Seine Frau Anna hat uns bei unserer Ankunft sehr herzlich empfangen und uns die Wohnung gezeigt. Von ihr haben wir auch alle wichtigen Informationen sowie nützliche Hinweise erhalten, Wasser stand ebenfalls bereit und die Wohnung war schon angenehm klimatisiert. Wir haben uns rundum wohl gefühlt, super gut in den Betten geschlafen und fanden alles vor was wir brauchten. Die beiden waren ebenfalls so nett und haben uns spontan an einem Sonntagmorgen Tickets für ein Footballspiel bei ihnen ausdrucken lassen, was uns sehr geholfen hat. Ich kann diese Unterkunft wirklich jedem empfehlen und bedanke mich bei Steve & Anna für die wirklich tolle Gastfreundschaft!

Nice space, nice location, nice owner.  We enjoyed coming back to a quiet neighborhood after spending fun-filled days in Manhattan.  Close proximity  to subway made traveling in and out of Manhattan as easy as it can possibly be.

Steve greeted us with his 3 year old son, gave a brief description of the apartment, and left some useful guides on paper to the apartment and the neighborhood.  The apartment itself seems brand new, with high-end appliances, including dishwasher and washer-drier.  The street was probably typical for Windsor Terrace--many one or two family homes with abundant vehicle and child noise.
Steve and Anna's place is great! It had everything we needed and a little more. The apartment is very clean,  comfortable and private. We definitely plan to come back.

Steve's place is really amazing. The description and pics are accurate. Location is also easy accessible with public transport. The apartment is well equipped and well maintained. We loved our stay and would stay again at our next visit.
Steve is so friendly and helpful and accommodating.  We hope to stay here again and again.

17/20
The apartment was a good surprise: extremely functional, comfortable and with good location: geography, security, food options and overall shopping.
Steve and Anna are very kind and attentive.
Basically, this is an example of what is expected and intended when using AirBnB, i.e. an (true) alternative to a Hotel.
To repeat.
Steve's apartment was an ideal home away from home.  The place is clean, bright, airy and spacious and Steve was a gracious and accommodating host.

What a great Brooklyn apartment!  I live in this same neighborhood, so I was stoked when I found this for my family to stay in for the holidays.   Steve was a great host and I am definitely recommending this apartment to other neighborhood friends who need a place for extra guests to stay in.

Steve and Anna's place exceeded our expectations. What lovely and amazing hosts! As a former New Yorker (Park Slope - Brooklyn resident), their place was one of the best we've encountered. The upper flat is cozy, contemporary, retro, rustic and spacious. The place is close to the subway station and markets. Loved the idea of going into Manhattan, and coming back / home to a cozy neighborhood. The accommodations were amazing - Steve and Anna thought of everything - necessities and goodies for the kitchen, wi-fi, and a very spacious and well kept place. They were always available whenever we needed them. Enjoyed meeting their adorable son too. Thanks for a wonderful stay, Anna and Steve! We hope to return to your place when in New York. Happy Holidays to you and your family ~
The apartment is as lovely as it looks. Very spacious, clean, and beautiful. I had a wonderful time and Steve was a great host. Available but will give you your privacy.

This was a wonderful & quant home away from home! This was our first trip to NYC so I was very nervous. I couldn't have picked a better place!  The location was fantastic with close access to the subway & grocery stores.  The living & kitchen area was just perfect for the 4 of us.  The beds were comfortable with fantastic bedding & the place is huge! We were in town to see my son who recently moved to NYC & it was just such a cozy retreat after a jam packed day in the city. It was freezing but the apartment was toasty with plenty of places to order in from! Steve was just a text away but we rarely crossed paths so it was very private.  Would love to stay again!

What a wonderful place to stay at!!

When you are in a place for almost 3 weeks you want to homely and comfortable and that what we got here.  Steve and Anna's apartment was simply wonderful. 

We were there over the Christmas Holidays and it was so magical. Its close to the subway, markets and restaurant. Steve and Anna were amazing hosts who were only a text or a door knock away if we had any issue.

Would recommend this place to everybody and would defiantly stay again.

We had an amazing time - Thank you Steve and Anna

The apartment is more beautiful than the beautiful pictures :o) It is a very clean space, lots of storage (closets & drawers) enough outlets to charge phones, IPads and IPods, close to shopping, coffee shops, and public transportation. Close to a park and a library for the kids. Great apartment, I look forward to staying with Steve and Anna again soon :o)

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Steve and Anna's. We traveled with our 5 year old little girl and Anna brought up a basket full of toys and snacks just for her upon arrival. The apartment was clean and super cute. It's a quick walk to the F train and about half hour to Manhattan. Steve and Anna absolutely respect your privacy, but it was nice knowing they were right downstairs if we needed them. We will definitely be back!
Good host! Very clean and comfortable house, close to subway, highly recommend.

The pictures of the apartment do not do it justice. The space is very clean and very nicely appointed. I have stayed here before and this stay was equally great. I appreciate the extras in the kitchen, everything you need to make a meal or just enjoy your morning coffee. The only thing nicer than the accommodations are the hosts :o) Very friendly and happy to help! Thanks for a great week! :o)

Myself, my wife and two kids (5 and 1) are just back from an 8 day stay at Steve's place. The apartment is fantastic and had the space and comforts we were looking for in a family stay in NYC. The location is perfect, allowing easy access into Manhattan but also in a great spot in Brooklyn, ideal for families. Steve and Anna were great hosts and provided everything we needed and more before and during our stay. We would definitely recommend Steve's place and will be back.

Steve war ein großartiger Gastgeber, die Whonung ruhig und gut gelegen und Manhatten mit der F Linie in 20 Minuten zu erreichen. Die Wohnung selbst ist gut ausgestatet, grozügig und hell. Wir haben den Aufendhalt sehr genossen.
Beautiful spacious place. Well furnished, great location, quiet but 20 minute taxi from Manhattan. Steve and Anna were great hosts too. I highly recommend this place.
Very cute and clean place. We had very comfortable stay. It is very close to transportation to manhattan. There are also many great restaurants in Brooklyn as well.

Rigtig fed lejlighed på Brooklyn. Vi nød opholdet med stor stil. Så søde og gode værter. 
Vi rejste med vores søn på 8 mdr. Og Steve og Anna havde lagt en babyseng klar, samt babymad til ham da vi ankom. SÅ sødt. Vi vil helt sikkert vende tilbage.

Nous avons passé 7 jours dans l'appartement de Steve.
Nous étions 2 adultes et un enfant de 13 ans, dans cet appartement très grand, extrêmement propre et parfaitement fonctionnel et décoré.
Les PLUS: appartement extrêmement propre, nous nous y sommes d'emblée sentis comme chez nous, quartier résidentiel très calme, métro à proximité immédiate (moins de 10 minutes de marche de la station "Fort Hamilton parkway", supermarché proche également (15 min de marche), supérette de "dépannage" à l’angle de la rue, la literie est vraiment très confortable, la communication était vraiment facile Steve vivant dans l'appartement juste au-dessous, malgré notre arrivée tardive, Steve et sa famille étaient vraiment accueillants nous ayant même proposé de nous donner un parapluie pour notre départ pluvieux  le dernier jour.
Le seul moins (il faut bien en trouver un!): la WI-FI "ramait" un peu.
UNE EXCELLENTE ADRESSE A RETENIR SANS HESITER A BROOKLYN POUR UN SEJOUR INOUBLIABLE A "BIG APPPLE".
Roomy, well equipped, very comfortable, very nice hosts

Super séjour à New York avec des amis !
Appartement idéal pour famille jusqu'à 2 enfants ou 2 couples.
Steeve et Anna, qui vivent dans la maison à Rdc, sont charmants. 
L’appartement est joliment décoré avec un style à la fois contemporain et rétro, comme en atteste les photos sur le site.
Les serviettes ont été changées au milieu du séjour. Ils ont très réactif à notre unique demande : des adaptateurs pour les prises US :-)
Il n'y a eu aucun problème durant le séjour et ont été très arrangeants pour le départ compte-tenu de notre horaire de vol.
A réserver sans hésitation !!

Able to experience a more neighborhood feel of the city with our family.  A short walking distance to the F train which takes you straight into Manhattan.  The apartment is spacious with two very nice sized bedrooms.  Hosts were there to welcome us and make sure we had everything we needed and made themselves accessible should a need arise.   Felt safe and comfortable and loved going into the city and coming home to the wonderful space we had in Brooklyn.  Also loved taking the opportunity to explore Brooklyn!   Highly recommend this airbnb!

Die Wohnung war perfekt, es war alles sauber und sehr modern eingerichtet. Die Metro ist innerhalb von 5min zu erreichen. Steve und Anna sind super Gastgeber, bei der Ankunft stand sogar Wasser bereit. Die Unterkunft können wir ohne Bedenken weiterempfehlen.

As described, this apartment is in a great location, close to markets, restaurants and subway stations.  It is a safe neighborhood to walk in, has a beautiful  park, Prospect Park, that you can walk, run or ride a bike in.  The community is made up of mom and pop businesses, delis, sandwich shops, and all kinds of restaurants, Chinese, Thai, Mexican, and foods from India.  There are all walks of life and everyone  is very friendly and helpful.  We are from California and this was our first trip to Brooklyn, NY.  We are timeshare holders so we thoroughly enjoyed the privacy of the apartment, the amenities of a full kitchen and the spaciousness.  The apartment was very clean, well maintained and decorated  like a staged home - stylishly, simple and coordinated with personal touches.
Very comfortable, well equipped, spacious, light and airy. Good location, excellent hosts, friendly and helpful.
Our host Steve was fantastic and ever so helpful. Our accommodation was amazing and so wish we could have stayed longer.
The apartment was really nice,  as in the pictures!  And we felt at home....!!

The apartment is lovely. It was perfect for our family stay. It was beautifully clean, light and spacious. It is well maintained and comfortable with plenty of storage space. Steve and Anna were both welcoming and helpful and they responded quickly to any questions we had.
The area is quiet and residential. There is a Foodtown supermarket nearby and shops at Church Avenue and Prospect Avenue. We enjoyed dinner at Le Paddock on Prospect Avenue, which is a 10 minute walk away. Fort Hamilton Parkway subway, F/G lines, is very close making it easy to visit anywhere in NYC. Prospect Park and Greenwood Cemetery are both easy to walk to. There are great views of Manhattan from Greenwood. Go at the weekend when the Fort Hamilton entrance is open.

Loved this place, not only because close to my daughter's apartment.  We had unseasonally cool weather in August, so left windows open.  This is the quietest neighborhood I've even been in, in Brooklyn or Manhattan.  The apartment is large for NY, clean and modern, bright with many windows and a skylight, and less than 3 blocks from the Fort Hamilton Parkway subway stop.  Steve and Anna were friendly and very accomodating.  Would stay here again.
It was a very pleasant stay. is a very cute and very comfortable house . I recommend it to everyone

I stayed 6 days in Steve's apartment with my wife and my parents. 
Everything was as expected, not far from coffee shop and subway station (F&G line) in a very calm neighborhood. 
Perfect if you want to stay in NYC and feel like a local ;-)

We could also cook breakfast in the morning, everything we needed was there (and thanks for the coffee you gave us)
Air conditioner in rooms, wifi, towels, clean sheets,... Feel like home :-)

See you again in NYC !

Steve's place was one of our best BnB experiences! It's a great apartment and excellent value for a two bedroom! He is an excellent host and was very accommodating. Was about a 10min walk + 25min F train ride into the city.

Roomy and nicely arranged apartment. Easy stroll to F train; 35 minutes gets you to Central Park. Pleasant and quiet
Steve and Anne are wonderful hosts.

The place to stay on your next trip to NYC. 
Our host was great to communicate with and ensured we were comfortable upon arrival. The location was perfect as it was outside of the madness of Manhattan but also in a very safe and cute part of Brooklyn. We appreciated the two coffee shops and various restaurants down the street. The train station was a short walk away with a direct train to Williamsburg and another to Manhattan. Perfect and affordable ways to commute to the hotspots. The apartment so modern, clean and comfortable with everything you could ever need. We will certainly be staying here again on our next trip to NYC!

This apartment is located in a nice area of Brooklyn- not the hip Brooklyn High but well located and close to a Metro Station - parking in the street is also possible. The apartment is spacious and open. Every room is well equipped and nicely and pragmatic decorated. Noticeable from our point of view is the outstanding cleanliness. This in sum made us feel very comfortable and we really enjoyed our stay!

Great apartment!  Steve is a helpful and friendly host. 
Location was perfect- coffee shop at the end of the block, delicious local restaurants, and an easy quick walk to the F train.
Steve & Ann are Nice ! the apartment is top, we are a family, 2 adults and 2 children. the trip was superb. it is a good place that I recommend! thanks again to Steve & Ann
Steve was very quick to respond and helpful. He helped check us in when we arrived late. We were very comfortable there and lots of amenities.

Steve and Anna are wonderful hosts; very accommodating, communicative and helpful.  The comfortable and spacious 2 bedroom unit is terrific! Beautifully decorated, sparkly clean and so close to shops and the subway.  Really hope it’s available next time we head up to Brooklyn to visit our family!
Terrific apartment close to all amenities and parks. Host Steve was very helpful and quick to respond. Met us upon our arrival and explained details and local facilities. Highly recommended *****

Steve’s place is bright and modern and was the perfect abode for our family to relax after a day in Manhattan. We bought groceries at the market about four blocks away and stayed in for breakfast each morning before heading out each day; however on the corner of Steve’s street, there are quaint restaurants and a coffee shop which were super easy to grab coffee on the way to the Metro station. 

We loved the cleanliness, space, and decor. We felt right at home with the amenities provided and it definitely helped complete our Manhattan vacation!

We had a great stay in Steve’s place for ten days. Everything was as expected and we enjoyed going back to the clean, attractively presented, modern space at the end of each day. Both beds were very comfortable. Steve and Anna were very pleasant hosts. We will definitely go back there again if we have the need.

Steve and Anna's place was great. Spacious, bright, clean, and uncluttered. It had everything I look for in an Airbnb stay. Streamlined décor that feels almost but not quite like a hotel is my preference, and this hit that perfectly. Comfortable beds, check. Ability to make a nice cup of coffee without having to go out, check. A modern bathroom with amenities, check. Good internet, check. Great communication and flexibility, check. I would stay again in a minute. Thank you!
Hospitable.  Super clean.  Really lovely space.  My parents were extremely happy to stay here - and would recommend it. Thank you
Steve has created a lovely comfortable space. Clean, quiet and a great find! He’s very friendly and highly responsive. Very happy to give 5 stars all round!
We loved staying here. Central location that’s great for families. Easy to get to the subway. Steve and Anna are gracious, helpful hosts and the space is stylish and well-equipped.

Had a wonderful stay at Steve's place. He and his family were extremely accommodating but also unintrusive. The place is exactly as shown, in a very safe feeling and family-friendly area. Note that the washer is no longer a part of the amenities!

I'll definitely be back the next time I'm in Brooklyn!

Great place to stay in Brooklyn! Convenient to the train, and some great little restaurants and coffee shops just down the street. The place was clean, had everything we needed, and the beds were super comfortable. Hosts were responsive and helpful. They were flexible and helped us by adjusting check in/ check out times to suit our red-eye flights. Would highly recommend and would stay again.

Steve’s 2 bedroom unit is comfortable, stylish and well appointed, and it’s in a great location! Very near the F & G subway lines and many bus lines. We have stayed there before and hope to do so again.  Steve and Anna are very nice & accommodating hosts.
Good host! Very clean place!

We have been looking for a nice place to stay when visiting our daughter and family in Windsor Terrace for some time and this apartment met all of our needs. Clean, recently updated, nice size rooms, comfortable beds and friendly host. We already have made a reservation for our next trip to NY.

My family absolutely loved Steve's place. Steve and Anna were fantastic hosts, and made us feel completely at home. The flat was super clean, fully equipped with everything we needed and more, and it was great to come back there after a busy day in Manhattan and exploring the NY city.
I would highly recommend this for a family. The area is quite and safe, and the closest subway station is 5 minute walk from the flat.

Overall, a great option for a NY city break.

Super Unterkunft, Küche gut, kleine Kaffeemaschine und Toaster inklusive; Gaskochplatte; Splülmaschine; Schlafzimmer grosszügig gestaltet, Matratze etwas hart, Klimaanlage in alle Zimmer (haben wir nachts allerdings ausgeschaltet). Nette Wohngegend, Parknähe (Park mit See und Boote).
Subway Haltestelle 10-15min zu Fuß. Nette Gastgeber, hilfsbereit.
Such a wonderful quiet, clean apartment in a great neighborhood! Steve and his wife were so welcoming and helpful. This was a great find for us, and we will return.

Beautiful and clean space! The hosts had great communication and allowed an early check in, which was very helpful! Quiet street, close to subway. The apartment was a bit further out from Manhattan than I expected, but was an easy ride into Midtown on the F! Highly recommend!

We had a wonderful time in this extremely family apartment . Quiet, charming and extremely comfortable. The beautiful decor made us question our recent re-decorating taste of our own place :|  

Highly recommended!

Steves Airbnb ist absolut fantastisch. Wir können uns den vorhergehenden Bewertungen nur anschließen. Die Wohnung ist ausgesprochen geschmackvoll und durchdacht eingerichtet. Wir haben uns sofort wohlgefühlt. Die Wohngegend ist ruhig und sicher. Die Lage ist für einen New York Besuch hervorragend. Nur wenige Minuten zur U Bahn, die direkt nach Manhattan fährt. Insgesamt sehr empfehlenswert.

Steve's place was really quite nice. The apartment is spacious, very comfortable and quiet.  I was visiting family both in this neighborhood, in other areas of Brooklyn and Manhattan and it was easy to get everywhere I needed to be.  I would definitely stay here again in the future.

My brother and I stayed at Steve and Anna’s place for our two week trip to New York. After travelling all the way from NZ (a long journey) we were greeted by the wonderful Steve who gave us a tour of the apartment and had some great tips for us.

The place was so spacious, beautiful, comfortable and clean. A real home away from home that we didn’t want to leave!

It’s perfectly located close to the subway that’ll take you to Manhattan in no time at all. The area itself is safe and quiet, which is a treat to come back to after a long day.

You’ll find the apartment has everything you need and more. Both rooms are spacious with comfortable beds. We slept well every single night and felt so rested despite being the busiest city the world.

Steve and Anna also provided a handy sheet upon arrival which details everything you need to know about the area (closet supermarket, laundromat etc). We found this incredibly useful to get us started. They are also super quick to respond to queries. Such a kind and helpful family!

We couldn’t recommend this apartment enough and will definitely be back to stay again. Thanks Steve and Anna for giving us such a lovely temporary home. :)

This is a great find - a clean and comfortable space in a safe area of Brooklyn. It is exactly as billed, the only disadvantage being no clothes washing facilities. It takes about 40 minutes in the subway to downtown Manhattan, an hour uptown. We had a very enjoyable stay and would recommend the place to others.

Steve and Anna waren großartige Gastgeber.
Besonders gefreut haben wir uns über die kleinen Details bei Anreise wie Obst und etwas zu Knabbern sowie Wasser und Limo im Kühlschrank.
Das Haus haben wir genauso vorgefunden wie auf den Fotos dargestellt. Handtücher waren reichlich vorhanden und die Küche ist mit allen Utensilien ausgestattet, um eine Mahlzeit zu Hause zuzubereiten. In beiden Schlafzimmern befanden sich sehr bequeme Betten, wir haben wunderbar geschlafen. Die nicht funktionierende Waschmaschine war auch kein Problem, da sich fußläufig eine Wäscherei befindet.
Nach einem langen, aufregenden Tag in der Stadt war es immer schön, in die Ruhe des Hauses zurück zu kehren und am offenen Fenster den Garten zu genießen.
Die U-Bahn Station ist schnell erreicht und bedingt durch die Häufigkeit der Züge befindet man sich in ca. 30 Min. in Manhattan. Zu keinem Zeitpunkt haben wir uns hier unsicher gefühlt (späteste Rückfahrt aus Manhatten nach Brooklyn war gegen 23.30h). Im Nachhinein bedauern wir, dass wir uns in Unkenntnis der Verhältnisse und aufgrund der Anreise nach 20h nicht getraut haben, ebenfalls die U-Bahn zu nehmen, aber so haben wir die Erfahrung einer Taxifahrt im Feierabendverkehr sammeln können ;-).
Sollten wir erneut New York besuchen, würden wir wieder in dieser Unterkunft wohnen wollen.

Steve and Anna were great hosts.
We were particularly pleased about the small details on arrival such as fruit and something to nibble and water and soda in the fridge.
We found the house exactly as shown in the photos. Plenty of towels were available and the kitchen is equipped with all utensils to prepare a meal at home. In both bedrooms were very comfortable beds, we slept wonderfully. The non-functioning washing machine was no problem at all, since there is a laundry within walking distance.
After a long, exciting day in the city, it was always nice to return to the tranquility of Steve's and Anna's home and enjoy the garden by the open window.
The subway station is quickly reached and due to the frequency of the trains you are in Manhattan in about 30 min. At no time did we felt unsafe here (latest return trip from Manhattan to Brooklyn was around 11:30 pm). In retrospective, we regret that in ignorance of the circumstances and because of the arrival after 20h we did not dare to take the subway, but this way we hade the experience of a taxi ride in the rush hour.
Should we visit New York again, we would want to stay in this property again.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Steve et Anna. Malgré l'heure tardive , Steve nous a accueilli et présenté l'appartement et le quartier. Pour les quelques questions que nous avons eues à poser, Steve et Anna ont été très disponibles. Le logement est situé à 6mn à pieds d'une station de métro qui permet de joindre facilement toutes les directions. A recommander à celles et ceux qui veulent s'éloigner de Manhattan et découvrir Brooklyn. Appartement confortable pour 4 personnes.
A gorgeous space in Windsor Terrace. A few blocks from the F & G lines, easy to get to other parts of BK and into Manhattan. Apartment is gorgeous, private, and comfortable. Thanks for a lovely time!

This lovely apartment is sparkling clean and extremely comfortable, with two spacious bedrooms (good beds!) and a generous living area that includes a living room and full working kitchen. Hosts Steve and Anna were very responsive to communication requests and even went above and beyond when the weather turned very cold, advising us on how to stay warm in the (cozy and well-heated) apartment. No hesitation to recommend!

Fantastic Airbnb in a quiet and friendly neighborhood. This space has everything you need and the host is extremely accommodating. I definitely recommend staying at Steve & Anna’s Airbnb while visiting NYC.

This place is simply beautiful, in a great area, super close to the subway and some really nice eateries, check out chino’s the local deli, they knock up some delicious sandwiches.

Prospect Park is a short stroll away which we found to have lovely varying path ways and interesting buildings dotted amongst lakes and trees.  For travel the subway station Fort Hamilton Parkway is a 5 minute walk from the apartment which offers excellent access to Manhattan via the G train.  The F train also runs from here.

The neighbourhood is quiet, friendly and family-oriented with local amenities close by.  There is a FoodTown a 10 minute walk from the property as well as Wendys, Dunkin Donuts and the like on and around MacDonald Avenue

Steve and his partner were really helpful and left some useful tips about the area too.

Although Steve and his family live below, don’t let this put you off, as you really wouldn’t know.

Steve’s place is very well equipped, so if you do want to stay in a couple of nights, they have all the cooking utensils you could need.

Would definitely stay again and recommend anyone else looking at this place to book it 

Thanks,

Hattie and James

Our family really enjoyed our stay at this lovely apartment.  The place was very clean and well equipped.  The kids loved the bench seating at the kitchen table!  This is a really good value for the space and location.

Steve and Anna’s place was warm, conveniently located, located near public transportation and it had a modern lay out. Steve and Anna were helpful and accommodating. My girlfriend and I had a comfortable stay and so will you.

Apparment was homely and comfortable with all the amenities we could have needed. Spacious, clean and quiet just a short walk to the subway. F line straight to midtown Manhattan was perfect.  Steve provided all the info we needed and we felt very safe with a 7 year old who just loves travelling and exploring.
The location was perfect. We loved the quiet street, friendly host and good night’s rest!  We will absolutely stay here again!

We stayed at Steve’s place for 3 nights with our two young children while apartment hunting in the area. It was conveniently located a short walk away to a couple local playgrounds, Prospect Park, and plenty of great restaurants! The space was clean, and renovated, with generous sized bedrooms that allowed our little ones plenty of space to play and relax. A wonderful place for families to stay in WIndsor Terrace!
Good place to stay

I have stayed here before and hope to stay here again. This lovely spot is spacious, comfortable, with everything we needed.  And we really appreciate the location which makes getting into downtown Brooklyn or Manhattan easy,  while a short walk to prospect park and local neighborhoods.

name: Perayata Flat#1/near Taksim
summary: Newly renovated,historical building at the heart of the city center,walking distance to Taksim and Galata Tower.Takes 5 min to tube station.Our place is fully renewed furnished and clean equipments.Peaceful and friendly..close to old town by walking
space: Newly renovated,historical building at the heart of the city center,walking distance to Taksim and Galata Tower.Takes 5 min to tube station.Our place is fully renewed furnished and clean equipments.Peaceful and friendly.. You can also  walk to the old town and Galata Bridge and on the way you can feel the atmosphere of the city by walking through the narrow streets lined with chic boutiques, art galleries, cafes and restaurants exclusively set up to lure tourists..  The flats are air-conditioned and each room includes double bed and a sitting area, an LCD TV and Wifi connection. The kitchen features a refrigerator, stove, electric teakettle and microwave and kitchen equipments. Ironing facilities and a washing machine are also available.Clean bed sheets and towels, hair dryer, shampoo and hair conditioner in the shower are provided for you. You can also ask an extra bed for the 3rd guest.
description: Newly renovated,historical building at the heart of the city center,walking distance to Taksim and Galata Tower.Takes 5 min to tube station.Our place is fully renewed furnished and clean equipments.Peaceful and friendly..close to old town by walking Newly renovated,historical building at the heart of the city center,walking distance to Taksim and Galata Tower.Takes 5 min to tube station.Our place is fully renewed furnished and clean equipments.Peaceful and friendly.. You can also  walk to the old town and Galata Bridge and on the way you can feel the atmosphere of the city by walking through the narrow streets lined with chic boutiques, art galleries, cafes and restaurants exclusively set up to lure tourists..  The flats are air-conditioned and each room includes double bed and a sitting area, an LCD TV and Wifi connection. The kitchen features a refrigerator, stove, electric teakettle and microwave and kitchen equipments. Ironing facilities and a washing machine are also available.Cle
notes: Just behave our place as your own home. It is enough:)
transit: Walking distance to Public Transports:  • Metro Station – 4 min.  • Bus Station – 4 min.
access: There are many popular restaurants, clubs, art galleries, historical monument within walking distance from our apart in Taksim area. You will find maps and Istanbulkart on your desk. This card will help you to pay less and go wherever you want with the public transportation. The only thing you need is to load some money in it..  Galata Tower (10min),Taksim Square (18 min), Asmalimescit (10 min), Karakoy (20 min) are very close, walking distance, to hang around in Istanbul. It is very easy to reach historical places like Ayasofya, Blue Mosque and Grand Bazaar, by walking it takes less than 20 min . All central places like Sultanahmet, Eminönü, Karakoy, Mecidiyeköy, Sisli, Besiktaş are very close by public transportation. From Atatürk Airport, there are two transportation options except taxi - You can take the metro from airport (M1A line- Airport - Yenikapı line) to "Yenikapı" station and change to the other line M2 ( Yenikapı - Hacıosman Line) to "Şişhane" station. Şişhane metro statio
interaction: You can reach me by phone, by airbnb or e-mail also if you want by viber or (Hidden by Airbnb) for free texting.
house_rules: You can smoke but please admit fresh air into the room and be careful for yourself.

host.host_about:
I am an architect and made the renovation of this building by myself. Besides my business ; I love to travel , meet new people, spend time with them and curious about different cultures, history, languages so I decided to run here as an apart hotel. I am trying to host my guests as ideally as I can do. Also it is a chance for me to meet so many people face to face. 
Got so much more to see and experience around the world and am hugely excited to stay in different countries

reviews.comments:
Mert and Gökçe are really friendly people!! They were always available to help us and advise about the city, they met us very late on the first night and they arranged the taxi to the airport too. They even took us on a tour!!! to the Asian side showing us some of their favourite places. We really enjoyed our stay there and Mert and Gökçe are fantastic hosts. 

This review is for the "Mayata Apart-Flat#2" which was not yet advertised on Airbnb as the others were not available. The flat is big and really nice, all new and clean with separate kitchen and living area and a small balcony. It is in a traditional style building that Mert and Gökçe are renovating and where there are only three other apartments that they rent. The area is safe as you can find a Police station meters away from the building and it is possible to walk to the Galata Tower and Istiklal Street in just a few minutes. There is also a metro station (Sishane) just five minutes walking from the building. Really recommended, you'll have a great time!  :)

It was really great to meet Mert and Gökçe! They were were very friendly with us and helped to find the way to all places that we wanted.
Their flat is situated on the safe place near the police station. It was very clean and comfortable there.
I decided to stay at their apartment next time when I go to Istanbul. I recommend the flat of Mert and Gökçe for all my friends. 
Thank you for your hospitality!

Many thanks for our highly sociable, friendly and helpful host.

Not only for providing a very charming and well equipped flat good to stay in, but also for being ready for 

giving help.

Finding the flat was so easy as they picked us at Taxin Square. 

Getting familiar with the local facilities was also so easy with their kind help.

Mert Üncü was a so kind and correct host that I can highly recommend him and his apartment to anyone 

who is looking for a well equipped and well prepared place to stay in.

Top rated host with a top rated place.

Thank you for the high quality service again.

István

from Budapest, Hungary

Mert and his wife were more than helpful. They were very welcoming and immediately showed us where to go and where to take the metro. We couldn't have asked for a more comfortable, cute place to stay. It was very safe and a perfect location. Next time we go back to istanbul we will definitely contact them. They went out of their way to make sure we were happy and that things went smoothly...and they certainly did! Thanks so much!
___________________

Mert et sa femme ont été tout simplement incroyable avec nous lors de notre séjour à Istanbul. Ils ont prit le temps de bien nous montrer les environs pour que nous puissions nous retrouver aisément. Ils nous ont conseillé des bons restaurants et endroit où aller. 

On ne peut demander mieux comme hôte et nous allons les recontacter lors de notre prochaine visite en Turquie :) 
Merci infiniement !

It was the first time I used airbnb when booking Mert and Gökçe's place and I must admit I was very happy. The flat was very clean, comfortable and functional, newly restored and furnished as well. Additionally It was very close to the metro station (4 mins walking), to the Galata area and Istiklal where there are many shops, bars, restaurants etc. but the neighborhood is at a very calm spot, which is a great combination. Not only that, Mert and Gökçe are two wonderful people as well as hosts. They waited for us, even though we arrived late at night, so that they could welcome us and showed us around to the neighborhood. They provided us with a map of the area and a metro card, they even booked us a taxi at the day of our departure and they are at all times available when we needed information on the city. Last but not least they were great company - we had such a lovely time going out with them! 
I highly recommend their place for the hospitality and the comfort and wish them all the best.

Mert et sa femme sont deux personnes d'une extraordinaire gentillesse et prêt à donner tous les conseils utiles tout au long de votre séjour. En ce qui concerne l'appartement, il est très bien situé proche de la tour Galata et idéal pour un séjour à 2. 
Vraiment je recommande Mert à tous sans hésiter.

We had a wonderful stay, the room was clean and modern with everything we needed provided (towels, cooking equipment, hairdryer etc.). The location was a 5 min walk from restaurants, bars and public transport - very convenient! Mert and his wife were super helpful and called taxi's for us - they were on call 24 hours which is wonderful for peace of mind. Perfect place to stay for a winter weekend city break with lovely hosts.

Mert and his wife our lovely. They we're very welcoming and even took me on a tour through the neighborhood. The apartment is nicely decorated, and has everything you need. We really enjoyed the area and our stay! I would absolutely recommend staying here on your trip to Istanbul.

Mert was very helpful - provided a route, which was helpful because Istanbul is a maze. Would be great if he send beforehand a map of the exact location too - the one in Airbnb I found not clear enough for use given Istanbuls complex street map. He stayed in touch and was easy available for anything we would further need. 

The place is new, very clean, good atmosphere and the bed is great. Kitchen had only the basics. We had a great stay and can most definitely recommend both the renter as the place. Only not for people who aren't fit to walk - the neighbourhood is very hilly, and the particular street is a steep stairwell! The location in general we found as excellent; felt at home in a rustique area, combined with only a short 5 minutes from the main shopping area heading to Taksim / amazing load of restaurants / pubs within easy reach.

La casa e' bellissima e molto confortevole, vicina ai mezzi e in un quartiere tranquillo e molto silenzioso.  L' appartamento e' molto pulito, nuovo, con un letto comodissimo dove abbiamo dormito benissimo. La doccia e' calda e comoda. Mert e sua moglie sono gentilissimi, sempre disponibili e veloci nella comunicazioni, sempre attenti a non far mancare nulla. Siamo stati davvero bene e torneremo

The apartment was extremely clean, cozy and well-situated. It is exactly as described and while being there it gives you the impression for a real home. Not to mention that it is located in a perfect area from where you can easily reach one of the most remarkable spots in the city.
Besides, it is a great opportunity to meet Mert and Gökçe who are such a wonderful and lovely couple. It is a pleasure when you get to know such people.
I highly recommend the place for all the hospitality and the comfort the hosts provide to their visitors, and I wish Mert and Gökçe all the best!

My fiancé and I spent 11 nights at Mert's place. First of all Mert and his wife both welcomed us with a smile and very informative conversation like the closest subway station and the distance to the attractions of Istanbul. Apart of the fact that Mert and Gökce were very friendly people, the apartment is located in the heart of Istanbul. You can literally walk to Taksim, Galata Tower and also to the Galata bridge. The subway station Sisli is the main line which takes you to the best shopping malls such as Cevahir, Kanyon, Istinye Park and many more. The neighborhood is very authentic with local people. You really feel like you are a part of the city. It was very cold in Istanbul during our stay but Mert did everything so we feel comfortable and warm. He even bought a new heater and new blankets so that we are not cold and the apartment was warm even though the weather in Istanbul was about -6 degrees. All in all I would highly recommend to rent this apartment!!! Thank you Mert and Gökce for everything! You guys are great hosts.

Mert and his wife made us feel very welcome. They were willing to help with pretty much everything, from laundry to finding places. The apartment was clean, quiet and close to the main district. I would stay there again if I ever go to Turkey again.
It was Great staying at Merts appartement. Everything was perfect! Thank u so much!

Mert stand jederzeit für Rückfragen zu Verfügung (hat immer innerhalb von 5 Minuten geantwortet), hat uns zuverlässig am Bahnhof abgeholt, uns sogar herumgeführt und uns alles wichtige gesagt und gezeigt. Das war wirklich super. Die Beschreibung der Wohnung war zutreffend und detailliert. Die Nachbarschaft ist nicht besonders schön, aber man fühlt sich sicher und kommt überall zu Fuß hin.

This was my 2nd Airbnb experience and it was another good one. Mert got in touch right away and was very helpful throughout - giving cab driver directions from airport. When we arrived, he took us for a little walk around to give us some bearings which was really nice of him. The location of this place is great. It's nice and cosy and everything in working order. It's not someone's home if that's the vibe you're going for and if you want to cook there's only a hob and microwave - we were sampling the Turkish cuisine so wasn't a problem for us. So overall, it's a good little place, everything works (TV, Wifi), quiet and great location for Beyoglu and Taksim square. Recommend a walk to Galata tower for Menemen breakfast in the sunshine. Enjoy
From the moment I booked this place, Meet was very cordial, informative and helpful.

We stayed at Mert's Perayata Flat for a week visit to Istanbul. Everything was perfect -- Mert was so helpful in answering questions before we left on our trip, he arranged a car hire for us to and from the airport, he even walked around the neighborhood with us when we arrived to make sure we had our bearings. The apartment is great and exactly as pictured. We loved being in a residential area away from large crowds of tourists but also very centrally located. Very safe, nice area near an elementary school and a great little cafe around the corner, "La Perla Cafe" -- go there for a cup of tea, the owner is wonderful! In addition to being clean, the apartment was nicely heated and had everything we needed. The building felt secure and quiet as well. Mert was very friendly and incredibly responsive whenever we had a question. We couldn't recommend this rental more! Thank you Mert!

Mert was incredibly hospitable and helped us to arrive from the airport to his apartment. He then personally showed us around the neighborhood and always made himself available for help and suggestions. He even booked us out early morning taxi to the airport upon leaving Istanbul. In my time using airbnb few hosts have done as much as Mert to make our stay enjoyable and easy. And a beautiful apartment in a great location too!

Mert nous a très bien accueillis. A notre arrivée, il nous a fait un tour de quartier et donné de bonnes adresses de restaurants pour bien commencer notre séjour ! Il est très facilement joignable toujours prêt à aider en cas de problème.
Nous avons passé 7 jours à Istanbul et l'appartement s'est révélé parfait. Fonctionnel et agréable pour se reposer entre 2 visites. Il est localisé dans un quartier calme tout en étant proche du métro, de la Tour Galata et de tous les restaurants en direction de la place Taksim. Idéal pour des vacances à deux.

This was the first time using airbnb and it worked out.

This apartment was great and it was walking distance to everything.

We had a great time in Istanbul thanks to Mert and his flat! Mert was very reactive and gave us useful advices before coming. Once arrived he showed us the area around the flat, the good places to go and some tips to help orient. We really appreciated it! The flat was perfect as described, well located to explore Istanbul by foot and go out in the evening.
We recommend the appartement and Mert as a very good host. Thank you!

Die Unterkunft von Mert ist wunderschön und entspricht exakt der Beschreibung. Wir haben uns Istanbul 3 Tage angschaut und dafür ist das Apartement perfekt gelegen. 5 Minuten vom Zentrum zu Fuß entfernt und für die Nacht total ruhig. Mert hat uns sehr nett empfangen und zeigte uns bei einem kleinen Rundmarsch die Umgebung. Das Bett und die Zudecke waren optimal. Von unserer Seite aus immer wieder und wir empfehlen das Apartment gerne weiter. 
Vielen Dank Mert und noch einen schönen Sommer!!

Mert was the perfect host: welcoming, available and also a nice guide for the city as he gave us a tour in the neighborhood with useful piece of advice for restaurants and places to visit.
The appartement was peaceful, newly renovated and near the place to visit and get out at night.
We had a perfect stay!
Mert est l'hôte parfait: accueillant, disponible il se transforme aussi en guide touristique quand il nous fait visiter son quartier et nous donne ses recommandations de restaurants et lieux à visiter.
L'appartement était très calme, fraichement rénové et à la fois près des lieux touristiques et de sorties. 
Nous avons passé un séjour parfait !

We had a wonderfull time at Mert's appartment. Although we didn't meet him in person he was very helpful and very friendly. The appartment was very clean and just a few minutes from the bar and restaurant area Istakil street away. We would definitely come back again.

Mert was a fantastic host! Met us upon arrival, helped with our luggage, showed us the apt and walked us around to familiarize us with the neighborhood. The apt was as pictured clean and bright. We love to walk and the location was great. Near metro and we liked to walk down to the Tram. We stayed 2 weeks the end of May and there was so much to see. We are delighted that we chose to stay in Mert's apartment!
Dan & Lucy

Mert is a great host! Even before arriving he was very responsive and explained us the best way to get to the apartment from the city. Upon picking us up from the metro stop he walked us through the neighbourhood and gave us great tips. I could always write to him while we were exploring the city in case of any questions.
The apartment is great for two people and was very clean. I also recommend the surrounding neighbourhood with its nice restaurants and bars. All in all: Thanks for 4 great days in Istanbul!

We rented the appartment for a 3 nights. The appartment was nice and clean (exactly like the photos). There is airconditioning in the bedroom, which was very useful.
It's a rather quiet street, but still close to nice restaurants and cafés and you can easily reach the touristic sighs by tram. 
Mert and Ozan took good care of us during our stay and were very helpful.

If you are going to stay here, it's advisable to mark the exact location of the appartment by gps in your phone. All the streets look alike in this area and it took us a while to find back the appartment the first day by using the tourist map only.

We had a great stay in this flat. It's clean, convenient and  in a quiet neighborhood close to Istiklal avenue.  Mert gave us clear directions on how to meet our host (Ozan) and he showed us around the neighborhood.  I would not hesitate to stay in this flat again were I to return to Istanbul.

Mert was a great host! He met us at the flat and showed us around the neighborhood - pointing out how to catch the metro, good restaurants and various sites. He also gave us tips for the rest of our travel in Turkey and was very responsive to any questions/requests we had. The location was great - we generally just walked everywhere, but it was off the main streets so there wasn't too much noise.

The flat was exactly as listed on the site, light and cozy. The location is absolutely perfect -- a walking distance from the busy main walking street with a lot of shops, bars and cafes, as well as to the river and the Galata bridge, from where you can walk into the old City or take a tram to the  Blue Mosque and the Palace. Yet, the location was very quiet and allowed for a good night sleep. Mert was very welcoming and helpful: he explained how to travel from the airport and met us at the subway station, showed us around the neighborhood and even helped with a reservation of a restaurant we wanted to visit. 

If you're coming to Istanbul, it's hard to find a better location. Highly recommended!

It was a pleasure to stay a Mert's flat. The flat was super clean and it is located in a safe neighborhood. It is a family neighborhood.  The metro station is a block away.  From the flat you can walk to Istiklal Avenue in few minutes where you can find hundreds of restaurants and shops. Our host, Mert, made our stay a great experience.   He helped with information on how to go around the city. He got us taxis when needed and answer multiple questions that we has. If you are going to Istanbul I highly recommend Mert's place to stay.

Istanbul is a fantastic and historical city. Most of the time you are going to be out. Probably all day, when you do come home at night, you want a nice, comfortable and quiet place. This is the place. 

When we arrived, Mert arranged for transportation for us from the airport. The apartment is located near a police station (very safe) and near the Metro (very convenient). The apartment was clean and tastefully decorated. There was a television, very good wifi services and all the basics you will need including a steam iron. The building also has a community washer which is highly efficient (we suggest using the quick cycle). 

After we got settled in, Mert and his wife walked us around the area for about 30 minutes. Showing us where to catch the train, where to eat (traditional) Turkish food and showed us Taksim square an outdoor wonderland. While we were there, he was always a (Hidden by Airbnb) message away and responded quickly. This is how good he is, one night, my husband had an issue with a crooked cab driver. Mert showed up within 10 minutes to make sure we were all ok. 

When you stay here you feel like you are part of the community. The neighbors are very friendly and warm. 

If you want an authentic Istanbul experience, this is the place to stay.

Side note: we recommend that you do not take a taxis and take the metro or tram. If you want a taxis just ask Mert to arrange it.

Had a wonderful stay in Mert's flat. It's very close to the Sishane metro station which is accessible with a transfer from the airport. Mert was kind enough to meet us at the station and walk us to the flat. He also provided great recommendations for food and sites to see. His cousin showed us around the flat and Istiklal street to get us oriented. Onut was great and personable. Mert was easy to reach and responded to our questions very promptly. The flat itself is comfortable and clean. Laundry, wifi, and a/c were all super.  I'd definitely recommend his flat.

Highly recommended! A great place to stay to explore the incredible city that Istanbul is!
Mert is an excellent, organised and kind host. Welcoming us after a delayed plane arrival at the Sishane train station, just a few mins walk from the apartment. Mert generously offered to show us around the local spots, speaks very good English and made us feel at ease straight away. He also gave us some great restaurant tips and a handy 7 day guide to Istanbul! Everything is closeby including great food, cafes, bars and architecture all hugging the cobblestoned streets. Its a downhill walk to the bridge across to Sultanahmet for all the amazing old city sights. Catching the tram to/from Karakoy worked really well, and then the Tunel cable car back up the hill.
The apartment is in a quiet residential area. It's clean, tidy and the air conditioning in the bedroom was great during the Summer heat. There is also a handy washer on the ground floor.

We spent an amazing week in Istanbul and staying at Mert's apartment made us feel right at home.
Before our arrival, Mert answered all my messages within no time and arranged four us to be picked up at the airport.
We were met by his cousin at the apartment who was very nice and welcoming and showed us around the neighbourhood and Istiklal Street and recommended a bunch of places for us to go for food and drinks.
The apartment is as advertised, very clean and convenient and a good size for two people. The house is in a very quiet, safe and nice neighbourhood with friendly neighbours and small shops, cafes, bakery and a supermarket only a few minutes away.
Mert immediately offered his support when he heard that my partner was sick and arranged a taxi for us back to the airport for a very good price.
Overall it was a very good experience and I will definetely stay in one of Merts apartments again when I get back to Istanbul some day.
Mert was great, responsive, friendly, etc. The unit was clean and worked well. The kitchen is not well equipped, for example, no toaster, no oven.

First, Let me say that Mert was a gracious host, very accommodating, and couldn't have made us feel any more welcome to stay at his apartment. Mert, was accessible via email and text before and after we arrived to Istanbul and made sure to give us a nice long tour of the neighborhood and Istiklal Avenue (Famous Avenue) in Istanbul.  

The Apartment is very conveniently located near the Sishane metro stop, walking distance to the New District (Taksim Square), and 15-20 min walking distance to the Old Town over the Galata bridge. Overall in great neighborhood and friendly neighbors.   

Highly recommended!
Great little flat, looks exactly like the photos. In a rather calm street so you can rest up after a long day exploring Istanbul.

Excellent location that was just a stones throw away from the subway and tunnel square. Mert was nice enough to even take us around istiklal street to help us understand our location better. Clean and nicely kept apartment. Would stay here again if I returned to Istanbul.

Well located, clean and cozy apartment for exploring Istanbul. It is located in a safe and friendly neighbour hood and is less than 10 minute walk from  several good eating joints -  Cafe Privato and Varka Antakya Lezzetleri are must try - and pubs. Well connected by public transport. Host Mert is quick to respond to messages and is helpful. would rate the entire experience 5/5.

Nice clean apartment in good location, but quite hilly. Our host Mert was very helpful and very quickly (within minutes) responded to our questions during the stay. Our first night we were shown the surrounding area and main street, it felt very welcoming. Overall great experience.
The description matched the actual space. We didn't meet Mert, but his cousin delivered the keys and showed us the space. The neighbourhood is quiet and very central, 5 minutes from the Galata tower.

El apartamento es exactamente como se describe en el anuncio. 
Además de ser especialmente luminoso, dispone de todos los servicios que uno podría necesitar (calefacción, aire acondicionado, toallas y ropa de cama, secador de pelo, plancha, microondas, cocina eléctrica, kettle, vajilla, batería de cocina, televisión, ...
El apartamento está muy próximo a Refik Saydam Cd., y se puede llegar andando a la Istiklal Cd. en menos de 10 minutos. 
El anfitrión ha estado muy atento y ha sido muy servicial. Ha mantenido conversación con nosotros durante toda nuestra estancia.
¡Absolutamente recomendable!

Mert and his cousin, Ozan, were excellent hosts. Ozan met us from the Metro station, showed us to the apartment, and then gave us a quick tour of the local area to help us orientate ourselves. This saved us a lot of time and potential stress, when arriving at night, hungry, and with a 7 month old baby. Mert also kept in contact throughout our stay (via AirBnB, text message and (Hidden by Airbnb) ), to make sure we had everything we needed.

The apartment building is in a quiet street, only a short walk from a buzzing and lively area with lots of shops, restaurants, cafes and bars. The Sishane Metro station (Kasimpasa exit) is only 5 minutes walk away. Overall, the location is ideal - easy to walk to Galata, Karakoy, Cihangir, Taksim, etc.

The apartment itself is simply designed and spacious enough for us as a couple and our baby. The bed was large and comfortable, and the shower was powerful with plenty of hot water. The apartment was also clean. The wifi connection was good. The kitchen is not especially well equipped, but with such tasty and affordable food options nearby, you would be unlikely to do much cooking. There are also a few small shops nearby for snacks and breakfast supplies.

This was our first time using Airbnb, and we were really pleased with the experience.

Mert's flat was good quality except we did not have any heating on the first night.

The approach of the property, to off-load from taxis etc was not convenient - but for the rental price of the apartment - this was a good value for money.

B rgds 
Capt INAM

The apartment was great and the hospitality and service provided by Mert and Ozan are just incredible. The place is super clean, comfortable, in a quiet area. WiFi worked perfect. The Sishane metro station is just a few blocks from the apartment as well as "Istiklal Caddesi" street which has an incredible night life, or you can also reach the "Tunel" tramway to "Karakoy" pier. 
I had an excellent stay at Mert's place. I recommend this apartment 100%, you won't be disappointed.

Thank you again Ozan & Mert for eveything!

Reviews and photos are accurate I would only add we made breakfasts and some dinners in the kitchen just fine and the comments about the climb, well that's Istanbul!
 Could have used a secondary light in bedroom.
 Mert was one of the most welcoming and available host of our 4 month journey of Europe. We really liked this side of the city and recommend this apartment.

Mert´s appartment was well located, great for walking to all the shopping and restaurants, great bars nearby. Perfectly clean, most comfortable bed !!! Mert's cousin showed us around the first night, so we could get to comfortable with the area. Would recommend this flat!
Mert was a great host. He was so helpful to make us feel like at home. Highly recommended and will definetely come back again.

Mert was such a nice Host. He organized our airport transfer and waited for us at the apartment even if we arrived after midnight.  The flat is clean, calm and very convenient. It is central and we could visit Istanbul by walking. 
Mert gave us any information we needed and replied when we had a question. He gave us good restaurants address, places to visit, hammam, etc. 
I really recommend this place and I would definitely come back!! 

Thank you again Mert for your hospitality!
I had a great stay at Mert's apartment. It had everything I needed and not far from the Metro station.  He was very helpful.

We had a wonderful stay at Merts apartment. He was kind enough to give us directions and wait for us at the metro. After giving us a tour of the apartment he took on a short walk to the surrounding areas and gave suggestions on where to go and what to do.

The apartment looked just like the pictures. It was clean and comfortable and about a 5 minute walk to the metro and a 10 minute walk to the Galata. Great location!

Mert was a great host, he told the taxi driver where to go, took his time after our arrival to show us arround and he gave us advices. The apartment is clean and really nice located. We def. would come back.
很好｡房间很干净｡距离地铁站也很近｡老板人也很nice 下次再来还会选择你家

Mert is a GREAT host! He met me at the metro station, made sure I was settled at the apartment, and then showed me some great places he knew around Istiklal to eat and drink. He also emailed me a list of other restaurants and things to see. Very helpful!, and checked in with me often. The apartment is clean and sunny and Mert really takes care of you.

Mert was a fantastic host - extremely responsive and helpful. Our first day of arrival, he not only provided awesome local attractions and food recommendations, but he also took us on a walking tour of Istanbul. Even when we had some minor difficulties working the air conditioning in the middle of the night (after 11PM) he offered to come by and help us with it.

As for the apartment, it is ideally situated between the Old Town and main night life/restaurant area so each are accessible by foot in 5-10 minutes. The apartment was very clean and well-equipped. I would highly recommend you stay there on your next trip to Istanbul!
The Flat was exactly as shown in the pictures. It was very comfortable. We had a perfect stay in Istanbul! Mert was a very very friendly host and so helpful.
Mert was an excellent host! Very helpful and easy to reach with any questions. We had a lovely stay! Would definitely recommend.

Mert is a very helpful host! He took his time to walk me to the metro & to get my bearings about the location eg shops transport etc. The apartment is situated in a quiet hilly street. In an older part of the city. You must be able to walk well. All basics are available.

Mert was absolutely welcoming and very quick to respond to my questions about Istanbul, as it was my first time in the city and I traveled alone. He sent me recommendations on where to visit and where to eat/drink, as the apartment is only a few streets away from nightlife and the Sisane Metro station. He went up and beyond to communicate with my taxi driver, helped me get oriented, and explained all the routes from the apartment to the Metro and the famous Istikal Avenue. He made himself available both over (Hidden by Airbnb) and in person, he has been a wonderful example of a thoughtful, helpful host. 
The apartment itself is exactly like in the pictures, renovated and clean. It can get a little noisy at night with all the cats and seagulls in the area, and the school nearby but overall I have had an enjoyable stay. 
The only other note is that Istanbul is quite hilly, and this apartment is right on the side of a very steep one, so I would not recommend this apartment for guests with physical disabilities. Otherwise, it has been great, thank you Mert!

Das Appartment war sehr schön, hell, freundlich und sauber. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt! Mert hat uns herzlich begrüßt und uns viele Tipps für Istanbul gegeben. Außerdem hat er unsere An- und Abreise mit dem Taxi organisiert. Wenn ich nochmal nach Istanbul fahre, übernachte ich auf jeden Fall wieder hier!

Istanbul is not the US or even western Europe. There are some things that might be easy to fuss about. There's a bright street light outside the window, little sound-proofing, ants, and lots of hills to and from the metro. But ignore all of that. This place is clean, modern, and nice. The hills get rough after a week, but the location is very convenient and quiet. But Mert is fantastic and will stay in constant touch with you throughout your stay to make sure you have everything you need. Our luggage was delayed 2 days and Mert handled it all for us to make sure we got it as soon as possible. We needed taxi rides to and from the airport and Mert handled that for us as well. There's a great ease that comes from having someone do this kind of work for you.

Our experience at Merts apartment was perfect! He was fantastic at communicating prior to our trip, being very patient answering all my questions and sending us lots of tips. Our flight was delayed by several hours and despite this, Merts friend greeted us straight from our taxi and showed us to the apartment. The apartment is beautiful, exactly as shown in the photos - spacious, modern, light and very clean, amazing value for money! Merts tips were great. One of the restaurants he recommended was delicious and became our local! The apartment was in a great location being in its own little local neighbourhood and only 5-10 min walk from the hustle and bustle of Begolou's bars and restaurants. We absolutely loved Istanbul and really hope tourism picks up and as it is city deserving of many more visitors! Thanks very much Mert
Everything about the apartment was great! Clean and comfy! The walk to the mrt is not too far as well. Mert was helpful and we had an enjoyable stay!

We had an amazing stay in Mert’s apartment. He was incredibly helpful and welcoming! He helped us arrange a car to take us right there from the airport and he even took the time to show us around the neighbourhood so we won’t feel lost. The apartment itself was really nice, has lots of natural light, it was perfectly clean and had lots of kitchen appliances. It is located in a quiet little street, really close to Sishane metro station, Istiklal street and the Galata tower – however get ready that you’ll have to walk uphills to get there from the apartment. Overall we had a great stay and would definitely come back again – thank for everything, Mert!

*Please read: how to deal with issues with an Airbnb stay."
We had to change our dates last minute because of the recent turmoil and events in Istanbul. Mert is a nice host who accommodated the date change request and spent time with us over tea showing us how to get around the city. However we had the unfortunate situation that the city was working on the water lines. Mert let us know there was no running water in the unit when we checked in(not before).  At first, we were not concerned since Mert told us it should be on that evening. We went about our day sightseeing and at dinner, we sent a note asking him if it was on. He said no. It was too late so we bought some bottled water to brush our teeth and wash our face. But the water still did not come on in the morning. After a night of not being able to use the toilet and needing to shower, we contacted Mert several times to figure out what to do. After not hearing back from Mert, we decided to check out and find a hotel at 11am. I waited until I returned home to the states to try to resolve our stay with Mert directly before going to Airbnb but sadly, he did want to refund any money believing it was not his fault. I am disappointed because it is not unreasonable to expect the basic need of running water for an Airbnb stay. My recommendation is to always let Airbnb know immediately of any issue so they can get involved with the host and you are not left trying to figure out what to do on your own, especially in a country you do not speak the language. Also, you can request to cancel during your stay and Airbnb will provide you a number to call to get help instead of sending an email.  I have traveled the world using Aurbnb but unfortunately it was the first time for my friend and this experience was so horrible, she will never do it again.

Amazing host and great apartment. This apartment made my life easier

The apartment is as on the picture, nice, clean and spacious (for a small apartment). It's close to the metro station( Sishane, one station from Taksim aka the center), even if you have to climb one street. 

You have most of thing you need for everyday life. And if you miss something just ask Mert. 

He's incredibly available, helpful and kind. 

Bonus there is even a cleaning lady who does an amazing work :)
Great place to stay !

Mert war ein sehr bemühter Gastgeber und  immer sofort zur Stelle, wenn wir eine Auskunft brauchten bzw. wenn es galt kleine Probleme zu lösen. Die Wohnung entsprach voll der Beschreibung und war warm, sehr sauber und gemütlich. Das Viertel war sehr zentral gelegen - in  maximal 10 Minuten war man in der Istilklal Caddesi, einer der zentralen Einkaufstraßen der Stadt. Ganz in der Nähe befand sich auch eine Metrostation: man konnte also bequem zu Fuß, aber auch mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln die Stadt erkunden. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in der Nähe des Hauses gab es nicht so viele, aber es gab einige Minimarkets, in denen man sich mit dem Nötigsten (z.B. fürs Frühstück) bis spät abends versorgen konnte. Noch ein Tipp für deutschsprachige Istambulbesucher: wenn man von der Wohnung aus in die Istiklal Caddesi kommt, so sieht man  auf der gegenüber gelegenen Seite  (leicht rechts) die deutsch - türkische Buchhandlung: dort gibt es auch ein Café, das sehr gemütlich und warm ist - vor allem empfehlenswert in der kalten Jahreszeit ;-)

It was a nice place, same as pictures. Flat has enough space just enough for couples. It's really close to shops, istiklal, metro and touristic places. Mert was really nice and he helped a lot. Totally recommend!

I wish I could give more stars! Mert was the perfect host, going above and beyond the call of duty in every way. His apartment was in a fantastic location to use as a base to explore Istanbul, it was immaculately clean, the bed was really comfy and it had everything you'd wish for. Could not recommend more highly!!!
地理位置非常棒,附近有公交站和地铁,距离加拉塔和独立大街都很近,房间宽敞明亮,干净整洁,房东还送了一份地图,带着我在附近走了一圈,给我推荐了一些很棒的餐厅,非常满意!

Fantastique endroit où séjourner ! Super bien placé, super propre, super accueillant :)  Mert est un hôte très attentionné avec qui nous avons bien communiqué avant le séjour et pendant le séjour. Nous retournerons à cette adresse lorsque nous reviendrons dans cette superbe ville qu'est Istanbul :)
Excellent choice, lovely apartment, with great options around of transport to move anywhere. The host is very helpful and has very good plans and information.

Merts apartment is as descriped - well located (only a few minutes per foot to very central loations in Beyoglu), nicely furnished and quite special for one (or two people).
He took care of vereything at my arrival (explaing the destination to the taxi driver on the phone, showing me around, etc.). mert is suoer communicative and if there is anything he can help with, he will do.
I enjoyed my stay in Merts apartment very much and would come back anytime.
Perfect, close. Close to public transportation and 5 mins away from Galata tower.

I loved the apartment
Very good location
Super clean
Super attentive and very polite host
I hope to return soon
VERY WELL RECOMMENDED

Had a very good and extended stay at Mert's flat. He is very helpful and a gentleman and his flat is very clean and comfortable indeed. 

Thank you very much!
Lovely apartment, great location and very friendly host.

Само по себе жилье не плохое, очень чисто и аккуратно, однако, квартирой это назвать нельзя, это именно отель и номер с неполноценной кухней. Была проблема по прибытию - хозяин не отвечал на сообщения и звонки, конкретный вход в отель удалось найти с помочью местных жителей. Кроме того, впоследствии общались с хозяином только по (Hidden by Airbnb) , видимо по причине экономии со стороны хозяина. В самом же отеле общение происходит с домработницей (домоправительницей). В спальне очень удобная кровать, шкаф для вещей гостей, неплохой кондиционер. Общая комната, объединённая с кухней, тоже достаточно уютная, но на кухне только раковина, одна электрическая плитка и холодильник. Кроме того на кухне, по пути в ванную, имеется порожек на котором можно споткнуться. Ванная комнатная не плохая и есть все, что нужно, однако, присутствует запах канализации, который иногда расходится по всей квартире. Одним из больших минусов было присутствие не малого количество муравьев, что доставляло ряд неудобств. По всей видимости, хозяева знают о проблеме и в один из дней нам (как это и бывает в отелях) была предложена бесплатная уборка нашего номера-квартиры. От этого предложения мы отказались, тем не менее, на следующий день в наше отсутствие эта уборка была проведена, в том числе была предпринята попытка скрыто замазать места откуда лезут муравьи - не удачно. Помимо этого, от замазки остался неприятный запах. Сама уборка, опять же, была проведена очень хорошо, но были передвинуты наши вещи, выброшено то, что возможно можно было посчитать "мусором", но мы хотели оставить на память. Стиральная машина стоит внизу, в общем пользовании и постоянно была заняты - стирать приходилось поздним вечером и ночью. Качество и скорость стирки не хорошие (часто нужно спускаться и проверять процесс стирки, проблемы с открытием дверцы). Расположение жилья не плохое, есть где погулять и не очень далеко от метро. Сам дом старый, окружён небольшими улочками и домами "окна в окна". En soi, la location n’est pas mal, très propre et bien rangée, mais ne peut pas être appelée un appartement, c'est un hôtel et la cuisine est rudimentaire. Il y avait un problème à l'arrivée - le propriétaire n'a pas répondu aux messages et appels téléphoniques, nous n’avons trouvé qu’avec l'aide de la population locale. En outre, nous n’avons par la suite communiqué avec le propriétaire que par (Hidden by Airbnb) , probablement par souci d’économie de sa part. Dans l'hôtel même, la communication se fait avec la concierge. La chambre a un lit très confortable, une armoire pour les affaires des visiteurs, bonne climatisation. Le salon combiné à la cuisine est également agréable, mais la cuisine est seulement équipée d’une plaque et d’un réfrigérateur. De plus, dans la cuisine, pour aller dans la salle de bain, il y a une marche sur laquelle on peut trébucher.
