La salle de bains est bien et il y a tout le nécessaire, cependant, les canalisations sentent, ce qui se propage parfois dans tout l'appartement. L'un des grands inconvénients était la présence d'un nombre non négligeable de fourmis, qui a donné un certain nombre de problèmes. Apparemment, les propriétaires sont conscients du problème et un jour (comme dans les...

Very clean place inside and looks as in the pictures.  Very good for the price. Located within close proximity to public transport and istiklal street, however its a hilly journey to Taksim and the flat is located at the bottom of steps.
The street is not the cleanliest, but seems very safe. There is a number of food grocery shops and a bakery within walking distance.
Flat is in close to the city centre, well equiped, clean and nice. Mert was very comunicative and helping, can only recommend!
很干净,提供几乎所有生活用品,如果不是时间很紧,每天都可以自己做饭了,下次来一定还会住这里｡

The apartment is in a great location, close to a metro and bus stations and in walking distance from many attractions. It is surrounded by steep hills, which is normal to find in Istanbul, so keep that in mind if facing physical issues, but it's easy to get used to otherwise. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful. The bedroom has an air conditioner which is key during humid Istanbul summer. Mert was great at communicating and was very fast at replying to any questions or concerns, he will go out of his way to make sure you are taken care of! Would definitely recommend.

Дом удобно расположен, совсем близко центральная улица и общественный транспорт. Не советую брать такси - таксист может не найти этот дом. Для двух человек места достаточно. Не советую для маленьких детей - на полу есть ступенька, о которую могут споткнуться. Ремонт хороший, но уже немного потёртый.
The apartment is exactly as it is in the pictures. Mert is a very helpful and friendly host. I reccoment this place.

Замечательная квартира, расположение и хозяин. 
Совершенно соответствует своей цене, даже превышает ожидания.
Спасибо за уют, чистоту и радушие!
the communication with host was fast and warm. we checked in earlier. the flat is central and easy to find.

Excellent hôte, disponible, répond rapidement à nos questions et offre d’excellentes suggestions.
Propreté impeccable, à quelques minutes à pied des principaux attrait de Beyoğlu.
The house has a significant difference with photos, Most home appliances are deprecated. House keeper is accessible.

Mert was a really friendly person, he was always helping me with all information that I needed,  appartment had all that we need for personal care and for prepare food, even in our first day Mert call herself for delivery to us.
Appartment is near to Galata’s tower, just a few minutes walking.

We’ve spent a great time in this appartment and in Istanbul!
It’s really easy and comfort to get into appartment from airport and city center. Mert gave us detailed instructions, met us and helped with our luggage. Also he provided a lots advises regarding places and restaurants to visit. He was on-line everytime we need a support. 
The location and the surroundings are really terrific. Buildings, lots of cats on the way, just a few steps from Galata, metrostaion, bars♣, historical places. The near transport system is well-organized and very convenient. There were a several shops nearby opened until lately evening. 

Small problems were with the unreliable internet connection and lively street: starting from buliding work in the morning and chatting people or TV several nights. So, as I sleep feely I used earplugs several times.  Also some spaces in appartment are not perfectly clean. But we found it as a nice place for a few days in Istanbul for a young couple.

My Wife and I stayed at Mert's place for 9 days. The apartment was clean and too close to Metro station Shishane, and bus stops (Shishane 3, 4, 6  and KasimPaça...) and 25min walking distance to Taksim Square via Istiklal street. 
Mert was kind and very helpful all along our stay. 
I recommand this apartment.
Thanks for a great experience

Stayed almost a week in this flat. The flat is located near Sishane metro station not one that near Istikla Street but near Kasimpasa. It is more like residential area, so it was very quite. Metro station was very closes from the flat but there was stiff hill (but doable). The host, Mert, responded to my message very quick and he tried to help me a lot in many ways. Highly recommend this flat!
War eine super Erfahrung und guter Standort. Supermarkt und Taksim Shops sind in Laufnähe. Wohnung genau so wie beschrieben. Zu empfehlen!

name: #Private Studio - Waikiki Dream
summary: At beginning Waikiki, the tourist center of Honolulu, this charming studio is about 10min walking distance from the beach, and all happenings.  Across the bridge to Convention Center and 15min walk to Ala Moana mall. Bus line is across the street. Studio is fully furnished - full size bed,TV, Wifi, mid size fridge, full bath, microwave, coffee maker, induction hot plate. Building has laundry, pool, jacuzzi and BBQ area; for additional fee you may use gym and parking ($25/24hrs in-out privileges)
space: Perfect location. Designed to be lived in on long term, this studio is suitable for long and short stays. Ocean view. Walking distance to the beach,  restaurants, shops, …
description: At beginning Waikiki, the tourist center of Honolulu, this charming studio is about 10min walking distance from the beach, and all happenings.  Across the bridge to Convention Center and 15min walk to Ala Moana mall. Bus line is across the street. Studio is fully furnished - full size bed,TV, Wifi, mid size fridge, full bath, microwave, coffee maker, induction hot plate. Building has laundry, pool, jacuzzi and BBQ area; for additional fee you may use gym and parking ($25/24hrs in-out privileges) Perfect location. Designed to be lived in on long term, this studio is suitable for long and short stays. Ocean view. Walking distance to the beach,  restaurants, shops, … Pool, hot tub, BBQ area, W+D in the building; for extra fee gym and parking ($25/24hrs in/out privileges). There is also a convenience store, food place, King's Pub, hair salon, and smart car rentals in the building. if not using self-checkin, at check-in to hand keys. Otherwise always accessible to answer questions. Studio i
neighborhood_overview: Studio is located at the edge of Waikiki, at the beginning of Kalakaua main strip. Waikiki is the place to be when in Honolulu - where restaurants, bars, shopping, nightlife is, and of course ..... the beach.
transit: In Waikiki the best way to get around is on foot. Buses run frequently and there is taxi, Uber, and shuttle services.
access: Pool, hot tub, BBQ area, W+D in the building; for extra fee gym and parking ($25/24hrs in/out privileges). There is also a convenience store, food place, King's Pub, hair salon, and smart car rentals in the building.
interaction: if not using self-checkin, at check-in to hand keys. Otherwise always accessible to answer questions.
house_rules: There will be a packet with house rules in the unit.  The rules are rather standard, asking residents not to create excessive noise, no illegal substances, no smoking, no pets, … Unit is not child-proved, nor is there an additional bed.

host.host_about: Love Hawaii!! Originally from Prague, Czech Republic.

reviews.comments: Great location! Dana was helpful and we had a wonderful stay.

Dana and her daughter were very professional and patient to check us in when our flight got delayed. They were there in person to make sure we had everything. The place is basic but comfortable, has a good air conditioner and is just a few of blocks away from the malls , beaches and the party spots. There is an extra charge for parking in the premises. We stayed there for one night before we took our flight had no complaints whatsoever.

It was an amazing experience staying at this apartment!
Great place, awesome location, easy to get to the beach, places to eat and shop.
Dana was very nice and helpful!
The place looks exactly as on the pictures!

Dana is a perfect host, she welcomed like we knew each other for a long time. The room was exactly like it was described in the listing, love it. The location is right around Waikiki beach and downtown, only a few blocks away from restaurants and shopping.
The parking is available inside the building at an extra cost of $20/for every 24 hours
The apartment was great, even better than the photos! Communication with Dana was swift and on point, we had a great experience. I'd definitely recommend this apartment to anyone in Waikikin!

Very good location close to restaurants, shopping and beaches. Dana welcomed us nicely. Pictures of the appartment are accurate. It´s really well decorated and organized. Please just note that there is no separation between the bathroom and the rest of the appartment. The parking lot for $20 per day is also very convenient as it´s not so easy to park the car downtown. I warmly recommend this place specially for the price!

Ho dana, thank you. Your place is sooo  cute. We did great. Loved the view from shower. Could've used another blanket...I'm sure that is not a common request!  It's been cold....take care maybe we c u again!

This was my first time using Airbnb and we had a wonderful experience! Dana was extremely easy to get in touch with and she responded to all of my questions and emails/texts immediately. She was readily available and worked with our changing schedule in a professional and kind matter. The room
Was absolutely adorable! It was so nicely decorated, and even more charming in person. The room has an ocean view and over looks the pool deck area. It was a very easy walk to the main shops and restaurants in Waikiki! On a side note, she provided towels and had a hair dryer available, as well as hand soap and shampoos, which was unexpected! The bed slept two people comfortably and she also had water in a filtered pitcher waiting for us. We couldn't have had a better experience, planning on returning in the future!

Dana's studio was a nice place to spend the night in town. All photos are accurate and it was clean and well equipped. As mentioned in a previous review, it is important to note the bathroom is not separate from the main room. This was not a problem for us, but could be for a couple whom may wish more bathroom privacy. All in all, we enjoyed our stay.  Dana was very sweet and responsive.

Great location set back from the beach. 5-10 minute walk to get to the sand on the beach.  Get the SpeediShuttle from the airport and they can drop you off and pick you up right at the door to the building.
Wailana Coffee House is on the same street on the way to the beach. Stop there for the "All you can eat pancakes" with 2 eggs and bacon. $6.80. Then go sleep off the pancakes on the beach. Best day ever.

Dana was great and easy to get a hold of once we landed. She met us out front of the building and showed us around the facility.  The apartment is super clean and has a fantastic cross breeze with the windows open. We would like to stay here again and will be telling our friends about it!

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in Waikiki. Dana's Apartment ist ideal gelegen. Man ist schnell zu Fuss am Strand und bei allen wichtigen Shops :-). Dana ist eine sehr aufgestellte und fröhliche Person. Sie hat uns herzlich begrüsst und war zu jedem Zeitpunkt erreichbar. Die Anreise war aus diesem Grund sehr unkompliziert. Das kleine Apartment ist sehr liebevoll und stilvoll eingerichtet. Es hat unsere Erwartungen voll erfüllt. Das Apartment war sehr sauber. Wir empfehlen es gerne weiter.

Everything was just like the picture. The apt. is small but very cute and very clean. 
The bed was comfortable but 2 more pillows would have been appreciated. 
The bath is semi-private and I might consider a curtain across that doorway. Shower is a little small for above average sized people. We didn't hear any neighbors. 
The building is a little tired, but that's not reflected in the condition of this apt. 
Plenty of housewares and small appliances. 
Location was close enough to the action in Waikiki to walk for those who are somewhat fit, but a very short cab ride. 
Dana was very pleasant and had good recommendation for places to eat. 
We only really slept there and it was just fine. We left satisfied.

Excellent location, Barbara, Dana's daughter met with us before our check in time and took care of us in a very efficient and professional manner.  The condo is honeymoon suite . Bathroom screen desirable . Will rent again.

Our experience was fantastic! Dana was easily accessible via phone, and met us in the lobby of the condominium with the key at a time that was most convenient to us. The apartment was spotless, and the view was incredible! The whole place looked even better than the photos suggested. Furthermore, the condo is within easy walking distance from the beach. All in all this was an outstanding experience and I would highly recommend it to anyone.

Danas Apartment war absolut fantastisch! Es ist genau wie auf den Bildern, sehr hübsch eingerichtet, mit Klimaanlage, sehr sauber, etwas klein, aber genau genügend Platz für ein paar Tage für ein bis zwei Personen in Waikiki. Zu beachten ist, dass das Bad/WC (rechts um die Ecke) keine Türe hat... Die Lage ist perfekt. Im Monarch (das Gebäude ist für jeden in Waikiki ein Begriff) gibt es ein tolles Kaffee für Frühstück, das Gebäude ist bewacht, hat einen Pool, BBQ und Jacuzzi zur Mitbenutzung, ein kleines Lädeli und Take Away. Sogar eine Bar im Untergeschoss, für die die nicht weit gehen wollen. Ansonsten ist eigentlich alles gleich um die Ecke (Einkaufszentrum, Restaurants, Hilton Village, Strand...) Man hat vom 12. Stock eine tolle Aussicht! Wir hatten mit Barbora zu tun, Danas Tochter, sie war sehr sehr nett, hat immer sofort auf alles geantwortet und uns warm empfangen. Besser könnte es nicht sein, wir würden sofort wieder dort hingehen!!!
Dana was great!  Communication clear and quick.  The place was clean, functional and cute.  We used the pool and hot tub.  Location was nice as we didn't have to walk far to eat or go to the beach.

We loved the large sink, the décor and the flooring were great.  This corner unit had a nice breeze so we didn't need to use the air conditioner.  Dana's daughter met us on time, and showed us the place.  She was very nice and always reachable. We loved our stay here!  Thank you Dana and her daughter!!

What a lovely room. Great location, great view, close enough to the water without being in the rat race. The room is exactly as described and the pictures do it perfect justice. It's cosy and homely, perfect for our one night stay, but wouldn't be unsuitable for a longer one.
Dana was great and very nice. Her place is very beautiful, we love the deco and it has a great view. The room is exactly as described, perfect for our one night stay.

The host met us at the property, showed us to the unit, and gave us information about parking. Being from Honolulu, I knew the area, and liked the neighborhood. The unit was as described. It would be great to add a divider for bathroom privacy. Had a great time!

Dana's studio was clean and convenient for our short stay, about a 15 minute walk to the shops and beach in Waikiki. Even with the $25 parking in the building, this studio was a good deal compared to the other options in the area. The apartment had a lot of kitchen amenities that would be great for a longer stay too - like a small fridge and freezer, microwave, toaster oven and large sink.

I love how cute this place is!  What you see on the pictures is exactly how it was!  Barb was very responsive when I had any questions about the place!  She even showed me the areas that had free parking.  Just pay attention to when you have to move your car before the tow away times.  Otherwise there is a cheap $18 parking lot across the street.  You are a close 3 blocks before the shopping area in downtown wakiki!
Dana was very welcoming.

The perfect tiny get away in Waikiki. Adorable (exactly as pictured) and close to everything.  It is small (not a lot of room for luggage), but it was absolutely perfect for our first 4 days of married life. 

The building has an amazing breakfast spot (The Cream Pot) and secure parking ($25 a day).

This place was great!  Adorably decorated and incredibly clean and has a great view of the city.  The room is a little on the small side but what it lacks in size it makes up for in location.  If you want to be in the middle of the city life of Waikiki this is it.  So many things in walking distance.  Dana was very nice and accommodating and made it a point to meet up with us and explain the ins and outs of staying on the property.

Dana was a great host, quick to get a hold of and very friendly. She accommodated my late check-in and gave me some pointers on things to do in Honolulu. The apartment is located at the western end of Waikiki, with the major attractions only a short walk or moped ride (highly recommended) away. Overall a great stay. Mahalo Dana!

We had a great time staying at Dana's apartment. It was central and walking distance to pretty much everything at Waikiki. The complex had all facilities you required. The apartment itself was beautiful to stay in with modern facilities. Would recommend others to stay here.

Dana was extremely flexible in meeting up with me on arrival. Her studio is very cute and well maintained. She is willing to give you local advice and be available if need be!!!! Parking is very secure as well. 

I would not linger in this hotel/condo; its best for a short stay.
The host was very helpful and met us to give us the keys and show us around. The apartment was very clean and in a great location.  I would definitely stay here again.

We arrived in Honolulu quite late, but that wasn't a problem for Barb, she welcomed us at the lobby, showed us around, and shared a lot of useful tips. The location is very convenient, the studio is tastefully renovated, everything was clean. We had a great stay!
Fantastic experience and the host was so nice to accommodate our early arrival. Everything was clean and prepared as advertised. A+ for the place and the host!

Dana was an incredible host! She was very easy to contact and was very warm and welcoming. Her place is amazing -- very unique and such an ideal location. Dana is very accommodating as well! I realized I left something in her apartment just as I locked the door behind me at check out, and she met me immediately so I could be let back in to retrieve my belongings. Would definitely stay here again!

Dana was an amazing host who was very accommodating with our travel plans in regards to when to meet up to receive the key to the studio. The room was exactly as described and it was perfect our one night stay :)

This listing is LEGIT.  the room looks exactly the way the pictures portray. it's very cute inside, and exactly what my husband and i needed for a couple of nights.  The A/C kept us cool as we slept.  Everything was clean, and we slept comfortably during the night.  

Dana was very sweet, responsive, and accommodating.  She met with us on time, gave a very clear description of how to find her, gave us our keys, walked us up to the room, and provided very clear/helpful instructions regarding parking.

This is a great deal in a convenient area. The building not amazing but the apartment is clean and comfortable and Dana is super sweet and easy to communicate with. Just a warning the bathroom is open so share with someone you are comfortable with.

Dana was very helpful with our stay. She was happy to meet at the apartment building at our convenience and show us the room. She got in contact with us prior to our arrival and let us know how to best get to her place. She also gave us advice on what to do and where to go while we were there!
Great location and lovely apartment. Dana was a fantastic host.

Dana was a great host. She was very nice about accommodating our vague schedule. The rental is pretty close to the heart of Waikiki. We were able to get around pretty easily by just walking, which was nice because parking in Waikiki can be a nightmare. Speaking of parking, Dana was very helpful in telling us where we could find it. The unit was exactly what we were looking for, a clean place to crash after a day out and about. The one quirk is that there is no actual door to the bathroom. Since I was staying there with my girlfriend, it was a tad awkward.

Overall, a great little spot to use as a home base if you're looking to check out Waikiki.

The studio looks exactly as shown in pictures! My boyfriend and I only only stayed for one night and it was perfect. The unit is located walking distance to basically anything that you need and we left our car in the 24hours ($25 with hotel key). The unit is very clean and cozy and has everything that you need. Also on the 6th floor we enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi! Cream pot located on ground level has great breakfast and brunch selections as well.
great location and nice Studio.

The host is very easy to get in touch with and flexible about picking up the keys.  The place is small but has all the amenities.  It is very clean and nice for 2 people.  There is no door on the bathroom as a heads up.  It is a very short walk to the beach and it is close to the main shopping area in Waikiki.  It is very close to the Hilton Hawaiian Village as a point of reference.  I would highly recommend this place.
The location was perfect. Only a short walk to the beach and to central Waikiki. The room had everything we needed and check in process was very easy.
Beautiful little studio and a great location!

Dana was out of town, so her daughter met me to give me the keys. She was very informative. 
The condo is in a great location. It's within walking distance to a lot of great places or a short Uber. 
The studio is clean and nicely decorated. I would definitely stay again.

The apartment was very clean and nicely decorated. Towels and shampoo were provided which was great. Being able to use the outdoor pool was an awesome bonus as well. Everything on the listing was accurately described and we would not hesitate to book with Dana again. We very much enjoyed our stay!
Perfect spot for 2 people! Everything was very clean and just as pictured. Check-in and communication was easy. The location is great for the beach, restaurants, bus lines, and the convention center.

This rooms and hosts are awesome!
Dena is so kind and funny:)
And the room is clean and good location.
We can't say anything with out good!!
I would like to stay again:)
Un super accueil et une tres grande disponibIlité de Dana. De bons conseils pour decouvrir Honolulu

Overall, it was a great cozy small studio with the enough amenities (bathroom essentials, beach towels, mini fridge for water, small A/C). Dana was great at accommodating a time to meet with us for the room key. We met in the afternoon once for the first day, then after coming back from Maui, we met her at 10PM. The building itself is old, but the room is in good shape. The distance is convenient for anything Waikiki. As for parking a car, good luck trying to find parking in this area, if you can't then you'll have to cough up $25 for a overnight car stay. Laundry is available in the building and there's a couple of bars downstairs. I recommend this place to anyone staying in Waikiki while saving some budget to allocate towards eating and activities.

Ottima, l'host ci ha attesi malgrado ci fossimo smarriti nel traffico e ci ha poi fornito tutte le info necessarie. Struttura essenziale (nel senso di monolocale con fornitura x colazione ma non adatto x predisporre pranzo/cena . Nel complesso, quello che serve per un breve soggiirno a Waikiki a un prezzo coerente. Grazie. Dana.
Dana was a great host! She was flexible with our late arrival time to help us check it. Great location and would recommend the spot to anyone

Host was great gave great directions and was eager to serve.  The loft was fully stocked.  Some things to know  Parking is FREE ON THE STREET. Be sure to move it early on weekdays before 8 am or you may get towed other wise garage parking is 25 bucks a night with room key (cash only)  Great pool close to many stores Laundry on site takes Debit card and people in building are super nice.

Wir haben es in Dana's Appartment sehr genossen. Dana hat uns herzlich empfangen und uns viele Entdeckungstipps zu Oahu gegeben -  vielen Dank nochmals!
Die gemütliche Wohnung war sehr sauber, hatte eine gute Klimaanlage, einige Geschirrsachen, Duschmittel und Dusch- sowie Strandtücher! Die Lage ist supergut und zum Gebäudekomplex gehörte sogar noch ein Swimmingpool und ein Jacuzzi!

This studio apartment looks exactly like in the pictures. Very spacious and has all the need necessities. Even though I didn't cook anything indoors there's a portable stove provided if I choose to. Dana was very kind. She showed me around and explained to me where everything is and what's good around the area. I had a wonderful first time and first day in Hawaii and wouldn't hesistate to book for her studio apartment again.

very central and nice/clean studio, where we loved to stay for our last night in Waikiki. Dana recommended us cool places to go and was always reachable when we had to change our check-in time. We would absolutely recommend her!

Dana was super responsive and a fantastic host.  She was able to meet us even when our flight was over an hour delayed and took the time to explain the lay of the land in Waikiki.  The only minor issue could be the lack of a bathroom door but the price and the location can't be beat

My fiancé and I had a great time staying at the Waikiki studio!  Dana was very accommodating as far as check in times, and made sure we had everything we needed in order to ensure a comfortable stay.  We really appreciated her clear and consistent communication via Airbnb and text message from booking to check out.  The studio's accommodations looked exactly like the Airbnb listing, and I was happy to find that the place was stocked with everything we might need -- there's practically a full kitchen of mini appliances in there!  The huge windows had a nice view of the ocean in the distance and allowed for an amazing cross breeze.  I think it was a heatwave when we were there, so the window AC unit was also much appreciated.  This was my first time staying in an Airbnb in Hawaii and certainly won't be my last!  I would be open to staying here again for sure.
Dana was so friendly.

This place has a great location close to Waikiki shops and restaurants. The room is a bit small but if you're going to be out and about it's not too big a deal. The views from the room are great! The room had everything we needed and we had a nice time!

We had a wonderful stay! Unit was about a 10 minute walk from Waikiki's main strip which was convenient. The front desk was very helpful with our touristy questions like bus services and destinations. Great location if you're going to Hanauma Bay as it is just blocks from the start of the #22 bus which takes you right there for $2.50! Dana was a great host. Super friendly, prompt,  answered all of our questions and made great recommendations. Studio is clean and has a laundry room in the building. Definitely sufficient for two people. Only thing that would have made it a perfect stay was how bright it got in the morning. For most people, that's a huge plus, and it is for us too... usually. But sometimes when you've been up for hours flying, you just want to crash and wake up on your own and without the help of the sun haha. But! That can be easily solved with a pair of those $3 eye cover things. But bring your own! I looked high and low all over Waikiki and couldn't find a pair! Bottom line, would stay here again and recommend. Convenient, clean, affordable and no frills, just the necessities.

This place was fantastic! Dana was a great host and was very accommodating when we had a flight delay. The room itself is well decorated and comfortable. It is conveniently located within walking distance of the beach and major shopping areas. The building is also home to several conveniences - there is a convenience store and a little Japanese restaurant that has decent snacks downstairs. There is also a fantastic breakfast restaurant called Cream Pot that is an absolute must try. Overall we had a great experience and were sad that our delayed flight left us with only one day to enjoy here.

Awesome one night stay! Communication with Dana was prompt and clear and check in/check out was a breeze. The pictures are are spot on - I really loved the care and detail taken furnishing this small space. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a great place with a central location. One thing I would mention as other reviews do not; there is no physical separation between the bathroom area and the rest of the space ie. no door. Not really an issue for showering etc., but going to the toilet  . . . you better really know your sleeping partner! Other than that, very accurate listing and we'll probably stay again :o)

This is a true gem in Honolulu! The apartment is beautifully updated, conveniently located, and there are so many perks - pool, hot tub, BBQs, convenience store, and gym. If you've stayed in Honolulu before, you know how rare that is. Dana was extremely helpful and easy to communicate with, and she made check in quick and easy. I will definitely be staying here again next time I'm traveling!
Dana was Very flexible to accommodate us and friendly. Great location very close to Waikiki strip and activities. Perfect space for the two of us.

Dana was great! She was responsive and attentive. She had great suggestions for the area that were very helpful. The location was amazing and had a great view! The open bathroom took me by surprise. Dana had both bath towels and beach/pool towels which was perfect! Overall loved the trip!
Great location and cute condo. Really close to shopping, restaurants, and the beach.

The host was great! She met us when we arrived, on schedule. She showed us the apartment and gave us great information about the best activities to do in the area. 

This apartment is exactly how it looks in the pictures, which we loved. The apartment is in the northwest end of Waikiki beach. It is within walking distance of the beach and tons of shopping and restaurants. The apartment can be a little loud due to outside noise but you have to expect that when you are in the city. 

Parking is available in the building but it is an additional cost. There is also credit card laundry available in the building.
Dana is very nice and friendly. The room location is great, it's fashion and clean. Strongly recommend!

Dana's place was very clean and located in a very convenient location in Waikiki. Although Dana was busy, her daughter Barb was able to meet with us and there were no issues at all during our meet up. The place has clean towels, bottles of water, and a variety of toiletries. Would highly recommend staying here!

Dana was a wonderful host! She was attentive and very flexible on a meeting time to exchange the keys.  When my key got deactivated, she was quick to respond and send an email to security to allow for me to reactivate it.  I enjoyed the studio and appreciated how clean it was.  My only feedback would be for the curtains to be wider and easier to pull so that I don't feel like people can see through the gaps.

My husband checked in and he states that she was nice and accommodating. The apartment fit the description and the neighborhood was nice. The only downside is that the apartment was in a building that was part hotel and private residence. When I arrived to the apartment , I was greeted by a strong stench of marijuana in the hallway which was an immediate turn off. The apartment itself was great, clean and just right for a short stay. It looked just like the photos and was within walking distance to stores and eateries.

I stayed at Dana's space with my husband for one night in October -- what a special find! 

The location is very central to shopping along Kalakaua and near to Ala Moana Center.  There is a great restaurant across the street called Cheeseburger Waikiki- we managed to hit both happy hours at 3pm and 9pm and had amazing service from Roman. There is also a smart car rental downstairs for $89/day (we didn't do it tho) and there is a 7/11 and ABC Mart downstairs also. So lots to do and many conveniences in the immediate building area.  Also a cute breakfast restaurant and some other sushi spots, etc... 

As for the space- her photos are true and accurate.  It is a good size, comparable to a hotel room.  My husband and I had plenty of room for our luggage and we were very comfortable. The space is clean and decorated with modern comforts.  There is a small fridge so if you are on an extended stay you could fit groceries. She also provides 2 bottles of water as a welcome.  I noticed a kettle, coffee maker, hot plate and some dishes. There is a microwave and toaster oven.  The bathroom is open concept (no door) so if you are traveling with someone, be sure you are comfortable with them! I loved the design.  There is an armoire for clothing and beach/pool towels and bath towels provided as well as extra blanket/linen.  There is also soap/shampoo/conditioner. The unit is run by a window AC unit.  Because of all the windows, it was quite warm during the day.  We opted to open the windows and the warm breeze felt amazing.  The bed is also very comfortable-- it is a real bed (not a futon or pull out).  There is also secure wifi.

The unit is within a hotel/condo high rise.  Laundry is available on the 5th floor but it is $$ and operates on c/c ($3.75/wash and $2.75/dry)
The pool and hot tub is lovely and there are BBQs available too.  Everyone in the building is super friendly.  The elevators are a bit slow but it seems to be a bit of an older building.  I noticed a fitness room and it seems things are slowly but surely being updated throughout the building. 
Don't be put off by the green walls of the building hallway or some of the smells. You get used to it and the unit is just such a gem! It is also super secure- we noticed security cameras everywhere, a key is needed to access the elevator and there is onsite security.  It's great to feel so safe. We loved it and would love to stay again! 

Thank you for a wonderful stay Dana, for being so easy to communicate with and for being so accommodating :)

Dana and Barb were very friendly. We did not get to meet Dana in person, but her daughter Barb gave us a very warm welcome. We arrived earlier and she gave us all relevant information in just a few minutes. The location is just amazing. Hopefully we can stay longer next time.

I stayed here for 5 nights during a conference with my husband and had a great time.  The location is very convenient, walking distance to the conference center, the mall, the beach, etc.  There's 24 hr security and a 7-11 as well as convenience stores just outside.  You can rent cars in the lobby.  The unit looks just like the pictures and is totally adorable.  As others have pointed out, there is no door for the toilet so make sure you're okay with that if you are staying with another person.  If you're showering at night, you may want to do it with the lights off (do-able) because there are gaps in the curtains and the windows are not reflective from the outside.  Keep the windows closed when you're out and about because the room can become rather warm in the afternoons (there's a window AC unit).  

Dana was very accessible, friendly, and helpful and I would gladly work with her again.
Perfect, quiet place with a wonderful view.  Very calming and inspiring space.  Immaculately clean and well-appointed.  Dana was an excellent and easy host.  Thanks so much!
Our host helped us with the arrival logistics and met us as discussed.  The apartment was simple and useful.

Great little place just off the resort strip of Waikiki.  Just a 5 minute walk down to the water.  I recommend trying the breakfast that is in the ground floor of the business.  I didn't even know it was there but wandered in and had a fantastic breakfast of souffléd pancakes, a new one for me.
Great location and the room was as described. Highly recommend.

Barb was an absolute joy to meet. She was very prompt in meeting at the lobby as instructed, and walked me to the studio to show me everything. The studio as presented in the description was precise! Very modern and clean. One drawback mostly due to the time of day we arrived was the room was stifling hot, but we opened the windows to air out prior to turning on the air conditioning. The bathroom does not have any doors so be cautious of you plan to share the room with anyone you're not that comfortable with.
Très beau studio, pratique et pas loin du centre! Parfait pour visiter Honolulu et Oahu!

I had a wonderful night at this beautiful studio, Dana was a nice and friendly person she recommended places to visit and I took some of her suggestions and had an awesome time. I will be coming back to Honolulu and booking my place through dana, she is a wonderful host!

Dana communicates well. Responds quick. She was informative about unit. Smooth and easy. The unit itself is cute with  very nice decor. All handmade by Dana herself. Unit has no door for bathroom or shower. And curtains all around room are thin. There is no door to divide shower and toilet. Parking not is not included but you're able to park in the hotel for $25/(website hidden) in unit but circulation isn't much. It gets really hot. Even with ac on. Hotel is convenient location. There is 7-11 and restaurants across the st as well as downstairs.

Perfect location, close to everything! Nice pool area. The one bedroom is cozy and comes with nice furniture. Keep in mind that you cant cook and there is no bathroom door! BUT we would def. stay again with Dana. She is really nice, uncomplicated and well organized.

We met Barbara, Sana's daughter. She was very helpful. The apartment is exactly as it was described, and shown in the photos. Clean and cozy. 
The location of the place is a bit far from the airport. However, it is in the center of the shopping and restaurant area. So, we love spending time there! Until see you next time Barbara, take care! Thank you!

Written by my sister, Maria, who stayed here: 
Dana was lovely and so was her cute shabby chic studio. Very clean and tidy and located in a very convenient location. Dana communicated very well with us and was there to greet us on arrival. I would highly recommend.
We loved the place! Super central and easy to get around. Dana was great and answered all our questions promptly. We will definitely be back!

Clean and cute little condo. 
Close to Ala Moana Mall and just a few blocks from the beach and Strip. 
We found parking within a block each night, but be prepared to move it early in the morning so you don't get a ticket. 
Or you can pay the 25 dollars at the parkade ( need condo key ). 
We drove around the island a lot, and it was a quick shot to the highway. 
It was perfect for a couple days stay. 
Nearby "Waikiki Brewery" attached to Cheeseburgers in Paradise was a life saver for low blood sugar after arriving. Didn't go back, but handy. 

Be warned, the lobby is home to a bar and lounge with some colourful characters (Which we didn't mind). But the condo is a cute oasis where you can't hear any of the music. 
Nice stay overall.

My mother stayed at Dana's place this week and we were there last week.  It is as you see in the pictures; clean, tidy, shabby chic studio.
It is very close to the shopping area and beach as well as the Convention Centre.  Dana was great with communication and even assisted my mum in getting her wifi set up :)
I would recommend and would stay here again.

Dana was very friendly and accommodated our special requests very well. We faced a delay due to which our flights had to be rescheduled and Dana was cool with checking us in later than anticipated. She was detailed and thorough in explaining the amenities of the apartment. 

I'd certainly recommend Dana's studio for anyone visiting Honolulu.

We had a quick stay in Hawaii, and this unit was perfect for us. Dana was very communicative and met us there when we arrived. It was extremely clean, nice location, and had the essentials - air conditioning, comfy bed, and wifi. There are several places to eat nearby and the beach is just a short stroll away. We would definitely stay here again.

Dana was great! The room is exactly how it is pictured and Dana was very welcoming and helpful with all the questions we had. The apartment was in a good neighbourhood, very convenient as it was in walking distance from Ala Moana and the main strip of Waikiki. It also had all the amenities we wanted and more! The wifi was great as well, it was very fast and could be reached everywhere around the room. Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again!

Dana was very nice and the studio had everything that she described. I really liked the pool area which includes a couple of propane grills. I prepared a couple of steaks on those and had a really good time.

Cellphone reception in the lobby/building was a problem.  It created a communication problem.   We ended up waiting an hour in the lobby for Dana to return.   No fault of hers. 

Condo was cute, clean and VERY warm.  Owner(s) could SAVE money on their electric bill and make their renters comfortable if they would change the curtains to sun-blocking/energy saving curtains/blinds.   There would be no need to run the window air conditioner an extended length of time.
Dana promptly welcomed me and kindly answered my important questions such as where to get a good plate of ribs. Studio is clean and had everything I needed for a quick one night stop over.
Another smooth and easy stay in Waikiki. Clean room and easy walk to the strip/beach
Great experience with Dana! She met me as scheduled and received the key. No problems at all!
Great location, clean unit. Very nice host.
Dana and her daughter Barb were very helpful and accomodating. It was a short 15 min walk to the beach and it was very clean. Very good hosts and I would recommend!
I had a perfect one nite stay at Dana's studio! Clean and convenient in an excellent location, her place is exactly as pictured. I arrived a little early and Dana was gracious and accommodating.
Good place.
Dana was a great host, and the location was good. The apartment was within walking distance to most places.

Dana was a great hostess--she was very flexible in meeting us and helpful with info about the neighborhood.  The apartment was as advertised and very clean and well-equipped, in a nice building and a  convenient area.  We would stay there again if in Honolulu.  Only one drawback--free parking is difficult.

Dana was very welcoming and communicated well in advance of arrival. She accommodated our arrival time to Honolulu and met us at the apartment right away.

The studio is very dashing and I'm glad we got to stay there during our trip. It is conveniently located within ~10 minutes walking distance to Waikiki beach and less than that to some pretty good food options. 

We found some awesome food trucks nearby the beach too!
Dana was a great communicator and after waiting for me, answered all my questions and had me comfortably settled in her great apartment in no time. Thank you

Dana was very welcoming and easy to get in touch with! She answered any questions we had and was very prompt. The room was everything we expected. It was clean and nicely decorated. It was our first Airbnb experience and it turned out great. It does get pretty warm in the room since it's a corner unit, but luckily there's air conditioning.

Dana and Barb were amazing hosts. Let us check in a little early and were super friendly and helpful. The unit is nicely decorated and in a good spot a little out of the craziness of waikiki. 
The pool was nice to have and it was close to good spits to eat.
Only negatives were the lack of door to the toilet in the small studio. 
Also the corridor leading to the unit stinks of cigarette smoke, can't smell it in the unit but waiting for the lift is sickening.
Other than that awesome spot,  thanks for having us

Dana was very nice and extremely accommodating. She worked with our schedule to meet and get checked-in and provided us information on  where we could go. The place is lovely and charming, and clean! we loved the extra towels and the air conditioner was very welcome after a long hot day at the beach. The room is warm since it is a corner room but it suited us fine. We walked pretty much everywhere and it was conveniently located. We would rent from Dana again.

The place was as advertised. Great location, clean and surprisingly nice view of the ocean and city. Keep the air on during the day, while the curtains are drawn and you will be fine with the afternoon sun. Dana was a pleasure to work with!
Nice view, Kind host, clean room and Wikiki.
Dana is very kind and well communicated. The room is clean.
We needed a last-minute place to stay for an extra night on Oahu and Dana got back to us the same evening! The place was great, would stay here again.

Dana was very helpful with her communication and checking in. The information on the website is accurate.
It was a comfortable and clean place to stay within walking distance to most places. The free wifi was excellent.

Dana was awesome to deal with! Very responsive to messages and was flexible with our check in time. She even went over and above to send us information about restaurants, entertainment and sightseeing. The room was clean and exactly like the photos. I'm really glad we booked it.

Dana was absolutely lovely and incredibly helpful. The studio is exactly as pictured - just a couple small things to be aware of: if privacy is something you are sensitive to, there is no bathroom door. Also the curtains are pretty, but thin, so if light is somethinf you have a hard time sleeping though, bring a sleep mask. The building the studio is in is a bit old And outdated, but the 24 hour security was very nice to have. It is about a 20 min walk to Waikiki beach and about a ten dollar cab ride. Thank you Dana for opening the studio up to us and putting up with all my questions!

Dana has this amazing studio near Waikiki beach. The room is romantically decorated, with two facades of large windows overlooking the Waikiki Bay Area. There's a pool in the building but I haven't tried it out, looks like a clean and nice pool, plus a jacuzzi:) Dana is also a friendly host and she is very helpful. Thank you Dana!
Dana was really friendly and her suite was really clean. Close enough to the strip and beach if you don't mind a 10 min walk. We'd recommend it to anybody.

Lovely little place, perfect for a few nights in a great central location. Dana was very friendly, and was super flexible in meeting me to give me the key, even when I arrived very late. Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a great deal in Honolulu.

Dana was accommodating to our schedule and was on time to let us in to the condo and show us around, despite us getting caught up in traffic and being late.  She was very nice and understanding, which made the experience less stressful.

The studio was nicely furnished and in a great location.  Everything was very clean and in working order.  The front desk checked people coming in once it got later in the evening, which was an encouraging security-wise.  We definitely enjoyed our stay.  

I'm not sure if I just didn't notice or what (and this is not a complaint), but as an FYI, there's really just a divider between the toilet/shower area and the studio.  No actual door.  So be comfortable with your partner.  ;)  Also, there are a lot of windows and the curtain panels, while lovely, were a little sparse, especially with other buildings nearby.  One more panel per area would have been nice for privacy's sake.

Got to Hawaii a day before the rest of my family so we needed a place to stay for one night. Dana's place was perfect. It is the cutest little space right within walking distance of all the best things in Waikiki. Dana was a great host and was very flexible with meeting at check-in to show us the room and give us some suggestions on what to check out in the area. Would definitely stay again. Thanks Dana!
Great neighborhood! Host Dana was friendly and showed us around the building when we arrived. Place was clean and comfortable! Very nice views and central.. Walking distance to Waikiki.

We enjoyed our stay at Dana's! Good location (walked to everywhere in Waikiki from there), nicely fitted out. Other reviews match our thoughts also. Dana was easy and efficient with contact. Thanks for hosting us!

Dana is great.
This apartment is beautiful.
We used it by a honeymoon.
It became the very good trip.
房源描述准确,街区繁华处市中心
We had a lovely experience staying here; the place catered to all our needs and the location was close to many services. Thanks for having us!
Very welcoming host with a comfortable room. Staff on site was accommodating and destination was great!

Dana was an amazing host. She responded to all our requests promptly. She made sure to arrange a time to hand over the keys when it was convenient for us. Overall, it was a very pleasant experience. The studio is beautiful! Newly renovated and lots of natural light. As others have said, there is no door separating the living space from the bathroom so if you're sharing this unit with someone, make sure you are very comfortable with each other. The location is great as well, about a 15 minute walk to the beach. A few restaurants and a microbrewery are nearby. I cannot say enough good things about Dana and her studio. Thank you for making our stay so wonderful. We will definitely recommend this listing to our friends.

Dana's studio was absolutely lovely! She was also very accommodating and friendly. No problems at all with meeting up, booking, check in/check out, etc. The location was perfect if you like to be in the middle of all the action. Very close to Waikiki beach, restaurants, shopping, and other activities. Would definitely recommend the Cream Pot  (I believe it's called) for an amazing breakfast which is in the lobby, right next to the elevators. The studio itself was perfect for 2. Very clean, beautifully decorated, A/C, wifi, beautiful views. The bathroom doesn't have a door but is behind a wall so you still have privacy. I would totally recommend this place to anyone and would love to stay here again!

Dana was incredible. So easy to communicate with and was super easy to meet up and get the key. The studio is adorable and everything ud need. Great location and we found lots of yummy food near by. Loved it!
Great stay! Thanks for the last minute accommodations! Very responsive for any issues and flexible for arrival times.

Staying at Dana's AirBnb was a lovely experience from start to finish!  We found ourselves in Oah'u for an extra night due to flight changes and Dana was so kindly able to accommodate our last minute booking.  The apartment is in a fabulous central location close to Wakiki, and we could walk to many fun bars and restaurants.  The space itself is beautiful and cozy-- with a great view!  Definitely hope to stay here again on our next visit to HI :-)

Dana's space was great! Open and bright and just what I needed for an evening in Hawaii. A good location that is far enough away from the busy areas of town, but close enough to walk there if you wanted to. Dana herself was such a pleasure to meet and connect with! She was SUPER flexible, hospitable and accommodating to my schedule. She was very kind and helpful. I would definitely recommend staying here or any place hosted by Dana!

Dana was lovely and helpful. The apartment is adorable and stocked with just about everything you'd need for a short to medium term stay. It's close to shopping, entertainment, bars, restaurants, and the beach. I highly recommend. If I had stayed longer, I would have liked to experience the nightlife at nearby clubs and bars.

Dana was wonderful to work with, very communicative and easy to get a hold of. She even came to meet us at Diamond Head when we mistakenly didn't give ourselves enough time to hike it & get to the studio for check in! The place was clean & walking distance to the beach. As other reviews have said there is no real door to the bathroom just a dividing wall so be comfortable with who you are staying with. There's a pool & hot tub in the building, very nice. Thanks Dana!!

Dana nous a bien reçu et nous a donné de bons conseils. 
La remise des clés s'est faite facilement.
Le logement était propre et fidèle aux photos.
Il y a des stationnements dans la rue à proximité (gratuit).

Dana personally welcomed us and showed us the room. The place is as described in the listing. The location is good - a close walk to Waikiki. The eatery Burgers & Sushi on the main floor of the building is great!
My experience was excellent. Dana was readily available. The location is super close to everything! I would recommend this to anyone!

The host is very welcoming & the place is nice & clean!
Love the decoration & brightness of the space~

Dana was great. My husband and I missed our flight to HNL so we asked Dana if she could accommodate a very late check in and she agreed right away. We arrived at around 11pm and she was there waiting for us. She gave us great recommendations to visit and was very helpful. 

Her place itself is small yet clean, cute, and has everything you need (washroom, small kitchen appliances, bed, tv with cable, wifi). 

Location was great. Walking distance to ABC store, Seven Eleven, Waikiki beach, etc. 

Thanks for making our very diary visit to Hawaii a great one Dana!
Dana was very welcoming and met us there on time! The studio is sweet, simple and small! Perfect!

My husband and I stayed in Dana's studio for one night, before flying off to Maui. Dana was quick to respond to all my questions, she was able to have us check in a bit earlier than standard check in time which was great! The studio is nicely decorated, cosy and clean! Close to everything you need, ABC stores, restaurants, bars, etc. I would definitely recommend this studio for anyone thinking of staying in Honolulu!
Dana's studio was perfect. Walking distance to all the restaurants in Waikiki and a short walk to the Ala Moana shopping center. Would recommend her studio to anyone!

We stayed at Dana's for one night and we really enjoyed her cozy studio! The place was clean and had everything we needed, and Dana was very nice and responsive. Would gladly stay at her place again next time we are in Waikiki.

We just stay at this condo for 1 night but we would like to stay more. Just good things to say about our experience. 
The location is perfect, the apartment is clean and comfortable and Dana was an excellent host. Very nice decorated and super clean :)

Dana was a wonderful host - extremely responsive, friendly and helpful. She gave us great food recommendations ahead of our trip and shared even more when we arrived - many of which we tried and loved. The studio itself is exactly as pictured/described. Beautifully decorated and with an amazing view, but the best part is the location right in Waikiki, walking distance to everything. Highly recommend this (or any of Dana's) properties and we look forward to visiting again soon! Thanks Dana!
Dana was a great host and made us feel very welcome when we arrived. The studio was nice and tidy and in a great location. We really enjoyed our stay in Waikiki and would return again in the future.
Dana was a great host and very welcoming when we arrived. The studio was very clean and and in a great location. We enjoyed our stay very much!!!

This was exactly as advertised -- very clean, great view, cozy and intimate yet right in the heart of Waikiki with easy walking access to everything. Dana was very flexible with us about our arrival time (we were flying in that day) and met us right in front of the building with only about 15 minutes' notice as we were arriving from the hotel. This place is nicer than any of the hotels in the area would be, much more personable and more affordable, plus you're basically in a hotel building so you have access to great amenities such as the pool deck. Dana was very attentive and responsive throughout the reservation process, on arrival day, and when we checked out. Couldn't have been easier. I would recommend this as a great jumping-off point to explore Waikiki and Pearl Harbor (PH is not walking distance, but there is public transportation, Uber, taxis, etc. for pretty cheap). Thanks Dana!

Thumbs Up and ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Great location, close to everything and views of Waikikiacross the gardens. 
Clean, well equipped and tastefully quirky decor and lots of light. 
Definitely recommend this great little apartment and would stay there again.
Mahalo to Dana for having us

The apartment is like shown in the pictures. It's a super lovely and clean place. Big bed very nice to sleep in. Dana is super friendly and  very helpful! She gave me a detailed introduction about Honolulu and what to do where to eat etc. Next time I choose her place again for sure. Best Airbnb experience in Honolulu for me!

First of all, she is very helpful. We arrived not really knowing where to park, and somehow she spotted us in the car and handed us the room key and gave us directions on where to go. The apartment is nice and quaint, and looks very well upgraded compared to the rest of the building. This place satisfied all of our needs and we would likely book this apartment again.

We had a great experience in Dana's studio. It is so close to everywhere in the city that we could walk to everywhere in Honolulu.We could also see the ocean from the studio window.

Dana allows us a great stay! Recommend everyone to check this studio out!
Dana was great and was really helpful. Lovely apartment and great location.

This studio was beautiful! Great location, wonderfully decorated, and incredibly comfortable bed! Dana was a super host. Very willing to help while also being sure not to "overstep." It was a wonderful 36 hour layover in Honolulu thanks to this beautiful place!
We can recommend this listing. It is centrally located, just a short walk from Waikiki. The studio is clean and nicely furnished. Reception was very smooth and easy.

Dana was a great host. She was very easy to communicate with and very flexible with check-in and check-out. The place is beautiful just like the pictures. We had access to the pool, so that was great! It can get a little warm and sticky in there because the AC is not very strong, but with the windows open it was ok. Overall it was a nice, comfortable place and I would definitely stay there again.
Dana was a great host! The place was nicely designed and had all the things we needed. Would highly recommend this place and host. Thankyou Dana for everything xxx

We only stayed for 1 night. The room had everything it needed to have. The bed and its sheets were quite comfortable. Dana was really sweet and easy-going. She recommended us to go to Duke's for "the hula" dessert where we spent our last memorable evening. Her place was just as described and located at a very convenient spot where verything was within walkable distance. Highly recommended.
Nice place.  Connected to a hotel.

Dana hat uns persönlich begrüßt und alles ausreichend erklärt. Die Wohnung entsprach zu 100 % der Beschreibung. Alles war sehr sauber und hat super frisch gerochen. Sie war jederzeit für uns erreichbar und super sympathisch. Die Wohnung ist als Ausgangspunkt für sämtliche Aktivitäten ideal.
It's a very convenient studio apartment a short walk from Waikiki. It had all that we needed, and we'd recommend this place to others.

This is a very cozy and comfortable studio with a great view! It has plenty of storage space and feels roomy. Dana met us downstairs, walked us up to the apartment, and explained the keycard and hotel amenities. 

This was a sweet space to relax in after a long day of snorkeling, hiking etc.
Great stay! Excellent location. The host was great with communicating and made check in and out very easy

We booked the studio twice during our trip to Hawaii, staying 3 nights in total and it really was perfect for our needs. The studio is compact but well designed, and the white walls make it feel fresh. The studio also smells nice when you walk in, and was always extremely clean.  It's about a 15 min walk to the beach and restaurants although there's a fantastic bar and a couple of great restaurants right across the road. Easy access to the airport too.

Dana was a great host, she met us upon arrival to show us the space and provide our key. She space is very basic but does have the essentials. The fact that the bathroom doesn't have a door was fine for 1 night but I couldn't imagine sharing that space for too much longer than that without any privacy.  Also, the curtains cover all windows but they are sheer so a lot of light comes through in the morning. The location is decent in Waikiki, probably a 10-15 minute walk from the main strip. We ended up renting a scooter for a day to easily get around and see the sites since we had such limited time in Honolulu.

We loved this little studio apartment! It was perfect for seeing Waikiki and easily in just as good of a location as any of the Waikiki hotels that are not right on the beach. Dana is incredibly kind and will go out of her way to help you with whatever you need. I highly recommend booking here if you are looking for a less expensive trip to Waikiki or honolulu in general.

Dana's aribnb was pleasant for our our 4 night stay. The building itself is both a hotel and condo so you'll see a mix of people. For the fee of $5 I was able to use the gym for all the days I was there. Parking was a bit of a hassle because the garage was $25/per 24 hrs or street parking where you would have to circle around the block a couple times and get up early the next day to pay for parking. Regardless it was like this at most hotels. The a/c blew cold and the room has everything we needed. The location was a 15min walk/7min drive to Waikiki beach and less than 10min to the mall. There are a lot of delicious restaurants nearby that are within walking distance and opened late. We would definitely stay again when we visit Honolulu in the future.
Lovely place, great location, and awesome host. Would definitely stay again
Host was very welcoming and accommodating. Place was clean and at a convenient location.  We could walk to many of the  places we needed to go for the weekend we were there.
Great apartment right in the centre of the city. Clean and well fit out. Thanks for an easy stay!
Dana picked us up at the lobby of the Monarch Building and showed us her condo on the 12th floor. She was very kind and gave us great advices for our trip on Oahu. Thanks for that

The host Dana is very nice and helpful. She provided plenty of great information about places to eat and hangout. 

The location is great and is very close to Ala Moana shopping mall and Kalakaua Ave where the main road of Waikiki is. 

The place is clean and the bed is quite comfortable however bedsheets a little bit worn out. 

The unit has an air conditioner which helped us slept through the summer nights. 

Thanks Dana for letting us stay at your place.

Dana was a great communicator and we didn't have any issues coordinating our keys handoff.   Her place was wonderfully located in the heart of Waikiki and it was also incredibly clean and spacious.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for the perfect studio to stay during their short stay in Honolulu.
Awesome. We loved looking out the windows that wrapped the room.

Loved the location. Walking distance to the beach and all the shopping areas and restaurants. Room was really clean and had everything you needed. Dana was really sweet and responded quickly anytime I had questions about anything. We were there for a week and would definitely book again if I come back to Waikiki.

This place is great! Dana did a wonderful job with communication. It is as posted - the pictures did a good job portraying everything and we were super tired when we arrived late so we didn't realize there were blinds as well as curtains (embarrassing)

Dona was very friendly and gave clear instructions. Her place is amazing!!  It is close to many shops and restaurants. Its next to the canal.  The apartment have gym and swimming pool. The apartment itself is very cute and homey. It was a pleasant stay!! Will definitely book this place again! Strongly recommend this place!!

We only stayed for one night but we had a pleasant stay in the small but cozy, and well-placed apartment. Dana was super helpful and present to answer all questions and everything went as smoothly as could be. 

One suggestion I would make is to install some kind of curtain or screen to separate off the toilet area, to give people a little more privacy in there.

It was a nice meeting with Dana. She was very nice and inviting, the advice she provided me was very helpful since I've never been to Waikiki. 

There was so much do in Honolulu I never got a chance to enjoy the pool/hot tub.
Wonderful host, place just as described in pictures, very charming. Excellent value in Waikiki!

I can recommed this studio for other passengers. 
the location is good, and the atmosphere of the room is nice.
Quick response, the attentive message, the owner of this hotel contacted me appropriately.

I could spend great time in Hawaii.
Thank you!!

Dana is a wonderful host! She really went above and beyond to ensure my  arrival was convenient and comfortable. The place is just as described and I had hero complaints. From the beautiful sunrise to the comfy bed and convenient location - I was in heaven. I will definitely try staying at her place next time I'm in Waikiki.
Used this as a home base for visiting Waikiki and Honolulu & Oahu in general. Great location and good amenities.
Great space. Good location walking distance to a lot of restaurants and shopping
Condo was nice and close to the beach, shopping etc... Dana was very accommodating as well. Would definitely stay again!

Das Appartment ist wirklich super schön und ausgestattet mit allem was man braucht: Strandtücher, Sonnencreme, Shampoo und Conditioner, etc.
Dana ist sehr nett und antwortet immer sofort auf alle Frage. Danke!

We had a lovely few days in Dana's apartment. The place was just as described and in walking distance to many great places. Dana was the perfect host and made us feel welcome from day one. Communication and directions were spot on! We would definitely recommend Diana's place!
Good

We had a nice one night stay at Dana's studio apartment. It was very small but was kept clean and was walking distance to the heart of Waikiki. Just know that there is no wall or door dividing the main area from the bathroom.

Dana was a great host :) Along with sending a welcome note right after I booked with her, she also sent a message a couple days prior to my trip to provide additional check-in details. The studio was so pretty and quaint, my boyfriend and I loved it! It's even prettier than the pictures :) The location is also so great, just walking distance from Waikiki beach and all of the main city attractions in Honolulu. Would definitely recommend staying here and booking with Dana :)

Dana was fantastic! She was kind and flexible, and very communicative about check in and check out, expectations, etc. It was very smooth and easy to get settled, and the place is clean and bright and beautiful. The location and value cannot be beat in Waikiki. Thanks so much!

Dana was a lovely host, very thoughtful! The apartment was very clean and in a great central location in Waikiki with access to public transport and a lot of shops and restaurants around. We would come back any time!
Cute little appartment, convenient and Dana was very accommodating of our early check in.
This place is perfect for acting like a local in a very busy place! Its low-key and nearby! Loved it!
Awesome location! Clean and convenient to get to Waikiki. Bathroom has no door, so make sure you're comfortable with the other person you're staying with! ;-)
Close access to main areas in honolulu. Stayed for one night..would stay again

Dana's apartment is well located for walking to the Waikiki beachfront and the shopping district.
The apartment was very clean & the decor is lovely. She is a very quick communicator & lovely to deal with.
We recommend Dana's place!

Es war ein schöner Aufenthalt.
Das Apartment hat eine gute Lage. Zum Waikiki sind es zu Fuß etwa 10 Miniten
We had a great stay at Dana's. The unit is bright, airy, and a 10 minute walk from everything in Waikiki. Great views of the ocean, too. We would definitely stay again.

Dana is a great host, I haven't met her in person, but her messages were very friendly and she responds very fast to any questions.
The room is clean and everything you need is there. I would personally like to have a bit more privacy, haha there are windows all around, but I think that is personal :)
Only little minus is the airconditioning, the works well, but is very loud!
further more, I would definitely recommend this place!
Such a cute location! Walking distance to the beach and shopping. Had a wonderful visit. Thank you!

Dana was very thorough with instructions and communication as to what to do when we arrived. Very helpful when we arrived a little early. The apartment is at the very beginning of Waikiki, so if you want a chiller place away from the crazy hustle and bustle, but still want easy access, this is the place for you.

I booked last minute and was able to be in contact as well as even check in early! Such a cute updated living quarters I wish I could've booked it longer! Thanks so much! PS: left a few items in room and Barbora/Dana had them waiting for me in security. So thoughtful.
The place is great! Super close to everything! Dana was wonderful. Everything was as expected from the pics.

Awesome room - recently updated. Location is close to everything: Waikiki, Downtown Honolulu and Chinatown. Check in and check out process was a breeze. The host was great to work with. Would recommend and return.
Good
Excellent place, with easy walking distance to all attractions (beach and shops!)  It was great to have onsite parking(paid)  at this location which made our stay /parking very convenient.
Amazing place with a great view. Everything was walking distance.
Really enjoyed my stay at Dana's place! Great location!! The room was soo cosy!! Just loved everything in the room! Easy check-in and out! Definitely coming back ;)

Es war ein toller Aufenthalt in diesem schönen, gemütlichen Studio. Die kleine Wohnung/Zimmer war perfekt ausgestattet und liebevoll eingerichtet.
Die Lage war toll und man konnte die Fußgängerzone und den Waikiki Strand super zu Fuß erreichen. Swimmingpool ist in dem Gebäude auch vorhanden. Die Kommunikation hat wirklich ganz toll mit Dana geklappt. Eine kleine Kritik habe ich, aber das betrifft eher das Gebäude. Das Hotel ist schon recht alt, daher auch die Fenster und man merkt es vor allem nachts, da wird es etwas lauter. Die Wohnung macht es aber auf jeden Fall wieder wett. Vielen Dank Dana!

Dana's place is perfect for a person or couple staying in Honolulu. My husband and I stayed in the studio for a quick overnight in the city and really enjoyed this place. It was super cute with a great view, very clean, and well laid out for the size of the space. The bed was also incredibly comfortable!

The check in process was easy and painless, and the security office allowed us to store our bags with them for a small fee. This was really convenient for us, as we landed early in the morning.

The building is a quick walk from all the restaurants and attractions in Waikiki and there is plenty to do within a 10 minute walking radius. We enjoyed our stay in Dana's studio and recommend it for a trip to Waikiki.

Dana is an absolute gem to work with.  She was very detailed and available to answer any questions we had.  Clean apartment located centrally to lots of places to eat and everything else you could need.

Nous avons été bien renseigné par dana avant notre arrivee. Elle a su repondre rapidement aux questions que je lui ai envoye via airbnb.
Le logement est bien situé et en prime très agreable.
Tout c'est tres bien  passé, je le recommande.

Great service;)
Perfect communication with Dana :)
The unit was provided with everything that we needed:)
Very clean,very good access to the beach:)
Nice pool, nice jacuzzi!:)
I highly recommend!!!

Overall a cozy stay! The apartment is clean and spotless. It is a small place but is a great value for money with the prices of Waikiki. I guess in Oahu you will be outside all day doing stuff any way! The owner was very friendly and helpful as well. Parking is $25 per day but except the first night, I did find parking on the street nearby for free after a little bit of search.
Great central location to so many restaurants! Well stocked amenities. So comfortable and clean and cute!

Dana let us check in as soon as the room was available which was great. Comfortable room, water was turned off in the whole building in the morning through til midday though so we couldnt have a shower.

Dana is a great host. Very responsible and fast response. She made everything so easy for us. Even though the room is not very easy to locate. Dana did her best to direct us to the right place. The place is 25mins walking distance to Waikiki beach. It's small but very clean and private. If you are looking for a place that is just for yourselves, have high sanitary standard, but on a budget and don't mind walking a bit, then it's a great choice for you.
Super cute place and great location. Host was very communicative and helpful. Thank you!
地理位置优越,购物生活都十分便利｡

Excellent place to stay, close to everything!
Dana is very easy to communicate with.
Great place to stay. It was neat and tidy, and great location. Highly recommended.
I like dana's place

Great place, nicely decorated as shown in the pic.

The floor was a bit greasy, but other than that the studio was great. As described though I think the curtains could be a little longer on the ends as some folks from other buildings could peer inside the cracks. The bathroom didn't have the most privacy either but it was still very nice.

The communication was great -- Dana was available by phone quickly as well. 

I liked that it was quiet and private, too!
Communication with host was good and check-in was easy. Apartment was as described and within walking distance to many shops and restaurants.

Centrally located in busy, hopping Waikiki beach. Great location within walking distance to everything, close to restaurants, coffee shops and shopping. The studio space is exactly as described, very clean and neat with nice views of the city and coastline. It's a corner condo so there is nice cross-ventilation. The bed was comfortable, good water pressure in the shower and nice amenities overall. We would highly recommend!
Everything was perfect ...!!!
This place is awesome, I love how full of windows it is! And the burger place down the street is amazing, I would check it out!
The location is very good. Walking distance (half mile) to restaurants and the beach. So we didn't rent a car, enjoyed stay and explored around the downtown area.
Great place for 1-2 people wanting to stay in Waikiki for a price you can't beat. Dana was very understanding with my arrival times. Communication with her was no problem.

Dana's place was very conveniently located for my overnight stay. Wasn't super far from the airport and only took around 15 minutes to walk to Ala Moana Center which was great for a lot of shopping. Up until check in, she kept in constant contact to make sure things ran smoothly and never hesitated with any questions I had. The apartment does get slightly warm when the curtains aren't drawn but nothing the air conditioning couldn't fix. Even though I didn't get the chance to meet her, thanks for the awesome stay!

Dana is so nice that give very detailed information before we checked in. The studio has a great view and also offers a pool and BBQ facilities in the building. Really nice experience during the two days rental. We also had a BBQ dinner! Great trip!

Great price for a place located so close to all the action. We walked the entire stay to everywhere, especially the beach near the Hilton. Just a note, only a good place to stay with someone you're really comfortable with as there's no door on the bathroom.

Beautiful home! Great location! Communication with host was good and check-in was easy.
Parking was not very convenient though. Paid $25 for 24hr.

The location was close to Waikiki beach. Within the walk was shopping and a diverse selection of restaurant options. Diana answered many of our questions promptly after we contacted her. I enjoyed the stay.

This was a great place for a great price! The pictures show exactly what you get. It is located near a lot of restaurants and shops and is walking distance to shopping, resturants, nightlife, and the beach! Response time was great whenever we had a question. We would highly recommend her place!

Danas place was cute and looked just like the pictures. Spent two days for my husbands birthday and had a wonderful time. Was able to reach Dana by text and she even recommended places to eat. Would stay again.

Dana's apartment is lovely. The views are great and everything you need is within walking distance, including the beach! Uber can get you to anywhere else in Waikiki for under $10. The apartment is in an older hi-rise building but once you're inside it's a beautifully decorated modern oasis. We really loved it and because the price was so much cheaper thean the big resorts, we stayed an extra day. We will be back!

Dana's property was very nice and located in a very busy and convenient location. The condo is very small and it must be noted that there is no door on the bathroom, although there is a short wall separating it from the rest of the living area. There is a nice local bar in the basement and a nice takeout restaurant off of the lobby.  We would definitely stay here again.

We stayed at Dana's place for the last leg of our trip. It was perfect for my partner and I - clean, great location & good value. Would highly recommend and will definitely stay here again if we were to come back. Thanks again for having us Dana!
This place was perfect for us! The studio was super clean and tastefully designed. Dana was so nice and easy to communicate with. I highly recommend staying here!
Great location for a great price, room was just as Dana described!

Dana's was a great base to explore Waikiki. everything is very walkable from there. The building is an older one but the space has be updated and very modern. Her instructions were very clear and prompt. Everything was exactly as described. recommended as a great place to be in Waikiki but at a fraction of the cost of a big hotel on the beach.
