Great location, super convenient.  We were able to rent a SmartCar from the shop located in the same building!  The view is great, and considering its central location to the city, it is surprisingly quiet.  Dana was super helpful and very responsive.
good location, smooth and fast check in and out, easy communication with host!
Enjoyed our stay, room was clean and tidy. Air conditioning was a welcome perk. Nice view and conveniently located near shopping and restaurants.
Nice unit in a hotel in a quiet part of Waikiki with a lovely restaurant next door for breakfast. Close enough to beach and downtown Waikiki. Can park overnight for $25/day with proof of room key.
Place is great! Location is perfect as it is an easy walk to anything you need to see/do in Honolulu. I'd highly recommend staying here to anyone!

Good place to stay, within walking distance of the beach and on bus lines. Building was older, but this unit is clean. Lots of windows for ample light, but I ended up drawing the curtains closed most of the time to get some privacy. Good value.
Lovely space! Convenient & comfortable. Dana was so incredibly helpful, so much good information that made our stay that much easier.

This place is all about location. It’s minutes from the beach and a short walk to Waikiki or Ft DeRussy beach, or easy bus ride to further sights (e.g., Iolani Palace, Diamonds Head).  As a bachelor suite, the room itself was the perfect size for a couple looking to explore Honolulu. Inside, the décor is pretty and modern and makes a nice private place to relax after a long day of adventure.  Though we didn't get a chance to use the pool (we were too busy exploring Honolulu), it looked well maintained and like a great place to relax.  Outside, the building itself, which is both a hotel and condo buildling, is a bit dated. However, the staff are very friendly, and someone is always around – night or day - to help you in case your key card doesn’t work.  Dana was also a great host, and communication with her was quick and easy!

This condo is comfortable and clean in an excellent location. The beach is just a short walk away, so are the major shopping centres and restaurants. Dana was helpful in getting us checked in and settled.
Stay was great! Close to downtown! Great Communication from host!
Very cute place! Small, but equip with everything someone will need and great decor. Within walking distance of beach and many great restaurants. Well worth the price, I highly reccomend!
Dana's place was as described, comfortable, clean, adorable, and very walkable to Waikiki! Would definitely recommend for your stay!
Awesome place to stay. Will stay again.

Good location for accessing the city. Nice array of crockery for meals. Very noisy apartment, with street noise all night. Could do with some new curtains as it was impossible to get the room dark, which wasn't ideal when we were up early for the airport. Not a luxury stay, but still a handy place to stay at a reasonable price.
Beautiful place and view, clean and well furnished.
The place is nice. Very clean and comfortable.
It was a lovely apartment in Waikiki, Dana is a very responsible and reliable person, we did enjoy our time stay in this apartment in Hawaii!

This was my first time in Hawaii and I'm so glad I booked this flat.   I will be rebooking in the future, for sure.   It is centrally located, very cute, and about a 20 minute walk from everything.   All taxis and Uber know where it's at and I had no problem getting rides around the city.

Also, Dana is super cool when you have questions and is available (something not found in all places).   

I would recommend this studio for anyone who wants to be close to the beach but get a good night's sleep. 

It was perfect!
Nice place but a little smaller than I expected. Also not much privacy due to lack of proper curtains and a bathroom door. Dana was very helpful and responsive during our stay.

Great location and very comfortable/convenient accommodation. The apartment is very close to the Waikiki beach area and dining options. Dana was very responsive and answered any questions that we had. It would have been helpful to know that there is no door to the bathroom, but that aside, everything was great.

Great use of the space! The design layout is very deceptively spacious with an upscale clean and modern minimalist yet cozy aesthetic. Gorgeous views of skyline, and Dana was super responsive! Definitely will stay here again.
Looks exactly as pictured! A couple good restaurants around it and Dana was really nice!

If you snag this place you're lucky. It's super cute, clean, easy check in/ out.  Easy communication. Within walking distance to shops/ beach.  No need taxi.
I'll definitely be back!

A lovely central apartment. It was easy to walk to all the main attractions and delicious restaurants.

The apartment has everything you need, and a fantastic view. 
We had a great time.
Dana is a great host

We enjoyed our stay. It's a short walk to the beach, shopping and restaurants. 

Dana was great at communicating. I especially appreciated that she contacted me when I left my camera battery charger.

Dana was a great host. Her place is walking distance to some good restaurants and bars. She was very clear with her instructions and it was super easy to check in and out. The room is small but very nice and exactly what we needed. Overall, we had a great stay!
We enjoyed our stay!
Dana's place has a cute little set up. It's in a good location in Waikiki and everything is close by.

Good communication. Easy check-in and parking situation.  Walkable to Waikiki beach and shops. Room is newly remodeled, but the hallways are outdated. Main issue is if you go with a significant other, you must be real comfortable with them since there is no door to the bathroom.

We had a great stay at Dana's studio.  Her place was super clean and nicely decorated.  Dana provided very clear instructions which made the check in procedure very easy.  We were able to find free parking in the surrounding neighborhood.  We also enjoyed the pool and hot tub in the building.  Thanks, Dana!

My husband and I stayed in the unit for 4 nights.

Dana is nice and easy to communicate with. She is responsive to any messages and provided advice accordingly. The location of the unit is close to convenience stores (ABC and two 7-11s) in close proximity. Easy walk to Waikiki beach and a 15mins walk to Ala Moana Mall. 

We did appreciate that the unit was furnished,had air conditioner and looked modern with tastefully decorated nice furniture and flooring. It was a clean unit upon arrival and brightly lit. However, we also note that there was no separate kitchen sink or toilet door. The unit is functional for someone who would be out for most of the time during the day as it can get quite noisy (can hear the lift sounds, other units slamming the door in the morning,siren noises). It was impossible to get the room dark as the curtains only blocked out some light but not all. Not as ideal for anyone who intends to sleep in or catch up on sleep during the day. 

The lift area and corridor leading up to the unit is quite dated and has a stark contrast to the unit's modern look. 

Overall, Dana is a good host and responsive and the photos do represent how the unit looks.

Had a wonderful time with my guy friend here. Clean, nicely decorated, loved the view, quiet for the most part, easy instructions for check-in and checking-out, great response time from Dana. I would definitely recommend this property for others. It's a good price.
Clean and close to the action.

The location is fantastic and the view is incredible, its the perfect place to crash after a long day. The instructions were very clear for check-in and check-out. The walk to waikiki beach is not very far, and the shops on the way make it a very enjoyable walk. I will definitely be staying here again when i return!
Such a good area, easy enough to walk to Waikiki beach or into Honolulu. Dana was super helpful with having suggestions on what to do around in the area. Would definitely stay again.
Dana's place is my favorite option for Honolulu.  The place is very clean and well taken care of.  Dana is easy to deal with and prompt.  I don't even have a suggestion for improvement!

Our stay here was amazing! The location of the studio is near the strip and was close to many freeways if you were deciding to rent a car. Parking is $25 a day which is a bit pricey so I suggest finding parking on near by streets! We were barely inside the studio, but when we were, it felt like home. Nice bed, tv, and AC to make you feel comfortable. In addition, Dana is a great host. Communicates quickly and helps you plan your trip accordingly!
Great place for our quick stay at Waikiki beach. Dana is great at communicating and the place was very clean!
Great place to stay in Waikiki for exceptional value. Beautiful view across Fort Derussy park to the ocean. Walkable and convenient for great dining and shopping.  Would definitely stay again.
Great, central apartment for a night or two's stopover. Walking distance to everything in Waikiki. Dana is great.
Well-kept, small bedsit close to the Ala Moana mall. Great value for money.

Je vous recommande cet appartement ! Bien situé, propre et confortable ! De plus, Dana est toujours disponible pour répondre aux éventuelles questions que vous pouvez vous poser. Accès au logement facile et rapide.

A small apartment, which was just as in the pictures. Beautifullly decorated. And not too far away from downtown as long as you don't mind a walk. Being close to downtown it was a little noisy at night, possibly because we slept with the windows open.
Dana place was perfect for 1 person or a couple traveling.  Good location, ideal spot.  A walk away from busy Waikiki and everything from restaurants, bars and shops.

My husband and I had a great stay here. Good place for 2-3 nights. The place was clean and Dana was easy to get hold of. Very seamless way of getting in and out of the apartment upon arrival and checkout. Walking distance to the main hub of cafes, restaurants and of course the beach. 

Thanks Dana
She was a wonderful host. I enjoyed the stay.

非常に良い時間を過ごさせていただきました｡
もしﾜｲｷｷに来る機会があれば､またここに泊まりたいです｡

①位置
ﾜｲｷｷ中心よりはやや離れる印象はありますが､その分静かです｡
深夜の街の路上ﾊﾟﾌｫｰﾏﾝｽも聞こえてこないです｡
少し歩けばﾄﾛﾘｰﾊﾞｽ乗り場もあるので､それほど不便には感じません｡

②快適性
それほど新しくはないですが､整頓されており非常に清潔に感じました｡
2人で泊まりましたが､それほど手狭にも感じませんでした｡
ｴｱｺﾝもちゃんと効くし､ﾀｵﾙもふわふわでした｡
ﾄｲﾚのﾄﾞｱはないので､だれかと一緒に泊まると少しだけ気をつかうかも｡

③ｵｰﾅｰ
すごく信頼できる方｡
滞在数日前になると､ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの仕方を連絡してくれます｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝやﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄの時間も相談すれば融通を聞かせてくれました｡
滞在中の質問など､Airbnb上ですぐに返信して下さり､安心して過ごすことが出来ました｡
ｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝは全部英語でした｡

④その他
◯5階に洗濯機あり､ｸﾚｼﾞｯﾄｶｰﾄﾞで使える｡洗剤は持参｡
◯角部屋で眺めよし｡
◯6階に大きなﾌﾟｰﾙと､ﾋﾞｰﾁﾁｪｱがあってくつろげる｡お昼の日向ぼっこが気持ちいい｡
◯一階のｶｳﾝﾀｰでﾀｸｼｰをお願いしたりできる｡ﾂｱｰの申し込みとかもあったみたいですが未使用｡
◯一階に6:30より開いている朝食のお店､手紙とか簡単なｺﾝﾋﾞﾆのようなお店､ﾊﾟﾝ屋さんあり｡

Dana's place was lovely for those who don't mind walking a bit to get to the beach or shops but also great for public transport. The small apartment was perfect for two and the food surrounding it was great. 
Would highly recommend to anyone.

Dana was a Great host! She was very attentive and was quick to respond to any questions I had regarding my upcoming stay. Her studio was very clean and the decor was super cute! The studio was also centrally located in Waikiki, so you can walk to any desired destination. I literally walked from the Diamond Head crater, back to the building, after an early morning hike (lol). I would definitely recommend this place to everyone! You will not be disappointed! :-)

Nice cosy little space. We did plenty of walking and exploring from the apartment. Everything was within a 20-30min walk, which was awesome. Pool, BBQ and spa area was great! Very family friendly and a good place to swim/relax. Would definitely book again :)

Das Appartement ist wie beschrieben und super gelegen.  Man kann eigentlich alles zu Fuss erledigen und ist auch schnell am Strand.
Das Gebäude wirkt auf den ersten Blick nicht sehr einladend,  aber das Appartement ist schön eingerichtet und sauber. Die Ausstattung ist gut (Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, kleiner Ofen, Duschutensilien, Tücher...).
Etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig ist, dass das Bad/WC keine Tür hat... Das Bett ist bequem, sofern man es weich mag. 
Was man verbessern könnte: Nachts ist es trotz Rollos und Vorgängen recht hell, da diese nicht gut verdunkeln. Wir hätten uns gewünscht,  es hätte ein paar mehr Haken, um feuchte Tücher etc. aufzuhängen.
Dana selbst haben wir nicht getroffem, aber der Kontakt war sehr nett und es hat alles reibungslos geklappt.
Alles in allem eine gute Alternative, wenn man nicht in einem Hotel wohnen möchte.

As described. 
Lovely views and short walks to  all the main facilities. 
Lack of wifi in room was only downside.
Highly recommended.
Couldn't ask for a better place!

This condo was perfect!! The description is super accurate and the location is prime. Check in was really easy, and the studio was very comfortable, especially after our long flight. We were able to walk around to everything we needed. Would definitely stay here again!

Dana's place was as wonderful as described. Everything was clean and the AC cooled the place down nicely. We went to the pool for an early morning swim and used the storage for our bags on checkout day. Everything from Check-in/-out to communication with Dana was very smooth and friendly.
We can highly recommend this place.

- 전체: 전반적으로 나쁘지는 않았지만, 사진에서 만큼의 깨끗함과 화려함은 없었던 것 같아요. 

- 장점: 
1. 와이키키까지 도보 10분, 알라모아나까지 도보 17분
2. 야외 수영장 + 자쿠지 

- 단점: 
1. 무료로 탑승 가능한 핑크 트롤리 승차장으로부터는 3 block 정도 걸어야해서 거리가 있게 느껴졌어요. 
2. 수건을 갈아주는 곳도 있는데 수건 교환 관련 문자를 했을 때 답을 받지 못한 게 아쉬웠어요.
Amazing accommodation, even for those looking for just a one night stay like us!

We enjoyed our short stay here and would recommend it to others passing through Waikiki.

The location is only a short distance from the main strip but far enough that it's a bit more of a relaxed area.

The space was clean and tidy and Dana was so great to communicate with.

My only word of caution is that the bathroom area does not have a door, and with the small space of the studio some couples might find this a little uncomfortable.
Great host, excellent appartment and well equipped. The location is great and the owner was very helpfull

We were in Hawaii for a wedding which started at 4 PM on the day we checked in.  Dana was extremely accommodating.  She had the room ready early so we had enough time to get ready.  This was a huge help. She also was very responsive for all my emails.  The room itself is cozy, but perfect size for two people.  Pretty solid views.  Could see the ocean and the river. There is a hobbit-like breakfast place on the main floor of the building which had better-than-expected food.  Great short stay!
The studio was clean and check-in and check-out were easy. Nice view and good value for staying in Waikiki walking distance to the beach and other attractions.

This was such a cute apartment downtown, in an ideal location! Dana was wonderful and accommodating, check in was flexible and simple, and communication was always prompt. We would recommend this space to anyone looking for a nice Waikiki experience. Thanks Dana!

Dana's place is as cute as can be ! The location is awesome, you can walk to  the ocean, to Ala  Moana shopping center .Dana was able to let us check in early which was very helpful and made our first morning stressless and enjoyable. We had great communication with her and we would love to come back and stay again.
We will recommend her place for sure.:)

Dana's studio is pretty sweet. In the heart of Waikiki you get to look out over the pool and towards the ocean from a beautifully renovated apartment. Very good value!! Not to mention she is the sweetest - let us know we could check in early, gave local tips and dropped my jewelry downstairs that I left under the sink...! :) thanks Dana for a great stay!
Great place with rooftop pool and close to Waikiki and lots of bars/restaurants/shops.  I would stay here again!
Studio was very clean and in a convenient location. Dana was a great host and always responded promptly to any questions.
Very charming and great location! Everything you need in Waikiki.
close to Waikiki beach,7 mins walk to HILTON, lots of public traffic stops around
Great views. Close to everything in Waikiki. Excellent price.

We enjoyed a lovely, comfortable stay.  The room was spotless and had everything we needed very central to everything with a lovely view.  Communication was quick and easy and loved all the unique décor in the room, would definitely stay again.
Great location and host!
買い物がかなり便利です｡

This self contained studio is good value . It is clean and has some cooking equipment if needed, and a good size fridge. The pool is clean and there is a Bar B Q  and tables there too. There are a few places to eat out not too far from the building and a café onsite. The beach is about a 15min walk away.Certainly would recommend to anyone as a cheaper option than Hotels. Dana was good with communication from the day I booked and throughout. Checkin easy once I found the locked box below the foyer. I was on my own and felt safe at night.Thank you.
Dana was really responsive to all Of my questions.  Her directions for getting into the studio were clear and easy.  Good value for a place in Wakiki.
Great location, a few minutes from the beach and the main shopping areas. Also great communication and advice regarding parking around the area.
We really could recommend this flat! It is very nice and neat! Restaurants are within walking distance. And the Communication with Dana was always more than friendly!
It s the Perfect stay in Waikiki! So Great, Thank you Dana!

Dana is a wonderfully pleasant host that provided great customer service. She was always very prompt with her response and accommodating with any requests or needs I had. I would highly recommend staying at her cute, cozy place that has a spectacular view!  :)

cheers,
sibel
Location was great. View was great. Room was nice and comfortable. Very pleased!!!

Dana est une super hôte, l'appartement se situe à l’endroit parfait pour visiter Honolulu . Il est très bien équiper. Propre
Je recommande vivement cette hôte à 100%.
Loved this cute studio. Host is very quick to reply to any questions or requests. Very walkable to the beach and shops or a quick drive down to all the action down the road

Though we never met in person, Dana was super helpful during our stay. We were a day late arriving due to an emergency but she was very understanding and made sure we had all the information to access the apartment. The apartment itself is fantastic for what we needed, clean, cosy and super central! Perfect for visiting Waikiki! Thanks so much, Dana!

Dana was very attentive & helpful with directions & parking. This studio is perfect for 2 people -- comfortable with AC & has a great view. We enjoyed our time at the pool at the end of the day, which is open until 11 PM. This studio is SO cute -- I may need to hire Dana to decorate my future home! Would recommend staying here 10/10 :-)
Nice little studio in Waikiki. Perfect for a couple for a few days! Close to the beach and restaurants. Easy check-in and free parking (on Alai Wai Blvd).

Dana's studio is the perfect size with everything needed for a couples getaway, including basic kitchen equipment and utensils. Waikiki beach is just a 10-15 minute walk down the road and shops and great restaurants are also close by. Dana was so accomodating with our early check in and so helpful in all the information she provided us. We would love to stay here again!
Great location. A nice bright space and very organised host. Easy to stay here and would stay again if I was in the area.
Great little studio right in the middle of everything. Loved how close we were to the beach and all the shopping and so many restaurants. Great pool and hot tub for the end of the day
This was a great space and catered perfectly for our needs

Great place.
Never met Dana but she was very helpful in making my stay comfortable.
Very close to Waikiki.
Loved it there !

It's a great location overall. Close to everything, and perfect for if you only need a simple place to crash at night. It's simple, small and very nice.  It's about a $20 dollar uber ride to the airport, and that makes it perfect. I'd stay here again. No Complaints!

Beautiful place! Dana did a wonderful job decorating and making the most of the space.... very chic! Very clean!! Felt safe and secure. Had everything I needed, actually exceeded my expectations. The bed was very comfy. Loved all the windows and mirrors that really made the place feel more open and spacious. Awesome views too. I felt spoiled!
Dana was wonderful!
Dana has a lovely place! Great communication and easy check in, great location as well.

Lage war super. Nahe am Zentrum in Fussnähe vieles erreichbar (waiki beach, etc) aber doch nicht mitten im getümmel. Stauraum eher wenig für 2 Personen mit Gepäck aber man kommt schon zurecht. Checkin & checkout war unkomplitziert, Dana hat uns sehr gut instruiert und informiert. Linke Liftseite verwenden, rechts ist nur für Hotelgäste.

Great place! Highly recommend. Dana was very accommodating and helpful. The place is very central and easy to get everywhere by foot. I recommend this to travellers as you don't need a car at all. Had an awesome stay :)

Der Check-in war sehr einfach. Das Gebäude ist recht groß sowie bekannt, also für Bus und Taxi kein Problem. Es sind ca. 5 min zum Strand (Hilton Hotel). Zur Shopping Meile sowie zum Waikiki Beach dauert es ca. 10min. Direkt gegenüber ist ein ABC-Store sowie ein 7Eleven. Sehr zu empfehlen ist die kleine süße Bäckerei, die direkt an dem Gebäude im 1. Stock leckere Dinge zaubert. Das Zimmer besteht aus einem großen Raum, Badezimmer ist darin, ohne Türe enthalten. Überall sind Fenster und Spiegel, was dem Raum groß wirken lässt und sehr freundlich.
Allgemeine Tipps für Honolulu:
-Mietet euch ein Auto, ganz günstig über Expedia und fahrt mit dem zum North Shore hoch. Man kann zwar auch mit dem Bus fahren (Tagesticket 5 Dollar), aber das dauert sehr lange und man weiß eig nie wann genau der nächste Bus kommt. Allgemein sind im Bus Minusgrade. 
-Den Dimond Head kann man nicht immer besteigen, wir konnten leider nicht den Trail hoch, da dieser nur am SA und SO auf war, was sehr ärgerlich war. 
-Auch bei Pearl Harbor ist es von Vorteil, wenn man ein Auto hat, da dies außerhalb der Stadt liegt. Es gibt auch Ausflüge die einen Transfer haben, aber dies muss man rechtzeitig buchen.
We had a really pleasant stay, everything was fine!
Great space and super close to the main shopping strip and tons of food options!
Great place. Love the view and the breeze:)
Great location in Waikiki, awesome pool/hottub!
This apartment is amazing! Everything is clean and stylish! Beaches, food and shopping is around! I felt in love in this apartment! Dana is wonderful! She‘s so kind! I really recommend this place!
The location is very good, you can walk to the shopping center. The host is very  nice. The room is very bright and very close to the street. I have to us eyeshade and ear plug to sleep.
Dana’s little place was perfect! We really enjoyed our stay and appreciated the quick responses from Dana! We would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

If you’re lucky enough to find a break in her booking schedule, book her place! Her studio is perfect for 2 people. Looks exactly like her pictures. So close to everything that you can easily visit all the best spots. And Dana herself was very responsive and kind! Highly recommend!
화장실이 트여있고 개방되어있습니다. 커플에게는 좋은 경험일듯.그리고 커탠으로 창문이 잘 안가려져서 밖에서도 안쪽이 보일거 같은 걱정을 했네요. 신혼부부 또는 커플 빼고는 적절한 장소일듯?
The space is charming and the location is very convenient to experience Waikiki.
Great experience!
Really loved my stay here in Dana's place. This would be a perfect spot for first timers in waikiki. Dana has been a great help and is always very responsive to all my queries.
great location.
Clean and we’ll designed place. The location was the best part due to it’s close proximity to all restaurants, stores and to the beach. We greatly enjoyed our stay here. Highly recommended!
Good location. Walking distance to Waikiki beach and Ala Moana mall.

Location is brilliant, very close to everything you need. Accommodation has a pool and Jacuzzi with a fitness suite too. 7/11 is 50 metres away from the lobby of the property! Dana provided us with all we needed and even bought us some weighing scales so we could weigh our luggage prior to our departing flight! Would 100% stay again. Mahalo Dana!

Dana's place is a nice little studio in Waikiki in walking distance of plenty of shops, restaurants, and beaches. Be aware that the bathroom has no door, so not great if you're shy, but didn't bother us. We had a great stay!
Awesome place. Dana is very kind. And very quick replay. Really good place!
The studio is so stylish and clean! It's a very chic place and so close to a lot of restaurants and shops too.
A clean and super convenient location to explore Waikiki! We had great communication with the host too. Ideal for a single traveler or close couple.

Very nice place, as described.

Good communication, centrally located, and I greatly appreciated having a food option an elevator ride down as it rained during my stay.
The place is clean and it is near Waikiki beach. Dana is very nice and respond my messages very quickly!
Very nice little place with good heart warming feel. I personally enjoyed the location. It has a nice little place to eat breakfast in the lobby.

Lovely, tidy little studio apartment, in great proximity to an awesome brewery and within walking distance to the beach.  A nice stay for a couple looking for a convenient location to the night life! Access to a private pool was an added bonus.
Awesome location! And the landlord did a lot to make it quicker to check in. Which we need the most after a long and exhausted flight. Thanks a lot. Will definitely come again next time.
Lovely little studio, Dana was super helpful and great with communication.
Dana is an excellent host! Be aware that there is no door to the bathroom. If this doesn’t bother you, you’re otherwise in a clean and comfortable place! Great find!

Great location, stylish place and amazing communication!!! Dana is a great host and so helpful! The place is really nice with chic furniture and has all the essentials! Great place don’t hesitate to book!
Great place to stay at. So many places to eat nearby. Beach is only 15 min walk. Great communication. Check in/out process was a breeze.
Great place to stay
Great spot for a quick stay & great location!
Dana is a great host and a very good communicator.  We appreciate the quick and caring responses to ask our questions which we few because Dana anticipated most of our needs.
Lovely place with a great view!!!!
Beautiful view from the apartment, particularly at night and a great location for the beach and buses. Wifi was pretty temperamental. Otherwise very convenient for a short stay.
Central house, with everything you need. Walking distance to shops and beach.

Pros: Great location - near shops, restaurants, beach, convenience stores. Cute space with nice views! 

Cons: Building entrance is a bit musty smelling (but the room is fresh and clean!), also the bathroom does not have a door so can be uncomfortable using the toilet if traveling with someone else!
A stylish space and a great, central location. Close to Waikiki beach to enjoy a sunset walk or two. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Great location, walkable distance to shops and a range of awesome food places. Dana was an amazing host and was very helpful.

Nice unit, central location, clean and tidy. Good price. Only down side was there was some conflict about returning the swipe key. Instructions were to leave it in the room when leaving but the lift wouldn’t work without swiping the key (despite the advice given by Dana). We locked the key in the letterbox downstairs when we left and Dana said it went missing and then tried to charge us $20 US. She was then very rude in demanding the money. We had a lot of problems with swipe key and had to have security change the key twice as it wasn’t working in the lifts or front door. Otherwise it was a nice stay and up until that point Dana had been nice and let us check in early. Wouldn’t stay here again.

Parking was very difficult. Drove around for an hour and a half looking for free parking on the side streets. Ended up giving up and paying the $25 to park at the building’s parking. Good location to Waikiki/nightlife.
Dana’s place was very clean, comfortable, and a good walk score to different areas of a Waikiki. She was a great communicator throughout the whole stay and would stay at her place again!
Great location, chic decor, and awesome hostess!

Thank you, Dana, for having us. It was the perfect stay for our first night in Hawaii! The unit was sparkling clean and the location was amazing. We were able to walk down to the beach in just a matter of minutes, and we had an unlimited choice of restaurants at our doorstep. We also found it very easy to catch public transport to/from the airport, as there is a bus stop just down the street. I would highly recommend a stay here :)

Windows, everywhere! Very lovely set up with an open floor plan. Parking is a little tough if you don’t want to pay for the parking in the building. Also, go check out the little brunch spot- very convenient!

Dana's studio is beautiful, clean, and pretty, just like in the pictures. It is also conveniently located and has amazing views. Dana is a great host and was available during my whole stay. Thumbs up on this one!

Cute unit. Pictures are accurate. There are plenty of kitchen utensils and the microwave and frig are great. All kinds of cleaning products under sink and the shower is really nice. The AC helps because the room can get a little warm in late afternoon but cools off quick with the AC. One con but is not Dana’s fault. The neighbors slam their doors at night and it woke up us during the night so it’s best to wear ear plugs at night for minimal noise disturbance. Oh and the bed is a Full bed so it might be too small for a larger couple. Maybe Dana can think about investing in a queen size bed.... that would be awesome :)
All in all it was a very cute unit and we were satisfied with it. Mahalo Dana :)
-Annie and Andrew
The keys need to be charged so make sure you do that before hand

My partner and I enjoyed our quick overnight stay. Clean, comfortable and a short distance from the shops. Dana our host was quick and informative. You can no longer smoke within the complex (signs posted everywhere) however there was a smell of old cigarette smoke in the complex halls, not in the apartment room. This could be an issue for some but we were fine. Overall we enjoyed our short stay. Thanks very much Dana! :)
Great location! Recommended ❤️

Dana's place is a perfect home base for anyone visiting Oahu and wanting to explore Honolulu and the surrounding attractions. There are tons of restaurants and bars within walking distance, and it is also a 15-20 min walk to Waikiki beach. We rented a car during our stay, which was great for day trips around the island. The only downside is that parking in the garage costs $25 per day, and we found it difficult to find free street parking nearby. Overall, the location was worth it, Dana communicated very well, and the room was great for two people for a few days!

Dana was very responsive and accommodating. The location is also extremely convenient. Be prepared to wake up early because the pool guy is at it early with the sunrise. Also, just know there isn’t a door to the bathroom, so be extra comfortable with who you’re sharing with. Great place to stay, pictures are accurate.
Restroom does not have a door.
A cute and cozy place with a great view. Host was gracious and prompt in answering questions.

What a lovely place to stay within .5 mile of Waikiki and all of the fun Honolulu has to offer.  The views are even better than they appeared in the pictures.  It was sparkling clean and Dana was very understanding about our delayed arrival.
Great place

Das Studio ist sehr zentral gelegen. In ca. 10 Gehminuten erreicht man den Waikiki Beach sowie diverse Restaurants und Shoppingmöglichkeiten. Das Check-in war unkompliziert und das Studio sauber und gut ausgestattet sowie liebevoll eingerichtet. Das Bad ist allerdings nicht extra abgetrennt vom Schlafbereich bzw. ist keine Tür dazwischen. Sehr zu empfehlen ist das Maleko Cafe gleich unten am Eingang, wo der Bäcker Mike in seiner Backstube viele leckere Sachen frisch zubereitet und wo es richtig guten Kaffe gibt. This little studio is such a FIND! We loved it from the moment we stepped inside - the extra attention to detail is fantastic. Great location, wonderful and prompt responses from Dana - we will definitely stay here again!

Very cozy spot and makes you feel comfortable and at ease. A central location within walking distance from the shops and nightlife in Honolulu. Would definitely stay again!

Dana’s place was very clean and the location was nice because it was so central. Recommend to anyone.

Dana's place is perfect for a couple or individual looking to explore Waikiki. The location is very close to the beach, restaurants and public transport. Great location, wonderful bakery in the lobby for breakfast, walkable convenient area!

We absolutely loved Dana’s place in Waikiki. The location is prime because it’s central in the city. Walking distance to the beach and shopping centers. The view is absolutely amazing and decor is lovely and chic. Would absolutely stay here in the future!

Cute and cozy modern place to stay. Room was small but equipped with an dorm style apartment refrigerator with freezer and microwave. Nice touches and amenities. Even had body wash, shampoo and conditioner in the shower. A/c and closed blinds made a huge difference! Nice room.

Had a great stay at Dana's place. It was in a great location and so close to Waikiki. Room was basic but has enough that you need when staying even if you want to make a meal or two. The only comment I have is that the bathroom was a little odd, with no separation of the toilet and the rest of the room. This left no privacy for the bathroom area if you aren't alone. Even adding a curtain would have added more comfort. Overall had a great stay and would highly  recommend!
Dana is super helpful and quick with any questions. You can't get a better deal than this quaint little place - great location, great amenities, great value! Mahalo!
Great location a clean tidy space!
Good place, good deal central location. Dana was very responsive and easy to deal with check in / out. Unfortunately the bathroom not being enclosed / or having a door.
Very nicely furnished and stylish apartment. Very close to Waikiki beach.

Dana’s place was good value for money and only a short pleasant walk to the main part of Waikiki. Check in was smooth and the room was lovely. The only thing is that the curtains were not very dark so perhaps keep that in mind if you are travelling from a different timezone and need to sleep in the day like we did :)
A compact space ideal for our short stay. Basic amenities covered for a solo traveler or a close couple. A short walk to Hawaii’s version of Rodeo Drive. Great value for Waikiki!

Das Studio war schön und zweckmässig eingerichtet und lag sehr zentral. Zum berühmten Waikiki  Beach ca. 900 Meter Fussweg. bestes Frühstück im Cream Pot (im gleichen Haus). 2x sehr gut und mit tollem Ausblick auf der Dachterasse von Tommy Bahama gegessen (ca. 500 Meter Fussweg).

I was in Honolulu for one day on business, this little one bedroom place is great as you get privacy and a great location too. Thanks Dana

Excellent location, very clean! The salt-water pool and hot tub were so nice after a long day of travel. Close to everything!
Good location, great view, cleanliness, everything was very good.
Great little place and close to everything. It was the perfect start to our holiday. Dana was very helpful and quick to respond to messages

Perfect locations! Stocked with everything that one could possibly need. The bar downstairs is also amazing, we had a fantastic time. Mahalo for the stay Dana.

Great host, cozy place in great location (quick ride from the airport, walking distance to beaches and Waikiki center, couldn’t ask for more). The building is quite old and really not a nice one, so chapeau to Dana for creating a nice little nest in that thing ;-)

Dana put a lot of detail into her place. Very clean, city chic design, and a great view. The strip is just a few blocks away, but if you don’t want to walk, Uber or Lyft can easily fix that. Parking garage was a little hassle to get to, but everyone was nice.

So happy to find this place!! The location was very convenient, and the view from the room was awesome. I stayed there with my husband. We only had one card key so we were taking a risk of lock out. We had being very careful so that never happened. Also, you need a card key for elevator (to go up to the room), and that would be a bit inconvenient if 2 guest staying at the place. It’s hard to find a street parking after the evening, but you have a parking space ($25/day), so you don’t need to worry about it too much.

Dana's place is so adorable! Everything you need for a comfortable stay, the building feels safe, close to Waikiki. Dana sent all of the info I needed ahead of time and was available if needed by phone or text. Absolutely book your stay here!
Great location for exploring Kauai, room was exactly as described and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Travel tips left in the room were very helpful. Highly recommend!
Dana’s place was lovely, such a stylish spot with great amenities. Dana is a pleasant friendly host. Would definitely recommend
Very clean and modern, great view and incredible location!
Dana's place is pictured exactly like the photos. We had a very comfortable stay, communication prior to check in was easy and Dana even let us check in early. Would stay again!

Nice tidy and comfortable place. Good view, comfortable bed. Safe area. Would definitely recommend. There’s no block out curtains though so if you’re sensitive to light whilst sleeping bring an eye mask.
Bright, stylish studio apartment! Really great for 1-2 people in Waikiki!

This place is like a hotel room, but much better! The decorations and furnitures are beautiful. The airbnb is walking distance from Waikki Beach and to many restaurants around. Dana was a great host. She was responsive and informative.
Great little studio with plenty of places to walk to in the area. Close to the beach and not too far from the airport. Had a great visit in our short time there easy to check in and check out of.

Great little appartment in Waikiki. Much smaller than we expected. The bed was good, but a bit small as well and matress is very squicky. Would recommend to offer beach towels for guests. 
But overall very good, short 15 min walk to the strip with restaurants and shops. And the view from the 12th floor is very nice!
Great communication and easy to get to. As other people have said having black out curtains would be helpful. Otherwise great place
We had a great stay. The location is a 10 min walk from everything you need. Great value.
I had the best stay. The space was very stylish and comfortable. Also in a perfect location, just walking distance from the best shopping, restaurants and bus tours. I highly recommend!!!
Beautiful unit in a central location. We enjoyed our time!

My husband and I had a quick 1-day layover in HNL, and this was a great place for us to stay!  Very cute and stylish studio!  Many amenities were provided which made things very easy for us so we didn't have to unpack much.  It's about a 10-15 minute walk to the Beach and the Waikiki strip (shopping).  Lots of great restaurants nearby (and cafe downstairs)!  Only 20 minutes from the airport by car.  One thing to note is that there is not a door to the bathroom area  which I didn't realize ahead of time :) Overall, a great and comfortable stay!  Thank you Dana!!
everything was great thank you!

Great location and Dana is a really nice host. Brilliant views from 12th floor but the downside, for me anyway, some may like it, the sun hits the windows all day. But the A/C unit is pretty effective.
I had an amazing experience at Dana's place. It was everything I expected and more. Should I have the opportunity again I would without a doubt choose to stay here . Thanks Dana
super cute and stylish small space. close to some smaller shops. about a mile walk from a major mall. easy to get a cab and travel elsewhere. great with communication.
Warm and suitable house
Everything we expected. Walking distance to many almost everything. 5 min walk to convention center.

Small but clean place.  Stay here if you want to save money and plan on only coming back to sleep.  Bathroom doesn't have a door which means if you are traveling with a significant other, you will hear everything . The average hotel price in Honolulu is double what you will spend here so keep that in mind.  I didn't see any critters in the room itself.  The building feels kind of sketchy but the room itself is fine.  Part of the building is a motel and there are shops on the lower level.
Dana was an excellent host and great with communication.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Dana's place within the Hawaiian Monarch hotel. The location is great and is within walking distance (approximately 1 mile) from Ala Moana as well as other shopping centers, restaurants, and lots of tourist destinations, and within this particular room, the panoramic view is amazing. We particularly loved the Maleko Bakery downstairs on the same floor as the lobby. The owner bakes homemade pastries for the morning and makes pizza at night -- though we only tried the breakfast offerings namely the delicious scones, muffin, and drip coffee.

If you want to venture outside of Waikiki towards areas like East Oahu and the North Shore you should definitely rent a car. Our friend who also stayed in the Monarch paid $75 for 3 days of parking with in/ out privileges.

One thing to keep in mind is that while Dana's condo is newly renovated and stylish, the entire building is much older.
Great location, great price, clean and modern space, great communication.
Such a cool space and great location!

This cute studio apartment was great for our short stay in Oahu. There was tons of light as it is a corner unit and has windows all around two sides. It has a great view of the pool and city . This is the place to be in Honolulu! Secure, private, and safe! Perfect for those traveling near Ala Moana and Waikiki. Dana is also very responsive. She replies back almost immediately! Outstanding service! :)

Amazing accommodation with amazing views ! 10/10 would recommend again !

This was a great spot for us to spend an overnight layover in Honolulu. An easy walk to the Waikiki shopping area and beach, close to great restaurants, and super clean space. Warning: no bathroom door, so if you’re traveling with more than one person, make sure you are comfortable with that!  We loved Waikiki Brewing in the adjacent block and Goodys for breakfast just down the street. Dana made checking in very easy and had great recommendations for us for restaurants. Would recommend if you need a simple and affordable space.

It was the perfect little get away after my husband and I got married. The place was clean and felt safe. The pool & jacuzzi were nice & quiet. View is great! Breakfast place (Cream Pot), coffee shop, and pizza shop in the lobby.
Great place. Easy walk to Waikiki Beach.
This is a great place to stay while in Waikiki, it's so close to lots of restaurants and the beach! We were very happy with our stay here, thank you!

Dana was an expert at fast and friendly coordination. She is truly a super host. The place was awesome, and I’d like to stay again in the near future! We had everything we needed, and Dana made the process accommodating! Thanks!

Gorgeous little corner unit with great views. Walking distance to Waikiki restaurants/shops. Be aware that there’s no toilet door (just a wall to give you some privacy), so don’t stay with a partner/friend who may find openly sharing this space awkward/uncomfortable!

Cute studio in a great location...walking distance to different restaurant options and the beach. Older building but beautifully updated and styled space, great use of square footage and lots of amenities. Easy check-in and check-out and great communication with Dana.
I loved my stay!!!

This Studio is just awesome. I love the style and you have a perfect view to the ocean and its close to waikiki. I would always go back there. And Dana is so lovely and helpful with everything. Thank you so much!

The unit is clean and has nice views. The bathroom  and toliet area has no door , for us having more privacy when using the bathroom is important.  The location is very convenient and within 10 minute walk to Waikiki beach. The host is very good and provides good communication.

Dana's place is perfectly situated close to all the Waikiki attractions. It's a great place to stay if you're looking to hang out in the area without having to walk too far to anything. The studio was the perfect size for my friend and I (2 small asian girls) and we had plenty of space for our luggage and to move around. The bedding was super comfortable, the air conditioning made the room very pleasantly cool and the bathroom shower was nice and hot. Not much else you can ask for really! The only thing, which Dana does make very clear, is that parking is a challenge (as it is everywhere in Waikiki). Free parking is not available in the building so you've got to go hunt for it on the main road (which is very difficult) or you pay a "discounted" rate of 25 USD a day to the building if you show them the keycard.

name: Apt in Lapa, Rio's bohemian cradle
summary: ** WELCOME ** The LAPA !!! Come to this wonderful apartment located in the bohemian and more welcoming neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro which is right in the heart of downtown, where it has the emblematic piece of the Arcos da Lapa.

Our guests will enjoy all the rooms, completely furnished and equipped, with TVs in living room and bedroom, refrigerator, air conditioning in the room, cooktop, microwave, washing machine, Internet / WI-FI, linen / table and bath, fully equipped kitchen with coffee maker, blender, electric sandwich maker, ceiling fan in the room, 24 hour security with i
neighborhood_overview: A cozy neighborhood and the bohemian enclave of the city with its bars, taverns and venues packed by samba, choro and MPB. In the early twentieth century, its narrow streets seethed with a mix of bohemian, trickery and intelligentsia. Many painters, poets, journalists, musicians, soccer players born in Lapa well as in the 30s, Noel Rosa and Madame Satan became great referential phenomena.  The lapa has become nowadays a cozy neighborhood filled with lots of fun surprises. Worth, come check closely !!!
notes: Being a residential building ask for the quiet time according to the collective agreement is respected.
transit: The neighborhood has several bus lines to the center and the North and South regions. Access to Subway is done by Cinelândia station (nearest station).
access: The apartment access to the world famous "Rio scenarium", the "Carioca da Gema", the "Lapa 40", the "Bar Brazil", the "Mangue Seco", the "New Chapel" among other places to eat, drink, listen to live music and dance, is done on foot. We are also just a few steps from the sights of the region - "Arcos da Lapa" and "Stairway Selaron" - and show houses "Flying Circus" and "Progress Casting".  The famous "Old River Fair" or "Fair Lavradio" as it is popularly known by locals, which takes place every first Saturday of each month from 10am to 19h, is 5 minutes walk from the apartment.  The neighborhood of Lapa is integrated with bus lines and subway allowing easy access to the famous beaches of Copacabana, Ipanema and Leblon. The traditional sights - Sugar Loaf, Christ the Redeemer, Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas, Sambadrome, Maracanã, Botanical Garden - are also easily accessed. We also have our around various supermarkets, bakeries, hairdressers, parking (fee), journeymen, lottery shops, pharmacie
interaction: Or I, or my husband or one of my two sons (both of age) will always be present at check-in for our guests to welcome you, show the apartment and clarify what is required.  Our (s) guest (s) will have access to all information about the apartment as well as login and password wifi and tips for restaurants and tours.  During the stay were available through the message AIRBNB service, phone - (Hidden by Airbnb) and SMS - and by email.  At checkout we are always present to receive the keys, hear comments and suggestions as well as you want a good and speedy return.
house_rules: - On arrival the guest will have to fill out a registration form with your information. This form is required to register the names of people who will be in the apartment and allow access to the building;  - It is not allowed to have other people in the apartment without the presence of the guest or after the property is vacated;  - It is forbidden underage visitors in the apartment, unless accompanied by their legal guardian;  - Children over 5 years, count as a person;  - The movement of people in costumes expropriated the hallways and lobby of the building is not permitted;  - The owner of the property is hereby authorized to enter the apartment and remove property left in it, after hours check-out date of contracted output;  - Pets are not permitted in the apartment;  - Illegal drugs are not permitted in the apartment (criminal responsibility of the guest);  - Do not leave wet towels on the bed or on the couch;  - In the window no clothes can be hung, under penalty of a fine to the

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Somos um casal  carioca e amamos nossa  cidade onde moramos. 
Adoramos receber e conhecer pessoas do mundo inteiro, conversar e podermos ajudar no que seja necessário. Nosso lema de vida é compartilhar! 
É um enorme prazer podermos hospedar a quem precisa de um espaço agradável e aconchegante, estiloso e confortável, para viver seu grande sonho nesta maravilhosa cidade do Rio de Janeiro, no coração da Lapa!!! 
Assim somos nós e sejam todos bem vindos ! :)

reviews.comments: Hilda’s place looks just like the pictures! So cute and well decorated. You can tell they took the time when remodeling. Check in process was fairly easy. Hilda’s husband was there to show us how everything works, get papers signed, and collect the R $500 security deposit. The only downside to this place was the bed. It was very hard and uncomfortable. Luckily my boyfriend is in the military and is used to sleeping on the ground so he took the bed and I took the futon. The futon wasn’t good for 2 people either, but was fine for just me. There were plenty of towels and pillows for us. The location was outstanding!! We ate breakfast lunch and dinner every day at a different restaurant, all within walking distance. And the famous colorful tile steps you see online are also only a couple blocks away! That made it easy to get there early and get some pics before the crowds showed up. Security in the building was good. We never felt unsafe. Lapa is a party town! The streets get noisy at night but we were able to tune it out or would just go join the party! If you wanna be in the happening spot, look no further!

name: Private Luxury Apartment Sitting atop Pittwater
summary: Escape to a beautifully located modern design apartment with a private pool and sauna. Scan the panoramic views above Pittwater from an open walk-out living room, or head down to the water to watch the boats before sunset.
space: This near new luxury apartment has everything you need to enjoy a comfortable and serene break away. It's private and tranquil and you will enjoy the stunning views of Pittwater from every room. It has it's own private outdoor  area and pool overlooking Pittwater, large separate   Queens bedroom, designer bathroom, lounge/ dining, full kitchen facilities and it's own sauna. The apartment includes WiFi access, it's own private pool and Sauna, Fully Equipped Kitchen, TV, DVD, Luxury Linen and Hairdryer.  Guests will enjoy all the amenities of the apartment to themselves it is self contained and private.  We will be happy to welcome you at check -in and  after that you have the apartment to yourselves. Just give us a call if there is anything else we can help you with. Enjoy all the beauty of Sydney's northern beaches at your doorstep.  Stroll down to Paraidise Beach for a swim, kayak or enjoy a fish from the public wharf. Avalon Village is within walking distance with it's wonderful cafe
description: Escape to a beautifully located modern design apartment with a private pool and sauna. Scan the panoramic views above Pittwater from an open walk-out living room, or head down to the water to watch the boats before sunset.
neighborhood_overview: Paradise beach is just a few minutes' walk away. Take the spectacular walk up to Palm Beach Light House in the winter to spot whales, or visit Ku-ring-gai Chase National Park with its Indigenous rock carvings and roaming wallabies.
notes: Wedding Preparations We are the perfect location for Brides to be for their pre wedding night and Wedding preparation and pre wedding photos. Ask us about the availability to have photographs on our top deck with stunning views across Pittwater. We are happy for you to invite your bridesmaids, make up artists and photographers to our beautiful apartment and off course we have the perfect romantic location for your Wedding Night!!
transit: We have a bus stop at our door step - this will take you into Palm Bach or Avalon village. From there you can take an express bus into the city.
access: Guest access is private
interaction: I am very respectful of my guest privacy - most of my guest choose Pittwater Paradise as a romantic get away or for a secluded break. I am, however always available to give you advise on the best restaurants and things to enjoy in the area. Just let me know how I can help make you stay as enjoyable as possible
house_rules: No smoking within the apartment and no pets allowed.

host.host_location: Whale Beach, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: My partner and I had a wonderful stay at Pittwater Paradise. The accommodation was spotless and we were delighted to receive a welcome gift from Evelyn consisting of  wine, fruit and muffins. The kitchen was stocked with essential items such as milk, juice, tea, coffee, butter – really a nice touch. The view over Pittwater was lovely and relaxing, and the proximity to shops, beaches etc was fantastic. Evelyn was a wonderful host and more than happy to suggest dining options and other activities to do whilst on the northern beaches;  the house manual was also very informative.  We really had the best time and hope to return one day!

The apartment was amazing. The views were wonderful - sunset overlooking Paradise Beach is breathtaking. The apartment had all the amenities we needed and we were more than comfortable during our stay. The beaches were easily accessible, but the pool was a good alternative for when we didn't feel like leaving the place.

Furthermore, Evelyn was an absolutely sweet and kind host. Her and her family live just upstairs, but were not intrusive at all. Evelyn made every effort to ensure we were happy and looked after. 

Thank you for having us!

We had an amazing stay at Pittwater Paradise! Stunning views from the bed and living room area! Evelyn is a great host - very friendly and easy to talk to. The apartment is full of daylight and very clean. Pittwater paradise is the perfect getaway! We didn't want to leave...

A beautiful apartment in a beautiful part of the world! Evelyn was vey helpful and responsive, willing to help us anyway she could to ensure an enjoyable stay. When we arrived, she gave us a quick tour and then left us to make ourselves at home, but was just a quick call away if needed. A bowl of Fresh Fruit, Tea & Coffee, Yoghurts in the Fridge and a bottle of Australian Red wine (which didn't last long) were left to welcome us. The area is very peaceful, but only a 20 minute walk to the shops, cafes & beach of Avalon, from where you can catch a bus for the short trip up to Palm beach. I strongly recommend taking the walk up the Barrenjoey Headland. The views up by the lighthouse are spectacular and made for the ideal setting for my marriage proposal..... and she said YES!!! The perfect end to a perfect weekend away. We will be back!
Thank you Evelyn x

What a spectacular location! The apartment, the view, the birds in the morning, dreamy and hard to leave! Evelyn was wonderful, friendly, considerate and thoughtful, a pleasure to meet and Avalon and Pittwater are really magical! One of the most peaceful and special places I've ever been to.

Fantastic location and view.
Clean with lots of space.
Exactly as listed
We had a wonderful stay at Evelyn's place! The apartment had plenty of space and was very close to shops and near by beaches. It was a very relaxing stay and would definitely stay here again!

This apartment was in an amazing location with beautiful views. It was as described, had everything we needed and was nice and spacious. Everything was so close by, with so many lovely beaches to visit and a pool to swim in when we just felt like lazing about.

Evelyn was a great host. Her family lived upstairs, but you wouldn't even know they were there. Thank you for having us, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Gorgeous, light filled space! Evelyn was a lovely host - she was there if you needed anything but left us to enjoy the beautiful surroundings. Thank you, we would love to visit again
Very nice and clean place with everything you need. Exactly like the photos. Great view and nice neighbourhood with nearby shops. Would defiantly stay again

We stayed at Pittwater Paradise for our wedding. From the get go, Evelyn was so accommodating and went out of her way to ensure we had everything we needed. I got ready at the place before the wedding with my bridesmaid and Evelyn even invited us to take some photos on her upstairs balcony  The bed was super comfy, shower was great and we really had everything we needed. we will definitely be back one day! It was just perfect! Thank you Evelyn - you are so kind (we enjoyed the champagne too!)

Evelyn was great about communicating with me. Everything was like the pictures, if not better. The open, airy feeling of the place was more than a photo could capture. It was quiet and serene. We slept well and enjoyed the peaceful environment. Avalon is a quaint town with much to offer in dining and shopping. Evelyn was very helpful in recommending lovely dining experiences, including a splurge at Jonah's Whale Beach. Go there, even if only to have a drink and take in the view! We will definitely rebook with Evelyn, as it was a perfect getaway.
Glorious setting and fabulous self contained apartment. Pittwater is also close you can almost reach out and touch it!  Very private and quite - perfect for couples!

Evelyn was a very welcoming and mindful host.  She greeted us with warm hospitality (and even a bottle of wine and some fresh fruit).   Evelyn was very prompt with her communications and flexible with our check-in and check-out times.  The space is the lower level of her home which is completely private with separate access, complete kitchen facilities, ensuite and sauna facilities.  The view of the pool and the water in the background was a beautiful sight to awaken to in the morning.  The surrounding beach areas and points of interest are easily accessible from the property.  Evelyn's place is definitely a piece of paradise - the perfect setting to unwind and relax, which is exactly what we needed.

Beautiful apartment with stunning views. Evelyn was very welcoming and helpful. The apartment had all the amenities we needed, location was perfect. Beautiful walks near by. We would definitely return and highly recommend to others.
My husband and I just returned from Evelyn's place over the Oct long weekend. We had such a wonderful stay and didn't want to leave. Evelyn and her husband were so welcoming and we felt right at home
Evelyn was a great host. We had a lovely weekend. I recommend the place!
We came to Avalon for a relaxing no stress holiday and that's what we got. My husband and I will definitely be returning

We stayed 3 nights at the beautiful Pittwater Paradise, the apartment had a gorgeous view and was incredibly peaceful. 
It was close to beaches, and great places to eat.
Evelyn was a great host, gave us some great tips on where to go and even gave us a bottle of wine on arrival. 
I will definitely be back. 
Niamh & John

We'd like to thank our hosts for a wonderful stay!  The apartment was as beautiful as advertised, and just as private as we'd hoped.  The sauna worked wonderfully, and the beach towels were huge and thick! Don't underestimate the value of the birds and the books!  We definitely recommend this place.  Pittwater paradise indeed.  :)

Karl and Nicole

Great little spot, just as described in a beautiful part of Avalon. 
Evelyn was excellent in communicating with us and her partner was extremely welcoming with lots of tips for our stay. We had a car but the shops and main beach were in walking distance. The rooms were very clean and we appreciated the tea, coffee (and wine!) that was provided. I loved spending our last day relaxing by and swimming in the pool, the views from here were spectacular.  Thank you Evelyn for such a fabulous experience, I highly recommend it and would love to return :)
My wife and I enjoyed a relaxing & comfortable stay. Great place to get away to for the weekend. Beautiful scenery, peaceful & very private. Would definitely go back.
We loved the apartment,  it was a lovely place to spend our weekend. Located in a beautiful area,  close to beaches,  cafes and restaurants.  Thanks for having us!

We had a wonderful stay at Pittwater Paradise. It was a great location with a clean and modern house plus an amazing view. It's rare to find a gem like this. Reluctant to put such a positive review as I want this to be just our secret but too good not to share! A must for anyone who wants to spend time in Avalon, Palm Beach or Whale Beach. 
Evelyn was a great host and though she was on holidays at the same time she still responded in a timely manner and was very welcoming and hospitable.
Thanks for sharing was amazing!
A great apartment and brilliant location. We had such a relaxing time and would definitely return.

We were welcomed with a lovely bottle of wine and Evelyn came to meet us our first evening and gave us lots of useful information about the area.
The apartment was as described and provided every comfort we needed.
We loved the local area, lots going on in Avalon which was an easy walk away. 
The beaches are stunning and we enjoyed visits to Cottage Point and Palm Beach.
A thoroughly enjoyable holiday. Thank you.

Evelyn's apartment has the most beautiful views and is a lovely, clean and comfortable place to stay.
Evelyn was great to deal with, very prompt, friendly and kind.
We would highly recommend staying at this apartment!
Evelyn is a great host. I look forward to spending time once again at her little getaway .

The location of Evelyn's apartment is great! Amazing views, quiet neighborhood and still close to the beach, shops and restaurants. The apartment is very clean and tidy and provided with everything you need! Great getaway for the weekend!

Evelyn was a fantastic host. From first contact, Evelyn was super friendly and welcoming. My partner and I stayed at Pittwater Paradise over our wedding weekend and Evelyn went out of her way to make sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. All previous comments about the amazing views, great location and excellent host are fully justified. On our wedding night we were very touched to come home to a chilled bottle of bubbly. Hope to return one day! Thank you Evelyn and A!

Beautiful, clean and tidy property. The view over Pittwater is amazing (and uninterrupted). Being the middle of winter we didn't get much use of the pool. Although the cold didn't stop one of us from jumping in! The property also had a sauna which was an added bonus. Evelyn was an amazing host in being flexible with check-in/out times and was not short on tips and suggestions on things to see and do in the area. Having a car was helpful to be able to get from A-B, however Paradise beach and Clareville Kiosk are all within walking distance.

Evelyn is a wonderful Host. She made me feel very welcomed. I loved her beautiful space, it was peaceful and  relaxing. Fabulous view and everything one needs. I found the location perfect for some R'n'R.
Thanks for a great holiday.
Pittwater Paradise is a lovely get away apartment for two.  The hosts were warm and welcoming, and flexible with check in and out times. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thank you!

Evelyn's apartment is real oasis of calm and luxury. Absolutely perfect for a relaxing weekend. Evelyn greeted us with all the local tips and a nice bottle of wine! All one really needs to do is open the giant patio doors and sit back to enjoy the stunning views out over the swimming pool to the water and national park beyond - bliss. The apartment is finished to a very high standard and also has a sauna to relax you even further. We had a wonderful day following Evelyn's tips with a walk up to the Barrenjoey lighthouse for breathtaking views, a delicious brunch at The Boat House sat right on the water, a cocktail at Jonah's looking out on the ocean and a gourmet dinner at the Clareville kiosk (only minutes from the apartment). We will be telling all our friends and hopefully will certainly come again soon.

We had a great stay at Evelyn's place. The place is just as by the pictures, the view is very impressive and the swimming pool, completely private for us, although quite cold at that time of the year, was worth a dive in! Evelyn did all to make our stay very confortable, and accomodate the place for our ten month old!
Beautiful location, close to amenities, and fantastic host communication. We had a wonderful stay!

Evelyn's place was the perfect spot for our relaxed weekend away by the water.
The views was stunning and we loved the sauna and the pool too.
Nice interior design and great location. We easily walked to Avalon as well as the nearby Paradise beach.
Thanks Evelyn for having us!

Evelyn was very welcoming, helpful and insightful should we need to know anything about the local area. The location was perfect, peaceful and everything was just great for a quick break away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney!

We spent a wonderful weekend in a clean, spacious, well equipped, quiet, beautifully presented apartment. The views are gorgeous from the apartment and the pool, beach towels provided, we enjoyed a swim on each of our 3 days. It was lovely to hear the birds, watch the boats, enjoy the view from the whole apartment, we didn't like to leave, but enjoyed some nice walks around the area and a swim in the "Pittwater". We were lucky to see two stunning sunsets, the weather was fantastic so we decided to self cater...takeaway on our second night from the lovely little Indian Restaurant 5 mins walk down the road. ..couldn't get a better seat with views to match. We didn't meet Evelyn, but we had good communication prior to our stay, and keeping private suited us, thank you Evelyn,  we will tell our friends and be happy to return!

Evelyn was incredibly welcoming giving us great flexibility with arrival and departure times, providing great tips for what to see and do in the area, making sure we had all we needed for a luxurious stay. This truly was paradise away from the busy life we lead in Sydney. We loved sitting on the deck watching the spectacular sunset, soaking up the sweeping water views, swimming in the refreshing pool and relaxing in the spacious lounge. We will be returning and highly recommend this stay for locals and those wanting a truly memorable Australian beach stay.

Evelyn's place is perfect. The location is stunning, the unit is clean and modern. The pool was beautiful and the area was quiet. Evelyn took us in a short notice without hassle and it was exactly what we were hoping for and more. A beautiful spot with wonderful views. Perfect for a quiet weekend away surrounded by nature. Thanks for having us. Highly recommend.
Lovely apartment!  Clean, light & airy. Scenery beautiful.  Close to shops and beach. Stayed there on our wedding night, perfect!!

Evelyn is a Wanderflug host, she made me fell very welcomed and her place is real oasis of calm, luxury and beauty - it is peacful and relaxing. The view over Pittwater is amazing with spectacular sunsets and the swimming pool, completely privat for me. Evelyn did all to make my stay very confortable. I thanks Everlyn to having me!
A beautiful stay at Pittwater Paradise - would recommend for anyone after some rest and relaxation. A gorgeous base for exploring. Thank you!

We knew there were many beautiful places to visit in the area but the apartment and it's aspect were so stunning we spent almost all our time there enjoying the view and the pool. 

It was only a short walk to an intimate little Greek restaurant, a bottle store and a grocers shop  - and to the most aptly named Paradise Beach. Couldn't have wished for better. Superb. 

Our expectations were high. They were exceeded. 
We're already planning a return trip.

We had an amazing two nights at Evelyn's place. We booked a few nights before the trip and Evelyn accepted our booking and communicated promptly. The weekend temperature was in the high 30's and the pool was a refreshing retreat from the heat. The beaches around the area are amazing as is the view of Pittwater bay from the room. Evelyn's recommendations of restaurants and cafes was extremely helpful and we enjoyed every single one of them. Once again thank you Evelyn for allowing us into your home.
Beautiful spot, relaxing stay. Thanks so much!

Evelyn and Anthony are wonderful hosts. Always available and approachable while at the same time totally respecting one's privacy. Helpful with tips on local to dos, very hospitable, flexible and proactive (e.g. towel and linen change during our 10 days stay).

The place itself is a great choice as well: stunning views over Pittwater Bay, fully equipped and tastefully furnished. It is located in absolute proximity to two beaches; Avalon with the ocean beach, its shops and good restaurants is in walking distance. 

To sum it up: highly recommended, we would visit again anytime.

Such a beautiful outlook and lovely apartment. Quiet, spacious, clean and natural light all make for an amazing stay. The pool is a great addition. And thank you for the shiraz Evelyn, it was enjoyed from the living room couch looking out to Pittwater. Just what we needed for a weekend getaway from the city.

Evelyn's apartment is just perfect , its clean and tidy and nicely decorated. It is very easy to get about the Northern beaches from where the apartment is. The views from the balcony are beautiful and its wonderful to wake up each morning to such a gorgeous view. Evelyn is a fabulous host and she will go out of her way to help you make the most of your time in her apartment. Its easy to get around but its better to hire a car as it takes about 30 mins to walk into Avalon but once there, its a lovely little place to wonder round and to have a nice meal (we highly recommend Yoda if you like Thai food) there is a little bar called The Mill which is nice to have a few drinks in (Happy hour is 5-6pm). All in all we had a fabulous time and we defineltly will be going back .
Wonderful location. The views are spectacular. Very relaxing. Evelyn and Anthony lovely hosts and allow you plenty of privacy.
Really nice spot, nothing like waking up to that view
Amazing spot for a long weekend over looking the water and relaxing. Such a special spot. We will be back!
Wonderful spot gorgeous view and very relaxing

I enjoyed my stay in Pittwater.  The arrival was seamless and owners were very accommodating.  Short walk to Avalon beach where you can find a grocery store and many cute shops.  If you are traveling during winter, I recommend packing warm clothes because it gets chilly at night (I had no idea how cold it could get).  I also strongly recommend purchasing groceries to have in hand.
Awesome stay and location. Thanks
We had a fantastic weekend here. Evelyn and her partner Anthony provided us with so many great recommendations and were always happy to help us. We couldn't have asked for more! Thanks very much!
We were blown away by this place. Everything was pristine, the view was spectacular and host helpful and respectful. We will definitely be visiting again!
Amazing property with an even more amazing view to wake up to. Can't recommend it enough.

Evelyn was extremely kind and helpful with going the extra mile with requests. She had a comprehensive guide on things to do, where to eat and even a little local history about the area. The place was nice and clean and the views were quite splendid. Really enjoyed the stay and would recommend it for anyone looking to escape from the bustle of the city.
Great place to stay, relaxing and beautiful. Avalon is close by with great food.
Awesome place. The view was incredible and the apartment just perfect. Strongly recommend

We had a wonderful week in Pittwater. The view from the unit is brilliant- and the presentation and comfort provided within the accommodation is excellent.Evelyn was a warm host, and her local knowledge very helpful. 
Thanks for a lovely holiday!

Stunning views and a beautifully decorated apartment. Perfect for our romantic getaway. Such a peaceful setting in the midst of nature. Evelyn was a lovely host and recommended some great local places to eat at. Would highly recommend this place!

What a picturesque and relaxing place to call home for a few days. We came for our baby moon and it was perfect. Stunning views over Pittwater, the apartment had everything we needed and we barely left! Loved the pool and privacy. The local restaurants were excellent. Highly recommend this place.

A fantastic little hideaway. Perfect for a break from Sydney or romantic weekend away. Lovely hosts who look after you and provide a very warm welcome. Everything was as expected and a little more, great little touches. Thanks Alex and Maddi

Such a lovely place to spend my partner's birthday. Thank you Evelyn for the wine, your thoughtful suggestions of the area and flexibility on check out. The apartment looks much better in real life, we thoroughly enjoyed our time in the pool and the sauna was a great touch!

We had a great (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was easy and Evelyn and Anthony were lovely hosts.
The pool and the view are fabulous, you can easily stay in but the property is also located close enough to Avalon, Whale Beach and Palm Beach that going out for dinners and lunches is also easy.

Evelyn’s apartment - in addition to having its own pool and incredible view - is a short walk from a gentle and quiet sea pool and an organic cafe. We spent a lovely few days in a very picturesque location...

Paradise Found!  This property is even better than the photos depict -- if you are looking for an idyllic escape in a relaxing atmosphere with fabulous views, this is the place.  Evelyn is a fantastic host who made us feel like locals.  The addition of having your own private, refreshing pool at your doorstep makes Pittwater Paradise an ideal location for a weekend getaway, or a longer stay.  We thoroughly enjoyed our two weeks at Pittwater Paradise.
Wonderful view to wake up to and excellent local knowledge of great restaurants and things to do.

I stayed here for 2 nights in March in Evelyn's place. It's a beautiful self-contained apartment and pool with amazing views over Pittwater. It's in such a peaceful location and is within 5min walking distance to Paradise beach, the local corner store and restaurants. You are also a 2min car ride away from Avalon - which has a stack of cafes, restaurants, banks, gift stores and a big supermarket.

The rooms were a great size and the place was super clean. Evelyn personally greeted me upon arrival and had many recommendations for local restaurants and things to do. There was also a nice bottle of wine waiting for us to make us feel extra welcome.

Evelyn's place is the perfect place to hang out and relax or to use as a base to explore all the spectacular northern beaches (e.g. Palm Beach, Whale Beach, Avalon Beach, Newport Beach). I would recommend Evelyn's place to any couples looking for a relaxing bush and beach retreat. My only regret is not staying there for longer.

Beautiful property with stunning views and beautiful pool! So many amazing beaches to check out around the area. Awesome Wholefoods cafe within walking distance of the house that we visited 3 days in a row for brekky (best smashed avo ever)!! Evelyn and Anthony provided a bottle of wine to welcome us which was lovely. As there is no oven in the unit, Anthony was kind enough to let us use his oven upstairs one night. Not a lot of phone reception in the area but the property has great wifi included! The bed was super comfy and shower pressure was awesome. 
Thanks :)
Very close to everything. Lovely couple and amazing views m.

I cannot recommend Evelyn's enough. She was absolutely brilliant and so welcoming. The apartment is self contained, spacious, and gorgeous. The bottle of wine was very well received and the views are second to none.
We loved spending time here. The private pool is wonderful at the end of a day enjoying the area. The view by itself was worth the money.

Wow! What a gorgeous place and a fabulous view as well. Beautifully appointed, everything you need or wish for. Including a very cute lap pool and a small sauna. Evelyn’s communication was not only prompt but very personable. We were made welcome from the moment of our arrival. We highly recommend Evelyn’s for couples looking for something special.

Nice peaceful location, would recommend to someone looking to spend a lot of time doing outdoor activities and enjoying the area. The space is underneath the main house however privacy was not an issue.
Pretty much as advertised. Stunning view!! Lovely health cafe at the end of the road. Some nice walks. Just a really nice getaway for us.
Highly recommended place to stay, lovely hosts and beautiful apartment close to all the beaches
This was such an amazing place to stay. Our hosts went above and beyond. Thank you so much for making our special day magical

Evelyn's place was stunning. Very thoughtful touches in the rooms, including a bottle of wine to enjoy! Avalon had incredible food and coffee, and palm beach was a great place to explore. It's about a 15-20 minute walk to Avalon, but well worth the walk. Transit is also very easy to get to/from the home, including trips to Palm beach and Sydney. My girlfriend and I had thoroughly enjoyed our stay, and would definitely come back!
