My husband and are just back from Evelyn’s place.  We had a lovely time, it was just like the photos, a very simple but tasteful design.  The veiw was amazing and loved wake up to it every morning.  Evelyn is so nice if there was anything we needed all we had to do was knock on her door.
I

Evelyn and Andy are the most warm-hearted and helpful hosts we ever had. The place is truly worth the label "AirBNB plus" as it has everything one could dream: spacious and light filled living room, comfortable bed and bathroom, amazing views, pool and sauna... We enjoyed our stay to the fullest!
Was a great stay at Evelyn’s place, would definitely recommend.
Great weekend stay!

Thank you Evelyn for making your beautiful accommodation available to share with us via AirBnb. You live in a truly beautiful part of the world. Waking up to the stunning view over the Pittwater River was so relaxing. We highly recommend your place to anyone seeking a truly tranquil retreat. We hope yo see you again! Many thanks, KT and Karl
The landlord is very kind. Thank you very much for taking us to the seaside and picking us up
Handy location for walks and short drive to avalon shops.
Evelyn's place is exactly as in the pictures. Very clean and stylish! Great views and close to everything.

Evelyn was the perfect host, she responded very quickly and made her place available at very short notice. I would highly recommend staying at this place, it’s stylish, has a fantastic view and is very close to the town centre. Thanks Evelyn :)

A glorious water view is what you can wake up to, and Evelyn is a respectful and gracious host. 
If you are looking for a launch pad to the beaches, this is a great pick. 
Unfortunately no full kitchen, so plan to eat out!
Great place, amazing views, has everything you need. Even a sauna! Loved it, Would go back.
Clean spacious and great views. 10 minute walk into Avalon where there are lots of places to eat and shop.

Evelyn was a wonderful host. The location was beautiful and we had a wonderful stay. The internet and phone reception is a bit patchy which may be a problem for guests who need to keep in touch with work. Otherwise, everything was perfect!
Great weekend away
Palm beach was magical, and Evelyn's place all the more so with fantastic views and wonderful accommodations. A real slice of paradise!

A great retreat with a lovely view and pool. It was exactly as expected and we had a lovely stay.
The only faults are that WiFi and 4G access are poor, and the kitchen does not have an oven.

Fantastic Airbnb stay. Was easy to find, easy check in. Great location and lovely space. Comfy bed and couch, plenty of kitchen utensils, pots etc. for cooking. Avalon is a nice quiet area and very pretty with a charming township.
Beautiful self-contained apartment. A perfect northern beaches getaway.
Lovely stay at a great property, nice area and host.
We had a wonderful time, the place was stunning in terms of the decor, the facilities and the view, we loved it

This is a cosy place that is well equipped and has a stunning view. We really enjoyed the pool even when the weather turned rainy. Despite the accommodation being underneath the home of the hosts we felt we had plenty of privacy especially since the pool is overhung by the second story verandah. Phone reception (we're with optus) and WiFi a bit patchy but we got by. Would love to stay again.
Such a beautiful home tucked away with an amazing location!! Thank you Evelyn for your great hospitality.
Magnificent views of the bay and a warm host made me feel very relaxed . Having your own private pool with and access to well secluded beaches was a big draw card as well.

Fantastic self contained unit with great views over the pool down to the water below. It’s an easy downhill walk to Clareville Beach/Clareville Kiosk and a short drive to a number of great beaches including Palm Beach. Avalon town centre & beach is close by (2 minute drive or a pleasant walk) with all its cafes and restaurants. We would definitely stay again!

Evelyn and her husband were amazing hosts. Their apartment is clean and spacious. 

We loved having the  pool and the sauna in the apartment and there is an incredible view of the sea.

Our location was perfect with many of the beaches nearby. 

Overall an incredible experience, I would highly recommend Evelyn's apartment to anyone.
Evelyn’s place is just perfect...I’ve not stayed at an Airbnb before where I just did not want to leave. The view, the pool, the location...perfect, perfect, perfect! So keen to return!

This place is AMAZING. The photos don’t do the place justice. We stayed here for 5 nights with our 3 month old baby and it was the perfect place. 

It is clean and the private pool with gorgeous views made it so relaxing. It has a stove, microwave and little fridge for when we wanted to reheat food. 

It’s located well with a short 3 min walk to the Forage cafe for excellent morning coffees and short 10-15min drive to Palm Beach for seeing the Lighthouse and dining at the Boathouse or Jonas at Whale Beach or even Bert’s at Newport. 

Evelyn is a great host and we can’t wait to stay here again.
A beautiful apartment overlooking Pittwater. Paradise. Everything is so close. With you’re own pool and sauna. Highly recommend. Loved our stay

Thank you for sharing your home. The privacy was outstanding with check in greating only but available if needed.
We loved your towels and linen, they were a very nice touch.
Your view was priceless and the atmosphere was very relaxing with a touch of luxury.

name: Apartment in the heart of Barcelona
summary: This beautiful apartment is very bright and quiet, very well laid out and comfortable. Best of all, it is located in the heart of the city, within walking distance of all places of interest to visit, and next to a metro station.
space: This lovely bright and quiet apartment has been completely renovated in the year 2014. It is located in the heart of Barcelona, in the "Plaza Urquinaona" 4 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya, the center of the city. Gives an inner block of the district making the stay in a very quiet place. It sleeps 6 people and is available as follows: Entering the apartment, there is a spacious living room with two comfortable armchairs and a sofa bed with double mattress quality. From the living room through a large window provides plenty of light into the apartment, you access to the terrace which has a small table with seating for two, where you can enjoy your relaxing moments. The 32 "TV offers free satellite TV to enjoy a variety of channels. The dining room has a large table that seats 6 people. The kitchen, located in a separate room, is fully equipped with dishwasher, fridge freezer, oven, hob for cooking comfortably, microwave, toaster, kettle and all necessary cooking utensils as you would i
description: This beautiful apartment is very bright and quiet, very well laid out and comfortable. Best of all, it is located in the heart of the city, within walking distance of all places of interest to visit, and next to a metro station. This lovely bright and quiet apartment has been completely renovated in the year 2014. It is located in the heart of Barcelona, in the "Plaza Urquinaona" 4 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya, the center of the city. Gives an inner block of the district making the stay in a very quiet place. It sleeps 6 people and is available as follows: Entering the apartment, there is a spacious living room with two comfortable armchairs and a sofa bed with double mattress quality. From the living room through a large window provides plenty of light into the apartment, you access to the terrace which has a small table with seating for two, where you can enjoy your relaxing moments. The 32 "TV offers free satellite TV to enjoy a variety of channels. The dining room has a large t
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is a beautiful, well-lit and recently refurbished apartment, situated in the district of Eixample Dret in the centre of the city, a smart and historically modernist neighbourhood. The apartment is on Trafalgar road, right behind the famous Palau de la Música and walking distance from the Paseig de Gracia, where Gaudi’s Casa Batllo and La Pedrera both stand, and to Plaza Catalunya, a transport hub with easy access to the airport. The old quarters of El Born and the Gothic are also at walking distance. There is a great variety of fashionable shops, restaurants and tapas bars close by. There is also a supermarket conveniently opposite the apartment if required, as the apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen.
notes: Licencia nº: HUTB-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
transit: The apartment is located in the center of the city within walking distance to shops and restaurants. There is also a metro stop close by,  Urquinaona L1 and L4.
access: There is wireless internet, WiFi access throughout the apartment. Both TV in the living room and master bedroom have satellite connection to enjoy a variety of channels. The building has an elevator.
interaction: My priority is a good guest service, guiding and by solving any questions you have. My intention is to make them feel at home. I pray inform me of your arrival to arrange check-in. If you call me or send a message out of the airport road from the apartment, it will help me a lot. The departure time is set at 11am and arrival at 4:00 p.m., but will look to adapt to their needs everything I can. Anyway, an extra € 20 will be charged for a check-in after 22:00 and € 40 for check-in after 00:00, which will be paid in cash with the keys delivery.
house_rules: - Not allowed to accommodate more guests than those indicated to confirm the reservation. - Respect the content and container from the apartment. - You must keep clean and respect all the common areas elements. In this sense, you will ensure the building door is closed in your exits and entrances, as well as the elevator doors closed once it has been used.. - Respect the neighbors. Do not make loud noises that might disturb from 10pm to 8am. - Parties are not allowed. - Pets are not allowed. - Only smoking on balconies is permitted. - No drugs are allowed. - All equipment and machines in the apartment must be functioning properly. If not, I will do my best to fix it urgently. But no refund will be issued. - Failure to comply with these rules, resulting in damage or harm to the community or the apartment, would mean the loss of the security deposit. - When the Check in is after 10pm a supplement of 20 € to be paid in cash with the delivery of keys will be charged. - And most important,

host.host_about:
Soy ingeniero de profesión, lo que hace que sea muy meticuloso y perfeccionista. Soy extrovertido, me encanta conocer nuevas gentes y culturas de las que aprendo muchas cosas.
Una de mis pasiones es viajar, que comparto con mi mujer. Juntos hemos visitado muchas de las hermosas ciudades europeas. Me encanta conocer mundo, soy un enamorado del continente africano, he viajado por diferentes países de ese continente.
Practico varios deportes pero sobre todo que sean al aire libre: esquí, tenis y golf, pero mi gran pasión es la pesca a mosca.
Me encanta el cine, las obras maestras las veo varias veces para no perder los detalles, y la lectura de novelas.

reviews.comments:
Hôte ponctuel et accueillant. Nous a aidé à monter & descendre les bagages et à trouver un parking pour la durée du séjour.
L'appartement était totalement conforme aux photos proposées sur le site.
Rien à dire sur la qualité du logement.

Fuimos muy bien recibidos por Antonio. El departamento está impecable. Limpio, ordenado y tal cual muestran las fotos. Todas las comodidades para pasar las mejores vacaciones en Barcelona. Eramos 4 personas adultas y estuvimos muy cómodo. El departamento está muy bien ubicado. Sin dudas recomendamos este departamento y a Antonio.

Perfect place for spending couple of days in the heart of Barcelona, very comfortable, modern, nice, clean, quiet and TOP location! Would definitely recommend, Antonio and his wife were very nice and gave us a warm welcome, also allowed for a later "check-out".

Excelentes anfitrión!!! estuvimos permanentemente en contacto por (Hidden by Airbnb) , nos recibió muy amablemente y nos aconsejó de cómo recorrer la ciudad y demás. Para nosotros era de suma importancia encontrar un departamento LIMPIO, LINDO, BIEN UBICADO Y A UN PRECIO ACCESIBLE. Superó nuestras expectativas ampliamente: el departamento esta muy bien equipado (no falta nada), es amplio, luminoso, todo estuvo super limpio, las camas son excelentemente cómodas, el mobiliario es moderno y de muy buen gusto. La ubicación es genial!!! MAS NO SE PUEDE PEDIR...FELICITACIONES ANTONIO!!!!

Antonio s'est montré très disponible et de bons conseils.
L'appartement correspond tout à fait à la description faite sur l'annonce. Il est très centrale et au calme.
Nous avons apprécié la propreté.
Conclusion, je recommande ce logement.

Antonio is an excellent host and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at his apt. It is exactly like the pictures- clean, spacious, and has all the amenities you need. We had 4 girls traveling so having 2 bathrooms was great. He has detailed instructions of how to use the amenities if you need assistance. He also gave us reccomendations of places to eat (delicious paella a couple of doors down)! We were able to use the washer during our stay and the wifi connection is really good. The apartment is located in an excellent part of town- close to everything and also subways. We were able to walk to Las Ramblas, take subways to Sagrada Familia and Parc Guell. Lastly, Antonio went above and beyond to assist me in retrieving my cell phone that I accidentally left in Madrid at the train station. I would definitely reccomend his apt and I'd happily stay here again if I have the chance to return to Barcelona!
The reservation was canceled 93 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

깨끗하고 좋아요. 지하철 역바로 앞이고. 관광지랑 가깝고. 넘 좋았습니다. 강추예요.
Me gusto mucho el depa de Antonio. Esta muy limpio y hay todos lo que necesitamos. Esta junto con metro y esta cerca de todos. Recomiendo mucho !

This is the perfect apartment for a short (or even a long) visit to Barcelona - light, spacious, beautifully clean and very thoughtfully equipped, I can't really see how it could be improved. Its central  location is ideal for exploring the city, but in spite of being so close to busy streets the apartment is quiet and peaceful and it was great to have not one but two sunny balconies. Antonio was happy for us to arrive early and was a welcoming and helpful host who gave us (two couples) plenty of useful tips for the city.  We all loved Barcelona and would very happily return to this apartment as three days was definitely not long enough!

We were promptly and warmly received by Elena, Antonio's sister. The apartment was well organized, clean and in an excellent location. Great storage for personal hygiene items in the bathrooms, a plus with 2 older daughters. Easy access to Plaza Catalunya and metro! For my family, the downside were the overly, firm, dense, elongated, synthetic pillows. We found them to be most uncomfortable. I placed a decorative pillow from the living room in my pillowcase. Also, the apartment looking this high end with attention to detail, I was disappointed with the low thread count bed sheets and the single, small air dried bath towel for our 3 night stay.
Wonderful apartment, great location and excellent host. Antonio was very helpful and accommodating. We loved this new, beautiful and quiet apartment

Antonio is an excellent host. He welcomed us on the late evening and gives us very helpful information about the neighborhood. The apartment is the same as Antonio was described. Located on the heart of Barcelona, clean, cozy and very well equipped. Perfect place to enjoy your stay in Barcelona. Highly recommend Antonio's place.

The apartment was in a great location and was easy to get to. Very nice space and having separate bathrooms with each bedroom is a big plus. Ana met us and gave us a warm welcome and a lot of great information. I would absolutely recommend this if you need a great 2 bedroom place in Barcelona.

Antonio est un excellent hôte, très réactif à chacune de nos interrogations. Nous avons été accueillis rapidement et très chaleureusement par Ana qui nous a donné d'excellents conseils pour passer un bon séjour à Barcelone (merci Ana). L'appartement est tout à fait conforme à sa description : grand espace , propre, lumineux et très calme. Son emplacement est idéal pour visiter la ville. Nous sommes enchantés de notre séjour et nous recommandons vivement ce logement.

Antonio was a great host. He met us at a time that was convenient to our schedule and gave us a thorough tour of the home.  The location is  awesome, very convenient to the metro but on a quieter street.  The place was clean and inviting, with everything we needed for our stay.  It was my first stay in an airbnb, and my family and I had a wonderful experience.  I'd stay here again if I ever return to Barcelona.

We had a great time at Antonio's place. He arrived promptly to let us in and give us detailed information about the apartment and Barcelona. He answered all our questions and was available whenever we needed him. The apartment was great -- the pictures accurately show it -- and it is in a great location. It is close to the city center (Gotic, Las Ramblas, the beaches) but also walking distance from La Sagrada Familia. Highly Recommended.

As listed, the apartment was very clean and comfortable. It was truly in the middle of everything you would want to see. Ana was patiently waiting for us as we arrived late from the airport and took her sweet time to make sure we were oriented correctly. She sat us down at the table and explained to us on a map where we were, were to go and not to go. Antonio has a great place in the middle of town and I will defiantly stay again when I return to Barcelona.

The apartment is nice, clean, well-appointed.  Everything we needed for a week long stay.  Close to supermarkets and easy walking distance to metro and all the bars/restaurants of Gothic quarter.  And Antonio is a great host.

Great apartment in Central Barcelona.  Right off the beaten path such that it was quiet, but close enough to everything that you could easily walk.  Meet and greet was easy and they were very informative about the local offerings.  Apartment was bright and spacious, very comfortable for us.  Convenient to have grocery store across the street, public transportation easily accessible, and any food option you might desire within close walking distance. Wonderful place to explore the city.  Antonio was gracious and extremely helpful, pleasure to work with.

We had a lovely stay at Antonio's apartment! When I arrived to pick up the keys, I was met by Ana who was very nice and helpful! The location is perfect. You can easily walk to many sites and the metro is also extremely close! the beds were very comfortable, and the whole apartment was equipped with everything you would need and more! And the whole place was spotless. Antonio was also very helpful and his communication is faultless. I will definitely stay here again when my family come to visit me!! Thank you Antonio and Ana.

Antonio's apt' was wonderful. the place was clean, fully equiped and in the best location in the city. it is close to everything, but still quite.
inside the place everything was perfect. there was enough room for all of us and the kitchen is just great for cooking.
beside all of that - Antonio was the best host we ever met. kind and carefull. 
We don't have anything bad to say - just to thank you so mush!!
I traveled to attend a conference. This apartment is perfectly located to reach the international congress center (few metro stops). The apartment is nice and Antonio was really welcoming.

Ana who met me to give me the keys and show me around the apartment was lovely. She also recommended must see places around Barcelona. The flat was really nice and the location was brilliant... we walked everywhere. I've recommended this to family and friends already and would love to stay again.

Fabulous apartment in a really attractive location: effectively on the border between El Born and L'Eixample. All the usual tourist haunts are within easy walking distance but you feel a little removed from the crowds and closer to the real heart of the city. There's also a metro station about one hundred metres away, which really adds to the convenience. Antonio's attention to detail is really to be commended and his friend Anal gave us a wonderful welcome (despite the fact we arrived later than anticipated, owing to really awful traffic from the airport). The apartment was spotless, tastefully decorated and equipped with all the accessories you could need, including modern air conditioning in both bedrooms. It's also very quiet, which is unusual for Barcelona.

Excellent stay. We were welcomed and shown all the facilities. Two minutes walk to Metro station and walkable distance to Cathedral and Rambla. Spacious apartment at center of Barcelona.  Antonio responded all queries immediately by SMS/ Whatsup.We enjoyed our stay

Antonio was very responsive with our questions when we texted him.  Even though our plane was over an hour late, Antonio had a friend named Ana waiting to let us in and show us how to use the appliances, point out major attractions on a map that she left for us, and the coming in and out procedures.  The place was clean and close to everything.  It reminded me a bit of a modern hotel suite.  Also, it is right across the street from a grocery store.
Très beau logement près de tout. Nous étions 4 adultes et nous avions beaucoup d'espace. Endroit très propre.  Nous reviendrions sans problème! C'est très facile de communiquer avec Antonio.

Stayed here for a week with a group of girls and had the most fantastic stay. Antonio was extremely welcoming. He met us at the apartment and showed us around the place, pointing out where all the essentials were such as towels etc. He then gave us a map and provided us with some ideas about attractions and restaurants that we could visit. The apartment is exactly as it seems in the photos; every room was very spacious and having two bathrooms (especially for us) was perfect. The location of the apartment is also fantastic. It is across the road from a really good supermarket and is only 5 minute walk at max from the metro station, which meant that access around the whole city was so easy. We were not disappointed by the apartment in any way, and would definitely hope to stay here again, if we were to return Barcelona.

Lovely place, friendly host, super central area. Had a great stay at Antonio's and will stay again when I return to Barcelona. The apartment is modern and clean and equipped with sufficient air conditioning.

Fantastic apartment, we really enjoyed our stay. Antonio responded quickly when we had an issue with the WiFi and the arrival-process was very smooth. Location is quiet and on the doorstep of both Born and Las Ramblas. Very clean and well-equipped.

Thank you!

We had a wonderful stay at Antonio's place! The apartment was just as pictured with more than plenty of space for 4 of us. His friend Ana met us promptly at the apartment, showed us around, and gave us recommendations for places to go while in Barcelona. The location was walking distance or a short cab from anywhere we needed to go. We would gladly stay here again!
Thank you Antonio for your hospitality. The apartment was perfectly clean and at a very good location. I would recommend everyone to stay here.

Ana was great when greeting us. Antonio communicated frequently. The only issue was it took two days to fix one of the two water heaters but all else was excellent, especially the location and cleanliness of the apartment.
The location of the property is excellent.  It is within easy walking distance of all the major attractions in Barcelona.

Antonio met up on time and has excellent English.  He went through all the details of facilities in the apartment.  He fully appraised us of everything we needed to use within the apartment and in the public hallways.

Antonio and his friend Ana were very friendly, they helped us a lot with orienting in the flat and in the city. The flat is as described, with a very well location! We will definitely come back to Antonio's place when back to Barcelona!

Estuvimos un fin de semana y todo fue genial.Antonio y Ana súper atentos , la localización muy céntrica con todo a mano y el apartamento tal cual se describe en el anuncio.Todo estupendo, repetiría sin duda!

Apartamento perfecto. Muy bien ubicado, a pasos de plaza Cataluña y de tres líneas de metro y del bus que lleva al aeropuerto. 
Todo impecable, muy bien equipado, con habitaciones y baños amplios. 
El anfitrión muy preocupado y atento a nuestra llegada. 
Las fotos no le hacen justicia, de verdad una alternativa perfecta.
Cómodo!!!! Lo califico así porque tanto mis amigos como yo hemos estado muy a gusto. Las camas eran cómodas y el piso  es bastante espacioso.

La experiencia fue genial, nos quedamos 5 personas cómodamente, Antonio fue muy cordial y atento con nosotros, la ubicación es muy central, a pasos del metro pero el piso es silencioso y se puede descansar muy bien, la verdad nos encantaría volver
Merci à Antonio pour son accueil de qualité.  L'appartement correspondait parfaitement à nos attentes : spacieux, calme, confortable, bien équipé et très bien situé. On espère revenir prochainement !

Excellent apartament 
Great location : 2 steps from gotic area, Plaza Catalunya na Passeig de Gracia
Restaurants, metro station, ...
Perfect for a family group, the apartment is very comfortable 
António was very helpful 
Checkin and checkout Easy

El apartamento de Antonio es inmejorable por donde se lo mire. Ubicación, comfort, accesibilidad, comunicación, todo es excelente!
La Cocina de maravilla, las habitaciones, los baños impecables! Caminando se llega a plaza Cataluña en pocos minutos, hermosa zona muy tranquila y segura!
Definitivamente recomendable, y por supuesto volveremos en nuestra próxima visita!! Muchas gracias!
The apartment was perfect for our stay. It's very well located in the city and has a supermarket across the road. Check in was very smooth. I'd happily stay here again.
Super Lage!
Very nice place Antonio!!!

Antonio's place is a home away from home. The apartment is very clean, nicely decorated and well equipped. It totally exceeded our expectations. It is centrally located and we walked everywhere. Antonio was a great host who responded to all our questions and requests promptly, including letting us check-in half an hour early. We didn't meet Antonio as it was Ana who checked us in. Ana was most helpful. Not only did she show us around the apartment and how to use the equipments, she took her time to give us lots of handy tips and useful information about Barcelona. We'd not hesitate to recommend this apartment to our friends or stay here again when we return to Barcelona. Our heartfelt thanks to Antonio and Ana

This is a great apartment located in the central part of Barcelona close to many historical sites, restaurants and shopping. Our family of 4 stayed for 6 nights and we truly enjoyed our stay. The apartment was clean, quiet and very comfortable. Although public transportation was easily available, we walked everywhere. We highly recommend staying at Antonio's apartment!
This is the perfect place to stay when in Barcelona. It's location is brilliant as it's right in the heart of the city, close to all that's to see and do yet calm and quiet too. We will return.
Very nice location to visit tourists spots, clean and comfortable apartment.
房子的地里位置很nice,去英国宫都可以步行去,离地铁站只有100米,我们住了四天,住得很放松,天天还可以自己做饭,很好的房子

Great location, away from the noise but close to the attractions. 
Clean and well equipped for our short stay
호스트 안토니오가 직접 체크인을 해줘서 너무 쉬웠습니다. 친절한 관광지 및 식당 안내 덕분에 더욱 더 즐거운 여행이 되었습니다. 위치도 매우 좋으며 시끄럽지 않습니다. 다시 바르셀로나에 온다면 안토니오의 숙소로 머물 것입니다. 다만 오래 머물 경우 안토니오에게 수건을 더 요청하거나 개인 수건을 챙겨가야 할 것 같습니다.
The location is fantastic and yet on a quiet side street. Antonio is a wonderful host. This is our second stay and we will be back again.

Great location which was walkable to main attractions (we did walk almost everywhere!). Apartment was also very clean, spacious and comfortable. Antonio was also really easy to contact and communicate with. Thank you!

Antonio’s apartment is in an amazing location, sparklingly clean and modern and comfortable for the 4 of us who stayed. 
The apartment is large, and there are 2 en suites which made 4 girls getting ready for New Year’s Eve super easy! And, something small but super useful- the apartment came with 2 sets of keys!  

Antonio himself was super responsive via the app and (Hidden by Airbnb) and was there to greet us when we arrived.

All in all a great trip made better by having a great apartment to stay in.

Gostei bastante da localização do apartamento. O apartamento oferece bastante infraestrutura. É muito bom! Tive problemas com o check-in. Esperei por Ana, pessoa enviada por Antonio para nos receber no apartamento, por um tempo. Eu fiquei com o meu filho de oito meses, meus pais, meu marido e muitas malas na entrada do prédio. Ficamos na rua esperando a Ana chegar. Quando cheguei no aeroporto não consegui internet e nem no Aerobus, mas Antonio tinha o horário do meu voo. Tivemos que recorrer a uma loja próxima para pedir a senha de wi-fi para falar com Antonio, que nos explicou que Ana estava entregando outro apartamento e a contactou para ir ao nosso encontro. Desde o contato com Antonio, esperamos por Ana cerca de 15 a 20 minutos. Fora a questão do check-in, tudo ok.
Great location and helpful host!

Antonio Was by far the best Host I have had. Very friendly, attentionate and caring. He met with us and gave us tips and pros on the neighborhood, the house and everything else. The house was very comfy and close to everything! I would stay there again anytime!
All prior reviews were completely accurate. This is a perfect and quiet location.
Very good
The apartment matched exactly what was advertised. Antonio was the perfect host. One word to sum up everything- Sensational!
Amazing location, edge of old town and its home away from home. Spacious for 5 people.  Very clean and Grocery store right across the street.   Antonio gave great info and map around town.
Great location. Great hospitality. Definitely recommended to make your trip a memorable one.

It was six of us who stayed there for six night. All of us were very happy with the place. Everything was clean. The place was exactly like the pictures. Antonio was a great host. Responded to my text right away. I will go back to his place again and again. The location was absolutely great. Close to everything and safe.

We really enjoyed staying at Antonio's - the location is perfect, i.e. close to the sights (Sagrada familia, Gothic district, Gaudi buildings etc.), walking distance to very nice restaurants/bars in Eixample, next to supermarkets, only half an hour walk to the beach (or even less) and it is right around the corner of Plaça de Catalunya where you have public transport (even directly from the airport). Antonio's friend Ana gave us really good tips which parts of the city to explore - thank's a lot!

The appartment was spacious and clean and the small balconys were really nice (maybe a little bit chilly in the evening - but we only had like 22 degrees which might be unusual for this time of the year).

We stayed with 5 people which is okay but the only disadvantages were a) the bathrooms which are next to the bedrooms (thus, the person on the couch cannot reach the bathroom at night without waking the others) and b) the couch itself which is not very comfy. We would not recommend to plan to sleep on the couch longer than a few nights as the mattress sags and might give you sleepless nights... (in contrast to the ones in the bedrooms which are good!)

Anyway, I would definitely come back (but with a maximum of 4 people ;-)).
This place was perfect for us, two couples. Near the old part of town and other attractions. We loved the balcony after a long day walking around Barcelona.
Utrolig flott leilighet, veldig ren og hadde alle fasiliteter! Super beliggenhet! Verten svarte raskt på alle henvendelser. Absolutt å anbefale!
Nice apartment really near in the center of Barcelona, a very beautiful place!
Perfect location to explore Barcelona. Comfortable apartment, exactly as described. Highly recommended.

Generally speaking the stay is pleasant, location is good , only regret is the renovation project going on upstairs which made some noise during the weekday but it’s something the landlord can’t control .  Would recommend this place.

The best thing about Antonio’s apartment is its superb location - near Plaça Catalunya yet in a very quiet place as the apartment faces the inner courtyard. You can simply walk around Barcelona or take a bus/metro if you need to reach some far places. The apartment is quite spacious and we felt very comfortable with a family of 5 (3 adults and 2 kids). Easy check-in and check-out and excellent communication with Antonio. This is our second time in Barcelona and I think we’ve found the right place to come back again. Highly recommend.

Very  nice location!
And nice host

Antonio’s place was just as described and we loved every night of our stay. There was always plenty of supplies in the cabinets (toilet paper, detergent, shampoo, etc) during our 5 night stay. Antonio was also very responsive to all my questions. Highly recommended!

A comfortable apartment in a wonderful location. A quiet street with great restaurants nearby, serving food I will long remember. Easy walk to  Las Ramblas, La Pedrera, Barcelona Cathedral and the Picasso museum.

The apartment was very clean comfortable & within walking distance to the centre. Ana met us as arranged. was very friendly & helpful giving us information re local amenities & restaurants. Would definitely stay here again.
Convenient location, great communication from the owner, the amenities and pictures are accurate.
Great apartment.
Really enjoyed our stay at Antonio’s Airbnb. It was a great base for exploring Barcelona from. Comfortable, clean and well maintained.

Really enjoyed my stay here. There was a massage parlour right below which I really enjoyed during the cold. Supermarket was right opposite. We were right smack in town. Beds were really comfy and house was very clean. Would definitely stay here again.

Perfect place for family vacation (traveling with 2 kids ages 14 & 10). Amazing location, across the street from grocery. Very clean - modern bathrooms with good water pressure and comfortable beds. Antonio had very good communication.  We would definitely stay there again!

Highly recommend this apartment.  The location is fantastic with everything we needed within a few minutes walk.  The apartment is clean and comfortable.  Antonio greeted us on our arrival and was very helpful with pointing out places of interest, great places to eat and how to get around the city.

Antonio et tres reactif
L appartement es tres propre et bien situé 
Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés
Great location and very comfortable and convenient apartment.  Highly recommended

호스트의 답변, 피드백이 정말 빨라요.
아파트 위치도 좋고 거실에 있는 식탁도 넓어서 좋았고 테라스에 앉아서 커피 마시는 것도 좋았어요. 욕실도 각 방에 있어서 정말 편했어요. 옷장에 옷걸이도 많아서 좋았구요.
저희는 4인 가족이었는데 편안히 머물다 갔었어요.

The place was amazing. Very clean and cozy. Lots of lights and the location is fantastic. Very close to Plaça Catalunya, close to the tube, but we didn’t use any public transport because we walked everywhere. In the apartment there was anything we need and Antonio was incredibly welcoming. I highly recommend this apartment.
Grate location, good apartment.

name: Bedroom Douillette Mont-Royal Metro
summary: Nice little cozy room two steps away from Mont-Royal Subway, functional for working. New and comfortable single bed (75X38in) Bedding included for one person. Desk with chair and lamp, wardrobe and ceiling ventillateur.
space: Victorian Style Centenary House with high ceilings, moldings, woodwork and hardwood floors. The apartment has three bedrooms to rent and a rear terrace. 2 minute walk from the Metro Mont-Royal Subway and The Mile End neighbourhood.  Facing the Santuary of Plateau Mont-Royal. Downtown is 10 minutes by subway.
description: Nice little cozy room two steps away from Mont-Royal Subway, functional for working. New and comfortable single bed (75X38in) Bedding included for one person. Desk with chair and lamp, wardrobe and ceiling ventillateur. Victorian Style Centenary House with high ceilings, moldings, woodwork and hardwood floors. The apartment has three bedrooms to rent and a rear terrace. 2 minute walk from the Metro Mont-Royal Subway and The Mile End neighbourhood.  Facing the Santuary of Plateau Mont-Royal. Downtown is 10 minutes by subway. Travelers have access to the kitchen as well as appliances such as microwave, refrigerator, stove. Common areas; living room, dining room, bathroom and rear patio. There is a washer & dryer also available. I am available for guiding you during your trip in Montreal. The Plateau Mont-Royal is by far the most hip in Montreal. Small intimate theaters, coffee shops and retos added to the cultural effervescence and ambiance which are converging with every lifestyles. It
neighborhood_overview: The Plateau Mont-Royal is by far the most hip in Montreal. Small intimate theaters, coffee shops and retos added to the cultural effervescence and ambiance which are converging with every lifestyles. It is undoubtedly here that one has the best idea of what is truly Montreal. It is a predominantly francophone and french community. Artists and students, young professionals and new families mix with diverse cultural communities. The Rue Saint-Denis and its wide range of shops, cafes and terraces. Avenue du Mont-Royal with its bars both trendy and relaxed. Small side streets dotted with twisted iron staircases, as well as the greenery of the La Fontaine Parc. Chic lounge with the brew pub of the corner, through a wide range of restaurants, the choice is rich. Quebec musicians produce performances each summer evening, the sidewalks overflow with life.
notes: There is two nice indoor cats, Paco and Babou which share common areas.
transit: NEAR ALL SERVICES A 2-minute walk from the Mont-Royal Metro and Rue Saint Denis. Downtown is 10 minutes by subway. From Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport in Montreal going to the apartment.  Buy Bus (#747) and then by Metro (orange line), about 45  minutes.  By car, about 25 minutes (23.6 km).
access: Travelers have access to the kitchen as well as appliances such as microwave, refrigerator, stove. Common areas; living room, dining room, bathroom and rear patio. There is a washer & dryer also available.
interaction: I am available for guiding you during your trip in Montreal.
house_rules: Respect the premises and neighbors. Keep common areas clean and wash your dishes after each use. - Do not let the cats go outside and do not feed the cats. A supplement $ for each use of the washer / dryer. - No smoking inside the apartment; smoking is allowed on the back porch only. - No guest, only registered Airbnb members are authorized to access the apartment.

reviews.comments:
I had a great time in Daniel's house. Excellent location, almost in front of the subway and with tons of cafes, bars and restaurants. The room it's exactly as described and as someone noticed in other review, the sheets and blankets are of very quality. 

Daniel is a welcoming guest and gave me excellent suggestions about what to do.

I would stay there again for sure and recommend Daniel's house for anyone.

Que dire si ce n'est je me suis bien senti chez Daniel. L'appartement est bien tenu, décoré avec gout, spacieux et idéalement situé ! 
Je suis plutôt de tempérament réservé, Daniel a été très gentil et serviable. C'est le genre de personne qui s'adapte à ses hôtes, il est ouvert à la discussion et il n'hésite pas à prendre de son temps pour donner des conseils.

Si je reviens, c'est bien chez lui que j'irai et je vous le recommande.

This place was a rare gem and I was lucky enough to stay here for a whole week.

Daniel is truly friendly and honest, and an absolutely natural host. It was obvious he has a genuine interest in people which made him effortlessly accommodating and easy to talk to. The cats were no different, clearly they have learned a lot from him. 

The apartment was beautiful, an incredible space filled with unique décor, furniture, and art, much of which was custom made by Daniel himself. The private room no doubt matched the rest of the place, comfortable, clean, and stylish. 

The location could not be better, with transit in all directions just steps outside (including the Metro) and right in the middle of a lively and creative neighbourhood.

I had a great time here and would highly recommend this place.
Daniel was an amazing host and my 4 day stay was absolutely amazing! The room was great and super clean and he opened up his kitchen and laundry room for my use as well. Definitely recommend!

Daniel was a fabulous host who made me feel very welcome in his home. He graciously accepted my booking on short notice after another AirBnB booking fell through. I ended up feeling lucky as it is hard to imagine finding a better host.

Daniel's apartment was a lovely place to stay. The location was excellent - right in the heart of the Plateau and well connected to down town via public transport. Nearby shops make it easy to self-cater, but there are also plenty of cafes and restaurants if you prefer not to cook. The Mile End is within walking distance, and Patisserie Au Kouign Amann (which makes the best croissants in town) is only a minute away.

Daniel has several rooms available. This one is smaller, but has a desk, something that was particularly useful for me as I was travelling primarily for work.

Daniel's apartment is absolutely beautiful and charming. It's also in the perfect location for experiencing the best of Montreal. The bedroom itself is quiet, charming, and peaceful - your own little oasis. The bed is also very comfortable, and the room is very dark at night, with no noise from the street -- so it's great for catching up on sleep.

Daniel is a lovely person and it was a joy to meet him and chat over coffee in the mornings. He goes out of his way to make you feel welcome and at home in his apartment, and has even stocked the bedroom with guidebooks to help you plan your trip. 

This was the absolute PERFECT place to stay for a beautiful, peaceful, fun and relaxing week in Montreal. I'm already dreaming about my return :)
Daniel a été un hôte parfait. Il a su se rendre disponible et est très accueillant. Le séjour chez lui a été très agréable ! Et son appartement est vraiment chaleureux !

Daniel was the most delightful of hosts. Friendly, welcoming and a perfect balance of giving one personal space, yet also there to have a nice chat with. He's an excellent conversationalist, and it was really nice just to be able to chat casual with him (in French, and of course, he speaks English as well). The apartment and bedroom were spotless and just so cozy during a very cold week. I absolutely loved that my comfy room had its own adjustable thermostat. Daniel's cats are sweet and calm, and quite adorable when they peek their noses outside in the cold snow. You could literally crawl to the metro station from Daniel's place. It's phenomenally located. There's also the bus that goes to the top of the mountain that stops just in front of his place. 
Furthermore, you'll sleep like an angel, as Daniel's place is incredibly quiet (being 2 flights of stairs above the street and set-back a bit as well). The kitchen was fully equipped with plenty of space for one's own food in the cupboards and fridge.
It was one of the most relaxing weeks I've spent in a long time. 
Merci Daniel! :)

Tout était parfait.
Daniel Provençal est quelqu'un de très chaleureux
J'ai été très bien reçu et tout de suite mis à l'aise
La chambre correspond exactement à la présentation sur le site
Le quartier est très bien placé pour la découverte de Montréal

Daniel is a very warm and welcoming host; I really appreciated that he took the time to make coffee and sit down with me to talk about Montreal and his travels more generally.  It made me feel a lot more comfortable about staying in his impeccably maintained apartment.  It is a very clean place with two amiable cats, and is peaceful and quiet.  There were two other guests staying there at the same time as me but I didn't even see them, nor hear them!

The area feels very safe and it is extremely close to the Metro station, which is especially useful if you are visiting in freezing midwinter.  I did walk quite a lot even though it was so cold, and I can imagine that in the summer this would be a great base for exploring the city on foot too.  The apartment itself is very warm and snug and there is temperature control in the bedroom so you won't ever be cold indoors.
L'endroit est super. C'est propre, accueillant, et à deux pas du métro. Bref allez y sans hésiter.

je suis retourné chez Daniel sans hésiter une seconde. Je savais qu'il
était un hôte sympathique et que l'endroit serait propre et accueillant.
Et je ne me suis pas trompé.

The experience was wonderful. Daniel is an excellent host and he keeps his home pristine.  His cats are friendly and not intrusive, and the space itself has a great vibe and energy. It was a pleasurable stay while I was in the city. :)

Daniel was a lovely host! His apartment is beautiful and I am extremely jealous. I only wish I had more time to spend in it.

A++ Would recommend!

This was my second stay at Daniel's apartment. Once again I had a great time. Daniel was a very welcoming host and his apartment is perfectly located for exploring all the the Plateau has to offer. His hard work on the balcony has also paid off this spring - it is a lovely spot to sit and enjoy the sunset.
Excellent location as well as accommodation would definitely come back.

Super séjour chez Daniel, j'ai réservé au dernier moment et je n'ai pas regretté mon choix ! Tout est comme décrit dans l'annonce ; l'appartement est bien localisé et on s'y trouve très bien. Super expérience.

Excellent accueil de la part de Daniel : j'ai beaucoup apprécié ses conseils et nos petites discussions...
Chambre confortable dans un joli appartement, très bien situé, à deux pas du métro et dans un quartier dynamique.
Pour ma 1ère expérience Airbnb, je suis enchantée et ce serait avec plaisir que je reviendrais, pour un prochain séjour à Montréal !

Daniel was truly an excellent, kind and attentive host with a beautifully decorated apartment that is situated only steps from the subway in one of the best, liveliest neighborhoods in Montréal. I definitely enjoyed my stay there and interacting with him and would not hesitate staying again on my next trip to Montréal.
very great host.  fantastic cook as well

My stay with Daniel was wonderful.  The place is in the perfect location, is clean, and beautiful.  I have stayed with Daniel twice now and both times I had the feeling that I was staying at a friends house.  

If you are looking for a place to stay look no more.  Daniel's place makes you feel at home away from home. My best reviews for the place and for Daniel.

Daniel was a very accommodating and gracious host! The location of his place is right by the Mont-Royal Metro, which is essential for those of us who want to explore Montreal on foot. Additionally, Mont-Royal Ave is a great street, filled with shops, bars, and cafes. The room was warm, comfortable, and perfectly sized for a single traveler. I'll definitely seek out this place the next time I stay in Montreal!

Great location, great host! Daniel was quick to communicate days before I arrive to make sure he is physically present for my arrival, which he was.  During my stay, he was also very attentive to any needs I might have, by telling me the key attractions and restaurants to go in Montreal.  His place was clean and neat.  I'll definitely stay here again on my next visit to Montreal!

I felt very very lucky to start my first airbnb experience at Daniel's. The location is superb, metro is just steps away crossing the street. Daniel is my first impression of Montreal, he is always there to help and provide advices such as for good restaurants, easy ways to travel around, etc. I felt very home-welcomed. The place is cozy, neat, clear and quite! I will come back hopefully in Jun(for Summer) and Oct(for Autumn) next year. Daniel's is my first choice, hopefully I will have the luck to book a room then(he is so popular)

This was my second time staying at Daniel's place in Montreal. It was absolutely delightful. The room is cozy, warm and quiet, with a comfy bed and desk for convenient working with laptop (and great wifi, too!). But even more than that, Daniel is the best of hosts, always ready chit-chat or share a coffee over a conversations. Furthermore, he even prepared a New Year's Eve dinner, as well as a French Toast for New Year's Day brunch. One feels totally at home and at ease chez Daniel. I cannot recommend it more!
Daniel is absolutely amazing. He is a really welcoming host. His place is super artistic and clean. I would recommend his place to anyone who is considering it.

Daniel was the prefect host! Welcoming, informative and extremely nice. The apartment is in the best location, just 3 minutes walk from the metro station in a really cool neighborhood with lots of cafes and restaurants. The room was clean, quiet, comfortable bed and enough space for luggage and your stuff, there is even a closet and a desk. I loved the place and loved the cats and will definitely airbnb with Daniel again if I am ever back in Montreal and the place is free!

Daniel was very kind, accommodating, and knowledgeable about Montreal. His home was spotless, and in a great neighborhood near many restaurants and just across the street from the Metro station- very convenient! Daniel had great recommendations of places to grab a bite to eat in the neighborhood and also very helpful suggestions about visiting Montreal in general. He kindly made coffee each morning, and offered an extra blanket because the temperatures were so low outside. I look forward to visiting Montreal in the summer and will definitely stay with Daniel again!

Well this is my second time!!
Same as the first time I enjoyed staying at Daniel he make me feel at home.

He welcomed me with homemade cake.
(Delicious)

I enjoyed my stay 

Thank you for everything

I really enjoy staying at Daniel's place. He was very easy to reach before my arrival, and answered my questions. He was very welcoming and friendly during my short stay in Montreal. The place is very neat and looks exactly as listed: very artistic! I love it! The area is safe and perfectly locate it. It's just a few steps away from the subway and has tons of nice cafes, restaurants, book stores, etc. If I go to Montreal again, I would definitely like go to his place again. Thanks Daniel for being so kind!
Location is great. Close to the Mont-royal subway station and is actually around 20 mins walk to the downtown. The place is great, clean and truly beautiful . Daniel is a great host. Thank you !

I absolutely loved my stay at Daniel's- so much so that I am coming back again for the end of my trip. It was so comfortable and the room at the back was so quiet. Slept very well. 

Daniel himself is so fabulous, kind, and helpful. He had all sorts of great suggestions and the morning coffee and chats were lovely. See you soon!

Daniel was a great host. The place was beautiful and the bed very comfortable to sleep in. It was also located perfectly within walking distance of shops, restaurants, cafe's, parks, etc. So lovely. :)
Daniel is a fabulous host. This is the third time I've stayed with him. I need more excuses to visit Montreal so I can come back again! Great location and a lovely apartment.

Daniel is a very considerate and helpful host. I really enjoyed my stay in his beautiful apartment. The entire place has a calming and cheerful atmosphere. 

Daniel is very thoughtful and interesting to talk to. There are two very adorable cats and my single room very comfortable and quiet. I strongly recommend this listing.

Best wishes, Daniel. Thank you!
Daniel was very welcoming. The place is exactly as described. The bed is very comfortable and the place is charming. Highly recommended.

Daniel was very friendly and gave me tons on information on the city. There were two other guys in the other two bedrooms and they were awesome people too. The apartment was absolutely true to the photos shown and most importantly, it was very clean. There is a bar just three stores down the same block, and my room faces the back alley, so it might be a bit noisy over the weekend though.
The apartment is very conveniently located (close to metro, and two stops from central metro station). I was attending a conference at UQAM and Concordia so that was perfect.
I want to thank Daniel for making me feel really welcomed, especially since this is my first time using airbnb. I definitely hope to visit the city again.

I had a wonderful stay in Montreal at Daniel's place! He is an outstanding host and works very hard to make sure his guests enjoy their stay. He is very knowledgeable about the city and has great ideas for places to go and things to do. He has many guidebooks and maps he will go through with you, he gave me some great information on the Parc Mont Royal as well as some neighborhood walks. Plus, he makes great coffee and is an excellent chef!   

The apartment is very cozy and well equipped. This bedroom is perfect for solo travelers or students, and is an outstanding value. Be aware that it is not large - however it is very comfortable, there is a closet for clothes, and a desk to read or work. With the desk and wifi I was able to get some work done to meet a deadline while I was gone.   
  
The neighborhood and location are both great. There are shops, restaurants, and a good market all close by. The metro is very close, and Saint-Laurent street and Mont Royal Parc are all just a walk away. I stayed in June for the F1 Grand Prix, and the Plateau neighborhood was a nice change from the normal race crowd and activities. I felt that there were few to no tourists around, so I felt like I was living like a local, which I enjoy. 

Comfortable and fun apartment, wonderful host, and a great location. I hope to stay here again!

Bonjour, Gabrielle.
Je viens de passer 10 jours chez Daniel, dans son très agréable appartement du quartier tout aussi extra du Mont Royal. L'appartement est juste à côté du métro, en 20 minutes à pied on est dans le centre en descendant la rue typique de St Denis et  pour ma part j'ai adoré toutes les librairies de proximité. J'en ai relevé 6 dans un rayon de 15 min autour de l'appart.C'était ma première expérience Airbnb et je suis enchantée. Daniel m'a tout de suite très bien accueillie et mise à l'aise. Il m'a montré le quartier, m'a fait profiter de son expérience de Montréalais. Il est disponible, prévenant et en même temps discret. J'occupais la chambre au bout de l'appartement et j'avais tout ce dont j'avais besoin avec plein de petits détails, notamment décoratifs qui font qu'on se sent chez soi. Une japonaise occupait une autre chambre et ça s'est très bien passé, notamment par la capacité de Daniel à concilier les attentes de chacun. Je vous encourage à profiter de cette belle opportunité. Merci Daniel

Daniel m'a très bien accueilli dans son appartement très agréable qui est situé dans un quartier vivant, à deux pas du métro. 
Je conseille cette adresse!

Dan has good knowledge of the city. He suggested things to do based on my time of stay. He and his family all leaves close by. He is very friendly. Apartment is very clean and well decorated. It is very close to mont-royal metro station with restaurants, shops and pubs around. There are round the clock cafes. If you have bike, please bring it as this is biking city. Thanks For having me in your house Daniel.

Daniel's place was as it looks in the pics -- a nice, clean, grown-up apartment with charm and impeccable style. And he actually lives here, too. :)

Great location near the metro, great neighborhood to walk around. I hope to stay here again next time I'm in town!
Le logement est parfait pour découvrir le quartier du Plateau. Daniel vous donnera les bons conseils pour découvrir la vie montréalaise.

Spacious flat in fantastic part of Montreal. The room was locatef towards the back  which was quiet and had a nice desk which would be ideal if you wanted to do work. Daniel is an easy going guy and was very knowledgeable about the city. Would definitely recommend this space for business or solo traveler. Cheers!

DanieI has an absoIuteIy deIightfuI pIace. I cannot more highIy recommend it. WonderfuI Iocation, yet aIso very quiet. DanieI himseIf is a great conversationaIist and is aIways ready to offer you ideas of things to do. This is the pIace you must stay in if you want a great MontreaI experience!

Daniel's place is as charming as he is (which is very). The location is top-notch; the house is in the middle of Mont-Royal, steps from the metro! Lots of restaurants and bars and stuff! I had a great stay here and hope you do too!

Great place, the appartement is very nice and clean, in one of the best area of Montréal. Really close to the metro. Daniel, is a perfect host and has a lot to share if you want to learn more about the city. Now I know the perfect place to stay in Montreal.

Daniel est un super hôte, chaleureux et qui sait mettre à l'aise ! L'appartement est magnifique, propre, bien équipé, et idéalement situé. La chambre "douillette" porte bien son nom : bien chauffée, il y fait bon même en hiver :)
El mejor lugar de Airbnb que me he quedado. Excelente lugar, muy buena ubicacion, limpio y seguro. Recomiendo 100%. Daniel es una persona muy amable. Gracias por todo

10/10 Airbnb experience
Great location (stone throw away from subway)
Great host
Great environment

Couldn't have hoped for a better stay during my brief visit to Montreal. The apartment is bright and airy, the room is cosy, Daniel is a great host and the location speaks for itself. Hopefully I'll be coming back!
Daniel is a great host! Kind, available, helpful and great to talk to. The house is beautiful and very comfortable, located at a central area and a block away from the metro station.

I loved my cute little room at Daniel's place. It is at the back of the building, so very quiet. Yet he's in the heart of the action of the Plateau and right across the street from the Metro. The place is immaculately clean and his two cats are darlings. Daniel is a real gentleman and made me feel right at home in his home. I look forward to the next stay.

Daniel is a fantastic host. Upon arriving he was available to spend some time with me (coffee, walk, ...) without being pushy at all. It was a very warm and nice welcome. He is very helpful and kind. Every encounter was a pleasure. The (small) room (at the back) was just perfect for my needs, and I appreciated the cosy, feeling-at-home kind of atmosphere in the rest of the house.
The location, room, house and host would be my first choice if I would pass by MTL again!

Daniel was a fantastic host. Quick to communicate and always willing to help where he could beyond just being your host. 

The apartment was exactly as advertised and well kept. Couldn't ask for a better place or location for the value you get here. 

Thanks Daniel!
Great stay!
This place is beautiful and is very quiet despite being on a busy main road, across the street from a Metro station. Loved the company of the cats

Chez Daniel tout est excellent, " A home away from Home", Daniel knows all the happenings in the city, he looks also carefully for the details to make sure you'll have the best and memorable stay... La chambre est cozy, confortable,  calme, propre et en tres bon etat... L'appart est dans un spot cool, tout proche du Metro... C'etait une experience tres agreable... Merci beaucoup Dani... Vraiment le spot ideal a Montreal :) ...
Daniel is a great host and bilingual expert of Montreal. He responded very quickly to all messages. Location is perfect for experiencing Montreal. My best recommendations.

Un appartement magnifique à deux pas de la station de métro Mont-Royal, une chambre parfaite pour mes besoins (périodes de repos en journée, les nuits et les matinées à se préparer tranquillement avant de partir en visites), un quartier extra où l'on a plaisir à déambuler, proximité du charmant Parc de la Fontaine, un accueil très agréable et très plaisant par Daniel, avec une alchimie très réussie entre les moments d'échanges et l'autonomie... Bref, avoir été hébergée chez Daniel compte beaucoup dans l'excellent souvenir que je garde de mon séjour à Montréal.

There aren't enough words to describe how great Daniel is, or how wonderful his place is. The room was everything I could have needed and wanted, and his place overall is warm, welcoming, and exactly as described. I especially loved sitting on the plant-filled terrace chatting with Daniel and the other guests. The location could have been any more convenient, fewer than 200 steps to the metro from his front door, but also dangerously close to Pâtisserie au Kouign Amann! There are also loads of other great places within a short walking distance as well. Daniel is a consummate host, taking me on a walking tour upon my arrival, suggesting endless options for places to go and things to do (his guidebook on here conveniently matched up with a lot of what I wanted to do...trust his insight!), and always being up for a great conversation - always welcomed to a solo traveler. I've already suggested his place to many friends, and I can't wait to return myself!

Daniel's place is perfect - the room is just as described, small but really comfortable, with a nice big window for fresh air overlooking a quiet back street. And the place is spotless.

The neighbourhood is great, I loved it. It's busy enough that you have eveything you need at your doorstep (including Metro station, 3 stops from the old town), but at the smae time has a great small 'hood feel to it. I really enjoyed walking around and discovering the alleyways, staircases and murals - be sure to make time to explore this area.

Daniel was easy to communicate with and he is very pleasant to chat to and interact with.

I highly recommend it.

The room is comfortable and pretty.
Very close to metro station and downtown.
The host is nice and considerate!
Good choice to live here. :)
Wonderful host and great location - you can't go wrong at Daniel's place. Highly recommended!

Daniel's apartment is just as described and pictured.  Daniel was also a great host making sure that I was comfortable and available for advice or a good chat.  

The area was perfect, very close to the metro and just a quick walk to Mont Royal.

I highly recommend his place for your stay in Montreal!!

This place is, in a word, AMAZING! Daniel's apartment is a great bang for the buck, located as it is in one of the hippest and liveliest neighborhoods in in the downtown area. It's just a stone's throw from the metro, which gets you just about anywhere you'd want to go. There are cafés, shops, and restaurants galore. The apartment itself has all the charm you would expect of a 110-year-old building, and I spent many delighted mornings having coffee and breakfast on the pleasant outdoor patio. The best part is Daniel, who is without question the most friendly, pleasant, kind, and helpful host I have ever encountered on Airbnb. I felt completely at home in his apartment and greatly enjoyed his company, as well as that of the other guests. I would stay here again anytime; it was exactly the experience that I had been hoping to have in Montreal and I commend this lovely spot to any travelers looking to forge a connection with the city. Daniel is truly a gem!
Nice little room in a perfect location in Montreal. Daniel is an pleasant and available host

Daniel's place is wonderful, surrounded by bakeries and walking distance to many attractions. It was a leisure walk up to Mont Royal Park and the metro station is a stone's throw away. The room and home were also true to the pictures. I highly recommend staying at Daniel's!

Daniel, put simply, is a consummate host. This is my first Airbnb experience and he has set the bar high. From the get-go, he was proactive in communicating with his guests. For example, by giving me directions to his place and informing me that the roads were closed due to a festival before I arrived, so that I could plan an alternative route to his place. He even greeted me at the door and gave me a quick tour around Montreal as it was my first time visiting Quebec. Bilingual and affable, Daniel ensures that his guests are comfortably well-settled, especially for English speakers who may have difficulties navigating around Montreal. His apartment is clean and his two cats, Paco and Baboo, are absolutely adorable. Depending on your preferences, Daniel can be a guide and friend, or simply a host if you wish it be. It is his versatile approach to hosting that impresses me the most.

Location-wise, his place is steps away from the Mont-Royal métro and in the heart of the French Ghetto. Good food is found everywhere. La Banquise and Fameux for Poutine, L'Avenue for brunch, Yokato Yokabai for ramen, pâtisserie kouign aman and plenty more. For bibliophiles, there is a ton of francophone bookshops nearby.

In short, I had a pleasant stay and got to experience a (very) local taste of Montreal. Merci beaucoup, Daniel!
房东丹尼尔健谈,能提供这个城市的有用信息,与房东交流是一件愉快的事情｡性价比超高,强烈推荐!

Le logement est propre, calme au cœur du plateau (métro Mont royal juste à coté).
Le propriétaire est très accueillant et à l'écoute. Se fut un séjour agréable. Je recommande les yeux fermés !

Daniel is a truly fantastic host. He was very helpful, kind, and thoughtful in his communication and thoughts on what to do in Montreal. His place is clean, elegant, bright, and even better than advertised. The location is perfect--right near Mont Royal subway stop and close to ample street parking in Le Plateau. The rooms are well-lit and clean and the apartment has a friendly, airy vibe. The room was outfitted with lamps and a towel and good bedding. If you are staying in Montreal, I cannot recommend this place enough.
La casa de daniel es excelente. Super bien ubicada con el sistema de transporte y a unos pasos del Mont Royal. Daniel es un super host. La casa limpia. Impecable.
Daniel's place is very lovely, cozy and in a great location. Daniel is very attentive and response to guests's need. If I come back to Montreal will definitely stay with him again.
Great host and excellenet location! Highly recommend this place.

The perfect Iocation: surrounded by restaurants, cafes, bars, shops and a subway station! And yet: you wiII aIways get a perfect night's sIeep in this amazingIy quiet pIace. Bonus: DanieI is such a sincere & down-to-earth host! :)

I spent 3 weeks in Daniel's house. Place is really convenient, everything is around and very close, metro, restaurant, shops.... House is clean, nice and welcoming, bedroom is small but it feels good inside, bed is good too. 
Only bad point to me, from the bedroom, internet wifi is really really terrible, I am an internet lover, so it was very annoying. But in the living room there is no problem.
Daniel is a very kind and nice person, he will make you comfortable in his house.

Très bon séjour chez Daniel où je suis resté deux semaines. Logement idéalement placé (proximité du métro et de nombreux commerces).

Daniel vous accueillera chaleureusement et n'hésitera pas à vous aider si vous avez des questions pratiques sur la vie à Montréal.

Daniel is wonderful ! A kind, generous, creative and intuitive person. He will make you feel welcome and give you any tips you need for your trip, as well as be intuitive to you and your needs if you want to stay private. 

The superhost title is so well deserved. 

His home quickly becomes your home - it is beautifully laid out, clean, tidy and a great place to spend time in, or arrive back to after a day of sightseeing / work.

It is right by the subway so only a 2/3mins way. Near by restaurants and bars, shops, swimming pool, park ! Everything. 

I cannot recommend daniels air bnb more highly.

Stay here ! You won't be disappointed

I honestly don't think you will find a better place and host in Montreal.  Great location, affordable, clean, well-appointed and Daniel is a superb host who will make you feel at home. A special place.

Daniel’s place has great location! Easy to commute to everywhere you need to go in Montreal! He’s a great host, always available to help and talk! I would strongly suggest everyone who comes to visit stay at his place!

Daniel's apartment is located in an awesome neighbourhood, really close to subway, bus stop, supermarket, and other services.
I actually felt like I was home at Daniel's apartment. Daniel is an amazing landlord, always available to help and make your stay comfortable!
I'd strongly suggest everyone who comes to visit MTL staying at Daniel's place.
Thank you, Daniel :)
Daniel is really kindly and welcome, also specialized at making cake! The house feels home, and the kitchen is wonderful, I love the pan a lot :D also cats are adorable ~~I highly recommend

Je peux affirmer, sans le moindre doute, que le séjour chez Daniel a été le meilleur que j'ai jamais eu. 
La maison est parfaite. Extrêmement propre, spacieuse et bien meublé;  j'ai trouvé tout ce dont j'avais besoin et plus. Les transports en commun sont vraiment au coin de la rue: deux minutes à pied pour aller à la station de métro et l'arrêt de bus.
Toujours à distance de marche il y a de nombreux supermarchés, restaurants et magasins de toutes sortes.
Daniel est un super host et une personne extraordinaire. Grâce à lui, vous vous sentez immédiatement à l'aise; sa gentillesse est incroyable. Il prend vraiment soin de ses invités et il est toujours disponible pour vous aider, vous donner des conseils ou simplement pour parler de n'importe quoi. Je suis vraiment heureux de l'avoir connu.
En outre, il est un excellent cuisinier! J'ai eu la chance de goûter ses gâteaux: délicieux!
Enfin je veux aussi parler de Paco et Babou (ses deux chats): je n'avais jamais rencontré des chats si doux et adorables.
Pour conclure, Daniel et sa maison méritent bien plus que 5 étoiles!

Daniel's home is located in a beautfiul area of Motreal. The appartment itself is beautiful and cozy, also very clean and the kitchen is very well equipped. I had a great time, talking to Daniel and his flatmate. Both were always very welcoming and had some nice suggestions about what to do and what to see. I really enjoyed my time there and would recommend it to anyone!

name: Modern Brooklyn Brownstone
summary: Beautiful 3-bedroom duplex in a mid-19th century brownstone on a quiet, tree-lined block of Bedstuy - Brooklyn.
space: It's a beautiful 3-bedroom duplex in a mid-19th century brownstone on a quiet, tree-lined block of Bedstuy - a Brooklyn's neighborhood. We love our home and put a lot of love into it, and hope to find guests looking for a home away from home.  We wish you to have a kindred experience.  Everything in the house We are happy to coordinate according to the wishes of our guests. It is one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Brooklyn, with tree lined streets, brownstones from 1800's, the diversity and (URL HIDDEN) a true Brooklyn neighborhood We are 5-7 minutes walk to J&Z or A&C subway lines and 1 minute walk to major buses Everything in the house We are happy to coordinate according to the wishes of our guests.

reviews.comments:
It was a pleasure staying at Ozlem & Gaudericq's home in Brooklyn. This home is probably the most amazing brownstone I've ever seen. The home is spacious, impeccably furnished and has all the amenities you could wish for in New York. Communication was prompt and easy, you couldn't ask for better hosts in Ozlem & Gaudericq. They are a truly wonderful & generous couple who will make your stay nothing but comfortable and memorable. 
The area is perfect, with plenty of great places to eat. whether your looking for true Bed Stuy dining or more contemporary dining this area has it all. Subway was conveniently located no more than a 5 minute walk.
Thanks so much Ozlem & Gaudericq, you made our stay i Brooklyn so wonderful and we cant wait to come back ad see you guys!
Bianca, Ben & Levi

We had a lovely stay here. Ozlem was a fantastic host and provides us with lots of information about the surrounding area. The place is exactly how it is described. It is a beautiful trendy home and child friendly too. Thank you Ozlem for letting us stay at your gorgeous home.
The hosts were nice, considerate and very accommodating! We really liked the house, it was spacious, quiet, comfortable and clean!

The house is beautiful and lovely. But Ozlem only have two room can sleep ( one room is kid's room) and we have four people, so one of us has to sleep in the hall.  This is the only thing make us feel unfortable. Besides, the house is good and Ozlem is very friendly and responsibility.

We are 4 adults and we enjoyed our stay in this beautiful home with all the comforts.
we felt us comfortable and safe.Everything was perfect.
Regarding the neighborhood, the area is quiet but not very near to subway.

Le séjour à Brooklyn chez Ozlem restera un grand souvenir. Cette dernière a été présente du début à la fin pour nous aider à passer d'excellentes vacances. La maison design (conforme aux photos) est un havre de paix pour se reposer. Et le quartier, avec toutes ces maisons semblables, est pittoresque et est aussi parfait pour ceux qui veulent sortir des chemins touristiques. On a découvert le "vrai" Brooklyn et mes 3 enfants de 7 à 12 ans ont adoré.
A 5 dans la maison, on était vraiment bien, avec de l'espace. Ce fut vraiment un grand moment lors de notre US trip.

We (family with 2 kids) enjoyed our week in Ozlems house. The house is very nice designed and it was a pleasure to return after a busy day. It was very clean and everything we needed was ready for us. The communication with Ozlem was convenient. She allways answerd fast. We got a lot information about shopping food and restaurants around. We loved it to live in brooklyn and beeing part of this district for a week!

Sehr schöne Wohnung im Herzen von Brooklyn. Malerische Häuschen mit sehr bunt gemischten Bewohnern. New York halt. Von Hipp bis Hip-Hop alles dabei. Wir können es sehr empfehlen. Ruhige Lage (wenn nicht gerade einer seine Autostereoanlage ausführt) Fussweg zur U-Bahn ist gut zu schaffen.

name: Charming apartment in Ipanema
summary: Charming flat in Rio de Janeiro, between Ipanema e Copacabana, 5 minutes on foot from the 2 beaches. Located in the Arpoador the cradle of brazilian surf, here you  can breath the cidade maravilhosa energy.
space: A large two bedroom apartment with a modern kitchen and a good area to relax. Two bathrooms and a very nice balcony.
description: Charming flat in Rio de Janeiro, between Ipanema e Copacabana, 5 minutes on foot from the 2 beaches. Located in the Arpoador the cradle of brazilian surf, here you  can breath the cidade maravilhosa energy. A large two bedroom apartment with a modern kitchen and a good area to relax. Two bathrooms and a very nice balcony. Free wifi, cable tv, air conditionig. an old bike to enjoy the cycle along the beaches. Ready to help for anything needed. Posto 6 em Copacabana is the cradle of the brazilian surf, great energy and good vibes. An unique place to enjoy the taste of the cidade maravilhosa. Bares and restaurants, to enjoy the Night in Rio. Near the underground station of Prça G. Osorio. Buses stations to Barra de Tijuca ou the city. The bus station to or from the airport is really close. The apartment is 130 square feet, with an area to relax, reading, listening to the music lining in a very confortable hammock.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
We stayed in Francesco's apartment for 20 days in August with my colleague during Olympic Games 2016 in Rio. I still feel that we were really lucky to stay at his place because:
- great apartment, very cozy, comfortable and clean, with enough space for two people to live and have rest together or separated, independent bathrooms and bedrooms 
- good neighborhood - just 6 mins from Copacabana and at the same time out of touristic crowds and noise, quite family building 
- in addition in the same building we found local supermarket where from the early morning you can buy fresh baked bread, croissants, orange juice and whatever
- Francesco was always in touch with us in case of questions, fast in replies and speaking fluent English which is important in Brazil)
- Francesco recommended us interesting places around and surfing instructor which made our staying much better
- of course, hammock forever)
I definitely recommend staying here for other visitors of Rio :)

Francesco's place is located between the most lively neighborhoods Ipanema and Copacabana which we liked the most. It is only couple minutes walk to Copacabana beach and around 5 min walk to Ipanema beach. We have stayed as 3 friends in his place during the Carnaval time and Francesco and his friend Pino were very helpful and responsive to our questions. The house was very clean and stylish, and bright during daytime. They were also very flexible with the check out time which helped us too. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to see Rio south zone.

summary: Come stay in my beautiful condo! Located in the trendy Quartier des Spectacles, all restaurants, shopping, sightseeing, nightlife is at your doorstep. Cozy queen bed and extra cot easily sleeps three adults. Ask me some questions!  I love to host!
space: This location is prime for your vacation to Montreal.  Plenty to see and do, everything is just a short walk away!  Consider this the hub for all your activities! Within a 5-10 minute walk: - Notre-Dame Basilica - Old Port Waterfront - Jacques Cartier Pier - Summer Fireworks  - Restaurants + Shops - Station St. Laurent - Station Champ-de-Mars Underground parking is included in the price and there is also a BIXI bike terminal at your front door.
