host.host_about: I'm a food scientist and bartender.  I love to eat, drink, and cook.  I also love to host and travel!  Please come be my guest!

reviews.comments: Patrick is a wonderful host and his condo is absolutely perfect for anyone traveling to Montreal and looking to be near restaurants and shops. We walked to downtown Eaton Center from his place easily and there was much to see and eat also walking distance. I would highly recommend.

Patrick's condo is absolutely gorgeous! It was perfect and exactly as described. The location was wonderful. The only issue we had was on getting the key, but we were able to drive to go get it. Thank you for letting us stay.
The place was very nice and clean in a new building, about a 10 min walk from the downtown core. Patrick's friend Vivian was very helpful and courteous. I would definitely stay here again.

The condo was very nice, clean, and it was nice to have access to some movies etc. for night time. Although Patrick wasn't there Viviane, his friend, coordinated key drop-offs and was very nice and helpful. Location was nice, within about 6-8 minutes of the Berri UQAM metro station , and a 10-30 minute walk from a lot of things to do in the city. There was some construction near the apartment (normal for spring / summer in montreal) but it was very well insulated from the sound. Would recommend to anyone who needs a place to stay, underground parking was also a big plus.
Patrick's condo was exactly as described and the whole place was amazingly quiet given its location, right downtown Montréal. Patrick was also very accommodating with us and I we enjoyed our stay!
The apartment was well-located, modern, comfortable and clean.

We really enjoyed our stay at Patrick's place - it was easy to communicate with him and the place itself was really clean. The building is new so all the amenities are nicely done and it feels safe. You're close to St. Catherine's as well as St. Laurent, it only takes about 5 minutes to walk to the metro... the only small issue being that you are also close to a few sketchier bars where there are some sketchier people. The bed was not comfortable but we would otherwise highly recommend Patrick for anyone thinking of a future visit!

Patrick's condo is in a good location, right around the corner from Saint Catherine Street.  The area is convenient with shops, restaurants, bars, and supermarket.  The condo has all the amenities for a long stay.  It was a comfortable (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with Patrick was quick and easy.  I would recommend staying in Patrick’s condo for anyone visiting Montreal.
Check-in was quick and easy. Apartment was in great location, clean and quiet!  Great communication and would definitely stay again.
The place is perfectly located. The apartment was clean and welcoming. I really enjoyed my stay!

We enjoyed a lot staying at Patrick's apartment ! Easy to find (next to the airport bus station), very good location, well-equipped, clean and comfortable ! Communication was easy and quick with Patrick and, as he was gone on vacation, his nice friends were there and flexible enough to coordinate our arrival / departure for the keys. We definitely recommend Patrick's condo for a perfect stay in Montreal :)

Patrick's place was perfect, just like the pictures. No issues getting they keys at all- one of Patrick's friends met us out front when we arrived, showed us up to and around the apartment.
It was freshly cleaned and all basics were supplied, and the kitchen was fully decked out too (we didn't do any cooking but would have been set if we had).
The location was pretty amazing-we were walking distance from almost everything including restaurants, shopping, festivals and all!
I would definitely recommend Patrick's place for your next Montreal stay, I know we'll be staying again for sure :)
Enjoyed the stay and Patrick was very accommodating.  Recommended.
Great condo we'll positioned to explore Montreal. Secure parking is a bonus.

I had a wonderful experience staying at Patrick's home, it's right in the centre of downtown. I was fortunate enough to witness the Francofolies festival which was only two blocks away. The metro and buses are within 10 minutes walk. Patrick's home itself was clean and comfortable. I was almost an hour late arriving but Patrick's rep waited patiently and was really nice and helpful with directions.
Patrick's place was exactly as described, great location in old Montreal. Various hosts were friendly and helpful, and made for a really good experience. Thanks again
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The listing description was very accurate. Patrick was really nice and he answered to all our questions. The neighborhood was really quiet and it was very accessible. My experience was great and I would recommend it to anyone.

Patrick's condo is in a superb location and it looks gorgerous!   Thank God i had a chance to live there for 2 days.   BIXI is literally at the front door so we had a chance to ride it.   It is very safe and close to everything.   I had a chance to watch a movie through patrick's netflix account!  Thanks Patrick!

Patrick is a great host.Even though we did not meet him he was always there to help and quick to reply to any of our queries. His friend Bruce helped us checkin which was very smooth. Patrick's apartment is very central and we literally walked to most of Montreal's prime attractions. The apartment is fully equipped for a perfect stay in a gorgeous city like Montreal. Highly recommend it.

Patrick's condo was awesome and in a great location close to a major metro station which made touring the city super convenient. He was very hospitable and hastily answered any questions we had. Thanks again Patrick!

Patrick's place was just perfect - ideally located in the center of the city, near public transport and convenient to many of the local attractions.  He couldn't meet me for check-in but made alternate arrangements that worked out just fine.  He was even kind enough to allow me a late check-out on Sunday.  
Pat provided a few brochures and maps of the area, and his guidebook on airbnb was really helpful, both for neighborhood convenience stores and best things to visit in Montreal.

It's a nice modern apartment in a convenient location, walkable to all tourist spots in central Montreal. You have everything you need in the apartment. One thing to bear in mind is that this is clearly the host's home for some or most of the time, and you will find his clothes in the closet, his food in the fridge etc. Check in and out was fine.

Apartment is in a very great location. Few mins walk to old Montreal, subway station and china town. We have never met the host, but her sister was very nice. Very flexible with check in and check out time.   Parking is also included.

We had a wonderful time in Montreal. Patrick's hospitality is really first class. He asked after our first night how everything went and if we needed anything. Would recommend him to anyone looking to spend some time in Montreal. Extremely convenient location. 

Thank you Patrick!!!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Patrick's house is very nice! Clean, in a really good location. Patrick is so gently! It's a perfect time!
Patrick’s place is close to restaurants , shops , and nightlife . Patrick responds quickly to messages and provided helpful local tips .

host.host_about: 我来自上海,住在纽约,我在这里专门为中国留学生服务,所以,我的家也是留学生在美国的家,我欢迎更多的客人来到这里,感受主人温馨的服务!

reviews.comments:
I just returned from my stay at Jessica Ling's property in Forest Hills, NY.
I never met my host Jessica.
I got the key as arranged by David who was very kind and warm. The next morning I met Rose. Both of them worked in an office downstairs of this property. Both were very nice, and accommodating.
The property is exactly as advertised. It is a large apartment upstairs, and there is an office downstairs.
The neighbourhood is superb. It is quiet, safe charming and very close to many eating places. Shopping on Austin street is a short 15 minute 
walk.
My only complaint is that there was no breakfast which I expected in a BnB, and one review spoke of breakfast being cooked by Jessica.
It would have been  great value for money if breakfast was included.
The room is very nice and the neighborhood very quiet. Its a Short 10 min walk to the forest hill subway. Will definitely book again.

We enjoyed our stay.  We would stay again.  I do have a few suggestions. 1) Too many signs. Does not make people feel welcome 2) You can save electricity by replacing your incandescent bulbs with LED bulbs. Your inefficient window air conditioners could be replaced by heat pumps.  Then, leave them at a constant temperature for further savings. You may be eligible for rebates from New York for the installation.  2) Water can be saved by installing water saving shower head and faucet fitting.  3) If no one is going to clean, perhaps brooms, and cleaning supplies could be left for guests to use. 4) Could trash be taken out periodically? Guests did that from time to time over the week that we stayed. 5) I think putting used toilet paper in a bin in the bathroom is a real issue for most people from the U.S. That bin was never emptied except by myself during our stay.
Good place for travelers to stay. It's convenient to check in and out!!
Very friendly host in a beautiful neighbourhood. The room is spacious and clean. Will stay again.
质优 价好 环境宜人 交通便利

Jessica is a nice & friendly host, we had the main bedroom on the 2nd floor, solid comfortable bed, plenty room for two!  We enjoyed early morning walk in the beautiful Forest Hills Garden, a 24 hours 7/11 convenience store couple of blocks away, 10 min walk to Trader Joe's .... all-in-all it's a happy experience. Thanks Jessica!

It was a good experience staying in Ms. Ling's. The neighbor is quiet and safe. The room is very spacious and clean, and guests would also get the second-floor living room, kitchen and bathroom. I had little interaction with the hosts who are living downstairs, and there were a lot of restricting signs that made me feel a little bit unwelcome. Those were not big deals though. The only thing for me was that the house was like 15 mins' walk from the forest hills subway stop, and almost 40 mins' ride to Manhattan, which might be not convenient for a traveler. But overall, I liked the place.
The room is clean and comfortable
Good place. Safe neighborhoods.

The houseowner, Jessica, was very responsive and helpful in securing the booking and arranging for arrival - keys provided upon arrival.

The area, Forest Hills, is lovely and very safe. It make for wonderful walks through Forest Hills Garden. Easy access to Manhattan by train.

My only feedback was improving the cleanliness, especially in the bathroom.

Otherwise, a great stay!

The house has a beautiful  view of the garden from the balcony with a herb garden and BBQ.  The house has fetch  Tv in the living  roomYou will have access to wirless Internet. The apartment is located right next to top ryde city shopping mall and buses to the city.  I am happy for guests to stay on my couch on a short term basis.

neighborhood_overview: This is a beautiful  neighborhood  with lots of parks and beautiful  river  in this is area. Shopping center is located 2 minutes walking distance   with  lots of restaurants . Head  into the city taking the following buses m (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) .  Bus tickets are available from the news  agency  right  next to the bus stop. Reccomeneded restaurants. Hurricanes, coffee traders ( good breakfast and coffee) ,bondi  pizza , chat thai, and plenty of different  cuisines  at your doorstep. Feel free to use (Website hidden by Airbnb) to find out activities in sydney during  your stay.
notes: Feel free to cantact me via email at any time.
transit: There are buses just outside the house  to get you straight into the city.  Busses run frequently. A cab  ride to the city is about $40. Head into  balmain  to explore lots of quirky  bars and restaurants  which is onlu 15 minutes  on any of the buses.
access: You will be sharing the house as I may pop by from timw to time. Be respectful  to all the equipment  and furniture  in the house. Feel free to treat this house as your summer home. Have a great time
interaction: I work full time and will  be out most of the time during the day.
house_rules: This is a secure  building, so be respectful  to the neighbours .

host.host_about:
Hi I am naby..

I am a professional  living in Sydney  in my very cozy little apartment in Ryde.

I would love to share my home with travelers who are couch surfing,  to share interesting stories and  food. 

My mantra in life is...find what you love and let it kill you.
I look froward to meeting you share the best of Sydney this summer.

Cheers
Naby

reviews.comments: Nice little apartment half an hour away from Sydney. It's a good place to stay at if you're in Sydney for longer, but wouldn't recommend it for a shorter time.

Naby was a wonderful host and her great personality reflects in the service she provides - offered drinks and food in the evening, shared a few jokes and a story - her welcoming attitude represents exactly what AirBNB stands for! Despite this listing being for couch surfing, Naby provided an air mattress and very comfy bedding in the living room. I highly recommend Naby!
Was a very welcoming place to stay and had a great time! Thanks alot

Naby is a great host. She is really kind and goes out of her way to make your stay as comfortable as possible.she even took me out to the beach with her family during my short stay.
Her place is about 20 minutes by bus from the city center and i never had any trouble catching one. I can highly recommend Naby to ever who wants to have good time in Sydney and doesn't mind a little bus ride. Thank you heaps Naby !
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The area is really nice and the premise is very secured. Just in front of the bus stops and near to Top Ryde shopping complex and various food options. 

The accommodation is quite good value for the money and all the amenities are available. Also one very positive thing was not mentioned in the listing that, the apartment have a small, well decorated veranda to spend time smoking, drinking and having fun or enjoying solitary time.

Naby is really warm and welcoming. She is very helpful and spent significant amount of her free time with me (she is a very busy lady with her career). I would like to visit her place again.

Thank you Naby !!! Hope to see you again.
I was only there one night, but Naby was extremely welcoming. The room (her son's) was very tidy and comfy.
Yeah. The stay was awesome. Naby, and the people I was lucky enough to meet were awesome to hang out with.

host.host_location: Hong Kong / London, Manchester, Oxford / Vancouver, Toronto / New York
host.host_about:
Hello everyone and an advance welcome to Hong Kong. I love to travel, explore and meet people around the world. Airbnb allows me to achieve all that and when I don't have time for work, I love to host, so I can continue to meet people. I turn my guests to friends, so I know the key ingredients of a perfect stay. I am looking for guests who are friendly, easy going and respectful.

Your safety, security and comfort are my top priorities, so once your reservation is accepted; rest assured, you are in the safest hands. I treat my guests like long lost friends, so expect a warm welcome from me when you check in.

I respect religious freedom; however, my place will not cater for any special religious worship or practices. I will also not cater any rude guests, guests with hotel expectations and guests who do not agree with my house rules. Thank you for reading and we wish you all a safe and pleasant trip ahead.

address.street: New Territories, Hong Kong, Shatin, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: I booked the room for my relatives, they are satisfied with the accommodation.Sven is very nice and helpful. The kitchen and bathroom are fully furnished & the wifi is strong. I highly recommend this place if you are going to spend a few days in HK.

Staying at Sven's was lovely and convenient.  The apartment is tucked away on a hill side and very close to city life as well.  I could easily get to the bus or train station in 5 minutes.  The apartment has all the amenities you could need and Sven was more than helpful during my stay.  I'd highly recommend a stay.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Sven is a great guy who helped make my stay in Hong Kong comfortable and easy. The location of the flat is great, 2 minutes walk to the plaza and 5minute taxi or bus to Sha Tin racecourse. It really couldn't have worked out better.

Sven is a wonderfully welcoming, helpful and friendly host. The room was clean, comfortable and quiet. It is located very conveniently next to Sha Tin MTR station and has excellent bus connections. I had a fantastic stay and would not hesitate to recommend it.

The room is on a wooded hillside right above the transit center at Shatin; it's cozy, well-furnished, and clean. Sven is a super attentive and responsive host who was helpful at every step of the way, including when some maintenance had to be done in the bathroom. He's also fluent in English, Cantonese, and Mandarin, so communication is extra easy.

第一次通过Airbnb获得了很好的居住体验,热情好客的房东和在香港难得的居住空间,客厅和卧室都挺大,设施齐全,最新的装修,还有看得见远山风景的落地窗和阳台,卧室是套间,本身就配有洗手间,电视,储物柜和办公桌,可以有自己的隐私空间,生活也很便利,出门几分钟左右就可以走到地铁和巴士站,购物有新都市广场和宜家等大型购物中心和超市,是个闹市中隐居的好地方｡谢谢房东提供这样一个好住所,给我一段难忘的愉快经历｡
交通非常便利,居住环境(半山)也很清幽｡住宿条件就不用说了,基本上一应俱全｡尤其是房东和房东妈妈,待人热情､周到,有求必应,让人十分感动｡这次得到他们很大的帮助,心里感到暖暖的｡强烈推荐｡

Staying with Sven was a really pleasant and relaxing experience. His place is a rare vintage duplex and it's very accommodating. Bathroom was impeccable, friendly environment and very comfortable room. The location is less than 5 mins walk from Shatin MTR station next to the slope, which is a great escape from the busy concrete city. The house is well renovated and fully equipped with high end amenities. Sven said more enhancement work will be done this year, so I'm definitely looking forward to my next stay. Sven is super friendly and instantly replies my messages. Overall, the experience was superb and I would highly recommend it to anyone. Sven and I have become friends and he is a great host. Thank you for giving me a brilliant first impression of Airbnb.

Sven made me feel very welcome!!! He was very accommodating with what time to meet up! His place was nicely renovated, new furnitures, linens, and extremely close to transit and shopping! You have to take some stairs to access the duplex, but its excellent exercise and I even feel healthier. I would definitely stay in Sven's first class duplex and recommend others to try it out! I found Sven to be a very open-heart, approachable, courteous and flexible host. He is an awesome guy and made all the stress around this sudden stay much easier and hassle free. Thanks Sven!!! Keep in touch

This was my first experience using Airbnb and Sven made my experience very positive. He is genuine and friendly. The GEM room was immaculate with everything we need in top quality. I felt very much like home and certain anyone who stays with Sven will get too notch hospitality. Legitimate host, highly recommended. Thanks Sven :)

Sven's house is immaculate. Super clean and tastefully design in a convenient neighbour right next to Shatin mtr. Sven vacuums his house everyday and proactively check on us if we were okay. He's very friendly and a brilliant host. Strongly recommended!

Sven was a great host! He gave us recommendations regarding restaurants, night life and interesting places and responded quickly when we had any questions. 
The room was clean, comfortable and conveniently located right next to Shatin MTR station. 
It’s a rare village house located on the slopes hidden from the busy streets of Hong Kong, but only steps away from one of the largest shopping malls in the city. 
It’s a perfect balance of exploring the city of HK and hiking the trails around the area. Thank you Sven for a beautiful memory and unforgetable experience. 
Sven and his dog are warm and welcoming, it definitely feels like a home away from home and he vacuums and cleans the house on a daily basis too. 
Good luck and look forward to stay at your place next time!

Sven and his girlfriend Cathy both are very kind and helpful people. I enjoy my stay in his cozy place,a very convenient and comfortable one. And they keep a super cute and lovely labrador. Highly recommend!!Thanks!!!

[‎3/‎1/‎2017 1:13 PM] Stephen Wong: 
Those who wants to experience a different Hong Kong, do not miss this choice. Sven's place is a rare duplex village house fully renovated. A generous cross over of modern and vintage design. He is very warm and outgoing and even shared his future upgrades for the duplex. Sven has a great passion in hosting. His house will show you a secluded facet of this vital city and HK is a small place after all, so those who love night life of the city won't be affected. I would definitely visit Sven's apartments again. He is a very friendly and considerate gentleman who has a big heart and loves to meet new friends. It was a pleasure to stay at your place, thanks for an excellent accommodation and good luck keep in touch

Highly recommended! Great location, minutes walk to shatin mtr and bus terminals.Taxi stands at the food of the village.Everything is really close and convenient. Sven was absolutely an awesome host. Warm welcome from him and his Labrador puppy. Sven's place was very clean, cosy, modern equipped with everything you need. The room is newly renovated and the pictures does not do justice. I will definitely recommend all my frjends and family to stay at his place. You won't be disappointed. Thanks again Sven!!! Good luck and see you soon.

Incredible stay. Im new to Airbnb and Sven made me feel like I'm meeting a long lost friend. His room is clean, equipped with all sorts of amenities and nicely renovated. Sven's puppy is also very welcoming and well behaved. Sven's place is truly a hidden gem in HK. Strongly recommended and will stay at his place again.

Sven and kathy they really helped me a lot.  They even helped me open the shower heater one day that I will arrive home very late. 
For the room is quite clean and comfort, it is perfect for one residence. U will have ur own bathroom, which is very convince. The bed is very cozy and warm. 
For the transportation, it will take u  5-8 minutes to walk to the Shatian subway station, where u could take the MTR.  Also there is a supermall and many restaurants around this area.

Very nice room in an oase of calme close to the Shatin metro station. 35 m'n from the airport by bus. A good compromise to visit Hong Kong. Cheaper than the main island. The temple at walking distance is worth a visit. You might see monkeys on your way....

Sven and his girlfriend are so kind and sweet.
They took care of me like family and friends and gave me a lot of information so I could learn about Hong Kong.
The house is also very clean, comfortable and pleasant.
I had a very good air conditioning, humidifier and bathroom heating, and it was so good that I was able to use it whenever I wanted.
I had originally intended to stay for three days, but their house was so good and lovely that I decided to stay for another three weeks. I would have wanted to stay longer if it was not just a business trip to China. I strongly recommend this house to those who come to Hong Kong.

I was a month in Hong Kong for an internship at the Prince of Wales Hospitel. The location of the apartment was perfect for me.
Sven was always available, always responded directly to my concerns.
I have never felt like a tenant more like a fixed roommate. I had a very good time with Sven and the incredibly funny dog Zonda.
Thanks for the many help and the good time in HK

Thanks to Sven, I had a very pleasant time in Hong Kong.
He is very kind and concerned about me during my stay.
When I had questions or trouble, He always answered my questions via mail as soon as possible he could or support me to solve my trouble.
The house is really convenient for the station and shopping malls, so that I could get anything I wanted to buy.
Also it was good exercise for me to go up to stairs.
Thanks for the kind hospitality, good  communication with Sven.

Sven was an absolutely fantastic host. He was very sweet and welcoming upon my arrival. The room was clean, well furnished and equipped with all the essentials. Sven even gave me a SIM card to use for free! The bathroom was private and clean. Sven always clean the house and make sure everything is sanitised. After a long day, being comfy in the AIR room was ideal. Definitely the best experience I’ve had so far. Look forward coming again. Thanks Sven!

Sven and his partner are very nice, friendly and warm-hearted. They are always ready to help you. The room is fantastic, very clean with good facilities. It's near Sha tin Station (no more than 5 mins walk I think, there is a path through stores) and big plaza. It's very convenient to go shopping and go to anywhere. Living here is a very cost-effective choice. 非常棒的房间,非常好的房东,房间干净整洁设施齐全｡来之前听说在半山腰上以为需要爬山,但其实就一小段台阶,而且周围环境也挺小清新的,很有意思｡离商业区也很近,不管是在附近逛逛还是去地铁站坐地铁都非常方便｡总而言之,居住体验很好,住这里性价比很高｡

It is great to stay in a village house in urban Hong Kong, especially in a jam packed place like Sha Tin. It gives a feeling of being in an older time in HK. If you wish to be in Sha Tin area, I think this is a great place to lodge. 

Gentle reminder: For people with weak knees, there is a very short climb to the house.

This place is very central and close to public transport, ideal if you need to go to CUHK. It is up on a mountain that you need to climb through stairs (about 5 minutes or so). Sven was a very considerate and friendly host. When my flight time was changed from the evening to the next morning, he let me stay at his place until I had to leave for the airport early in the morning at no extra cost. The flat was clean. Be aware that the bathroom fan of another bathroom in this flat connects to the bathroom of this bedroom, so when it is on it can be quite loud. Overall, I had a pleasant stay here.

Sven was an extraordinary host. He exceeded my expectations in everyway. First, he helped me settle down by teaching me where and how to setup mobile phone cards and bank accounts. Secondly, he helped me setup a mailing address, so I can receive packages form overseas. Thirdly, he introduced his friends and other guests to me and occasionally made some outings, so we can all have fun, such as dinner plans and celebrated my birthday with other guests. Sven definitely made me feel like a family member and I was grateful to have booked his place. After a long day at school, his dog Zonda would give me a warm hug to welcome me home. I would highly recommend Sven's place to everyone; especially if you are a student. His place is 2 stations from CUHK and the walk to his duplex is excellent exercise and only a short 5min walk. Thank you Sven ^^ and I look forward spending my remaining school years at your place =)

Sven’s place is a village house located on the slopes about 5-10mins from Shatin MTR station. It’s conveniently located next to the malls, bus terminals, Taxi stands and mini buses that goes to Sai Kung, CUHK, Race course and Science Park. You need to walk some stairs to his place, but the view and feel pays off! It was a short notice booking at Sven’s, but he was super quick in response and provided all the essentials in meeting him. The room is nicely furnished with its private bathroom outside the room. Windows were big and bright. Sven prepared everything for me such as hot water for shower, towels, water and even turned the air conditioner on prior to my arrival. I felt spoiled and was mind blown by how much he offered during my stay. The cost relative to the experience you get is unparalleled. I would definitely come and stay with Sven again. Definitely recommend to everyone!

This place is the best. Bright, airy, spacious and comfortable. Sven was very nice and super helpful. His helper assisted me with my belonging and Sven made pancakes in the morning. Very peaceful place to stay and will definitely come again. Thanks Sven!

Sven was very welcoming and generous and included me in everything he could. The apartment was a short walk from the train station, bus stop and a large shopping mall. The room was clean and tidy with an ensuite and had a nice view. I would highly recommend staying here as it is very convenient and in a lovely location to explore Hong Kong.
Private bathroom was convenient. Nicely designed house. Right next to Sha Tin subway and IKEA. Overall a top choice in Sha Tin.

Sven is a superb host and make sure everything i needed is being attend to! Location is good apart from need to climb stairs but its normal for such apartment in HK, so those with really big luggage must take note. Really love the village within the city feel. Thank you so much Sven.

Sven is a considerate landlord. The room is spacious (in the HongKong standard) and very clean. Hidden in Paitau Village and facing Shatin Grand Central Plaza, the apartment has a nice view from the balcony and is essentially noise-free (also in the Hong Kong standard).  I visited Hong Kong several times, and this is the best place I have ever stayed.  5 stars!

name: Planet Paprika Aparts
summary: Welcome to Planet Paprika Hostel, where you can experience the Turkish hospitality at the heart of Istanbul. Our hostel is providing the cozy, friendly and clean place to stay. We are not a big , impersonal hulk hostel. We value the independent travelers and we are against any kind of discrimination. So come here to be a citizen of Planet Paprika.
space: Welcome to our property , where you can experience the Turkish hospitality at the heart of Istanbul. Our room is providing the cozy, friendly and clean place to stay.  We are also closer to old Istanbul; the touristic peninsula and big touristic spots. Grand Bazaar, Spice Bazaar, Blue Mosque, St. Sophia and Topkapı Palace. You can walk to Sultan Ahmet or you can take a metro with tram. We prefer walking. Since it takes only 30 mintutes from here to Eminönü and a bit more to Sultan Ahmet on foot. On the way to old town you can visit Cite de Pera , Nevizade , Galata Tower, Galata Bridge , fish market ,Yeni Mosque, historical Sirkeci train Station, and so on. Yes. Everything you want to visit in Istanbul is on the way to Sultan Ahmet from our property.  And Taksim Square is the transportation hub in Istanbul, so you can visit almost everywhere without any worry.  - This room has 1 double and 1 single bed.The room has a big balcony. Inside the room, you have TV, fridge and a bathroom. -. O

host.host_about: Sosyal , arkadaş canlısı ve neşeli

reviews.comments:
Great thanks to Serhat for hospitality! 
Very nice appartments in 100 meters from Taksim square in beautiful historical district. You can spend great timejust hanging out nearby at İstiklal street and surrounding cafes, bars, pabs and so on. Also Taksim is transport hub so it's easy to take a ride to any part of the city.
Appartments.. very very cozy place :) Nice interiors, pretty clean and rather warm (our visit was at winter). We found everything we needed during stay.

Serhat is very kind and responsive, I'm very happy to meet such man. And all hail Mr. Paprika! :)

I had a lovely time at this place, it was exactly as advertised and in a prime, very walkable, area. I would certainly recommend it and come back. 
Thanks!

Serhat was very friendly, communication was very good. The apartment is spacious and the location is very convenient, but the proximity to the big road with heavy traffic make it a rather noisy place at night. Also, it's messier than it looks on the fotos, and not the cleanest either. And if you mind the smell of cold cigarette smoke on every object, especially in the bathroom, I can't recommend this place to you.

Serhat was super helpfull for me who had to manage a last minute cancellation, and this appartement super central fully furnished was exactly what i expected. You feel very safe as Serhat and his team Volkan and Bidane were always around and were always ready to help. So if yu want to be around Taksim this is the place for you!

Location is super. Its in the middle of Istanbul heart. Clean, big, full furnished with love touch. Serhat is very helpful person,he always giving advises to make your stay easy.
Highly recommended.

Mr. Paprika is a super friendly and welcoming host. He helped us out when we desperately needed a place to stay. His apartments are excellent for longer stays. We wish there was air conditioning when it was super hot out, but he provided us with a fan and extra water. Great location close to Taksim Square, Istiklal Avenue, and small shops and bars.
Nice room, a typical turkish house. Very close to taksim square and iskital cardesi (2 min walking)

Best host ever: very thoughtful, helpful and  with perfect communication! Apartment itself is very stylish, in the very centre, 2 minutes from Taksim metro. 
1000% recommend!!

name: 2 Bedroom condo at Solano - 305
summary: Located on De La Commune Street in Old Montreal with 1,130 sq. ft.  This 2-bed 2-bath condo features gorgeous views, private balcony, and modern design. The Solano offers exceptional building amenities.
space: ** 30 nights minimum stay  The Solano offers exceptional building amenities including rooftop terrace, swimming pool, and gym. Bright and uncluttered, this 2-bedroom and 2-bathroom condo is fully furnished and ideal for your next short or long term stay in Montreal. Hardwood floors throughout, the open-concept living space features contemporary furnishings as well as fabulous views of the Old Port marina and Clock Tower thanks to floor-to-ceiling fenestration and a private balcony. The kitchen comes fully-equipped with high-end appliances and granite countertops including island block with breakfast stools. Find a queen-size bed in the master bedroom which includes a large walk-in closet and en-suite designer bathroom with soaker tub. The second closed bedroom holds 2 single beds and also offers great storage. Living is made easy with a 6-person dining table, a laundry closet with stackable washer/dryer, as well as a guest bathroom that includes a large walk-in shower and modern finish

neighborhood_overview: Popular amongst tourists and locals alike, Old Montreal’s history and charm are undeniable. The city’s iconic waterfront, known as the Old Port, is famous for its cobblestone streets, horse-drawn carriages, and effervescent Promenade. This vibrant area offers lots of sightseeing as well as year round activities for all ages, such as bike and boat rentals in the summer, and ice skating in the winter. Old Montreal is also rich in upscale restaurants like Club Chasse et Pêche and L’Auberge Saint Gabriel, or take advantage of the great nightlife options at places like Velvet nightclub or the trendy Terrasses Bonsecours. There are also plenty of services in proximity, and with the Champ-de-Mars metro station nearby, the downtown core is never far away. So if you’re planning your next stay in Montreal and want the best the city has to offer, Old Montreal will not disappoint!
notes: Once your reservation has been confirmed via Airbnb, please provide us with the following information: - How you will be arriving to Montreal (car, plane, etc.) - Your approximate arrival time, please note that by default Check-in is at 3:00PM and Check- out is at Noon (If you require a specific check-in or check-out time, please advise us in order for us to plan accordingly). - Your complete home address. - Names of guests (if any) As soon as we have received the following information, we will send you a reservation confirmation as well as your reservation contract with Simplissimmo.
transit: Metro Station: Champs-de-mars Bus, Subway, Bixi.
access: The Solano completed construction in 2013 and is located on Montreal’s coveted waterfront. This massive luxury development, with 6 phases and 124 units, offers a remarkable quality of life in a very unique setting. With some of the finest in the city, the Solano boasts numerous amenities and creature comforts for a truly memorable stay including a peaceful landscaped courtyard garden, a fully-equipped gym, and exercise pool with sauna. Residents will also enjoy the Solano’s rooftop that features a furnished sundeck, an outdoor swimming pool, and a shared lounge that all enjoy stunning panoramic views of the St-Laurence River and the Montreal skyline.
interaction: Informations Séjour 1) Heure d’arrivée  Veuillez prendre note que les heures d’arrivés se déroulent à partir de 15h jusqu’à 21h maximum. Aucune exception ne sera tolérée à moins d’une autorisation contraire. Votre heure d’arrivée par défaut est 15h.  Un agent vous accueillera à l’unité afin de vous remettre les clés et effectuer un état des lieux. Afin de pouvoir vous accueillir dans les meilleures conditions, il est essentiel de convenir d’une heure d’arrivée approximative avec votre représentant.  Dans le cas où votre heure d’arrivée dépasse 21h, veuillez vous adresser à votre représentant afin de voir si des exceptions peuvent s’appliquer. ------ 2) À votre arrivée    Afin d’éviter toute attente inutile, nous vous demandons d’appeler l’un de nos représentant 45 minutes avant votre arrivée à l’unité (lors de votre arrivée à l’aéroport de Montréal, ou une fois que vous aurez passé les douanes canadiennes). Veuillez prendre note qu’une flexibilité de 30 minutes supplémentaires à l’heur
house_rules: Please note, it is forbidden to: - Disturb the other residents' right to a peaceful enjoyment of their property; - Block toilets, sinks, tubs or other water fixtures with garbage or other substances; - Use a Bar-b-q on the balconies or terraces unless authorized by the building; - Hang clothes, towels or bathing suits on balconies, windows or terraces; - Take away dishes, cookware or any other equipment or furniture from the Suite; - Use Roller Blades, bicycles or skateboards in all areas of the building; - Leave windows open when the Suite is not occupied; - Install additional locking devices on doors; - Throw out garbage or debris in any common areas not designated for waste disposal; - Leave children under the age of twelve (12) unattended in any common area of the building; - Tamper with smoke detectors or fire extinguishers.

host.host_about:
Looking for a perfect stay with a host that understands your needs? 

Welcome to Loftel and Simplissimmo, Montreal based companies established over 10 years ago, that are operated by young and motivated team with a strong and valuable hospitality experience. 

We manage more than 200 properties and are fully dedicated to make every client’s stay unique and memorable. We’re always there to help, answer questions and provide the best services. So don’t hesitate and go ahead, and challenge us :)

reviews.comments: Everything was great!! All shown and told was accurate, and while staying in the appartment everything was better!! I am very happy to have stayed in Le Solano and Simplissimmo team was a 10 !

name: Secluded semi moments to everywhere
summary: Flexible, casual living in our pretty coastal home. Endless days spent relaxing by the pool, or a short walk to beaches or hop on a bus to the city. Child friendly yet an adults haven, you will enjoy Australia at its best in this beautiful spot!
space: Open-plan living, with flexible arrangements for sleeping; the hammock is my favourite place... A contemporary styled home with all your creature comforts plus some extras! DOWNSTAIRS - Front terrace - Entrance - Queen bedroom - King single and trundle bedroom* - Shower room and laundry - Kitchen - Living room - Courtyard and pool * Every space will happily sleep an adult, the 10th space being a trundle bed which may only suit up to 14yrs old. UPSTAIRS - Master bedroom with balcony - Family bathroom (Bath and separate shower) - Single room with extra full-sized-single trundle - 2nd living area/queen size sofa bed room with balcony and hammock With plenty of space to escape to and a generous indoor/outdoor living area to gather in, you will be sure to have a wonderful holiday.
