A contemporary styled home with all your creature comforts plus some extras! DOWNSTAIRS - Front terrace - Entrance - Queen bedroom - King single and trundle bedroom* - Shower room and laundry - Kitchen - Living room - Courtyard and pool * Every space will happily sleep an adult, the 10th space being a trundle bed which may only suit up to 14yrs old. UPSTAIRS - Master bedroom with balcony - Family bathroom (Bath and separate shower) - Single room with extra full-sized-single trundle - 2nd living area/queen size sofa bed room with balcony and hammock With plenty of space to escape to and a generous indoor/outdoor living area to gather in, you will be s
neighborhood_overview: Walking distance to almost everything. A beautiful 45 minute walk along our coastline boardwalk to the famous Bondi Beach, via Clovelly (5 minutes), Bronte (20 minutes) and Tamarama (25 minutes) beaches. Excellent surf and snorkelling opportunities along the way. Coogee (and the spectacular New Years Eve family fireworks) is only a 5 minute walk down the road. Coogee is a bustling beach with an abundance of restaurants, cafes and the newly opened Coogee Pavillion. Just around the corner from us is an excellent Thai takeaway, sushi bar, coffee house and famous fish and chip shop. A bistro, deli and bakery complete our very local area as well as the Clovelly Hotel (pub). We are 1 minute from Gordons Bay, with an amazing underwater snorkelling trail, calm water and an interesting rocky shoreline, perfect for sunbaking and lagoon-style swimming.
notes: We have a Nespresso machine with a starter pack of coffee. Shampoo, conditioner and soap to make travelling a little easier! All bed linen, bath towels and beach towels are included. Please strip beds before you leave. A clean will be required on departure and is also available if you require during your stay.
transit: Just around the corner you can catch the bus to Bondi Junction (10 minutes) for Westfield shopping centre or the City (20 minutes). 2 pre-loaded adult and 2 pre-loaded child Opal cards are provided for your convenience. There is also free parking on the street. The airport shuttle is the best way to get here, or of course a taxi.
access: Access to computer, wifi, gas heated swimming pool, gas Weber bbq, Sonos in most rooms, PlayTV, Nespresso machine, washing machine and tumble dryer, dishwasher and ceiling fans.
interaction: Feel free to text or email me anytime for hints and tips on the house and the area.
house_rules: Staying with us means you can live like a local!  Please be mindful of noise in our close community. Please smoke outside only. Parties, gatherings, functions are STRICTLY PROHIBITED. In the interest of being green, we ask guests to ensure that lights/heating/cooling etc., are switched off when not in property, and when checking-out. Check-in/check-out is flexible depending on other guests arrangements. We will try to accommodate your needs as much as possible. Any damages and/or losses to property or contents must be immediately reported to us via email. All damages and/or losses to property or contents are the express responsibility of the Guest making booking and any of the Guest's Invitees. So, you or your guests will be responsible and are obliged to pay for any damages and/or losses to property or contents. How to use machines, run the pool and anything else will be available for you in a booklet on arrival at the property, or you can just message me if you prefer!

host.host_about: We have lived in Sydney for 14 years, started our family here and live happily in the Eastern Suburbs. We have 3 girls and enjoy our beachside suburb lifestyle. We love eating out, the beautiful walks and our little dog.

reviews.comments:
A lovely place to stay. Perfect for a family.
Just around the corner from everything.
The home was better than described. As you envisaged there was competition for the hammock. 
Thanks Emma & family for letting us stay in your home.
John, Pam, Matt & Josie.

The house was amazing and beautiful; also the owners family were very close and just a call away to solve any little hiccups and questions that we had. Clovelly is great, the house area was quiet at night and during the day with easy walking distance to the beach and restaurants. Also very close by to public transport (fundamental in Sydney) and for us that drove there, free and easy to find parking in the same street. We did love it the stay.

Look no further this is the perfect place!!!
Emma was  absolutely beautiful to deal with and her house reflected her.  Emma was always quick to reply to my questions and did what possible to cater for our visit. 
The house...
Extremely comfortable; modern conveniences: coffee machine, multiple bathrooms, comfortably catering for 2 large families.
The pool was a great hit as was the kids retreat upstairs.
Location...
Fantastic surrounded by beautiful beaches, great places to eat and an easy busy ride to the city centre.

Emma is a wonderful host. The house and area were great - a perfect place to stay for a family. Upon arrival, Emma welcomed us into her home and made sure that we had everything we needed. After a very long flight from Europe, we were grateful and soon found (with three children) that we couldn't have made a better choice. 
The house was very comfortable. Whilst we had a car, it would have all worked fairly well without one too. Having had several airbnb experiences to date, this by far was one of the best!

name: Oh this one's lovely... and cheap!
summary: Situated only 4km (1 bus stop) from the CBD, this quiet & cosy 2 bedroom unit is just what you've been looking for.  Wake up to sounds of birds chirping, not traffic noise.  Free Wi-Fi Internet, very clean, everything you could want in a convenient location. Weekly and Monthly discounts of 12% and 20% apply to this booking and will automatically apply when you enter your required dates.
space: Your own fully furnished room in a quiet 2 bedroom unit in Rozelle. The room has a wardrobe, chest of draws, a small book shelf, bedside table/draws & a queen sized bed with linen and an extra blanket.  Towels are provided.  Unlike many other Airbnb hosts who charge close to hotel prices,  our purpose is to provide a basic, clean and welcoming “home away from home” at an affordable cost.  Our nightly rate is less than half that of the closest hotel and roughly the same as you would pay for a couple in a backpacker’s dormitory.
description: Situated only 4km (1 bus stop) from the CBD, this quiet & cosy 2 bedroom unit is just what you've been looking for.  Wake up to sounds of birds chirping, not traffic noise.  Free Wi-Fi Internet, very clean, everything you could want in a convenient location. Weekly and Monthly discounts of 12% and 20% apply to this booking and will automatically apply when you enter your required dates. Your own fully furnished room in a quiet 2 bedroom unit in Rozelle. The room has a wardrobe, chest of draws, a small book shelf, bedside table/draws & a queen sized bed with linen and an extra blanket.  Towels are provided.  Unlike many other Airbnb hosts who charge close to hotel prices,  our purpose is to provide a basic, clean and welcoming “home away from home” at an affordable cost.  Our nightly rate is less than half that of the closest hotel and roughly the same as you would pay for a couple in a backpacker’s dormitory. Guests have full access to:  *Kitchen - contains pretty much everything you n
neighborhood_overview: Rozelle is a lovey quiet neighbourhood.   There is a nice park just up the road and we are close to both the Bay Run and the Rozelle Bay walk.  It is a 10 minute walk to Darling Street Rozelle where you can find a variety of restaurants and cafes.
notes: *Smoking outside only please.   *Single guests or couples are preferred (its one Queen size bed), we are also a gay friendly home.   *No additional guests or visitors without consultation, this works both ways. *You will need to confirm your identity through AirBnB to make a booking. *We do not accept cash to extend bookings, all transactions are through AirBnB only.   *Airport transport depends on the time of day that you arrive. During peak hour it will be cheaper to catch a train & bus.  *If you are catching the bus from the city, we are about a 500m walk down Lilyfield Rd from the first bus stop after the ANZAC bridge (White Bay).
transit: The bus stops are roughly 500m from the front door and will take you into the city.  You can find specific travel information on the transport NSW website. You will need Pre-paid Opal cards to travel on public transport.  It takes approximately 40mins to walk into the city over the ANZAC Bridge.
access: Guests have full access to:  *Kitchen - contains pretty much everything you need except food. *Laundry - clothes line around the back or dryer for rainy days. *Shared Bathroom - shower over bath.  *Lounge Room - soft leather couches,  55” curved 4K LCD TV with HDMI support for laptop connection,  DVD player with a small range of DVD's. *Wifi Internet - 4G+ home wireless connection (roughly 11 Mbps) *There's plenty of free on-street parking.
interaction: We are quite friendly and always happy to have a chat about our favourite parts of Sydney.   We tend to work a lot so you may not see us too often.
house_rules: If you have an incomplete profile... i.e. No photo, A blank "about me" section, or no info about who you're traveling with... We will decline/cancel your enquiry straight away.... We hate to sound harsh, it's just that if we are opening our home to you, then we'd expect some basic information about you. You're expected to clean-up after yourself. We shouldn't really need to list any rules but basic common courtesy and respect should sum everything up... Just remember that this is a home and not a hotel.

host.host_about:
G'day, I'm Duncan.
I'm in my 30's, Australian and work in the Maritime Industry.
I've travelled all over NSW by motorcycle, been to every state in Australia and OS a few times. I've also done a few good camping trips around NSW by car.
Originally from rural Australia, I made Sydney City my home roughly 15yrs ago. 
In the past, I spent a lot of time interstate staying in hotels for work and know how monotonous it can become. 
There's nothing quite like coming "home" to a real kitchen, lounge room, bathroom & bedroom when you're indeed away from your normal residence.
My experience hosting has been great! 
If you're looking for somewhere clean that has everything you need with someone who can give you a few good traveling tips, look no further.

reviews.comments:
This room and apartment are a great little find - in a lovely quiet area in Rozelle with great transport links into the city via bus and walking distance to some awesome pubs & into Balmain. You could also walk into the CBD in 40 mins (which we did a few times across the Anzac Bridge).
We stayed with Duncan and Ashlee for three weeks and they are perfect hosts - gave us space to do our own thing but always there if we needed advice on Sydney (it was our first time to the city) and generally great company.
The room itself is spacious and well furnished with plenty of space for storage, the bed was really comfy with an electric blanket for when the nights got a little chilly, and Duncan's information sheet in the bedroom was a great reference point. Kitchen, Living Room and Bathroom are ample sized and well equipped. There is nothing I can fault this property on nor the hosts - a great first experience of Airbnb and Sydney for us. Thank you so much guys!
The room is really nice and comfortable! The bus stop is very closed to the apartment. Duncan and Ashlee are wonderful! They're nice, kindly, friendly and hilarious! You couln't ask for more!

Excellent and cheap accomodation! The best Thing is that you can take all the buses and it is just 1 busstop to the CBD!
Duncan is very very friendly and funny.
The room is tidy, good bed, there is enough space (also in the kitchen) and it is a calm place. 
I really recommend this apartment! :-)

Duncan and Ashlee provide a lovely room and good, friendly experience and stay.

The room is very clean and set up perfectly for arrival with a lot of space to store personal items and clothes. Everything was made easy and hassle-free, and the location itself is perfect for a quick tram or bus into town, so it easy to find be first time also. 

We didn't get to chat much with the hosts as we were coming and going and exploring, but we enjoyed our short time spent in their company.

We recommend this place for all aspects of a stay, and would be happy to stay longer than the 4 nights we had there.
Duncan und Ashlee waren tolle Gastgeber: freundlich, hilfsbereit und großzügig - bis hin zu einer Einladung mit ihnen das Silvesterfeuerwerk auf einer der Ferries zu erleben. Unvergesslich!!!

It was our first time staying with airbnb and we couldn't have wished for a better start.
Their place is very nice, clean and comfortable. Ashlee and Duncan were nice hosts and we enjoyed the conversations which were quite entertaining as well not to forget the nice self made honey we had! :)
It was handy to be so close to the city and it was easy to get there as it's just one bus stop.

Thanks for accommodation us.
Cheers,
Mathilda and Kim
Duncan made us feel home from the very beginning. The room is very well located (close to the bus stop and only 2 stops to Queen Victoria Building/the city).
First time Airbnb, Duncan was the perfect host,the room was exceptionally clean as was all of accomodation. Rozelle is the perfect place to rest whilst visiting Sydney.

Duncan and Ashlee are great hosts! They were welcoming and went out of there way to assist me with every thing. The location is great, it's a nice neighborhood and very easy to get into the city. The house has everything you need. I had a great stay, I recommend it!

Staying at Duncan's place was a pleasant experience.  The apartment was clean and in a fantastic location.  Duncan is a great host and would always make you feel welcome.  Definately a recommend staying here if you need to find a place to live for a few days.
Duncan & Ashlee's place made our stay in Sydney really convenient. Friendly people, very clean place, very close to Sydney (one bus stop to city), nice recommendations

From the moment we arrived we were made to feel welcome by Duncan & Ashley, who are both fantastic hosts. The bedroom was cosy, and the rest of the apartment was spotless. The location is convenient as it's only a 10 mins bus ride away from the city centre. We were provided with lots of useful advice on things to do around the city, and had lots of fun & interesting chats with the hosts! Thanks again for your awesome hospitality!

Duncan and Ashlee were the perfect hosts for our first experience with Airbnb in Sydney. From the first moment they let us feel home and give us the feeling of being very warm welcome. It was a pleasure to stay at their very cozy, clean and beautiful home! Thank you so much!!

So glad that our first Airbnb experience was a positive one! Duncan is prompt with his replies on (Hidden by Airbnb) once contact was made. No problems checking in, the apartment is cozy and clean, and well-equipped. Also just 5 mins by bus across the ANZAC bridge into the city. We looked forward to coming 'home' each day after our explorations. Thanks again, Duncan and Ashlee for contributing to our  memorable stay in Sydney!

Duncan's place was certainly one of the best places that we stayed in. Duncan was very welcoming, along with his partner Ashley. They made us feel at home, and we didn't miss anything. The room was very spacious and comfortable, and the location was perfect. I would certainly recommend this place to anybody looking for a quality accommodation for affordable price.

Lovely hosts, beautiful place, perfect stay!
We loved staying with Ashlee and Duncan and really enjoyed chatting with them! They we're so friendly, caring and we felt very welcome!
The guest room is perfectly equipped, the bed so comfortable and we could really feel that they're both experienced travellers and therefore know about travellers' needs: chocolate on the bed, maps and recommendations,  the cleanliness of the whole place and the warm atmosphere, everything just perfect!
The apartment is also located very good, it is quiet, perfect for a relaxing sleep, but at the same time very easy to get around from there and we felt very safe in the nice neighborhood!
Of course communication was very easy too! 
Highly recommended, if we return to Sydney we would love to stay with Ashlee and Duncan again! Thank you so much for everything!!

Our stay was perfect. We stayed at Duncan’s home for 2 weeks.
Duncan and Ashlee are very friendly and kindly. They are always ready to help and give advice of everything we needed.  
It was a real pleasure to stay at their place. The house is exactly as pictured, lovely! The room as well as the bathroom are very nice and clean. 
The place is very conveniently located. There are only 5 mins away bus stops. The neighborhood is quiet and so nice.
Great experience and highly recommended!

This was my first Airbnb stay, and what a great start. No nasty surprises, the accommodation was just as described, comfy, clean, great almost inner city location and affordable. The information sheet provided with the accommodation was perfectly understandable & helpful for anyone who is not a Sydney local, like me. And the little touches that make it special were unexpected but lovely...the Lindor Balls, the Frangipani toiletries, all add to a relaxing experience.Duncan and Ashlee were fabulous hosts who are happy to be as involved as you want them to be and have a wealth of info on many things, as well as the odd anecdote or two. Very easygoing and personable, couldn't fault them! Couldn't be happier with my first visit, and hopefully I will have the opportunity to stay with them again in the future, now that I've fallen in love with Rozelle just a little bit more.

The apartment and the room are clean. Close to bus stop. (5min from CBD) 
Duncan and Ashlee are friendly, helpful and easy going hosts. We recommend.

Thank you for everything. Ashley and Duncan took turns to chat with us, though all of us was in and out quite alot. 
Glad we had time to hang out briefly. 
All as described- clean and crisp, and felt truly welcome.
Fantastic hosts, beautiful clean room, hidden gem, many thanks!
Duncan and Ashley were both very friendly and helpful, but also let us have privacy in the house - we weren't home that often but never had an issue feeling cramped. Great stay!
Cosy and very well located. Very nice neighbourhood at only one bus stop from CBD. Duncan is a great host, always ready to help with good tips. We had a wonderful time.

I had such a great stay with Duncan and Ashley.  Their little apartment was very inviting and had everything I needed. It was clean and tidy and nicely presented with bunches of flowers which were replaced/refreshed during my stay. More little touches such as the brand new white fluffy towels rolled on the end of my bed and topped with Lindt Chocolates made this stay a really pleasant experience. 
And as for Duncan and Ashley.....these are two super friendly, interesting and generous people. I had a great chat with Duncan when I arrived and he invited me to come on his boat... and then chatting to Ashley on the last night she offered to come along with me to a gallery the following day.  These two go out of their way to include you in Sydney.  I could not recommend this AirBnB enough.

This was my first experience using airbnb, and I gotta say I'm really glad i did it. The apartment was just as described and very clean. Duncan and his girlfriend was the perfect hosts, they will gladly help you with whatever you ask them, and Duncan even drove me to my next accommodation when my stay was over. I give Duncan and his apartment my highest recommendation. Enjoy your stay! :)

I booked Duncan's place with only a few days notice. I arrived to a lovely cosy house which was clean and tidy. Duncan was an awesome, entertaining host. But was rarely around due to his work commitments. The room was quiet, tidy and warm. The bed I have to say was the comfiest bed I've slept in for a long while. I really could charge my batteries up here! Access to Sydney CBD was super easy, only being a 5 min walk from the bus stop. I also met Ashley, who took my out to a really great quiz night.
Duncan was a great host! His place was great and cozy, located in a good neighborhood. I'd definitely stay there again.

We had a wonderful stay at Duncan's place. The apartment was very well situatated, we loved  the neighbourhood and we were close to the city. The apartment was very clean and tidy. Duncan and Ashley  were very sweet and helpful. The bed was very very very comfortable. We would definitely stay there again.

Since the moment we arrived at the place Duncan was so kind with us. He was ALWAYS attentive and ready to help us and answer our questions.

We loved our stay.

The place was clean, bright, quiet, 7 minutes walk to a bus stop that you can go everywhere.

The neighborhood is quiet and simple.

Duncan was a fine host.  He's knowledgeable about so many things: Sydney, travel, horses, the sea - he's a commercial sailor. Ashee's an excellent host as well. Great, positive experience.  The place is super clean!

If you choose airbnb to meet nice and friendly people, you are at the good place. The flat has a very good location. The heart of Sydney is served by regular buses. The neighborhood is great and quiet. Duncan and Ashley gave us a lot of advices. We had access to the kitchen. The flat is clean, the bedroom has a lot of storage and is very comfortable. It was a great stay. You can book without hesitation !

Duncan and Ashlee are perfect AirBnb hosts - their place is lovely and nothing was too much trouble. Their apartment is located very close to the city - just a quick bus trip. Highly recommend staying here if you are in Sydney!

Amelia and myself had a lovely stay with Duncan and Ashlee. Their place is conveniently located 1 bus stop away from Sydney CBD. They were both welcoming and accommodating and we would definitely recommend  them to future guests.

Highly recommended.  Duncan and Ashlee are great and very accomodating.  The place is neat, quiet, and perfect and is just one bus stop away from the city.  The neighborhood feels safe as well.  Would love to be back in their place someday.

Our stay in Sydney was fabulous. Not only because the city itself is fantastic, also because Duncan and Ashlee were most helpful whenever needed. Room is very pleasant with comfy bed. Always very clean and tidy. 10-12 minutes bus ride to city centre. Its a shame though that we didn't have  more time to chat together, because these guys are really easygoing. Highly recommended to stay here.

VERY LOVELY :)
Nice little cosy apartment with great hosts!
Duncan and Ashlee are there to help you if you have any question.
We spent 2 weeks there and we hardly recommend the place!!!
Really close to the city (10 minutes by bus) and to everything else you have to see in Sydney.
It was a real pleasure to meet them both, we hope to see them again one day :)
GO, you won't regret it!

Super hôtes, super sympas, super disponibles ! Duncan et Ashlee vous avez été super adorable avec nous. Notre séjour à Sydney n'aurait pas été complet si on ne vous avez pas rencontrés !!! Surtout ne changez rien ! Je recommande ++++ Bonne continuation à tous les 2..... Lydie

Duncan and Ashlee are two of the friendliest people you will ever meet. Both of them were working a lot during our stay but were always chatty and happy to offer any advice we needed and made us feel very much at home! The place is in a great location and was always clean and tidy, we very highly recommend to any and all who have plans to visit Sydney!
We have thoroughly enjoyed our second stay with Duncan and Ashlee. They are both lovely hosts and we would recommend to future guests.
Great people felt like I had known them for years
The room was very nice and clean, the location is perfect very quiet everything is near. Duncan was very helpful , we recommend this place !

We really enjoyed our stay with Duncan and Ashlee. They're a very friendly couple and were great to chat to over the course of our stay! The room and apartment was in impeccable condition and, whilst we didn't need to use them, the pre-loaded Opal cards were a wonderful gesture! It was great to get to know both of them; absolutely great people to have the pleasure of meeting.

Duncan and Ashlee were fantastic hosts making us feel welcome and at home right from the get go. They are both really lovely, laid back and have a great attitude towards Airbnb. The property itself was exactly as described, very clean and in an awesome location. The prepaid opal cards were a huge help and all the advice to help with our trip was very appreciated. Our first trip to Sydney and it couldn't have been better. We would definitely stay here again and really recommend it! You will really struggle to find better value on Airbnb let alone in Sydney! Thanks again guys!!

Duncan and Ashlee were great hosts! We arrived in a Friday night after work and as soon as we walked through the door they offered us a beer and to have dinner with them. It is in a brilliant location just 1 bus stop from the city and has a lot of good restaurants and bars on Darling Street. They were very welcoming hosts and we felt at home and comfortable for the duration of our stay. It was a good sized room and the place was clean and had everything we needed and more. They also cooked us dinner later in the stay which was very nice! I would recommend staying here very much!!

A great stay! Duncan and Ashlee are friendly, down to earth and full of good tips for the area. The room itself is comfortable, and not too far away from the city. 

Duncan and Ashlee are very welcoming and fantastic across the whole stay

This is my first time Airbnb experience. It was lucky for Liena and me to stay with Duncan and Ashlee for a month. They are nice, genuine and funny! The unit is exactly what it looks like on the picture. The space and the bed are enough for two people to stay. A wardrobe and a chest of drawers are enough for us to place our belongings. There were lots of hangers as well. Duncan prepared a cupboard for us and we had  space in refrigerator. And he even prepared Opal cards, though we chose to use ours. The whole apartment is tidy and clean. It's really comfortable.  Living here won't be disturbed by noise. And the house is really closed to Town Hall (5 minutes by bus) , which is in CBD.  It saved plenty of times and money when traveling around. Though my English is not well to express clearly, Duncan and Ashlee were so kind they listened carefully. It was definitely funny  learning Australian culture or slang with them! They 're both willing to share and help. Sometimes they would serve us food, two of them are good at cooking.
Liena and I appreciate their kindness, because during our stay we had made inconveniences they still treated us truly. It's absolutely worth to stay with them and learning Australia from them. Best choice!

I've never been to Australia before and I didn't know anybody in Sydney, nor did I know how to get around when I arrived, so naturally I was a little nervous.  However, both Duncan and Ashlee put me at ease, they are very friendly and easy-going people who showed me the nearest bus routes and had Opel bus passes readily available.  After we introduced ourselves, I was able to go out to the nearest grocery to buy food.  Plus they are centrally located.  They are very close to the Sydney Opera House and to the Sydney Exhibition Centre on Glebe Island where OZ Comic Con took place the weekend I was there.  They also took me out for a beer and invited me to their whale-watching boat trip where I actually got to see whales!  Room was very nice and cozy, I got use of the kitchen and even the living room to watch TV.  Bathroom was clean too.  And very quiet too, I slept soundly all six nights I was there.  And they have free wi-fi.  They also provided towels, soap and shampoo.  Finally, you can't beat the price especially for that location!.  If I ever visit Sydney again in the future, I would love to be at their place again!  : )

My boyfriend and I were looking for somewhere to stay in Sydney that was good value for money but with a homely feel and Duncan's place didn't disappoint. The room has so many little details from all the maps, the welcome information to the lindt chocolates on the towels! Although Ashlee and Duncan lead very busy lifestyles, they were always very friendly when they were around and made our stay very comfortable. The location is so convenient to get right into the heart of Sydney, just a short bus trip away (literally!) If you're considering between a hostel/hotel in the city or this air bnb - book the air bnb. It's really good value for money in a city that definitely comes with a hefty price tag.

J'ai passé un séjour agréable chez Duncan. La chambre est très confortable et la résidence est proche des transports pour un accès facile au centre-ville. Je n'ai pas passé beaucoup de temps avec les hôtes parce que nous étions tous très occupés mais ce sont des personnes adorables et qui font en sorte de rendre le séjour très agréable. Merci à eux !

They kept me updated how early I can check in, and even sent me a notifier when the room was ready. Through the stay they were both real friendly, open, helpful, plus they surely can give you a few tips what to see and where to go! The room is clean, comfy, a small heater unit is also provided if you happened to come at wintertime. We are fully satisfied with the room and recommend it to anyone lookinh for a safe, nice stay in Sydney!
The perfect location to be able to get into the centre of Sydney quickly with lots of public transport options. Ideal place and a friendly welcome too!

Duncan and Ashlee were great hosts! Friendly, funny and always willing to answer your questions. We loved the Bondi to Cogee Coastal Walk, which was recommended by Ashlee. We really enjoyed our stay, the chats and the movie night. The ferry ride with Duncan was awesome!! The room was very clean, cosy and the bed very comfy. We also liked the pre-loaded Opal cards, the chocolate and the maps. The apartment is located in a quiet neighbourhood and is close to a bus stop. The city centre is just 10 min away. Great experience and highly recommended!!
We have stayed here for a couple of days the talkings where great and Duncan can if you like it show you whales whith his boat. We are glad that we have been by them

Duncan and Ashley are wonderful hosts. They have been very kind to me. The place is nice and cosy, though if you are a couple it might be a little small (I was by myself so the place was perfect). Very convenient to catch buses to the city also.

We didn't see much of Duncan and Ashlee but they made us feel very at home! Lovely room in a good location. Felt very comfortable! The place was clean and tidy but homely and lived in. There were opal cards ready for us to use which was so handy! The guidebook was also a great tool. Really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it to others for sure!

Duncan and Ashlee weren't just any hosts to us but they became our Australian Family. They're both incredibly funny, kind and helpful. The apartment itself is super clean and the room is very spacious and comfortable. They provide everything you need. Even if something were missing they would make sure that you get it. The first night I mentioned that I'm scared of insects and the next day Ashlee came home and placed baits all over the apartment just in case. In the 6 weeks we stayed with them they helped us with so many different things completely unrelated to their apartment and just made us feel so very welcome and at home. We spent Christmas and New Year's Eve with them and those two are so lovely people, you couldn't wish for better friends and especially not for better AirBnb Hosts.
Duncan and Ashlee: thank you so much for everything, we are so happy that we got the chance to meet you both.

Duncan is a great host, although we didn't meet, he made sure that everything was alright.
The apartment is very clean and lovely, as in the photos! 
Thank you Duncan!

Such a lovely house, that is in a great location.. quiet suburb but so close to the city! Everything and more you could need for a comfortable stay; we stayed for a month and it was perfect for us! Duncan and Ashley are so friendly and more than happy to help us out with anything! Would highly recommend as a very affordable and great location accomodation for the city.

We had a great stay at Duncan's and Ashlee's apartment.
Everything was really clean, comfortable and it really felt like a "home away from home".
They are both so nice and friendly - unbelievable! 
We also had a tour with Duncan on a ferry and that was one of our highlights in Sydney. 
So we can highly recommend to stay here.

Couldn't ask for better hosts if you tried. Ashlee was very welcoming when we arrived and both were very helpful. highly recommend having a beer with duncan and listening to his stories. If am ever back back in Sydney will definitely be looking to stay here again.

Definitely the best home outside home we've ever had! The house is lovely, clean and super comfy. You will find everything you need for your stay in Sydney. Thank you Ashley and Duncan for hosting us and being always welcome and helpful. We really enjoyed staying at your place, see you soon!

Duncan's place was a perfect Airbnb. Duncan and Ashlee were welcoming, helpful and made sure that the entire stay was as hassle-free as they possibly could. 

They are Super Hosts who are very experienced in thinking of the things that a guest will need, well in advance of the guesting thinking of those things themselves!

The room and apartment is meticulously clean, the location is very good for the heart of the CBD (5 minutes over Anzac Bridge /  1 bus stop to the city). 

I don't think Duncan and Ashlee could have done any more as hosts to improve my stay in Sydney. They were excellent - thank you Duncan and Ashlee!!

.

Unser Aufenthalt bei Duncan und Ashlee war wirklich klasse! Die beiden waren supernett und haben uns bei all unseren Fragen geholfen. Außerdem war die Wohnung sehr gemütlich und mit allem ausgestattet, was man so brauchte, sodass man sich sofort zu Hause fühlen konnte. An unserem letzten Abend hat Ashlee sogar für uns alle ein leckeres asiatisches Gericht gekocht.
Alles in allem haben wir uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden sofort nochmal zurückkommen, sollten wir wieder in Sydney sein.

Nous avons passé une dizaine de jours très agréables chez Ashlee et Duncan. La chambre est confortable, le quartier est calme (avec quelques restaurants un peu plus loin). Ashlee nous a donné de très bons conseil pour visiter Sydney et nous nous a fait sentir comme chez nous : cuisine et salon libres d'accès, possibilité d'utiliser le lave-linge,… Le logement est un peu éloigné du CBD à pied, mais beaucoup de bus passent à quelques mètres du logement et sont direct vers le centre (5 minutes de bus à peine). C'est une bonne adresse et nous le recommandons à tous ceux qui veulent rencontrer des sydneysiders :)

It's was amazing to stay with Duncan and Ashlee! They are both extremely nice, communicative and open. Their place is exceptionally clean and equipped with all you need to have an overjoyous experience in Sydney. Highly recommended!

Wir haben uns bei Ashlee und Duncan sehr wohl gefühlt. Das AirBnB hat eine gute Lage und war stets sauber.  Die beiden sind tolle Gastgeber, die uns unsere Zeit in Sydney durch Tipps und spontane Aktivitäten unvergesslich gemacht haben. Hoffentlich sehen wir uns irgendwann mal wieder! :)

Die Unterkunft ist schlicht aber sehr schön eingerichtet und hat alles was man braucht. Man ist zu Fuß in 5 Minuten an der Bushaltestelle und braucht ca. 15 Minuten in die Innenstadt. Die Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und es hat einen Park in der Nähe. Man kann auch sehr schöne Spaziergänge um die Hafenbuchten unternehmen, die besonders schön beim Sonnenuntergang sind. Ashlee und Duncan sind zwei wundervolle Menschen und sind weitaus mehr als nur Gastgeber! Wir hatten 5 unvergessliche Monate mit ihnen und sind überglücklich sie kennen gelernt zu haben! Herzlichen  Dank nochmal für alles was ihr für uns getan habt! Es gibt nur positives über die Beiden und ihrer Unterkunft zusagen.❤

Duncan and Ashlee were amazing hosts! They were friendly, welcoming and went out of their way to check in with me and make sure I was having a good time in Sydney. 

I was in Sydney for business, and also enjoyed the beautiful walk to Circular Quay. For those who prefer not to walk, there was plenty of public transport. 

Their home was clean, tidy and homey. It was a great stay; I enjoyed the comfortable bed, excellent shower pressure and evenings chilling out in front of the TV. I can only highly recommend staying with them; you'll be in a great location in fantastic hands.
The place was super clean and the guys were perfect hosts. I'd recommend the place to anyone.

Duncan and Ashlee are two lovely persons! The flat was clean all the time and we slept verry good in the bed! (: 
Both of them were friendly all the time and gave us great tipps!
Duncan and Ashlee were excellent hosts. My daughter and I enjoyed staying in their super clean and tasteful home. It is our home away from home! Highly recommended!

Best location in Sydney!! Really quiet area! Enjoy the time in Duncan and Ashlee's House. Both of them are so lovely and like the nature so much! Also they are a great designer of their house! The photos hanging in the room are the great proof! Next time if I have a long term vacation, I'll still choose to live here! Thank you, Duncan and Ashlee! Best experience in Sydney.
Exellent affordable stay. Really lovely hosts.

Duncan and Ashlee's flat is in a lovely area of Sydney.  It is close to some lovely parklands going down to the waterfront, near the shops at Rozelle, the amazing Orange Grove market on a Saturday and has good links into the City Centre.  The room for one or two people is of a good size, the bed is comfy and the whole flat spotlessly tidy and clean.  I thoroughly recommend Duncan and Ashlee - they are great hosts.
A really lovely room hosted by a great couple. Good location just a couple of bus stops away from darling harbour. The apartment is really cosy with some lovely cosy touches.
Amazing place to stay at especially if you like some privacy :) stayed here for a week and its super convenient!
Awesome place to stay.  Very hospitable and friendly and has everything you need. Definitely recommend for future travellers
Logement très propre, accueil irréprochable, à un arrêt de bus du centre ville, bref parfait pour un séjour sur Sydney avec calme et confort.
Great value for money. Very clean and in a nice suburb close to everything.
Great place with amazing hospitality, and it is only located 1 stop away from the city! Duncan and Ashlee are amazing and have some great tips to share.
The house is very close to CBD and darling harbour and is very quiet. The house was sparkling clean and duncan and ashlee are very amicable
Great location, 5 min drive to the city and 15 mins to the beach, very good value, couldn’t ask anymore from an Airbnb

Duncan and Ashlee's place is very close to the city. The kitchen the bathroom and bedroom everything you want in a home and very clean and tidied up! It really is a "home a way from home". 
Duncan and Ashlee are very friendly kind people. Even though this was our first airbnb with staying with the host, we never felt uncomfortable! 
These two lovely people will help you out with anything!
Thank you very much!!!
Duncan & Ashlee are lovely hosts. Helpful and funny, we will miss them even though we only spent 1 week there! Thanks again D&A!
Duncan and Ashlee are great hosts and their place was clean, cosy and very close to everything. Would definitely stay here again :D

Superhosts for a reason! Flat was located better than expected, only short walk to bus stop from which frequent buses need 5 mins to CBD.
We even got something priceless from Duncan (no further details to avoid everyone expecting this)

Hi, 
I travel a lot, staying in airbnb's all over the world and they were the best hosts I ever had. Not saying the other places were't great but the were the best. I would urge everyone visiting Sydney to stay here if they can. It super comfortable, clean, one stop from central Sydney, affordable, and their kindness is on another level.

name: Modern Private Entrance Bedroom, Nr A/C Subways
summary: This relaxing, newly renovated home features state-of-the-art comforts, rainfall showerheads, and a full bed with its own private entrance and white noise machine
space: This listing is for a private room, for up to 2 people. The room contains a deluxe full-sized bed. Perfect for students or travelers.  The house is a brand new and renovated house. In total there are 5 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms on 2 floors. We are on the ground floor. The house is decked out with luxury touches -- imported tiling in the bathrooms, rainfall showerheads, and a large kitchen with an island could all be yours to call home for your NYC visit! (Your room has a private entrance from the street with a keyed lock, and the rest of the house is shared including the 2 bathrooms.)  The kitchen and living space is welcome to guests for use. Feel free to make yourself at home and cook -- I only ask that you clean up after yourself as it is a shared space.  There is also a washer and dryer on the downstairs floor, free for use.  Listening to past guest feedback, we've also added a white noise machine for guests' comfort by your bedside.  Common areas like the kitchen and bathrooms
description: This relaxing, newly renovated home features state-of-the-art comforts, rainfall showerheads, and a full bed with its own private entrance and white noise machine This listing is for a private room, for up to 2 people. The room contains a deluxe full-sized bed. Perfect for students or travelers.  The house is a brand new and renovated house. In total there are 5 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms on 2 floors. We are on the ground floor. The house is decked out with luxury touches -- imported tiling in the bathrooms, rainfall showerheads, and a large kitchen with an island could all be yours to call home for your NYC visit! (Your room has a private entrance from the street with a keyed lock, and the rest of the house is shared including the 2 bathrooms.)  The kitchen and living space is welcome to guests for use. Feel free to make yourself at home and cook -- I only ask that you clean up after yourself as it is a shared space.  There is also a washer and dryer on the downstairs floor, free f
neighborhood_overview: Near the subway there are tons of shops, delis, coffee shops, and supermarkets around to do all your shopping. It's a very upcoming area so new trendy shops are opening all the time.
transit: The house is a short 10-minute walk to the C or 3 subway lines. There are a lot of convenient delis and take-out restaurants nearby.  Kingston-Throop (C) Subway stop is the nearest subway station. From there, it's just a short 20-minute ride into Manhattan and the A/C goes directly to Times Square.
access: Access both full bathrooms, the washer and dryer, living room, and feel free to cook in our kitchen. There will be space for you to keep things in the fridge and cupboards as well.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a USMC veteran involved with ventures in hospitality and physical fitness. In my free time I love most sports: basketball, football, and weightlifting are my passions. My motto is always keep positive; good energies are vital. Welcome to NYC!

reviews.comments: Steven was a great host. We really had a great time there. The place was nice and clean. Everthing was fantastic except the neighborhood. it was not convenient to buy the food as there were no good market or grocery store nearby. I would recommend if you stay for only few days.
Caring and extremely helpful,steve is a wonderful host who owns a beautiful house which i higly advise you to stay in

La chambre est parfaitement conforme à la photo, les lits sont excellents, nous avions notre entrée privée et la salle de bain est juste à côté est très agréable. Les 4 autres chambres de la maison était occupées et pourtant nous n'avons jamais eu à attendre pour la salle de bain. Nous sommes partis en juillet et il faisait très chaud dehors mais l'appartement possède une climatisation centralisée qui fait que nous étions parfaitement bien à l'intérieur. Nous n'avons pas vu Steven en personne mais il a répondu à chacune de mes questions dans la minute. N'hésitez pas à le contacter si besoin. 
Le quartier est Afro-Américain mais extrêmement familial. Les enfants jouent sur les trottoirs, les personnes âgées discutent sur les perrons et tout le monde est prêt à vous aider si vous êtes perdus. 
Il faut marcher pour aller au métro ou au supermarché mais à NY on marche beaucoup de toute façon...
Je recommande vivement cet appartement, je ne pense pas que nous aurions pu trouver un meilleur rapport qualité/prix.

For the price you have good quality. 2 big and clean bathrooms. A big livingroom. You share it with other people.
The bedroom was very small when you with 3 people.
We had problems with the bed but when we contacted Steven he came in a hour to fix it.
It is a small 10 minutes walk to the subway. Fom there you are in 20 a 30 minutes in manhatten.
The neighboorhoud and the house are noisy. and the in the house nxt to you they are building.
They start around 8.
So tip bring your earplugs with you.
At our last day we were alowed to leave our luggage in the livingroom because we had a late flight. That was very fine.
Convenient, safe and modern accommodation about 15 minutes from the centre of Manhattan. 5 minutes from Kingston Throop, 10 minutes from Kingston Av. Would defo recommend!

The room and the house were clean and fully equipped. The first times it took us an hour to go to Manhattan by metro, then we realized it would take less by changing from line C to A. If we had met Steven, he might have told us, but unfortunately we did not receive any assistance.  The closest metro station does not have any elevator or facilities for strollers or wheelchair so I would recommend this accomodation if you don't need them.

The booking was made with Steven 8 months in advance but everithing was ready before our arrival. Thanks for that.
The rooms are spacious enough and it is very interesting to be able to use 2 different bathrooms.
The fridge offers places per room sufficiently large. 
The situation of the apartement is ok regarding transports to Manhattan.
We faced 1 problem (loss of key) and received a double 2 days after.
Thus, in case of urgency, (arrived during the week-end), the assistance could be quickest.
But, we will keep good memories from NY and the apartement.
We had a nice trip in NY, steven anwered to all our questions and the room and all the house was fine, the other roommates were cool! We will come in the house next time!

La ubicación es buena , el precio excelente por lo que recibes, existe privacidad y limpieza, un poco ruidosa la habitación ya que estaba en construcción la vivienda aledaña. Pero en general es buena opción en Brooklyn,

Nous sommes restes, avec ma meilleure amie, 15 jours. L'appartement est vraiment bien, tres fonctionnel. Vu qu'il y a 2 salles de bains, nous n'avons jamais eu d'attentes. La piece a vivre est tres pratique et nous avons, dans la cuisine, tout le necessaire pour nous restaurer. Il y a quand meme eu un petit probleme, la chambre est pas tres bien isolee donc on a juste entendu quand le voisin du dessus rentrait et sortait.

The room fit the description presented on this page and was in a pretty convenient location to A and C trains. Nice neighborhood. Never actually met Steven in person but he seemed responsive over the app.
We had a fantastic week in Steven's apartment. Everything was as expected, clean and cozy! Steven always responded within a short time. Thank you!

Everything was as advertised. We stayed in room no. 1, it was small but lack of heating in the room and  I could not dry out my wet hat for 3 days. Subway Blue C line takes You from Kingston Av./Throop Av. in 20min. to Lower Manhattan. Very nice tenement house. Finally I would recommend it.
Todo genial.
It's really really good!! The room is so clean and cozy :) it looks same as picture.  You should book this room now!

Everything was fine. Steven gave us all the information we needed to check in and check out. The room is a little bit small for 3 people but beds are big enough, it's clean and nice. The rest of the house is nice as well. 
We just had a problem with WiFi the last day. There was no connexion anymore.
Anyway, it was a great trip ! :)
Very nice flat, well located, 2 nice bathrooms. Be sure that you get the locker key before checking in! Situation between 2 stations 5/7 min walking, lot of place to eat around
Pretty nice place to stay in New York, lots of deli around and quite close to the subway station!
The place is really good highly recommend for tourists... The apartment is near the metro and many deli's around. Neighborhood is quite calm..
卧室睡三个人略小,不过公共空间很大~做饭也很方便!

Nous avons eu des gros soucis avec les autres personnes qui étaient présentes : manque d'hygiène, manque de civilité et nuisances sonores durant la nuit. 
Nous avons prévenu la propriétaire qui a fait la sourde oreille. Nous avons été très déçues. Elle nous a demandé de l'appeler si le bruit recommencé ce que nous avons fait et elle ne nous a jamais rappelée...sinon le quartier est sympa et la maison en soit est jolie

De ruimte was erg klein maar dat klopte wel met de beschrijving. We hadden erg veel stopcontacten om apparaten op te laden en ook de WIFI was goed. De badkamer en keuken zijn geweldig. We hebben het naar ons in gehad; de plek is een aanrader.
Tout a été très bien chez Steven. Chambre propre, facilement accessible avec grand salon, climatisation et cuisine moderne et équipée !

Le séjour chez Steven s'est bien passé, nous sommes restés 4 jours. Nous avions une chambre avec entrée et sortie directe. 
Ensemble très propre.
Nous entendions tous les soirs le voisin du dessus qui mettait sa musique très fort. Gros bémol après une longue journée de visite...
Il faut compter 10 bonnes minutes pour la 1ère station de métro. 
Par contre le quartier autour de l'appartement n'est vraiment pas beau.
Nous n'avons pas vu Steven de tout notre séjour. Il n'y avait que d'autres voyageurs avec nous (5 autres chambres mais pas de problèmes avec eux)

Hi Steven

Everything was ok for us 3 in the room, 
only a little tidy but we weren't there the whole day only for sleeping so fine for us. Also enough clothing-space!
We used both bathrooms, when they where available. Bathroom upstairs was GREAT. Kitchen GREAT.
We definitely recommend this room to our friends if they like to stay in Brooklyn.
Thank you so much for this experience Steven.

Le logement était conforme aux photos, la chambre était propre et les lits étaient confortables. Quartier calme mais il est vrai que les allés-retours du voisin du dessus sont vite devenus gênants ainsi que sa machine à laver qui faisait trembler le plafond la nuit (c'est arrivé 2 fois sur une période de 10 nuits). Autrement l'appartement est top, le ménage est fait régulièrement et Steven a répondu à tous les messages avant et pendant notre séjour.
A realy had a great time in the Steven's appartement. Everything was awsome. Perfect!  Thank You!

The location is great. It was not clean everyday but it was due to the others travelers! 
It is very close to a station, we appreciated that! I recommend it

La chambre est belle, le lit confortable. Le  logement se situe dans un quartier résidentiel de Brooklyn. assez typique et familial. La maison, très bien aménagée, est partagée, avec 5 chambres accueillant d'autres voyageurs et cela est plutôt plaisant. Vous rencontrerez d'autres nationalités et parlerez anglais! Steven est très à l'écoute et très réactif. 
Le seul bémol est que cette chambre donne directement sur l'extérieur et est parfois bruyante.

Had a great time in the city. Place was as described, room was clean and had plenty of closet space. Neighbors were a little loud and the walls are a bit thin so you can hear them and the other renters in the same unit. Loved that we had a private entrance to the room. Never met the host but he communicated back quickly as well as being flexible with the check out time.

Location is great to get to Manhattan, as this place is just blocks away from the subway station. Stephen is a great communicator and was very quick with responding. It was kind of a bummer that none of the lights worked in our room besides the lamp that was next to the bed but we weren't home that much so it didn't really bother us much. Other than that, this is definitely a fun place to stay in Brooklyn, as this entire apartment has been rennovated. Highly recommend this place to anyone traveling to NYC.
맨해튼과의 접근성이 생각보다 떨어진다는 점이 단점이었어요! 지하철이 우리나라처럼 제 시간에 잘 안와서 미드타운에 가려면 한시간이 조금 넘았아요. 숙소와 지하철역까지의 거리도 가까운 편은 아니였아요. 방은 사진과 같구 크기는 생각보다는 안락했습니다. 화장실은 2층 화장실이 예뻐요! 청결은 같이 사용하는 사람들에 따라 다를 것 같아요!!

Generelly the appartment is modern and the communication worked perfectly. 
However other rooms of the appartment were also occupied by several airbnbguests and it was very noisy especially at night, so it felt like staying at a hostel.
Furthermore there were hairs from the guests before on the bed sheets and the bedframe was broken.
The kitchen and the bathroom were modern and spacious.
Steven Was very helpful and friendly; we havent met but he responded to every message quickly! The place is great and clean
Great appartment with a lot of commodities (hairdryer, iron, washmachine etc), very clean and comfortable. I recommend it !!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is a really great deal for the location and the amenities! The room has a private entrance from the street, which is very convenient. The bed was super comfortable with nice pillows. However, the room is adjacent to the street, so there can be some loud noises at night or in the morning for light sleepers. Towels and travel sized shampoo and conditioner were provided, along with a couple granola bars, which was a nice touch. We really enjoyed the place!
Place is clean, really nice bathroom & kitchen, 5 mins walk from the subway. Had no problems!

Fantastic host. Fantastic home.
I would book this again just to take another bath in the luxurious and clean bathroom!
Beautiful apartment and fast internet. Staying in room #1 and having our own entryway to the street was great as we barely needed to interact or see other guests.
Super easy trip! Clear instructions for check-in/check-out, and the room was clean and really comfortable!
It's a great place

Being that we stayed in crown heights to check out the neighborhood, it was a great way to be introduced to the area. The amenities are superb and the access to  a private entrance really makes the the room feel like it's very own little little apartment within an apartment. During our stay we took the subway during the day and at night we took an uber pool that never cost more that 8 bucks. The place was really well kept and I am using that bathroom as inspiration to what I want for my next bathroom! Overall 5 out of 5 !

Das Airbnb bei Steven ist auf jeden Fall zu empfehlen! Es ist sehr schön eingerichtet und man kommt sehr schnell in Kontakt mit den anderen Gästen! Auch der Weg zur nächsten Subway-Station ist in 5 Minuten zu bewältigen. Insbesondere Check-In und Check-Out liefen besonders reibungslos ab. Für den Preis wird es schwierig, etwas besseres in NYC zu finden!

Beautiful house, and checking in was super easy! It is a great house for independent travellers. We did not find the neighbourhood very safe, especially for a young traveling couple and especially at night! There were not many shops near by. However, it is close to the subway.

The place is clean and very stylish. Subway is 7 minutes walk and it will take you straight to times square, central park and the other usual suspects. 
The neighbours in the building may be a bit loud especially because my room had a private entrance adjacent to the  building entrance. But all other rooms are internal so maybe just request a quiet room while booking and Steven will sort you out.

Goed adresje als je ertegen kunt in spannende buurt te logeren. Schoon en veel ruimte waarvan je er een aantal deelt met anderen. Niet erg maar goed om te weten voordat je boekt. Steven is behulpzaam , we hebben hem niet gezien maar hij was goed bereikbaar. Prijswaarde verhouding: heel goed!

The house was warm and well furnished. The room was also very cozy and nice. The location was ok if you are available to take regularly the subway for at least 30/40 minutes to go to Manhattan and if you are adatable to the area in which it is located. Since several guests are in the house I suggest to wake up early to avoid long waiting times for using the restroom. All the rest was perfect. I reccomend this place for the relationship between price and comforts.
Great for what we needed it for!

Beautiful apartment! The private room is great and we loved how we had its own entrance to outside. The upstairs bathroom is beautiful and I will miss taking baths in that bathtub, as well as using the rainfall shower. The living area and kitchen downstairs is also very open and nice. All seems very recently renovated and up to date. Washer and dryer was very convenient as well! Steven is a very responsive and conscientious host.
Beautiful house, confi bedrooms and living room. The neighbourhood nice but little isolated. Fantastic stay anyhow.

Accommodation in Steven's apartment was wonderful, big kitchen, clean bathroom and nice bedroom. All instructions were clear and simple. We could share the kitchen and the living room with other friendly guests. It was easy to get from Brooklyn to Manhattan. Unfortunatelly we didn't met Steven during our stay there.

We had a great week in NY. We didn't spent much time in the house, but it had everything we needed, it was clean and the room was good as well. The street is a bit noisy, so if you are looking for a quite place ask Steven to get a room on the inside of the house. Be aware that you are in Brooklin and so the neighborhood is sometimes a bit scaring. Still we didn't have any problem.

Una casa muy bonita en un barrio muy auténtico, ideal para quien quiera salir un poco más allá de la gran ciudad. Tuvimos problemas de goteras en nuestra habitación un día de lluvia (venían a arreglarlo al día siguiente) y se oía mucho a nuestros vecinos, pero la casa era muy práctica, moderna, limpia y la comunicación con el anfitrión muy rápida y buena.

The only thing that was bad during our stay were the fruit flies in the kitchen, although we didnt really mind. There were fly tapes and no food was left out, but due to the heat and humidity, I suppose a Brooklyn kitchen is an ideal place for them. The guy who cleaned the kitchen did apologise for them multiple times and tried to get rid of them the best he could.
Great place! Close to public transit. Clean. Easy to access. Host was prompt and answered any questions/concerns. Would definitely stay again!

We spend 11 nights at Steven's aparment. For tourists like us, it's really great. You arrive Manhattan within 20-30 minutes via subway. Steven was always available for questions and supported us throughout our stay. Thank you!

We had a great time in Brooklyn. Steven is a nice host and answered in case of any questions really quick. We would book this apartment again! His recomandations were also great, we used some of them and were really happy with them.
Clean and cozy house. I wanna use again!

Schöne Unterkunft im stylischen Brooklyn. Sehr cooles Haus mit dem schönsten Badezimmer überhaupt (Regendusche, freistehende Wanne & viel Platz). Die Delis nebenan bieten sehr leckere Rolls zum fairen Preis an-unbedingt probieren! Super gute Verbindung nach Manhatten (ca.20 min.) - Wir würden jederzeit wieder bei Steven einchecken!
Amazing place easy access no hassle and especially the service is spectacular.
Clean, close to the subway and quick communication! Would recommend this place to all of you!

This is one of the best Airbnbs I've stayed in. The area is pretty quiet for the most part and seemed pretty safe over the duration of our stay. We stayed during a storm, so we were really appreciative of the heater. The room is pretty close to the A/C subway stops, and the private entrance is nice. My absolute favorite part was the bathroom equipped with a rainfall shower and beautiful bathtub. Steven was very quick to respond and very clear/accommodating with check-in.
Was a great and incredibly affordable stay and only about a 10 minute walk to the subway. Steven was prompt, courteous, and helpful in his responses and the apartment was beautiful.

On paie pour le ménage 34€ à peu près m, alors que le ménage n’est pas fait c’est très sale. 
L’hôte ne prend pas la peine de demander si nous sommes arrivés sur les lieux si tout se passe bien. 
Sinon le métro est à 10 min à pieds et le quartier est pas mal
Great space. Met some nice guests at the house. The walk to the subway isn’t bad, but the neighborhood is off the beaten path. All around a great space to stay for the price
Está muy lejos del centro. El cuarto tenía goteras
Everything corresponded to what was announce. It worked fine for my 5 day stay on business.

My son and I stayed at Steven’s place for 5 days. Our stay was great. Didn’t spend lots of time there since we were busy exploring the city, but for the most part it was a great place to rest. The bed was super comfortable. We definitely appreciated the heater. We aren’t used to the NY weather. I would recommend Steven’s place.
This place was very functional and clean, not far from the C and A Kingston-Throop Subway Stop. Everything was straightforward.

Spacious apartment in Brooklyn with ample bathrooms and large kitchen. Easy access to either the A express train (Utica Ave Station) and the C train (Kingston-Throop Station). It takes approximately 30-40 minutes to get into Manhattan (midtown). Subway travel to Williamsburg is more complex, and takes a deceptively lengthy period of time to reach. 

The area is safe, has a bodega metres away on the corner, and plenty of shops on Fulton Street. 

The bathrooms are well maintained and regularly cleaned. The upstairs bathroom even includes a large free-standing bath. 

Overall excellent accommodation with good value for money, but somewhat isolated from most traveler’s idea of the Big Apple

Steven and his co-host were necessarily communicative, however, in strictly reviewing the living space in an objective manner there are a few seminal pieces of information future guests need keep-in-mind. Both community bathrooms were inundated with Stachybotrys Mold. To your average pedestrian  it goes unnoticed beyond any apparent 'moldy towel' smell after a shower but the ramifications are extensive and dangerous...beyond concerning. Additionally, the private room (1) I stayed in had significant water damage (I will upload images if prompted) making for an even more uneasy inhabitable feeling during my time. Luckily, Im a NYer back on business so I had resources and family to reach out to for showering purposes during the week in-between running around for business obligations. The next guests might not be so lucky and I'd hate for their entire experience to be ruined due to the host' negligence. Do your own DueDiligence on mold exposure, be mindful, its dangerous and easily unnoticed. (Clearly)
The best air bnb I've been so far. Steven is an awesome guy with great local tips too, so our trip in NYC was all well...
Die Wohnung bei Steven ist super Zentral gelegen. Für das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis kann ich die Wohnung nur empfehlen!
Great place! Clean and stylish. A couple problems with check in and noise from upstairs.

Living and dining room are as advertised.  There are a total of 5 room with 2 bathrooms shared between these rooms.  1 bathroom on the first floor shared by three rooms and 1 bathroom on the second floor shared by two rooms.  There can be problems in using the bathrooms if all rooms are occupied.  Bedroom is also quite small but should not be an issue if the room is only used to sleep.  No TV in the living area or the bedrooms.  Area is residential and not much to do near the location and you have to head in to Manhattan or other parts of Brooklyn for things to do which requires subway or bus ride (although host may be able to provide more details on what to do near the location).

Staying at Steven's apartment was great. Very clean. He is a very good host with helpful tips and always very fast at replying to all our questions. 
Subway station 5 minutes from the apartment with good connections to Manhattan and JFK.
There is mold, not as clean as i would prefer. No mirrors in bedrooms so in order to get ready you have to hold up a shared bathroom.

I admit being slightly concerned about a couple of the recent reviews but I'm very glad I stayed here. Steven obviously cares about his hosting duties and with previous guest feedback he's really endeavored to improve and perfect the space and room as much as possible. The bathrooms and bedroom were very clean (and I am pretty meticulous). He reached out during my stay to ask if everything was all right and if he could help with anything which was appreciated. Overall an amazing value for the price, convenient to downtown Manhattan. Citi bikes nearby and cheap Uber rides to downtown Brooklyn.. Kitchen was stocked with everything you need to make a meal Can't recommend his place enough. I'll be back!
Nice!

The house was really comfortable and had everything that we needed. Our room was safe to store all of our things when we were out and about. Our room was awesome because we had our own separate entrance so coming and going was exceptionally easy. There were a whole bunch of other air bnbers and that made for a good social time when at home. I would definitely stay there again.
belle appartement
Great place. Great host. Highly recommend
Good place.
Exactly as in photos. Host was very helpful with info and would strongly recommend you book this place. The A/C in the appartment was amazing during the heatwave that hit NYC.

Bell'appartamento con grandi spazi e dall'aspetto di tendenza.
Le uniche pecche possibili sono il fatto di avere 5 stanze e solo due bagni (se gli altri ospiti non sono ordinati come voi in pochi giorni la casa risulta sporca) la zona è molto carina e relativamente tranquilla basta non dare troppo nell occhio.

Exactly as described! Great value, lovely home, very clean, and expertly run. Steven was communicative and shared lots of information about the neighborhood, as well as very clear directions for accessing the house and the room.

His place was amazing! I didn’t spend much time in the house but of what I did, it was awesome! I liked the fact that Room #1 has it own direct access to outside so I didn’t have to be bother with interacting with the other tenants! I loved the little helpful notes left around the house. I stayed for a week so what I spent for a week at Steven’s place you could easily spend one night in a hotel in NYC. So I really felt like I got my money’s worth! We caught the bus and subway just about everywhere. Steven’s tip about the metro card was golden. Steven’s bathroom was the best it made me feel very at home. Only thing that bugged me was the tenants during my stay. They were not the tidiest of people, but Steven has cleaners that come on Thursday’s and they cleaned everything spotless!! Overall nice place and when we come again I’ll be looking to book here first!

Very nice location and very convenient neighborhood. It’s very easy to get food and everything you need around this neighborhood. Room is very clean and the bed is so comfortable. After having fun walking in NYC for all day long, you would enjoy a perfect shower and bath in the amazing bathroom. That is the most beautiful thing I love about Steven‘s apartment.
Thanks Steven!
exactly like advertised online, community based area close to the subway. Host gave lots of nice tips that we found useful for our visit.
A lovely house and room with close proximity to the subway. The room was very clean and had everything we needed. Would recommend!
Steven's place is exactly as described, perfect to stay one week. Our room was very clean and had its own own direct entrance. We would definitely stay there again. Thanks for all!

Steven’s place is exactly as described, perfect for travellers who are looking for a clean, no frills location a little away from the city. We were mostly out and about so we didn’t spend too much time at the Airbnb but we had everything we needed when we did spend time here. I loved how hot the showers get and how easy our stay was in general! Overall, great value for your money.
What a great place. Easy to get to and very safe neighborhood

Sehr schöne Unterkunft! 
Das Bad hat Stil und überzeugt! Die Lage ist etwas Gewöhnungsbedürftig, da es in einem eher nicht so schönen Stadtteil liegt.. jedoch ist preis-Leistung zu empfehlen! Und hat es gefallen
The house was as described, the area was close to market, metro stations and other shops. I highly recommend to all this accommodation
Steven is a wonder host and his accommodations are well maintained. Really enjoyed our stay.
Great place, location a little bit out but it's really not that big of a deal. 1 min to a 24hr deli shop if you need anything last minute

The appartement was nice but the bathromm and the kitchen were a little bit dirty and  other persons are with you in the house. So it was often noisy and they took our things from the fridge. Taking all together it was okay.

Our stay in Steven's apartment was great. He was very fast and clear with all instructions and information prior to and during our stay. The apartment is about a 10 minute walk from and to the subway we normally used. The neighborhood is pretty quiet and has a very distinct suburb feel - which is nice after spending all day in the busy city. The apartment itself was modern, clean and had everything necessary for a vacation home. Five stars from us!

name: B&B Porto Downtown 1
summary: Double bedroom in a five bedroom flat.  Located a 100 m of one of the most iconic streets of Porto, Rua de Santa Catarina with a directly metro line from the airport. Air Shuttle optional for two, three or four guests for 25€/trip. Breakfast is optional (2,5€/guest) and is served in a Bar, located in Santa Catarina street , 200 meters from the apartment (3 min walk). Believe me, it's worth the walk. Alojamento Local nº 1584
space: - Other listings available (check profile)  - Free wifi  - Linen and towels provided  - Easy access from the airport  - Bedroom window view to the street - Fully furnished kitchen  - Couzy flat in a secular building  - Located in a 5 bedroom flat  Alojamento Local nº 1584

Air Shuttle optional for two, three or four guests for 25€/trip. Breakfast is optional (2,5€/guest) and is served in a Bar, located in Santa Catarina street , 200 meters from the apartment (3 min walk). Believe me, it's worth the walk.
