neighborhood_overview: - Walking distance from the trendiest bars, cafes, restaurants, art centers, typical grocery stores, bakeries, take-away, ATMs, supermarkets.  - 5 min walk the most stunning of all cafés in the nation and one of the most attractive in the world – Café Majestic - 14 min walk to the best francesinha - Bufete Fase.
notes: Breakfast is included and is served in a Bar, located in Santa Catarina street , 200 meters from the apartment (3 min walk). Believe me, it's worth the walk.
transit: - Airport underground station (28 min underground)  - Bolhão underground station (1 min walk)  - Trindade underground station (8 min walk)  - São Bento train station (10 min walk)  - Batalha long distance bus station (7 min walk)
access: - Access to living room, toilet, terrace and kitchen - Indoor car park for €10/day upon request, 50m away walking
interaction: - Always available on the phone or in person for everything you might need and make your stay in Porto a pleasant trip :)  - Please contact for any additional info
house_rules: IMPORTANT  - If others guests are sleeping please keep your noise as low as possible  - All doors are labeled (ask for the correct key) - No smoking, you can smoke only in the terrace, thank you.

host.host_about:
Me and my wife are passionate about traveling.
When we travel our goal is always to have a good time and bring back good memories, same applies to our guests, we always try to deliver the best experience possible.
At the moment we have five rooms available in a spacious flat with terrace in the heart of Porto downtown, the location is excellent and we can guarantee a good time in Porto :)

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
I feel very honoured to be one of the first guests in marios place: actually it's nicer in reality!!!!
very tastefull and in the heart of Porto!! I will definitely return :next time for a longer stay and with some friends!
to everybody who will stay at this place:good choice and you will enjoy it, for sure:)))

We found ourselves in need of a place to stay on very short notice and Marcelo fixed us up quickly with very comfortable beds and good wifi in a central neighborhood. It was all we needed. 

Mario was very responsive and kind, but we didn't met him in person. If you're looking to stay with locals, this may not be your place. It's like a hostel with a number of rooms sharing a kitchen, living area, balcony and bathrooms. It's very nice.

Fomos muito bem recebidas pelo Mário que nos fez sentir como se estivéssemos em nossa casa. O espaço da casa é muito agradável e os quartos são óptimos. Não posso deixar de referir que a cama é fantástica.
Gostámos bastante da localização. Junto à Rua de Santa Catarina e com o metro quase à porta, não poderia ser melhor.
O Mário também disponibilizou informação sobre a cidade e as actividades a decorrer o que foi uma óptima ajuda para decidir o programa da estadia. 
Recomendo e, certamente, voltaria a ficar neste apartamento.
Obrigada!
Overall, it was a great experience. The flat is really well located, well furnished and clean and Mario and his wife are very welcoming ;) I would definitely saty there again.

Mario ne vit pas sur place, mais en proche banlieue. Il reste néanmoins attentif à la réception de ses hôtes (même si nous concernant il y a eu un petit raté, compte tenu que nous sommes arrivés à 8h dans un appartement vide et avons été pris d'un doute en voyant toutes les chambres utilisées). 
L'appartement a un petit côté auberge espagnole, avec les allées-venues chaque jour d'hôtes de toutes nationalités. Sur quatre jours nous n'avons eu aucun problème de cohabitation, nos voisins étant majoritairement des couples - chacun disposant des parties communes avec respect et indépendance. Une femme de ménage passe d'ailleurs régulièrement préparer les chambres (5 en tout). Les photos sont bien fidèles à la réalité. 
Nous n'avons finalement pas pris la chambre 1 : on y entend tous les bruits de circulation (murs fins, fenêtre simple vitrage) et elle communique par une cloison coulissante à une autre chambre. Préférez la chambre 5 (la meilleure selon Mario himself) plus au calme et qui bénéficie d'une meilleure exposition (+ accès à la terrasse, véritable atout j'imagine l'été), sans compter sa proximité avec la SDB et les WC (non négligeable quand c'est à partager avec d'autres hôtes). Savon et shampoing ne sont pas fournis. Des plans de la ville bien pratiques avec tous les spots touristiques sont en revanche en accès libre. 
Le petit déjeuner est sans intérêt : il est proposé dans un café quelconque (ambiance bar PMU) situé à 5 min., en échange d'un petit coupon qui donne droit à une formule très basique. Nous n’avons pas utilisé la cuisine, mais elle semble fonctionnelle et on trouve facilement des supermarchés aux alentours. 
L’emplacement à proximité de la rue Sainte-catherine, et l’accès direct en métro depuis l’aéroport en font un lieu de choix. On a eu un petit coup de coeur pour le très local Cafe Guedes situé à qqs rues, qui propose de petits sandwichs avec lanières de porc ou fromage de brebis. 
Le seul petit bémol à noter (et uniquement valable en temps de grand froid) est l’absence de vrai chauffage dans les chambres. Seul un mini chauffage électrique faisait office de source de chaleur ; il faut sinon se débrouiller avec les couvertures supplémentaires mises à disposition. 
Mais on oublie vite ce désagrément devant la gentillesse de Mario, prompt à vous répondre par mail pour vous proposer des itinéraires de visite de la ville ou des suggestions de restaurant. Pour dire, une attention qui m’a beaucoup touchée : il avait même laissé en notre absence un mot sur la table du salon accompagné de petites friandises pour souhaiter la bonne année à ses hôtes airbnb !

We have very much enjoyed staying at Mario's bed and breakfast! I would definately recommend going to this B&B! The rooms are very nicely decorated, everything is really clean and it's just a 5 minute walk to the city centre and very close to the metro. But best of all is that Mario and his wife are really friendly. They have great tips on where to go for dinner etc and will help you with everything you need! Mario responds to his mail very quickly, which in nice in case you have any questions. Overall, we have had a very pleasant stay in Porto and I definately would go there again!
Karlijn and Wesley from Holland
Un bel appartement bien décoré aménagé et facile d'accès.  Super bien localisé à proximité du centre ville. Bruirant à partir de 7h du matin à cause de la circulation de la rue.

Chambre très propre dans un appartement très bien placé.
La description correspond bien.

I foubd my 2 night stay very enjoyable. I was need to look around the area as Im moving across in the newer future and found the apartment to be in an excellent location for walking around and using the the metro. The apartment itself was very clean, individual rooms could be locked as well which was very reassuring. Highly recommend the stay!
Perfect. Everything was great. Really nice flat, nice atmosphere. A bit noisy in the morning but Porto has to be seen anyway so not a problem at all! Very good location as well.

Really clean, spacious and central location. Mario and I didn't meet, but he was really friendly and available via email. A little bit noisy at night, but it is normal when you sleep in downtown, didn't have any problem falling asleep. The breakfast is in a café near the BnB, simple, fast and really good! Highly recommend!

Mario a été très accueillant et chaleureux. L'appartement est agréable à vivre et idéalement situé. L'idée de la carte personnalisé avec les bonnes adresse et les bons plans est très bonne. Séjour agréable. N'hésitez pas...
É bom !
Mario est un très bon hôte. Il nous donne toutes les informations nécessaires. Et son logement est très propre, agréable et joli. Bref un de nos meilleurs moments à Porto.

Casa molto bella, moderna e pulita in posizione centralissima. Avevamo due stanze con bagno e doccia in comune con altri 4, nessun problema di alcun tipo. Mario è stato di grande aiuto e gentilissimo. Grazie!
Everything went great! It was easy getting in the Appartement and the Appartement itself was really beautiful and clean! Everytime again! Thank you very much!

We booked this room but we get another on the same streat B&B Mercado do Bolhão 2

 Location of this flat is great, just oposit the metro station, near the small local market. It takes nearly 30 min to get there from airport. Beautiful view from this room. The room was perfect cleaned. We got vouchers for teasty breakfast in nearly cafeteria.

He was great host, I really like the home and room. He helped me when I need and I want. The room was clean and tidy. flat was comfortable and silent. Hope I can go there again. Thank you so much again Mario.

We enjoy staying in Mario apartment. The apartment is a little hostel - 5 double rooms and two bathrooms. It is clean and it has a good location. Mario is very friendly, very helpful, everything was explained very well with all the details of the apartment, also has a very funny and helpful map of Porto, with a great design. We got vouchers for breakfast and enjoy it in a Café in St Caterina street ,near the apartment. Thanks Mario

If you plan to visit Oporto, Mario's apartment it's a great choice. It is well located, close to the center- shopping area. Mario is a fantastic host who facilitate us a map of the area with good recommendations on restaurants and places to visit. He was kind enough to let us rent his parking place (with a very cheap price and close to the apartment). The rooms were wide and decorated with good taste. Also the beds were big and comfortable. The terrace is really nice, we felt like home.

Mario's crib is awesome! He's the best host you can ever imagine. The rooms are well-designed, equipped with Porto's map and hairdryer. My trip to Porto with my friends are memorable, thanks to Mario.

The house is very well located, right by the subway and one of the best streets to walk around (Rua de santa Catarina) there's a ton of shops around, and a supermarket just across the street.

The whole apartment is very clean and comfortable and the bedroom I stayed in (Nº1) was very spacious.
There are two bathrooms (one with shower) wich makes it fairly easy to use even when the house is full.

There was also a heater in the bedroom which was really helpful as the nights were very cold.
The only downside of the room is that we can hear everything that happens on the stairwell but since there wasn't any movement after hours so it was not a big deal.

Because I was out most of the time I ended up not using the patio but it's just as in the pictures and it must be great to spend some time.

Mario also provided an amazing map with tons of points of interest, from where to eat to what to visit and it's drawn in way that makes it really easy to read and not get lost.

Also, the chek-in is really pratical as you can do it at any time without bothering anyone with time constraints.

For the low value and the added breakfast, which is great, I definitely recommend it and will be back!

Francisco
Great host, great location, pretty house, just everything was nice. I could feel Mario tried to make things better for his guests. Highly recommended!

Mario's apartment feels like it's in the center of everything. Within a few minutes of walking there are lots of shops, cafés, restaurants and sights. We only had a brief stay at his place, but felt very welcome and would come back any time.

It being January Mario made sure there was an electric heater in the room that kept us warm at night. We stayed in a few other places during our Winter trip, and Mario's definitely was the warmest! :-)

The entire apartment was very clean, and having 2 bathrooms with shower was great. The room has blinds on the windows and doors so no light falls into the room when you're sleeping.

Everything is good.
Mario is kind and room is nice!
I want to stay more

Mario war sehr freundlich und kommunikativ und hat uns das Gefühl vermittelt, jederzeit erreichbar zu sein. Wir haben eine kleine selbst gestaltete Karte von Porto bekommen, die uns ein paar interessante Tipps geben konnte.
Ideal location and ideal hosts! Excellent option when visiting Porto alone or with a group. Very clean and comfortable.

Mario's flat is cozy, convenient, and clean, just what I was looking for. Location is great, the majority of tourist spots are within walking distance. The flat was nice and quiet and I was able to feel at home. Mario came to help when I (thought I) couldn't get in, and also gave me loads of information on where/what to see! Very helpful, and can tell that he takes hospitality very seriously! 
Make sure to take advantage of the cafe at the nearby breakfast as well. All in all, this place is a great value for money, and I hope to come back again!

I didn't have the pleasure to meet Mario but everything was as expected! really nice and comfort room, literally in the heart of Oporto.
Everything worked easily and well. 
I will definitely book again If I'll come back to Oporto and I suggest to everyone this host. Professional, great communication and always available.  
Thanks again
Serena
It was super easy to find the flat.

Mario was a very friendly, helpful person.
He also demostrated  flexibility and understanding when I had to change my reservation.
Mario is a super helpful host with very good taste. He is on it when it comes to recommendations. I like his style! I will stay with him again.

We arrived late at night but that was no problem at all, because of an electronic door locker. We came from the airport by metro and it's very easy to find! no changes (30min) and very close to the metro exit. It is a very nice flat with 5 rooms and kitchen and two bathrooms and terrace and and and ;)
as breakfast you'll get a voucher for a nearby cafe wich is also very nice! coffee, tea, lemonade... it not very much (sorry but you have to know I could always eat ;) ) but you are no longer hungry and can start your walking trip around Porto right after finishing your food.

As we checked out I talked like 10 minutes with Mario on the phone and he even gave us some tips for our route to Lisboa and he was very kind!

Sadly we stayed just one night and if there is any chance we visit Porto again, it would be in his Apartment! :)

Amazing location!! In The heart of Porto! Nice Flat, very confortable. Mario was very kind and available for any requests.
I defenitely suggest it!

It was, how we expected it. Mario and his wife welcomed us really friendly. They´re helpful and anxious. It was great to get a coupon for breakfast in a Pasteleria next to the flat. The modern flat is equipped with all the staff you need for a nice stay in Porto. Most of all the fast wlan is amazing. Good job Mario. The location is perfect, you are close to all important places in the centre. Thanks for it. Anytime!

O anfitrião foi simpático e atencioso. O local foi facil de encontrar e chegar ao quarto também. Poderia melhorar facultando informações sobre transporte até ao local, pois por ignorar a facilidade de apanhar o metro directo acabei por usar um taxi e foi muito caro. Em termos de espaço é bastante agradável. A informação durante a estadia pode ser melhorada, como os locais a visitar, restaurantes e outras informações turisticas, podem ser uma boa aposta.

Mario was there to greet us into his lovely apartment, which has a really great location, being only a few minutes from many attractions, shops, restaurants etc. The room and bathroom were both great, there is loads of space for everyone and an amazing terrace! What was super impressive is that Mario actually went through the trouble to print maps and create an actual Mobile App with key attractions/places to eat and how to get to them from his apartment! Amazing!

Really nice experience at Mario's, a nice room in a design furnished apartment transformed in B&B. All the comodities were at a 2 minutes walk and we managed to enoy fully our short stay in Porto. Will definetely contact Mario again for our next trip to Porto.

Très bel appertement au coeur de Porto! L'accès est facile à partir du metro et des bus. Très confo et pratique.
Mario fut très gentil et accessible au besion. Dejeuner inclus pour 2€ ☺
L'appart est calme, lorsque les voitures passent la nuit, nous les entendons bien, mais c'est la vie en ville !!!
Je recommande fortement.
I stayed in this AirBnB for one night and I totally recommend the place!  Its cleaned and space full!  Mario is answering very fast to any questions!

Though I didnt have chance to meet Mario, everything was still perfect! Perfect location, cozy and comfortable room, all did make my journey so remarkable. Thanks Mario, if I come to Porto again next time, I will definitely live in your place again!
Great contact to the landlord, clean room and house in the middle of the Porto city centre!

Nous avons passé un super séjour à Porto.
Mario est un hôte très prévenant et arrangeant.
L'accueil fut très sympathique et l'appartement super confortable.
Merci beaucoup Mario !

Long story short: The Flat was just as promised. Central and really well equipped! Beside the fact, that Mario was one of the best Hosts we had on our two week trip around Portugal, Porto is a City one should as least visit for three days or even more. Dont miss Marios private Map and the App he actually developed just to give you the best possible experience for your journey! We will be back soon!

Mario fue muy amable, preocupándose a nuestra llegada, explicándonos cómo llegar a la casa y todos los detalles el primer día y aconsejándonos que nos bajáramos su aplicación sobre Oporto que ha desarrollado con una serie de visitas guiadas a la ciudad. El alojamiento cómodo y moderno, estilo backpackers, perfecto para pasar un fin de semana. También ofreció su plaza de parking ya que viajábamos con coche aunque al final no nos hizo falta.
pas vu d'hote .... heureusement l'hotel sortie du métro bolhao a été acceuillant à 1 h du matin !!

Mario's place was great for our short stay in Porto since it is located in the city centre. He gave us all the information we needed and answered our questions very quickly, even though he doesn't live in the apartment himself. The whole apartment (5 guest rooms, 2 bathrooms, big living room, kitchen & terrace) and our room were clean and had everything we needed. Mario made us feel welcome and gave us a good introduction to the apartment & the city - he even has his own app for exploring the city easily! We can definitely recommend staying at his apartment.

Jeżeli kiedykolwiek wrócimy do Porto napewno zatrzymamy się u Mario! Pokój był bardzo ładny i czysty, bardzo duży plus za grzejnik w pokoju, który nas uratował przed zimnem. Mario jest naprawdę sympatycznym gościem, pozwolił Nam zostawić Nasze bagaże do wieczora, gdyż mieliśmy późno lot. Lokalizacja super, bardzo blisko do centrum. Pozdrawiamy Cie Mario i jeszcze raz dziękujemy! Zapraszamy do Polski :)
Un gran hospedaje. Limpio, cómodo y agradable.

Mario a donné de bonnes explications pour se rendre à son adresse. Dommage nous ne l'avons pas vu. L'appartement ressemble exactement à ce qui est décrit.
Merci Mario pour ces prestations très agréables.

I already knew Porto from other visits, but I had never stayed near  Bolhao Market and the Bolhao Metro Station in the city centre. So I felt quite happy when I discovered Mario's Place and assured my stay there for 4 nights. The apartment consists of 5 guest rooms, a living room with a small, but useful library, a large table and a TV set, a well-equipped kitchen, 2 bathrooms and a small backyard veranda where you can sit and drink and chat outside. The rooms are spacey and furnished efficiently and with good taste. 
Included in my arrangement was also a voucher for breakfast in a nearby café, a very nice coffeeshop indeed, with very friendly staff and great croissants and pastries. I loved it.
I enjoyed my stay at Mario's Place, but I have one restriction:  My only complaint is due to the fact that rooms 1 & 2 are facing the main street, a noisy street where hundreds of busses pass and also lots of trucks. Due to a respiratory problem, I need to sleep with open windows, and as I had drawn room no. 1,  this meant that I had busses and trucks almost inside my room all night.  I contacted Mario and tried to change to another room, but since this wasn't possible, I had to cope with the street noise.
It might be a good idea to inform people beforehand that rooms 1 & 2 should only be booked by people who have lesser problems with street noise.
Apart from this complaint, I really enjoyed my stay. If I drew one of rooms 3 to 5 next time, I would consider returning for another try.
Thank you, Mario!

While we never met Mario, his place is incredible and highly recommended to stay at. My girlfriend and I were in town for a night to see the football match at the Estadio do Dragoa and felt right at home. It's right next to the Bolhao metro station, a stones throw from the downtown, and not terribly far from the river. The bathroom was nice with everything laid out for us, and the room was perfect. Also, the complementary breakfast nearby is a must. Highly recommend staying here!

Everything was absolutly fine. The flat is very Nice and the Location is great. Mario is very helpful and kind. We liked his new app. There is a small breakfast included in a Nice Café nearby, which offers good coffee and good lemonade.
Had a really nice stay in Porto. Good location, clean and beautiful room, ...

Appartement très  bien  situé, très  joli.
Mario est charmant et a bien travaillé  pour  nous  faire  bien  profité  de Porto
Excelente estadía en un lugar inmejorable, en una ubicación excepcional, atendido por un verdadero apasionado por Oporto y por el mundo: Mario!

Bonne situation géographique. Malgré la non rencontre avec notre hote,  Mario nous a facilité l intégration dans le logement avec des précisions.  
Chambre 1 un peu bruyante du à la rue. 
Petit déjeuner pris à 5 min du logement et accueil sympathique.

The place was really nice, well situated, clean and warmful. There are a lot of rooms and a large living room to share meal with other guests. If I knew this place before I would stay longer to enjoy the ambiance. Mario does his best to make guests comfortable and is really helpful. He answers fastly and the place is easily accessible. My next stay in Porto will be at this place for sure!

Super Lage in der direkten Nähe von der Stadt und der Bahn. Frühstück umsonst mit Kaffee, Saft und Brötchen. Gepflegte Anlage. Mario beantwortet schnell alle Fragen und es gibt einen kleinen "Reiseführer" mit Stadtplan von ihm :) vielen Dank!!
Informations d'accès à la chambre précises.

Mario ist ein toller und sehr hilfsbereiter Host. Er hat sich rührend um uns gekümmert und uns untersützt, da wir Probleme hatten mit unserem verloren gegangen Gepäck.
Die Wohnung sieht genau so aus wie auf den Bildern, ist sehr sauber und sehr gemütlich. Leider konnten wir nur eine Nacht bleiben, da alle weiteren Tage ausgebucht waren.
Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder.
Danke Mario!

Really clean apartment, well designed and just nice to live in. Best part was how quickly Mario responded to any questions we had, and his free app which gives you a nice explanation of all the monuments and buildings you go by, and a route you can take to see almost all the important things in Porto. Overall would definitely recommend. Great experience!

L'appartement est situé à proximité du Métro et du centre ville. Le logement comprend plusieurs chambres. Nous étions dans une des deux chambres qui donnaient sur la rue. Entre la chaleur et le bruit de circulation de la rue, il était très difficile de dormir. Dommage.

We had a very nice stay at Mario's place. The common area is very nice, and both room and bathrooms were super clean. And the apartment it's a walking distance of the bars and restaurants area. We totally recommend ;)

Séjour agréable dans l'appartement de Mario. C'est un appartement bien équipé et agréable situé à deux pas de l'hyper-centre de Porto. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Mario mais il est resté disponible et à l'écoute lorsque nous avions des questions et lors de notre entrée.

Pasamos cuatro días muy agradables en Oporto. El apartamento de Mario está en pleno centro histórico de la ciudad y muy cerca del metro, por lo que la localización es inmejorable. Es luminoso y con todas las comodidades. Además Mario ha desarrollado una aplicación móvil en la que te recomienda rutas, los lugares que no puedes dejar de visitar y lo que a mi parecer más le puede interesar a los viajeros, los lugares donde comer y no pecar de turista. Muy recomendable.

Tolle Wohnung, in der man sich wohlfühlen kann! Wunderschön, wie auf den Bildern und sehr sauber. Von den Mitbewohnern haben wir kaum etwas mitbekommen. Wir haben das Zimmer Nr. 1 bewohnt, das zur Straße liegt, die leider auch nachts ziemlich laut war, mit geschlossenen Fenstern war die Lautstärke aber aushaltbar. Die Terrasse ist ein Traum - ruhig, sonnig, einfach schön! Alles war zu Fuß gut erreichen - Supermärkte, Restaurants, Stadtzentrum. Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen!

Mario is a great host. if you are looking for a real b&b experience this is not the place. it's more a hotel than a b&b, because there are five rooms and the host doesn't sleep at the place. but the instructions to the room was very clear and the total experience was great. the room, the sheets, the towels, the bathroom could be a little bit cleaner. the common rooms were clean and nice.

Its a central location in Porto, close to one of the main shopping streets, most of the inner city is accessible from here. The street it's on is busy during the day, but ok at night. It isn't the most charming accommodation in Porto, but it's more or less worth its price.
Very good place
It was a pleasure to stay at Marion's BnB, he provide us everything to make our accommodation perfect!

Mario was really fast in answering our questions and it was really good for us that the door can opened by code so check-in is everytime possible. He organized a taxi to airport for us at 4am and was really kind at all. Room Number 1 was perfect, clean and the two bathrooms were totally enough for the different people in the flat. The flat is really central, maybe a little loud but yeah - it is a flat in the middle of the city thats normal. The App of Mario is perfect to discover the city and we had a really good time there. Thanks a lot Mario, hope we can come to porto soon!!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

God og hurtig kommunikation fra værtens side. Værelset var fint, rent og pænt. Boligen lå godt - tæt på centrum og 2 minutters gang  fra "hovedstrøget" og Metro. Hele forløbet  gik nemt og smertefrit. Eneste ulempe var larmen fra morgentrafikken på den gade som værelset lå lige ud til. Det kunne dog fikses med ørepropper :)

La ubicación es perfecta y Mario tiene todo preparado para que recorras Oporto sin perderte los mejores sitios para visitar, comer y salir, usando el mapa que el mismo y su mujer han hecho o bien bajándote la app que tienen. La habitación está bien pero la limpieza del baño se puede mejorar.
El apartamento de Mario esta en sitio inmejorable, muy centrico, la decoración es impresionante. Estubimos muy agusto y nos encantó el barrio!!
L'appartement se situe juste près de la station de métro. Très facile pour tout.
Mario is a great host! The apartment is stylish and clean.
We really enjoyed stay at Mario's place.  I can recommend to everyone!

We came by car and had no problems parking despite not being able to get on the Main Street next to the apartment. Spoke with Mario just on the phone he seemed like a great person, provided a lot of detail with regards surrounding area with an app he's created! Made it clear he was available for anything we needed. Only downside was we didn't realise it was a room among four other airbnb rooms, sharing at the same time, so more like a hostel feel. But value for money, can't complain.
really comfortable room! communicative host! everything was good.

Optima localização, metro do Bolhão a 50m
Casa bem equipada e limpa
Anfitrião super prestavel e atencioso.
Optima parceria com a Nata Lisboa para os pequenos Almoços
Recomenda-se !
Ok
El lugar está muy bien, recomendado

Nice place, great communication with the host and well placed in the city.
I can absolutely recommend the accommodation for everyone.
Clean, big enough and well decorated.
Cool place
Mario is friendly and gives us many suggestions about Porto
Clean

La habitación era tal y como habíamos visto en las fotos, limpio, cómodo y no hacía nada de frío, había gel de baño, secador, toallas, comida en La Cocina  y muchos mapas para conocer la ciudad, la terraza el muy bohemia y perfecta para un buen desayuno, está muy cerca del centro y en un barrio bastante pintoresco! Recomendado sin lugar a duda

Optima localização e condições... recomendo vivamente.
Obrigada Mario por todo o apoio durante a viagem.
Ate breve
Eine sehr zentral gelegene, sehr schöne Wohnung. Vorallem die Terrasse war sehr entspannt. Hatten eine schöne Woche in Porto. Sehr netter Gastgeber.
Mario ist klasse! Er ist immer zu erreichen und hilft sofort. Das Zimmer, allgemein die Wohnung, ist schön eingerichtet und super sauber. Wir würden immer wieder in Marios Wohnung übernachten!
Apreciamos a estadia, obrigado :)
Muy cómoda llegada, buena ubicación, cómodo, limpio y prolijo el apartamento. Nos hubiera gustado quedarnos más

Appartement très bien situé (à deux pas du marché Bolhao) ; très facile d'accès à partir de l'aéroport. Environs bruyants (certaines pièces sont situées le long d'une rue avec pas mal de trafic) et les sanitaires pourraient être rafraichis et plus propres. Appartement pratique et avec un bon rapport qualité prix pour des séjours de courte durée. Mario est très facilement joignable, merci !

Local muito bem localizado no centro de Porto. O espaço é organizado. Ótimo acesso à transporte públicos como o metrô do Bolhão. Mario foi acessível e preocupa com a nossa estadia. Recomendo e quando voltar para Porto será uma opção.
Gostamos da hospedagem, foi top
Mario is a Great host ! You can depend on him ! In Every detail - perfect host !

Nuestra estadía fue estupenda, Mario estuvo en permanente contacto y nos facilitó información para poder movernos por la ciudad sin ningún problema. 
 El apartamento es tal cual lo descripto, impecable. Gracias Mario!
Great position and very nice flat!

Mario was a fantastic host. The room was clean and cozy! The communication with him was straightforward and smooth. He provided us with a lot of great recommendations what to do in Porto. He even has a map and a mobile app for to do-s in Porto!

Espaço muito central, mesmo ao lado da rua mais movimentada. O Mario foi um anfitrião muito disponível, providenciando-nos várias dicas, restaurantes e lugares interessantes para visitar no Porto. Será um local a ficar de novo.

O local é uma especie de hostel, com alguns poucos quartos duplos e banheiro/cozinha/varanda compartilhados. Infelizmente só ficamos 1 noite no apartamento do Mario. 
A chegada foi muito tranquila, ele não estava presente mas passou um código para abrir a porta. O prédio é muito bem localizado.
Somente dois pontos eu acho que poderiam ser melhorados: o chuveiro estava estragado, então tínhamos que segurar a ducha para tomar banho. E a cama do quarto número 2 deixava um pouco a desejar, ficamos com dor nas costas o dia inteiro :( 
Mas o ambiente é bem bacana, wifi bom e o anfitrião disponibiliza um app com dicas da cidade, muito legal!
No fim das contas, recomendamos!
非常好的位置

Mario was very open and welcoming before and during our stay in Porto. It was the first time we booked a room only and do not regret it at all. The appartment was cleaned daily and had enough room and accomodations to feel at ease. It was also a pleasure to meet the other guests, who were from all over the globe.
Bel appartement avec lits confortables. Le seul petit hic est que les murs sont très fins et que l'on entend très bien ce qu'il se passe dans les chambres à côté.
Les chambres de Mario offrent tout ce qu'il faut pour passer une bonne nuit à Porto. Et la terrasse intérieure est très mignonne
Apartament był czysty i zgodny z opisem, warunki mieszkalne były dobre. Gospodarz odpowiadał bardzo szybko na wszystkie pytania. Śniadania w knajpce dobre, ale nieduże. Polecam!

Ich war mit meinem Freund bei Mario zu Gast und wir haben dort eine Nacht verbracht. Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral und man kann viele Sehenswürdigkeiten von dort erreichen. Das Kaffee, wo das Frühstück serviert werden sollte war leider nicht aufzufinden.
Las puertas del piso y del portal hacen mucho ruido. Se escucha absolutamente todo, entrar y salir a la gente. El piso estaba limpio y bien situado.
Good location, nice and simple roomy with all the explanations necessary !

Très bonne adresse. 
Jolie déco . Chouette terrasse . 
A réserver sans hésitation

Clean and nice room, quite appartement when we where there. Its situated very close to shopping and a walming distance to all, but also very close to Bolhao Metro. We had bikes and it was great to roll down the hills! A bit worse to get up ;)
All in all very good, and priceworthy!
Ótima localização e a casa é bem aconchegante. Recomendamos!
Great location, clean, lovely atmosphere

Great segue into a short stay in Porto.  Super location and Mario's App for Porto is a bonus.  The apartment offers five rooms and two bathrooms with access to a common kitchen and beautiful terrasse, so it is much like a hostel.  We never met Mario so you need to be able to manuever your way through your arrival and departure if necessary.  Room No. 1 offers a comfy bed and bedding, but it requires ear plugs too.
Logement agréable et bien situé, mais presque plus proche de l'hôtel que du airbnb.
Voin suositella, hyvä sijainti, wc-pesutilat siistit ja ajanmukaiset.  Hyvin varusteltu keittiö ja viihtuisä ulkoterassi.

항상 호텔만 이용했기에 처음엔 큰 기대를 하지 않았지만 기대 이상으로 저렴한 가격에 깨끗하고 필요한 것들이 갖추어져 있어서 이틀 동안 잘 지낼 수 있었다. 
그런데 삼푸 린스는 준비해야 할듯^^
Wir waren eine Nacht bei Mario und es war super. Tolle Lage, einfacher Check-In, bei Fragen schnelle, hilfreiche Antworten und die Wohnung war auch schön.

Un hôtel avec code à l'entrée en guise d'accueil.  Ce n'est pas une chambre chez l'habitant. 
Les photos collent avec la réalité.  Beaucoup de charme côté deco et un parquet splendide.
Es un sitio muy recomendable
Everything you need is at Mario’s... but don’t forget your shampoo and soap!  Ah...there’s a mall a block away - you’re fine. ;)

Very nice apartment. Mario has been very polite and caring for our arrival, we could text him anytime.
The room is a bit cold for the tough winter but there are some small heaters to use :)
Good location, very clean apartment and I recommend Mario’s app: very useful for your visit to Porto :)

El piso es fiel a las fotos. Estaba todo muy limpio y no hemos pasado nada de frío. La ubicación es perfecta ya que está muy cerca de todo. Mario ha estado accesible y atento en todo momento y el mapa que nos dió para conocer los mejores sitios de la ciudad nos encantó. Una pena no habernos podido descargar la app! Ha sido una estancia muy agradable, lo recomendamos 100%!!
Outstanding location
위치가 좋았고 빠른 답변과 편의를 봐주었던 좋은 호스트와 숙소였다~!
Todo esta en perfecto estado y ha sido una gran experiencia! Mario se esfuerza por que sus huéspedes lo pasen mas que bien, es un excelente anfitrión! totalmente recomendado.

Good price/quality choice if you want to live close to everything and have a chance to see Porto in 2-3 days!
Apartment is as described, Mario is a perfect host - quick communications, very responsive and nice (he even has his own city guide app with best places to see and visit, which was super useful for us!).
Highly recommended!
The flat is well located and beautifully designed, modern and clean. I highly recommend it !
Excelentes condições e localização
Mario’s place was super nice and really chic! I can’t wait to visit Porto again! I’d totally stay there again
Very nice room, and very easy to communicate with Mario!

Mario’s place is comfortable, spacious, good located and cozy. If you don’t exactly know what you wanna see, you can always use an App made by him, which includes sightseeing routes, main monuments, restaurants and bars. Towels are provided, wifi works nice, you get own key to your room. At night room can be a little bit cold because of small heater and big space but depends on person and current season. Apartment is located close to city center and also near to metro and bus stops. Kitchen with all staff and washing machine, nice bathroom. Communication with Mario is very good and he will answer your questions fast. I recommend this place for staying and enjoying Porto and recommend Mario as a host.
A good place to stay:)

Our stay at Mario's appartment was fine. Alhough we didn't meet him, there was no problem with communication. The flat is nice, little bit cold, but there is a heating in the room which is totally sufficient and the bed is very comfortable :). Also, the location is very good. Thank you Mario :)
Excelente decoração, localização e hospitalidade. Aconselho!

We hebben een enorm leuk verblijf gehad in Porto! Mario's Downtown Appartement was erg leuk en voldeed aan onze verwachtingen. Dit appartement ligt centraal en daardoor ideaal om de stad te verkennen. Ook fijn met de andere gasten die er verbleven. Ook al was Mario er niet, toch kregen we telkens binnen de 5 minuten antwoordt op onze mails. De Mario-app is een leuk extraatje. Zeker een aanrader om te verblijven bij een bezoek aan Porto!
Really nice modern flat! Central located and clean! :) We enjoyed our trip!
Right in the centre and everything close by!

Siamo stati una notte a dormire in una camera di Mario e ci siamo trovati molto bene. Mario è stato molto disponibile nel darci tutte le informazioni necessarie per arrivare al suo appartamento e poi ci ha fornito una mappa e la sua app per visitare la città. La Camera era pulita e ordinata ma purtroppo alcune cose erano rotte. Nel complesso però abbiamo riposato bene e la camera era molto calda. I due bagni erano ordinati anche se non troppo puliti al nostro rientro alla sera, probabilmente per colpa degli altri inquilini. Alcune ore prima del check out hanno iniziato a fare le pulizie, svegliandoci. 
Nonostante queste piccole pecche consiglio la casa di Mario, sia per l'ottima posizione che per la disponibilità dell'host.

Mario was a really nice and communicative host. We never saw him but whenever I contacted him he replied very promptly and was very helpful. The place was nice but it was very cold in the apt. There was a heater though, which helped. Unfortunately the bathrooms didn’t seem too hygienic. Not the worst but could def. be cleaner.The breakfast Mario suggested was a good option!
Очень уютная и стильная квартира в самом центре города. Спасибо Марио за гостеприимство и полезное приложение для знакомства с Порту!

Logement design et très sympa, petite terrasse, spacieux.. bien placé pour visiter Porto à pieds. Mario à une application très bien fait avec de bonnes adresses locales ! Le lit est confortable mais les draps tachés et les lieux communs sales. L'appartement reste tout de même sympa à vivre
Mario's llace
Everything is perfect! The host gave us all the information we needed even at night. The location is the best and recommended stay!
Zona inmejorable, bien conectada con el metro y las calles principales de la ciudad, el piso muy cómodo y limpio, Mario muy amable y atento a todo!

Mario's place is very comfortable and clean. There are five rooms he rents out with two bathrooms that each have a sink, toilet and shower, and a small bathroom with toilet on the terrace. When I stayed, four rooms were occupied and it was comfortable. Plenty of hot water for showering and everyone respected the quiet rule. The sitting area has a couch along with a kitchen table for 6 or so. It was a bit rainy and chilly, but the apartment was comfortable as there are heaters. Great location for walking g around. Definetly would stay again.
A great place, thank you for everything !
Very clean and incredible location! Had a wonderful stay in Mario’s place, and I cannot wait to plan another trip to Porto!

Even we didn't get to meet mario, his place is very nice and well managed. Location is unbeatable - walking distance to metro and near to a lot of nice restaurants / supermarkets. The room is clean, warm and nice bed! Definitely highly recommend this place!

Honestly we choose to rent a room instead of the entire place to interact with people, but everyone was just locked in his room. 
Our room was clean, but poor installed. No wardrobe or support for clothes if you are planning long stay. Also out window had an access to the main street with all it's sounds. 
I would pay more attention on the carpet cleaning in the bath or change them for plastic ones, easirer to wash. 
By location the place is good and Mario was very fast responding our messages.
I had a great Stay! Very nice flat and Mario was a very Good and helpful host. Thank you :)
The place is really big and gorgeous !very beautiful ,nice location. BTW,the host has a very  lovely map made by himself ,it's extremely useful for guiding the city.
nice!

Die Unterkunft von Mario war genauso wie im Internet beschrieben wurde. 
Das preis Leistungsverhältnis ist super! Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

Alles hat super geklappt. Wir hatten Zimmer No.1 und waren zufrieden mit der Ausstattung.
Wenn man ruhige Nächte gewohnt ist, könnte die Laute Straße direkt neben dem Haus stören aber wir haben sehr bequem und sauber geschlafen. Wir würden für einen kurzen Stadttrip in Porto wiederkommen. 

Mario hat eine super App zum Erkunden und antworte immer schnell auf Nachrichten.

Great location, can't be closer to the city center. Mario is very kind and tries to accomodate to your needs (flexible check-in if possible). He responds to messages instantly. His sightseeing app is genius and made our stay much easier! I totally recommend this place!

El lugar estaba excelente, muy bien ubicado y equipado, lo recomiendo ampliamente. Adicional, Mario tiene una guía genial para conocer Oporto con recomendaciones donde comer que nos ayudó mucho. Definitivamente nos volveríamos a quedar aquí.

Care for the details, really cool
If you can meet Mario he will give you the nice recommendation to visit too!!
Alles bestens. Simple eingerichtet, etwas laut, da an der Straße gelegen. Mario antwortet immer sehr schnell und kompetent.
Todo perfecto. Ubicación muy buena y alojamiento tal y como está publicado. Mario siempre contestó al momento, todo muy bien.
Bellissima casa, pulita e centrale. La colazione non è inclusa nella tariffa ma il menù del bar sotto casa in accordo con Mario è un’ottima soluzione!

Mario's place is really nicely decorated, in a good location, and just as advertised. I didn't see any other renters while there, it was super quiet. Mario provided really helpful information to find the place and find parking. Thanks!!
Very pleasant stay, very clean and a great location.

Espaço confortável para um bom descanso, ainda que a acústica entre quartos não seja a melhor. Em algumas divisões da casa sentia-se um cheiro a mofo e na casa de banho um cheiro a fossas um pouco intenso. Acho que podia ser um pouco melhor também o chuveiro da casa de banho.
Great place for solo traveler. Mario was v communicative and loved his app, was v helpful!

Mario responded in one minute and gave us detailed instructions on how to get to the apartment from the airport (very easily accessible). Location is awesome, in the centre. The keylock and access to the apartment is automatic so you just get the code and can enter the apartment. The place is beautiful, really well designed, with an even more beautiful terrace. We really enjoyed the stay and highly recommend it to everyone.
Está al lado de la zona más comercial de oporto, y a 10 min andando centro,

Very nice place! High ceilings, lots of light, modern atmosphere with lots of nice details, super clean. We had everything we needed and more! There are toys for and books, its really good when travelling with kids! Our stay was lovely. Thank you :)

Mario’ nun yeri bir iki gün kalmak için gayet iş görebilecek bir yer. Müthiş bir temizlik yok onu söylemek isterim. Yani bal dök yala değil. Yani ne çok iyi ne çok kötü, özellikle banyo kısmı. Nevresimler belki temizdi ama artık yeni nevresimlerin alınma vakti gelmişti. Hepsi lekeliydi, ayrıca bizimle aynı evde kalan misafirler de aynı şeyi söylediler. Yastık kılıfları, nevresimler, havluların hepsinde lekeler var. Evin 2 odası ( no1 ve no 2 ) cadde tarafında. Benim gibi uykusu hassas olanların mutlaka yanlarında balmumu tarzı kulak tıkaçlarını getirmelerini tavsiye ederim. Ev sahibini hiç görmedim, ama bu çok da önemli değil. Şaşırtıcı olan güzel bir şey vardı o da; eve çok yakın ( 2 dakika yürüyüş mesafesinde ) bir kahvaltı mekanında ücretsiz kahvaltı alabiliyor olmanız. Örneğin ben laktoz ve gluten içerikli yiyemediğim için salamlı çırpılmış omlet  sipariş edebildim. Süper de lezzetliydi. Yanında taze sıkılmış portak suyu da ikramdı ( normalde ücretli ), bir de espresso aldım. Hiçbir ücret ödemedim. Erkek arkadaşım ful kahvaltı yedi, ekmeği tereyağı salam, marmelat vs. Sadece portakal suyu yerine limonata aldı (ücretsiz ). Özetle kahvaltı opsiyonlu bir yer olması ve bunun ücretsiz olması çok güzel. Evin konumu merkezi bir yerde, hemen yakınında bir alışveriş merkezi ve çevrede alışveriş sokakları var. Restoranlar da oldukça (Website hidden by Airbnb) arabayla gelmemize rağmen heryeri yürüyerek gezdik. 
Çok pimpirikliyseniz yanınıza evden bir yastık kılıfı getirebilirsiniz :)

I was only there for one night, but except for some street noise in room 1, which was easily resolved in me changing into a vacant single bed room, it was a fairly pleasant stay. By the way for those who travel by car: There is free all day street parking on R. Moreira corner R. Alegria, otherwise it's paid in car parks or 4h max on the street (but free between 19:00-9:00). Enjoy Porto!
Clean, cozy and convenient stay in the heart of Porto!
Nice place to stay. Everything good!
Mario's place was great, We spent only one night, but the location was perfect and we had everything we needed in the house. I can highly recommend:)
Perfect location.

This place is so charming, we were so sad to only be staying one night. Amazing location, beautiful apartment, all other guests we bumped into were very nice. There is more than one bathroom which is fantastic, as well as a washing machine and full kitchen. I highly recommend this spot, it is a gem!
הדירה מאובזרת היטב, נקייה ומעוצבת מהמם. המיקום מדהים, והאווירה טובה. היה כיף להיפגש עם עוד אנשים בפטיו המגניב שיש בדירה.. וגם הייתה פרטיות אם היינו צריכות אותה
Amazing spot! The app is fantastic Mario really knows Porto!!! Would absoluely stay here again!

Seulement des points positifs sur notre séjour chez Mario!! Emplacement, propreté, tranquillité #1. Mario nous a fournis des explications claires avant notre arrivée pour faciliter notre check-in. Son app pour Iphone est super pour découvrir la ville. Sérieusement un des meilleurs airbnb que j’ai vue :) à bientôt je l’espère Porto.

El piso de Mario es un lugar agradable, muy bien decorado. Situado en la zona comercial. Todo es facil, la comunicacion con el propietario, la llegada al aeropuerto.... de nuestra habitacion decir que la cama no era muy comoda y entraba luz y ruido a la habitacion. No nos ha importado, ya que solo pase una noche, pero quizas hubiera sido un problema para nosotros para mas dias
Mario’s place was located in the center of popular shopping area, with a wonderful food market across the street. Easy, quick responses from Mario and clean.
Tip top! Immer wieder!
The room is perfect if you want to walk through porto! It's really central with a supermarket right around the corner. Also a Metro Station is within 3 min to walk

très bon emplacement
un peu bruyant
Mario absent
très propre
terrasse très agréable
parfait pour des gens de passage
ligne de métro directe aéroport
dommage de ne pas avoir rencontré Mario
je recommande pour la propreté et la situation

the location was great!
very fast responding :)

This place is very central. You can hear the traffic a bit, but after 11 p.m. there isn't that much traffic anymore, so it didn't really bother us. We had our own room which was very nice. I also really liked the balcony. Furthermore, everything was clean. As there are 5 more rooms you may not get into the bathrooms whenever you want to, but we never waited longer than 10 minutes.
Moreover, the apartment is very near two shopping centres and the Balhao Metro station which takes you practically everywhere in Porto!
In total, we had really good days in this flat and a very pleasant stay in Porto!
Um ótimo apartamento, com ambientes muito amplos e confortáveis. E principalmente uma ótima localização. Super recomendo.
The apartment is comfortable and the location is very nice.
Great experience :)!
Mario is an amazing host. Everything is made to make your trip easier and relaxing. Really reactive and helpful! Perfect place to stay :)
Una estancia increíble a dos pasos del centro de Porto, brutal!
El departamento de Mario es muy lindo, está muy limpio y muy bien ubicado. El único aspecto negativo es que hacía un poco de frío en los espacios comunes y baño.
Agreable séjour encore une fois à Porto Downtown  Airbnb pratique et facile d’accès !

Le logement est très bien situé. Il s’agit d’un logement séparé en plusieurs chambres avec des espaces communs dont la superbe terrasse et une très Belle décoration. l’hôte parle anglais ce qui est très pratique pour les informations données. Rien à redire. Très bon rapport qualité prix.

Espaço incrível. Muito bem decorado, simples, moderno. Bem localizado e com estacionamento bastante perto. O processo de check in é bastante simples e prático. Sem nada de negativo a apontar. As respostas foram rápidas por parte do Mário. Recomendo.
Mario's system is absolutely fantastic. Easy and convenient. We loved it!

Mario gentilissimo, ha risposto immediatamente a tutte le nostre domande, l appartamento in una posizione ottima. Molto carine tutte le indicazioni all interno della struttura, si vede che Mario ci tiene molto, anche la stanza carina e pulita. Unici appunti: il bagno era un po' sporco, forse dovuto alla sporcizia degli altri inquilini, e la colazione dove siamo andati non era male ma sicuramente non ne vale la pena perché ti portano pane, formaggio, marmellate e due bevande, niente di tipico o di dolce.
Przestronne mieszkanie, ładnie urządzone, świetna lokalizacja, gorąco polecam :)
Great location, elegant and comfotable room. the breakfast was in a bar near the house, we asked him which one but he never answered (but visualized the message). Mario is kind.
If you visit Porto, this house will be a good choice. The subway station and the Dom Luis Bridge are close and easy to move. And it was good that Mario was kind. The house also clean.
Breakfast not available
la casa es como en las fotos. Tuvimos libertad tanto para la hora de llegada como para la de salida.

가격대비 괜찮은듯요 ㅎㅎ워낙 싸서 ㅋㅋ
체크인이 쉽고 위치가 괜찮았어요 
끄런뒈 너뮤너뮤너뮤너뮤 츄워써용 끄뤠서 껕옷입꼬 자써용 ㅠㅠ
끌꾸 쫌 침때 쌍때가 쬼 뿔청껼했어욥 예민하지 않은 분들은 깬춘할것같음 ㅎㅎ
Super location and very pretty place to stay! Mario always helped through my stay!
Everything was perfect. I would stay here again

Great location close to many restaurants and shopping. There are stairs necessary to reach the apartment, which can be difficult to navigate if you struggle with luggage, however the room is worth it! I appreciate the extra blanket due to the colder weather as well! Also, Mario has developed a wonderful phone app to help you navigate around the sights in Porto and I recommend it! :)

Boa localização e aspecto actualizado.
Limpeza das instalações sanitárias podia ser mais cuidada.
De resto tudo funcionou.

Mario's place is in a perfect location, and the flat has 5 separate bedrooms.  The room was spacious, and the bed and linens were very comfortable.  Clean bathrooms, a nice kitchen, and a comfortable common area.  I wasn't able to meet Mario, but he was very helpful and provided me with a local map.  Would absolutely stay there again if I'm in Porto.
Excelente local. Próximo aos principais pontos da cidade. Espaço extremamente limpo.
少し匂いがするのと水回りの清潔感に欠けていましたが､連絡を迅速にとってくれ､部屋も柔軟に対応していただき､変更までしてくれました｡

name: Cosy flat in the center of İstanbul
summary: My flat is located in the centre of İstanbul, Beşiktaş. The neighbourhood has a number of cafes, bar, restaurants and shops to offer but at the same time the flat is situated at the first floor of a building in a very quiet and safe street.
description: My flat is located in the centre of İstanbul, Beşiktaş. The neighbourhood has a number of cafes, bar, restaurants and shops to offer but at the same time the flat is situated at the first floor of a building in a very quiet and safe street. Beşiktaş is a student-friendly neighbourhood which makes it very alive and it's also very famous with delicious Turkish breakfast places. You can go everywhere easily.  The famous Taksim square is within 10 min with buses or dolmuş (the yellow shared minibuses). You can walk to the seaside in 5 minutes and get to boat stops to take a Bosphorus tour or simply go to the Asian side. The beautiful Abbasaga Park is within 2 minutes of walking distance from my flat.
neighborhood_overview: Beşiktaş is a student-friendly neighbourhood which makes it very alive and it's also very famous with delicious Turkish breakfast places.
transit: You can go everywhere easily.  The famous Taksim square is within 10 min with buses or dolmuş (the yellow shared minibuses). You can walk to the seaside in 5 minutes and get to boat stops to take a Bosphorus tour or simply go to the Asian side. The beautiful Abbasaga Park is within 2 minutes of walking distance from my flat.
house_rules: Please take off your shoes and be nice and gentle to my flat : )

host.host_about: I'm 28 years old woman. I am working as actress in film and theatre.

reviews.comments: un mot de bienvenue nous a permis de nous sentir comme chez nous. L'appartement se situe aux abords d'un quartier tres anime. Situe au rez de chausee, il est tres calme et agreable.

Спасибо большое Есми за уютную квартиру в центре Стамбула. На 100% соответствовала описанию. Спальня и кухня-гостинная очень просторны, поэтому мы с сыном прекрасно тусовались там и не мешали друг другу. Я так думаю, что и для четырех человек квартира вполне бы подошла. На кухне все есть, дом обжитой и уютный. Рядом множество магазинчиков и чудесных кафешек, есть рыбный рынок. Это не туристическая зона, поэтому все дешевле, чем в историческом центре. Рекомендую, короче:)

We had a great time in Esme's flat. The flat is exactly as in the photos, in a very lively area. We were very comfortable in the flat, it is quite and has a good kitchen for preparing your own food. Esme's boyfriend greeted us despite our quite late arrival. Thank you for everything.

Appartement très chouette. Propre et bien aménagé. Esmé et son ami sont des personnes adorables et disponibles pour informer.
Nous avons découvert ce quartier d'Istanbul très animé, où les touristes ne sont pas majoritaires et les locaux bien présents!

name: Grd 3 chambres lumineux à 90m métro
summary: Très lumineux, agréable, tranquille, notre appartement de 115 m2 à 90 mètres du métro (station orange Beaubien) saura vous charmer avec ses 3 chambres (lit king, lit simple -> transformable en king selon vos besoins, lit bébé) ainsi qu'une terrasse ensoleillée de plus de 20m2. Commerces proches. Marché Jean Talon à 10 min à pied.
space: Brique, grande superficie, climatisation, 2 puits de lumière et beaucoup de fenêtres (double vitrage), matériels pour bébé, internet, grande terrasse avec jeux pour enfants, stationnement dans la rue gratuit, ... Nous sommes situés au 1 étage d'une maison typique de Montréal. 3 chambres pouvant accueillir 4 personnes et un bébé/enfant. Pas d'animaux acceptés. Accès à pied au marché Jean talon (moins de 10min). 90 mètres du métro de la ligne orange station beaubien. Restaurants, supermarchés, pharmacies, SAQ à quelques pas. Tout se fait à pied en moins de 5 minutes.
description: Très lumineux, agréable, tranquille, notre appartement de 115 m2 à 90 mètres du métro (station orange Beaubien) saura vous charmer avec ses 3 chambres (lit king, lit simple -> transformable en king selon vos besoins, lit bébé) ainsi qu'une terrasse ensoleillée de plus de 20m2. neighborhood_overview: Accès à pied au marché Jean talon (moins de 10 min). Supermarché Iga, jean coutu, pharmacie, uniprix, SAQ, restaurants, le tout à 300 m du logement maximum. Quartier familial.  Parcs avec des jeux pour enfants tout proche, ainsi que des jeux d'eau ou piscine gratuite (parc père Marquette / parc Jarry).
notes: Vu que nous vivons dans un appartement, il est important pour nous de respecter nos voisins, nous demandons de même aux personnes qui viennent chez nous (par exemple, enlever les chaussures dans l'appartement).  Merci Les photos seront mises à jour prochainement avec la troisième chambre (lit bébé).
transit: 90 m du métro ligne orange (station Beaubien).  90 m du bus 30 et du bus 160 et bus de nuit aussi qui amène au centre ville.
access: Logement entier. (Seulement quelques placards seront marqués "privé"). Utilisation possible de tout l'équipement de cuisine (four, machine à café, mixeur, ...), du matériel pour bébé (chaise haute, table à langer, merci de demander ce que vous avez besoin pour vos enfants, notre fille a 4 ans mais nous avons du matériel pour les plus petits aussi que nous pouvons sortir...), livres touristiques de Montréal, ...  les draps, serviettes de bain, papier toilettes, essuis tout, liquide vaisselle, éponge, pastille vaisselle pour le lave vaisselle, sac poubelle, ... Pas d'animaux. Pas de fêtes.
interaction: Nous vous laissons une fiche avec les informations indispensables pour le logement et pour les activités du quartier. De plus, selon nos disponibilités, nous pourrons vous accueillir et vous conseiller selon vos besoins.
house_rules: Pas le droit de fumer dans le logement. Pas le droit d'amener des animaux. Pas de fête ou de réception

host.host_about:
Bonjour, 

Nous sommes Alexandre et Bénédicte. Nous sommes deux bretons arrivés au Québec en 2010. 
Nous aimons voyager, la photo, ... 
Nous utilisons AirBnb durant nos déplacements et nous adorons le principe. 
Nous travaillons tous les deux dans l'informatique.

Pas de devise comme nous suggère Airbnb... mais trois mots : Live, Love, Laught que vous retrouvez plusieurs fois dans notre appartement que vous adorerez.

-----
I'm Alexandre from France (St-Malo) and live in Montreal with Benedicte and our daughter since 2010 now.
My hobbies when I'm visiting a place are walking by the streets, museum, and feel the atmosphere of the city.

I'm known as a friendly guy with a very good relationship.
Benedicte and me are working in IT.

reviews.comments:
We loved staying in Alexandre's place, she made us feel very welcome so much so that we instantly prolonged our stay by a couple of nights.

The apartment is bright, modern, very clean and well equipped. We are travelling with an 11month old and this was also her favourite stop!

Location is great, on the doorstep of a metro station and the famous  Jean Talon market.

I would not hesitate in recommending if you are visiting Montreal.
Very true to pictures... Incredibly convenient location... Pretty good price for being rented during the world cup.

Nous avons adoré notre séjour chez Alexandre et Bénédicte. Nous nous sommes vraiment sentis comme à la maison.  Bénédicte était là à notre arrivée et nous a tout indiqué. L appartement est spacieux, agréable, propre et très bien situé dans la ville. Alexandre et Bénédicte sont des hôtes très disponibles avec qui il est très facile d échanger. Merci à vous,  sans oublier la petite Clémence, adorable.

We were profusely welcomed upon our arrival at Alexandre's beautiful flat. It is precisely as depicted in the picture and extravagantly comfortable. Of particular note is the outdoor space at the back which is shade dappled and lovely in what could be perceived as a back alley but, courtesy of some plantings and an overhanging tree, is transformed into an idyllic outdoor deck. As mentioned, indoors is equally calm and comfortable. The neighbourhood is an up and coming part of the city with lots of restaurants, a grocery store and shops nearby. Also easily accessible to the downtown of Montreal, especially once the metro is up and running again.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour au coeur d'un quartier typique de Montréal. l'appartement est très spacieux et très bien équipé, à proximité des transports, cerise sur le gâteau: la terrasse à l'arrière pour de bons moments de détente en fin de journée après avoir parcourue la ville. À proximité: la rue St-Hubert vaut le coup d'œil.

Première expérience d'Airbnb très positive. Les échanges avec Bénédicte très cordiaux. L'appartement super ! d'abord super propre, moderne, avec tout le nécessaire pour cuisiner, truc sympa c'est qu'ils mettent à disposition les produits pour lave-linge et lave-vaisselle. Nous avons pu nous garer facilement et gratuitement dans la rue, le métro se trouve vraiment tout proche, je recommande vraiment cet endroit.
Excellent accommodation - clean and very comfortable. The hosts were fantastic and welcoming.
We had an excellent time! They unfortunately were away the weekend we stayed, however they left a lovely note and instructions on what we should.  I would recommend anyone to stay with them.
Absolutely amazing. The apartment is exactly what my needs require. Everything you need just steps away in this hood.

Bel appartement très spacieux et très bien équipé, à proximité du métro avec une agréable terrasse à l'arrière. Même si nous n'avons pas rencontré les propriétaires, tout a été très bien organisé pour faciliter notre séjour (système de remise de clés très pratique, instructions claires dans l'appartement). Propriétaires très prévenants (contact régulier par e-mail). Nous le recommandons sans hésiter !

The 3 of us enjoyed our stay here. The apt looked exactly as pictured and was super convenient to the metro. The neighborhood was quiet and safe, and we were able to walk to cute cafes nearby for breakfast. Would recommend :)

We had a phenomenal time at Alexandre's place. Not only were the pictures accurate, the hosts went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable. The location was beyond perfect and the apartment was just amazing! I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again - this is probably my best Airbnb experience so far. Thank you Alexandre for hosting us in your beautiful home!

Merci à Bénédicte et Alexandre pour les réponses rapides aux sms que nous leur avons envoyés pour certaines questions que nous avions lors de notre séjour.
Merci à eux pour l'aménagement horaire également.
L'appartement est superbe et très bien aménagé et équipé.
Nous avons passé 2 jours supers.
Il est bien situé à seulement 100 m d'une station de métro qui mène au centre en 10'.
Parking possible proche.
Idéal pour visiter la ville soit via métro soit en voiture.
Merci pour ce séjour
Bien à vous
Hugo, Christine et Xavier

I can say  super host!!!! Excellent location!!! Very cozy and clean apartment!!!!! Alexandre and Benedicte are very very friendly couple. The apartment is very clean with an interest design and very convenient for travelers and visitors. And moreover, the terrace is one the best place to have a breakfast or a dinner. We've spent a wonderful month in Montreal!!!!!
Strongly recommend it.

Nous sommes une famille avec deux enfants, nous avons passé deux semaines dans ce magnifique appartement très propre et bien situé, juste en face du métro. Il est très bien équipé et aménagé, parfait pour une famille. Le quartier est calme et avec plusieurs parcs à côté.
Nous y avons passé un très bon séjour dans le confort total. Les propriétaires ont laissé un guide détaillé avec toutes les explications nécessaires. De plus ils étaient disponibles à tout moment pour répondre à nos questions. Nous y retournerions avec grand plaisir.

name: NEXT TO TAKSIM SQUARE LUX RESIDENCE
space: Koza Suites Apartments offers a garden and a terrace. Each apartment has a full kitcen, which you can prepare your own meals.  Accommodation will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a seating area. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All of the properties have cleaning products.  Free public parking is also possible on site.  You can benefit from ironing facilities and sweeper. There is also DVD player with a film archive on site.  Lively Taksim and Sultanahmet districts are both a 30-minute drive from the premises. name: Idealistic Inwood
summary: One bedroom, one bath, kitchen, TV with Netflix and Hulu available. Comfy and cute space in the heart of Inwood: Manhattan's best kept secret. Close to the A and 1 trains. Plenty of restaurants and coffee shops. 30 mins from Times Square.
space: This is perfect for musicians needing an easy overnight for auditions or a late night rehearsal.
description: One bedroom, one bath, kitchen, TV with Netflix and Hulu available. Comfy and cute space in the heart of Inwood: Manhattan's best kept secret. Close to the A and 1 trains. Plenty of restaurants and coffee shops. 30 mins from Times Square. This is perfect for musicians needing an easy overnight for auditions or a late night rehearsal. Help yourselves to anything in the apartment. You won't see me much more than the key exchange but I'm available via phone or email for questions and concerns. Close enough to the heart of Manhattan to enjoy the thrills of tourism but far enough to rest peacefully. One block from A express and 3 blocks from 1 local trains.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: I think the good experience of our staying started with the initial commutation with Alaina, she always responded to me quickly. We arrived a little bit late than we planned, and it was cold, she was not there, but her friend was waiting for us outside of the apartment building and gave us a warm greeting and drop off the keys. Alaina left us a sweet note with yummy homemade cookies and a bottle of wine, we felt more than welcome to stay in her apartment. The room is clean and neat, and the towels are soft with freshing smell. We had the entire apartment for all the time we stayed there, it was quiet and comfortable. The area is safe and the apartment is about 3 minutes walking distance to the subway station, it is easy to get to Manhattan, Brooklyn and Queens. It was a great experience staying in Alaina's apartment and she is such a wonderful host. It is our pleasure to be the first guest to write the review for her, and for sure we will stay with her next time when we are in New York. Thank you Alaina!
Alaina was a great host, very welcoming and easy to contact if anything was needed. Very nice home! I will definitely be staying again:)
This was a great place to stay!!

I enjoyed my stay at Alaina's apartment.   I didn't meet Alaina, but communication was not a problem, and she has an easy system to retrieve the keys.   The apartment was very clean, very reasonably priced, plenty of room (for NYC) and has a great shower.   I hope to stay there again.  It is a three floor walkup.

Alaina's place was great! It's up three flights of stairs, so be prepared for that. And the neighborhood can be a little noisy, but the apartment is on what appeared to be the quietest block around. Alaina takes great care of the place, and she was always responsive when I had questions. The coffeemaker was clutch too.

we spend best vacation in Alaina's apartment! so sweet interior! clean and cosily. lovely high bed ) I hope someday we will come back! thank you so much Alaina! 
from Russia with love.
Apartment was clean, orderly and very neat.  Bedroom was basic but comfortable. Alaina was a very conscientious and considerate host.  Overall a very good value.

A very lovely space in a beautiful apartment building! Great location, minutes away from the subway and a short walk to Dyckman Street where there are a lot of bars and restaurants. The space was clean, comfortable and very welcoming as seen in the photos. Alaina was not available over the weekend but was very easy to contact and very efficient in her responses. Would certainly recommend!
Place was clean, as she advertised. Very good and flexible on key delivery, which accomodated my arrival during a non standard hour.

Really enjoyed my stay at Alaina's home during my short visit to New York. Clean, cosy and very airy apartment in a typical prewar building. Clean bedding and pair of towels were provided. I would recommend this apt to anybody looking to experience an uptown Manhattan living.
Very welcoming apartment exactly as seen in photos. Picking up the key was easy and convenient. Great location.  Would definitely recommend.

The appartment was very easy to reach.  Subway trains are just 5min walk from the appartment . There are many grocery stores in just 2min walk. You can reach NYC with in 30min!! The host(Alaina)  was very helpful. There was a good flexibility regarding check-in and checkout timings . The appartment has got all the facilities. Though appartment was small,it's is very good for 2 people. I would surely recommend others about this appartment.
The host make us feel very welcome. The apartment is great, clean and close to the subway. The staying there was really great
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very cute and nicely arranged appartment. We loved our stay. Warm home for New York's cold winter. Close to the metro station, take A and you'll be downtown in no time. Host was very helpfull and friendly. Worked great for picking up key as well. I warmly recommend this lovely home.

name: Prime W. Village location 1 bdrm
summary: A lovely clean, 1 bedroom in a prime location in the West Village with excellent access to the A/C/E and B/D/F/M subway lines (1block) to Go anywhere in the city.  1 block from Washington Square park with an endless supply excellent restaurants and sites nearby.
space: It's a 1 bedroom in a walk up building in the heart of west village and is truly the living in New York experience!
description: A lovely clean, 1 bedroom in a prime location in the West Village with excellent access to the A/C/E and B/D/F/M subway lines (1block) to Go anywhere in the city.  1 block from Washington Square park with an endless supply excellent restaurants and sites nearby. It's a 1 bedroom in a walk up building in the heart of west village and is truly the living in New York experience! Fresh linens / towels provided. Happy to answer any questions up to your stay! Just ask!  I will likely meet you to hand over keys and when you arrive and you're all set. I love being close to Washington square park when you need a walk and some people watching, I love that it's easy to get to from the subway...tons of bars and restaurants and shopping within a 5 -10 min walk. Best spot in the city to get truly anywhere from.  Apartment is Seconds from the west 4th subway stop with A/C/E and B/D/F/M lines to go everywhere. There is wifi but no working cable TV.  You're not in NYC to watch TV!

reviews.comments:
Genevieve was very kind and very flexible with our schedule which makes things much easier! It was easy to communicate with her.
The apartment is well located and many restaurants around!

Genevieve was very easy to communicate with and answered any questions we had. The apartment is in a great, safe location. Very simple but had everything we needed. It is on the 4th floor. But what's 4 flights of stairs when you walk everywhere?!? Thanks!
