reviews.comments: I had a great time staying at Tomoko's! She is wonderful and gave me a warm welcome. Great communication. The place is really neat and the location is THE BEST you could find in Honolulu, close to everything in Waikiki. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!! :-)
Tomoko was very accomodating and allowed me to have flexible checkout times that were convenient for my flight times. Thank you!

Tomoko is a really friendly, welcoming host who was kind enough to accept my last-minute reservations when my plans with another Airbnb listing fell through.  Even though she is extremely busy, she is lightning fast in responding to messages.  The apartment itself is centrally located, with Waikiki shops just a short walk away and a bus stop right around the corner.

I loved staying at Tomoko's House.  The room was great with fresh sheets and towels.  The place was clean and I got to meet interesting women from around the world.  The location was amazing!  In the middle of Waikiki I was 4 blocks from the beach.  It was also close to 2 ABC stores, 24 hour Denny's and Ihop and groceries.  We got to go salsa dancing which was a blast!  Also, the bus is easy to catch from there, and there is a ton of shopping nearby.  Tomoko was a great host!

Tomoko was very welcoming and patiente ! thanks a lot for that. The place was a share room. I was with a Japanese girl who was nice :) 
It's a small place but confortable. Tomoko knows how to feel you good.
前泊のﾎﾃﾙまでお迎えに来ていただいたりかなり親切でした｡

"FEMALE shared room" is what caught my eye for this post! Also, the location was perfect. If you want to stay within walking distance of the beach, contact Miss Tomoko! She will take great care of you :) Super friendly and welcoming too!
Great! Perfect location. Great deal for wakiki!
Very friendly and convenient! Parking a bit difficult at times, but well worth the price!
very convenienced place,nice price,near everywhere,clean,safe,female only. very good experience!

The location of the flat is extremely convenient, with 5 mins' walk to Waikiki beach and Kalakala avenue. I got a separate room which is very sweet. and all the other tenants are so friendly. Three of us shared a bathroom but there was no problem sharing it. Tomoko was very accommodating, always replying my message speedily. I've a couple of itinerary changes before arrival and she was very patient to deal with my questions. She also provided two big towels for me to use which is very sweet. Though the overall cleanness can be improved, this was a great stay within my budget and I will choose to stay in Tomoko's apartment again if I go to Hawaii next time.

Tomoko is the best! She was really helpful and makes you feel at home! Roommates are all chill and laid back! And everything is walking distance! It was amazing defiantly coming back and staying there again!

Location, location, location! This room is centrally located in Wakiki! Total walk-ability (if you don't plan on renting a car) and near buses/Ubers/taxis that can get you all over Honolulu.

The host Tomoko, was extremely kind and welcoming! 
This is a room share so I would recommend to travelers who only need a place to sleep and shower. However I will say that the cleanliness  left much to be desired. I did see quite a few roaches during my stay; which would be my only real complaint. 

If you just need a place to sleep and shower then you can't beat this deal in terms of location and price!

I've never me Tomoko in person. She's very rude, asking for more side cash before I even check in. I told her I might be bringing my daughter to sleep over, and she started asking for more money and very unprofessional. She did not let me check in but she charged me for the two nights plus cleaning deposit which I never used or never make it at her tiny place since she won't let me with my daughter. I filed a report to Airbnb and told them to review all her texted that she sent to me and they found that it was very rude , unprofessional , inhumanity message. Worst worst host ever! It's all about the money for her. Makes my stomach upset

Tomoko is a nice host. My flight was delayed for couple hours on arrival date and changed several times. Tomoko was patient and flexible to adjust check-in time for me. The best of this place is the location, in central of Waikiki area and nearby many bus stations. The space is clean but no air condition. It is good option if you want to find a place with reasonable price to stay in Waikiki.

The place was simple but equipped with everything one may need (even with a surf board!). I stayed 11 daya and had a really good time and place's location (in the middle of waikiki) helped this a lot.. I can not say anything negative about the place. I got what I was promised.
very convenient location, close to shopping, restaurant, beaches and bus stops. Tomoko is very nice and always smiles  and you will love her two year old (Website hidden by Airbnb) cute...

I stayed in Hawaii for 3 weeks with Tomoko as my host, and it was the ideal experience for me. She greeted me with a hug upon arrival, gave me a key, explained a few rules about using your own toilet paper and dusting sand off outside, and that was it. I had 1-3 roomies (all of them from different countries like Japan, China, Taiwan, and Brazil) at any given time as people shipped in and out, and this is one way I made friends during my stay. :) Everyone was respectful and friendly, always saying "hello" if not having a full-out chat session.
For a highly reasonable price per day, I had a sectioned-off, semi-private space with a bed, a window, shelving, bath and beach towels, a small closet space (which was more than I needed), access to a kitchen with a stove and refrigerator, a bathroom with a shower, washers and dryers downstairs (costs $1.25 in quarters), and even snorkel gear left behind by previous guests. I was a 10-minute stroll from the grocery store (Food Pantry), a less-than-10-minute stroll from Waikiki Beach, and a 15-minute jog from Ala Moana Beach Park. 
Altogether, it was a wonderful, chill "temporary home life." If you don't mind sharing a small apartment, if you are open to intercultural experiences, and if you abhor spending so much money on hotels and want to stay in Hawaii longer, this is for you. ;) Aloha!

Really enjoyed the stay at Tomoko's place!  Tomoko is a very friendly host, whom you can reach out for if you have any questions.  She has all the basic stuff needed for your stay which can be much appreciated especially with this cost.  Great access to main part of Waikiki so you can walk to just about anywhere.  And I enjoyed the conversation with other girls in the house too:)  Next time, I'd definitely come to Tomoko's place for a longer vacation.  
ﾜｲｷｷに住んでいるかのように過ごせる場所です｡日本語で対応してくれるので､日本の方も安心してｽﾃｲできると思います｡
check-in check-out很方便 我临时提前了入住时间 跟tomoko讲明原因后她热情地接待了我 简单介绍过后她就离开了 地点不错 离海滩商业区都近 方便

Tomoko was pleasant and the space seemed as pictured. I was looking for a place at a reasonably cheap price *honestly* also reasonably clean/ethically exterminated. I did rent for a reasonable inexpensive price, with Tomoko, which helped keep travel cost low in Waikiki, while travelling solo. So here is honesty, while I was there for 2 weeks; I experienced a considerable amount of roaches, bathroom mold, and poor air circulation and barely bearable heat. Also, I was falsely accused of smoking "weed". Because of the poor air circulation and uncomfortable night sweats for the first four days of my vacation, I became extremely sick for 3-days of my trip. I stayed in for a day to get better with cold meds and Gay Hulu, when that's when she started text harassing me with the weed accusation. She apologized, which was gratifying, but it was still a pointless frustration, as I was super sick and in no way in the mood to feel the harassment and insecurity of my stay in that dump *seriously, I hate to say that about a roof over my head, but really there were curtains up, as space/bed dividers*. Don't get me wrong, I think Tomoko is a great person. I just feel that there could be better management. Like, maybe, a) having cleaners come in once a week to clean the apartments; since there is such high traffic with people moving in and out. b) Labelling and dating food/throwing out/composing old food *there was smell* c) deep cleaning the bathrooms/curtains once a month d) and PLEASE have some form of air circulation; a FAN... was so helpful once received.
Finally, I will say, my first week I met some of the most fantastic ladies who would will be my friends forever and I would have never had that experience if I had not rented space with Tomoko.  Maholo! Aloha!
Place was exactly as described. Close to everything in wakiki. Other roommates were super nice. Tomoko was very nice. Mahalo

I had a great stay in Waikiki with Tomoko. The location is near shops and beach. The bed was comfy, I had my own space and best of all there was great wifi. I was travelling by myself and felt safe. Tomoko is also very good to communicate before and during your stay and I had no problems at arrival and/or check out.

ﾜｲｷｷ中心部やﾊﾞｽ停なども近くとても便利でした｡
お部屋もきちんと仕切りがあり､ある程度ﾌﾟﾗｲﾍﾞｰﾄな空間があるので過ごしやすかったです｡
ともこさんとは鍵の引き渡しのときのみお会いしましたが､とても気さくな方で話しやすかったです^^

Tomoko was very welcoming into her place. She was very sweet and kind. Honestly, there's nothing that could have been improved. She even let me keep my suitcase at her place until my flight at 11pm so I wouldn't have to lug it around Hawaii.
awesome place!!

This place is rather old, as Tomoko rents many apartments (10?) for her business. The price is good, if you don't mind the luxury and hot sweaty rooms. Tomoko has a tendency to make you book the rooms, even though she rents so many apartments with so many beds
Nice location ;) 위치는 정말 짱 좋습니당
初めての2日は別のともこさんのお部屋で4日はこちらに宿泊させて頂きました｡ｼｪｱﾒｲﾄも皆とｰても暖かくて良い方で安心しました!色々とご丁寧にありがとうございました!!!

ｺｽﾊﾟ高いです｡便利です｡ﾊﾜｲの昔からあるｺﾝﾄﾞでのｼｧｱﾊｳｽ体験､楽しかったです｡英語での他の方のｺﾒﾝﾄに清潔さについての指摘があり､そのことも踏まえて入室しましたが､ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑの衛生状態に指摘のような問題がまだありましたので清潔好きな方は要注意です｡ﾍﾞｯﾄﾙｰﾑの衛生状態は極めて良かったです｡私の滞在時(月曜日)には薄い壁隔てた隣のﾘﾋﾞﾝｸﾞで深夜から3時まで5人で酒盛りが行われており､耳栓してましたが嬌声に寝られず､深夜過ぎてるので声を落としてくれ､と注意しました｡悪い人ではなくお酒が入ってただけなのでその後声を落とすように努力はして下さいましたが狭い空間の中なので､5人で酒盛りとなると他のｹﾞｽﾄには影響があるので､今後ｽﾃｲを考えておられる方はそこもちょっと参考ください｡英語話者で楽しいお酒ではあったようです｡
Not fancy, but you can't beat the price in this neighborhood.
ともこさんはﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰでとても気さくな方でした｡部屋も相部屋でしたが気になりませんでした｡ｼｪｱﾊｳｽなので夜にﾀﾞｲﾆﾝｸﾞで楽しむ人もいるので､寝たい人は耳栓必要です｡清潔感は女子にはきになる人もいるかもしれませんが､なによりも立地の良さとｺｽﾊﾟから､断然星5つです!
ﾎｽﾄは､日本語もできﾁｪｯｸｲﾝも融通してくれ明るいのでいいです｡ﾜｲｷｷより徒歩数分の立地で非常に便利です｡ｼｪｱするのは若者ばかりですが､それぞれがﾏｲﾍﾟｰｽ?で生活しています｡男同士や一人旅には向いています｡
OK place. Price was a little high for quality of place. Nice host.
Great place.
Very convenient in Waikiki. Definitely recommend.
この時期はいいですが､暑い時にはｴｱｺﾝが欲しいですよね｡
Fantastic value in an amazing location! Just a few minutes to the beaches and main streets of Waikiki. Easy check in, Tomoko is super sweet and helpful! Thanks for a great stay.

Its a great place to stay, clean, nice, friendly, and responds very quick. 
Totally recommend.
pretty small place, but adequate to the price. right in the center of town, accessible to downtown Waikiki. it’s very cozy and everything was clean when i arrived!
An excellent place to stay, close to everything you need and a very friendly environment.
Great location, excellent host will stay there again.

Just as posted, small room in central location. Clean, quiet, and very conveniently located to Waikiki beach. No issues with self check-in, pretty straight forward. Very small room with individual bed but slept well. No complaints. Would stay again if on a budget.

Super cost performance!!! Even though the kitchen and bathroom are a shared space with others, was impressed with the hotel level cleanliness, especially the bathroom.  Location is also super convenient, close to the beach, restaurants, and shopping. It’s a good base to meet up with tours that start from nearby much more expensive hotels.

I didn’t understand until I got there, but “White” designates the room within the apartment. As stated in the ad, “White” is quite small, there’s a twin bed, a small space next it, a book shelf, a power outlet and a bar with hangers for clothes. The windows are not sound proof, they are light slats that can be open and closed. On Friday and Saturday night, could hear people coming back from the bars late at night, ear plugs recommended for light sleepers. I stayed in January, so the temperature at night is comfortable, summer months might get hot at night.

Overall 5 stars! Would stay again!
Is a small room but clean , I just sleep perfect and is amazing close to everything .
Always awesome!

It’s exactly what you pay for! The location is amazing really recommend if your staying in Waikiki and are just looking for a place to crash for a night! The room is pretty small but totally fine for a night! The bathroom and kitchen were nice and tidy :)
Perfect

Tomoko's house was clean and well equipped in the communal areas. The room is small (as per the description) but light and airy. Although the louvres are nice during the day, it does allow light and noise from the street into the room at night. I slept well but others may not.
However, it is good value for money - very close to public transport and a short walk to Waikiki beach, restaurants and bars. I would stay here again

name: Ruelle Place au Soleil-Sunny Alley
summary: Magnifique maison au coeur de la Petite-Patrie. Chaleureuse et confortable pour toute la famille.  Beautiful house in the heart of Petite-Patrie. Warm and confortable for the entire family.
space: Our house is warm and centrally located. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, with access to full laundry facilities. We can welcome 6 to 8 people comfortably.
description: Our house is warm and centrally located. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, with access to full laundry facilities. We can welcome 6 to 8 people comfortably. Our guests have full access to the house and its amenities, full kitchen, etc. Our neighbourhood is trendy, with cafés and restaurants everywhere. The subway is a 8 min walk, a 15 min subway ride to downtown, and the Marché Jean Talon is a 20 min walk! 1 hour drive to the Laurentians... etc! Very centrally located. Métro Beaubien is less then 8 min walk.  There is a bus stop on the corner of our block.
neighborhood_overview: Our neighbourhood is trendy, with cafés and restaurants everywhere. The subway is a 8 min walk, a 15 min subway ride to downtown, and the Marché Jean Talon is a 20 min walk! 1 hour drive to the Laurentians... etc! Very centrally located.
transit: Métro Beaubien is less then 8 min walk.  There is a bus stop on the corner of our block.
access: Our guests have full access to the house and its amenities, full kitchen, etc.
house_rules: We are expecting our guests to leave the house in the state they found it. Smoking is not allowed inside but permitted on the front porch or in the backyard. We don't accept pets. Our house is almost 100 years old so the walls are not very soundproof! We don't hear the neighbours and we don't want them to hear you!

host.host_about: Dynamique, aime courir, manger, voir des films, lire et voyager!

reviews.comments:
Bonjour,
Nous avons passe 15 jours formidables à Montréal, et la maison de Pascale y est pour beaucoup!
En effet, la maison est parfaite pour y sejourner en famille. Elle est grande, tres confortable, avec beaucoup de charme, et très fonctionnelle. Elle est en plus idéalement placée dans le cœur de little italy, du métro, des commerces (Traditions, Jean Coutu, la rue St Hubert...) et petits restaurants sympathiques (Les empoteuses huuum). Pour rajouter a cela, Pascale a été une précieuse hôte avec ses explications, sa flexibilité et sa gentillesse. Tout ceci nous a permis de vivre l aventure de l intérieur, avec le sentiment d être de vrais québécois. 
En un seul mot : foncez!

Nous n'avons pas beaucoup hésité avant de contacter Pascale et Alex et n'avons pas été déçus, au contraire. La maison est propre, bien organisée et accueillante, très bien placée dans un quartier agréable et chaleureux. Avec nos enfants, nous avons réellement apprécié cet hébergement et nous promettons d'y retourner. D'après notre expérience, c'était une chance de goûter à la vie montréalaise depuis le quartier de la Petite Patrie. La ruelle où ils ont pu jouer en toute sécurité et laisser leurs dessins, le jardin et l'ambiance du quartier ont particulièrement marqué nos enfants qui ne voulaient pas quitter. L'hospitalité de Pascale et Alex, leur disponibilité et leur simplicité ont, qui plus est, rajouté à notre plaisir de loger chez eux. Il n'y a pas de questions à se poser pour les contacter. C'était super. Merci à toute la famille.

name: Fern Forest Getaway - entire house
summary: 2 store, 3000 sq.feet secluded house. - 4 bedrooms; - 3 bathrooms; -  4 living rooms, 2 of them with big screen TV and fireplace.  - additional couches and airbeds in living rooms for big groups. - two dining areas, one on a closed porch (lanai with gas grill) - full kitchen. - hot tub; - 3 acres fruite trees garden; - free parking, wi-fi, trip planning.
space: I am a former micrichip engineer who now share my love of the Paradise (Island of Hawaii) with other people. My wife and me operate a B&B inspacious house (3000 sq.feet) on a slope of volcano (8 miles to Volcano National Park), surrounded by jungles of Fern Forest.  In the forest, far from noise and light pollution to enjoy the stars. 20 Minutes to Jagger museum, 35 minutes to beaches. Easy access to Hilo and Pahoa. Ideal for big groups 8-15 people. Private bedrooms for smaller groups (breakfast included for groups in private bedrooms (up to 8 people), Four bedrooms/three bathrooms in your possession. Four living rooms to put more airbeds for groups up to 15 people. Big TVs/DVD/ Dish and fireplace on each floor. Shared areas are  full kitchen and two dining areas (6+6 people), one of them is covered lanai (porch) with grill.  Additional guests above 8 people (up to 15) are FREE of charge. Free Wi-Fi internet included. Free parking. Free trip planning by pro-guides to maximise your expe
description: 2 store, 3000 sq.feet secluded house. - 4 bedrooms; - 3 bathrooms; -  4 living rooms, 2 of them with big screen TV and fireplace.  - additional couches and airbeds in living rooms for big groups. - two dining areas, one on a closed porch (lanai with gas grill) - full kitchen. - hot tub; - 3 acres fruite trees garden; - free parking, wi-fi, trip planning. I am a former micrichip engineer who now share my love of the Paradise (Island of Hawaii) with other people. My wife and me operate a B&B inspacious house (3000 sq.feet) on a slope of volcano (8 miles to Volcano National Park), surrounded by jungles of Fern Forest.  In the forest, far from noise and light pollution to enjoy the stars. 20 Minutes to Jagger museum, 35 minutes to beaches. Easy access to Hilo and Pahoa. Ideal for big groups 8-15 people. Private bedrooms for smaller groups (breakfast included for groups in private bedrooms (up to 8 people), Four bedrooms/three bathrooms in your possession. Four living rooms to put more airb
neighborhood_overview: Very quite secluded subdivision, nobody will bother you at all.
notes: Huge house perfect for weddings, corporate meetings, family reunions. Guide tours around the island provided ($480 for group of 1-4 and $560 for 5-6). There is German Shepherd dog on premises that is not allowed to be in a house, (attention people with allergies!) House is sitting in the rain forest and sometimes it is rainng several days in a row - two dehumidifiers and fireplaces are in your possession to dry up the place.
transit: Airport transportation provided ($50), free if you renting our car (5-seats SUV, 7-seats minivan).
access: Full access to kitchen, dining, office, garden, jacuzzi, etc. First floor (two bedrooms) have wheel chair access. Kids below 4-years old staying free. Free high-speed Wi-Fi, TVs,> Fully stocked kitchen. Beach and shower towels, shampoo, soap. Laundry room. Big patios with hot tub. Full size gas grill.. 3 additional couches and up to 5 airbeds
interaction: We don't bother our guests, but we are available by phone, text or e-mail. Can be onsite on a moments notice. Owners still may staying on premises, not in a house. As a professional guides, will be happy, per request, provide discount tours, rental cars, arrange your wedding or reunion.
house_rules: We prefer intelligent no drama communicative people from all over the world.

reviews.comments:
The house was beautiful especially the spacious living room on the 2nd floor with the big windows. The location perfect for our itinerary. Some rooms though are a little musty and while I didn't personally experience it, a companion of mine said that she could smell the dog in once of the bathrooms?

Leon was very nice and helpful. We truly appreciate how he walked us through the house to make sure we have all that we need and how he helped us finalize the sites that we would visit for the rest of our trip.

Leon was responsive and communicative prior to the reservation. However, he was out of town during our one night stay but his wife stayed up late to receive us as we had a late arrival, which was much appreciated. The home is situated in a secluded area, sort of like a forest. It's about a 5-10 mins drive from the main road and not much to eat after dark. I wish we knew as our family was hungry when we arrived and it was just too far to drive back out to search for food. So bring your own supplies as they have a fully functional kitchen from what I can see.

The home is quite large, but not the cleanest nor is it updated. The fourth 'bedroom' is an area blocked off by a screen. Sofas were made into beds in the living room which served as a bedroom and one of our occupants was looking for more privacy and wanted to sleep downstairs on a couch but said it was not very clean. 

Also, there are holes in the screens and mosquitoes were coming into the house. So you will need to bring bug spray. I saw AC in the listing, but there's no AC offered. And Leon's wife mentioned electricity is very expensive so we didn't bother searching for the AC.

The dog was friendly and stayed in the porch and guarded us throughout the night. When we woke up in the morning, we realize the view from the deck was quite nice. We didn't really do much other than shower and sleep since it was a short stay. Also, bathrooms weren't the nicest. Could use some cleaning.

A big house perfect for a large group that is comfortable sharing the space, and maybe some rooms. Our choir of 14 singers had a great time. Only 30 minutes to Hilo and 15 minutes to see the Volcano, this was perfect for us. 

Leon was very easy to talk to, he was friendly and accommodating. He allowed us to check in earlier upon request. The description and photos are very accurate. 

Our group wanted to be together and since we were on a limited budget this really helped us out. We prepared food and shared breakfast easily in the large living space and lanai. 

Recommend, especially if you are looking for a simple lodging solution in a quiet location and don't intend to spend a lot of money on hotels.
N/a

Leon is a very nice person and a local guide. gave a lot of tips to go around. His place is close to Hilo, so if you plan to drive from Kona, its 2 hrs. Kitchen has all ameneties and some groceries we can be used freely. Only improvement is overall cleanliness. Its average.
Loved the location in the jungle and their doggies were so sweet:)

name: Cozy Apartment Sleeps Up to 4
summary: This apartment is a cozy 2 bedroom - the main bedroom has a full bed, the L shaped couch in the living room pulls out to a full bed. Located just near the Hopewell Center, MTR station, bus lines outside, and near the bars and nightlife of Wan Chai!
space: This listing is a newly refurbished 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The living room has a large TV with cable as well as WiFi and a large pull-out couch that sleeps 2 people.
description: This apartment is a cozy 2 bedroom - the main bedroom has a full bed, the L shaped couch in the living room pulls out to a full bed. Located just near the Hopewell Center, MTR station, bus lines outside, and near the bars and nightlife of Wan Chai! This listing is a newly refurbished 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Hong Kong Island. The living room has a large TV with cable as well as WiFi and a large pull-out couch that sleeps 2 people. 5 minute walk to Wan Chai bar area, close to Star Street shopping and Restaurants, 5 minutes walk to Wan Chai MTR station and trams, buses to Central, Wan Chai and Stanley are just downstairs. Under 5 minute walk to Wan Chai MTR Station and the Tram Line
neighborhood_overview: 5 minute walk to Wan Chai bar area, close to Star Street shopping and Restaurants, 5 minutes walk to Wan Chai MTR station and trams, buses to Central, Wan Chai and Stanley are just downstairs.
transit: Under 5 minute walk to Wan Chai MTR Station and the Tram Line
house_rules: Smoke outside or on the roof top please!

host.host_about: New York Architect living in Hong Kong, born in Florida, raised in Kentucky.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Great location on Queen's Road East, right by the intersection with Ship St.  It's a 3rd story walk-up flat in a typical Wan Chai apartment building, but everything inside is modern (especially the bathroom).

It's a VERY short talk to the Wan Chai MTR, and a pretty short walk to Three Pacific Place (and the vast Pacific Place Mall), while also walking distance to the trendy new coffee shops, restaurants, and gastropubs of upper Wan Chai.

We are a family of 4 and stayed in the apartment for 2 weeks. Sean's apartment is conveniently located in Wanchai. It's walking distance from both Wanchai MTR station, Admiralty MTR station and 2 trams stops too. Good restaurants are everywhere around the apartment. Was happy to find extremely good local restaurants along Spring Garden Lane (only 5mins walk). The apartment was spotless and the dryer came in really useful in HK's humid weather. Although we didn't get to meet Sean, he was always responsive when we had any problems. Would love to stay with Sean again when we next return to HK.
Great Place! Sean was wonderful, really enjoyed my stay.

Sean is a great host. He made sure the check in was smooth and on time and helped us with anything we needed over during our stay. The place is beautiful and is very clean and well maintained. We had everything we needed. Loved our stay!
Thanks Sean for being such a wonderful host!

괜찮았다.
대체적으로 깔끔했고 따뜻한물도 잘 나왔고
위치또한 한 두블럭 가면 트램과 버스 지하철이 있어 이동도 어렵지 않았다.
단지 4인 가족이 있기에는 조금 작다고 해야할까~
하지만 즐거운 홍콩여행이었다^^~
总的来说不错
MTR은 걸어서 약 5분 거리이고 바로 앞에 버스 정류장이 있으며 택시는 언제든지 가능했어요. 숙소는 깨끗한 편이였고 성인 4명이서 지내기에도 충분했어요. 따뜻한 물이 계속 나오지는 않았지만 잘쓰면 샤워하기엔 충분했고 호스트와 연락도 잘되는 편이였습니다.

The internet stopped working on the first night we arrived, and the host was too busy to sort it out- for our whole five day stay! He expected us to wait in all afternoon for the engineer, and made no attempt to sort it out himself. Every time I contacted him about it, he told me how busy he was in meetings with important people, and wasn't at all concerned about the problems it was causing us not to be able to keep in touch with our workplaces. This place is probably fine if nothing goes wrong, but don't expect the host to be bothered if something goes wrong.

name: Cozy 1 bdrm Park Slope, Brooklyn,
summary: Spacious one bedroom apartment with own bathroom, kitchen and living area in Park Slope, Brooklyn. Entire apartment is available and located on the third floor of private house up two flights of steps. Close to Prospect Park and within close walking distance to the subway. 15-20 minute train ride  into Manhattan. 7th avenue is a a lively street with nice restaurants, bars and shopping. It is a safe family-oriented neighborhood. No smoking. LGBTQ friendly. Preferably, no more than two people.
space: This is the private third floor of a 3-storey townhouse that was built in the 1860's. You will have your own bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and living area. There is cable tv, Netflix and Hulu as well as WiFi.  We have recently improved security by adding an exterior camera to monitor the front entrance to the house especially when no one is at home.  We are just 2 blocks from Prospect Park and the Historic brownstone district. There are many bike paths throughout the neighborhood. It is easy to get around by walking, bike or public transport. In less than 15 minutes you are in Manhattan although there is a lot to do and see in Brooklyn. We live on the second floor and are available if you need anything. The F, G, R, N trains are within 4 blocks. On bus route (B67 & B69). Dedicated bike lanes.  There are two flights of stairs. Not suitable for small children.
description: Spacious one bedroom apartment with own bathroom, kitchen and living area in Park Slope, Brooklyn. Entire apartment is available and located on the third floor of private house up two flights of steps. Close to Prospect Park and within close walking distance to the subway. 15-20 minute train ride  into Manhattan. 7th avenue is a a lively street with nice restaurants, bars and shopping. It is a safe family-oriented neighborhood. No smoking. LGBTQ friendly. Preferably, no more than two people. This is the private third floor of a 3-storey townhouse that was built in the 1860's. You will have your own bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and living area. There is cable tv, Netflix and Hulu as well as WiFi.  We have recently improved security by adding an exterior camera to monitor the front entrance to the house especially when no one is at home.  We are just 2 blocks from Prospect Park and the Historic brownstone district. There are many bike paths throughout the neighborhood. It is easy to get ar
neighborhood_overview: Excellent parks, museums, theatre, walking, biking, friendly people, bars and restaurants.  We will leave detailed information on activities going on at BAM, Brooklyn museum etc. We are also about 15 mins from Manhattan and 30 mins from Queens
notes: LGBTQ friendly! We are not set up to accommodate small children.
transit: Excellent public transport with 4 subway lines and 4 bus lines within 4 blocks of the house.  From the airport you can take a cab (about $50) or take the subway for $7.50 per person
access: Amenities as listed (WiFi, cable, kitchen, living area, own bathroom & bedroom) There is a shared entrance to the property We don't wear shoes in the house. You're encouraged to bring slippers and we provide shoe covers on request. Absolutely no smoking.
interaction: Infrequently unless guests need something.
house_rules: No shoes in house. We recommend you bring indoor shoes/ slippers. We supply shoe covers. No smoking indoors.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Love to cook, hiking, walking, cycling and enjoying the great outdoors. I love travel and urban history.

reviews.comments: An absolutely wonderful apartment with friendly, helpful hosts. We felt instantly at home in this beautiful apartment (the pics don't do it justice) The kitchen and bathroom seem to have been recently renovated (shower is awesome)  and the entire apartment has a very clean and untouched feel. The bed was so comfortable I wish I could have taken it home. The neighbourhood is just that a neighbourhood. A pleasant break from the hustle and bustle of Manhattan, however there are lots of hip restaurants, cafes' and shops in very, very close walking distance.  The metro stations are close by as well or about $25 or so by cab to Manhattan (depending on where you are going) Janine and Anita are charming hosts. I would definitely come back and recommend to anyone.

Janine was a very welcoming and considerate host. She made sure we were completely comfortable, and the apartment was spotless. The location was very convenient to restaurants, shops, the park, and the subway. All in all a great place to stay.

Janine runs a very comfortable, extremely clean, well supplied apartment in the top floor of her three story house. She was helpful, always available when needed, but otherwise left us to ourselves. It is important to note that while the apartment is completely separate from the rest of the house and takes the entire floor, there is no interior door between the rooms and the stairway. The bed was extremely nice with beautiful sheets. The kitchen was completely functional, though we never used it. I would recommend staying there.

Lovely place, we completely felt at home.
The apartment is much better than it looks in the pictures. It features a nice decoration and furniture that makes you feel like you’re in your own place.
The kitchen was fully equipped, the bathroom was nice and clean but a bit small to be used for more than one person at a time, and the bedroom was very cool with great views of Manhattan. The apartment was always warm and we never felt cold (even with all the snow we had!) 
Janine is the perfect host. She helped us out with everything we may need at all times. She lent two bikes and provided with a bunch of useful tips about the neighborhood, transport, where to buy, what to do… Also she left food for us the first night when we arrived so late; she had a lot of special details with us.
Very convenient location with two subway stations nearby that allow you to go downtown in barely 30 minutes and other destinations really quick. The street is very quiet and the only noise you hear is some airplane noise when they occasionally fly too low above the city, but we didn’t find that disturbing.
Brooklyn is a very cool place to stay, it has a lot of places to visit and things to do, and this apartment is very convenient for visiting it on feet. 

We fully recommend this place to stay :D

The apartment was extremely nice.  The pictures do not do it justice!  The bedroom is spacious with a very comfortable bed and fantastic views of lower Manhattan from the windows.  The kitchen is well equipped, lovely modern bathroom with good shower and generally lots of storage space for suitcases and clothes throughout the apartment.  The essentials provided are far better than essentials - lovely towels and toiletries etc.  During our trip it was very cold but the apartment was always toasty warm! Whilst the apartment is described as the third floor of a house it is private with a lockable door - guests just share a common staircase (like any apartment building). 

The hosts were very welcoming, helpful and friendly.  I would definitely recommend this apartment to anybody wanting to visit NYC.

The neighborhood was great.  The main street, 7th Ave, is a vibrant area (without being overbearing) with lots of niche delis, stores, restaurants and bars.  We ate on 7th a number of times and weren't disappointed once.  The is also lots to do in the locale - Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park and a great Flea Market on Saturdays to name a few.

The subway is a 5-10min walk from the apartment and then a quick ride into Manhattan.

I had a lovely visit in the cozy 1 bedroom Park Slope, Brooklyn.  The apartment is nicely appointed & very close to my reason for the visit.
I will try to use it again, my next visit.

Janine was a great hostess & very helpful.  I am sorry I didn't have much time to visit.

We had a fantastic stay at Janine and Anita's place in Brooklyn. The apartment was even better than imagined from the description and photos and other reviews; we couldn't have been happier with the place. It was actually quite large and well appointed both with useful items and tasteful decoration. 

Both Janine and Anita were so welcoming and friendly; when we were late arriving Janine checked in to see if we were ok. My partner was getting over the flu at the time and had come from Switzerland to meet me; Anita brought soup and kleenex up for him the second night. Other than that, we barely saw them and felt like we had a private, magical safe haven in Brooklyn, all to ourselves.

A couple notes of interest: previous reviews have mentioned that the unit it open to the internal staircase. This has been changed and there is a new door that has been installed to ensure privacy. Also - the bed and sheets are fabulous. Very comfortable and we slept like babies. The shower is quite luxurious and has great water pressure. Everything is VERY clean, and the place was warm (which is saying a lot since it was in the teens at night in February). 

Location is excellent; 20 minutes to Manhattan, and plenty of great shops and restaurants and character in Brooklyn to keep you entertained for days. I especially recommend the Saturday Flea Market.

Definitely book this place; you won't be sorry.

The place is lovely and so well situated. Lots of room, full kitchen and immaculate. Janine is very organized with excellent communication. For those unfamiliar with the area, Park Slope is super safe and there are lots of shops and restaurants an easy walk. Thank you very much for a wonderful stay!

--> 
The apartment is very spacious, clean, nicely furnished, with charming old wooden floors, comfortable beds, and stocked with everything one could wish for.
Janine was a kind and friendly host, relaxed and helpful and very well organized. I very much appreciated that she reacted very quickly every time I contacted her.
We had a good time in the apartment and can recommand it to everybody.

This apartment has really everything you could ever ask for. Two very nice hosts, a warm, clean space in a great location in Brooklyn - including an awesome blackbuck head made from pearls in the livingroom. It all feels very personal and, yet, free and easy. A strong recommendation!

Janine's apartment is an absolutely amazing place; good looking, spacious, clean and comfortable, with great amenities both in the apartment itself and in the surrounding area. 
Janine is a helpful and informative host, very knowledgable about 'local' secrets and very happy to share said info.
It's a very short walk from the apartment to major subway lines and a quick 15 minute hop into lower Manhattan . We were very sorry our trip wasn't longer and will definitely look to stay with Janine again in the future.

The apartment was more than we expected.  Not just clean, but spacious and lovely.  Well located near restaurants and shops in Park Slope/Prospect Park area.  Janine welcomed us and made sure to show us around.  We were late arriving and she was flexible about arrangements as they changed.

We were very happy with our choice of apartment. Everything as advertised and very neat and clean.
The Brooklyn location was perfect-close to subway, cafes, restaurants, Prospect Park and we always felt very safe.
Janine was pleasant an helpful.

Janine's apartment is perfect in every way. Clean, fresh and equipped with everything you need. Nice interior, comfy bed, lots of TV channels and fast wifi. The apartment feels like home and you want to stay forever. The location in Park Slope is perfect, close to several subway and bus stations.
Close to a lot of great restaurants, bars, coffee shops. And right next to the great Prospect Park.
Janine is the perfect host, easy and fast to communicate. Very service minded and a very nice person. We strongly recommend Janine as a host and the apartment. We will definitely come to return.

I booked Janine's apartment for my elderly parents who came from Japan to see my family in Park Slope. My parents praised the place everyday. They slept well every night in the very quiet and comfortable bedroom. They said the shower in the bathroom give good water amount and pressure. The apartment is shoe-free which is normal in Japan so my parents were able to feel relaxed in the clean apartment. Janine texted me a few times during my parents' stay to check in how they are doing. That was very kind of her. 

We were lucky to find this nice and cozy apartment one block from my place. I am certain that I will book Janine's apartment for their next visit - that's their request as well. :) Thank you, Janine!

We stayed in Janine's apartment for 2 weeks in June and could not be happier with how beautiful, clean and spacious it was. The rooms are comfortable and bright, kitchen and bathroom very well equipped (toaster, large fridge & freezer, shampoos, plenty of big and small towels…), there is a great view to Manhattan skyscrapers... Janine had air condition installed during our stay as it was hot. Wi-Fi connection is excellent and so are the TV services available. 

We arrived rather late in the evening and Janine waited for us, made us feel welcome and showed us around the apartment. There were maps and magazines with events in the neighborhood and in the city waiting for us on the desk and we were given advice on where to go and which events were worth visiting. Generally Janine stayed out of our way but was happy to chat, help and answer any questions - the best a host can do. She checked in with us every couple of days and even offered to book our airport transport at the end of our stay. Some construction work had to be done in the apartment while we were staying in it and Janine went out of her way to ensure it was done at a time when we were outside so it didn’t disturb us.

The location in Brooklyn is excellent and just a quick subway ride from Manhattan (F and G trains run a short walk down the street). The area around the apartment has a nice number of shops and restaurants – it’s lively, but doesn’t get crowded or too loud. 

We are so happy we chose this accommodation - photos don't do justice to the actual feel of the apartment - it was cherry on the top of our amazing NY experience! We would recommend staying at Janine’s place to anyone and will gladly return the next time we’re in New York.
We had an amazing time at Janine's.  The apartment was beautiful, and Janine already had it cooled down (air conditioner) for our arrival.  She was very helpful and was an allround great host.

Perfect location for being away from Manhattan confusion but at the same time close to public transportation to easily move everywhere.
Very nice apartment, very quite. Well equipped.
Janine has been very kind, gave all necessary information and support.

I surely would consider the apartment for my next time in NY!

Janine's place was perfect for our long weekend. It's close to the subway and in a beautiful part of Brooklyn, making everything easily walkable. She had the air conditioning ready for us on arrival and was more than willing to help us acclimate to the area. 

Would return here in a heartbeat. There's also a beautiful view of the Manhattan skyline out the front windows.

This is the third Air BnB we've used in NYC, and it is far and away the best.  We stayed in Janine's place in early Sept., for a week.  The apt. exceeded my expectations, and I would heartily give my highest recommendation.  Janine greeted us upon arrival, showed us pretty much everything we'd need to know about the apt, and then checked in twice via text during the week.  Location is quiet, safe, with amenities in the neighborhood.  An excellent little Italian place, Piccoli, is less than two blocks away.  

The apt. was spacious, very clean, and had a fine kitchen for cooking quick meals to save money; we used it mainly for breakfasts.  NYC was roasting hot our first two days there, and this is a third floor walk-up, so it was very hot, but the AC in the back bedroom made it bearable.  

I almost hate to give such a good review, as I know I'll probably never find this space available when I want to visit NYC in the future, but I have to be truthful.  Janine has done a fine job with this space.

Unfassbar....Das war so klasse..Janine hat uns begrüßt,uns alles gezeigt.Alles erklärt,gefragt ob wir noch was brauchen.Da meine Freundin total krank war bei Ankunft,gleich nach Tee (Website hidden by Airbnb) standen sogar Nudeln und Sauce,Wasser etc.im Kühlschrank.Wohnung 1Amit Sternchen....Janine absolut klasse (Website hidden by Airbnb) etwas kann man nur weiterempfehlen.Küche top ausgestattet.Bad ebenerdige Dusche...Grosser (Website hidden by Airbnb) Bilder lügen nicht..Die Lage in Brooklyn war für uns toll.Ruhig genug...schöne Restaurants...klasse Supermärkte(alle etwas mehr bio)..Anbindung  U-Bahn dicht bei...Direkter Weg nach Manhattan aber auch Coney Island....Wir machen das bestimmt nochmal....und Janine mit Ihrer Wohnung und auch dem Vertrauen, das sie einem entgegenbringt,können wir nur wärmstens empfehlen.

Janine was an extremely helpful host and was always willing to help make our stay easier and more enjoyable.  The apartment was exactly as it was described, very clean and tidy.  The neighborhood was very family friendly and had many nice restaurants in walking distance.  The close proximity to the subway made travel in and out of the city simple.

What a wonderful place to stay in Brooklyn. It was very convenient to subways as well as grocery stores and nice places for a quick bite as well as nice dinning out. All of the people we talked to on the street were very helpful with directions and suggestions of places to visit. We had some bad weather we did not expect and Janine had us covered, umbrellas as well as ponchos for our use, that was great! Janine also had maps and walking tour info available to use which was very helpful planning our stay. Photos cannot capture the feeling of a space and that is true in this case, the apartment was so comfortable, and the views from each room of the city were awesome. All of our friends who visited could not believe what a wonderful space Janine has, we will be back!!

Just one word : PERFECT !
The place is nice and confortable. 
The neighbourhood is quiet and there are a lot of shops and restaurants. 
It's very easy to go to manhanttan, thanks to the G line, and to JFK airport. 
Janine is really nice and helpfull.
One of my best AirBnB experience.
Completely fantastic. The apartment was perfect. Great location, beautiful apartment and views and helpful host. The only downside was we didn't stay long enough! Thank you Janine!
Good neighborhood, close to lots of good restaurants.

We couldn't have been happier with Janine's accommodations.
We arrived mid-afternoon and the keys and maps were all set for us.
It is a really large, cool, space - the whole top floor with a view of the NYC skyline.  And we fell in love with her Brooklyn neighborhood.
Janine and I never crossed paths (there were no issues) and am sorry I could not thank her personally.
Best,
Nancy and Dave

Just as advertised: cozy, clean, comfortable, private, well-appointed apartment in convenient location, lovely townhouse. Met Janine only briefly, but she was warm and friendly.  Contributed to a wonderful weekend!

Janine's apartment is simply perfect!Beautiful, clean, near the subway, in a fabulous neighborhood...we couldn't ask for more! Janine is a perfect host, too. She gave us important tips, useful for our trip and she's been always helpful and kind with us. Strongly recommended!
The fact that we are coming back speaks for itself.

We spent over a month at this cozy, friendly apartment.
My husband and I were impressed by Janine's exceptional personality. A very special person, someone you would love to have as a friend.
Thank you for everything you have done for us.
Janine была очень гостеприимной и радушной хозяйкой. Общение, заселение, комфорт, чистота - все на самом высоком уровне.

We had a really great time in New York. Janine is a very helpful and lovely host. Her cosy apartment felt like our home during the trip. You can find lots of cafés, bars and shops in the beautiful neighbourhood. Only a few minutes away from metrostation and Prospect Park. The apartment provides everything you need to have a great time. Thanks for making this trip unforgettable!
My girlfriend and i had a nice time in Janine's place, we enjoy Park Slope and Brooklyn in general! We will recommand this nice flat for people who want to live like "real" brooklyners!!
My parents had another wonderful stay! Thanks for being so welcoming and responsive. Your apartment has become their Brooklyn home away from home.

A great Airbnb experience. Janine made sure to stay to welcome us before travelling away herself. Everything was very easy. The apartment and neighbourhood were great, plenty of facilities nearby too. Apartment was full of character and a great base. It was very clean, well equipped and comfortable. Approx 5 mins to subway and then 15 mins to lower Manhattan. 
Thanks to Janine for the stay!
Tom and Claire

Dès notre arrivée l'accueil de Janine fut chaleureux, tout en nous laissant notre espace et notre intimité.Elle fait preuve d'une grande confiance en ses hôtes, ce qui permet de se sentir réellement comme chez soi.A cela vient s'ajouter la localisation, qui est encore un plus, car il y a beaucoup de magasins,de restaurants,un super bar à vin  ( même l'un des meilleurs Bagels de NY à moins d'1km de la maison), et des lignes de métro proches.Pour en terminer avec le quartier, il est calme (réveillé le matin par les petits oiseaux) et près de tout, même d'un magnifique parc, qui n'a rien a envier à centrale park( hormis les building bien sur).L'accés à Manhattan est très simple par le métro, et pour se déplacer dans Brooklyn les bus ne manquent pas.L'appartement traversant avec 2 chambres séparées dont l'une donne une magnifique vue sur Manhattan, est un havre de paix, il a du caractère et du cachet.Janine, est de bon conseils, de plus elle nous a permis de découvrir le Chinatown de Brooklyn, de soir au restaurant, et suivant ses conseils, de jour en plein marché notamment aux poissons, et autres crabes et crustacés (à faire (Website hidden by Airbnb) plus elle nous a trouvé un moyen de transport pour rejoindre l'aéroport ce qui nous a permis d'être sereines même le dernier jour.
Pour finir, je pense que pour une première expérience en Airbnb, Janine a mis la barre très haut.....
Si dans l'avenir nous devions de nouveau nous rendre à NY, il n'y a pas d'autre endroit ou nous aimerions loger.
Thanks a lot for everything Janine and see you soon....B et C

Janine è molto simpatica e gentile. Ci ha accolto con entusiasmo. La casa era bella come ce l'aspettavamo.
Vacanza bellissima!
Geweldig appartement  op de bovenste verdieping van een mooi huis. Prima afstand van metro en voldoende verschillende soorten restaurants in de buurt. Wij komen graag in de toekomst terug.

Janine is a great host, gave us very useful and good tips and helped us always immediately when we had questions. We spent two weeks in her wonderful, cosy and clean apartement – located in an awesome neighbourhood. All important subway stations to reach Manhattan, Williamsburg, Coney Island, Britghton Beach etc. directly are very close by. We enjoyed the restaurants, cafes and shops in Park Slope and the near by Prospect Park. Highly recommended! Thank you, for the wonderful time!

We hebben een hele fijne tijd gehad in het appartement  van Janine. Het appartement is ruim en schoon en prettig om in te verblijven met een mooi uitzicht over manhattan. Het ligt in een leuke wijk met alles wat je nodig hebt. Verschillende metrolijnen vlakbij.
De communicatie verloopt soepel en snel. Bedankt Janine voor je gastvrijheid.

Janine was such a wonderful host, from the first communication she answered all questions promptly and courteously. She provided me with a PDF document she prepared on the apartment and neighbourhood.  Janine  met me on arrival, walked me through the apartment and was full of great suggestions to make the most of my stay.

The apartment was amazing, the space, the cleanliness and the location were perfect and it was a peaceful yet vibrant neighbourhood! Locally Café Grumpy and Bagel Hole are a must for any future visitors!

This was without doubt a first class airbnb experience and Janine is an exemplary host who should coach other hosts on how it should be done! I fell in love with Brooklyn and when I go back I shall be booking with Janine again!
Great place in a great neighbourhood. Hosts were lovely and made everything really easy.

We were in the period from 05.09.2016 until 09.18.2016 Janines guests .

The apartment exceeded our expectations . The photos in the advert can not show the coziness and comfort of the apartment .
In addition, the unit was very clean and is equipped with all the necessities .
Janine was a very good host . She has us in advance provided with lots of information , so that the check-in was very easy . Also during our stay she was always accessible and has helped us quickly and very hard even in an emergency . She is just a very nice person.

We enjoyed our stay with Janine here and would come back anytime .

Finally, we can mention that the area Park Slope is beautiful , and exactly the right thing to unwind after a stressful day NYC . The apartment and Park Slope are very easy to reach with the Metro.
Great place with excellent location. Hostess very accommodating and place very clean and inviting

L'appartamento è molto bello, curato e pulito. Lo abbiamo trovato comodo e nello stesso tempo esteticamente piacevole per trascorrerci del tempo: la tipica casa in brownstones con finestre ad abbaino e parquet antico. Janine inoltre è un host molto attenta e disponibile alle esigenze dei visitatori. Siamo rimasti molto contenti e sicuramente per un futuro viaggio a NY sceglieremo nuovamente questa struttura per il soggiorno. Brooklyn è fantastica, da veri newyorkesi: abbiamo apprezzato molto i locali della zona sia per mangiare/bere qualcosa si per fare spese. Arrivare sull'isola di Manhattan è facile e veloce con la metro. Ottimo!

Die Wohnung ist noch schöner als beschrieben, sie liegt in einem sehr entspannten Teil von Brooklyn in einem typischen brownstone-house. Die Umgebung ist ruhig mit vielen kleinen Läden und sehr guten Restaurants. Nach Manhattan gibt es eine direkte U-Bahn-Verbindung. Die Gastgeberin, die auch im Haus wohnt, hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen und uns bei Bedarf auch tatkräftig unterstützt. Wir haben dort eine tolle Zeit verbracht und würden die Wohnung jederzeit wieder mieten.

The listing was accurate and we were provided with all the information we could need prior to arriving.  The apartment is very comfortable and is located in a nice neighbourhood.  Janine is a great Airbnb host and provided us with extra information during our stay and organised a car when we needed to go to the airport.  We would not hesitate to recommend Janine's apartment to others.

Janine was an amazing host. Lots of details prior to arrival, dinner waiting and made to feel really welcome. Apartment is extremely comfortable and functional. Pictures don't do it justice - is beautifully restored and extremely well presented. Also very quiet which was important for me. Tourist info provided for local sites and Manhattan which was very useful (including info on local supermarkets and car service, the latter was prompt and good value for money). Location is wonderful with two subways close by and not long into Manhattan if you need. Local area has a great array of restaurants and buses up to shopping areas if needed. While I've stayed in Manhatten on previous trips, this was an alternative I will take up again. A huge thank you Janine for making my two weeks such a relaxing and enjoyable time in your apartment!!!

Janine is a great host who will make extra sure that you have whatever you need so that your stay in her apartment is just perfect. I would recommend this apartment and Janine as a host to the entire AirB&B community and would definitely stay here again.
 
Things that we especially liked about this apartment:
I was silent, clean, roomy, cozy; rules were clear; information about the neighborhood/house was available and plentiful; it was near two subway lines, near important Ave in Park Slope, near groceries, cafeterias, and restaurants; it was well equipped.

Attributes that we appreciated about the host:
Janine was communicative, informative, caring, and well organized.

Amazing apartment, perfect to live Brooklyn, quite and relaxing, close to subway station. In 20 minutes you can be in Times Square. 
Jeanine is so cute, she's the perfect host!

Our stay at Janine's was wonderful. The pictures don't do the place justice, it is even lovelier than the pictures show and also a lot bigger.  The bedroom was beautiful and the entire apartment incredibly comfortable. The location is amazing, two blocks from the F train and about three to the R, so you are very close to Manhattan but also in one of Brooklyn 's nicest neighborhoods. Janine was very kind and made sure we had everything we needed. We will definitely stay here again. Thank you for everything Janine!

This third floor flat is really beautiful--lovingly restored with loads of historic detail. The kitchen has everything you need for preparing meals, the wifi is strong, and the bed is super comfortable. The location in Park Slope is amazing too.  Janine was a welcoming and attentive host and hope to have the chance to stay again on my next trip.
Great apartment with good location in a nice and calm neighbourhood. Close to restaurants and shops and only a short walk to Prospect Park.

El departamento de Janine es excelente para quien quiera pasar unas estupendas vacaciones en NY, ubicado en un pintoresco, tranquilo y tradicional barrio, en donde tendrán una variada propuesta gastronómica (Thai, Japonesa, Mexicana, China, Norteamericana y aún más) muchos mercados de diferentes rubros en el barrio, así como también un cercano acceso al metro (para estar en minutos en Manhattan) y al hermoso Prospect Park.

El departamento es íntimo y de primera categoría, la cocina y el baño completos e inmejorables, súper limpios ambos, las habitaciones y las camas comodisimas! Janine es súper cordial y atenta, no duden en pedirle recomendaciones de a dónde ir!

Recomiendo este deprtamento sin dudas! podes conocer Manhattan y también Brooklyn que tiene un encanto especial, la variedad de propuestas están a la vuelta de la esquina.
This was a great base for our visit to Brooklyn, which was to visit family round the corner.  It was very clean and comfortable and quiet.
A wonderful place. It is a perfect place for an enjoyable time in Brooklyn.

A szállás sokkal jobb, mint a képeken! Nagyon jó volt visszatérni ide a városból. A környéken minden megtalálható. A lakás jól felszerelt, tiszta és világos. A házigazda nagyon kedves és segítőkész volt. Minden segítséget megadott ahhoz, hogy jól érezzük magunkat.

One of my all-time favorite airbnbs (and I use it often)! 
A beautiful two bedroom apartment in a great location in Brooklyn. Just two blocks from Prospect park, super close to amazing restaurants, and close to public transit. 
A very comfortable setup, awesome shower, and well-equipped kitchen. 
Very kind host. 
Would love to stay again if I'm ever back in neighborhood.

L'appartement est encore plus beau et spacieux .On hésite entre 2 très jolies chambres ,l'une donnant  sur les jardins ,l'autre avec vue sur la skyline. Très bien équipé, déco de bon goût,le logement est idéalement situé pour visiter Manhattan tout en profitant du charme et du calme de Brooklyn.
Supermarchés "organics" ,cafés ,bons restaurants branchés et magasins sont au rendez vous.
Janine  est une hôte aussi prévenante que discrète,efficace et réactive.Elle laisse à disposition des guides pour visiter NY à pied.
Nous avons eu la chance de voir son timide chat katie.
Nous recommandons vivement  cet hébergement.
My parents had another wonderful stay at Janine's apartment. It's a very comfortable space, and Janine is a friendly, accommodating host. Thanks Janine!

Het appartement was heel fijn!! Zag er allemaal schoon en goed uit, alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig. Het is dichtbij een metrostation en een aantal supermarkten. We zouden zeker nog een keer terug willen! Zeker een aanrader!

This is a great little place in Brooklyn. Close to lots of restaurants and Prospect Park. If coming during the warmer months, be aware that this is on the 3rd floor and it can be hot. 

The bed was comfortable and we loved the location.
Lovely place, lovely stay. Place is as advertised on pictures. Great location!
Perfect location. Super friendly and helpful host! Would recommend it!

Beautiful space! Janine was very welcoming and easy to get a hold of. The location is in a beautiful neighborhood, close to the trains and Prospect Park. The location is quiet and the apartment is clean, simple and a very relxing space. We will definitely be stating with her again!

Janine's place is terrific--a lovey oasis in wonderful Park Slope. She was very helpful prior to and during my stay. The place is spacious and beautifully kept and a short walk to the subway and Prospect Park. I would definitely love to return!

Een erg mooi, ruim, praktisch en proper appartement in een levendige en hippe buurt. Afstand tot het centrum van Manhatten is makkelijk te overbruggen met de Subway F. Contact met Janine verloopt erg makkelijk. Er is een groot park vlakbij met avondconcerten in de zomer. Winkels en restaurants in overvloed in deze fijne en veilige buurt. Absoluut een aanrader!

Janine ist eine unglaublich freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Wir haben unsere Zeit sehr genossen. Der Ausblick aus dem Apparment war der Hammer. Direkte Aussicht auf die Skyline in Manhatten. Die Kommunikation lief einwandfrei und Janine hat uns bei allen Fragen direkt weiter geholfen. Das Appartment hat genügend Platz für eine ganze Familie. Es war perfekt!

This place is pretty much perfect!
Janine was a perfect host, very helpful and so nice. She helped us finding a car service and provided us with everything we needed.
The apartment was clean, spacious and so tastefully decorated.
If you love quiet, stylish, up-and-coming city life, park slope is the place to be. Lots of shops, bars, restaurants, buses and subway in walking distance. Very close to Prospect Park.

We stayed at Janine's for two weeks and it was one of the best experiences we ever had on airbnb. Janine's place is perfectly located, the neighbourhood is very nice with lots of things to do, the appartment is spacious, clean, lovely decorated, and is overall a very relaxing place. Janine is a great host, always available and ready to help, and sharing great tips and advices to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. We won't hesitate to recommend it to people, and would love to return someday. Thank you! :)

Superbe séjour ! L'appartement est beau, spacieux, équipé et confortable. Le quartier est agréable et vivant, Manhattan est très facile d'accès en métro. Janine a été très arrangeante pour l'arrivée et le départ. Malheureusement, nous étions tellement occupés à visiter la ville que nous n'avons pas eu la chance de la rencontrer !

Janine's apartment was an excellent place to stay in Brooklyn.  It was a charming and clean and made us feel right at home.  The neighborhood was quiet and lovely, close to shops, restaurants and transportation.  Janine was available for any questions or needs and was just an all around nice person.
Wonderful place in the beautiful Park Slope in Brooklyn and wonderful host.

Dit mooie appartement op de tweede verdieping van dit woonhuis is een heerlijk thuis voor ons geworden.
De voorzieningen in de buurt zijn erg goed. Er zijn voldoende winkels, restaurantjes. Op nog geen 10 min lopen bevind zich de metro F welke je binnen 40 min naar Manhattan brengt.
Janine is een geweldige host die er alles aan doet om je te helpen je tijd in New York zo aangenaam mogelijk te maken. 
Dit is zeker een aanrader.

We were looking for a specific location when we found this wonderful Airbnb. Luckily for us, Janine had already received high praise from past visitors so we knew we were going to be happy. We were not disappointed. In fact, it exceeded our expectations! Janine is a fantastic host. We will be back! Pam and Brad
Perfection. I worked really long hours for two weeks in Brooklyn and this was a perfect place to return to. Quiet. Comfortable. Spacious. I'd stay there again in a heartbeat.
Janine’s apartment is comfortable, spotless, thoughtfully equipped and in a wonderful location. I couldn’t recommend it more highly.

merveilleux séjour chez Janine , nous avons été accueilli a bras ouverts , nous avons rencontré beaucoup de gentillesse et disponibilité de la part de Janine.
L'appartement est très agréable très propre, très calme au dernier étage de la maison avec 2 chambres spacieuses dont l'une à la vue sur la Skyline de Manhattan et l'autre coté cours ensoleillée . Jolie petite cuisine équipée, salle de bain et salon pour un repos bien mérité après les visites touristiques. Vous trouverez pleins de restaurants et cafés près de chez Janine , belles balades dans Prospect Park tout proche et la location est très bien desservie par les transports en commun (bus et métro )
Nous le recommandons vivement , nous en avons fait notre prochain lieu de résidence
a bientot à Brooklyn

Janine's place is great -- super comfortable, thoughtfully appointed, and with a great deal of space (especially by NYC standards). It's located in a charming Brooklyn neighborhood with tons of character, it's convenient to shops and restaurants, Prospect Park, and several public transportation options. I'd recommend Janine's place without hesitation.

We can’t talk this place up enough. We loved our stay here so much. Janine is the best host we have ever stayed with. Was so welcoming and gave great tips. The apartment was so unbelievably clean and cozy. We wish we could keep this place a secret to ourselves and not tell you stay there but honestly this is the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in. The location is great, close to subway, amazing restaurants and prospect park. We come to NYC every year and as long as this place is available we will be staying here. Thanks Janine for the lovely stay and making our honeymoon so enjoyable.

Janine’s place was in a great area of Park Slope.  The street was lovely and tree lined, and it was only a half block from one of the main streets in Park Slope with shops and restaurants.   It was also only a few blocks from one subway line and walkable to two other lines.  The flat was sparkling clean when we arrived.  It was a good size, beautifully furnished and very homey.  Janine was very responsive both before we arrived and during our stay.  I would highly recommend Janine’s flat.
Everything was just great. Thank you Janine
Un appartement bien situé, au calme et accessible pour visiter la ville, de l’espace, un super équipement, une jolie décoration, un super accueil... en bref, un séjour parfait !

We use this space often when visiting children and grandchildren in Brooklyn.  Ideal location to all of Park Slope, including subways.  Roomy, clean and easy to live in.  The hostess is friendly and accommodating.  We have moved this to our first choice whenever in NYC.  We highly recommend it.
perfect for stay in NYC

Janine es una persona muy amable y hospitalaria.El alojamiento esta en una de las mejores zonas de Brooklyn,un barrio familiar y tranquilo.Esta bien comunicado por metro,en alrededor de media hora estas en Manhattan.Tiene comercios cerca para aprivisionar la nevera.Y muy cerca un parque fabuloso donde correr por la mañana o dar un paseo.El jardin botanico de Brooklyn es una buena visita.El alojamiento dispone de todas las comodidades y es extremadamente tranquilo.Una magnifica opcion para conocer New York.

Janine’s place is the perfect base from which to explore New York.  It is in a great location in a beautiful, leafy part of Brooklyn with lots of cafes, bars and food stores close by and is within easy reach of the subway for Manhattan.  The flat itself is lovely and has everything you need for a very comfortable stay.  Janine is a great host, providing lots of very useful local information. All of her communications were fast and very helpful.  We cannot recommend a stay here highly enough!
We are frequent guests here, and are never disappointed in any way.
This was my second stay and it was everything as perfect as it was the first time. Beautiful apartment in a great neighborhood. I definitely won’t be my last time.
We had the most amazing time at Janine's! I couldn't recommend it any higher. an amazing space, beautiful neighborhood and friendly host. what more could you ask for?

Janine's place was perfect for my 5 nights in Brooklyn! I arrived late at night via the train, and appreciated the flexible self check-in. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and amazingly quiet compared to other places I've stayed in the city.  The Park Slope neighborhood has tons of amazing restaurants and cafes, but if you want to go to Manhattan, Queens, or North Brooklyn, the F & G trains are a quick and easy walk down 7th Ave. Janine was respectful of my privacy, but quick to respond to messages and questions. Thank you, again, for a lovely stay, Janine!

The apartment is very nice and comfortable! It is equipped with everything you need. Location is very convenient, near shops and public transport. Janine was very helpful and friendly, she’s a super host!

Das Apartment ist gut gelegen,. ca. 5 Gehminuten zur Subway die einen schnell nach Manhattan bringt. Ebenso viele Restaurants, gut sortierte kleine Supermarkte und wer es liebt eins Starbucks direkt neben dem Zugang zur Subway :-) . Das Apartment ist sehr schön aufgeteilt. Es ist alles da um einen den Aufenthalt angenehm zu machen und es ist sehr sauber !!! Hab ich so bisher noch nicht einmal in einen 4-Sterne Hotel erlebt. Janine ist eine tolle Gastgeberin.

Janine's place is spacious, stylish and the perfect base for exploring Brooklyn and its surrounds. We had a very comfortable and relaxing stay here. Janine was very helpful and welcoming and we would love to come back to stay here again.
Great place to stay, Janine is the perfect host - thanks again!
it was an absolutely amazinh stay. highly recommended

It was our first visit in the USA and Janine gave us the opportunity to stay at her lovely place in Brooklyn. We always got the informations we need immediately, so don't bother to write her :). From JFK its about 55€ with an Uber right to the doors. There are lots of restaurants nearby Janines house. So there was no problem to have breakfast every day at another place.  Or dinner in the evening. It takes about 5-10 minutes to the metro station. From there maybe 10 minutes and you are in Manhattan. So no problems at all in terms of commuting. The apartment is as cozy and nice as it is described. There is everything you need for your stay. Even if you want to cook, it has a fully equipped kitchen. All in all I just can highly recommend Janines place for your NYC visit. Its close to Manhattan, but not in the middle of the rush. Perfect
Very beautiful stay, you will love it

Wonderful place to stay!  Amazing location - close to the Park, and loads of cafes and restaurants, the subway to Manhattan, etc.   Quiet beautiful street in Park Slope. Super comfortable bed, nice shower and cozy sitting room.  We would highly recommend Janine's house and would definitely stay here again!

La estancia fue inmejorable. Janine respondió siempre a nuestras dudas y de una manera muy rápida. El apartamento es como en la foto, cuenta con 2 habitaciones aunque en nuestra reserva ponía 1. Janine nos permitió usar ambas. El barrio es muy tranquilo y seguro y cuenta con 2 paradas de metro cercanas. La 7th av. está llena de locales comerciales y restaurantes. Si volvemos, repetiremos.

Janine has a great place with easy acess to all places around New York. The area where the apartment is has lots of restuarants nearby. The apartment is big, clean and very quiet. Janine is superfriendly and really quick with answers for all kind of questions. This is a fantastic place to stay while visiting New York.

We couldn’t imagine a better stay for our trip to New York! We stayed at Janine’s for a week and felt like at home in her big, cozy apartment. It’s equipped perfectly, the beds are so comfy, the bathroom is large ... we can go on and on.
The Neighborhood is very safe, quiet and full of nice people and shopping opportunities.  
Janine helped us out a lot and answered within seconds. We were lucky to met her!

We would come back for sure, saying goodbye was hard! 

100% and more recommended!

Thanks, Susanne and Angelina
Large and well appointed! Janine’s place does not disappoint. Great location, nice amenities. Janine is friendly and quick to respond.

We have spent a week in Janine’s apartment. The location is very good and has very good connection to Manhattan with the nearby subway stations, just a few walk minutes from the flat. The apartment is well equiped with everything you need in everyday use. We can highly recommend it for everyone who would like to feel like a real New Yorker :)

Janine’s place was great! She greeted us on arrival and showed us to our apartment on the third floor. The apartment was beautiful,  clean, the bed was very comfortable and it had all the amenities we needed! 

The apartment is located in a nice area in Brooklyn with fun spots to eat, shop and drink in walking distance. And it was easy enough to get downtown NYC! 

We had a great time staying here and are looking forward to staying again! Would recommend 100%.

The space is a quiet, comfortably furnished, third floor apartment with two spacious bedrooms (queen beds with duvets and many pillows), and  an inviting sitting room. The kitchen is fully equipped with new appliances. The bathroom features a large walk-in shower and a contemporary toilet. The hardwood floors are polished and are the main reason for the no shoes policy. Those floors are so beautiful, we didn't mind wearing slippers. This could be the cleanest Airbnb we have ever stayed in. The location is perfect for enjoying Park Slope and the rest of NYC. We were just a few blocks from the F train and the busses are half a block away. We love 7th Avenue. It's the ideal walkable neighborhood. We quickly established a favorite cafe from the many we could course from. We would definately book this place again.

Great location. Great apartment with style and comfort. Jeanine will see that you have everything you need to enjoy your stay in Brooklyn. We have already referred the apartment to other couples we know.

name: Porto/Gaia Apartment with swimming pool
summary: Apartment well located 15 minutes from the center of Porto traveling by metro. Metro is 3 minutes walking from the apartment. Quiet, calm and central location. Shopping area for your daily needs. It's comfortable and accommodates 4 people. Public transport, taxi and metro is in 3 minutes walking. Tourist Zone, where the famous Port Wine cellars are located.
space: A quiet and safe place for your holidays. Vila Nova de Gaia is also a tourist place, as it is where located the port wine cellars, museums, churches and gardens. Is where you can see the most incredible view to Porto and the Douro river.
description: Apartment well located 15 minutes from the center of Porto traveling by metro. Metro is 3 minutes walking from the apartment. Quiet, calm and central location. Shopping area for your daily needs. It's comfortable and accommodates 4 people. Public transport, taxi and metro is in 3 minutes walking. Tourist Zone, where the famous Port Wine cellars are located. A quiet and safe place for your holidays. Vila Nova de Gaia is also a tourist place, as it is where located the port wine cellars, museums, churches and gardens. Is where you can see the most incredible view to Porto and the Douro river. The apartment is located in closed condominium and has access to outdoor pool. There is also a children's playground. they can acces from 9am to 9pm. they cannot access the indoor pool. I will not be present at the guest's stay. neighborhood_overview: Quiet town, close to everything. Local cafes and bakeries are a great place to have breakfast and start exploring the city. The zoo is 2 km away.  in Vila Nova de Gaia you can find the Port Wine Cellars, beautifull garden as "jardim do morro", "Serra do Pilar monastry", and a few museums.
notes: The city as the best tourist destination.
transit: It has free parking. The public transport network is excellent. The guest can go by metro, bus and taxi. Metro is 3minutes walking from the house. Bus is 2minutes and taxi 2minutes also from the house.
access: The apartment is located in closed condominium and has access to outdoor pool. There is also a children's playground. they can acces from 9am to 9pm. they cannot access the indoor pool.
interaction: I will not be present at the guest's stay. Only at check-in and check-out and on request I can arrange transfer to and from the airport, or any other point. A fee will be charged.The apartment is located in an enclosed condominium and has access to an outdoor swimming pool. There is also a children's playground.

reviews.comments:
Cristina es una persona muy alegre que ha estado muy atenta para que estuviéramos genial en su apartamento. La comunicación con ella ha sido estupenda. 
El apartamento es tal y como se describe, limpio y muy muy cómodo, con unas zonas comunes espectaculares. Esta muy bien comunicado en metro con el centro de Oporto (en 10 minutos ya estábamos) y además admiten perros en el metro, por lo que hemos podido disfrutar de nuestra visita con nuestro perro.
Totalmente recomendable para disfrutar de Oporto y a la vez estar alojados en un pequeño oasis de tranquilidad. 
Muchas gracias por todo Cris, de corazón!.

Très bon lieu pour passer des vacances , découverte de porto , métro a 1mn et 4 stations du centre, et pour se reposer ( Piscine extérieure et intérieure, salle de sport...). Appartement spacieux et accueil parfait par Christina

lappartement est juste parfait nous sommes restés juste le temps dun weekend mais nous aurions souhaité y rester plus longtemps
on reviendra surement 
porto est une ville superbe

name: NEW! Piso Premium en Ps de Gracia!
summary: Apartamento de una habitación doble y con capacidad máxima de hasta 4 personas (utilizando sofá-cama del salón).  Abierto y luminoso apartamento con todas con una tribuna con vistas a Paseo de Gracia.  Desde el dormitorio se ve la Casa Batlló.
space: Apartamento de una habitación doble y con capacidad máxima de hasta 4 personas (utilizando sofá-cama del salón).  En este abierto y luminoso apartamnto con vistas exteriores a la calle Consell de Cent podremos sentir como el famoso sol mediterráneo inunda las mañanas para comenzar el día llenos de energía para salir a “comerse” la ciudad. Un frondoso y relajado desayuno dejando entrar la claridad por las ventanas y el aire freso, puede ser el prólogo perfecto para un día de descubrimiento de los más escondidos secretos de la ciudad.  Salón  Amplio salón-comedor con un espacio sobre la calle con amplios ventanales donde uno puede sentarse a leer un libro después de un largo día visitando la ciudad. Dispone de un cómodo sofá que puede usarse como cama doble. En un lado del salón encontramos una mesa amplia para 4 personas con mobiliario de diseño, dándole un toque alegre. Dispone de aire acondicionado regulable según la época del año. La cocina La cocina está equipada con vitrocerámica,
