neighborhood_overview: Nuestros 3 apartamentos ocupan toda la la 2ª planta de uno de los característicos y clásicos edificios del barrio de l'Eixample. El edificio dispone de ascensor y conserje. Su arquitectura exterior, de mediados del siglo XX, refleja una de las épocas arquitectónicas de mayor expansión y consolidación del actual aspecto urbano de la ciudad. En cuanto al interior hemos reconstruido íntegramente todas sus estancias en este mismo año 2014, adaptándolos así a las necesidades modernas de habitabilidad y confort. La ubicación geográfica que seleccionamos para nuestro proyecto es probablemente una de las mejores opciones que se pueden encontrar en Barcelona para disfrutar de todos sus posibilidades. Nos encontramos en la calle consell de Cent, entre el Paseo de Gracia y Rambla Catalunya, en la comúnmente conocida como “Manzana de Oro”.   El barrio de l’Eixample es el más característico de Barcelona debido a su historia y diseño característicos de finales del siglo XIX con amplias calles y flui
notes: Se cobrará un extra de 20€ en caso de llegadas posteriores a las 21h (9PM).
transit: La estación de Passeig de Gràcia se encuentra a 50 metros del apartamento. Desde ahí hay conexión directa con el aeropuerto y las principales líneas de metro de la ciudad. En Plaça Catalunya se pueden encontrar la mayoría de líneas de autobús que conectan con el aeropuerto.
access: Cada uno de los apartamentos dispone de cocina propia íntegramente equipadas, baño privado, así como también un área común donde comer y/o recrearse fuera de las habitaciones. También todos ellos disponen de: Wi-Fi Calefacción. Aire acondicionado. Suelos de Parquet. Toallas y sábanas en cantidad necesaria. Servicio de limpieza (opcional). Otros servicios (a petición) Los gastos de electricidad y agua se pagarán por adelantado, a la llegada al apartamento (100€ mensuales)
interaction: Nos gusta saber los planes de viaje de nuestros huéspedes, para poder recomendarles sitios que visitar o restaurantes donde cenar y de los que solemos disfrutar cuando podemos!
house_rules: Sólo esperamos que os relajéis y disfrutéis de la ciudad como se merece!

host.host_about:
BCN Dream Apartments is: " Your home in Barcelona ". Wide, luminous, calm apartments and our personnel is nice, attentive and they manage the needs of all the clients. In the main Center of Barcelona, in the Modernist Route. We're waiting for you!
BCN Dream Apartments es: "Tu Hogar en Barcelona".
Apartamentos amplios, luminosos, tranquilos y nuestro personal es amable, atento y gestionan las necesidades de todos los clientes.
En pleno centro de Barcelona, en la Ruta Modernista. ¡Os esperamos!

reviews.comments: The apartment is amazing! In a perfect location. Very central. Easy to get to and get to all the best sites and parts of the city. Was so easy and convenient.

Très bel appartement, propre et bien situé. Un parking situé à 2 pas, dont on peut monnayer l'accès avec l'hôte pour un prix raisonnable (37€ pour 3jours), nous a bien aidé à garer notre voiture. 
Il y a 3 logements géré par cet hôte sur le même palier, et le hall est très bien organisé pour laisser ses bagages dans un placard qui ferme à clef. Ils sont très professionnels et parfaitement réactifs aux messages et aux demandes. 
Le logement est central, à côté de Passeig de Gracia. Le salon du notre était un peu bruyant car il donne sur une grande rue mais la chambre est au calme sur des jardins.
Je recommande particulièrement cet appartement très spacieux et confortable.
Un piso estupendo, muy bonito y la ubicación excelente. Muy buena comunicación con el anfitrión, muy atento y amable. Para repetir.
Amazing. Great service. Great spot. Even better in person.
숙소가 정말 청결하고 화이트 색상으로 예쁩니다. 베란다에 테이블과 의자가 특히 마음에 들었습니다. 식기구도 깨끗하게 사용할 수 있었고 화장실이 조금 작은것빼고는 정말 좋았습니다. 위치도 까사바트요 바로 옆입니다. 추천합니다

What a wonderful location & comfortable place to stay!  very quiet, close to the center of Barselona  and metro station. It is very clean and has everything it needs. We had a pleasant stay and we highly recommend it for anyone who is looking for a comfortable and quiet place to stay.

This apartment is very well situated. We enjoyed our stay in Barcelona mainly because of how centrally-located the apartment was - close to the metro and main stations, as well as city staples like P de Gracia, Sagrada Familia, La Ramblas & Plaça Catalunya. The apartment itself had the basics. The enclosed patio overlooking the main street was a very nice addition and made our mornings entertaining as we people watched whilst sipping coffee. The hosts were easy to talk to as well, and check-in arrangements were a breeze.

One gripe I do have is that the wifi was really really slow (even with full signal strength!). We couldn't browse or book anything online, and even basic websites would take a while to load. Good thing there is an awesome cafe downstairs that offers a decent connection. I don't watch a lot of tv when I travel, but to those who do, it might be wise to ask the host how to operate the digital antenna or just bring your own media since there were no channels on tap (both English & Spanish).

Aside from these "minor inconveniences", I'd say I'd go back and stay here again. It was modern, had plenty of light and space that would comfortably fit 4 people, and it's location makes it easy to conquer the city's sights without overly exhausting your feet.
Es un departamento soñado! Excelente ubicacion, moderno, amplio y en un edificio tranquilo! Como voy a extrañar los desayunos en esa galeria!! Imperdible!

Great location for exploring Barcelona. Apartment is located in a stylish area of the city and above a busy and vibrant street but no problem sleeping as the bedroom is at the rear of the apartment. Loved how sun drenched the lounge area was in the mornings. Would definitely stay here again.
Great place and a great location
Inmejorable
Ubicación perfecta!

name: Jolie 5 Pièces semi-ouvert
summary: Petit logement 5 pièces situé au coeur du quartier Villeray! À 5 minutes de marche du metro, 20 minutes du centre-ville et 2 minutes de marche d'un des plus beau parc de la ville. Cuisine, 1 chambre avec lit double et un divan-lit (double) dans le salon, 1 lit pour enfant de 10 ans max. Wifi. Apple TV
description: Petit logement 5 pièces situé au coeur du quartier Villeray! À 5 minutes de marche du metro, 20 minutes du centre-ville et 2 minutes de marche d'un des plus beau parc de la ville. Cuisine, 1 chambre avec lit double et un divan-lit (double) dans le salon, 1 lit pour enfant de 10 ans max. Wifi. Apple TV

reviews.comments:
Sympathique emplacement, idéal pour petite famille... Etienne, l'hôte, est agréable (nous avons communiqué par téléphone et par écrit), il a répondu rapidement à mes questionnements.

Le quartier Villeray est un endroit avec un charme indéniable, le marché Jean-Talon (surtout l'été) en est le coeur.

L'appartement d'Etienne est tel que décris dans l'annonce, pas de mauvaise surprise. Nous avons communiqué par messages et tout s'est très bien passé, en plus Etienne nous avait laissé une petite attention de bienvenue et un conseil de visite du marché Talon dans le quartier. Très bon séjour, appartement proche du métro, calme et idéal pour 4. Je recommande!!

J'ai passé 2 jours dans l'appartement d'Etienne qui était très bien situé, à côté du métro et de plusieurs petits cafés, l'appartement est grand et lumineux, et surtout le lit est incroyablement confortable! La communication était très simple avec Etienne, qui est super sympa. Tout était parfait, je recommende!

Très sympathique appartement dans une rue assez calme. Prêt du Marché Jean Talon que nous adorons et d'une magnifique pâtisserie que nous avons découvert au coin de Jarry. La communication avec Étienne fût très facile
We had an amazing stay! The space was clean, welcoming and in a great area near many restaurants, cafes, bars, grocery stores and very conveniently near the Metro!

This place was in a very nice quiet area of the city that isn’t far from local restaurants and culture.  Beds were comfortable and space was bright and clean - pleasantly surprised with the bed in the kids room for an adult to sleep in so me and my friend had 2 separate rooms to sleep in.  Recommended!

Bel appartement, calme et propre. 
À proximité du métro et des commerces . 
Je recommande
Etienne's place is really warm, cosy, bright and located very close to a bunch of nice places (bakery, brewery, restaurants, parks). It was really an enjoyable place!

Etienne is a great host. His home is nice and comfortable and has a great value compared to the price asked. Etienne gave us good suggestions on what to do and see in city. I recommend his apartment to spend a good time in Montreal.
Bon pour 2 personnes maximum, propreté à travailler mais un belle emplacement mais ne pas y aller dans une canicule

name: Brownstone Guest Suite by Superhost WINTER SALE!
summary: Sunny entire parlor floor guest suite in owner occupied Brownstone in beautiful, historic Stuyvesant Heights, Brooklyn. Spacious, three room floor with spacious private bathroom.  Living room, Dining area and Bedroom, with great restaurants nearby! This suite is the entire 2nd floor of our house and is fully private. The house is owner occupied and we live in the building on the other floors while you stay here.
space: Clean, light-filled, and spacious apartment in our owner occupied brownstone.
description: Sunny entire parlor floor guest suite in owner occupied Brownstone in beautiful, historic Stuyvesant Heights, Brooklyn. Spacious, three room floor with spacious private bathroom.  Living room, Dining area and Bedroom, with great restaurants nearby! This suite is the entire 2nd floor of our house and is fully private. The house is owner occupied and we live in the building on the other floors while you stay here. Clean, light-filled, and spacious apartment in our owner occupied brownstone. Guests will have access to a private entrance, their own private floor and bathroom in our townhouse. This apartment has no kitchen but has a brand new mini fridge, a coffee maker and a teakettle for making coffee and tea in your apartment. There are also and mugs, glasses, plates and utensils for your convenience. We are friendly and happy to suggest fun and interesting things to do and see in New York. Tree-lined blocks in beautiful brownstone Brooklyn.  The neighborhood is vibrant with a choice of
neighborhood_overview: Tree-lined blocks in beautiful brownstone Brooklyn.  The neighborhood is vibrant with a choice of restaurant, bars and cafes.
notes: This apartment has no kitchen but has a brand new mini fridge, a coffee maker and a teakettle for making coffee and tea in your apartment. There are also  mugs, glasses, plates and utensils for your convenience. This is an owner occupied townhouse.
transit: Easy access to A and C subway trains. 10 minutes walk to the subway station from our house. 20 Minutes by subway to downtown Manhattan.  JFK/ La Guardia airport is 30 minutes by taxi.  Free street parking is available.
access: Guests will have access to a private entrance, their own private floor and bathroom in our townhouse. This apartment has no kitchen but has a brand new mini fridge, a coffee maker and a teakettle for making coffee and tea in your apartment. There are also and mugs, glasses, plates and utensils for your convenience.
interaction: We are friendly and happy to suggest fun and interesting things to do and see in New York.
house_rules: -Consideration is appreciated and offered.  -No smoking or loud music. -No candles or incense, lighters, matches or ANY other fire hazards. -Please be quiet after 9 pm.  -NO MOVIE/ FILM/ PHOTO Shoots -No parties, No events, No outside visitors or overnight guests. -Do not engage in illegal activities anywhere on the property. -No Illegal downloading of Movies, Software or ANY copyright Materials. -Please don't leave any food out that will attract uninvited pests. Our home is pest-free and we intend to keep it that way with your help.  -We're sorry but no pets. •Safety & Liability -If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately. -Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Gue

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hi, I'm Steef and I live with my wife and kids. I am Dutch and my wife is a native New Yorker.  We speak French, Dutch, English, and a bit of German.  
We live in our wonderful Bed-Stuy, a neighborhood with much to offer. We love traveling and food and have enjoyed using Airbnb in the past. We love to go to a place and see and do all kinds of interesting things.

reviews.comments: Steef's place was great in many ways. He and his wonderful family made me feel very welcomed and I very much enjoyed meeting all of them. You get the entire 2nd floor of a three story brownstone. It was recently renovated and very nicely appointed. I slept very well both nights. You can have real privacy there if you wish. It's not a place to have a party with friends over but it is ideal for singles or couples to use as a base to explore Brooklyn or eat at any one of the several trendy restaurants just round the corner (check out Saraghina!). After all that you can come home and relax. All in all a strong recommend.

My girlfriend and I stayed at Steefs freshly renovated Brooklyn brownstone house for one week and liked it very much. We got one floor just for us with our own bathroom, own etrance and a brand new coffee maker. Everything was perfectly cleaned up and the bed very comftortable. Steef, his wife and his children were very great hosts and we felt very welcomed. They had great advices for our stay in New York. The neighborhood was quiet and safe and very authentic with plenty opportunities for shopping and eating. With the nearby subway stations you can reach Brooklyn or Manhatten very fast. To conclude: We recommend in every way.

A beautiful apartment in a brownstone. Very tastefully decorated, large and comfortable. The hosts were extremely helpful and accommodating. Good location in Bed-Stuy close to the two best restaurants in that neighborhood.

My girlfriend and I stayed on the second floor of this beautiful brownstone for two nights while there were guests at our apartment in Bushwick. We arrived earlier than we initially planned and were immediately greeted by our gracious host and given a tour of where we would be staying. The woodwork in the second floor apartment, which I believe we were told was refinished by Steef and his family, created a warm, cozy backdrop for our weekend in this peaceful neighborhood. The apartment had the intimacy of a bed and breakfast with a comfortable level of privacy. Steef and his wife made sure that we felt at home and made things very easy for us with prompt and clear communication. Among the establishments nearby that we enjoyed were Saraghina, which was suggested to us by our host and had food that certainly rivaled over-celebrated artisan pizzerias such as Roberta's in style, taste and atmosphere, and Georges-Andre Vintage Café, a homey spot on Halsey and Stuyvesant with donuts from Dough and excellent cappuccinos. I would definitely suggest Steef's apartment to anyone who wanted to get in touch with this gorgeous section of Brooklyn, including out-of-towners given the easy access to the A and C at the Kingston-Throop stop.

It was a pleasure to meet Steef and his wife. Me and my boyfriend stayed at their place 5 days and enjoyed it very much - it was a great choice! I felt homey, but very private at the same time. Steef and his wife were helpful and friendly. I was completely satisfied with the place: the apartment is spacey, very cozy, artistic, freshly made and situated in the nice street of Brooklyn. An extra bonus from us goes for the 2 great world music CDs which totally completed the atmosphere of the place. Thank you and good luck Steef!

I had never been to Brooklyn before but I certainly found a home there at Steef's place. Steef made sure that we were taken care of even before we arrived. We arrived on the early side and that was no problem at all. He welcomed us and stayed in touch throughout our stay to make sure we had all we needed and to just see how our day went. The place itself was packed with charm and there was more space than you might expect. You could hear a pin drop at night in a very peaceful neighborhood with super easy access to a train right into the city. A great deal!

All around great experience staying at Steef's place. The space is large and relaxing for two people, bathroom is clean and spacious, and bed is comfortable. Steef gave us great recommendations on places to eat in the neighborhood, and while Bed-Stuy isn't a tourist hotspot, there are some really great restaurants and cafes on Lewis St, just around the block from his place. I highly recommend staying with Steef if you want a quiet escape in Brooklyn.

Steef and his family, though we only met them in passing, were super inviting and excellent hosts. The description is exactly what it says and more so. Beautiful 3 room apartment practically. Comfortable furniture and fully stocked bathroom for anything you forgot. Though we were in and out mostly we felt comfortable and unintrusive on our comings and goings. Neighborhood is still old bedstuy for the most part but Hancock is a pleasant street all brownstones. The A/C/E is a cup of coffee walk away. Thanks for having us! We would totally go again! Thanks Steef and family!

My girlfriend and I had a great stay at Steef's.  He was very helpful before we left, helping us to figure out parking and making himself available for us to check-in in the midafternoon.  

The place was exactly as he described it.  Room was simple and clean.  Bathroom was very nice.  The location was great.  A few nice restaurants close and very easy to catch the subway right into Manhattan.  

Steef was very available when we needed him.  We would definitely stay with him again and would highly recommend his place to others.

The apartment was really nice, very clean and cozy. My girlfriend and i enjoyed our stay a lot and would recommend it always. The neighborhood is although very friendly with a few bars and cafes, but not to busy and hyped... We really loved that.

We had a great time in Steefs appartment. It's a very cosy and clean space nearby the subway, which takes you in 20 minutes to Manhattan. Steef is an excellent host and made our stay unforgettable, with even a gift for Christmas. So, thanks Steef again for your hospitality and quick answering of our questions!

We had a lovely time in Steefs apartment. It was clean and tidy and was a really pleasant and quaint space. Very roomy and comfortable. Steef was very welcoming and accommodating, he answered all our questions and was able to tell us about the area and New York City.

My girlfriend and I recent visited Steef's home. The home itself was adorable. The rooms are nice and large with beautiful wood everywhere. The space has everything you would need to be comfortable and feel at home. Steve met us at the door when we arrived and provided us with everything that we would need to enjoy our visit. He is a very gracious and enjoyable host! Getting around in both Brooklyn and Manhattan was very easy and quite convenient. We had a short walk to a subway station and were able to take the C train almost everywhere we needed to go. It was only a 30 minute cab ride to and from JFK airport. I would absolutely recommend Steef's home to others visiting New York. We would happily stay there again.
Host was very accommodating, was able to retrieve an article of clothing I accidently left without any hassle.
The place was great! Very clean and comfortable with cool decorations.  Steef the host was very helpful and made sure our stay was pleasurable. Recommended :)

My girlfriend and I had to take a last minute trip to New York. Steef was very prompt in responding to our reservation, as well as replying to messages. We stayed in his gorgeous brownstone in Bedstuy, everything was clean, he was very gracious and courteous when we first up. Told us everything we'd need to know. It was easy to get downtown via the C train - 8 min walk - and later to my girlfriend's sister's house in Bushwick - 5 min drive. Was pleasantly surprised Steef had set aside coffee and water for us--didn't realize Airbnbs did that! All around it was a great place to stay in Brooklyn!

We had a fantastic stay here, the photos are accurate, it's just beautiful. I liked the neighborhood, it was diverse and had lots of personality, walking distance to subway station, we went to nearby restaurants Peaches and Saraghina, enjoyed them immensely! Many of the friends I was visiting live in Brooklyn, so we wanted to remain centrally located, and that meant that we got to see many of Brooklyn's different neighborhoods. This was my first real visit to NY and I was delighted that the block we were on reminded me a lot of Sesame Street (I'm from Indiana) - but you'll notice a lot of blocks like that! 

Comfy living room to chill out in, with great windows facing the street. There's no kitchen to speak of, but a cabinet with a small fridge and a coffee maker had everything we needed for coffee and the Saraghina bakery nearby fed us in the morning. 

Would stay again!

We hebben 5 nachten verbleven in dit charmante appartement in Brooklyn. Al tijdens de voorbereiding van de trip en het boeken hadden we een goed contact met verhuurder Steef. Snelle reactie op onze mailberichten en beantwoording van onze vragen. Op dag van aankomst werden we hartelijk ontvangen en wegwijs gemaakt. Het appartement ligt in een rustige buurt, op korte loopafstand van de metro en leuke restaurants. Het appartement is zeer ruim, schoon, een goed bed en fijn dat je een aparte woonkamer hebt waar je kunt vertoeven als je dat wilt. Mogelijkheid voor het zetten van koffie en thee en de aanwezigheid van servies, bestek en een koelkastje vonden wij heel erg praktisch en prettig.
Steef, bedankt voor je goede zorgen, de fijne ontvangst en de tips! We hebben erg genoten van onze trip en kunnen (en zullen) dan ook iedereen jullie appartement aanbevelen.

Hartelijke groeten,
Nelleke en Diana
Steef is a really great host, and the place is even better than the pictures, thank you Steef !

Mooi,ruim appartement,plezierige ontvangst. Steef is steeds bereikbaar en bereid tot praatje,advies of hulp. Leuk om ook even in eigen taal te kunnen praten over alle indrukken. Prettige ,gemoedelijke buurt. Centrum prima te bereiken per Subway. Zeker aan te raden. We hebben het prima naar onze zin gehad.
Their home was beautiful and both Steef and his wife were exceptionally welcoming and gracious; I would definitely stay here again!

Steef is very welcoming host. We enjoyed our stay in his apartment. It's so clean and very well decorated. The bed was comfortable . We found everything we needed from shampoo to toothpaste . 
He also had a good coffee and tea station . The dark chocolate was so good with the coffee.
We will sure be back if we have a chance to visit New York again

This is a beautiful floor for rent in one of the nice streets full of brown stones in Bed-Stuy. A comfortable and spacious en suite living in with Steef and his family, but with plenty of privacy and a large private bathroom. No kitchen, but a kettle, coffee maker and fridge and a couple of good restaurants just a block away. Steef is a very pleasant host, who is always there when you have questions. Highly recommended!

Ook heel leuk voor Nederlandstalige gasten.

Tip: explore Brooklyn by bus, much easier than by subway, and loads more to see.

From the moment that my husband and I arrived, Steef was extremely hospitable.  He was very welcoming and went so far as to provide us with feedback on area eateries, and the home was immaculate and homey.  Having lived in Brooklyn for many years, this was our best option.  We felt like we were at home instead of like visitors.  I highly recommend Steef's home as a great place to stay for your next trip to New York!

A good place to stay in Brooklyn!
Steef was a perfect host ans we enjoyed staying at his apartement. It is just like on the pictures: spacious, cozy and spotlessly clean. The subway is a 10 minutes walk away from the apartement and there are several restaurants nearby.

We would love to come back one day!

Steef was  a wonderful host.  He gave us clear directions on how to get to the location and was there to welcome us and give a tour when we arrived. He was prompt in communication and most considerate, providing the essentials in the kitchen area, extra blankets and umbrellas when needed and letting us leave our bags after check out as we had an evening flight. He also gave excellent suggestions of food in the area and places to visit.
The apartment was spacious and charming. Pictures and descriptions were as stated. The natural light and breeze were a lovely perk. It was so nice to return to the cozy apartment after a day out in the city. 
The location was convenient to subways and very pedestrian friendly. Lovely tree-lined streets and lively neighborhood, though quiet by evening which was ideal. 
Delightful experience and would love to stay again the next time in the city. Many thanks, Steef!

So I’ve been fortunate to have stayed in some of the best kept and presented hotels, guests houses, apartments and holidays homes across the world. This beautiful brownstone townhouse, lovingly restored by Steef and his family is an excellent representation of what can be achieved if a host has that extra attention for detail and focus on customer service.

This high ceiling apartment has many original features from the period; the smart bedroom looks over an enchanted designed garden, all located in a diverse neighbourhood. I pop along to a local hipster coffee shop and met a full range of people, from urban types, to young professional family types, established members of the Jewish, LGBT, art and music communities to a host of friendly New Yorkers (check out Counter Culture Café for a real positive clash of heritage).

The apartment has a kitchenette arrangement; is just enough and very much like one would find in a city centre property in Paris, Bangkok, Tokyo or anywhere else in the world where a good cooked meal is so inexpensive to buy it really doesn’t make sense to cook.

This has been a real joy from start of the process and I’m looking forward to staying again on my next trip....

10/10 for Steef’s hosting skills - big respect.

Ich habe 10 Tage in Steefs Apartment gewohnt und bin sehr zufrieden mit Unterkunft. Das Apartment entspricht voll und ganz der Beschreibung und den Bildern. In der Nachbarschaft kann man 24 Stunden einkaufen und auch Essen gehen. Steef hat mich nett empfangen und mir entsprechende Tips in der Umgebung gegeben. Auch wenn man spontan was braucht war er sofort zur Stelle. Mit der UBahn dauerte es circa einer halbe Stunde von der Haustür bis nach Manhatten.

We feel so fortunate to have found Steef and his apartment in Bed-Stuy and will certainly be back.  We were in Brooklyn to help our daughter move into an apartment that turned out to be just down the street! So the location was great--not just for us but for being a really interesting neighborhood to explore and being convenient to other parts of Brooklyn and to the A/C subway.  Steef was easy to communicate with beforehand, waited for our late arrival and was friendly and helpful when we were there. The apartment is spacious, clean and nicely furnished and it was very comfortable to spend time there on a rainy afternoon. Great coffee shops nearby. Try Manny's on Patchen for breakfast/brunch. Steef and his family have lived in the neighborhood for over a decade so know it well.  My only worry is that Steef's place will be so popular it will be booked when we want to return!

Steef war sehr herzlich, hilfsbereit und jederzeit ansprechbar. Sehr schönes gediegenes Apartment in einem typischen Bedford-House mit viel Holz und einem tollen Fußboden. In der Umgebung gibt es sympathische kleine Restaurants und Supermarkets. Vertretbare Distanz zum Subway. Bis Penn-Station ca. 35-40 min.

Steef was wonderful.  He stayed up late to greet us, even though our flight was quite late, and helped us with our bags when we got to his brownstone.  His neighborhood is quaint, and his brownstone is even more beautiful than the photos show.  The neighborhood itself is quite walkable and is in an up and coming part of Brooklyn.

Steef's rental unit is air-conditioned, clean, comfortable, and spacious.  Well worth it for the price.  The neighborhood is quiet, and with bodegas nearby, convenient.  Steef leaves detailed instructions for everyone who stays at his place, and made us feel welcome and comfortable.  

Steef is a great guy, and made the whole check out process easy.  I would definitely stay here again the next time we are in New York.  Thank you so much Steef!
Steef is so kind that he provided all information we needed and the room is clean and comfortable. Would like to see thanks to him and his wife.

Vielen Dank Steef! Unser Aufenthalt bei Euch war vom Kennenlernen bis zum Ende ein sehr angenehmes Erlebnis. Das Apartment ist sehr schön und stilecht, für uns eine gute Alternative zu einem ****-Sterne-Hotel! Hinzu kommt die freundliche und hilfsbereite Art, mit der sich Steef um seine Gäste kümmert. Beim nächsten Besuch in NY wäre diese Adresse wieder unsere erste Wahl.

This flat is a lovely place to stay. Daniella was warm and accommodating. We plan to stay here again!

The Slussers

Estuvimos 15 días y lo pasamos muy bien!! Daniella y Steef son muy buenos anfitriones, simpáticos, amables, dispuestos a ayudarte en todo lo que necesites. Gracias a Anne (mamá de Daniella) que nos fue a recibir el sábado, después de que a último momento nos cambiaran el vuelo del avión y llegáramos antes de lo previsto. El departamento es muy cómodo, amplio, como se muestra en las fotos. El aire acondicionado y el refrigerador nos vino muy bien para aplacar el calor que hizo durante nuestra estadía. Nos gustó mucho el barrio y nos movilizamos muy bien en subte y colectivo. No tuvimos ningún inconveniente, si bien es cierto que no volvíamos de madrugada. Gracias Steef por alcanzarnos hasta el subte, las valijas estaban realmente pesadas!! De nuevo, gracias a los dos!! Esperamos volver!!
Helpful and friendly hosts. A comfortable and spacious apartment. An interesting and fun neighbourhood. Easy subway access to Manhattan.

Steef was a great host. Lovely guy who met us on arrival. Really helped us out on the last day which we were very greatful for. His apartment was really nice. A big open space accommodated us perfectly. The area had a nice coffee shop and Italian resturant right round the corner. A train station was a 10 minute walk that takes you straight into times square. Enjoyed our stay very much and highly recommended. Thanks steef. ☺

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour à New York.
L'appartement est très confortable, très joliment décoré. Le fait d'habiter Brooklyn nous a permis de découvrir la ville autrement, de voir autre chose que les buildings de Manhattan (que nous avons aussi admirés, bien sûr!
Steef et son épouse sont des hôtes parfaits: ils sont gentils, disponibles, bien organisés...... Et pleins d'humour!
Merci à eux. Nous avons fait, grâce à eux un super voyage!

The accommodation at Steef is very nice, there is everything you need, audio equipment cd available, make us feel like home. The apartment was very clean.
His welcome is warm and he takes the time to look after you, your advice on tours. The situation of the apartment is 8 minutes walk from the subway station Utica is on the blue line. It's very nice to walk there, I recommend the Brooklyn Bridge is not far away, a foot crossing to please the eye. Brooklyn is less known than Manathan but is probably quieter. I stayed three nights and it was very pleasant.
Thank you to Steef. :-))

This was our first experience using Airbnb and it exceeded our expectations. Steef made the experience very enjoyable. He came out and welcomed us when we arrived and was very helpful providing information about the local area as well as NYC. The apt was clean,  nicely furnished and comfortable. Steef was a great host and was always available when we had questions. It was comforting that Steef and his family lived in the building and was available if needed. His family was very quiet and we never knew they were there. We definitely would recommend Steef.

Steef is a great host and very personable. The apartment is clean and well decorated and the bed comfortable. He also provides a small kitchenette and good coffee! We would defintely stay there again.

We thoroughly enjoyed our 7 night stay in Steef's old brownstone home in Brooklyn.

Steef is a fantastic host, a clear communicator and eager to ensure you are comfortable and orientated to the neighbourhood.

While there is no kitchen there is a generous supply of basic catering items (mini fridge, coffee machine, jug and utensils).

The bathroom is large and spotlessly clean and is located  just outside the 3 rooms in the communal corridor of the house - but is solely for your use.

Steef and his family really do everything possible to ensure & protect your privacy during the stay.

The neighbourhood is quiet, safe and convenient. 2 subway stations are within walking distance and there are many convenience / deli stores close by and open until late.

Thank you Steef and family for a very enjoyable stay.

A highly recommended airbnb

Steef is an excellent host.  He made sure we were familiar with the neighborhood, suggesting local shopping and restaurants. He had a lots of New York information available including a subway map. He took the time to check in with us several times during our stay. Our parlour floor apartment was clean, comfortable and well equipped (as described in Steef's write up).  We also appreciated the character of his lovely home.  He was quick to respond with helpful information when we texted him.   It was fun feeling like we were part of a neighborhood.  We would definitely recommend Steef's apartment as a comfortable place to stay in a safe neighborhood.

We had a great time at Steef's place. He was a great host and everything was perfect. He offers lot of informations to his guests and is always there if you have a problem or a question. Next time we hope to stay again at Steef's apartment at Brooklyn.

We had a brilliant time at Steef's charming house.Inside it is full of wonderful character, snug and relaxed. The location is really convenient, close to three subway lines and with great restaurants nearby. Would recommend it to anyone.

Steef was a great host. Very friendly and welcoming. He was always on hand if we had any questions,  and checked up on us a few times in the week to let yous know if something was going on locally and to make sure we were ok. The flat is beautiful, really spacious and fantastically presented. The area is nice and quiet on a night as well.  Although there is no kitchen, we didn't find this a problem at all. It's new york! There's 1000s of places to choose from to eat, including a few great places 5 minutes walk from the front door. Steef did provide a coffee machine and tea making  facilities if you need a caffeine fix first thing! Would definatly recommend staying here.
Steef wachtte ons op. Het onthaal was hartelijk. We werden vlot wegwijs gemaakt in de flat en kregen ook wat info over hoe en waar wat te vinden in de omgeving.

Steef was a great host, and made us feel totally at home.  He was there to answer any questions we had, but didn't intrude at all.  The apartment was fantastic, really spacious and comfortable, and in a nice area with plenty of shops, bars and restaurants nearby, and the subway was only a few minutes walk away.
Steef was a great host! We were very happy with the experience. Anybody that wants to explore Brooklyn should consider his place.

Steef is a perfect host, very available, friendly and helpful. The apartment corresponds perfectly to the description. Spacious, elegant, comfortable, very good placed for visiting NY, absolutely recommended. Our stay was very nice in every respect.
Very large, clean, and comfortable. Steef was easy to communicate with and flexible with meeting us. Easy all around!

Great location for exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan is just a short commute away. Good neighbourhood restaurants and cocktail bar with great live music!  Apartment was well appointed and Steef was a wonderful host.

My friend and I had and incredible experience here! I highly recommend this Airbnb, and as my first time in NYC and using Airbnb, I can honestly say it was such an amazing experience. Steef is a really cool, friendly person who is very welcoming. If you have any questions about NYC he is the go to guy for that! He recommended some great restaurants around the place and we went to Tepache (a Mexican restaurant) and it was a great recommendation! He'll provide you a list of bars and restaurants to try and a map with which transits to take! The studio is a very charming place in a safe, quiet neighborhood not too far from everything! Williamsburg is maybe about 15 minutes away and Manhattan is just about 25 minutes away. Around 30 minutes away from JFK (by car). When I comeback to NYC I'll definitely be staying here again!  Thank you Steef :)

We had an excellent stay in Steef's super comfortable place.   Everything was perfect set up and we really enjoyed all of the cool architectural details in the guest space.  Place was super clean and location was perfect,  just a block or so to an excellent collection of delicious restaurants, pubs and a live music venue.  We always do Manhattan,  but so much cool stuff in Brooklyn including museums, botanical gardens, parks, eats and shops.    Ended up here for our entire stay! Can't wait to stay at Steef's place again!
Steef is one of the kindest most accommodating hosts we've ever had, and the apartment was incredibly tasteful and comfortable! Great location and a wonderful stay on all accounts.

We were very satisfied with our stay. Steef met us when we arrived and as we were leaving, and was a wonderful host. The parlor floor had old-world charm, and was very comfortable and private. There Bedford-Stuyvesant has a few really nice coffee shops and restaurants, but otherwise was mostly residential. Some of the areas on Fulton St were low-income, and that was where the nearest (A)/(C) train stops were. We recommend staying with Steef, but do your research regarding Brooklyn neighborhoods before you make your decision.

Steef is a perfect host, accommodating and very attentive to his guests’ needs. He met us upon our (late) arrival and explained us everything about the apartment, cafes and bars near by. The parlor apartment looks very authentic; it is tasteful, comfortable, quiet and situated in the very heart of a beautiful and safe brownstone neighborhood. On our next trip to New York, we will definetely stay here !

Een gastvrij ontvangst, een prachtige etage, volop privacy, veel nuttige informatie over de buurt.
Authentieke karakteristieke buurt met volop mogelijkheden voor boodschappen, ontbijt, lekker eten en uitgaan.
Wij zullen familie en vrienden zeker aanbevelen om deze airbnb in deze hippe buurt te boeken!

Steef was a great host. He responded immediately to all communications and checked in often before and during our stay to be sure all was well. He met us promptly as planned and made us feel very welcome.

Our stay with Steef was very comfortable. He is a gracious and helpful host. We had the whole second floor of his brownstone home, with a private bathroom. It was spacious and well equipped. The neighbourhood of Bed Stuy is safe and gentrifying, so we were able to eat at delicious restaurants and even found a coffee shop called Brunswick which is owned and run by a Melbournian. Steef's home is about a 10 minute walk to the station (Utica) from which you can take an express train to Manhattan. Thanks for your hospitality, Steef.

Steef was a warm, easygoing, flexible and gracious host.  We had a great chat when I arrived that made me feel very welcome. The guest floor is really lovely; a mix of interesting, salvaged moldings and fireplace mantels, all installed by Steef himself. The decor was a feast for the eyes - lots of interesting accents and objects.  Steef's attention to detail was evident throughout the visit - everything was in its place and every need met.  The accommodations were a perfect base for my visit to the area.  Thanks, Steef!

Steef was a gracious host, very accommodating to schedules and needs. The home is very comfortable and well appointed, with a nice, warm "feel".  I would not hesitate to stay with Steef and his family again.

Unser 4 tägiger Aufenthalt bei Steef hat uns wirklich sehr gut gefallen. Wir würden hier definitiv erneut bleiben und zur U-Bahn war es nur ein kurzer Fußweg von ca 5 - 10 Minuten. Von da aus mit der Express Linie war man in ca 28 Minuten direkt am central Park. 
Steef hat uns außerdem sehr viele Informationen gegeben wo man was finden kann und war auch sonst wenn man mal eine Frage hatte sehr hilfsbereit!

When I rate/review something for me it boils down to one question, Would I stay there again? that is a definite yes. The apartment is every bit as nice as shown in the pictures. Was very clean, and quiet. I liked the neighborhood, I checked out a few of the places Steef recommended, LunAtico is a neat bar, some interesting music going on the night I was there. Olivino (wine store) had a decent selection to chose from.  I highly recommend a fairly new French Restaurant just up the street a few blocks, L'Antagoniste, food was good and a very nice wine list

The apartment was clean and comfortable and just as described. Steef was a wonderful host, he met us at the door, showed us around the apartment and talked us through the maps and information he had compiled to help visitors to New York. He checked on us over the next few days to make sure we were ok. The location in Brooklyn suited us very well as we were able to take the subway back to a quiet haven after a day's sightseeing.

When my husband and I were selecting a room to stay in Brooklyn for a weekend we wanted a place centrally located to different things and well kept. Steef's one bedroom in his brownstone exceeded our expectations. The unit is beautifully decorated, very clean and only a ten minute walk to the A express line train.  Also, Steef was a great host by being available when we first arrived to give us the keys and to recommend some great restaurants in the area (e.g., Peaches and L'Antogoniste). The neighborhood is very charming with all types of places to eat within walking distance and safe, but still easy to travel to other parts of Brooklyn by Uber or cab. I highly recommend Steef's one bedroom for anyone looking to stay in Brooklyn and exploring that part of the City.

Steef greeted me the moment I got out of the cab and we went over everything I needed right away (and if he hadn't been around that day I'm sure he would have found a way to make the check-in go just as smoothly). 

The apartment was clean and just as described -- Steef's woodwork on the brownstone is even cooler in person. 
Everything I needed was available: empty dresser,  coffee maker, tea, mugs, plates, utensils, clean towels and bedding,  fridge, comfy furniture, etc. 

The building was quiet, comfortable, and when I'd see Steef or his wife around they were welcoming and generous. 

Great cafe's and restaurants in the neighborhood. Close to C train, which goes straight to Manhattan.

This is an excellent place to stay if you are in NY for few days .Steef and Daniella are excellent hosts and respond quickly to any requests .The rooms are spacious and tastefully decorated.The expectations are fully met as Steef clearly specifies what is included.
Recommended.

The apartment is exactly as pictured, very clean and comfortable.  It's situated walking distance to the A/C train and the J/Z which is a little longer walk.  Steef is very personable and responsive, going out of his way to be an welcoming host.  The coffee and umbrellas were very appreciated.  Thanks!

Thank you Steef for a wonderful stay in Brooklyn!  Really enjoyed meeting you and loved the suite of rooms!  

This is a great location, close to the subway for getting in to Manhattan but honestly the local neighbourhood has such great places like Saragina for pizza, all mentioned in the listing.  Don't miss the bar Lunantico, wish we'd gone there sooner. 

Highly recommended.

Steef was the perfect host. From pre-flight contact, to the day we left he was nothing but friendly and accommodating. He was always available for advice before/during the trip and happy to answer any questions. 

The Brownstone property was ideal for us and exactly as described. Away from tourist-mad Manhattan, this felt like experiencing a real NY neighbourhood. A short walk from the Subway, everyone we met was friendly and the locals bars, restaurants and shops were great!
The rooms in the apartment were spotless and modern whilst the vintage decor gave it such a great feel. Steef’s attention to detail has to be admired and we were still spotting his little touches in the room on the day we left!

I would recommend this property to anyone staying in New York. Why pay crazy Manhattan prices for an average hotel room (which I’ve done in the past) when you can make your whole trip a better experience?!

Thanks Steef, hopefully we’ll make it back to NY, you’re beautiful home and expertly painted hand rails soon!

I had a perfect stay with Steef at his beautiful Bed-Stuy apartment. He is a welcoming and accommodating host, responding to all my questions quickly and helpfully, and checking in to make sure everything was going well. The space itself was very clean and comfortable, with everything I could need for a 5 day stay. Beautiful listing, friendly host, and a great neighbourhood -- I highly recommend staying with Steef if you have the opportunity!

From the very first corresponence, Steef was very helpful and timely.  His brownstone was impeccably clean. The location was a short walk to the subway and we greatly enjoyed the eclectic  neighborhood. All of Steef's suggestions (restaurants, wine store, attractions, transportation) were accurate, appropriate and appreciated! This was our first Airbnb experience and we will definitely travel this way again.
Steef was very nice and welcoming but arrival was puzzling since he did not send info that there was no doorbell and we were to text him on arrival.

We enjoyed our stay very much! Clean place, the bathroom was very nice! Steef was very helpful and answered any questions we had. Explained how the subway system works and gave ideas on places to eat. We mostly ate in Manhattan tho, lots and lots of places to choose from. I would for sure stay here again if I ever go back to the very populated New York!

Hallo Steef, 
We hebben erg genoten van jullie airbnb tijdens onze stedentrip naar New York! We zijn goed ontvangen en voelden ons snel thuis. Het appartement is net verzorgd en ruim van opzet. Het was ook fijn om 's morgens zelf een potje koffie te kunnen zetten. Met de Subway in de buurt waren we rond de 20 min in Manhattan. We hebben lekker gegeten bij de Mexicaan om de hoek en t restaurant Saraghina. We vonden het gezellig om af en toe een praatje met je te maken op t stoepje en kunnen jullie airbnb zeker aanbevelen.
Groetjes en wie weet tot ziens! 
Agnes en Maurice

Exactly as described; a really nice place with lots of original features and interesting artifacts. Comfortable bed, quiet area, with some nice neighborhood restaurants round the corner. Nice hi-fi too :-) Steef was a very welcoming and helpful host too, I'd definitely stay here again.

De verhuurder, Steef, een zeer plezierige, betrokken en open persoonlijkheid heeft er alles aan gedaan om het ons naar de zin te maken. Hij kwam regelmatig vragen of alles naar wens was, kwam spontaan met tips en was heel goed en snel te bereiken. Bij een volgend bezoek aan New York zullen we graag weer van zijn gastvrijheid gebruik maken.

Geweldige tijd gehad in Brooklyn. Iedere dag rustig opstarten in het appartement voordat we naar de stad vertrokken. Steef heeft ons de eerste dagen goed op weg geholpen en we kregen van hem veel goede tips over de stad.  perfecte plek om vanuit deze locatie Manhattan te bezoeken, met de metro ben je binnen een kwartier in hartje New york. Appartement ligt in een gezellige buurt met winkels en restaurantjes op loopafstand. Bedankt voor jullie gastvrijheid en tot een volgende keer.
Steef is a really great host. He helps you to get to the accommodation and then gives great tips about where to go and what to do once you are there. He is available to answer questions and help out.
Thank you so much for a great stay! I have no complaints! It was exactly as described and as I hoped. Thanks Steef!

I cannot say enough good things about this place and the host. We had an incredible stay, and I highly HIGHLY recommend it! We had a couple bumps in our trip, and Steef was friendly, welcoming, and very gracious. It was so nice to see a friendly face after a long day of traveling! One of our days in Brooklyn it rained. As we were leaving to venture out into the city, Steef left a note on the front door saying please take an umbrella with a bunch of different umbrellas for us to use. 

It was very easy to navigate the train, and the ride in and out of manhattan wasn't a big deal at all.

If you are headed to NYC, and are looking for a place to stay! Stay here. It was affordable, charming, clean, and comfortable. Very impressed, and we will be back!

Steef (geboren Nederlander) heeft ons super ontvangen. Heel attent een parkeerplaats vrij gehouden en goeie intro in huis en buurt en hoe je makkelijk de stad in gaat.
Tijdens verblijf was het makkelijk communiceren via berichten maar verder goed privé.
Bij vertrek heeft Steef ons weer ontzettend geholpen door ons met de auto naar de metro te brengen.
Super tijd gehad!
This is a great space and certainly was convenient for visiting our family.  We would definitely come back (and intend to do so).
The apartment is as described.  Super clean, nicely furnished.  Steef is a great host. Very nice and helpful.
Steef has a warm, inviting space. His description is accurate and his communication is excellent. Great value.

My partner and I had a great Christmas/New Years break at Steef's place. Since we stayed for over a week, it was nice to have a spacious, private place to relax, while it was also easy to take the subway into Manhattan to do the tourist things. The apartment was spotless and just like the description.
We also liked the neighborhood, which was quiet but still had some nice places to eat or drink (we especially enjoyed the Mexican restaurant just around the corner). We woke up a couple of times from the firetrucks that passed the house from the fire station that is situated in the same street, but it was usually not a problem. 
Steef was a great host, easy to communicate with and accomodating. I would reccomend this place to anyone!
Steef was the BEST host. Very considered and helpfull. Thanks for everything. We Hope to see you soon

What a beautiful brownstone home, located right in the heart of Brooklyn. Peaches HotHouse has the best brunch ever and is in walking distance. The Brooklyn Museum is nearby, at Prospect Park, and is a jewel. Steff was a great host and made it an easy, cozy stay. (And the umbrellas were very appreciated!) Great visit!

We booked this place for my parents to stay in while visiting us in Brooklyn. It's an amazing flat- super comfortable and super clean. Really nice bed too. Steef was an incredible host. Very communicative and welcoming towards both me and my parents. My folks want to stay here every time they visit.

Si vous aimez le calme 
Si vous voulez être dans un quartier typique de New-York
Avoir un hôte accueillant et disponible 
C'est la bonne adresse

Steef é um excelente hoster. Nos deixou muito confortáveis, nos sentimos como se estivéssemos em casa. No primeiro dia, minha namorada esqueceu a bolsa no banco de trás do Taxi e Steef prontamente nos ajudou, fez ligações e nos instruiu como proceder. O motorista do taxi voltou dentro de 2 horas para devolver a bolsa. Ambos salvaram nossa viagem a NYC.

A vizinhança é quieta, muito segura e respeitosa. Perto da casa do Steef tem pequenos mercados e locais para comer. O metrô não fica longe, 10 minutos de caminhada (aproximadamente 6 quarteirões)e liga diretamente a Manhattan. Uma viagem a Times Square, por exemplo, demorará entre 30 a 40min. Se você vai visitar Nova York, a casa do Steef é altamente recomendável. Foi um imenso prazer.
A great place to stay in Brooklyn and an awesome host!

A great Brownstone home with lots of character and decor located in 'Bed-Stuy', Brooklyn. Close to C train to get to and from Manhattan and close to bus lines to go around Brooklyn. Lots of coffee shops and local restaurants close by.  Steef was a great host, who was always available to answer any questions.
The place is comfortable and aesthetically pleasing. Steef is an excellent communicator and gracious host. Airb&b at its best!

L'appartement est spacieux et place dans un quartier typique de New York, il faut compter une bonne demi heure de metro pour se rendre a Manhattan, Stef est une proprietaire attentionne et tres agreable.

This is such a great place, in a great neighborhood and Steef was a fantastic host! Highly recommended! Super comfortable space and beautiful decor. Probably one of my all time favorite Airbnb experiences!

We would give more than 5 stars if we could! It was so comfortable, cozy and beautiful. We had as much privacy as we wanted, but Steef was also very accessible and helpful with questions. I tend to be particular about things like bedding, and the sheets were crisp and fresh and the bed comfortable. The woodwork was beautiful and we loved the interesting finds that were used to decorate the rooms. Plenty of drawers if you don't want to live out of your suitcase, and all the amenities needed, from an iron and ironing board to a coffee maker to extra lotion and shampoo. The location was perfect for us - an easy walk to subway stops, and a variety of good local restaurants nearby. I hope to be back!
Had a great stay here for the weekend! We used a combination of public transit, citi bikes and Uber to get around to Manhattan and Williamsburg to get to some places we wanted to see on our trip.
Steef was a great host! We enjoyed walking around the neighborhood and visiting local restaurants and shops. Subway is a short walk - easy to get around. Would stay here again.
Beautifully furnished, clean, updated interiors.
Couldn't be better! We loved everything about our stay and Steef was super nice. Comfortable, cozy and beautiful.

I had a perfect stay. The space was clean, spacious, and private. Also located in my favorite Brooklyn neighborhood. I hope to book again in the near future.

Thank you!
CP

Steef was a wonderful host, his responses to my questions were quick. The place was clean and perfect for couples. It is really close to public transportation so it was really convenient. All in all I would definitely stay here again if I was in the area.

Excellent place even more than expected. Steef was there when I check in and out( even it was 6;50 AM during my check out). The apartment well decorated, super clean and very confortable. I enjoyed the area. One day I arrived in the middle of the night around 12:45 AM and it was very safe( I walked from the subway station to Steer place). I recommend Steef apartment. Thank you for all
Comfortable, clean and spacious. Fabulous relaxing vibe and lovely decor. A great place to explore the city from, in a vibrant neighbourhood. Host is very friendly and helpful.

Steef has created a beautiful peaceful environment for his guests. We could have just stayed in apartment the whole time it was so lovely. We are glad we did go out and explore the neighborhood there are so many great places to eat and drink and listen to great music.  This was a stop for us on way home from Paris.  The next time it will be the destination.
Praktische  plek veel info schoon en mooi appartement. Prettige sfeer,dichtbij  Subway. Veel restaurants  en bars.
Beautiful, convenient, and quintessentially New York.
Wir konnten in der Unterkunft gut vom Trubel der Stadt abschalten. Steef war freundlich und hilfsbereit zu jeder Zeit!

Steef was a great host. He was communicative and generously worked around my schedule. I was able to check in a bit early and store my bags after check out. I enjoyed the neighborhood. There were many great places to eat and drink--some a few blocks away, others withing a 20 min walk. This a great place to stay on a weekend when you have the leisure of making your own schedule and moving at your own pace. The location is not particularly close to Manhattan or other neighborhoods in Brooklyn but that was just fine for my stay. With cabs and ride sharing it was easy to get around.
Steef has an incredible haven that is convenient and well designed. He was very thoughtful and everything a traveler could appreciate from a host.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!  Steef was a wonderful host, providing great advice and information.  As we were both new to the area, and to the subway system, the maps were really helpful.  I already miss the morning walk to the Saraghina Bakery for a delicious pastry on our way to the subway for more adventures throughout Manhattan.  The location was great, and the place itself was well furnished and decorated, clean and lovely.  I highly recommend a stay here!

Steef's place was clean, comfy and a great base to explore Brooklyn.  Steef gave us recommendations for neighborhood restaurants, and we could explore the Brooklyn Botanic Garden and the Brooklyn Musuem, Williamsburg and get into Manhattan easily on the subway.  He's a very friendly host!

We appreciated a lot our stay to "Brownstone Parlor Floor Guest Suite".
The accommodation is completely in accordance with the description and with the photos; it's very well decorated and very clean; it has a real independent access.
Steef is a very nice and very thoughtful host.
He is really eager to facilitate the stay of the visitors. His advices are very informed.
An address which we recommend gladly.

Io e mia moglie abbiamo passato una splendida settimana a novembre  a N.Y grazie anche alla casa di Steef, spaziosa, molto carina, ben arredata ed accessoriata, calda e pulitissima. Non è attrezzata per cucinare, ma ha uno spazio/armadio con un minifrigo e la macchina  per preparare bevande calde. Anche i dintorni sono piacevoli e tranquilli, con diversi locali interessanti per cenare o ascoltare musica. Steef è veramente un ospite gentile, disponibile , pieno di attenzioni e facilmente raggiungibile per ogni comunicazione. Sicuramente ci tornerei nel caso di una prossima visita a N.Y.
Great location, great Host!
Ciao Steef! Thanks a lot!

Steef was great - very happy and welcoming to his home. The space is a separate 'apartment' but with no kitchen facilities as described. However there is a wonderful cupboard full of coffee and tea making facilities, including a fridge containing different types of milk. This was a nice treat when waking up on a Saturday morning. The style is very nice, old, classic town house / brownstone. Very warm and cosy, large living space with classic touches.

Prompt checkin/easy checkout. Good communication. Would stay there again.

Amazing space with lots of room and great amenities. Steef was available for questions but the space is also incredibly private. We were in NYC for work so we didn't get a lot of time to explore the neighborhood, but there are some nice haunts nearby and Steef had great recommendations. The subway is a short walk away. Great value for the price and just a lovely, lovely place to hang your hat in Brooklyn.

Super cosy, quiet, and very comfortable studio within Steef and his family's gorgeous townhouse. Highly recommend for anyone spending a few days in New York City. Steef is a great host and his flexibility was really appreciated.

Had a great stay at Steef's. The home is located in a nice area with many restaurants around and in between a few metro stations. Check in and out was really smooth and Steef made sure to check in with us ensuring that we had everything that we needed.

Het appartement van Steef ligt in een interessante buurt van Brooklyn, waar net de leuke restaurants en winkeltjes opkomen. Tien minuten lopen van de metro. drie kwartier naar Midtown Manhattan. Om de hoek ligt de bar Lunatico waar je elke avond leuke bandjes tegen kunt komen, in ons geval toevallig Norah Jones...:-) Het appartement is gezellig en alles is er, tot een strijkplank aan toe. Steef is erg attent en flexibel, we voelden ons thuis en komen zeker terug.

Steef is a wonderful host. Great location and wonderful accommodations. If you are heading to Brooklyn this is a great place to stay. Close to subway and several good restaurants. Steef is very welcoming and a super nice guy....

We were very impressed with the apartment. It is a large space (a living area and a bedroom separated by a curtain with lots of unique interesting “stuff” including a number of antique musical instruments. It was remarkably clean  and well located in an interesting neighbourhood with lots of amenities nearby. It is obvious that 
Steef really cares about his home including this apartment and has invested much in its restoration to its historical character. I

A classic Brooklyn brownstone, so well appointed and beautifully maintained. Very peaceful and yet within walking distance of excellent restaurants, bakeries, wine bars and transportation. Steef is the consummate host!

Amazing apartment and a fantastic host. A real credit to how Air bnb's should be. Cosy, friendly and gave a genuine authentic experience to staying in Brooklyn. Great access to Manhattan via the subway and a bunch of nice restaurants near by. Apartment is exactly how described and very homely. Would definately recommend to anyone who loves air BnB or wants a great experience.

This is an amazing place in a beautiful setting, so well designed and really well laid out. The neighbourhood is awesome, the people are terrific. I really appreciated the privacy I was afforded but also Steef was on standby if you needed anything. Its a great and wondrous place and I was very happy there.

We had a really wonderful time staying with Steef on our recent trip to Brooklyn! The space is absolutely beautiful, the location is great, and he is a warm and generous host. We can't wait to go back!
Wonderful stay, would absolutely come back!
Was really impressed by this AirBnb! Spacious and super comfortable -- one of the best that I've stayed in.

Steef is an excellent host (friendly and helpful and answering communications immediately). His home is an amazing place to stay in New York. Bed-Stuy has long been my favorite area to stay when I visit New York (and the neighborhood gets better all the time) and Steef’s home is a great location (close to excellent cafes and to the subway). The interior is among the most pleasant and attractive I have stayed in. Guest have the whole parlor floor in this elegant brownstone with lots of light and wonderful aesthetics. It is comfortable, spacious, and decorated with a pleasantly hip eclectic sensibility. I highly recommend this apartment.

Steef really deserve his Superhost title.  He was really responsive to all our requests and he is so welcoming.  We had a wonderful stay! We visited Brooklyn and NYC by bike and have really appreciated the neighborhood. If we ever go back to Brooklyn in a near future, we will definitely contact him!  We will talk to our friends about him and his place!

What a lovely place to use as home base during our six-day trip to NYC.  Steef was incredibly hospitable and provided a wonderful space for us to relax and refresh from our tromping about the City.  Every little touch spoke of a world-class host and the space, itself, was beautiful.  Loved the big bathroom!  We will definitely come back to Brooklyn and this AirBnB!!

A fantastic place to stay. 

A beautifully and lovingly restored brownstone Brooklyn property. 

Close to manhattan on the subway and some great bars/cafes/restaurants near to the property. 

All in all a great stay and can’t recommend highly enough. Thanks again Steef!
Wonderful stay in a great neighbourhood!

My firt criteria when I choose a airbnb I look for a clean place and a comfortable bed ! Well this place has both and it was very high standard bed !!!! Almost more comfortable than home :) 
Then everything else was there : easyness to get to manhatan, hospitality, advices, functionality,.... I will come back for my next trip to NYC, and will advise this place to my friends !

We had a perfect airbnb experience at Steef’s place!  Great communication, very nice place super close to our kid in Brooklyn, and conveniently located within walking distance of some very good restaurants (e.g. Roberta’s Pizza has earned its rep).  We will definitely stay with Steef again if we come back to Brooklyn!
Great place, great host, will return!

Steef est vraiment un hôte super sympa, très à l'écoute et d'une efficacité exceptionnelle pour répondre à nos questions et à nos exigences. Le lit est super comfortable, la rue calme et l'on se sent comme chez soi dans cette maison. Seul petit bémol (qui ne nous a pas dérangé car nous sommes restés 6 nuits), c'est un peu loin de New York ( une bonne demie heure en métro), mais nous étions ravis de sortir de New York pour dormir et être dans un quartier authentique de Brooklyn sans touristes !!!! En plus, excellent restaurant italien à 3 minutes à pied !!

Steef’s apartment in Brooklyn is great! Good lcation, nice and helpful host, easy to get to subway, restaurants nearby. A very nicely decorated and comfortable apartment. Can recommend this apartment to everyone!
Lovely place and a very friendly welcome. Great local tips (the pizza place is so good).

My mother stayed at Steef's place during a brief visit to my neighborhood. She can be picky, but was very comfortable and had no complaints. For her standards, that's the equivalent to a five-star review. Steef was super friendly and helpful. Would absolutely recommend to future guests.

Steef is a great host, and his place is accurately described in the posting.  Anytime I stay in NYC in the summer months I worry about the AC unit.  Steef's works great and the place can be nice adn cool.

Would definitely stay there again when I return to NYC!
Steef was a great host. His home is in a nice Brooklyn neighborhood full of restaurants and close to a subway station. Would highly recommend it to anyone interested in seeing another side of NYC.
Great place, great neighbourhood!
Beautiful, immaculate place to stay in a fun Brooklyn neighbourhood - Steef is a very friendly responsive and helpful host

Steef has a wonderful place to stay for work. After a long day at work, it was nice to come here to rest and relax. There are many good restaurants to walk to and eat at. Plus, Steef's place has many nice touches, chairs and a comfortable bed.

Last but not least, Steef really is a super host. He greeted me when I arrived, walked me through the place and he really made me feel at home. 

I highly recommend staying here and I will stay here again.

The place is very charming and in a good location.  Steef was a great host and is on the premises.  He met us there more than 3 hours late as our flight was delayed.  He was very helpful and responded quickly to anything that we needed.
Steef is a great host! Everything was as described and very clean!
Steef’s place has become our home away from home every time we visit NY. Great neighborhood and great convos with Steef.

Well decorated, cozy bed, very clean and very hospitable host! We had a wonderful time enjoying the local restaurants in the neighborhood as well as the close subway station making day trips into the city a breeze. Steef was very accommodating from the moment my fiancé and I landed at JFK. Would love to come back and spend more time here. Cheers

ﾆｭｰﾖｰｸの中心地から電車で30分､徒歩10分ほどのところにあります｡

ﾌﾞﾙｯｸﾘﾝの町並みも感じられるし､ﾚﾄﾛな家具や現地の住居を経験することができ､広々としていて､とても良かったです｡

飛行機の関係でﾁｪｯｸｲﾝが夜11時頃になりましたが､丁寧にお出迎えしていただけました｡
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの際10分ほど設備や鍵の説明を受けました｡
そのあとはﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄまでﾎｽﾄと顔を合わせることはなかったので､気楽に過ごせました｡
ｺﾝｾﾝﾄもいろんなところにあったので､過ごしやすかったです｡

ﾒｯｾｰｼﾞの返信がとても早いので､困ったことがあったときにすぐ解決できて助かりました｡

部屋には地下鉄の路線図や､最寄り駅付近のﾏｯﾌﾟなどの案内が多数置いてあり､助かりました｡

ｼｬﾜｰのお湯もしっかり出ます｡
ﾄﾞﾗｲﾔｰも風量ばっちしです｡
布団もふかふかで気持ち良い｡
Excellent flat in a cool neighborhood, close to subway stop and good restaurants.  Steef met us as we arrived and made us feel very much at home.
Comfortable and spacious accommodation
Great stay here, everything was clean and as described, Steef was very helpful and accommodating.

Great place, we really loved our stay. Steef was so helpful and always available if we needed anything. Everything was exactly as described, very clean and stylish. We really loved it! It’s very close to the subway which was super handy!  Thanks for a great stay! :)

Het appartement is precies zoals omschreven, het is ruim en schoon en een goede ligging t.o.v. de metro. In de buurt genoeg voorzieningen om te eten en voor eventuele boodschappen. 
Steef geeft goede informatie en in het appartement ligt voldoende toeristische informatie. 
Voor een volgende keer New York gaan we zeker hier weer naar toe.
Steef dank voor deze prima week in jullie appartement en tot ziens.
Groeten Frank en Nel

Large room, quiet area conveniently located to the subway for the express 'A' train into Manhattan and JFK, with bakery, restaurant and bar nearby. Steef was very helpful with suggestions and flexible with check in and out. Highly recommended!

Steef is a fantastic host. He even saved parking for us in front of the building. The apartment is beautiful, very clean, with lots of unique international touches. Close to several very good restaurants, a short walk from the subway. Very quiet neighborhood at night.

A brownstone haven after the crush, crowds and chaos of a day in Manhattan! Steef is the perfect host and this lovely, comfortable apartment is a great place to use as a home base. The local area has some fantastic places to eat and drink, our favourite being Zacas for delicious, healthy food and a great relaxed atmosphere. 
My partner and I aren't fans of big cities and crowded restaurants, so the Brooklyn area was perfect for us.
Steef went out of his way to help us whenever we needed assistance or advice. A great host!
Nice place, good host, good location, stores and restaurants nearby.

Excellent apartment with a great host. Absolutely as advertised, very clean and tidy, and great communication with Steef throughout. Really helpful recommendations for the local area. Would definitely visit again.

Steef's place is spacious, comfortable and sparkling clean. Steef is very friendly and accommodating. He was gracious enough to let us check in early and encouraged us to stay longer than the usual checkout, as we had a later flight.
We had everything we needed and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended

What a cozy spot to stay in Brooklyn! Steef was a great host and we really enjoyed our stay. The neighborhood was very walkable and close to some great restaurants and cafes. Despite the other levels of the house being occupied we did not hear a peep the whole weekend and felt like we had the place to ourselves. Would definitely stay again!
Great, unique space in an eclectic, quiet part of town.  Be sure to walk to Lunatica for the live music and excellent beef tartare.  Thanks Steef!
Steef’s place is super nice and clean and he’s very hospitable. My mom stayed here while she was in town and really liked it.

If anyone stays at Steef's , it's truly a quaint and elegant place to visit!  Nice to get to explore Brooklyn and Manhattan all in one visit!!  You have your own private bath, a tv to watch, wifi connections , and the Subway connection to Manhattan is only a few blocks away.  I'm not easy to  please when it comes cleanliness and privacy...Nice place!
Great place to stay clean very efficient.

We stayed at Steef's place in Bed-Stuy for 6 nights and it was everything we wanted it to be.  Steef is a great host - lots of advice for places eat and things to do and always available if we needed him.  The space itself is absolutely beautiful - roomy, clean and full of interesting decorative items.  The bed is super comfy and the bathroom was great (lovely shower!).  The location is awesome - 10 mins maximum walk to a few different subway stations and the choice of local or express trains to Manhattan.  The local area is eclectic and beautiful - a welcome respite after a busy day.  Plenty of bars/restaurants/wine shops and Delis everywhere.  Our favourite breakfast spot, Manny's, is a 10 min walk and they also have a great Wine shop with friendly staff.  We honestly can't wait to return!

This was one of our most outstanding Airbnb experiences! Steef is a great host who welcomed us warmly into a homely environment but also respected our privacy. The place has character and is comfortable and very clean. I recommend the location in its own right, not just for its proximity to Manhattan. This is the kind of experience that makes  airbnb preferable over a hotel!
Great host, great location, great apartment!

we would thoroughly recommend you stay here if you want to experience the true Brownstone building experience, the host was welcoming, unobtrusive and on hand if need be , the apartment was warm and well equipped , 10 min walk from 2 stations so very quick in to Manhattan and plenty of amenities nearby should you want to eat out or grab food to go five star all the way

Wonderful stay! Steef is a terrific host and so incredibly prompt with communication! His home was so inviting and made for a perfect spot to unwind from long days of working. Could not have asked for better accommodations and hope to return again!
Great place to stay! Not far from all the cool spots Brooklyn has to offer.

The Central – Mid-Levels Escalator system, is the world's longest outdoor covered escalator system, stretching for over 800-metres and rising 135-metres through the streets of a steep hillside linking these districts of Hong Kong Island.
