house_rules: Com educação e discrição. Não é permitido fumar Não recebemos animais de estimação  Respeita regra do silêncio

name: Cedar Loft with Private Hot Tub
summary: Perfect for a couple. It can accommodate up to two adults and two children. Spacious two-bed redwood & cedar studio loft with private entrance, private outdoor patio & private stargazing hot tub spa, surrounded by organic bamboos, palm and fruit trees. Conveniently located in Hawi Town.
space: This exquisite cedar and redwood loft  has a large sliding window facing south and is surrounded by  organic bamboos, palm trees and fruit trees. Separate from the main house  with  its own private entrance, private outdoor patio dining area and private stargazing hot tub spa.  It features a very spacious 600 s.f. solid oak hardwood floor  with very high ceiling and  a ultra comfortable queen bed downstairs and a loft sleeping area (5 feet high clearance) with a comfortable queen bed;  A perfect location only 1/2 mile from the Coffee Mill, Sweet Potato Kitchen, Bamboo and Sushi Rock restaurants and just a short drive to most beautiful white beaches Hapuna Beach and gorgeous Kauna'oa Beach. The Loft is completely insulated with double walls and double pane storm windows for noise suppression and temperature control.  Eight  high ceiling surrounding windows and large dual fans are designed to  provide natural air conditioning.  The bed downstairs has a queen size Posturepedic mattress. T
description: Perfect for a couple. It can accommodate up to two adults and two children. Spacious two-bed redwood & cedar studio loft with private entrance, private outdoor patio & private stargazing hot tub spa, surrounded by organic bamboos, palm and fruit trees. Conveniently located in Hawi Town. This exquisite cedar and redwood loft  has a large sliding window facing south and is surrounded by  organic bamboos, palm trees and fruit trees. Separate from the main house  with  its own private entrance, private outdoor patio dining area and private stargazing hot tub spa.  It features a very spacious 600 s.f. solid oak hardwood floor  with very high ceiling and  a ultra comfortable queen bed downstairs and a loft sleeping area (5 feet high clearance) with a comfortable queen bed;  A perfect location only 1/2 mile from the Coffee Mill, Sweet Potato Kitchen, Bamboo and Sushi Rock restaurants and just a short drive to most beautiful white beaches Hapuna Beach and gorgeous Kauna'oa Beach. The Loft is c
neighborhood_overview: Hawi Town is located on the north shore of the Big Island of Hawaii between heaven and earth.  This is the most historical place in Hawaii facing the island of Maui with moderate weather and soothing trade winds.  Hawi Town has great restaurants and boutique shops which showcase local artists creations. Scenic sites close by include  famous Pololu valley with spectacular views of the Big Island's north coast and black sands beach, with great hiking trails.. King Kamehameha the Great's birth place and the Mo'okini Heiau oldest Hawaiian temple along the coastline with gorgeous hikes and views of Maui Haleakala volcano. Go for an amazing snorkel at Mahukona and explore the coral reef 10 minutes away,  snorkel or scuba dive with turtles in Puako , swim with wild spinner dolphins in Ho'okena, watch the whales crossing the Maui channel just a few miles away (between December and April), go for the boogie boarding of a life time at Hawaii's most beautiful Hapuna Beach nearby or leisure on the
notes: Hawaii Occupancy Tax of (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) %  and Sales Excise Tax of 4 % are included. A $85 cleaning fee is added to your bill. The Cedar House Loft is insured by Tudor Insurance and Lloyds of London up to one million dollar in liability and property damages.   Hawaii Tax ID W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) nce (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: A regular rental car will get you to most places. But the best way to explore the Big Island from Waipio Valley to the top of the Mauna Kea Volcano is to rent a Four Wheel Drive. There is  public transportation  but the schedules are limited.
access: A drip coffee machine, a French press, a coffee grinder, a tea kettle and  a blender are provided. The kitchen is equipped with all your basic cooking and service needs. Complimentary organic soap, shampoo and body lotion provided. Beach accessories, boogie board, beach chairs, umbrella, cooler and towels are also available for guest use. Sorry, no wheelchair access.
interaction: We respect our guests privacy but we  are available in case of emergency and to answer questions, give directions and tips to local sites and restaurants if needed.  Have a great stay! Aloha.
house_rules: NON SMOKING HOUSE:  Do not leave household property unattended outside of the home.  Secure all windows and doors when home is unoccupied. Please do not move furnitures around the house. Septic system requires only waste and waste paper be flushed. DO NOT flush any feminine products, paper towels, feminine or baby wipes, etc. HOT TUB SPA: We invite you to relax and enjoy the hot tub. Secure the cover over the hot tub by snapping it down on the sides. Lock the cover with key if children under 12 years old are present. Please do not add any type of soap products to the water. Wash your feet off sand or soil before entering the tub. Refrain from using perfume, essential oils or sun tan lotion in the spa. Do not bring alcoholic beverages or glass container in the tub. No children under the age of 12 permitted in hot tub at any time. Teenagers under the age of 18 allowed under supervision. The American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists (ACOG) state that becoming overheated in a hot

host.host_about: We have been living in the Hawaiian islands since 1997 and we have made Hawi our home in 2001. We like outdoor living, yoga, hiking, open ocean swimming and organic gardening.

reviews.comments: Jon and Jan are great hosts, they are very warm and personable and gave us tips on all the best local sites and restaurants. We really loved our stay in the loft, it was very clean, quiet and relaxing. The open design was so comfortable with great light and air flow and the kitchen was well stocked with all our cooking needs. We really enjoyed the complimentary coffee outside on the patio surrounded by bamboos and fruit trees. It was so great to have nature all around us, but still so close to charming town of Hawi with all the shops and great dining places. We will recommend the "Beautiful Cedar House Loft" to friends and family and would love to stay there again.

great place to stay while exploring the North Shore of Hawaii Big Island. Conveniently located at the entrance of Hawi Town.  The Loft was very clean, spacious and well stocked. The hosts were friendly and made us feel like home. We would recommend this place for anyone looking for a comfortable and rewarding experience.  Thank you for a memorable stay in North Kohala. We will definitely come back at the Cedar House Loft.

Beautiful place

Jan and Jon are very gracious and welcoming.  The space is very comfortable, nice bed in the loft.  Neighborhood is fine, it's right on the main hiway to town.  Some traffic noise.  Some refrigerator noise also in this small space.  A great place to stay, close to town and all the amenities.  We enjoyed it so much.  Would definitely stay here again.

Staying at Jan and Jon's was a pleasure! The flat was clean and very comfortable. The location is perfect. Right down the street from some delicious restaurants in Hawi and a short drive from a handful of beautiful beaches and hiking paths. Would definitely recommend!

Jon and Jan were wonderful.  They were easy to get a hold of, responded promptly to email and calls and were very charming in person.  The loft was in their backyard but felt very private.  It was bright and clean and had great amenities (washer/dryer, smart tv,).  We would stay here again!

We didn't have the pleasure of meeting Jon but Jan made us feel incredibly welcome. The loft was very inviting and a wonderful home base to explore the northern end of the Big Island. Comfy bed and a nice kitchen. Having Netflix on the TV to watch at night was a nice touch. My wife and I fell for the town of Hawi, good food, friendly people, and a beautiful landscape.

Jan and Jon are kind and intelligent people. Their consideration for their guests is reflected in the amenities they provide - the towels and linen are first rate; the washer and dryer are modern, high-end and efficient; the dishes, flatware, kitchen utensils, cookware, and appliances are complete, making meal preparation easy; a blow dryer, beach gear, iron/ironing board and more are provided - they've thought of everything! The Beautiful Cedar House Loft is meticulously clean and furnished with a lovely amoire, couch, entertainment center (smart tv with accesss to Netflix), very comfortable beds and a breakfast bar. The layout is well designed to provide maximum light, ventilation, storage, openness and privacy. The location - rural, yet only a 10 minute walk to the center of Hawi - is ideal for visits to the northeastern, northern and western areas and coast of the Big Island. Groceries, great restaurants, galleries/shops, hiking, beaches, spectacular views and historic sites are close at hand. The stars in the night sky viewed from the backyard on a clear night are incredible! Both Jan and Jon have detailed knowledge of the area's best attractions,  how to get there and when to go. They are diligent,  quiet people who are nearby when needed and excellent to communicate with! Pleasant and genuine, we found them to be ideal hosts. Their description of the accommodations and conditions is accurate. We found our visit to be a remarkable experience and value - we look forward to returning.

Jan and Jon are great hosts! Jan welcomed us to her spacious loft and told us all about the area. Jon too was very attentive, giving us great tips on local beaches and cool places to explore. They're lovely and the loft is very comfortable. We would stay there again without hesitation.

We were greeted warmly by Jon and made sure we had everything we needed.  After giving us a freshly picked coconut he gave us maps and lots of information about nearby things to do and must see places.  It's location was central for seeing the north coast. We found Spencer and Hapuna beaches perfect for family outings.  Nearby Bamboo restaurant was a favorite. We loved the quiet surroundings of Havi and would definitely go back again.
The home was exactly as described and pictured. It had a fully stocked kitchen, including freshly ground coffee. A perfect size for 3 to 4 people.  There were beach chairs and boogie board available.
The country road leading to the property is perfect for car travel, not so much for walking as there aren't sidewalks. The setting is gorgeous and private, with owners in close proximity.  It's best to let the owners know beforehand if you have small children so they can prepare accordingly.  
Afer we left the Beautiful Cedar House, we stayed in a cottage in Volcano, a hotel in Hilo and a resort in Kona.  My 4 year old grandson wanted to know why we couldn't go back to the first big house. It was his vacation favorite!

Our hosts Jon and Jan were wonderful! Being newly-weds they made us feel like part of their family. They brought us gifts of coconuts and lemons and even had a box of mocha ice cream in the freezer for us.
They gave us directions to secret spots of their section of the island and told us where to go for a romantic moonrise picnic. Then they left us alone for the rest of our stay and gave us a great send off when we turned in the key. They have been the best hosts at any rental we have ever had. Wonderful people!
The Loft was clean and tidy and very comfortable. Its well insulated, has a great little kitchenette and bathroom. Wonderful location and the loft bed was a great experience. Very comfortable. We loved it and highly recommend! North Kohala is such a wonderful place. You wont be disappointed with this place!

The cedar house loft was a great getaway. It is attached to the main house (separate entrance, not connected inside) with another rental guest house further back. Jan and Jon were great hosts, providing timely contact ahead of arrival, and guides to the north side of the island. Not unusual, the house is shoes-off inside. The loft itself has a ceiling clearance of about 5.5 feet, which Jon cautions guests about. It is quiet, though sound can carry inside and out if the windows are open.
Hawi is a fun, funky getaway from the tourist-heavy Kona area but you will have a 1-2 hour drive to places like Waimea or down to Kona. Pololu Beach, recommended in Jon's welcome information, is a short drive away and well worth the 20 minute hike down and back up.
Aloha

Jon made us feel very welcome at the Beautiful Cedar House in Hawi.  He was very helpful with explaining places to visit in the area.  Their place was very central to the town and special places to visit.  Hawi is a lovely old town and we were fortunate to be there for the Sat. market.
A great, quiet, very clean, private, convenient place. The hosts were very welcoming, informative and good people.

Me and my brother stayed at Jan and Jon's place and as soon as we got there, it was like we were part of the family!!! 
Jon was very informative about our place and the area that we came to hike.
I asked many,many questions about almost everything in the area and he gave us all the time we needed.
Oh and our place was spotless and everything and more than we expected.
Highly recondmend this stop if your traveling anywhere close!
Thanks Jan and Jon.
Jon and Jan were great! This is a wonderful little place to stay while in Hawi. We regret only staying 3 nights here. Highly recommend you consider this cottage for your north island visit!

My husband and I really enjoyed this space as our introduction to the Big Island.  Hawi is a great town and North Kohala has tons of nature attractions.  The apartment is as nice as the pictures, and it was very clean.  We had everything we needed there.  The bed is super comfy, but watch your head as the loft ceiling is low.  We interacted with Jon and he was very pleasant and accommodating.  The only thing that is not great is the shower.  The water pressure is low and the stream pretty weak.

Overall, totally great and worth the money.  We wished we had stayed longer.

We really enjoyed our stay in the beautiful Cedar House Loft in Hawi. Jan and Jon welcomed us very warmly. The apartment was perfect for us, our girls loved it too. Everything very clean and well equipped. Hawi is a small, very charming village. And lots of things to visit, and beautiful beaches in 20 min drive. Thank you very much - hopefully we can come back one day.

Jon told us that the Cedar House Loft used to be a yoga studio before it was converted to a guest house. No wonder we felt such good energy here. We loved the hardwood floors, the high ceilings, the open floorplan and the cozy sleeping loft. It was easy to prepare meals in the kitchen which was well-appointed and organized. The loft is on a quiet, country road surrounded by pastureland. We were delighted to hear birdsongs and mooing cows each morning. Jon was  pleasant and responded quickly to calls, texts, and emails but otherwise respected our privacy. A long time resident, he knows the area well and gave us excellent suggestions about local sites, restaurants, and outdoor activities.  Many thanks to Jan and Jon for providing this unique and relaxing space.

The Cedar House Loft was as cute and cozy as it looks! We had a wonderful stay - it was quiet and close to so many activities and beautiful Hawaiian scenery. Jan and Jon were gracious hosts, who we were so happy to meet and talk to. They left us fresh lemons, mint and greens to enjoy which was above and beyond. The Loft was clean and had everything we needed to feel at home. The kitchen was well equipped for a couple who enjoys cooking local foods when on vacation! Having comfy beach chairs, cooler etc. was an extra bonus. We will be back, thanks so much! Jenn and Willy

Jon and Jan were excellent hosts. They greeted us with fresh lettuce and meyer lemons from their garden. Their loft was very clean and well equipped. It was close to Hawi and wonderful restaurants and shopping.  We felt right at home. They were there if we needed them, but otherwise we seldom saw them.

Our stay at your lovely loft had only one fault: it was to short. You thought of every detail, from the fine Temprapedic bed (best sleep in a month of travel), to the William Sonoma dishes. Attention to detail that was not overlooked. Jean Pierre, your helpful tips for seeing the sights off the beaten path, were spot-on: easy one-mile walk in the evening to town, the whales at sunset (sublime), the public (yet oh-so private) beach at Mauna Loa (vintage Hawaii), the Poholu Valley Beach (otherworldly) and all in all, our stay in your loft at Hawi was a writers paradise that may be muse for my next book! Bruce and I felt we met a kindred spirit in you, Jean Pierre, and only hope our "paths" will cross yet again.

Mahalo!
Tarini and Bruce

This is the perfect place to stay in Hawi. Private, clean, with every amenity we would need, very central location, quiet.  We didnt even have to research the best things to see or hike. Jon and Jan have already done that for us and explored all the surroundings. Their knowledge of the area is very descriptive. We really enjoyed the waterfall. Thank you.

Wonderful little place within walking distance of my favorite Big Island town, Hawi. Everything was super clean and top of the line (LG washer and dryer, Tempurpedic mattress). Our son loved the sleeping loft. Jon and Jan were wonderful hosts with lots of local knowledge to share. Would definitely go back!

Mahalo to Jan and Jon for a wonderful stay.  It was a pleasant surprise to have found some fruit and veggies for us upon our arrival. The accommodations were clean and new. Loved that there is a washer/dryer, large refrigerator, blender, coffee maker, TV (although we didn't turn it on since we were busy). 
I slept on top of the stairway in a Japanese style mattress and my friend slept in the bed below and it gave us somewhat privacy. 
The location is close to town and loved all the tips they gave us regarding places to visit.  If you want to visit Polulu Valley, then stay here.
It's a great place to stay and they also have a larger building with a few rooms if you need more room. 
Their hospitality is impeccable and would love to visit again sometime.
Mahalo and a HUGE aloha blessings.

Jan and Jon were extremely welcoming - they both stopped by to say hello and provided us with many recommendations for exploring the area, along with their favorite places to eat. There was fresh fruit waiting for us in the loft, and twice they came by with fresh veggies from their organic garden. The loft was comfortable and very clean. We enjoyed every minute of our stay there, and will utilize their property upon return to the Big Island!

Outstanding and upscale, the experience was exquisite in every way. Located perfectly from town, it offered solitude yet convenience. Jon was incredibly helpful in explaining the insider secrets to the area. Snorkeling, hiking, gift and grocery shopping as well as the best restaurants were all explained cheerfully with true Aloha spirit. 

The accommodation was extremely clean and well appointed. Everything was top notch and tastefully decorated. Especially nice was the best bed/mattress that we have ever slept on. The kids loved the loft and I do believe it was the best bed/secret hideaway they ever had as well. 

Mahalo nui for the Hawaiian hospitality! 
Sabine and Greg and kids.

My friend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Cedar House Loft. Jon greeted us right away and gave us a brief tour. He also left us some bananas from the yard to snack on. The loft is clean and spacious and has everything you need including laundry. The peaceful and charming town of Hawi is just a short walk down the road. I'd highly recommend staying here and hope to return sooner than later!

We recently stayed in the loft house while visiting our son in Hawi Town. Jan and Jon welcomed us with fresh fruit from the area as well as suggestions for good restaurants and highlights to see while there. The house was clean and well furnished. Having internet access was helpful as we made travel plans. They even provided beach chairs, umbrella, cooler and a boogie board to borrow for the beach days. It was the perfect size and location for two of us.

We had a great stay at the Cedar house loft in Hawi.  Plenty of room in a beautiful space for my wife, me and adult son.  Beds were very comfortable, kitchen was well stocked with everything we needed. Jon met us when we arrived and spent considerable time giving us lots of information as to the very best sights and places to eat; he even had photocopied handouts! We took much of his advice and agreed with his assessment.  Although we didn't get to meet Jan, we thoroughly enjoyed the delicious banana bread with macadamia nuts she made for us. We would not hesitate to stay here again. Highly recommended.
We really loved and enjoyed our stay. The location, bed, supplies for the beach... Everything was perfect. My favorite Airbnb so far!!

The host made us feel welcome and gave us great snorkeling tips and an overview yet was respectful of our privacy. The location is good--one can walk to the local Hawi town and it is under 30 minutes to outstanding beaches (Mauna Kea!) and even less time to pop in the water for a snorkel or look to Maui view for a sunset. Also Hawi is at around 500 feet elevation which makes for cooler evenings--less humidity--which is great for sleeping. The loft area bed is best for kids (one of our teens liked his 'man cave') but both of our tall teens would not have fit so well--there is a sofa bed in addition to the queen bed. All beds are in the same room as the loft/kitchen you see in the picture so no separate bedroom. Nice extras such as beach towels, chairs, umbrella and boogie board! Loved the fruit basket and blender! There is a fenced-in garden patio with table and chairs (but no view) and given it was rainy in the evening plus mosquitos we ended up never sitting outside. As a bonus for relaxed evenings with teenagers--wi-fi and several movies to choose from on netflix and a pizza place not too far away--in fact lots of local, casual, great food places--try Minnie's and CSC in the next town.

Jan and Jon's loft is not only beautifully done, it is absolutely immaculate!  We have stayed in many gorgeous Airbnb properties round the world, and theirs is by far the cleanest and tidiest (and I am very particular). 

Jan and Jon were at the property (they live next door) when we arrived and gave us a warm greeting and tour of their property.  In addition they left a delicious, ripe, and chilled pineapple for us to enjoy (which we did throughly after we went for a refreshing ocean swim at a locals swimming spot recommended by Jan and Jon).

This easy to access property has a well stocked kitchen where you can prepare meals, the most comfortable bed EVER, a sleeping loft (our son loved sleeping up there on a comfortable futon mattress), nice linens, free Netflix, Wifi, Pandora, a brand new washer and dryer, beach towels, an outdoor dining area, beach gear, and incredibly nice hosts!  :)  

When visiting Hawi in the future, we would not pass up an opportunity to stay at Jan and Jon's beautifully appointed property.  Mahalo!

My husband and I were in Hawi for family reasons, and I'm so happy I found Jon and Jan's Cedar Loft. It's comfortable, well designed, clean, and well stocked. The best thing, though, is that the space has wonderful energy. It's peaceful and embracing. Jon and Jan are filled with aloha spirit, and you will feel it with every interaction with them. We hope to return next year and rent the larger unit on the property. Thank you, Jon and Jan!

The house was just as described.  Very clean and lovely.  The kids adored the loft.  It was a perfect spot for us.  Jon and Jan are wonderful hosts - the place is very private, but they were available for excellent advice.

Cedar House was perfect for four adults.  My daughter and her husband slept in the loft and my daughter commented that she had the best view and could see the ocean from her window.  My husband slept on the comfortable double bed, and I used the sleeper sofa.  Comfortable, very clean, and well stocked, Jan and Jon were very friendly and helpful.  After catching a 5 foot Ono we asked about a BBQ and Jon brought theirs over for us to use.  We were even able to use Cedar House as a base for visiting with my cousin and her 9 month old baby who  lives in Hawi.  Thanks for an awesome stay!

The location has a convenient access to Kohala coast while still retaining the rustic feel of a small Hawaiian town! Amazing and cozy loft with great set of accessories for cooking and relaxing. Loved the blender after the long hike. The air circulation within the cottage and the environs was great despite hot weather outside which made it easy to relax. The host had great suggestions on the places to visit :D

The house is conveniently located close to the white sand beaches in Hawaii big island and only a few miles away from the beautiful Polulu Valley trail. The host had great suggestions on what to do and especially on the best beaches to visit. Everything was in order and well indicated in the house; the kids loved the loft upstairs and we enjoyed the comfort of the mattress in the master bed. Amazon prime was great after a day hiking or at the beach. We really made the most of our stay in Hawi.

The Cedar House Loft was a wonderful place to stay in Hawi. It was much nicer than the local hotel accommodations (where my friends stayed) and it's very close to the center of Hawi town. The apartment itself is very nice and comfortable - you really feel like you have your own private studio in a beautiful, lush part of the island with everything you need. Jan and Jon were wonderful hosts - they give you all the space and privacy you want/need, yet are always ready with really helpful information, guidance, tips, and where to find hidden gems for when you want to explore more of the area. I found them to be very friendly and personable, and they made me feel very welcomed and at home. The studio is directly behind Jan and Jon's house, but you really don't feel as if you're in someone else's space - it feels very private and you can come & go as you please. I highly, highly recommend this space for a couple or a single person traveling to the Hawi area.
Die Cedar-House Loft ist sehr schön und wir fanden sie sehr sauber vor. Jon hat sich gut um uns gekümmert und mit Tipps zur Umgebung versorgt. Die neuen Strandutensilien haben wir sehr geschätzt.

My girlfriend and I had a great four night stay in the Loft. Simple but well done accommodation with everything we needed. Spotlessly clean. Excellent directions/pre-info and a couple of informative/fun chats with Jon when we arrived. Walking distance to restaurants, etc in Hawi and well located to get to Waimea and SaddleRd (across island) or to Pololu Valley (recommend that hike). A great few days.

Thanks a lot Jan and Jon for your warm welcome, a fantastic stay and the aloha feeling we had in your perfect loft.

Special thanks for the good advice and secrets of the area.

All the best, Mahalo Melanie & René

The loft has everything you need for a comfy stay, neat tidy and spacious. We definitely reccomend staying here and in this part of the island. Havi is beautiful and close to walks and cafes. Hosts are friendly and helpful with local recommendations and are very easy to contact. Thanks for having us!

We were very lucky to have such an incredible host!  Jon made sure we were comfortable and was very accommodating. The loft is simple, perfect for our family of 3.  We especially enjoyed the upper bed area where our little one played in.  Jon and Janet are pros at hosting.

The cedar loft was a perfect place to start our big island vacation!  Spacious with good size kitchen & the washer/dryer was helpful after many trips to the beach. Jan and Jon were gracious hosts and clued us in on some great places to eat and adventure in Hawi!

Cedar House Loft was great for our 2 night stay with friends. Great to have lots of space to cook and relax by the breakfast bar and watch a film in the evening. The property is located to the rear of another house with fencing around so very secure. Close to amenities of Hilo including restaurants and coffee shops. If you are sharing with others one thing to note is that the double bed downstairs is in the main room, with another mattress up on the raised mezzanine - open plan fine for us though! Wifi and Netflix were a great addition too.

Thank you Jan and Jon for a great stay.
We loved the comfy bed and pillows...great sleeps ensued. The suite is quiet, clean, tidy and well appointed with everything necessary for a relaxing stay.

We had a great stay in Hawi. The Home is very clean an we had everything we needed. (Beach-stuff, Household...) 
Thanks!
The Cedar House Loft is a perfect little vacation retreat. It is very clean and bright. Definitely would stay there again.

Good location to experience the northern portion of the island - including the white sand beaches and a number of cultural sites. Easy to find - even in the dark - and very quiet. Jan and Jon were very responsive and friendly. Loved the fresh Meyer lemons and the recommendation to harvest a few. The Saturday Farmer's Market in Hawi was the best we found on the island - thanks for this recommendation, too! This is a small space, but well appointed for two people (tight for the three of us). The small kitchen was surprisingly just what we needed for the meals we cooked (breakfast and dinner). Loved all the windows and fans for circulation. Thanks for providing laundry detergent for a few loads - nice touch and very helpful.
We loved the place! Everything was as advertised. It was nice and clean, and it was a bonus to have beach towels and beach gear provided. Our hosts were very personable. We'd be back in a heartbeat!
Great place to stay. The apartment is clean and bright and well stocked. Really loved the quiet and serene atmosphere. Great location for everything in North Kohala.

Jon and Jan's place was great! The bed was super comfortable and our daughter loved the loft. The kitchen had everything we needed. We also were able to use the hosts' beach equipment. We appreciated the host's tips for sightseeing and ideas for excursions. The location is very convenient and easy to find. Thank you Jon and Jan!

This was a nice place, very clean, with some good amenities. This was my first airbnb stay, and I managed to not inform them that we were a 2 and not a 1. But Jan did a great job dealing with my bumble there.

Everything else was great--and we did go to Hapuna and Pololu, both easily gotten to. 

Certainly worth a stay.

Jan welcomed us with a text on our arrival date and introduced herself the following morning.  We appreciated her recommendation to try the beach at the Mauna Kea resort.  We spent the entire next day there!  Cedar Loft was as lovely as pictured, in a quiet neighborhood.  We walked to town for the Farmer's Market and another time to eat dinner.  Hawi is charming.

Great hosts! Gave us heaps of local knowledge on what to see and do in the area. Whale watching, beautiful valleys and a black sand beach. The place was also very quiet and clean. Freshly ground coffee on arrival was perfect! Thank you for such a pleasant experience!!

We loved staying in our hosts Beautiful Cedar Bungalow.  The space was the perfect size for a family of 3 an my daughter was thrilled with the loft bed.  The bed downstairs was insanely comfortable and tv with the netflix movies on demand was an awesome bonus at the end of a long day in the sun and surf.  Thank you Jan and Jon!

We were so pleasantly surprised at the peaceful beauty of this loft apartment for our stay. The kitchen was complete and the TV with Netflix was so enjoyable. Our hosts were so gracious and provided directions and local happenings for us in advance. Mahalo for a wonderful experience!
Great space for a couple.  Clean, well organized, and everything you need for a visit to Hawi.  Thanks Jan and John!

When we walked in we were stunned by the cleanliness of the room. Small cozy area but we were pleasantly surprised with how roomy it felt. They had beautiful Hawaiian music playing to greet us.  Very accommodating with extra towels, sunscreen and bug spray. Gave us complete privacy. The main coffee shop about a mile away was well worth the walk or drive. Would highly recommend to others.

The Cedar House was exactly as described. We stayed for a month and cooked dinner most days. The kitchen is well equipped, the gas barbecue outside was great, the eating space adequate (we had four for dinner several times), but best suited for  two or three. Jan and Jon were very welcoming hosts and provided everything we needed, including help printing documents. Beds were comfortable, the space was very clean, and we were happy with everything. Location was good with good access to beaches, restaurants, and local stores. It is a long drive to major towns like Hilo and Kailua (Kona), and the volcano but this is the Big Island. We felt the Cedar House was excellent for our needs and we would certainly book it again. It is perfect for two people. We had three for one of the four weeks and that worked well.

The Cedar House Loft was perfect for our stay! The efficient kitchen supplied all the utensils needed; the bed was very comfortable, and the entire place was immaculate. Jan and Jon are wonderful hosts--they are attentive and informative but also very respectful of privacy. The neighborhood is very quiet, and a great spot for accessing all of the gorgeous sites on the North end of Hawaii.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay at Jon and Jan's house.  Jon welcomed us with a nice tour of the property, he went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable.  We loved every minute of it!  We hope to come back someday!  Thank you so very much, Jon and Jan!
Great location. Not suitable for more than one couple. Simple but had everything we needed. Owners were welcoming and ready to provide information about the area.

Wonderful place in the cute little town of Hawi. The house is beautiful and luxurious. We were amazed at how well they have used the space. Every little thing is provided. Perfectly organized kitchen (wifey got kitchen envy), washer/dryer, dining area, comfortable bed, living space, patio. Our 10 year old didn't want to leave the loft :-)

The location is perfect. We took the stunning coastal route up from Pahoa and explored the many waterfalls en route. The icing on the cake was driving across the "mountain road" during sunset. Stunning ! We hiked to Polulu valley, explored Waipio on horseback and boogie boarded in Hapuna beach. All within a 30-40 minute drive from Hawi.

Jan and Jon are excellent hosts. Very warm and welcoming. Communication was perfect from the start. The place is really easy to find and Jan made us feel at home as soon as we arrived. The attention to detail is apparent throughout the place. 

We absolutely loved our stay here and will definitely be back.

reviews.reviewer_name: Grit And Frank And Lukas And Julia
reviews.comments:
We stayed in Jan and Jon's loft with a family of four. While it is just a single room plus a small bathroom, it is spacious and was just perfect for us. The "upstairs" bed is fun to sleep in. The loft is equipped with everything we needed - not only a fully-equipped kitchen, but also a washer and dryer. The location is very good to explore the little town of Hawi and the surrounding area. Don't miss the farmers' market if you stay here on a Saturday!

Jan and Jon are wonderful hosts. They gave a very accurate description of where to find their house (we found it at dark with no problems, even without GPS) and checked back on us to make sure everything was fine. They gave us directions to the farmers' market, to beaches and so on. And it was a pleasure talking with them - it was as if we had known them for a long time already.

Overall, we definitely recommend this airbnb. If you prefer more than a single room, Jan and Jon own another house which is on the same lot...

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Jan and Jon's loft and hope to visit there again. It is everything as described and then some. Unfortunately, I did not meet Jan but Jon greeted me initially and dropped by another time or two. I did not need him for anything but am confident he would have been available if necessary. The loft is nicely furnished, very comfortable and exceeded my expectations. Highly recommended!

We loved our stay at the Cedar House Loft - wish it could have been longer! The loft is immaculately clean, with a modern kitchen area and stylish furnishings. Jon was very welcoming and had lots of suggestions of things to do in the area. I would recommend staying here when you are in the north of Big Island.

This is a hidden gem in the beautiful village of Hawi. We loved every minute of our trip to Hawi. The apartment was such an amazing space to come home to and the facilities just great. Jon is a really nice guy and was so helpful and friendly, we found his recommendations to be perfect. Kaapa Beach has to be some of the best snorkelling we have done in Hawaii and so close. Loved the Bamboo restaurant a taste of real Hawaii.  Loved being away from it all.  I would highly recommend you stay here when visiting this part of the Island we loved it.

The Cedar House is in a great neighborhood, with local markets, shops, and restaurants. Jan and Jon made us feel very welcome, and even gave us some fresh fruit from their garden (best bananas I've ever had!). The house was very clean and very spacious with its high ceilings. Surprsingly, there were almost no insects in the house, given what our friends experienced during their stay in Kohala. The washing machine and outdoor patio were very convenient as well. Overall, a fantastic experience and I would absolutely stay again.

Jon and Jan met us as we arrived and went through the place to show us everything.  They provided maps and suggestions for sites to see.  Jon actually loaned us walking sticks for a hike he recommended.  He offered us Meyers lemons from their trees that were in season.  Very generous.  
The house was very clean and comfortable.

Jan and Jon's place was absolutely perfect for us! We are travelling as four girls, two slept in the loft space and two downstairs in the bed. Both were very comfortable places to sleep and we felt we had plenty of room. The Cedar Loft has everything you need, it is very clean, quiet and truly lovely and is close to town. Jan and Jon were so sweet and informative, letting us know about the area and they even gave us lemons off their trees! Highly recommended and would absolutely stay here again. :)

Nice hot tub, beautiful and clean, a lovely view out back, great view of the stars at night-Jon was really great showing us places we might like to visit with our two kids and they left fresh kona coffee for us. Jon even gave us fresh fruit from his garden in the morning.

We loved staying in Hawi to experience this area of the Big Island! The place was perfect for a couple. It was private, comfortable and well equipped. The hot tub was a bonus!! We would stay here again and recommend our hosts!

Wonderful cabin with very clean bathroom and well equipped kitchen! The hot tube is in top condition and we enjoyed it every evening after a long day out door activities! The hosts are very welcoming and very helpful in giving tips and suggestion! It was a bit windy and rainy but within very short driving distance, you can always reach great sunny beaches, hikes and restaurants! Highly recommended!

Very cute space! I could see this being perfect for a family with kids as the bed on the loft is pretty cool. The directions and parking instructions Jon left were great! We also really appreciated the 100% Kona coffee he left for us. Best coffee ever! Both Jan and Jon are experienced hosts and know how to make your stay a very pleasant one.

Clean and comfortable home where we were able to relax. Extras such as beach chairs and boggie boards were very nice additions. Jan and Jon were very nice to work with. I would take my family there again.
Jan and Jon have a lovely place. The nearby town was simply idyllic. They provided us free lemons from their tree and delicious kona coffee. The stay was very comfortable.

Jan & Jon's place is even more beautiful in person than in the photos. The stained glass, green bamboo fence and hardwood floors make for a bright and cheery ambience. It's right near *downtown Hawi* (which is such a quaint and sleepy town, that using the term *downtown* is generous), and it's a great homebase for exploring nearby sights, lookouts, beaches and for spotting the occasional whale. The coffee shop nearby has amazing ice cream and tasty breakfast, the hot tub was perfect for evening soaks and having a washer/dryer (at the midway point of our trip) was a game changer.

This is the second time that we have stayed at the "loft" in Hawi.  Jon and Jan are always great to communicate with - responsive, helpful, and genuine.  The space is also very comfortable, quiet, and clean, and has everything needed for a great time in this lovely part of the Big Island.  Excellent space for a couple or small family.

Great little place in Hawi! Jon is great, laid-back and very knowledgeable about the area. Cedar House is in a quiet area about a minute from Hawi-Town proper. Studio Floorplan is open and bright and Jon thoughtfully included everything we might have needed. Jacuzzi is a great feature! Would stay again or recommend for sure.

This is a wonderful place to stay, very private.  Great hot tub.  I stayed there as a single person and it was perfect for me.  A couple could stay there as well and have plenty of room.  In my opinion, the loft would be a bit small for 2 adults, unless you are very good friends.

Jon and Jan are great hosts.  They provided everything we needed for our visit down to an ice chest and body board for our trips to the beach.  I would highly recommend both this properly and the Hawi area for a relaxing Big Island vacation.

Our experience at Jan & Jon's air bnb Hawi was incredibly relaxing and enjoyable. We are thankful for Jon's great recommendations on sunset spot to visit and even sited two whales close to shore! We also appreciated his suggestion for breakfast at the Kohala Hub and the beautiful moments stargazing in the jacuzzi. Lovely views of the Milky Way! We really enjoyed the comfort of the ohana including the amenities and yoga mats for morning stretching. We also appreciated the beauty of the ohana, including the stain glass flower windows and lovely little loft with the sunrise seeping in. Thank you for creating a gorgeous space for us to relax and enjoy the peacefulness and aloha of Hawaii!

Beautiful, clean, friendly, quiet, loaded with extras like fabulous beach chairs, ice chest and high quality boards for surfing. The town of Hawi is only a few minutes away with remarkable restaurants. Our favorites were Bamboo and Sushi Rock. Jan and John are excellent hosts with tips for finding that perfect trail or snorkel beach in the area. It is definitely a home I will return to!

My husband and I really enjoyed staying at the Cedar House loft. The accommodations were perfect for two people. We liked having a grill to cook up a quick dinner and the hot tub was amazing after a day of hiking and exploring.  Jon and Jan are super hosts and we wouldn't hesitate to stay here again if our travels take us back to the Big Island.

We loved our time and would definitely stay here again! We were here for a wedding that took place at a house down the street, but on our extra day, we went to Hapuna beach (as suggested by Jan, amongst many other great recommendations) and had a great time because we didn't have to rent a thing. The loft had beach chairs, an umbrella, towels and even and ice chest and ice packs ready to go! They also had a pack and play in the loft which was perfect for our 4 month old who we brought with us. Overall we had a great stay, away from the hustle and bustle of tourists, beautiful location, and great hosts. Thanks for the great stay!

Jan & Jon's was wonderful!!! Beautiful house. Everything was clean and bright and they have taken care of every little thing- down to the Noni soap and the 100% Kona Coffee! The hot tub was a delight and the gentle wind across the property felt rejuvenating! Check in/out was easy and communication was positive, timely, and clear. The artful touches such as stained glass in the door and the cheerful yellow coverlet on the bed made it feel very classy :)

This is a great find and I highly recommend it to anyone!!!

There's a skydiving company down the road called Big Island Gravity (BIG) Skydiving- do not miss that!! Their airport is a ten minute  drive from the house. All in all this was a wonderful gem of an airbandb that everyone thinking on it should go!!!

The location is great - right next to Hawi so you can easily access to stores and restaurant. 
Jon was super friendly and helpful - by bringing us the cooking sauces when we wanted to cook ourselves. He also brought us a fresh lemon from the tree!
The loft was super clean, everything was super organized with tags on the drawer so you can easily find what you are looking for. 
Loved the hot tub - you can see stars when you are in the tub and enjoy a wonderful evening outside. 
Also provided were all the beach stuff - chairs, umbrella, body boards, cooler, etc. We enjoyed a great day at the beach thanks to these preparation. 
Jon made some suggestions regarding where to visit and things to do. 
Had a wonderful time here.
Jan&Jon were amazing hosts! the location was perfect for us! We had a great time and I highly recommend this to anyone!

We loved staying here. It was a clean and relaxing studio. The fans cooled down the apartment nicely, and we enjoyed cooking breakfast in the kitchen before heading to the nearby hikes and beaches for the day. We appreciated that Jan and John provide boogie boards, chairs, an umbrella and cooler. Also, we used the hot tub at night and had a great star viewing! Overall, it was a great spot: comfy bed and apartment with very friendly hosts.

Great spot! Hawi was a nice little town to base all our adventures out of. We stayed for three nights at Jon&Jans place. Jon came by and pointed out some snorkeling and hiking spots on the map after asking what we were looking for during our vacation... very helpful and informative about local spots to check out. We drove all over the island from Hawi. Definitely need a rental car for this location to get around... we went to the Hawi farmers market, snorkeled at a couple beaches (saw about 10 sea turtles at one!), saw the lava flow enter the Pacific, went to the Volcanoes National Park, visited the Kona brewery, went to the summit of Mauna Kea at 13k feet, all based out of Hawi! We had a gecko friend hanging out in the house during our stay, so if you don't like critters it may not be the place for you. But pictures are very accurate, the space is large, impeccably clean, and very nicely furnished. It felt like home!!! Would definitely go back and stay again.

We had a wonderful stay at the Cedar House Loft. Hawi is a nice little corner of the Big Island, with a cute little downtown and beautiful nearby beaches, hiking trails, snorkeling spots, and country roads to explore. Jan & Jon's place was an ideal place for us to experience Hawi and the Kohala Coast. The apartment was clean, newly-appointed, quiet, and very comfortable for us to relax after our adventures nearby. The full-functioning kitchen had all the things we needed for cooking tasty meals, preparing fresh-brewed Kona coffee (beans provided!), and making smoothies with the tasty locally grown papayas, pineapple, and bananas. Jan & Jon were also very responsive in their communication and provided some useful pointers on snorkeling and other local activities ahead of our trip. We'd definitely come back again!

This is a great house to stay in, in Havi.  The hot tub was a great touch and we definitely used it.  The beds and everything were comfortable.  The restaurants in the area were among the best we had across the island.  Thanks for a great stay!

Jan and Jon have created a beautiful home away from home. We travelled to Hawi for a wedding at nearby Kahua Ranch as a family of 2 adults and 2 kids. We stayed four nights here and it has been our favourite part of this vacation so far. The beds are amazingly comfortable. All the facilities are of an excellent standard - BBQ, hot tub (filled and ready to go on arrival), the oversize washing machine and dryer (HUGE!) and the gorgeous little touches like fresh coffee beans and a grinder, fresh bananas on arrival and a run down on some really neat things to do locally have made this visit truly special. Thankyou Jan and Jon - we hope to come back one day. We love Hawaii! Cheers,jim and daisy

Jan and Jon have thought of everything their guests may need to explore the northern part of the island. We absolutely loved our stay in their guest house and would recommend it to anyone who wants a comfortable and cozy place to stay. The hot tub has a beautiful view of thr stars and was a real treat at the end of the day. Plus, you can't ask for nicer hosts.
Very clean, cozy house.

Very cute cottage up in Havi where owners Jan and John were very helpful. Everything that you could need  to go to the beach was supplied from towels to coolers and more. The place was very clean and quiet and anything that you forgot was there. The place was large enough for three adults with one staying in the loft. Great location near restaurants, shops, beaches and more. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice comfortable stay.
Really enjoyed the stay, very close to Hawi town and just as described. Clean, cute, place. Didn't use the hot tub so can't comment, but would recommend if in the area.
Hawi and north kohalo are great to explore!

Jan's place was exactly as described. Very cute and very tidy. Jan was a great host and gave us several suggestions for day trips, which we took and loved. She had beach stuff (chairs, blanket, towels, cooler, and umbrella) as well as a gas grill and hot tub in the enclosed yard. Highly recommend her place,

Jon could not have been a better host. He welcomed us to his home with coffee, beverages, and amazing tips for the best local sights including a black sand hike, local waterfall, beaches, and great restaurants. We felt right at home and got a real 'locals' experience. If we return to Hawi (which we hope to do) we will definitely stay here again!

The accommodation was clean and nicely decorated.  The location is wonderful, it is an easy walk to a grocery and downtown galleries and restaurants.  We discovered a new snorkel spot close by that had an easy entry into the water, no urchins or lava scrapes! The parking and privacy were also excellent.  We will stay here again on our travels :-)

This a the perfect quiet and secluded studio for a romantic getaway. Clean and stylish. Plenty of condiments in kitchen, perfect for cooking meals, loved the BBQ too! No need for A/C as there were so many windows letting in the breeze and multiple fans. The hot tub was great for evening relaxation. We thoroughly enjoyed the boogie boards, beach chairs, cooler. It was an easy drive to thr best beaches on the island and hiking spots. And not too bad to drive over to Hilo. Will definitely stay again!

Very wonderful space at the north tip of the island. Jan was a very helpful host, especially when we locked ourselves out of the house while using the hot tub! Very relaxing, convenient, “loft” away from home for our 5 day stay on the big island.

The cedar house loft is a sweet one room place perfectly located close to Hawi town. It’s the perfect place to land after adventuring the North Kohala area. Jon and Jan are very nice and helpful. The hot tub is great to unwind at the end of the day. The kitchen is well-equipped for preparing meals, and the space is neat and clean. We loved our stay and will definitely be back!!!
Great space, very clean and well maintained, nice private deck area with bbq and hot tub. Worked great for our family of four, close to Hawi, and some great day hikes.

I would recommend using pandora on the TV set on the Hawaiian music station. It really got us in the island mood. After long hikes, soaking in the hot tub was perfection. Take advantage of the local tips and tricks from Jan and Jon!

You have thought of everything anyone could need right down to a couple of beers to welcome and coffee to grind. We enjoyed our stay from beginning to end in a spectacular part of Hawaii. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this loft to anyone. Many thanks!!
For anyone that has problems walking most of the beaches are a hike over lava rock but the views are beyond spectacular

Jan and Jon are terrific hosts.  Their home is very clean, quiet and well-appointed. Parking is off-street and right outside the unit (convenient for loading/unloading). The address is easy to find and instructions provided are clear and easy to follow.

The studio bed is extremely comfortable -- we didn't use the loft bed.  The washing machine and dryer is in the unit is very nice.   

Jan and Jon helped with recommendations on places to visit in the Hawi area.  We especially enjoyed the hot tub, yoga mat and beach equipment.  The unit is perfect for a couple such as us; they also have another 2-bedroom home for larger groups.

We highly recommend Jan&Jon's Place.

Our stay at the Cedar House Loft was amazing! Wonderful location near the sweet little town of Hawi. Jan and Jon were excellent hosts and were quick to communicate if we had any questions. The loft was clean, comfortable, and well-furnished for my husband and myself and our two kids. We enjoyed the hot tub very much and found the loft very comfortable and inviting. We would definitely recommend Jan and Jon's loft to anyone visiting the Big Island!

Secluded and quiet -- but close to great restaurants, cool shops, and all sorts of activities. Plenty of space. The extra bed would be great for kids or a second couple. (We didn't use it since it was just my hubby and I.) Excellent & fast communication from the hosts. The hot tub and washer/dryer are nice bonuses!!

The house is exactly as shown in the pictures, probably even better. Everything was very clean, new and had everything we needed. We received very useful recommendations about what to do in the surroundings and Jan&Jon made themselves available in cae we needed anything, but giving us our space. If we come back to Hawaii we’ll repeat!

Jan John were terrific hosts and very responsive and helpful. Wonderful hot tub. Very comfy bed, linens, pillows. Kitchen was very well appointed. Kona coffee was supplied. No a/c but not needed with the with the many windows and cross-breeze and ceiling fans. Beautiful spot with access to great snorkeling and charming shops in Hawi Town.

Great space. Comfortable for us and our kids. Thanks Jan and Jon. 

Hawi is a very beautiful location close to some of the best of the Big Island!

This was a cozy, pretty, and clean place, close to town and restaurants.  Wish there was a better shoulder for walking to town.  Also, preferred the lanai and view that came with the other place on the property.
Cozy home, super comfy bed, wonderful breeze at night with sliding door w/ screen, easy walk to town and perfect location to explore nearby beaches, shops and further travels.

This loft was perfect for my family of 3. Jon welcomed us in and filled us in with local info. This was our favorite place and local. Great vibe, great people, and amazing town. We will be back. Highly recommended

Visit this small loft for peace and quiet.  It is right up the street from two outdoor tours (zip lining and fluming).
The black sand beach is 8 miles away.  Extremely beautiful but a serious hike. Wear tennis shoes.

A really gorgeous loft. I only wish we had a few more days to spend here. Jan is a great host who made sure we had everything we needed and even got the hot tub ready in time for our arrival.

Hawi is a charming little town and not too far from both great beaches on the west side, as well as sites like Pololu and Waipo Valley. The surrounding hillsides down Kohala mountain road are also gorgeous and were an unexpected treat for us.

Would love to return some day.

This part of the island is gorgeous and enchanting. Close enough to Hapuna Beach and to Waimea, but away from the crowds. Public radio signal from Honolulu is very strong, and I delighted in listening to classical music as I drove along the ocean. Jan&Jon's place is spacious and extremely quiet.  The hot tub was a plus. I always felt safe and comfortable. Everything about Hawi is charming and wonderful, down to the post office mural. Best AirBnb ever.

Thank You Jan and John for our wondeful stay at your beautiful place on the best part of the Big Island. We enjoyed every minute and your helpful tips on where to go and what to visit. It could not heve been better. Mahalo.
Jan and Jon were great hosts!  Very responsive.  The place was perfect for my needs!

No need to look any further, Jan and Jon are the beat host ever, they were very engaging and informative of the island and Hawi. Honestly the space was even better than I hoped, it was beautiful, immaculate and was the perfect home away from home. 

I should note that I also stayed in a 5 star resort after I left their house and all I could think is I want to go back. The town of Hawi is amazing, quaint and the people here are beautiful and engaging.  Look no further this is your paradise!!!

Absolutely beautiful and charming cottage! We felt right at home and the decor, furnishings and private patio with hot tub were amazing. Every amenity we could imagine and perfect format for family with young children! We have family in Kona and Hilo on the Big Island so visit often, but we were delighted at the opportunity to escape to this lovely Hawi area which is quiet and off the beaten path. Lots of exploring and fun with local restaurants and shops, hiking and hidden beaches - and you cannot miss ATV Outfitters for the true scenery and history of the area. And Bamboo restaurant offers exquisite food and friendly service. We will be back!

The cottage is just like the pictures it’s nice to have two beds if you need them. The town of Hawi is cute, but very small. it rained a lot when I was there but it’s at a quiet end of the island. In the cottage I love the Stainglass and yoga mat, the open space, full fridge, it all worked out very well. Jan was one of the sweetest hostesses I’ve ever met and really enjoyed her. Mahalo

We had a great time relaxing at Cedar Loft- lovely quiet little spot with extremely indulgent hot tub! Well situated for exploring North Kohala region, good restaurants a couple of minutes down the road by car. Would recommend.

Staying at Jan and Jon’s place was a wonderful experience, for many reasons. The location, Hawi town, was pristine — far from the vog we saw in the Kona region. Hawi is also greener, cooler (ocean breeze), and more secluded than the resort enclaves to the south, as well as a short drive from some of the island’s best beaches (20 minute drive to Hapuna). We also had a view of Maui!
Jan and Jon showed extraordinary hospitality, going the extra mile to make our stay so special. The loft house had everything that a hotel could offer, plus thoughtful touches like supplies for beach days (lounging chairs, umbrella, body boards, and a cooler). They also provided a pack ‘n play crib for our 18-month-old. Our private jacuzzi and BBQ grill were bonuses as well.
All in all, this was an excellent experience and much of it thanks to the expert hospitality from Jan and Jon. Mahalo!

Jan and Jon’s home is beautiful it had everything we could possibly need there were a total of four of us staying and more than plenty of clean towels for us all. Jan and Jon had left us with local maps and places to see and were very quick with any questions we had. The house was more than enough for us. It was very clean and the hot tub fresh clean water. The neighbourhood felt very safe and We would easily stay here again if we came back to Hawaii!

This place was great and became our little home for almost a week during our stay. The place is like a mini apartment complete with a washer/dryer, shower and outdoor hot tub. No AC but the breeze and ceiling fans kept us cool during the day and night. The hot tub was warm and worked well. WiFi worked well and the TV had Netflix along with a few other app/channels. I recommend this place for couples traveling alone or for a family with small children. The loft bed overlooks the entire space so unless you don’t mind a lack of privacy I’d say this is good for 3-4 people. The couch was comfy but not long enough to sleep an adult. Loft bed wouldn’t be ideal for tall people either.

The location was in walking distance to the small town of Hawi where several shops and restaurants are located. The local food was excellent and the place was easy to find. About an hour north from the airport via a scenic drive during the day. 

Although we never met the hosts they were  quick to respond and supplied us with information we needed. There were plenty of clean towels, beach towels and beach chairs all available for our use. We had a designated parking spot and it was very quiet at night. We had ample
privacy and felt safe staying there. I would stay again and recommend this place.

We are two young professionals in our respected fields; we are able bodied, responsible, quiet, adventure seekers. We visited the Big Island for two weeks in August of 2018 on vacation. We stayed in 3 different Airbnbs while on vacation, this was our last location and we chose it for financial reasons (it was about $100 less than the other places we stayed). This location was our least favorite place due to the comfortability and the location (see list below). We wish we had stayed in this location for 3 days instead of 5. This space was very basic. Basic can be great at times and quite annoying at others. Thank you to the hosts for offering a safe place to stay. 

Pros: 
-	Safe
-	Bed is comfortable 
-	Newer TV (it was nice to have the option to watch TV at night)
-	Basics included (4 plates, 4 bowls, 4 glasses; hotel soap/shampoo; paper towels; small amount of coffee) 
-	Clean hot tub 
-	Quiet 
-	Parking space provided 
-	Great vegetarian restaurant in town, great sushi too. 

Cons:
-	Does not feel homey, feels more like a garage converted to a living space (we love Airbnbs that make us feel like we are staying at a friends house) 
-	Tiny outside area with annoying gravel and motion detector light
-	Remote location, there are two or three restaurants in town that are great but this is a teeny tiny Hawaiian town be prepared. The volcano erupting also messed with our plans, we had stayed here because its closer to Hilo and that side of the island. Without that section to explore we ran out of things to do. This is not at all the hosts fault just something to consider in regards to your plans. 
-	Teeny tiny kitchen, we used the table pictured as a bar in the picture as extra counter space and the owner wanted to charge us almost $90 to refinish it after our stay. We explained that we never placed anything greasy on it but probably set cold glass containers on it. How could that stain a table meant to be a bar?? They dropped that extra charge but it brought unneeded stress. We will definitely start taking pictures of all the Airbnbs we stay in now due to this experience.
Nice space and very convenient to Hawi and surrounding areas.
It was very peace full hot tub was great

The studio cottage was cozy and comfortable and very clean. The host, Jon, provided very good insider suggestions on places to visit and see on the north side of the Big Island.  The location was great for visits to some great snorkeling and hiking locations.  Local food was great.

The Cedar House Loft is a wonderful place to stay!  We loved the stained glass windows and everything was so clean. Soaking in the hot tub on a chilly, blustery, and rainy night was also a nice touch. Jan&Jon were thoughtful and quick to communicate. One thing to note for future travelers, that while the Cedar House Loft is very private, it is still connected to the main house (under the same roof). Thanks to Jan&Jon for a fantastic "stay-cation"!

This is a lovely, bright, clean space in a great location. We truly enjoyed our time here. 
The kitchen was spacious which was wonderful for cooking meals at home. The bed was very comfortable. And the location is cooler than some other parts of the island, which was so nice in the evenings. 
Close to beautiful beaches, hikes, and other activities. Town is cute with restaurants and cafes and a great feel. 
We highly recommend this place.

Jon & Jan are great hosts. The cedar loft is very comfortable and clean with just enough kitchen to make meals at home. We loved the hot tub, especially soaking in the evening watching the full moon and clouds drift by. It’s a sweet location to explore the Kohala coast. We might just be back again! :)
It is a large, open, and airy space with a hot tub to view the stars right out the door. The inside and outside areas have great privacy, so it is very easy to relax and enjoy Hawaii.

This is the space was very comfortable for my family of four. The hot tub was very clean and it was very nice to sit and look at the stars or the bamboo or the topical rain while enjoying a soak. The beds were very comfortable. They provided boogie boards, beach towels, and everything we needed to have a great visit. Jon am Jan are outstanding hosts and even provided us with fresh fruit from their property.

Jon and Jan's place is clean, spacious and conveniently located near Hawi town. We traveled with our toddler and they provided a high chair on our request. The kitchen is pretty big considering it's  a studio so it was very convenient with our toddler as we mostly cooked. Jon was very hospitable and gave us good recommendations on restraunts and beaches. The hot tub was also great - you can relax watching the bright stars at night. We felt very at home there. Will definitely come back to stay with them the next time we're in Hawi!

Take a good look at the pictures  and also  use (Hidden by Airbnb) Street View  to check out the town of Hawi Hawaii.
This place and its location were way better than expected.  It was awesome that, (this was the first time), I finally got to meet the landlords.  Their picture might be great on the internet, but once again, way better in person.  if you want the best and biggest lemons in the world for free, rent this place.   Very clean. No carpeting to worry about. Extremely roomy for two people. Nice hot tub.  Good supplies.

Cozy, quiet spot in a less-visited location on the Big Island. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Jan and Jon's loft and would recommend it to both singles and small families looking for a more "local" experience than what you'd get in Kona or at the big resorts. Jon greeted us when we arrived, answered all our questions, and shared excellent restaurant and activity recommendations. I only wish we'd had more time to follow up on all of them.
Such a lovely and relaxing space. Jan & Jon were lovely hosts and even offered up some fresh coconut water from the property. We had a great time here!

Lovely house in a cool location on Hawaii. The hot tub is fabulous and the space is stylish and exactly as described. Would stay again! Jan was even helpful when we tried to have a package delivered (harder than it seems in Hawaii)
Jan and Jon were wonderful hosts, easy going, helpful, and deserving of a 5 star review. Thanks Jan and Jon !
Super clean and convenient studio space with everything you need!
It was quite and peaceful. Had a relaxing time in the hot tub.
The Cedar Loft was a great home base to explore the north side of Hawaii, and it is a stunning drive up from Hilo.

This is a studio listing with two beds one of which is in a loft but not enclosed. It's one big room with no privacy if you are traveling with others. Best for a couple. The place was clean and the hottub was a good feature.
Wonderful place to stay.  We enjoyed our time exploring the north of the island...lots of great hiking and beaches nearby.  Clean, well-furnished and well-decorated place with everything you need.

The Ceder House Loft was a great place to stay for exploring Hawi and Pololu Valley. The hot tub is a plus for sure! For a couple it is more than enough space, and the loft bed was really cool. We also really appreciated the washer and dryer in the unit!  The place is really close to Hawi town which was great for getting coffee in the mornings and we ate at Sushi Rock both nights, totally recommend!

name: Studio building  beach front , wifi
summary: Atlântica avenue back. Apartment building in front of beach,  wifi, quiet and clear. Renovated, 20 square meters to the beach, with all the furniture of the pictures. Near restaurants, bars, museum, beach. Transports facilities like metro, bus, ..
space: The apartment is very cool, with all the furniture inside you see in the pictures, internet and  with sheets and towels.
description: Atlântica avenue back. Apartment building in front of beach,  wifi, quiet and clear. Renovated, 20 square meters to the beach, with all the furniture of the pictures. Near restaurants, bars, museum, beach. Transports facilities like metro, bus, .. The apartment is very cool, with all the furniture inside you see in the pictures, internet and  with sheets and towels. The building is in front of the beach, but the apartment is in the back , very quiet. The building has a concierge 24 hours a day. There Near bars, restaurants, museum, transport facilities, like metro, bus, taxis etc... Very near Ipanema and Arpoador Beach Bus, metro, taxis..
neighborhood_overview: Near bars, restaurants, museum, transport facilities, like metro, bus, taxis etc... Very near Ipanema and Arpoador Beach
notes: Prédio em frente a praia de Copacabana com portaria 24 horas, mas o apartamento é de fundos ,  silencioso,  próximo de Ipanema, muito bem localizado.
transit: Bus, metro, taxis..

host.host_about: Sou advogada e trabalho no Rio de Janeiro

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Excellent location, very clean, very convenient... I hope to go back
Muy grata experiencia, el departamento es igual a las fotos, la ubicación es increíble, cruzas la calle y llegas a la playa.

Sandra é muito atenciosa e confiável. Ap fica em prédio em frente a praia de Copacabana, e proximo a Ipanema também. Local perfeito. Portaria 24 horas e vários bons restaurantes próximos. Ap bem organizado, corresponde às fotos. Recomendo muito!!!

Excelente Lugar! Enfrente de la playa, a pocas cuadras de Ipanema, cerca del subte y de todos los buses.
Muy comodo y Limpio.

Estou muito satisfeita com a hospedagem, o apartamento é  exatamente como nas fotos, estava organizado, recém-pintado. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, com acesso de ônibus e metrô para vários pontos turísticos. A recepção da Sandra foi ótima, mantivemos bastante contato pelo celular e ela me deu várias dicas.

L'appartamento è situato in una location perfetta, giusto di fronte al mare in Copacabana. Le foto rispecchiano perfettamente l'appartamento. Sandra è stata una grande host. Noi non l'abbiamo mai incontrata ma ha sempre risposto velocemente ad ogni nostra richiesta / necessità. Unico punto di attenzione: il bagno è veramente piccolo, per chi è un pò in sovrappeso, è complicato entrare nella doccia. In ogni caso, io ci tornerei.

Logement très satisfaisant et fidèle à la description.
Le logement est calme, choses très importante pour ceux qui connaissent le bruit à rio de janeiro.
Difficile d'être mieux situé, on a juste a traverser l'avenidad atlantica pour appeler à la plage, il est a coté d'aporador et d'ipanema.
Sandra est très disponible et a l'écoute.
Je le recommande pour une personne voyageant seul ou un couple (attention salle de bain et wc dans une toute petite pièce).
N'hésitez pas moi j'y retournerais sans hésitez pour mon prochain séjour.

Super recomendo!Ótima hospedagem,próximo de linhas de ônibus ,mercados,de super fácil acesso p ir para qualquer lugar do Rj ,perfeita localidade..apto novinho super confortável,me senti em casa,anfitriã super adorável e muito prestativa!Recomendarei a quem for ao Rj..

A descrição e foto do apartamento é totalmente fiel à realidade. Quarto confortável e localização excelente. Foi tudo muito prático e tranquilo com a anfitriã e os funcionários do prédio. Indicações, chave e senha do wifi prontamente fornecidos, sem problemas. Sandra também foi muito gentil em permitir early check in e late check out, uma vez que não havia outros hóspedes na véspera e no dia seguinte a nossa estada. O banheiro é pequeno em proporção ao quarto, mas isso costuma ser comum neste tipo de apartamento.

Me and my friend had a really good time at the apartment of Sandra. Especially the location is very good (close to the beach, bars and restaurants). The apartment was clean and comfortable. Also the communication with Sandra was really good en quick. She gave is a lot of information about Rio.
I would definitely recommend this apartment!

Desde o momento da reserva fui muito bem atendida pela Sandra,  uma pessoa gentil,  educada e prestativa. O apartamento era exatamente como nas fotos. Tudo bem limpo e cheiroso. Nossa estadia transcorreu de maneira tranquila  e prazerosa. Voltaremos com toda certeza.

O AP é do tamanho ideal para duas pessoas, super limpo e a cama é muito confortável. Possui WiFi, geladeira, fogão, sanduicheira e liquidificador o que contribui muito para estadia. A Localização é ótima e podemos curtir Copa e Ipanema a pé. A Sandra foi uma ótima anfitriã e ofereceu todo suporte necessário. Infelizmente tivemos um pequeno incidente ao utilizar a tomada do banheiro porém Sandra foi compreensiva, pediu para o síndico ir olhar o ocorrido e sempre respondeu quando contactada e isso não atrapalhou nossa ótima experiencia.  Recomendo a todos viajantes :)
Excelente estadia. Não poderíamos ficar numa melhor localização. Indico com segurança.

Although we never met Sandra in person, she was very responsive to our text messages and flexible with our travel arrangements. The Studio apartment worked out really well for our needs. It was clean, and nicely furnished. Refrigerator even had cold water waiting for us! Only downside was that a nearby apartment was being renovated and work started around 7am. Not a huge deal for us as we are usually early risers and were up early to site see anyway.

O AP é muito bem localizado, completamente equipado com utensílios do dia-a-dia e bem organizado; WiFi muito bom; o espeço é ideal para duas pessoas e a anfitriã nos atendeu muito bem quanto a disponibilização das chaves e retorno aos contatos. Ótimo mesmo, super recomendo!

Sandra foi muito clara em todas as informações solicitadas. O bairro é muito bom, seguro, com tudo que é necessário muito perto do apartamento. Nos sentimos muito a vontade no apartamento e no bairro com vizinhança muito hospitaleira e solícita.

Apartamento em ótimo estado, exatamente como foi demonstrado nas fotos. A Sandra foi muito prestativa e nos auxiliou via telefone quando chegamos ao Rio de Janeiro. O apartamento é ótimo para duas pessoas, o Wi-Fi tem um bom sinal e a mesma deixou água e café disponível. O único ponto negativo foi a obra de um prédio ao lado do prédio da Sandra, que acarretou em manhãs mal dormidas, porém, a tendência é que a construção seja concluída e este problema não exista mais.
This is a great place to stay the location is excelente and the room is very warm confortable and home like. Sandra is a great host very helpful. We loved it.

Apartamento em perfeitas condições, igual às fotos do site. Localização excelente, perto de tudo, nos sentimos muito bem.
A Sandra é bastante atenciosa e de fácil acesso pelo celular.  Recomendadíssimo!
Apto muito bem localizado e exatamente como aparece nas fotos. Tudo foi encontrado muito limpo e bem cuidado. Passamos uma semana maravilhosa. Recomendo,.....
Apartamento conforme as fotos, muito bem localizado! A Sandra foi muito prestativa desde o inicio! Recomendo à todos!

O Loft é exatamente como nas fotos, muito confortável e limpo.
A Sandra foi muito prestativa e atenciosa, como sua mãe também.
A localização é ótima. Voltarei mais vezes com certeza.
A minha estadia for perfeita, as fotos mostram o local como realmente é, simples e limpo, o prédio é bem antigo, a localização é a melhor, perto de tudo. Gostei muito e recomendo!

El lugar es como se describe, Sandra muy atenta y muy considerada, el apartamento muy completo y muy limpio y muy cerca de la playa, a solo 20 mts.
Lo recomiendo 100%.

Daniel

Excelente apartamento, muito bem localizado. A anfitriã muito compreensiva e flexível facilitou nossa vida quando tivemos um problema com o voo. Além disso, o apartamento fica próximo a cafés, bares, restaurantes, supermercados... E bem em frente à praia de Copacabana! Com certeza, ficarei aqui de novo quando voltar ao Rio.
A nossa estadia foi muito boa,a Sandra foi flexível com os horários! Recomendo e esperamos voltar mais vezes!
Localização perfeita ,apto fiel as fotos,toalhas macias e limpas,cama muito confortável

Sandra's place was well located right on Copacabana. The accommodation is a small studio- open with a bed, armoire, small table, and very small nook for the kitchen and bathroom. The place was clean, but the bathroom was very small, so something to keep in mind if you need more bathroom space. The studio is located near many amenities and stores. We did not meet Sandra, but she was quick and attentive, checking in during our stay. Recommended.

Olá Sandra, gostamos muito dos dias em que passamos hospedados. A Internet é excelente e nos sentimos muito a vontade, o ap tem sua estrutura interna nova que torna muito aconchegante. Acredito que um feedback positivo para melhorar seria um aumento na estrutura do banheiro, o espaço dentro é muito limitado e pequeno, em especial a pia, que talvez num primeiro momento seria o mais tranquilo à melhorar. Sintamos falta também de algumas indicações sobre passeios e o funcionamento dos mesmos, sugestões de restaurantes, pois pela Internet não tivemsos sorte, ao encontrar os restaurantes muitos de seus comentários não eram bons aí ficávamos muito na dúvida de onde iur! Algumas sugestões seria muito legal ter ao chegar no ap!
 A sua gentileza aos meus questionamentos quando iniciamos  os contatos foi excelente, prestativa e super simpática, adorei conhece lá!! Grande beijo!!
