Even though I never met Sandra she was amazing with communication and helping answer any questions I had. Her place was small and clean and right on the beach, location couldn't have been better. If visiting Rio I highly recommend contacting her.

Me quede en el apartamento los primeros dias de febrero de 2016. La descripción del apartamento y las fotos coinciden con la realidad, Sandra me escribió apenas llegue al apartamento para saber si estaba todo bien, es muy preocupada. Todo estaba muy limpio y tenía todas las comodidades. El barrio es excelente, frente al mar, con restaurantes y supermercados cerca. Además esta muy cerca del paso a Ipanema asi que puedes disfrutar tanto de Copacabana como de Ipanema fácilmente. Volvería a arrendar el apartamento sin duda!
Adorei o espaço de sandra. Bem localizado e bem cuidado.

Eu achei a Sandra um exemplo da máxima da simpatia! O loft é exatamente charmosinho como nas fotos! Correu tudo perfeitamente bem! 
A localização é PERFEITA!
Suuuuuuuper recomendo!

El departamento estaba muy bien ubicado cerca de la playa y las fotos lo reflejan casi tal cual como es. Encontramos todo muy ordenado, pero en cuanto a la limpieza había bastante polvo. Si no se tiene conocimiento del portugués cabe aclarar que los porteros no hablan ningun otro idioma, sin embargo la anfitriona habla Inglés muy correctamente. El lugar tiene dos bares abajo, por lo que siempre hay movimiento a la noche y eso da mas seguridad. Sandra, la anfitriona responde muy rápidamente los mensajes y atiende cualquier inquietud. Lo recomendamos.
EL DEPARTAMENTO ES MUY COMODO Y LIMPIO. LA UBICACION MUY BUENA.

Muy bien  ubicado , lugar tranquilo y silencioso, solo un poco pequeño el baño 
Encontramos todo muy limpio y ordenado
Muy recomendable

A Sandra é uma ótima anfitriã, muito atenciosa, e bem flexível com os horários. O apartamento está muito bem localizado, em um local muito tranquilo e silencioso , e é muito fiel as fotos. As toalhas e roupas de cama são de excelente qualidade, e tudo estava limpo e organizado. Somente o banheiro que é bem pequeno, mas a acomodação não deixa de ser muito aconchegante. Recomendo e Espero poder voltar a me hospedar nesse local.
Excellent location, good room even has a tiny kitchenette, quiet at night, 5 stars.
Sandra foi muito atenciosa desde o princípio. O apartamento é bem localizado e possui tudo que os viajantes precisam para o momento. Sem falar que atravessando a rua está em Copacabana. Recomendado!
Great host! Very accomodating!

Estuve junto con mi novio en el departamento de Sandra la primer semana de junio 2016. Es muy cómodo, estaba muy limpio y equipado con todo lo que necesites (jabón, papel, toallas, etc). Esta sobre la avenida atlántica, lo que es muy cómodo. El edificio es antiguo, de muchos departamentos por piso y la entrada esta dentro de una galería comercial. Tiene portero las 24hs. lo que lo hace seguro y con movimiento todo el tiempo.Sandra fue muy amable y atenta. Se preocupó por nuestra llegada y estadía. Nos pasó tips sobre lugares para cenar y pasear. Es una persona muy atenta!. Recomiendo este alojamiento. 
Sólo una aclaracion, justo al lado hay un edificio en construcción y hay ruidos de obra desde muy temprano.
Ótimo espaço e acomodações, melhor que o esperado, bem localizado
Ótima localização. Tudo porteiros amigáveis.

I could not have been happier with my stay!  The place was clean, close to the beach, and Sandra was very responsive and reachable. I would highly recommend this place and plan on booking it again in the future. Not only is it steps away from Copacabana beach, but it's also a short walk to Ipanema.  Everything you need is in walking distance.
Otima opcao pela boa localização e pelo excelente suporte da Sandra. Dicas e sempre disponivel para ajudar. Indico e voltarei se precisar.
Excellent place. The flat was super clean, perfect location, easy access. I would stay here again for sure. I would have paid double for this flat I could not be happier.
Everything exactly as advertised. Had a great few days and the location couldn't have been better for us. Many thanks Sandra.
Atendeu toda minhas expectativas e necessidades! Sandra sempre pronta para atender! Bem localizado e Apto higienizado! Recomendo!

ótima localização. O apartamento estava limpo e foi entregue no horário combinado. Sandra foi muito atenciosa respondendo prontamente a tudo o que foi perguntado. Wi-Fi funcionou perfeitamente. O banheiro é bem pequeno mas atendeu às necessidades.

QUIERO FELICITAR A SANDRA POR EL DEPARTAMENTO. REALMENTE RESULTO MUY ACOGEDOR, LA UBICACION ES PERFECTA, LAS COMODIDADES TAL CUAL SE DESCRIBEN EN EL ANUNCIO. ADEMAS QUIERO AGRADECER A SANDRA POR SU PREDISPOSICION PARA COORDINAR EL HORARIO DE INGRESO, POR ESTAR SIEMPRE EN CONTACTO Y POR PREOCUPARSE DE LA COMODIDAD DURANTE NUESTRA VISITA. MUCHAS GRACIAS PORQUE NOS HIZO SENTIR MUY A GUSTO Y SIN DUDAS VOLVEREMOS . GRACIAS NUEVAMENTE , BESOS
Sandra was very responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) , helping out with whatever I needed. The apartment is really nice and in a calm environment. Would definately stay again!

Apartamento  adequado ao anúncio. Apenas, banheiro extremamente pequeno, internet bem instável, não funcionou alguns dias e a TV a cabo com pouquíssimas opções de canais. Bairro excelente, apartamento silencioso e limpo.

O apto é exatamente como anunciado, organizado e aconchegante, local perfeito com fácil acesso a todos os meios de transporte.
A Sandra foi muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) toda certeza voltaremos em uma próxima oportunidade.
Me senti muy comodo ,muy buena ubicacion y todos los servicios en las inmediaciones
Location couldn't be better

El departamento está muy bien ubicado en frente de la playa, en un lugar con movimiento de gente hasta la noche, y con seguridad en el edificio. Es chico, pero lo único incómodo es el baño, porque casi no tiene espacio para moverse. El wifi anda muy bien!
Todo muy bueno

O apartamento superou nossas expectativas. Ao chegarmos o local estava em perfeito estado, tudo limpo e organizado, com mimos ja para as hospedes. Ficamos muito satisfeitas com a hospedagem. Wifi, e todos os acessórios na qual consta no anuncio estavam em ótimo estado. A localização é otima. A beira mar, próximo de tudo. Vale a pena a hospedagem.
Muy lindo el dpto. Excelente ubicación. Una zona muy segura y está todo muy cerca y cómodo.
O espaço é muito agradável e muito bem localizado. Recomendo.
Apt pequeno, exatamente o q está nas fotos. Bem localizado. Tranquilo.  Prédio silencioso. Porteiro 24hs.
Maravilloso lugar. Feliz de la elección

Apartamento ideal para um casal! Pequeno e super aconchegante! Tinha todos os itens básicos. Ótima localização. Tivemos um probleminha no chuveiro, mas nossa anfitriã resolveu muito rápido! Prédio seguro e com porteiro 24h. Super recomendado.
Apartamento, localização, limpeza e anfitriã excelentes. Já sei onde quero ficar dá próxima vez que eu voltar ao Rio. Recomendo.

Lo mejor del apartamente es su ubicacion,bajas y cruzas la avda,Atlantica directo a tomar el sol en la playa,solo vas con tu traje de baño y toalla y si necesitas volver al apartamento cruzas la calle y listo.Tienes 2 estaciones de metro a cuadras General Osorio y Cantagalo,por la otra salida del edificio esta la Avda.Nossa Senhora,hay mucho comercio y lugares para almorzar.Para terminar la feria artesanal mas económica de Rio,esta en Avda.Atlantica y empieza como a las 18:00 hasta tarde todas las noches.Solo bajar del depto,e ir a vitrinear.
Estudio pequeño, con excelente ubicación en Copacabana, con wifi. Tuve que llegar temprano y  o hubo problema con Sandra, no es de lujo pero si funcional para una estadía corta

É muito bem localizado, silencioso, próximo a estações de metro, ônibus, de bicicletas... Loft completíssimo! Pensado até os pequenos detalhes. Nossa anfitriã estava sempre disponível. Foi um período sensacional! Custo-benefício extremamente favorável.
A estadia foi ótima. O apartamento é ideal para um casal, além de ficar próximo das praias de copacabana e ipanema, metrô, mercado e muitos outros lugares. Super recomendo!
Um ótimo apartamento. Não é a toa que essa é a segunda vez que nos hospedamos com Sandra. A localização é excelente. Tudo que você precisar tem próximo. Muito movimentada a região.

Appartement très bien situé sur Copacabana et à proximité de Ipanéma. Facile de récupérer la clé de l'appartement a toute heure ça il y a un concierge à l'entrée. Idéal pour court séjour à Rio de Janeiro.

O espaço apesar de pequeno tem ótima localidade. Vc pode contar com estações de metrô e bike Itaú próximas, americanas e inúmeros restaurantes. Para quem for ficar hospedado e vai comer fora indicamos o Copabar nos fundos da galeria com pratos fartos e que servem dois por menos de 25 reias. Segurança do local é ótima tbm ao lado do Emiliano.
Recomendo. Perfeito em tudo.

Apartamento pequeno mas extremamente aconchegante. Possui todos equipamentos necessários. Limpeza e higienização excelentes. Edifício 
 com ambiente seguro e silencioso. Localização privilegiadíssima.

Os dias no Rio foram maravilhosos. Quero agradecer a anfitriã pela flexibilidade de horário no check in. O loft é super bem localizado, limpo e cheiroso. Os porteiros são tri atenciosos. Esperamos voltar em breve.
Lugar agradável, perto de tudo que vc precisa para descansar e/ ou se divertir!

Sandra gave us a few tips of places to eat and had everything prepared for our arrival. While she could not facilitate a late check-out (she had another guests) she kindly offered her mother's house so we could keep our luggage there and enjoy the day. 

The place is not as new as it looks on the pictures and it is quite small but the amazing location makes up for it if you don't intend to stay much at home or do much cooking. 

Thank you, Sandra - we would stay there again.
Ótimo lugar! A descrição é bem realista. Uma kitnet pequena em frente a praia, com um preço justo pela estadia.
O apartamento é exatamente como as fotos, muito bonito e limpinho. A localização é excelente.
Excelente localização e apartamento bem cuidado, voltarei mais vezes.

Excelente ubicación, muchos medios de transporte quedan cerca. Departamento muy cómodo, silencioso y tranquilo, cuenta al 100% con todos los servicios. La atención de Sandra es muy buena y esta al pendiente de cualquier mensaje. La recomiendo muchísimo.
Muito bom!

Sandra's place was at an excellent location, just in front of Copacabana Beach. We felt the neighborhood was very safe with everything we needed near the apartment (supermarkets, the subway station Cantagalo, restaurants and, of course, the Beach). The place was comfortable, clean and well-equipped.

We did not meet Sandra personally, but she was very diligent with our questions during the check-in process. One minor caveat though, the neighboring apartment is being remodeled and there were some noises during weekdays (at least at the time of this review). Since we usually went out, this wasn't really such a great inconvenience.
Ótima localização.
A localização, o acesso ao apartamento nos agradadou muito. Super recomendo!
Ótimo lugar! Limpo, bem localizado, seguro, silencioso, muita atenção da parte da proprietária! Com certeza voltaria, obrigado
This place was very clean, and it was in a great location. I have no complaints.

La ubicación del departamento es inmejorable cerca de todo y muy segura.
Cruzas la calle y estas en la playa de copacabana!
El lugar es tal cual lo muestran las fotos, con el agregado que posee plancha, secador de pelo y toallas para la playa.
No tuvimos inconveniente con el horario de entrada ni salida.
Sin lugar a duda volvería a hospedarme en la casa de Sandra.
Ótimo acesso a praia, so atravessar a avenidade.
Excelente ubicación!!!
Ótima localização,  perto de metrô, parada de ônibus ao lado, supermercados, banco... enfim lugar modesto e acessível.  A anfitriã foi bem prestativa, responde rápido.  Super recomendo o local.

O melhor do apartamento é a localização. É simples, limpo, organizado, fica bem próximo de vários pontos turísticos, podendo ir a pé para as praias Copacabana e Ipanema, e com fácil acesso aos meios de transporte (ônibus, metrô, taxi). Vale muito a pena relação custo/benefício, recomendo.
Excelente la ubicacio y una anfitriona fasntastica.
Limpio. Con todo lo necesario para cocinar, bañarse y poder descansar. A 2 min de la playa y 5 del metro. Repetiría sin duda so vuelvo a Rio

Nos gustó mucho el apartamento. Excelente ubicación y muy limpio. Frente a la playa Copacabana y a 4 cuadras de Ipanema. Cerca de bares, restaurantes, tiendas, metro, buses. Zona segura.
Sandra fue muy amable y respondía enseguida. Además nos dio muy buenos tips para conocer Río!
El wifi era muy bueno, también la cama muy cómoda. El apartamento tal como las fotos. Equipado con plancha, aire acondicionado,  cocina, cafetera, buena heladera, buen secador de pelo. 
Sandra nos dejó papel higiénico, toallas y jabón. Todo para pasar unas lindas vacaciones!!! 
Lo único que le cambiaría es la pileta del baño que es muy pequeña pero igual nos arreglamos y volveríamos al apto!
La mejor relación calidad precio.
Muchas gracias Sandra!!

La ubicación del departamento es excelente, justo frente a la playa de Copacabana (pasando el posto 5), súper cerca de Ipanema, en una zona llena de bares, restaurantes, supermercados y bien conectada con el resto de la ciudad. El departamento está en un edificio con seguridad las 24 hs y en sí es tal cual como se ve en las fotos, chiquito pero bien equipado, ideal para pasar unos días. Esperamos volver pronto a Río porque es una ciudad alucinante y nos encantaría volver a hospedarnos aquí. Gracias por todo, Sandra!
Great space! Provided extra towels for the beach which was so nice! Great WiFi and AC! Loved our stay!

Ótima localização, em frente à praia de Copacabana e muito perto da Pedra do Arpoador ( 5 a 10 min caminhando). Local pequeno porém com tudo no lugar e funcionando. A proprietária passou todas as informações necessárias
Top apartment! Super central located at the beach front. Very good furniture. Great host. Best apartment for a wonderful stay in Rio de Janeiro.
Um apartamento no coração de Copacabana, localizado na Av. Atlântica, um ótimo custo benefício.
Tudo ótimo

El departamento tiene una ubicación excelente, y sandra nos proporcionó todo para tener una muy buena estadia. Lo único que se podría mejorar es la ducha, si se configuraba la temperatura de agua como invierno, después de un ratito saltaba una térmica que había que esperar que se enfríe para poder continuar bañándose. De cualquier manera volveríamos sin dudarlo.

Departamento top! Monoambiente calido y completo. Ubicación inmejorable, frente a Copacabana y a 5 min de Ipanema. Estación de subte, ferias, supermercados y todos los servicios cerca. Sandra me dio buenos tips para conocer mejor El Barrio.
Nice, clean place with a very small bathroom
Excelente

Ótima estadia !! O local é privilegiado , bem em frente à praia de Copacabana e pertinho do arpoador e praia de Ipanema , limpo e organizado , com tudo que precisávamos para ter uma boa estadia , valeu muito !!!
Excelente localização, junto a tudo! É um achado.
Cerca de todo y muy seguro.

The location was amazing! Literally cross the street and you’re at the beach! The apartment was very clean and Sandra was really quick to respond with any questions/problems we had. There were limited utensils in the kitchen and the bed sheets were a little dirty but other then that we loved our stay and would recommend it! Thanks so much Sandra!!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excelente localização na orla de Copacabana, local bastante claro e movimentado o que facilita o passeio a noite. O apartamento é ótimo e equipado com todo o necessário para se passar dias agradaveis no Rio. A Sandra foi sempre muito gentil e solicita as vezes que precisamos dela. Um grande diferencial do apartamento é sua chave magnetica com senha que tras aos hospedes uma tranquilidade a mais por nao ter uma preocupação a mais para levar a chave para a praia.
Boa localização
Ótima localização,Sandra muito atenciosa ,em breve voltarei !

The studio apartment was sparking clean witn excellent location acrooss from Copacabana  Beach and at 10 minutes walking distance from Ipanema beach. Easy access to restaurants, grocery stores and 5 minutes walk to the Metro.  Location is vey alive at night.

A Sandra é uma excelente anfitriã sempre respondeu as mensagens rapidamente e nos forneceu dicas valiosas. O apartamento além de bem localizado é exatamente como mostram as fotos. Local super recomendado para que quiser ter uma maravilhosa experiência no Rio de Janeiro.
Hospedagem muito boa, ótima localização, anfitriã muito educada e disposta a nos atender sempre que tivemos alguma dúvida. Vale muita apenas. Fiquei no réveillon com amigos.

Estuvimos hospedados junto a mi novio en el departamento de Sandra por 13 días ! La ubicación es excelente , cerca de supermercados , restaurantes , la playa  y el metro ! El departamento estaba limpio y había seguridad 24hs ! Espléndidas vacaciones!
Excelente!!!! Vale mt a pena!!!

ótimo apartamento, pequeno, ideal para viajante individual ou casal. espaço limpo, confortável, com utensílios essências, como: ferro de passar, sanduicheira, microondas, fogão, geladeira, ar condicionado, tv, louças... ótima localização, de frente para praia de Copacabana.

Sandra es sin dudas una anfitriona de lujo; lamentablemente no pudimos viajar pero su amabilidad en todo  hace que en el próximo viaje nos alojemos allí. Tiene todo lo que necesitamos Nos evacuó todas las dudas; siempre presente ante cualquier pedido de información. Por ello aun sin viajar  opté por ponerle 5 estrellas  Gracias!!! Sandra y Daniel

name: North Shore Resort, Private room
summary: Some guests have stayed here and rarely left the property.  There Is local entertainment every night at the hotel pool bar.  Guests can check at the hotel and take advantage of other activities offered there.  The beach here is beautiful and the safest during winter waves.  This area is near many points of interest and we are glad to offer ideas and places to explore off the grid.  PLEASE NOTE:  there is a 13 percent hotel tax payable in cash to us at arrival.
space: On the North Shore Oahu, Hawaii.  Home of the best beaches, snorkel, surf swim etc.  We're on the golf course across from a secluded beach. Turtle Bay resort hotel is steps away from us. We have a two story, two bedroom two bath unit.  Close by are heated pools and tennis courts. We have 24 hour security and guest parking.  Hotel ammenities, restaurants and shops are all on site.  Beautiful vegetation and almost always balmy, breezy and warm.  Internet, cable tv.  furnished.  We also have two horses a few miles away and sometimes take people on rides in our mountains with fabulous views ( weather permitting etc.)  We enjoy hosting travelers and love meeting people from other parts of the world.  We lost our little dogs a few years ago and now two cats have moved in with us.  We do love animals and most people!  One of the many things that make us so special is that we are really in the country but with many of the ammenitees of resort life.  There are hiking trails, miles of pristene b
description: Some guests have stayed here and rarely left the property.  There Is local entertainment every night at the hotel pool bar.  Guests can check at the hotel and take advantage of other activities offered there.  The beach here is beautiful and the safest during winter waves.  This area is near many points of interest and we are glad to offer ideas and places to explore off the grid.  PLEASE NOTE:  there is a 13 percent hotel tax payable in cash to us at arrival. On the North Shore Oahu, Hawaii.  Home of the best beaches, snorkel, surf swim etc.  We're on the golf course across from a secluded beach. Turtle Bay resort hotel is steps away from us. We have a two story, two bedroom two bath unit.  Close by are heated pools and tennis courts. We have 24 hour security and guest parking.  Hotel ammenities, restaurants and shops are all on site.  Beautiful vegetation and almost always balmy, breezy and warm.  Internet, cable tv.  furnished.  We also have two horses a few miles away and sometimes
neighborhood_overview: Our gated community on the resort grounds are abundant with tropical vegetation.  Lots of colorful flowers that attract a multitude of birds, we even have a flock of small parrots that fly by every evening.  This is a great place for long walks on the beach or in the woods next to the beach.  You can rent horses and ride on the beach or take a surf lesson. People are friendly here!
notes: Gate entry - press 114 and red button for entry
transit: Our public bus system stops here every hour and goes clear around the island for a couple of dollars.  You can rent a Segway at the hotel and mopeds.
access: Guests have use of pools and tennis courts.  There is a grill at the pools for your use and a covered pavilion at the tennis courts with tables and chairs.  Many of the hotel facilities are available for our guests, restaurants, shops and many rental recreation devices.   Gate entry- 114 and red button for access
interaction: We are usually here to welcome our guests.  We try and be available as needed but we want guests to feel free to come and go uninterrupted.  We love to learn about people from other places and will spend as much time as possible conversing.
house_rules: We are safe for children 5 years or older. Our community here is quiet at 10pm.  We just ask guests, if coming in after 10, to be considerate with noise.  If you're leaving before 8 am do your best to roll suitcases quietly.  Smoking is outside about 20' from building.  There is  air- conditioning in the room but we ask that you use the fan before using the aircon.  Our climate is usually breezy and cool in the evenings unless on rare occasions we loose our trade winds and Hawaii has the highest electric in the nation!

host.host_about: My husband and I are semi retired but very active.  We golf, ride horse, active in our church, and I'm a writer/ oil painter.  Our children are a big part of our life.  My older son Garrett has the guiness record for the biggest wave riden and all the sons and grandsons are competitive surfers.  I was in Portugal for a month last year while Garrett was looking for the waves there.  I've enjoyed traveling to Bali, Canada, Mexico, France, All of the US, and Japan.  I built a house in Belize in the '70s.  I've been here in Hawaii 30+ years.'

reviews.comments:
Mary is a fantastic host who makes you feel right at home.

You will get your'e private room and own bath with a private entrance thru the garden if you choose. And a Super comfy large bed.
Access to a chlorine free sweet water pool and endless charcoal BBQ's ; )
Also walking distance to several bars at the Turtle bay resort,  numerous classes and spectacular beaches. Mary may even take you along to a FAB golfing experience and you may get to meet her and Bernie's beautiful horses.

Will be happy to be a guest again!
Malia was very open and inviting with her home. The spare bedroom is a good size and the mini fridge is great especially if you have an extended stay.

Mary and Bernie were perfect hosts- made me feel completely at home, guided me on where to travel around the island and took great care of me. Am looking forward to meeting them again at sometime in the future.

Mary's home was cozy, and comfortable. She and her husband were adorable! I had a great time here, and felt at home. Turtle Bay, which is within 5 minutes of the place, offers the most spectacular, amazing sunsets. Restaurants, bars, shrimp trucks, and gorgeous beaches are all within a 10 minute drive of this location. I would recommend this place for your stay in the north shore if you're looking for a 1 bed/1 bath type of place to rent.

Malia was an absolute delight to stay with. She opened her home and her community to me. An extremely great stay! Her home is right next to the Turtle Bay resort and right next to the Bus. Whether with a car or without you'll have a great stay! Absolutely recommend staying here.

Well I hate to say too much or I'll never be able to book back here but...I loved the area, the room , the environment and Mary and Bernie were fabulous hosts and we had much in common.  Easy-going, peaceful, artistic, joyful time....all was great.  This place is a perfect spot to recharge ....a Headquarters for your adventures.  It truly was memorable and I will always cherish my time with such great hosts as Mary and Bernie.   Thank You for being part of AirBNB :)  Hope to come back soon !

Malia was a great host - everything went very smoothly.  We were delighted to be welcomed by fresh flowers and local fruit upon arrival.  She respected our privacy but was quite friendly and easy to talk to each morning before we headed out to explore the island.  She gave us some great recommendations of nearby hikes and beaches to explore.

The room was a good size and fairly clean.  Full disclosure, we did have an encounter with a gecko and one mosquito while in the room.  Malia's husband smokes outside the condo, but luckily on the opposite side from the bedroom so it was not an issue for us (no cigarette smell inside the bedroom at all).  She has two adorable small dogs but they do not have access to the unit.  I have bad dust mite and cat allergies and mild dog allergies but had no problem here.  

The heated pool was awesome - we had it completely to ourselves when we took a dip there.  Probably 50 yards from the unit.  Parking was easy for our rental car.  We arrived late in the evening and Malia was very accommodating.  

Would stay again

Great location, for a great price, with great people! Malia and Bernie are excellent hosts and the kind of guys you really want to spend some time talking to. These guys have really lived! We went up to the ranch to feed the horses and see some real Hawaiin country with Bernie and the dogs, and Malia and Bernie showed us all the local surf breaks suitable for my level - I guess it helps that both Malia's sons are pro surfers but if your into surfing make sure you ask Bernie about "that wave" too!

Malia and Bernie were wonderful hosts. I truly enjoyed getting to know them while I was staying in the room and the location for the price is unbeatable. If I ever get back I will see if the room is available again, and if not I will definitely go by and say ‘hi’ and catch up. Thank you again for everything! I do hope Bernie is feeling better!
Great people great room and location we really liked bernie and malia

Maria and Bernie were very nice hosts, and were very welcoming into their home. We even attended the same wedding as them coincidentally! 
We really appreciated them giving us tips on where to go, there is an amazing secluded beach right across the golf course that we really enjoyed. The location and their home was perfect.

Malia and Bernie's home is conveniently located on the north shore, just a few minutes from Turtle Bay Resort. They are a nice couple and always there to give you tips or suggestions on where to go, or to answer questions. If you're lucky, you might even get a chance to drive to the ranch to meet their beautiful horses!

We stayed a few days with Malia & Bernie. They were fine hosts. Very friendly and knowledgeable. Bernie always had strong coffee brewed which he shared with us. Our room was small but comfortable and even has a small fridge in the closet. Also the guest bathroom and shower is right outside the bedroom door.

Had a great stay for my nephew's wedding over at Turtle Bay which probably could walk to, but we drove, as to us it was a bit hot in Hawaii. Look forward to staying again in the future. Thanks!
6 out of 5 stars. Excellent location on the north side and very nice room.

Very nice location on the north shore. The room was a bit small and so the bed, but all was clean and comfortable. Some beach stuff was provided. We will definitely recommend for a short stay on the north shore.

I had an awesome time at Malias house. She is very friendly and made me feel like 'I am home'. The room was great and the location at the popular North Beach of Oahu is fabulous with beautiful bays and beaches near by. I defenitely want to go back. Thanks again!

Location! Location! Location! . . . And, a deal that can't be beat!  My daughter and I had a wonderful week on the North Shore, and with this lovely stay immediately adjacent to the Turtle Bay Resort, we felt very much in paradise.  The room and surroundings are exactly as pictured, but what isn't mentioned is that their condo walls are covered by beautifully painted island art which were done by Malia over the years...really great!  We easily walked to all the resort amenities, enjoyed soaking up the sun at the resort's public beach, and watched surfers on the other side with the bigger waves.  My daughter and I were there over Mother's Day, and we were delighted to come back after the day's activities to 2 luscious, chocolate covered strawberries Malia shared with us, which were part of her Mother's Day gift!  Their condo is in a gated community which made us feel very secure.  Their backyard is the well-manicured golf course.  We were there to visit friends in Laie, just a 10-15 min. drive away, and at times when they couldn't drive us, we easily took the bus (the stop is just outside the condos' gated entry).  I've already spread the word of this great Turtle Bay abode to many friends, but hope it will be available for us again, too, in the future!

I want to thank Bernie and Malia, and Minnie and Pearl, for opening up their home to me! I had a wonderful time staying with them for 3 days. I explored Turtle Bay area and the beach and had a lovely, restful time with them. The room is exactly like the pictures, they had a mini fridge with some treats in the closet, and plenty of space for me to put my stuff. 
The birds were always joyful and waking me up, Bernie had coffee going for me in the morning. And was a wonderful host.
Thanks so much for sharing your bit of paradise!
Maholo!

Bernie was a gracious host, and the fresh coffee was  appreciated every morning (as were the thoughtful snacks and fruit they offered).

We really enjoyed the local beach (very quiet) as well as the pool with our 7 month old daughter.  They even had a pull out cot for her to sleep on.  

Their location was perfect for our stay, and walking distance to friends at the Turtle Bay resort. And you can't beat the price :)

Thanks again Bernie, and we hope to meet you next time Malia!

I had a good time at the north shore. It's a nice place ant the people are really friendly. 
Thank you!
The reservation was canceled 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 85 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The reservation was canceled 93 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I want to thank's Malia for the wonderful time I had when I was staying at her home. The room was very nice and clean and Malia was a great host. Whenever I come back, I would stay with her again.

My sister and I had a wonderful time at Malia's. She's very knowledgeable about the area and it was wonderful to have such great advice. I loved being able to walk to the beach and go swim! Malia and her husband are very relaxed and easy going; they allow you as much privacy as you want, but are friendly and great conversationalists.

Malia's place is super clean, quite and has a great location! Malia is soooo welcoming, she offered me ride to haleiwa for dinner, provided tons of helpful advices for getting around, and gave me a gift when I left:)

Will stay here again next time visiting north shore! Highly recommend.

Holly

What a great experience! The location was perfect for exploring the island and the unit is just across the fairway from the beach and a lovely stroll. The room itself was great–the bed was really comfortable, there was a little sitting area, and Malia has supplied a small refrigerator and miscellaneous beach supplies. This is a very clean and neat house, Something I really appreciate. There is a very comfortable bathroom right next to the bedroom and the guest area is overall pretty private. The hosts! This is a very comfortable household and if wanted, the hosts are more than willing to chat and recommend activities and places to go. At the same time, they respect your privacy and it is very easy to go hang in your room by yourself if that's what you want. This is the best AirBnB I've ever stayed in!

I really enjoyed my time at Malia's place. She is a very thoughtful and wonderful host!! The room is just as seen in the picture - clean, airy and lots of natural light. The bed is very comfortable too and the bathroom was also very clean. Malia also had some treats (fresh fruit and granola bars), drinks in the mini fridge in the room and snorkeling gear. I also thoroughly enjoyed the fresh coffee (brewed fresh every morning by Malia) and conversations with Malia. She is very knowledgeable about the area, things and activities to do around and in other parts of Oahu. On the day of our arrival, Malia and Bernie waited for us to arrive  to show us around even though they had a dinner to attend. The day I was leaving, Malia gave me a beautiful print of one of her water color paintings. Both Malia and Bernie were very helpful and available for questions or anything that you may need. I was there to attend a wedding at Turtle Bay and asked for an iron and board to iron my dress and they promptly provided both.  As noted by other vacationers, the room and the bathroom are in a private corner of the house and your privacy is well respected. I loved the North Shore and Malia’s place was definitely a part of the great experience. I will definitely stay here again the next time I visit the North Shore!

Thank you Malia for having us at your home! Your home was very nice and the room was spacious and comfortable! Malia was a very wonderful host who gave great advice to us on what to do and where to go. She is also a fantastic artist! The location was also walking distance to turtle bay beach. It was a very pleasant stay and i would reccomend come back to stay again. Thanks!

Aloha Malia, 

You are da bestest! I enjoyed staying in your home.  You are a wonderful host. As you know, I was pretty busy and was coming and going at odd hours.  But you were very kind and understanding.  I wish I could have spent more time sitting and talking story. But what little time we got to chat was enjoyable.  I especially liked hearing about your big wave riding sons and your kendama-expert grandchild.

You are at the top of my list for places to stay in Hawai'i. 


Ke Akua pū a hui kaua,

Michael Horito

Malia's place is in great location, within walking distance from the Turtle Bay Resort and many beaches, and the room was really cosy. It has been "upgraded" since taking the photos, there is a big comfy bed and a flat screen TV. The room is also equipped with a fridge, and there were drinks and some snacks provided in the room ,which was really nice surprise.  

Malia and her husband were  great hosts and always available for any questions. We even played a round of golf with Malia. 

Highly recommended :-)

Malia and Bernie were great hosts!  We appreciated their friendliness, flexibility, and tips for dining and snorkeling.  The room and amenities were all as described, and we found them to be clean, functional, and comfortable.  The location is PERFECT for exploring the North Shore. We had easy access, via our rental car, to great beaches/snorkel sites such as Shark's Cove, Waimea Bay, Kulima Cove, and Malaekahana SRA.  Also, were we close to markets, fruit stands, and plenty of food trucks serving an impressive variety of cuisines.  Highly recommended if you plan to spend most of your time hanging around the North Shore!

We stayed at Malia's place for three days. The room was very
cozy and nice. It is located directly at turtle bay, just a 5 minute walk away from the beach. Malia also offered us to use the swimming pool and the bbq next to her house. In the room there were some beach tools like a parasol which was really great to have at the beach. The bathroom was very clean. Our private room was next to Malias and Bernies living room, but they gave us as much privacy as we needed. Thank you for the stay!

I could not have asked for a better first time experience using airbnb! Malia and Bernie were so welcoming and provided us with helpful suggestions about things to do such as where to hike, paddle board, snorkel, and eat. We went to a wedding and the party stayed at Turtle Bay Resort and it was an easy two minute walk to hang out with them! If you want an "authentic", affordable, safe place to stay on the north shore this is it!

Malia, Bernie and their dog Pearl were excellent hosts.
House was in safe and quiet location, and our room was clean. 
This place made us feel at home in North Shore.

Malia and her husband Bernie are wonderful hosts.  We felt very welcome in their home.  Although we were sharing their house, we hardly heard them at all. Malia made coffee in the morning and Bernie even let my wife watch part of a football game with him.  They were both very happy to give advise on local beaches and shrimp trucks, etc.  Great hosts!  Thanks so much!!!

Staying at Mary's place in the Turtle Bay resort was exactly what I needed, peaceful relaxation in a beautiful clean and airy room. The perfect host: there was complimentary cereal bars in my room and lemonade in the fridge, towels and shampoo. It felt like a home from home! Highly recommended!

Malia and Bernie are gracious hosts, who are happy to share stories and tips on the North Shore. The room is cozy, very clean, and is located on the ground floor away from the living area, and near the front door for easy access. With this being said, be aware of two things. First, the AC unit is "for emergency use only, please" to keep costs and carbon footprints low. The October trade winds kept us cool, but the open windows needed for airflow left few sounds private. Second, they have a really sweet older dog. However, there is a doggy potty pad located right outside the bedroom door, which led to some surprises on our way in and out. Overall, we had a pleasant stay. Just come prepared for the trade winds and furry friends.

Comfortable accommodation in a central spot for exploring the Windward Coast and North Shore of Ohau. 
Location is great for access to Turtle Bay Resort and the beaches there.

My stay with Malia and Bernie was phenomenal. I wanted to get away from the hustle and bustle of town so at the last minute I looked into staying in North Shore. Many places had been booked as expected with 3 days notice, not to mention VERY expensive. I saw this place and immediately reserved. Within 30 minutes Malia accepted my request and sent me a welcome message. I didn't know what to expect as this was my 1st time using Airbnb. I took bus 55 from town and got dropped off right in front of the condos at Turtle Bay. Upon walking in the door I felt at home. I cant say enough good things and could go on for days so I will try to keep it brief:

Located in the resort area of Turtle Bay overlooking the golf course and only steps away from a heated pool, private beach, golf course, Turtle Bay resort, restaurants, tennis courts and bus stop.

The room and bathroom were clean, comfortable and well put together. King size bed (the most comfortable bed I've ever slept on), mini fridge with drinks, a basket of snacks, hangers in the closet, pamphlets on what to do, flat screen TV, 2 fans and an AC unit. With a window, sliding glass door and northern trade winds I never even turned on the AC. Both Malia and Bernie went out off their way to make sure I was comfortable. They were always available if I needed them, willing to chat if I wanted or not if I didn't. Bottom line if you want to stay in a comfortable place that feels like home away from home with kind and generous hosts for an affordable cost this is the place. I will absolutely be back next year and truly cannot thank them enough for making my trip a great one!

Malia and Bernie were gracious and very helpful hosts. When asked, they would suggest places to eat, where to go, or how to go.  They also lent us their sewing supplies when we needed it.  Room was airy and clean.  Even if we stayed in the same house, their presence was never imposing and they let us be.
Location is great since it is within the Turtle Bay and we had a wedding to attend there.  The designated parking slot is a plus too.

I really enjoyed my time at Malia's place. She is a very thoughtful and wonderful host! The room is just as seen in the picture - clean, airy and lots of natural light. The bed is very comfortable too and the bathroom was also very clean.  I also thoroughly enjoyed the fresh coffee (brewed fresh every morning by Malia) and conversations with Malia.

If you like your accommodations to be quiet and private this place is for you. The large room is very clean full of all the amenities you could ever want. It is also very tastefully decorated. You also have your own bathroom. Malia makes it very homey with welcoming snacks and a fridge full of cold drinks. The king size bed is very comfortable giving you a wonderful night sleep. Laundry facilities were made available to us also which was greatly appreciated. The ocean is a short walk away where you can watch the sun set or swim. Malia is always full of ideas of where you can go and what you can do on the north shore. That was very helpful. It really added to our whole Hawaiian experience.

Host Malia was very responsive on email, and indeed made me feel welcome.  She is booked weeks in advance so reserve early!  Location is within walking distance (5-6 mins) from Turtle Bay resort so location is ideal.  I'd do it again for sure!

We had a lovely time at Turtle Bay. Our host Mr. Bernie was very nice and the house was lovely. We slept in the best bed ever! Everything was very neat and clean and our daughter loved the heated swimmingpool! I would certain go back! Thanks again!

We felt really at home and the bed was the best!! Everything was clean and tidy and although we didn't get to meet Malia, her husband was really helpful. Kitchen was easy to use, our bathroom was immaculate and it was great to have out own carpark.  Our favourite listing in Hawaii!!!!

I really enjoyed staying Malia and Barney's condo!!
They welcomed me so warmly and I was able to relax so much.  It's walking distance from their condo to the turtle bay resort that has nice restaurants and great beaches.
I had been thinking I want to stay in Hawaii with doing nothing just relaxing, and finally my dream came true at Malia and Barney's place.
Thank you so much!
I absolutely come back you your place to cook nishime! See you again!

Most pleasant surprise of my Hawai'i trip. This is my first ever airbnb stay. I have booked it so long ago, as I drove to the Northshore, I did not remember everything about the place that I read when I booked it. I was amazed when I entered the neighborhood. I did not realize I was in the sought after Northshore right next to the Turtle Bay. The house looks like it is made for airbnb. The room is right next to the front door and the bathroom is right next it. Provides absolute privacy from the rest of the house. 
The room looks exactly like the picture. Cozy, comfortable and you are surrounded by breathtaking paintings. Everything is neatly in order. Room has a key in case you are worried about security of your possessions. And yet I have never felt more secure in my own home or neighborhood like I did this week at Malia and Bernie's home.
There is a personal touch like the basket with healthy snacks, the mini refrigerator with the juices and all the lotions and shampoos you may want in the bathroom. I did not expect any of this at all when I was looking to spend 7 nights in someone's house for a bargain price. After having stayed in sterile impersonal hotels that provided no frills for the expense, this was a breath of fresh air.
The bathroom is like the room too. Clean, looks good as new bathtub, a cheerful shower curtain and the most eye pleasing paintings on the wall. 
The access to kitchen and knowing there is a beach 5 minutes away from the house was a nice extra for me. 
But the surprise of all are the hosts. Malia and Bernie made me feel at home, were generous and more than kind. Malia directed my attention to all the things only a local would know to do on the island and I was grateful for her planning most of my week and making the stay so enjoyable. When I did not get to see any surfers, on the last day of my stay she even went with me to show me the right beach to watch surfers. I would not have known to go there. 
Everyday there is a good morning and at the end of the day she was happy to listen to anything you want to tell her about the day. Again, not knowing anything about airbnb really, I did not expect this personal attention and help with my sightseeing adventures!
This is one week I will never forget. I was looking to stay somewhere less expensive and ended up feeling like I went to a favorite cousin's home and all the adventure was a bonus.

We felt very welcome, and the accommodations were lovely -- the bed is super comfortable! We loved that there was a fridge and snacks in our room. We also really appreciated access to beach towels. Overall just a really great, welcoming experience. Thanks, Malia!

I spent five nights in Malia and Bernhards accomadation at the Turtle Bay Resort, which is licated near Kahuku. I had a nice room with enough space for my clothes and bits and pieces. After my excursions around the beautiful North Shore, I swam in the pool, were they live and than, I wrote E-Mails in their living room. I always had a coffe or tea. I also played golf with Malia and we had fun. Even though I am a beginner in this sport. I can highly recommend this accommodation!

Malia and Bernie were amazing hosts. 
The room has everything including a mini fridge, flat screen TV, and an extremely comfortable king size bed. 
This extremely warm and inviting couple made our stay worry-free and included helpful tools for the beach (cooler, boogie boards, beach chairs *very useful*, and snorkelling gear). 
Bernie made a pot of coffee every morning and invited us to have a cup, we thank him very much for this helpful gesture. 

Being right on the golf course and having beaches near by was just the cherry on top of our wonderful stay.

First english review, dann deutsche Bewertung ;)

First of all: Malia and Bernie are amazing hosts! Both are very helpful and nice. Thank you so much for having me, I enjoyed every second of my trip - especially because of all the perfect suggestion on how to spend my time on Oahu!

The room as well as the bathroom are very clean. The huge bed is so comfortable. I slept like a baby. A huge plus are the parking slot in front of the house and the heated pool. Not to mention the own fridge in the room, the healthy snacks and the beach towels.

The location is perfect for exploring the North Shore! If I’m lucky enough to come back to Hawaii, I would stay with Malia and Bernie again!

**************************************************************

Eins vorweg: Malia und Bernie sind wunderbare Gastgeber! Beide sind sehr hilfsbereit und nett. Malia gibt außerdem tolle Tipps, was man in der Umgebung unternehmen kann oder was man nicht verpassen sollte. Wer braucht da einen Reiseführer?!

Sowohl der Raum selbst als auch das Badezimmer waren sehr sauber. Das Bett ist wahnsinnig bequem. Großes Plus ist sowohl der Parkplatz quasi direkt vor der Tür, als auch der beheizte Pool. Ganz zu schweigen vom eigenen kleinen Kühlschrank im Zimmer, den bereitgestellten Snacks und die Badetücher für den Strand.

Die Location selbst ist perfekt, um die Nordküste zu entdecken. Sollten mich die Passatwinde in Zukunft wieder nach Hawaii wehen, würde ich wieder bei Malia und Bernie übernachten.

Malia and Bernie were the most hospitable hosts and welcomed us into their home like old friends.  Like numerous others, this was the first time we have used airbnb and were not disappointed.  The room is EXACTLY as pictured, the bed is like a cloud to sleep in.  After a 9 hour flight and 1 1/2 drive from Honolulu, we wanted a nice quiet place to catch our breath and this was certainly it.  The room Malia & Bernie offer (along with bathroom for our own use just outside bedroom door)  is very clean, comfortable, safe and  importantly quiet.  Both Malia & Bernie are very considerate of their visitors and are quiet people themselves.  Malia having lived in Hawaii for many many years recommended  places to see, eat etc and we had numerous chats over the four nights we spent with them.  They both made us feel very welcome and as mentioned in other posts, Malia left snacks in our room and in the small fridge also in our room which we managed to enjoy over the days that we were there.  I would highly recommend this accommodation to any travelling couple, single person and also very safe for a single female travelling alone.  It's a great place to stay as a base if wanting to explore the North Shore and East Coast however you will need a car to get to the surf breaks such as Pipeline and Sunset.  The good thing is that nowhere is far on the Island so you can see a most of the coastline in a very short time.  Thank you again Malia and Bernie for inviting us into your home and extending us your hospitality.  Aloha

Mary and Bernie were lovely hosts: responsive on email, accommodating with the departure time, and recommendations for food. My boyfriend and I stayed there for a long weekend to explore North Shore and loved being able to drive to both Haleiwa and Laie very easily.  The condo is in a residential section on the edge of the Turtle Bay Resort within walking proximity to hiking trails, beaches, and restaurants. The room is stocked with juices, snacks, and beers which was a nice touch as well.

Malia was a lovely host!  My sister and I received great hospitality from her throughout our stay.  The room was very clean and had a lot of amenities. It was also located in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood with a very comfortable king sized bed!
Malia greeted us in Hawaiian tradition. Mahalo for your great welcome.

It was a pleasure to stay at Malias and Bernies place. They are lovely and gave us good locally advices. Their place is nice with a really conformable big size bed and located directly in Turtle Bay. It is easy to go by public bus anywhere around the coast at north shore. We will come back to the pipeline and definitely stay with you again ;-)
Giulia and Peter

Very friendly and helpful hosts and Turtle Bay is a great location. 

 We had some problems with ants (we lived in Hawaii for awhile and know this can sometime happen) but our hosts took care of it right away.

Malia and Bernie were lovely. They gave us a lot of privacy and understood that we usually home late at night. The place is convenient if you want to hang around north shore, it is 2 mins drive or 5 mins walk to the turtle bay beach. The only minor issue I have is the shower, it requires a lot of power to turn on the tab.

Thank you so much Malia. Your place was perfect for us. Beautiful room and really nice surroundings close to the famous North Shore. We will be definitely back one time. Everything was wonderful and Oahu so gorgeous. Malia was really kind and did everything to make our stay as comfortable as possible. She got a lot of good advises for hikes and other things to do. I can recommend Malias place at it´s best. Nice people, nice place and so close to the beach and North Shore. Good to stay a little bit away from the big city and enjoy the nature of Hawaii.

We were very nicely welcomed by Malia. A few things were a little bit of a surprise but all ended up good. We were very happy spending 6 nights in Malia's home. First I thought the room had an outside entrance from looking at the picture but found out it wasn't and we needed to enter the house. No problem. their door is always open and we came and went whenever we wanted. The second surprise was that our bathroom was not in our room but the door right next to us. Since we are the only guests sleeping there, and the hosts sleep upstairs, it was not a problem, though a little problem during the day when they are downstairs. They were very hospitable and knowledgeable so we enjoyed sharing their house. Parking very convenient. When we finished running around during the day it was great to be able to use the grounds of the Turtle Bay Resort. Special treat to be able to be at the pool bar and drink,eat,watch surfers and sunset at the same time.  Coffee made early and some packaged biscuits in our room. Almost forgot to mention there is a dog and cat. As long as you are okay with a small bedroom in someone's home, where they are totally okay with you sharing their kitchen and living space, you would want to stay with Malia and Bernie.

I felt very comfortable and the welcome was very nice. Malia waited for me and showed me the room and bath. Everything was clean and shower gel, shampoo, conditioner was offered to use. Like in a hotel. In the morning I got a coffee offered what was very nice as well. Malia and Berry are very relaxed and help you with every question you have.
Thanks for the nice stay.
Malia met us as we arrived. It was a room in their home with a bathroom right next to it. We didn't use the kitchen. There was a small fridge in the room. Served our needs.

Thank you for your kindness welcome. It was very comfortable and peaceful.
I hope you guys take care. Thank you.

Malia was very welcoming and we felt very comfortable throughout the 6 nights we stayed at her home. Everything we needed was provided, even more than we expected. The surrounding is absolutely beautiful and the location is perfect to explore the island. The North Shore is spectacular and we are glad that we chose this part of the island. High recommendation!

We stayed with Malia and her husband Bernie on the North Shore of Ohau in their lovely home overlooking the golf corse at Turtle Bay for 5 nights. They were very friendly and welcoming which made our stay very enjoyable. Malia has lived here for many years, her recommendations for places to visit  and things to do (across the island), and local eateries was exceptional. She always had time to interact and see if we had enjoyed our day! We also used the pool and tennis courts at the accommodations (excellent)! I would certainly recommend staying here to anyone... It's a wonderful escape from the tourist hub of Waikiki.

We really lucked out finding this place on North Shore for such a great price. A condo located right in the midst of Turtle Bay resort, you really can't beat it. Malia and Bernie were also terrific hosts! Their home is beautiful and the room we stayed in was very clean and comfortable. It is right by the front door which made it easy to come and go as we pleased without creating a whole lot of noise. The bathroom is also located right next to the room and was basically our own. They even offered us shampoo and soap as well as fresh bath towels and beach towels. We were also welcomed to prepare food in their kitchen and we were offered coffee in the morning. We had an amazing vacation in Hawaii and loved staying here. Highly recommend this spot!

Malia was an excellent host during our stay! She really made us feel welcome and was very knowledgeable about North Shore sites and restaurant. Our room had a wonderful breeze all day long and the bed was amazingly comfortable. We would love to stay here again!

My husband and I had a wonderful stay at the north shore of Oahu with Malia and Bernie. Located in condos next to the Turtle Bay resort, we found the room to be super comfortable and convenient to everything. A short walk across the golf course brought us to the rocky beach where we saw a monk seal sunbathing! The drive to other north shore sites, and even to Honolulu was nice and easy (accept for traffic in Honolulu!). The bed was super comfortable, the host provided bath towels, beach towels, beach chairs, and bath robes for us! So nice! We used the pool just a few doors down - lovely. Malia made coffee every morning and we had some time to visit and get to know her and Bernie. It was like visiting family; we felt very much at home. Thank you Malia & Bernie!

We had marvelous journey at Malia's home!! The room is spacious, clean and well organised, and the bed is very comfortable!
In addition to that, Malia has received us warmly, gave us some interesting advice... She show a remarquable availability for us and adapted her behaviour to her guests ( she was ready to talk when we wanted, answered to our questions...). We will never forget the north Shore and Malia & Bernie 's reception! Thank you for everything

Wonderful Airbnb experience! I would recommend in a blink of an eye. We stayed with Bernie and Malia in their lovely home at Turtle Bay for 5 nights and it was absolutely amazing. The room had a cool breeze (no need to use AC) and the bed was very comfortable. The area is very beautiful, come and quiet, lots of flowers and birds everywhere. Best of oahu beaches to visit close by, some by foot some by a car. (parking space was available right next to the house)
We enjoyed some chat with Bernie, Malia was on a trip most of our time there, but we also got to meet her which was very nice.
The pool was also nice but we only went there once (why go to the pool while the ocean is so close :) )
Fresh coffee every morning and some beach equipment for us to use was a very nice thing, Thank you! 
We would love to stay with you again!

Mary und Bernie waren wunderbare Gastgeber. Sie haben sichergestellt dass wir alles hatten was wir benötigen und waren immer vor Ort wenn wir eine Frage oder eine Bitte hatten.  Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön. Sie hat alles was man benötigt. Es liegt in einer tollen Umgebung und nahe von Stränden, Waimea Bay und Park, Haleiwa, Sharks Cove, Pipeline, Sunset, etc. 
Wunderbare Anlage mir wunderbaren Gastgebern. Wir freuen uns in naher Zukunft hier wieder zu übernachten.  

Mary and Bernie were GREAT hosts. They made sure we had everything necessary for a comfortable stay. They checked in a couple of times to ask if we needed anything and were always available if we had a question or request. They very much shows the aloha.

The place was very very nice. Great space. It has everything one needs. It is located in a great spot. Close to beaches, Waimea Bay and Park, downtown Haleiwa, etc. Not very far from Sharks Cove, Pipeline, Sunset, etc.

GREAT property with a GREAT host. We look forward to coming back here renting in the future. Mahalo!

Our stay at Malia and Bernie's place was exceptional! We stayed for a week and felt right at home. They provided some snacks and drinks for us (there is a mini-fridge in the room) and were extremely helpful with suggestions for things to do and places to see. There were nice personal touches throughout the house and we were told to make ourself at home. The location is great, close to nice restaurants at Turtle Bay Resort, many food trucks, and great beaches! The famous Pipeline is just a few minutes' drive away. Air conditioning is available for the room as needed (we used it a few times because of an unusually warm early September weather pattern) but we were usually fine with the screen door open and the provided fans. Bernie and Malia were great hosts!
We had a very good Time at your Place. The neighberhood was quite. Bernie was very friendly and gave us good hints where to go to the beach and for Dinner. Unfortunately we didn't met Manila.

I booked for my son who was traveling on his own. he was very well received and Malia even sent me a lovely personal note that he was safe and welcome. That was very special and i love the personal touch. My so has let me know the location was perfect,close the the turtle bay resort (3 min walk) had a little fridge and was very comfortable and safe. Malia and her husband made him feel very welcome.

Malia and Birney were very welcoming ! They are so nice and we felt right at home.  They have a nice home and a spacious room  . Their neighborhood is private and close to the beach. We really enjoyed staying with them and highly recommend it.

Malia and Bernie were excellent hosts - low key and incredibly helpful and accommodating.  Our flight got in really late and we didn't get to them until close to midnight and it was pouring with heavy tropical rain, but Malia was there ready to greet us with an umbrella.  The room was perfect and just as pictured/described.  The location is great too with all the amenities and scenery of the Turtle Bay Resort. We also appreciated the little touches like the juice and granola bars in the room and even a toothbrush and shower puff each.  Malia also helped us prep for the trip advising on car rentals and even letting us ship a SIM card to the room so that we could use our phones as soon as we got there.  Thanks so much for looking after us.  We only wish we had time to meet with you more.  We wouldn't hesitate to book here again.

He was there to meet us.  He came out with a fob to open the gate. He showed us where to park.  He had every thing ready for us Including a bowl of snacks on the dresser and Island juice in our in-room refrigerator.

Although we didn't get the pleasure of meeting Malia, Bernie was a fantastic host. The room is cosy and private with everything we needed.  Their beautiful house is nestled in the Turtle Bay Resort grounds with easy access to pool, beaches and great walking trails. Bernie had great tips for the local scene and the wifi was a godsend for me who was trying to operate a business whilst abroad. I would definitely recommend this property and the North Shore.
It was really great staying at Malia's. She is a lovely host.

Malia provides a beautifully kept room in an excellent location on the north shore. They were very welcoming and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We did notice that mosquitos had been a problem for another guest but we had no such issues. I would recommend to others and stay again myself if I have the chance.

Malia and Bernie are super friendly and welcoming. It's just like staying with family. 
We stayed with them for 4 days and we really enjoyed the attention to detail. Everything you need is right there. The bed is big and comfy and there is a good size fridge in the room. 
The location is perfect for exploring the North Shore and driving down both coasts. 
We had a great time here and will definitely recommend staying with Malia and Bernie.

My husband and I had a great stay with Malia and Bernie. They were very friendly and welcoming and very helpful with everything we needed. The room is right next to the front door and the bathroom is right next it. The room looks exactly like the picture. Very clean, comfortable and had a nice breeze during the night. There were fresh coffee every morning, which was a very nice thing, and they let us use the kitchen to prepare our sandwiches. They provided bath towels, beach towels, beach chairs, and bath robes. The location is perfect for exploring the North Shore as well as the East Coast of the Island. It was a great choice. Thank you so much for your hospitality!
Great stay with Malia and Bernie - perfect location for exploring the North Shore! Malia gives you all the great tips about where to go! And the house is full of her paintings - very cool.

It was my first air BnB experience where I shared a house and it went great. I didn't get to meet Mary as she was away but her husband Bernie looked after us. He made us feel very welcome and told us to make ourselves feel at home which we did. He let us do our own thing and would usually be relaxing outside but was there to answer any questions we had. The room in itself is super nice and the bed soooo comfortable! All we needed. There was towels, loofers, toothbrushes, hair dryer etc. Every amenities you need. Bernie also told us we were free to use the coffee machine whenever we wanted and sit at the dinning table to eat. During the trip we also needed to do a load of wash and no laundromat around so Bernie let us use his washer/dryer for a very small fee but so convenient for us. We didn't use any of the facilities as we were sightseeing but there's a super quiet pool right there and the beach is literally just across the golf course. The Turtle bay resort is also around the corner and you can dine there or have a drink at the bar. It's about a 20 min drive to Haleiwa the main town but close to the Polynesian cultural center. But if you choose to stay there you don't really need to go anywhere else as everything is on hand :) Thanks Bernie & Mary.
Malia was away however her husband was welcoming. The setting was tranquil just what I was looking for on my 5 day stay. The room was comfortable and the amenities excellent.

we loved staying at Malia's! She is so kind and we had no problem with anything! She was helpful and took us in with open arms, we will loved to visit her again, sweet Malia! And the room we stayed in was very clean and BIG comfy bed, loved it. We made breakfast everyday in their beautiful clean kitchen and had our own bathroom, so nice! We miss the place and her already! My boyfriend Thomas enjoyed Bernie's company, he sat with him outside and talked with lot about Hawaii and wild life, he was so kind to him also. Best place! We felt like we were at home!

My boyfriend and I spent 4 nights at Malia and Bernie's home. The room was clean and we had an enormous king-sized bed - what a treat! There is a fridge (in the room) full of juices, beer and breakfast snacks which Malia had generously prepared for us. 
The unit is located in the Turtle Bay resort - the only biggest tourist development on the North shore. There's secure entrance to the unit and a parking lot for the guests. We could also use the resort's swimming pool. 
The Turtle bay is the perfect starting spot for exploring the dreamy beaches of North shore and the Windward Coast - Sunset and Pipeline  were our favourite! Ideal for sunsets and sunrises!

Our stay with Malia was fantastic. She made us feel right at home as soon as we got there. The room was as described, with the most comfortable bed ever! It was a great location - with the beach so close, also to restaurants and food trucks. We would definitely come back and stay with Malia again.

We had a fantastic stay at Malia's place. Our bed was extremely comfortable, like sleeping on a cloud, and she upgraded to a King size bed recently, and a new flatscreen, which we didn't use (come on, we're in Hawaii!) We loved to leave the sliding door open all day and night to let the lovely breezes cool our room and to let in the natural sounds. We used the kitchen to make breakfast and lunches, which we took with us for day, and everything was very clean and well cared for. The bathroom is private, right outside the bedroom, and is also clean and well cared for. We enjoyed learning about the area from Malia and Berney and all of their restaurant suggestions were perfect (North Shore Shrimp Truck: garlic shrimp, North Shore taco truck: fish tacos (made with Ahi), and Kahuku Grill (best burgers!) We were at Malia's during the Pro Bowl, and the players and their families were staying at the Turtle Bay resort, so the resort was on "lockdown" so I cannot comment on the amenities available at the resort, but the beach there was great for snorkeling. I saw some of the biggest tropical fish I've ever seen. We didn't see turtles there, but saw them at nearby Kawela Bay (an easy walk from the resort). We look forward to returning to the North Shore and Malia's place soon.

Malia and Burnie were great hosts and were there when you needed them to be.
The offered suggestions of places to go and dine.
It was a great place to stay, right on the golf course and close to Turtle Bay Resort.
The neighbourhood is very quiet and relaxing.
Being a golf course resort the mowers are out early not that we minded as we just slept in once they passed.
Bed was all that was reported, very comfortable.

Malia and Bernie were perfect hosts and very friendly. My wife even spent a day shopping with Malia while I went photographing the surfing... We love staying at Turtle Bay it's our second visit, the first time was staying in Malia's sons own condo last year. The facilities in Turtle Bay are great so eating out and having a drink without having to drive is a bonus. For surfing fans like ourselves the North Shore certainly delivers in the winter months with waves often reaching 30 feet or more. We are already missing the place and cant wait to visit again soon.

My host couple were most friendly and hospitable.  Promptly responsive to my needs. Meeting me in the parking lot and at the front door leading me to my private room and bath and familiarizing me with the amenities.

Mary  was there to meet me and get me settled into the room. townhouse is geogeous and centrally located on the Turtle Bay Resort within walking distance of resort amentities. As many people have said, the bed is to die for! Beyond comfortable!!  Mary gave me tips on we're to go and where to eat.  Leilei's is a must to eat at and Surfer the club has great live music. Both golf courses are amazing. I felt very at home and would definitely go back.
This was a great location in a nice condo with two very great people. I would be more than happy to stay here again if I swing through the area.

Mary & Bernie were wonderful.  Made us feel right at home when we walked in the door.  Our room was comfortable and nice.  Little frig in the closet was great.  Slept like babies. The house is filled with Mary's art work.  Can't wait for our next visit.  Loved North Shore!!!!

The listing description is very accurate.  The room is very comfortable and well provided.  It was nice to find cold drinks in the refrigerator when we arrived.  Hosts Malia and Bernie were friendly and helpful...quick to offer conversation and advice on where to go.  We enjoyed having access to beach chairs, snorkeling gear and tennis rackets.  The on site non-chlorine pool and tennis courts are nice, too!  Overall a great experience and we would recommend this listing to a single person or a couple looking for a nice place to set up a home base for an O'ahu visit.  Easy walking distance from Turtle Bay Resort and a short drive to tasty food trucks and fresh fruit stands.  We were able to buy a few groceries and use the toaster oven and microwave in the host's kitchen for breakfasts and the occasional lunch or dinner so we didn't have to eat out all the time.  It's slightly awkward that the bathroom is separate from the room (but very convenient right outside the door).  As other reviews have noted: the king size bed is wonderful!

Malia and Bernie are great hosts! We stayed for lovely 5 days and we could´t ask for more. Malia took great care of us and suggested what we could do or where we can go for dinner. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone.

My husband and I enjoyed our stay with Malia very much! She was a lovely hostess, her townhouse on Turle Bay is beautiful and our room was very comfortable. I would definitely stay with Malia again! We loved the location!! Absolutely gorgeous!

While Malia wasn't there during our stay, she made us feel incredibly welcome and was very communicative so as to make sure our trip was smooth and memorable. Her place was great and just what we needed to both explore the North Shore and also attend a friend's wedding at the Turtle Bay Resort (short 10 minute walk). Her cat, K K, is the coolest cat too. I've never seen a cat so friendly that likes his belly rubbed and ears scratched, reminding us of our dog! We would definitely plan on staying here again and hope to be back soon!

this is a very pleasant accommodation experience!Malia and Bernie are great hosts and very friendly who made us feel right at home, and our room was comfortable and nice. Mails took great care of us and suggested where we can to for dinner or play. KK is a so cute cat and very friendly too. We will come back next year and plan to staying here again.
Great place
Loved staying at Bernie and Malias! Clean, spacious and peaceful room. Nice pool. Amazing beaches.

Malia & Bernie were excellent hosts. They offered advice on the area and  made my stay very comfortable. Their place feels like home and they have every amenity you will need. The area is very safe and quite. It is close to all the great beaches on the north shore (surf, snorkeling, swimming, etc).  I would stay with them again.

Minha viagem foi acompanhada de minha esposa. Malia foi muito atenciosa em nossa chegada e explicou-nos tudo com bastante detalhes. O quarto é bastante arejado, cama king size bem confortável. O banheiro fica do lado de fora do quarto, porém bem junto à porta e de muito fácil acesso. O condomínio é muito bonito e bem localizado em North Shore, até arrisco dizer que é o melhor da região. Malia é uma pessoa tranquila e amável. Bernie, seu marido também é uma pessoa muito calma e tranquila. Agradecemos de coração pela excelente hospitalidade que recebemos! Para finalizar deixo uma palavra bastante simbólica que aprendi no Hawaii: MAHALO!!!
Malia was there to greet us and very helpful.  Home is very comfortable, especially the bed.
Great stay.....

We had a great time at the North Shore. Room and bathroom were as advertised. She even had some snacks and cold drinks prepared for us. Area felt really safe and it was only a short walk to the beach. Would highly recommend this to anyone.
My husband and I had a great stay here such a beautiful place nice comfy bed and shower had the best pressure would happily stay again

Malia and Bernie were very gracious and welcoming. The room/bathroom were exactly as described. There were also snacks and drinks in the fridge; fresh coffee was provided every morning. The neighborhood was very safe and quiet. There's a nice pool and the beach was within 10min walking distance. I would absolutely recommend staying here. We can't wait to stay there again!

Malia made me feel welcome, comfortable and part of her home from the first.  She is a gifted artist with many diverse interests that are woven into her colorful history.  Truly a special person.  Her home became my home and I look forward to remaining in touch.  Thank you Malia

Merci à Malia et son mari pour ce logement très bien situé sur le north shore, dans un environnement calme et facilement accessible. Leur accueil a été très chaleureux et ils ont été disponibles pour répondre à toutes nos questions, nous recommandons cette chambre.

We stayed for 3 nights with Malia, she was very welcoming & friendly. Place was in a great location, within Turtle Bay complex, safe & honest neighbourhood. Room was good size, had everything we needed & extra, there's a bar fridge in the room which Malia stocked up drinks & snacks, very thoughtful. Comfortable king bed with white linens & flatscreen TV, room was better than as described. We had a wonderful stay & loved north, will definitely stay with Malia again if we come back! God bless.

The experience is great to stay at here! The Malia and her husband are super nice host. She introduced lots of good local stuff to me at north shore including food and other stuff. The place is clean. The bed is big and comfortable. I enjoyed the private bathroom even it's not in the room.
We felt right at home in that beautiful room.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Malia. She is a very gracious host who even set us up with the "friends and family" discount when we took surf lessons with her sons company. The location could not be better if you like the relaxed feel of the north shore (and their yummy food trucks) but still be able to utilize the lovely amenities at turtle bay resort which is a 5 minute walk away. We also appreciated the morning coffee in the morning and being able to eat our own breakfast out in the kitchen area as there was no space to eat in the room. 
Mahalo!

Hosts were very helpful, giving us specific instructions when we forgot ou directions.  Also she came out to meet us to help us.  The bed is very comfy as has been mentioned by other renters.  She has some nice things in the room. Including a nice small refrigerator, snorkel gear, beach chairs, boogie boards, and a small ice chest.

Malia and Bernie have a beautiful place in North Shore. The location is very convenient. They are amazing hosts. We felt like home at their place.  Highly recommend their place and we will come back to stay with them again. Thanks for making our stay lovely. Mahalo!!

I needed a calm and quiet place to study for a very important exam...I was able to accomplish that over at Malia's place. They were very welcoming hosts, gave me the space I needed, and were overall wonderful in their treatment of me. I couldn't have asked for a better place to be for several days. Plus...their place is situated in a safe and friendly community. I would definitely return here and even refer a friend!

The location was fantastic with nearby access to lots of great North Shore hotspots in a super safe setting! Malia was a wonderful host who was generous, easy to communicate with, and has lots of great recommendations.

My girlfriend Greice and I went to Hawaii for the first time. Maria and Bernie were very helpful during all our staying. They introduced lots of good stuffs to us including restaurants and secret beaches around North Shore. The location is amazing, safe, quiet and close by the most popular beaches of North Shore.
We stayed 11 days in their room. The room is nice, good size, comfortable king bed, there is a bar fridge in the room with water and snacks. Fresh coffee was provided every morning.
We highly recommend this place to everyone!!
Mahalo!!
We enjoyed our stay at Mary and Bernie's place. Nice and clean and private

Malia is a great host and location is perfect on North Shore. She made sure we have hot coffee every morning and there is a fridge in the room provided. In the room we found beach towels, snorkeling gear, little foam cooler, tennis racquets and balls.

Neighborhood is most likely the nicest and safest on the North Shore.  Access to beach and a pool. Host was flexible as accommodating with our change in arrival.    Very clean place with a lot of Hawaiian ambiance.

They were great hosts. Very welcoming. We had full use of the kitchen. Bernie does smoke (on the patio - not close to the guest room). It didn't bother me but it did bother my husband. Great location.

Aloha, that's what they say in Hawaii and Malia gave us the feeling of Aloha from start to finish! We spent 2 weeks with Malia and Bernie. We had a very comfortable stay and felt welcome in every way. I'm a surfer and wanted to see the Pipeline Masters and we needed to be on the North Shore of Oahu and this is the place to be. I wouldn't recommend it to someone that wants to be in Honolulu or Waikiki on a regular basis. It's a good place to be if you want peace and quite, a golf course, and miles and miles of beaches of white sand, perfect green waves and of course warm sunny days.
