You'll have a nice king bed, a private room on the main floor (no stairs), a small refrigerator in the closet, a flat screen TV, and plenty of space to put your belongings. Extra items that you bring, surfboards, golf clubs, or anything bulky will have to be kept in your car as they have no space for it. This is a very well kept residence and Malia was the perfect hostess and we felt very welcome in our coming and going. She knows all the places to eat and knows the island like the back of her hand.  We had the food trucks, Lei Lei's bar and grill (very upscale and within walking distance), and of course the Turtle Bay resort hotel very close by. I don't play golf but I hear the course is great and within walking distance. There is a surf break at the hotel and I was able to surf it a couple of times but the best places are Sunset Beach, Pipeline, among others within 5 or 10 minutes away.  There is a pool within walking distance that has a bbq and it is protected from the wind with a fence that goes all the way around.  An outside shower is there as well.  This is a gated community so you'll be pretty safe here.  You'll have a parking area just for you too!  A tennis court is there too, but who has time to play tennis when you have all of Hawaii to explore?  It was a relaxing vacation and many mahalo's to Malia!
Malia and her husband are a lovely couple who are always available to provide information or advice. The bedroom is very comfortable.

We loved our stay with Malia and Bernie! Their home, within walking distance to the Turtle Bay resort, is super cozy, the coffee is fresh and plentiful every morning, Malia's vibrant and spectacular paintings are on every wall, and their cats are soft and friendly. We loved the king-sized bed, our own private refrigerator that was stocked with cold tea drinks, and the nice basket of biscuits and granola bars. Their home is in such a dreamy part of Oahu-- so close some really magical places like Kawela Bay and the giant banyan tree in the forest nearby. We only rented a car for part of our trip, and the rest of the time we stayed close to the resort or took The Bus, which stops right out in front of Kuilima Estates. There are a few spots on the resort grounds where you can get food, though they're pricey. We most enjoyed getting poke and crab-stuffed salmon at the restaurant right on the golf course, Lei Lei's. The portions are generous there and the service is warm. Just know that if you don't rent a car you will need to allot more time to getting around outside of the Turtle Bay area. But we had fun bussing down to the food trucks across from Shark's Cove, where Malia's grandson has a place called The Spot. We had tasty breakfast tacos there one morning while we watched the January surf. We also took the bus to nearby Haleiwa and had a great time at Teddy's Burger and Tiki Bar for Happy Hour. Also, there is an Enterprise rental location right at the Turtle Bay Hotel so you could do like we did and easily get a car for when you want to venture out! We are so happy we stayed at Malia and Bernie's. What a paradise. They were always there to answer any questions we had or offer ideas for where we might visit, and yet they were so respectful of our privacy. When we were leaving, Malia gave us a gift of two cards with prints of her paintings, and one of them was of a rainbow over an Oahu valley. I had gone for a run a couple days before and I'd taken the trails to Kahuku point, the very tip of the top of the island. I hadn't brought my phone with me and when I was met with the most picturesque rainbow I was just kicking myself. Malia's card meant so much to me. What a lovely reminder of our time there.

The hosts Malia and Bernie are really friendly. The private room and bath is clean and cozy. What a perfect location for the North Shore. This is the neighborhood to stay and the side of the North Shore to experience less traffic getting to and from the beaches and golf courses surrounding the neighborhood if you plan to play. I recommend the booking to all.
Nice and quiet place, really enjoy our vacation here. Thanks a loooot寧靜友善的社區,治安很好早出晚歸很放心,特別適合早晨散步晨泳,很放鬆的地方

What wonderful hosts (especially the cats)! 

Malia was so helpful and made sure our stay was great. She had awesome recommendations on beaches and eats.

The location was safe and comfortable and I would absolutely stay with Malia and Bernie again.

Malia's place is awesome, especially if you don't plan on spending much time in your room (since it's just a private room, there isn't a ton of space if your plan was to hang out all day, but honestly you should be at the beach or exploring the beautiful surroundings). It's a comfortable bed and there is an AC unit in case it gets too hot. Malia also has snorkel equipment and other items for you to borrow. Overall, it was pretty wonderful and a 10 min walk to the Turtle Bay hotel and amenities.

This is a great location if you are interested in Turtle bay and north shore activities. The pool is exceptional, don't miss it!!!  Don't count on breakfast although coffee is available if you ask. The bed is comfy and the room is nice. If you want a quiet space you may be disappointed as the room is very close to a sidewalk and yard maintenance was in the early am both mornings I was there. Also, there are 2 cats which I love but if you have allergies, this may be a concern. Nice place overall.

Malia was a wonderful host and the room was in a perfect location for the North Shore and Turtle Bay. She had coffee made in the morning which was really helpful. There was a refrigerator in the room and the bathroom was right next to the room. The room was right inside the front door and had its own lock which was also nice. There are cats and some smoke smell so if you have allergies that might be hard, but it was not a problem for me. I hope to see them again on my next trip!

Malia and Bernies place is in a perfect location on the north shore of Oahu. They are steps away from Turtle Bay resort. Very close to all the amazing surf spots and food trucks. The room was prefect with a king size bed and fridge in the closet. Bernie makes a mean cup of coffee and likes to talk story of the old north shore. Pretty entertaining stuff. We can't wait to come back for another visit.

Malia is a wonderful hostess.  The room, bath and kitchen are very clean.  We most loved the phenomenal bed, the birds outside our window in the mornings, and our good conversations.  The pool is close, clean and warm.  The golf course surrounds you and is beautiful.  You can walk across the golf course to the ocean and down to the Turtle Bay resort very easily...or drive.  You are very close to so much of North shore and east. Wow!  I own a KoOlina Marriott timeshare and we were very impressed with Malia's Airbnb. We plan to go back!

We had a wonderful time staying in Malia's beautiful home.  It was just as described and the perfect base to explore the North Shore, meeting all of our needs.  Malia & Bernie were the perfect hosts, we even arrived home to find our washing all dry and folded for us.  It was divine to sleep with the cool trade wind breezes coming in the window on the big comfortable bed.  We would return in a heartbeat and can highly recommend it.  A hire car is a must to get there and to get around but there are also many beautiful treks to discover from the home. Mahalo Malia & Bernie for your friendly hospitality ☺
Ideal space to be in if you're an on the go person-- great room with AC and a bathroom, all you need when you're spending your days outside on the beach and adventuring!

What a wonderful experience with these great hosts.  Their home is beautiful filled with Hawaiian art and artifacts.  It is a must stay for all people who want to experience a fabulous vacation stay.  God has blessed these people and will enlighten your time in the islands.  My only regret is that I couldn't get this review written sooner so that other people searching for a place to stay would see this.  I will be back.  Aloha.
This is a great place to stay if you're looking for accommodation on the north shore.  You get a comfy bed, a warm welcome and everything you could possibly need.  What more could you want?

We had a great stay at Malia and Bernie's. Even though we didn't see them much during our short stay, they were very friendly the few times we ran into them. It rained for most of our time in the North Shore, but we were grateful to have a comfortable place to relax and seek refuge from the rain. Our favorite part was being able to walk to Turtle Bay to catch the gorgeous sunset! Thank you Malia and Bernie!

The room and private bath is located right next to the front door when you enter, which was really nice. This gave it a very private feel and we didn't feel like we were intruding! Mary is very sweet and approachable. Wonderful experience for a first time airbnd stay!!

We had a great stay on the North Shore! The room is as advertised a cozy room right inside the front door of Malia and Bernie's condo. The room has a lock, AC (although we didn't need it in May), TV and small fridge. The bathroom is located just next to the room as well as the washer/dryer. Malia and Bernie make a mean pot of coffee every morning. The condo is located within Turtle Bay which is really nice because there are walkable restaurants, beautiful secluded beaches, walking trails and the condo itself is right on the golf course. I would definitely recommend staying here, mahalo Malia and Bernie!

Malia and Bernie were great hosts!! my wife and I really enjoyed our stay.
It's a great spot to stay if you want to get out of the hustle bustle of the city and be within walking distance of beautiful, quiet beaches with great swimming and snorkling.
Also only a short drive to food trucks, food stores and restaurants.
They have two lovely cats who are very friendly.

Highly recommend to others
Great hosts, great location. Reviews speak for themselves. We loved the North Shore!

We had a great time staying here. It's so close to turtle bay resort, walking distance. And her two kitties are so adorable and friendly! Definitely going to miss them. Malia and Bernie were very welcoming and told us to make ourselves at home as soon as we arrived.

From the moment we stepped foot in the door, everything was perfect! Mary was a fantastic host and she went the extra mile in making sure the room was fully equipped with absolutely everything you could think of. The room was quiet, peaceful and the bed was huge and so comfy! Thanks for a great stay, we can't wait to come back soon.

Great location for access to all the amazing beaches of the north shore. You would need a car if you wanted to get around but there is a nice beach and hotel bar nearby so really no need to leave the compound. Great hosts.

Tight room. But nice big bed.
There is a cat and also are smokers just be aware of that.
Lei lei restaurant short walk. Central to north shore with car.
Was quiet.
We did not use air conditioner as host preferred us not to due cto cost. But made for hot sweaty night despite the fan
Good food at pandas thai.

Malia's room for us was incredibly comfortable. The bed was large and comfortable, and she set up the room so that we would feel at home very easily. The place smelled great and clean, and the location in which the house is in is really friendly. It was easy for us to get around. We would definitely recommend staying here.

Absolutely Fabulous !
Tout était absolument parfait.
Malia et Bernie sont des hôtes accueillants et chaleureux. 
L'emplacement proche de l'océan et du terrain de golf, est d'une grande quiétude: réveil au chant des oiseaux les seuls sons étant ceux de la nature. 
La chambre très confortable avec un lit "King size" ,  salle de bains serviettes et même  peignoir de bain.
Un réfrigérateur avec boissons et barres de céréales. Nous avons pu accéder à la cuisine pour préparer le petit déjeuner.
Merci Malia pour l'excellent thé au gingembr!
Enfin cette maison du bout de l'île est décorée avec tes peintures personnelles de Malia qui témoignent de l'esprit d' Hawaï .
je recommande vivement cet hébergement.
This just what my wife and I needed. Privacy, cleanliness, and very welcoming. Great guide to local activities.
ﾀｰﾄﾙﾍﾞｲ近くでとても便利

房源的各项条件都与描述一致:安静､舒适､环境优美｡一人或情侣如果想来北海岸休闲度假,又不介意与房东同住大house的话,强力推荐Malia家｡Guest room和bathroom都单独在楼下,所以私密性也不用担心｡
House应该是在富人小区,附近300米就是高尔夫球场,有一家不错的Grill店｡
当然,住这里绝对需要租车自驾,北海岸离其他地方还是比较远的,到威基基大概要开1个半小时｡

This actually felt like a vacation away from my vacation! It was so nice to be close to so many amenities while maintaining a quiet place to retreat back to. There are great, local food options only down the road in either direction and the ocean is a walk away. I loved it here! Malia and Bernie make you feel a longtime friend. Stay here if you're headed to the North Shore!

We loved our stay at Malia and Bernie's place. The king bed is very confortable. Malia provided us some goodies!!! They also gave us trully helpfull informations for restaurants. We went to an outdoor local concert of hawaiian music and traditionnal dance that we enjoyed. Also many thanks for the surf rental. Malia deserves her super host title.
Malia's place is as described. We loved the strategic location on the North Shore of the island close to beautiful beaches and nice spots.

This is my second airbnb experience and I deeply appreciate Malia and Bernie for allowing us comfortable and peaceful stay. I was traveling with my mom and we actually were a little nervous due to some problems with the first airbnb host. But we came to be relieved day by day thanks to their consideration, and genuine kindness. We enjoyed the breeze through the open door, the sound that leaves make and soft lighting lamp beside our bed. We went to the swimming pool a lot and could relax. Walking along the trail was a good start for a day. The two adorable cats are sociable enough to hang out with me for sone time. Watching sunset at resort pool was another gift. The best part of the stay was that I could purchase beautiful postcards drawn by Malia. I will never forget their warm-hearted smile with these cards. All in all, staying at Malia's home was like a compensation from God. I hope I could visit there again.
Salle de bain semi-privée. On ne se sentait pas très à l aise pour prendre un petit déjeuner dans la cuisine du propriétaire.

Wir haben Entspannung gesucht und sie dort gefunden. Malia und Bernie haben unseren Aufenthalt perfekt gemacht. Sie sind so herzliche Gastgeber, geben super Empfehlungen und haben uns immer geholfen, insbesondere bei der Buchung eines günstigen Mietwagens. Traumstrände in der Nähe und der Pool auf dem Gelände erfüllen jeden Wunsch. Wir waren fünf Nächte dort und wir wären definitiv gerne länger geblieben. Mahalo :)
We had a great stay at Malia's! It's in a beautiful area and we had fun exploring the beaches nearby and swimming in the pool.

Great location in north shore!Close to PCC. We enjoyed breeze in room. Had a lot fun with 2 lovely cats! Bed is big and very comfortable! We'll come back again next time! Actual room is much more beautiful and cozy than pics posted here. Nice stay:)

Staying at Malia and Bernie was very nice. As Malia was on a short vacation, Bernie took care about us very well. We got very good information about where to eat and what to do around the north shore. The flat is located at the very nice Turtle Bay. We realy enjoyed staying there. Louis and Peter from Germany.

Malia's place was great. Location was close to great snorkeling spots! A short walk to Turtle Bay and short car ride to Shark's Cove. Restaurant and Bar were a short walk as well.  Checking in was easy as Malia was very responsive. Would definitely recommend staying there if traveling to North Shore. Also her two cats Kaikey and Hobo were super cute!
We loved the sound of birds, the location, Malia's beautiful artwork and kindness, having snorkel stuff for us and the flexible checkout!  Wonderful!

Malia was very friendly and hospitable. She responded promtly to my initial inquiry and texted info for finding her place. She met us in the parking lot and showed us the  private room and bath, which was right by the front door so we did not have to walk through the living area. The bed was super comfortable and the morning coffee great!

Malia and Bernie accepted our reservation on very short notice, and welcomed us when we arrived albeit unannounced and at an inconvenient time.  They are a very kind and hospitable couple.

The bedroom we stayed at was very comfortable - a king sized bed with all the needed amenities.  While there was air conditioning provided, we did not need to use it as the evening breeze going into the room was cool and relaxing. And in the morning, the lovely sound of birds chirping welcomed us to the day ahead.

The beach at Turtle Bay, a couple of hiking trails, a good restaurant and a nice bar were within short walking distance of Malia's place.  Famous food trucks are a short drive away, and the Polynesian Cultural Center, North Shore beaches and other attractions are easy drives from her place.

Had the chance to talk to Malia about her paintings (my wife and I loved them!) at the tail end of our stay and heard stories about her family and their 40 year life in Hawaii - I just wished we had more time to stay.  Malia's farewell present is immediately displayed in our apartment after arrival, a reminder of our stay in Malia and Bernie's place that made for a lovely vacation in Oahu.

Malia and Bernie were great hosts! Very accommodating and such great people. Their home is beautiful with lots of artwork by Malia, and they made me feel right at home. Malia is such a sweet person and I loved getting to know her in the short time I was there. I would definitely recommend it here, and would come back again.
Great quiet place except for the symphony of birds! Malia is a very nice and welcoming host.

Malia and Bernie were amazing hosts!
We were attending a wedding at Turtle Bay and their place was perfect for us! It was walking distance to Turtle Bay at a fraction of the price. Also really close to north shore surfing! They have a great set up for guests and make you feel very welcome in their home. Thank you Malia and Bernie for sharing you home with us, we hope to visit again!

Malia's place is the best value on the North Shore.  It's clean, comfortable and pretty and they are very accommodating.  The location can't be beat.  This is our second time here and we hope to return.
This Airbnb is amazing. We had a great time at Malias house. Everything is perfect. We'll come back :)

Malia and Bernie we're wonderful hosts! They made me feel right at home and their room was easy to come and go as needed especially when spending all day exploring the north shore. I had a little accident while snorkeling and was stung by a sea urchin and Bernie was very kind with helping me properly treat my wound! You'll never get that kind of treatment anywhere else, we will definitely be coming back!
This is a great room in a great house in a wonderful location. Well appointed and with great hosts. Close to the beach and to turtle bay. A all round winner.
Great hospitality! Clean space, beautiful location very handy to all the north shore beaches. Will definitely come back if we had the opportunity to would recommend to all.
Great spot, will try to stay here again

Malia’s place is in a lovely location on the North Shore. We loved hearing the surf pounding in the distance, the short walk to the beach across the golf course, a comfy bed and room and her suggestions for places to check out.

Location, accessibility, cleanliness, and hospitality were wonderful.  We woke up to a great breeze and a quiet calm that we always associate with the laid-back vibe of the North Shore. We live on island and made reservations for a Christmas Day Brunch at Turtle Bay. after we made the reservations we decided to make a weekend of it and stay on the North Shore. After checking kamaaina rates the price was still over $300 a night so we looked at Airbnb for something on the North Shore. We found this lovely room for under $100 a night and it was literally on the Turtle Bay golf course. We didn't need anything major just a place to shower and sleep.  However, the room was spacious,  internet/cable were available and we had a fridge.  The bathroom was immaculate and right next to the room.  Malia and her husband took the time to great us and ensured we were acquainted with the area.  We spent the days on the beach and eating in some great Restaurants in Haliewa.  All in all it was a really nice Christmas weekend.  We appreciate the hospitality.

Malia is sweet, cheerful and has good recommendations for activities and restaurants. The location is great if you’re looking to enjoy the more quiet ways of the North Shore. Swimming in the wintertime is possible at the Turtle Bay beach, which is about 5 minutes to walk to. The cats, Cakey and Hobo, are pretty entertaining. My husband loved that there was coffee waiting for him every morning.
Malia had great knowledge of the area, she was a wealth of knowledge. She  made me feel very much at home. Thanks again for being such a great host.

We truly enjoyed the warm hospitality and comfort of Malia and her home. The fridge, big bed and her tips were all appreciated. I recommend this place should your journey take you to the Turtle Bay Area.
Great price, comfortable bed, mini fridge in the room and coffee made for us in the morning. We felt welcomed in the home instantly. Would definitely recommend to our friends and family. :)

Secluded comfortable place to crash in, but far from restaurants (except for couple restaurants from the resort) You have  to drive for food. The room was clean n spacious. Malia n Bernie are nice people. We wish there was a lanai to sit n enjoy especially in a place like Hawaii.

Malia offers a very comfortable room located on wonderful resort property in the north shore. All you need is right here. 
An unexpected illness kept me in bed more than expected during my stay. Extra thanks to Malia for the homemade chicken soup and the mini fridge with refreshments.

Loved staying at Malia and Bernie’s place. They were very helpful with their tips on where to go and what to do. Everything was super clean and everyone was very friendly. Would recommend getting a car to better explore the island and it’s many beautiful beaches. Although it’s in the country side, there’s a good amount of things to do, you’ll never get bored. Would recommend this place to anyone.
Great place to stay. Nice location and the bed was super comfy.
Great location with easy access to the north shore!

Malia and Bernie were amazing hosts, very welcoming, helpful, kind and laid back. Malia was kind enough to take me with her when she went grocery shopping which was a huge help. She leant me a few items that I had forgotten and was always offering me advice and help with anything I needed. It was such a pleasure to stay with them. I would definitely stay here again, as it feels like home. Thanks again, Malia and Bernie!
Very comfortable accomodations........ relaxing and very beautiful........ Bernie and Malia are the very best hosts......... stellar vacation spot.

O quarto estava muito limpo mas ter que utilizar um banheiro externo deixa um pouco a desejar. Além de compartilhar cozinha e lavanderia com os moradores. Mas, tinha uma coisa boa que era a de ter um refrigerador no quarto para guardar seus alimentos.
Malia and Bernie were outstanding hosts.  Their place was a nice get away from town.  Nothing but good things to say about our experience.  Would definitely stay again.

This wonderful host makes your stay in Hawaii a true dream vacation.   The warm, caring, and genuine aloha spirit is felt in this lovely home. Her tropical art and decor, knowledge, and worldly travels and adventures is a must to be shared with guests.  No concierge can compare.

Malia was wonderful! She and her husband were lovely hosts and offered TONS of great recommendations. We were out-and-about a lot but it was very easy to come-and-go as we pleased. Their home is located within walking distance from the main beaches and restaurants at Turtle Bay, along with some great little beach trails and sightseeing. It's also a great central location if you are looking to explore the North Shore by car, as there are a lot of wonderful little towns and beaches to explore. We were not bored once during our 10 day stay and Malia's private room was the perfect spot to come home to and unwind. Would definitely recommend!
Nice place with beautiful scenes.
Five Stars all around. For the price you can't beat this place! They gave great suggestions and were always helpful.
A perfect stay ,everything exactly as described
Had a great stay in Mary's apartment. The room was clean and comfortable and Mary was very easy to share space with. Great value in Turtle Bay!
Very comfortable space, great value especially in comparison to the hotels at the resort! Malia and Bernie were very kind and helpful. I would highly recommend!

We really enjoyed our stay at Mary's place! Guests have their own room and bathroom and it comes with a personal fridge as well. Mary provides some amenities, e.g. cool drinks and some cereal bars. Bigger shops are 15 mins by car in either direction on the coastal road. Parking available in front of the house. Some beach equipment is also provided. I would say the place is a good base for exploring Northshore Oahu incl. Snorkelling, seeing Turtles, the Polynesian Cultural Center, Waimea Valley, Pipeline wave (only in winter months).
Would not hesitate to give  a recommendation  to stay at Mary's home.
Great place, quiet. Nice hosts. Close to the best beaches in the world. Amazing. Nice area too. Very beautiful place. I am happy.
Malia's place is comfortable and convenient. Malia is friendly and helpful. No complications, just a great place to stay.

Had a lovely time staying here! Very close to North Shores most beautiful beaches! Very comfortable and homey. Safe and clean. The hosts were polite and informative of the Island! Would definitely stay here again!

Malia and her hubby are a lovely couple who made us feel very welcome in their home. The bed was very comfy and we had our own fridge. Malia supplied a few snacks and cold drinks but also made delicious coffee for us. She does not supply breakfast but there are supermarkets and restaurants a short drive away. There are bathrobes and slippers as well as snorkel gear, beach towels and chairs.  Their home is within a gated community and very safe. They supply a car park as well. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend their home
Malia is a wonderful host. My wife and I had some complications, and she was incredibly thoughtful and generous. I would consider staying here in the future!
We thought it was expensive for what we received even though the bed was very comfortable.
Great location! Super friendly and willing to help with anything! I would highly recommend them!

Malia is a wonderful hostess: casual and welcoming. The king size bed was so very comfortable! She provided beach towels, robes, and coffee in the mornings.  Malia and Bernie are available for conversation including suggestions about local trails and beaches and activities. The swimming pool is close to their apartment and lovely.  There are many beaches within walking distance, all with unique features, and many others within 15 or 20 min drive. The amenities provided by the Turtle Bay resort include golf, horseback riding and bike rental.  We chose to do the Night time Glow Paddle at Haleiwa Bay offered through AirBnb. That was delightful. 
For two people needing a home base on the North Shore, Malia's place is the perfect home.
Malia’s home had everything we needed for the weekend! Great location and communication!
Super nice Hosts and very comfortable room. Clean and crisp bedding. Easy to communicate with the owners!

This was my very first airbnb rental.   Everything and more if you need if you need to just sleep, shower and relax.  The bedroom and bathroom is right near the entrance of the condo.  TV, Fan and A/C but I didn't need to use the A/C.   You have access to the swimming pool and you are walking distance to Turtle Bay Resort.  Any questions you have, Malia will be happy to answer.  Aloha!
the room was private and Malia and her husband were present to answer or questions. Loved the place. Thank you
Very gracious hosts!

Häufig liest man von tollen Gastgebern. Aber Malia ragt daraus noch hervor. In gleich zwei für uns sehr Situationen, hat sie uns Hilfe angeboten, die weit über eine gute Hilfsbereitschaft hinausreicht.
Sie gibt gute Tipps für die Tagesplanung, abhängig von den jeweiligen Bedürfnissen.
Auch die Anlage, in der sich das Haus befindet hat tolle Möglichkeiten.
Very nice host

Toll! Sehr gute Lage und eine sehr freundliche Gastgeberin :)
Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden jederzeit wieder kommen!
A bedroom and a private detached bathroom with everything you need for a few days' stay. Very close to Turtle Bay Resort. Friendly and helpful owner.
It was very great. Nice location and Nice beautiful scenery. It was more special and not common experience. They are warm people and we enjoyed very peacecful and relaxing atmosphere.

The location of this house is good that you can walk to the beach, the bedroom is clean although a bit small. 

If you really want the bathroom to be used exclusively to you then you might like to look for somewhere else because in our 5 nights stay in here, due to different personal habits I noted that our toilet was used at lease 4 days when we were out of the house. And I did raise this issue with the host’s husband on the 3rd day, he admitted that his wife might have used it when we were not there.

Although the kitchen rule stated that guests can cook their own meals; however, the living area of the host is very closed to the kitchen and the eating area (right next to each other), you can feel very uncomfortable because the host can make you feel that her personal space is being invaded by you (that was what happened on our 4th day morning that the female host made few abrupt remarks when we were using her kitchen to make toast and having coffee as our breakfast). We didn’t want to be an intruder so since then we did try our best to avoid using the kitchen while the female host is there.
May be the host should include a more detailed kitchen rules so the guests can make an informed decision before making booking in her house.

If you don’t like the cats to be in your  bathroom or your bedroom or on your bed (one of the two cats  jumped on our bed) you need to keep your doors closed. 

This house is right next to the golf course, we were woke up shortly after 5am every couple days by the loud motor of the mobile crane (which is parked not far from the house)  that they used for pruning trees and park nearby. So you might like to use your earplugs, which we didn’t bring with us.

Thank you so much!  I had such a pleasant stay. I highly recommend. And I will think of you guys in the future when I visit again. 

-TJ
Malia’s Place is comfortable with some lovely personal touches.  Malia has great local knowledge.
This home is comfy and clean and the owners are so wonderful!

this place is in a great location. lots of beaches to stop at all along the way. the waves are amazing and being able to sit in the shade and be on the beach is a plus! plenty to do since it is in the Turtle Bay Resort....close to a lot of shops and the Polynesian cultural center which is a MUST!

My husband and I had a great stay at Malia & Bernie’s place, it was perfect for what we needed on our first trip to the north shore of Oahu, Hawaii. 
We really appreciated the friendly hospitality of Malia and Bernie and the local tips they provided. It was great value for money and a central location on the north shore. 

The bed was huge and extremely comfortable with a big tv, fridge, towels, snorkel gear, snacks and other things provided in the room which made us feel very at home. The shared kitchen and private bathroom facilities were as decribed and clean. The beach and turtle bay resort were within walking distance and only short distances in the car to food trucks, shops, Polynesian cultural centre, hikes, Ziplining, horse riding, snorkeling etc.

Malia and Bernie were very welcoming and also very respectful of privacy. Overall I would highly recommend this for accomodation on the north shore!

What a wonderful place to stay. Malia and her husband are very nice and helpful people and gave us a lot of good advices. We appreciated the private bathroom and the possibility to use the kitchen...and the fresh coffee every morning. Besides there are a lot of additional equipment like bathrobe, slippers, beach chairs, tennis rackets, flippers, etc. We had a lot of luggage but still had enough space in the room. The bed is very comfortable and we had a very good night´s sleep. You can darken the room and it is a very silent area, you just hear the sound of the ocean. It is a very nice and safe community, the beach is nearby and you can also use the pool or tennis courts. There are also some nice trails around Turtle Bay. We definitely recommend this accomodation.

bernie and Malia were excellent hosts. they made me feel most welcome and were always helpful with any questions I had. their condo is right at exclusive turtle bay resort with all the amenities at a fraction of the price. the bus stops right outside for easy access to north shore beaches. awesome comfy bed too. I would definitely recommend their place to any traveller
aloha mark
Nice room in a great location right near turtle bay. Lovely hosts
Lovely home in a lovely area. Very quiet and peaceful. Malia was very friendly and helpful.
nice room, good location
You can expect the finest hospitality and independence to help you explore the North shore of Oahu. Wonderful  opportunity.
cozy place in a nice location

Mahalo Malia and Bernie. My Husband and I are very pleased to stay with your Home. We felt extended family, Thank you for Inviting us on the trivia night, We had so much fun and all the suggestions where to go and Eat,, We’ll Surely Miss the Aloha Vibe in your House, Place and kids..  Kaykie and Tiki,. Godbless you and Bernie.. 

Lea and Benjamin ♥️
Great stay! Thank you!

There is not many restaurant and sightseeing.
If you want to trip north, you will get a hotel Haleiwa area.

And cat's fur is so many in the room and kitchen
If you don't like pets, I don't recommend this room.

Last thing 
No privacy space in this house.
Everytime you doing something, host will see you and interest in your all.

Northern travelling is Haleiwa better than end of the north or kahuku.

If you’re looking for the resort experience without the bill- this is a terrific spot. You’re right off the golf course, and a short walk to the Turtle Bay resort and amenities. Be careful with those Mai Tais!

Mary has everything you need to go enjoy an adventure on the island. I recommend going to Snorkle either at the nearby resort or Shark’s Cove.

Mary and Bernie are very hospitable, and you’ve got a nice space of your own. They’re happy to make recommendations and there’s plenty of coffee in the morning. 

Had a lovely time, 10/10 would stay there again!
enjoyed our two days stay in Malia’s place

Ich habe mich bei Malia wie Zuhause gefühlt. Das sehr saubere Zimmer in einer ruhigen Wohnanlage ist gemütlich mit Kühlschrank, Fernseher und sehr gutem WiFi und das eigene Bad ein Bonus. Vielen Dank für den immer sehr leckeren Kaffee! Die Location ist ausgezeichnet für Wanderungen an der Küste und zu den goldenen Stränden zum Schwimmen und Sonnebaden.  Die Unterhaltungen mit Malia habe ich immer sehr geschätzt - vielen Dank für einen perfekten Aufenthalt!

Wonderful cozy, clean space.  King sized bed with the most comfortable mattress and high quality bed linens and towels.  We loved our two night, three day stay and couldn’t ask for nicer hosts.  Would recommend to all my friends.  Thank you Malia and Eddie .
Great hosts, location, and stay!
Malia and Bernie were awesome. I’d recommend them to anyone
Great room a 5 min walk to the beach, trails and Turtle Bay hotel.  Bed was extremely big & comfortable and hosts were very kind.  I would definitely stay there again.

reviews.comments:
Michael was a truly fantastic and accommodating host and getting to stay in Ko Olina was exactly the experience we were looking for.  The house was clean, quite comfortable and situated in a delightfully quiet neighborhood.  Having both the community pool and Ko Olina lagoons within walking distance was perfect as we never had to venture far to cool off.  

As nice as hotels can be, they're just not the same as being able to return to a real home at the end of each day.  It makes the experience more comforting and familiar.

I highly, highly recommend Michael's residence for anybody look for a great Hawaii experience without having throw yourself into the thick of other visiting tourists.

Thanks so much, Michael.

The house is very clean and the beds are comfortable. It is big enough for our big family, 4 adults and 3 kids. Michael was very responsive to all my questions and requests. Our communications were swift and efficient. I like Michael's idea of taking care the house as your friend's home. Even though I haven't seen Michael in person, after a few email exchanges, I felt a trust is building between us. 

The villa was located in a Golf resort, a very nice neighborhood to stay. It is also within the walking distance to Aulani Disney resort, and a short drive to 5 beautiful lagoons. My kids love love the lagoons!

Thank you Michael for comfortable home. We enjoyed our 8-night stay!

Ko Olina is a luxury resort that's been in development for more than 20 years.   Besides the two Marriotts and the Disney Auilana resort, there are a half dozen mixed use developments on the back side of the beautiful golf course.  Most are mixed, detached single family, townhouse/duplex style condos and everything in between.  This property sits behind the Golf Course Clubhouse.   Because it is a master planned area, the architectural style is gorgeous, what Seaside is to old Gulf Coast Florida, Ko Olina's architecture is designed to evoke an island cottage style.  While the West side of Oahu is much more of a "desert" climate compared to the very wet East side of the island, the entire resort is beautifully landscaped, huge variety of beautiful tropical plants and palms that complement the prevailing architecture.  Everything is lush and green, with beautiful lighting.  This section of single family homes is one of two immediately inland from the Marriott/Disney waterfront properties.  The two subdivisions are tied together with a network of private walkways that readily connect you to the main attractions of Ko Olina.  From Michael's property its a ten minute walk to the high end Roy's restaurant located in the Golf Course Clubhouse.   There is a shuttle that stops in front of Roys every 20 minutes that takes you to all three resorts plus the next adjacent retail area.   We preferred to walk, which is very lovely in the cool morning hours and at dusk.  From Roys its another ten minutes walk to the first of the three protected swimming lagoons, and to the most scenic restaurant on the West side, Longboards, outdoor dining right on the first lagoon looking across at the setting sun through a screen of tall palms (gorgeous).   More often we walked about 20 minutes to the complex of Restaurants and shops that is across from the huge Disney resort (Aulana).  Monkey pods is one of the best restaurants in Oahu, there is also a Sushi bar, an Asian fusion restaurant, a 'sort of' Mexican restaurant, Ice cream shop, Coffee shop, and a half dozen upscale retail shops and galleries (and equally important an ABC corner store, picture a 7-11 with fresh fruit, local treats, beach stuff, and liquor).     So in other words, we found the location great.   More important, the subdivision is quiet, sedate, gated, a double handful of residents.  Did I mention quiet?  Our downstairs neighbor was home about 4 days of our 10 day stay, but we never heard anything.  This is a huge difference from Marriott/Disney which are literal madhouses of people coming and going.  Disney is the greatest family resort I've ever seen, but literally a thousand children running wild may wear on most people.  We loved to walk to Disney's lagoon at dusk, wander back through the gorgeous lobby and shops, listen to the live music, then walk home to peace and quiet.  The house was well equipped, nicely decorated and altogether suitable.  Point of reference we are 65.

Our family of 5 spent a month in Michael's unit at Ko Olina.  We enjoyed a prior stay so much we came back again.  There was plenty of space for all of us to spread out, complete with all the necessities of home. It was great to be able to cook in the full kitchen and have dinners on the lanai. The gas grills at the pool were an added bonus.  The kids make great use of the pool while the adults had some relax time.  Being within walking distance to the lagoons was fabulous - no packing kids in the car and waiting for parking spots. We spent many days at the lagoons, watching the sea life - monk seals, turtles, and even found an octopus.  It was great to be able to walk or ride a bike to the ABC store for a forgotten item, or for Shave Ice & Ice Cream.  There were plenty of beach towels and the beds were all comfortable. It was so much nicer to have a safe place for the kids to roam around the neighborhood, looking for lizards and geckos than being confined to a hotel room.

Michael was a great host, and went WAY above and beyond on a couple of occasions. He was easy to work with and always responsive.  Thank you so much, Michael!

We had a fantastic vacation, and highly recommend making this home for your stay!
Our overall stay was very nice! Mike was very helpful and condo was very clean and in order. I would stay here again!!
Michael was very responsive with all communications.  The house is in a very nice, quite and safe area.  It is exactly as desribed.  Ample of space for family of five.

Mike responded very quickly and kindly answered our questions and issues. The place is very closed to Aulani hotel where is Disney scheme hotel, beach and shopping centers includes groceries. We had a really good time.

生活用品から､調味料等がすべて整えてあり､到着と同時に普段通りの生活が出来ました｡ｳｪﾙｶﾑﾄﾞﾘﾝｸも用意されており､初日からKo Olinaを満喫させてもらいました｡
添付されていた写真を見て今回のStayを決めたのですが､期待以上のHouse Styleとｺﾞﾙﾌｺｰｽ内の周囲環境とﾗｸﾞｰﾝと呼ばれる複数のPublic Beachを含むKo Olina全体の雰囲気はﾘｿﾞｰﾄ気分を盛り上げる最高の場所でした｡日本人ばかりのWaikikiと比べ､正にﾍﾞｽﾄﾘｿﾞｰﾄでした｡
ｶｰﾄﾞによる出入り管理､併設されているﾌﾟｰﾙとﾎｯﾄｽﾊﾟも毎日利用させてもらい､ﾘﾗｯｸｽできました

The listing was accurate and a perfect fit for our 3 generation family. 
The neighborhood was neat, clean and secure. Walking distance to shops and lagoons. 
There was soooo much to do and see, we barely scratched the surface.

Our host Mike was great! Just hours before my flight departure, around 5 am, I realized I forgot the house keys Mike sent me a few weeks earlier. I desperately emailed, text and lastly called Mike at 5 am to see if he had a second set of keys. Shortly after, Mike replied to my email and remotely coordinated a second set of keys sent to the house before my arrival in Honolulu. Mike was prompt and responsive with all of my questions. The house was exactly as pictured on the site. The 3 bedrooms was perfect for our party of 7-clean with enough space for everyone. The community pool and sauna was also great for the kids and grandparents. We would love to stay at Mike's house again in the future.

Vi opplevde at vi fikk god hjelp i forkant av oppholdet og verten var rask å svar på spørsmål. Plasseringen var flott men det er litt lite som skjer på kveldstid. Det er lukkede arrangementer på hotellene i nærheten men der får du ikke tilgang. 
Leiligheten var slik som beskrevet og holdt ok standard. Det var endel mangler ved rengjøringen så vi måtte begynne å vaske med en gang vi kom men verten kompenserte oss noe for dette.  
Området har fantastisk strand og vi likte oss svært godt der, det er stille og rolig med lite bølger men fint for snorkling og bading. Basseng området brukte vi lite da våre barn er glade i å hoppe, løpe og stupe og det var ikke tillat i bassenget.

I traveled to O'ahu with a group of friends and family for a girls trip.  Michael's place was just as described and a beautiful place to stay.  It was very safe and the neighbors were friendly. I loved the ample room for everyone and the balcony too. The pool was a  wonderful place to gather and cool off. The pool area has a place to sign up to use a covered BBQ area for your group if you want. We didn't use it, but it was nice to know it was there. The Lagoons at Ko'olina were AMAZING!! We went to several of them during our stay and again after we moved to the North Shore. Waters were calm and sandy beaches we great, but there was grass that you could lounge on instead if you didn't want to get all full of sand. Lots of beach chairs, towels and toys available as well as a garage if you need one. There were no bugs inside the residence at all, which is very important to me when traveling to Hawaii. This place was very clean. Communication was great with Michael and he always got back to me with any questions I had very quickly.  I would definitely stay here again.  Thank you Michael!

Aloha!!! 

This was a great deal for the week; The location was perfect for the wedding we were attending (at Aulani). We were within a 10-15 minute walk from the lagoon and Mike even provided us with some snorkeling gear, boogey boards, chairs, etc. to take with us to the beach.  The location was super convenient for the first half of our trip since we spent most of our time at Aulani, but towards the end, we did a lot of driving to Waikiki and the North Shore (we played it by ear most of the time, so our itinerary was pretty open).  The beds were comfortable, the AC was nice and cool, and the neighborhood was peaceful. I didnt hear any noises whatsoever from people downstairs/next door.  Mike was also very responsive to all my questions and answered them quickly.  

A few things to note:  
1) You do have to wash the sheets and clean before check out, but if you don't mind then it's not too much of a big deal.  
2) You have 2 parking spots (garage and driveway). There were 8 of us and we had 3 cars (some people arrived/left later than the rest). There is no street parking. There are several Guest parking spots between the villas, but you need to get a special permit from the front office.

Overall, I would recommend this place for families who are interested in staying close to Aulani. 

Mahalo to Mike for sharing his home with us. Cheers!

It's fabulous place, My family loved our time in Ko Olina Kai.
We had a great time at villa.
Mike was a great host!
He was very thoughtful and has a kind heart. 
Our flight arrived early in the morning.
So We wanted to early check-in for our little kids. 
He did accept really cool. 
And besides, We made floor noises at first day.
Actually we didn't know who live in downstairs. The neighbor had claimed to Mike. 
But he politely was send a message to me.
The neighbor also understood our mistake .
The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful. 
Even until now we're really sorry about that.

Mike's place was perfect for our group with children.
The pool & jacuzzi are beautiful and perfect for our kids.
The house was very beautiful and clean.
They provided everything's we need.
If we get back to Oahu,  we'd definitely stay at Mike's again. But We're not sure that he accept us again. :)

Thanks for the great stay, Mike!

Mike did responde our question or request quickly during our stay in the house. Expecially we did reach him by phone in first day night when we lost the direction to the house, and he did clearly guided us to the location. The house was clean and comfprtable. The community is quiet and safe, the scenery is beautiful.

This three bedroom condo is located within a resort area, which has its good and bad qualities. It takes a lot of time to get anywhere, such as a grocery store, outside of the resort area. The resort area itself is beautiful and easy to get around with a car, or walking. With older people with us we found it difficult to find parking within the resort area outside of the condo, but fitter people can easily walk. The house is nice and well kept. There were a few problems during our stay but Michael came to fix them quickly. The house sleeps six people, but the settings, such as bowls and table chairs, were only for four. Overall, it was a picturesque location for an Australian and American family reunion.

I highly recommend staying here if you have small kids. We went with a 2 1/2  year old and we were in walking distance to many beaches with low-tide to no-tide which made for perfect day trips to the beach. We were able to swim with sea turtles and see a seal taking a nap (Paradise Cove Beach - short walk from the condo). Also, the Disney resort is across the street which is fun for kids to go see.

The location was very convenient, you could walk to the grocery store, many restaurants and shops, a luau spot, golf and many beaches. We also walked to the car rental to pick our car up. (Hidden by Airbnb) maps makes the walk places seem far more difficult than it actually is - it gave us 30 minute walk times around weird routes and when we finally figured out the right way the walk was (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes at most. 

We rented a car to drive to the more touristy spots (Hanauma Bay, Pearl Harbor, North Shore, etc.) However, we found the best beaches and atmosphere in Ko'Olina. It wasn't crowded (besides the Disney resort) and was very relaxing. 

Overall, a great trip and a great place to stay!

Michael's home is beautiful.   The area that it is in is also beautiful and peaceful.   The pool at the place is great ... as is the hot tub.  We also used the barbecue grill and cabana next to the pool to cook dinner one night, which was fantastic.   The Lagoons are nice and much less crowded than Waikiki beach!  The beach is farther away than I had anticipated.   I thought we could walk there.   But with three little kids and all we had to take with us ... driving was the only way for us to get to the beach.  I think to walk to it would have been over a mile. 

I rated our stay good ... and not excellent ... for two very important reasons.  
 (1) It took us hours and hours to clean, change and wash the linen, and wash, dry, and put away all the towels, wash cloths, and anything else we used.   Michael offers a great deal on his place, but because of that great price, you do your own cleaning.   I feel like we wasted most of a day cleaning ... I think I would have rather paid a bit higher price to have the cleaning included. ... at least the linen and towels. 

(2) There are neighbors living below Michael's place, and they are very unforgiving with sound.   We came with three little kids and if they even walked fast from one room to another, the people below us got mad and banged on their ceiling.  It was constant.   The kids tried ... and we tried to remind them ... but it's hard for three little ones to remember to tiptoe at all times.  If they got the last bit excited, the neighbors below would get mad.  If they bounced a little soft ball, we got in trouble. If just my husband and I were coming, I think it would be fine ... but I Would NEVER stay again with little kids.   It was way to hard  ... it felt like we were yelling at them to be quiet the whole time ... and we weren't really in the condo all that much ... but when we were ... we absolutely couldn't be quiet enough for the downstairs neighbors.  It was tough ... and will definately be a black eye on our vacation. 

But Michael was great, his condo was beautiful, and the area is gorgeous.  Michael also does a great job of providing anything you may need to make your stay enjoyable.

Mike's place was beautiful and a great spot for our 3 generation family. Our kids ages 1 and 2 loved the lagoons and the pool area. Michael was always very prompt in returning any messages and being very clear with his communication throughout the entire process. The only concern I had was that the neighbor downstairs complained about the kids noise from walking around on the very first day of our stay and got us all stressed out about letting them be kids the rest of the trip (I got the impression from the neighbor that it is not a very kid friendly place because of that) Everything else was wonderful and exceeded our expectations.

We just arrived home from.a wonderful week in Ko'Olina at Michael's condo. It was the perfect spot for us and our five teenage daughters. Close enough to some shopping and beaches, but away from the craziness of the city. Michael's place was clean and well  maintained, with plenty of space for all of us.  He checked in a few times during the week to be sure everything was going well. It was a bit of a disappointment that the pool closed for maintenance while we were there, but it was easy enough to drive the kids to the beach instead. Being able to cook a few meals at home was nice too, especially breakfast so we didn't have to get up and going too early. Thank you for a great stay in beautiful Hawaii!
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The home was everything that was advertised. We were 3 generations that did a family trip and it was amazing. The home is in a very quite neighbourhood and very walkable to the beach. Waikiki is quite a drive away especially during rush hour but Costco and Walmart are very convenient. I would just like to mention that the reviews that there are people living underneath you is true and that if you have kids that like to run this may not be the place for you. I had a 2 year old and a 7 month old and it worked out well, we had a "thumping" complaint by the neighbours only a couple of times when my kid was over excited. I would highly recommend this place so that everyone can stay together under one roof.

This place was everything that it advertises itself to be. No false expectations. 

This is a perfect 'starter pack' for anyone who is a bit weary of the island life and might need a bit more of a cosmopolitan cushion to welcome them to paradise. In my case, it was the perfect place to show my family (the bulk of which are senior citizens that have various mobility needs) the beauty of Hawaii without worrying about them getting swept away by the crashing waves of a full blown beach.

The house did have a flight of stairs that my elderly auntie was able to go up and down (only when we were coming and going from the house) very easily with no complaints.

There is a cafe and lots of great restaurants that my family commondeared and visited daily. 

The 20+ speed bumps to the villa were a bit obnoxious at first but one night, my boyfriend and I decided to go for for a stroll to see if there was a quicker way to get to the main strip where the hotels and the lagoons were so we gps-ed walking directions to Aulani and we were there in 12 min. It was a snap!

My family LOVED the lagoons. I had an aunt who didn't even bring a swimsuit to Hawaii but ended up buying one because of how gentle the waves were at the lagoons. It was their favorite place in all of the island (next to the Costco and Target there were just an exit away). 

The pool in the community is a short little walk and is absolutely beautiful. There are 3-4 covered shelters where you and the family can pull up and grill some steaks. It was a great way to take advantage of the beautiful weather the last couple days when half of us wanted to chill and half of us wanted our time in the water.

I've been to Oahu several times already, myself, so for someone like me and the the more adventurous and mobile people in my family, the mermaid caves are less than 7 min away, a drive to Waimanalo or Honolulu was about 30-45 min, but for the most part, it's not a bad drive. 

Cleaning was an easy thing to accommodate with some diligent planning. 

Overall a great stay and a great deal granted all the amenities at your fingertips.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Nice host very accomodating. Note he had sold the place so not sure it will be available for future rental. Well equiped kitchen for a rental. Carpets need deep cleaning or replacement. Living sparsely decorated,i.e., one couch which was too low for us so we added some cushions. No real beach chairs available for tenant use. Pool is good but lots of loud children at the weekend. empty during week. No on premises bbg grill, so you have to drive or walk to the pool area to grill your steak or burger. Grocery stores and other services require a drive to Kapolei. Restuarants in the Ko Olina are mostly bad to mediocre, even the Roy's at the golf club house was not so good.
The host canceled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Large Open kitchen with lots of extras, open floor plan and remodeled with granite counters and appliances plus plenty of cookware from rice cooker to griddle and waffle maker.  Dishes for 12 plus... Spacious and lovely and well maintained...Upstairs unit with 3 lanais to enjoy outdoors and have that morning coffee or enjoy your meals out on the lanai!  Plenty of breezes and ceiling fans in each room.. We provide all linens and beach towels.  There are plenty of beach toys for the little ones. neighborhood_overview: Poipu Beach is a smaller community with great shops, restaurants and activities!  Close to everything and not a crowded area but lovely and lush and perfect climate to enjoy your special time in Paradise! Great spot to explore the island!  Best weather on sunny side of island!
notes: Our prices includes Taxes which is 13.42%!! Great Deal!!! Holidays we reserve a 12 day minimum!! NO EXCeptions... This is Our Family CONDO please treat with respect....Mahalo!!!
transit: There is public transit....But car is suggested to explore all that Kauai offers!  Bikes are available for rental and great for kids to explore...Also shuttle from airport if someone else joins your group!
access: There are 3 pools and 3 jacuzzis available for your use....two pools and jacuzzi right in our complex PLUS Poipu Kai larger POOL and Jacuzzi. Also boogie boards, beach chairs and beach towels!  We have beach toys for kids, tennis racquets and some snorkel gears as well! Coolers for day trips.   Plenty of guide books as well! Games and CDs plus porta crib for the little (URL HIDDEN) Charge for all the goodies!
interaction: Just let me know if you need advice for your trip or suggestions on things to see and do! I do send you with your info a Favorite Things to do in Kauai...I have collected this for many years and helps with your plans...
house_rules: No smoking!  No shoes indoors.  No pets.  No large parties!   Please take trash out on departure and start dishwasher.  Pool hours 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. Have a Fabulous time!~Mahalo!   Let us know how you enjoyed your stay! No Late checkouts unless you check with (URL HIDDEN) early checkin unless you check with Pam..

host.host_about:
Loves Kauai!  Favorite pastimes are traveling, reading, cooking, movies  and spending time with my family and grandkids!
I love to help people have a wonderful time in Kauai!  I have 2 beautiful condos and love to make your vacation special!  I can give you lots of details on condos and the area!  Poipu Beach is a special place and offers quiet, beauty and fabulous sun, surf and sand.  I love all the great fresh fish, produce you can secure on Kauai and cook in your condo or outdoor grill!  I will send you a great list of places to see and things to do and where to eat!  This is truly Paradise!!!
Call me for last min deals!

reviews.comments: This condo is huge, gorgeous, and immaculate. There were tons of beach towels, toys, boogie boards, beach chairs, and even coolers. My friends and I had a great time staying here. Great location as well. Close to the beach, restaurants, and shops.The only downside was it could get a little noisy. The pool is very close to the unit and there were several days when children were playing and screaming and then later adults were also partying out there. This behavior is against the rules, but people disregarded the rules while we were there.

We stayed in Pam's condo for a week and had a wonderful time! The place was clean, spacious, affordable for a grad student's budget, and had everything we needed for our vacation, including beach toys, snorkel gear, and beach towels. There is no AC in the condo, and we were worried about the heat in late August but the cross breeze from the ocean kept us cool and comfortable at night (though the loft is slightly warmer). The location was great as well - we were in Kauai to attend a wedding at the Kiahuna Plantation Garden restaurant, which was just a 10-15 min walk down the road. The beach was a short walk away as well and we enjoyed using the pool and hot tub in the Poipu Kai complex in the evenings. Overall, we can't wait to come back to Kauai and would love to stay here again!
I reserved this for my parents, who enjoyed the large space, and made good use of the snorkel gear.

My 7 and 11 year old granddaughters, daughter and son-in-law, wife and I had a fantastic time in Kauai staying at this wonderful Hawaiian retreat.  We were in easy walking distance to beaches for swimming, snorkeling, people watching, etc. and the Hyatt.  The residence is roomy with well stocked kitchen and bath items and supplies as well as many beach items.  Pam provides a helpful “Our Favorite Things To Do” list.
 
One pool, with barbeques is close by and another pool and barbeque a very short walk away.  Although the unit is not air conditioned, we were always comfortable because it is located for very good air flow.  We were sorry to have to leave but have many, many memories of our Kauai stay.

We had a very comfortable stay in the condo. Pamela was informative and extremely quick at replying to messages. She ensured my little girl was reunited with her favourite toy rabbit which we had left. Mahalo.

This place is in a great location for families with kids - an easy walk down the path to Poi Pu State Beach park, which has a perfect beach for toddlers and a park.  It is also an easy walk to shipwreck beach and the Grand Hyatt, which is beautiful to walk around.  The inside of the condo is very spacious and comfortable and fully stocked -- it had everything we needed, from beach toys to boogie boards, a cooler, beach towels, etc.  It  made our stay very easy and relaxing.  The only thing that is missing is an ocean view, but the verandas are still nice to sit on.

Pamela and her home definitely met our high expectations. She was kind and responsive to our inquiries and the house had everything to enjoy our stay in Kauai. I would totally trust Pamela to accommodate us in future trips.

Our host contacted me several times to provide us with lots of helpful details about the condo.  Even  though we've been to Kauai before, our host's comments were very helpful.  We'd highly recommend this unit!

We were made very welcome by Pam and the two staff members we encountered. The Unit was as advertised and had everything we needed. Communication with Pam was excellent. The beach chairs and boogie boards came in very handy.
The location of the Unit was great and the BBQ's and pools were used every day.

Pamela is a great host and the place is amazing!
Apartment is very bright, clean and welcoming.
We stayed there for a week with my wife and two kids and everybody enjoyed it!
Poipu is a really nice location, beaches are just 5 minutes walking from the apartment.

We appreciated the information that Pam sent us about the area before our arrival. We found Hawaiian coffee and goodies on the kitchen counter upon our arrival. Pam was very responsive when we had questions initially and when we needed to have the smoke detector serviced.

The condo is very comfortable and in good condition. The five of us had plenty of space. We made good use of the beach towels and chairs, boogie boards, and coolers. It was nice to have the use of the washer and dryer, also. The kitchen is well equipped with anything you might need to prepare food.

Thanks Pam.  We had a wonderful time in Kauai.  We reserved the home for our daughter, her husband and her two kids (three and six).  Due to work conference, my husband and I stayed at the Grand Hyatt.  The house is within walking distance to the Hyatt.  We enjoyed playing with the kids and have dinners with the kids at the house.  The house is very well furnished.  Our Grandkids enjoyed the beach toys.  We are looking forward to coming back again.  

Happy 2015 Pam to you and your family.

What a wonderful experience!  We arrived at the condo late in the evening and a little bit hungry.  Pam left us a basket of goodies, so we had a quick munchie and fresh coffee in the morning too!  The condo is well stocked.  It has anything you can think of for amenities.  There were books, games and videos in the cupboard for any down town we may have had.  There were chairs, water toys and a cooler for the beach - which is a short walk away.  We were 3 adults and 2 kids and there was plenty of space for us, for when we wanted to hang out together and when we needed a little quiet time.  The location is lovely.  A nice walk to a little mall down the way and restaurants near by.    Pam has been a pleasure.  She answers questions quickly and is so helpful.  Would absolutely stay here again!!

This unit perfectly met our needs for a family holiday. My husband, baby and I were travelling with our in-laws and our brother-in-law and his girlfriend, and the unit was plenty spacious for all of us. The kitchen was beautiful and has every appliance you could need. There was no air-conditioning, but with the windows open we got a nice breeze that kept things comfortable. The location was fantastic, with less than a 10-minute walk to a very family-friendly beach and playground and the site had three different pools, plenty of green space and lots of gas BBQs to use. Pam was great, quick to respond to any questions and provided a list of activities and restaurants to try in the area. She also had lots of beach gear (towels, boogie boards, snorkel gear, etc) which was great to have access to. Only downfall was the unexpected notification that the building across from us was having their roof done while we were there, which resulted in one of the pools (the one right outside our unit) being closed and some construction noise, which was hard to avoid because of having to keep the windows open for air flow. 
Lots of parking, quick drive to some local shops, plazas and hotels for a nice meal or drink. Loved this place and hope to be back someday!
Very nice spacious condo that met all my families needs.  I would definitely recommend this location to anyone who is going to be vacationing in Kauai.
Pamela was great, she was very thorough explaining about the accommodations and had great suggestions about things to do in the area.
The host canceled this reservation 103 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Pamela is very helpful and very responsive to email. The location is great. It is so close to Poipu beach and shopping. The condo is well stocked with kitchen appliances / spices / beach towels, beach chairs, and pretty much every thing we need. There is no air-conditioner, however, with the windows open, the condo cools down with the nice breeze right away.

Had a few issues so can not recommend this place.  Location is off main road so there's traffic noise at night/ morning.  Though the bathroom and kitchen are remodeled the rest of the apartment is really dated and shabby.  Could not use the dresser in the master bedroom because of dirt and hair all over the drawers so had nowhere to store clothes.  The 3rd bedroom is a loft with steep stairs so not usable if you have small children.

B4 we left the host gave us the address and the key code for the front door via e-mail. There were 3 middle aged couples in our group; a bedroom for each couple. There was plenty of room for us. The apartment is almost elegant. It was clean and well furnished and very comfortable. It is conveniently located in an upper class neighborhood of hotels and condos; surrounded by many other units all with pools and hot tubs. It is within walking distance to a beach backed by a 4 star hotel. You can walk to eating and a small shopping plaza. There is a major plaza with restaurants and tourist shops within a mile. Nothing other than Bubba Burger is cheap in the neighborhood. You can drive to Kooloa town for a super market used by locals and a middle class tourist area about 3 miles up 520 from the apartment.

Only negative is that parking is at a premium. Many permanent residents have reserved spaces and they park in other spaces leaving transients to fight for the few remaining spaces. If you go out for the evening and get back late, you might have to park in an adjacent area because there are no spaces available in your parking area.

Place is just a 10 minute walk to Poipu beach. Very well maintained and had all the amenities that we needed. The pool was also an added bonus. Pamela was also quick to respond to any questions we had. Great place to spend a vacation for a big group of people.
The host canceled this reservation 106 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was an all-around great condo!   There were 5 adults and a 1 year old and it met all of our needs for 10 days.   I'm pleased to say the host's description is very accurate--no surprises!  If I return I'll definitely stay at this condo again.   The kitchen is very well equipped!  
The host was very responsive to any inquiries I had.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Pam was wonderful at making us feel welcome. She was available whenever we had a question. 

The space is very open and comfortable. It has a master bedroom with a king size bed, a second bedroom with a queen size bed and a loft with two twin beds. The dining area is large, and the living area comfortably accommodated five adults for visiting and watching a movie. The balconies, including the front porch, were cool and relaxing. The complex is very well maintained, safe, and convenient to beaches, shopping and dining. Parking is close and always available. It's a perfect location!

Pam was super helpful to check with us before our trip and ensure we arrive at the condo. everything was great, location was convenient, the portable coolers were a  great item to have (there were many sizes!) Wi-fi worked very well too.

the only issue was we had a hard time operating the key to the door, it took several tries, but Pam said she will look into it after we told her upon checkout. So overall, highly recommended.

Pamela is a fantastic host and is very responsive. Her condo is well-equipped with all the cooking utensils you'd need and plenty of beach  gear. The location is walkable to a great local beach and also to the Grand Hyatt resort.  Highly recommended for families.
Enjoyed our stay. A good price for a large place.

Pam was a great hostess - giving a lot of tips before our trip and was very responsive with the few questions we had during the trip.  The condo is beautiful and well-situated.  Some of us paid a daily fee to have access to the Hyatt spa which is walking distance from the condo.  We spent two weeks in Kawaii and were quite busy but there was a lot more to do in the Poipu beach that we never had time to take advantage of - it was a great trip!

Your condo had everything we needed and more. It was larger than it looked in the pictures, which was a great surprise.

The sofa bed was quite uncomfortable. It hurt my sons' backs who preferred to sleep on the floor. The loft was a bit too hot. It would be great if it had air. Overall we had a great family vacation.

A perfect vacation sit for our family of 2 parents and 3 college students. Close enough that they could walk to the beach. The home is spacious enough that each person could find a space for some down time when needed. This beautiful home is thoughtfully furnished, complete with beach towels and toys as well as spices and condiments. We loved it here!
Very spacious and comfortable.  The most well-equipped kitchen in a rental I have ever had! 10 minute walk to Poipu beach through lovely greenspace.

We had a wonderful stay at this lovely condo. The photos don't do it justice! The location is quiet and an easy walk to Shipwreck beach and Poipu beach, and is close to many restaurants and shops. I would absolutely stay here again.
The stay was great. We would love to come back to this unit next time.
Lovely spacious place for a family to enjoy the sights and sounds of Kauai.

We truly enjoyed Pamela's condo. It was spacious enough for our five teenage boys and daughter each to have their own space. The high ceilings and kitchens were lovely. We had the fans going non-stop as the humidity and heat was unfamiliar. We were close to beautiful Poipu beach and walked down to enjoy the ocean every day.  Pamela was wonderful to work with. I would highly recommend this condo.   Thank you Pam!

Pam's place exceeded our expectations.  It is a great value for the money.  The condo is much larger than it looks in photos.  The loft has a lot of room and a private half bath.  The master was large enough to fit two kids as well as two adults (she has portacribs there, which is great!).  The second bedroom is also a good size.  The only downside to the condo itself is there is no air conditioning, so it might be really hot in the summer.  She has a lot of fans though.

The location is walking distant to a great beach with a protected play area for kids.  Very convenient!

Air BNB classifies 4 stars as good and 5 stars as great. I would rate this condo 4.7 out of 5 (5 being absolutely perfect). Pamela's condo in Poipu is in a fantastic location, is beautifully furnished/stocked and reasonably priced. And dealing with Pamela is an absolute delight. Our party of 6 thoroughly enjoyed our 10-day stay. 5+ stars for the following: Location. Centrally located. Getting anywhere on the island is a breeze. You are just 20 min drive from the Airport, Costco, and major shopping. This means getting groceries for the week can be done in one run and save you lots of $$$. You can make a day trip of exploring the island to the north and west, and another to Waimea. Also, Poipu Beach Park, a family friendly beach is a 10-minute walk through breathtakingly beautiful grounds, or if you have small children it is an easy drive. The waves of Kauai are treacherous. Locals warned us several times of the dangers when visiting other beaches. Snorkeling and surfing lessons are an added 5 minutes away. We went to a Luau at a fancy hotel down the street. You CANNOT BEAT this location. It is awesome. The layout: Comfortable condo. Spacious and the pictures posted don’t fully capture the beauty of the space. Beautiful artwork and very clean. I love that there were two single beds in the loft as my preteen boy and teen girl each had their own bed!!! Lots of places will say sleeps 6 but only give you 3 beds… here we had 4… perfect for us! Extras: Beach towels. Snorkeling stuff. Boogie boards. Beach Chairs. Soap. Cooking staples. Not having to pack or buy these things - 5+ stars. Realistically this saved us money since we didn’t check our luggage, so it was nice to pack minimally. Pools: There are three!!! Which is fabulous. Some dummy brought glass into the pool closest to the condo and forced a shut down, but we still had access to the other two and the grill (locked inside the pool area). This bears mentioning because if you plan on cooking – grill outside to keep the heat in the house to a minimum. Laundry facilities. Save money. Don’t bring excess stuff and wash & reuse. The less than perfect rating comes from: The dryer - 3 stars. The vent to the outside needs to be cleaned to get the dryer working more efficiently. This particularly threw off my last day of vacation where I hoped to lounge at the pool and pack up clean clothes. I paid an extra day because our flight left at 10 pm. Had I known what I knew about the dryer, I wouldn’t have spent the extra night. The wifi. My children do schooling online and my brother needed wifi for work purposes. Unfortunately neither was able to use it at a reasonable time. Wifi is basic and shared with the community. The more people access it, the slower it goes....
Great place for a family vacation. Walking distance to the beach and fabulous hotels. We had a great time at Pamela's place.

This is a great condo in beautiful Poipu resort area. The place is spacious, with a beautiful master bedroom and second bedroom downstairs, and a loft area upstairs. This is not a ground-floor unit, however -- there are 18 small steps to the front door. This wasn't a problem for us, but was unexpected because I assumed since it had a loft, it must be a ground floor unit. The kitchen, living and dining areas are large and well-furnished. There is a medium-sized pool just around the corner from the condo, and a larger one within easy walking distance. Our kids loved the nearby pool and jacuzzi. Pam was the most responsive and helpful host you could ask for, so I really recommend this place without hesitation!
Pam was very communicative and the condo was breezy enough to keep our large group of 8 cool in hot weather

This was our first frip to Hawaii and our first ever experience with Airbnb.  Our time spent at Pamela's place was all we could have hoped for and more.  We had a family reunion with our four adult children and truly felt welcome and at home.  This is such a beautiful home and was a perfect fit for us.  From the tasteful furnishings to the fully equipped kitchen, beautiful baths and oh so comfortable beds, not to mention beach towels, chairs and snorkel gear -- we had it all.  This home is in a great location with an easy walk to the beach and pool as well as a few great spots to dine out.  We would highly recommend this  condo to all.  Tom & Mary P., Westlake, OH

Large spacious condo. Beautiful furnishings with everything you need from towels to laundry soap to finns and goggles. Just a few minute walk to tennis courts and the public beach. Quiet surroundings with easy access to shopping and restaurants. Pool and grills just behind the building-great for family fun and meals.
Great space, decor and location. Only thing one could wish for would be a slightly warmer pool, but everything else was perfect

Pamela’s place is very spacious and in a great location. We utilized the pool and jacuzzi on the property that is just steps outside the door. Also the condo has all the necessities for a comfortable stay including kitchen essentials and all the beach gear you will need. There is plenty of non-reserved parking spots for your rental car. Check in and check out times are pretty rigid as it seems Pamela’s place has a lot of back-to-back reservations so plan accordingly. Overall, great place to stay in Kauai.

The condo exceed my expectations.
