It was very roomy, decorated nicely and had  almost anything you needed (movies, books, DVD's, games, dinner ware and very well stocked kitchen with all the pans, dishes and many spices and staples.  Pam was very attentive.   I brought all kinds of shampoo and conditioner because I thought there was just going to be enough for a day or two and was surprised that baths were fully stocked.
Beautiful, elegant home in ideal setting and a short walk to a beach with a lifeguard and cafe. Clear and rapid responses.
Great place to stay, very spacious and modern

Everything was perfect for us.  There is easily room for 6 people (we were 4) to spread out and relax in the living room, sit and enjoy meals at the large dining table, and prepare meals in the kitchen without getting in each other's way (a lot of counter space).  We did enjoy our meals at nearby Brennecke's Beach Broiler and Keoki's Paradise restaurants.  We rented a car so it was easy to get everywhere/anywhere, and we did feel a car was needed.  We were able to watch the sunrise and the sunset at the nearby walking path/trail (we did use the car to get there), where we were also able to watch whales breaching one morning.  We enjoyed our daily trips out to all areas of Kauai knowing we had a comfortable condo to come back to each evening.  Thank you Pamela for hosting our stay...we would and will recommend your condo.

A great place in Poipu area. Close to restaurants, beaches, and a shopping plaza. The master bedroom is quite big. However, the 3rd bedroom is a loft. It has all the amenities: dishes, utensils, fans, cookware, towels, and even beach chairs and a sand bucket for kids.
Large, nicely appointed condo!  Everything you want or need in the kitchen,  updates throughout, quick walk to the beach!! Can’t wait to go back!!

Pam's place was perfect for our stay.  Great location near the beach and the heritage trail.  This place was so thoughtfully appointed and perfectly clean.  The beds were all really comfortable, bathrooms had plenty of soap and shampoo.  The second bedroom closet was loaded with beach gear: chairs, boogie boards, snorkeling gear, and a cooler.  Kitchen had everything we could have needed.  Lots of great books about the island and a stack of movies for evenings.  Really recommend, especially great for families!

It's not easy getting to Kauai from a place as far away as the midwestern U.S., but our reward for traveling so far was Pamela's outstanding condominium in Poipu. Her condo was spotless and had every imaginable amenity. Everything anyone would need to have an enjoyable stay in Poipu is made available by Pamela. She also provided some terrific tips for local places to visit. I highly recommend her condominium. She is a terrific host!
Great place to enjoy the beautiful Kauai Island. Great hospitality and amenities above and beyond. Definitely would stay again in the future.

First trip to Kauai and Pamela's condo couldn't have been a better place to experience it.  Condo is located a 5 minute walk from a great public access beach to the west and a 5 minute walk to the east is a very nice Hyatt resort.  Both beaches are great places to spend a day snorkling, surfing or sunbathing.  The beach to the west is a great place to catch beautiful sunsets and the beach to the west provides access to a great stretch of the Heritage Trail that provides  great ocean and landscape views.  It also leads to the Makauwahi Cave reserve, which was an interesting visit.  Plenty of restaurant choices, a grocery store and shopping also within walking distance.  We used a rental car for access to the north side of the island but with the beach and hiking during the day and condo pools at night, we could have just relaxed in the condo area the entire trip.  Pamela provides a lot of nice little extras that make it easy to enjoy all the area has to offer.  Her communication is timely and access excellent.  Highly recommend.

We loved Pamela's house, and we felt at home. Everything was exactly as described. The kitchen was fully equipped, the bedrooms were comfortable and had plenty of space. The decoration was great and provided a touch of home as well. We really appreciated that they provided initial supplies of shampoo, conditioner, paper towels and soap. Also, the location couldn't be better. Poipu by itself is great, with a nearby shopping center, restaurants and grocery stores. Also, the place is strategic because you are close to west shore and east/north shore. We would definitely come back. Thank you, Pamela, for your hospitality.

Pamela’s place is an A++ - even better than the pictures, ideal location, easy walk to the beach, and every amenity you could want. Such a thoughtful host with many fantastic suggestions. Needless to say on our next trip to Kauai we will be staying here again!!

The stay was great and the price could not be beat. My conworkers and I were there on business and the place was perfect. We would definitely book again. The only drawback is no AC. They offer a lot of fans so we made it work but if AC is a big deal for some, they may want to reconsider. We loved the spaciousness and set up and the condo is top notch. Thank you again Pamela for the great stay!
Very nice and spacious.  Be sure and leave the sliding doors open and fans on when humidity is high.

This is the perfect place to stay in Kauai! The condo is located in close proximity to Poipu beach but also in a very centralized location for exploring all the island has to offer! The pool is just outside the master bedroom balcony which is incredibly convenient. The condo is spacious and contains everything that you need to explore including pool chairs, beach towels and even sand toys for your little one! Pamela is a wonderful host and is so quick to respond to all questions. We are already planning a return vacation!

We spent Thanksgiving week at Pamela’s condo. 4 adults and one 10 yo. We cooked a full Thanksgiving dinner, we had everything we needed. The condo is well stocked with beach towels, beach chairs, boogie boards,  and umbrellas. There are two great beaches a nice 8 minute walk through the landscaped complex. Pool is just outside the condo, master and main floor bedroom lanais overlook pool. Living room lanai overlooks parking lot but there is a lovely mountain view as well. A few games, books, movies and music. Pamela has extensive info on groceries, dining, activities and farmers markets. We highly recommend The Fresh Shave for shaved ice. So good but a bit of a drive. Its a little thing but our family all loved the Kirkland Moisture shampoo and conditioner in each bathroom. It’s so great we will be putting this in our own beach rental next summer!  
Thanks Pamela!
Close to Poipu area!! Clean house. Good neighborhood.

We pretty much use Airbnb for all of our travel these days. It's common to expect certain things, but typically the units have this but not much more. This rental is different, you can tell it's not just a rental but the owners really care about their place. We really felt at home here, at one point we bought some local steamed pork buns. We figured we would have to create a make shift steamer basket. But it turns out the rental had one. I know you might be thinking, who rents a place for a steamer basket. Your right no one does, but it does show you that this condo has just about anything you might need. It has all the big expected items, but then it has so much more. Pamela is super responsive, she even allowed us to ship a few items ahead of time to the rental.

The location is great, it is off a kind of busy road. We found that the unit was angled in a way that we never heard the traffic, but we also had a great breeze the whole time that mostly we just heard palm trees blowing in the wind. It was super comfortable there, the breeze blew through the whole house, it was quite amazing actually. Honest highlight to our trip. I can see that if the trade winds died down and it was a hot day, having no AC or breeze could make the unit uncomfortable. Based on what I know of Hawaii that is an exception not what is normal.

Walk to the beach, the walk to the beach is 10-15 minutes. The walk to the beach though is stunning and enjoyable on it's own. It was easy and safe to get to.

Side note we stayed here with our 16 month old son. The condo was very kid friendly, better than most Airbnb's we have stayed at. The beach that was within walking distance was kid friendly also, there was also a playground at that beach.

Pamela truly deserves more than 5 stars for her place.

Imagine if your favorite aunt had a great condo in Kauai and when she heard you wanted to go, offered to let you use it.  That's the experience we had with Pam.  She's not our aunt but she made us feel at home.

Pam's directions made the unit easy to find and the address is also easy to find using (Hidden by Airbnb) maps.  It was easy to get in to the condo when we arrived.  The code for the programmed deadbolt worked and it was easy to use to get into the condo and secure it when we left.  Upon entering the condo, we found a huge plate of homemade cookies waiting for us along with other great Hawaiian snacks.  The condo was clean and nice.  Not so nice that you were afraid to touch anything but tasteful and comfortable.

The beds were all comfortable with nice linens and an assortment of pillows.  The kitchen was fully stocked with a wide variety of spices, cooking oils, vinegars, pots, pans, utensils, and knives.  Again, it felt like we were staying in someone's home, rather than in a dedicated vacation rental.

The unit is perfectly situated with easy walking access to Poipu Beach, Brennecke's Beach and Shipwreck Beach.  We enjoyed the easy walk on an almost daily basis and often visited all three of the beaches in a day without much effort.  It's also an easy walk to the Grand Hyatt which is a great location to get a coffee and enjoy the sunrise.  There are a number of pools and hot tubs on the condo grounds so if you find one to be overly crowded, it's easy to find one that is less crowded.  Same for gas grills for barbecuing.  There is also a nice tennis facility on the grounds that we enjoyed using during our stay.

The Poipu Beach location is also an easy drive to all the other areas on the island.  The longest time we spent in a car was when we returned from Hanalei and reached the north edge of the Wailua area a little after 5:00 PM and encountered commuter traffic.  The total return trip was about 2 hours with heavy traffic congestion.  We made the drive up in about an hour.

Pam has also stocked the unit with an assortment of beach gear.  There were boogie boards, beach chairs, snorkel equipment, tennis rackets and a nice sized cooler.  Pam's suggestions for activities, restaurants, etc. were great.  Pam's place easily accommodated our family which included 3 adults and 3 children. 

We had a great time and loved our stay in Pam's condo.  We explored all over the island and this unit would be our first choice if we return to Kauai with the full family again.  

Thanks, Pam, for your part in making our time in Kauai so special!

Tutto perfetto, communicazione ottima, posizione ottima, camere spaziose e pulite, accessori ed oggetti da mare a disposizione senza preavviso.
Consigliatissimo
ideale per 6 persone

Pam's place is wonderful.  Located just in the middle of the green belt, you can walk to see both sunrise and sunset within about 10 minutes - something we took full advantage of!  The kitchen is one of the best equipped kitchens we have found in a rental.  My husband and I like to be able to prepare some meals where we are staying and we had everything we needed.  That said, if you want to eat out for every meal, there are so many choices very close by.  I would definitely recommend staying here!

Pamela's place was great! About a 10 minute walk and you can get to several different great spots.  The Hyatt for beautiful views and coffee, Poipu beach/baby beach, and Kalapaki Joes sports bar were a few of our faves.  Little Fish Coffee is also a great spot and only a 15 minute (mostly shaded) walk.  The condo has a great space/layout and great breezes.  Parking is easy and close to the unit. Great spot for our family!

name: Amazing Ocean View Moon Cabin on retreat property
summary: A lovely cabin on 15 acre sanctuary with incredible ocean views. Cottage has a very nice yard and gardens overlooking a pond. *Please acknowledge this cabin has a recently purchased, modern composting toilet in the bathroom.
space: 15 acre sanctuary near new black-sand beaches, Kalapana, Pahoa Village, Uncle Roberts Market and the best of East Hawai’i. Enjoy strolling through our beautiful 15 acres with expansive ocean views, 2 ponds and many gardens featuring flowers, orchids, medicinal plants, fruit trees, chickens and more. Enjoy our 50 foot, circular mandala flower garden featuring a custom made sculpture of Pele at the center. There are plenty of little hideaway places to discover, fruits to pick and an amazing 2 mile loop hike that goes around the neighborhood.  Our place is just 12 minutes from downtown Puna which has many restaurants, a grocery store, a health food store, a bakery and more. On Wednesday nights, we are just 5 minutes away from the Puna night market where you can find local handcrafts, great food and local music. On Thursday nights there is an ecstatic dance at our neighbors house from 8-10pm. There are also numerous dances, workshops, yoga classes and more happening nearby.  We are a 10 mi
description: A lovely cabin on 15 acre sanctuary with incredible ocean views. Cottage has a very nice yard and gardens overlooking a pond. *Please acknowledge this cabin has a recently purchased, modern composting toilet in the bathroom. 15 acre sanctuary near new black-sand beaches, Kalapana, Pahoa Village, Uncle Roberts Market and the best of East Hawai’i. Enjoy strolling through our beautiful 15 acres with expansive ocean views, 2 ponds and many gardens featuring flowers, orchids, medicinal plants, fruit trees, chickens and more. Enjoy our 50 foot, circular mandala flower garden featuring a custom made sculpture of Pele at the center. There are plenty of little hideaway places to discover, fruits to pick and an amazing 2 mile loop hike that goes around the neighborhood.  Our place is just 12 minutes from downtown Puna which has many restaurants, a grocery store, a health food store, a bakery and more. On Wednesday nights, we are just 5 minutes away from the Puna night market where you can find l
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood offers endless discoveries of beautiful spots along the seashore and in the forest, wonderful people and rich cultural activities. This is a very color community of artists, writers, organic farmers, sustainable living pioneers and free spirits. We offer you a unique experience in the paradise! New Earth Mandala is located in the most pristine and unspoiled area of Big Island, Hawaii. Only minutes from the famous Red Road that offers the scenic view of the tropical forest and turquoise blue sea shore. You will be amazed by these unexplored landscapes and rhythmic waves crashing against rugged lava coastlines. The Red Road-the Kapoho Kalapana Road takes you through lush coconut & mango groves, tropical rainforests, tranquil ocean side parks, plantations and lava fields. You won't see any corporate resort and tourist stores on this road. Time stops here and the mother nature opens you to an old Hawaiian dream of wild beauty and grace. Within a few minutes drive, you can
notes: Please note we don't take monthly rentals. Bathroom has composting toilet. Kitchen is designed for light cooking with a stove, sink, pot, pan & basic utensils. New Earth Mandala offers additional space for hosting a small gathering, wedding or retreat!  We have a beautiful Yoga Shala which serves as a place for our daily classes held at 8am and 4:30 on Wednesdays. Our retreat can accommodate a group of guests up to 28 people. If you need a few more spaces, we can have some camping spots with the access to bathroom.  if you are thinking of an intimate wedding, a family reunion or a small retreat for your students, we can help you plan and arrange the details.  New Earth Mandala with ocean view is a perfect place for events and gatherings. Please email us to discuss your plan and needs. Laundry service is offered for $10/a bag, wash & dry.
access: Your ocean-view cabin surrounded by beautiful and lush landscape on a 15-acre retreat center. Guests are free to explore and enjoy the very unique and special energy on this land. We offer yoga classes daily, tours, massage and catering available apon request for an extra fee.
interaction: I enjoy sharing my knowledge of this part of Big Island with my guests. Meeting people from different walks of life enriches my understanding of life and humanity. If my guests prefer having their privacy, I can be reached only when they need my help. I share the spirit of Aloha with you.
house_rules: Smoking limited to outdoor/lanai areas. Quiet time after 10:00 pm.  Common sense and respect for the indoor and outdoor environments will be appreciated. Due to we have 10 acres of wild tropical forest and lava rocks on the property, a waver of liability is required for the guests to sign at check in. Thank you for understanding.

reviews.comments: An amazing stay for anyone visiting the islands...especially for those visiting for Kalapana! 10/15 min walk right across the street from the venue. Tucked away in the hills, amazing view. Clean and tidy house! Very professional home owners, and nice too! Very accommodating. I would definitely recommend others to stay here!

Beautiful house with amazing views in a secluded area. Very clean and had all the amenities that we needed. Natasha is a wonderful host and gave us a lot of tips on where to eat and visit. Highly recommend!

We enjoyed our stay in this beautiful, spacious, and clean space. And Natasha was welcoming and most helpful with supporting our comfort.  Having the constantly changing ocean/sky view made our time here relaxing and peaceful.  As for the air quality here in this part of the island… this is Kalapana after all!

Staying here was a truly awesome experience.  Best described as sensory illumination :)  There was such a great energy  here.

Natasha is an awesome, considerate host. She went out of her way to make sure all my needs were met. Upon arrival , she reviewed a  helpful handwritten guide ( loved it ) of the local  offerings and was available  as needed throughout the stay. She is a kind, sincere and genuine. Personal yoga instructors and massage therapists are available in the area.  

The location is peaceful and serene. No traffic noise .  The first morning upon awakening, I could see the sunrise w/ a whale in the distance from both the bed or deck !!!The night sky was full of stars.
The studio was very clean and well equipped with small type kitchen, bathroom with a bathtub and great internet access.   

Ten minutes away  is Pahoa is the closest town about 10 min ?  has with a variety of restaurants, shops and nice health food grocery store.  Also nearby is a coastal road that hugs the ocean..new Black sands beach is a short 10 min drive  and easy walk. 

I would recommend staying here without reservation. If you are looking to escape the commercial areas for more  serenity, nature, artists etc., this is the perfect place.    I met so many lovely people in and around this area that will be friends for life.

I hope to return again one day ! 

Aloha Nui Loa ~~

Natasha welcomed us with so much Aloha right from the start! The room was spacious, clean, inviting and private. The view of the ocean from the room is so beautiful and we were minutes from the Outer Space market and Kehena Beach. We highly recommend staying here and when we are in the area we will stay here again! Mahalo Natasha - see you next time!

We were looking for a place to stay in Puna area after visiting Ahalanui hot pond.  Her house was in the perfect location for us, which was very close to where Route 130 (Pahoa-Kalapana Road) and Route 137 (Kalapana-Kapoho Road) met.  From Ahalanui hot pond, we drove Kalapana-Kapoho Road to get to her house, and we were pleasantly surprised to find it out to be such a picturesque scenic road!!  It is a MUST experience if you are in that area.
Upon arrival, we had a very warm greeting from her, followed by a great information around that area with a map.
Everything was new and clean, and we loved the décor of lotus theme.  Nice bathroom and mini kitchen in the room with a separate entrance.  
Mahalo, Natasha, for having us, and good luck to your 3rd unit!

We had an incredible stay at the Hoku Suite! It is spacious, clean, beautifully decorated, and has classy fresh appointments. It is a prime location nestled up in the hills above kalapana. The views are expansive, and it is perfectly oriented to catch sunrise from bed, or outside on the deck. Natasha is an amazing host, and you can tell a lot of intention has gone into setting up the space to be comfortable, private and easy.  This is a really good deal for how nice this space is. I would definitely stay again in the future, and I hope i get to sooner than later. Kalpana is beautiful, and the lava fields are some potent medicine, highly recommended. Mahalo Natasha!

Natasha's place is amazing! You can see the ocean from your bed, the space is peaceful, and it's a great way to get away from the city. Stargazing at night was great, the lanai is huge, and Natasha was a welcoming and responsive host. The place has everything you need - coffee maker, dishes and utensils, great bathroom. She keeps the place very clean, and it was overall a great experience!

Natasha created truly a 'Lotus Dream'. The front balcony looks like a Yoga Retreat and overlooks the ocean. Natasha was amazing and helped navigate us to her place via phone. Natasha provided in great detail instructions to her place and was accessible when we needed the extra help. The room inside is pristine and nothing short of a 5 star resort. You can tell the amount of thought she put into creating paradise. All the rooms have a private bathroom, refrigerator and dish ware. Natasha provided a listing of the local area and events to attend and was incredibly inviting. We wish we were able to stay longer and are intent on returning!! Prior to us leaving, Natasha was doing Yoga in her studio right next to the rooms, which is a 4 walled loft with an open frame which provides a 360 view. If you are looking for a private, elegant, place to stay I HIGHLY recomend staying with Natasha.

Absolutely wonderful! A true gem on the Big Island. Well worth the drive to its more remote location -- next time we'll plan to stay here multiple nights while exploring the southern shores of Hawaii. With her enthusiastic responses before our arrival and her inviting "Aloha" welcome, we felt immediately at home. The room itself is charmingly appointed, with subtle attention to details, especially in the shower, bathroom, and closet; the scenic balcony is perfect for breakfast or dinner, soaking in the tranquility, sounds, aromas, and sights of the surrounding trees, as well as the ocean view; the yoga pavilion (for exercising, too) made our early morning start of the day exhilarating! The Hoku Suite wins the best room award for our trip to Hawaii.

Natasha was really friendly, communicated well, and knew a lot about the area.  This place has some amazing views (especially of the moon rising) and the room is really cozy and relaxing.  It's a very peaceful retreat and a perfect hub for exploring the east side of the island.  Highly recommended!

Natasha was a great host, very friendly. She gave me valuable suggestions what to do in Puna. The apartment is perfect, very spacious with a nice bathroom. The location is great too, just nature around you.

The description of the BNB was accurate. Natasha welcomed us although we arrived late at night. We appreciated this. 
It was a quiet location. The room was clean. Nice view.

Natasha was very communicative during our stay. The first thing we noticed was that our room was very clean and she provided us with towels and beach towels. Natasha provided us with an extensive map of the area and gave us excellent tips about tide pools and beaches to go to and other activities in the area. As far as the suite is concerned, it is in a perfect setting with ocean views and surrounded by forest, and has all the provisions. It has best of the both worlds. This is the perfect kind of place to experience serenity with all the modern amenities.

Natasha's place was lovely. When we arrived, Natasha showed us the room we ha booked and another that was free in case we wanted to pick that one instead, which we did!
Natasha gave us a cute map of the area and showed us heaps of things to do and secret spots along the red road, which was awesome. The place itself is lovely, and very scenic. We had a hire car while we were on the Big Island which made it really easy to get around. Everything was clean and spacious, and the king bed was so comfortable!
Thanks again for having us, Natasha!

A great experience! Natashas cozy retreat is secluded, quiet and very inspiring. At night, you hear the animals around you giving a private concert and the waves gently lulling you to sleep.

The room is tastefully arranged and spotlessly clean. Very quiet. 

Natasha has been the greatest host. A heartwarming welcome and lots of good recommendations for the area.

Highly recommended. Thank you Natasha.

Natasha is an excellent communcator. She is a super sweetheart and I wish I had more time to chat with her. She was accommodating when it came to arrival time. 

I enjoyed our stay and wished we had more than 3 days to spare. The bed is amazingly comfortable and the room is exactly as pictured. I originally booked the Hoku room but since we were the only guest she gave us an option to choose after showing us the difference. The next time we are in the big Island we will definitely stay again!

Natasha's the best AirBnB host I've ever had and her space is the best I've stayed in; due to the combination of price, location, amenities, and native authenticity.

Natasha welcomed us the night we arrived, staying up and extending her check-in deadline by a few minutes - as we drove in from Kona. She showed us multiple rooms and gave us freedom to choose.

She was always available via text/call, otherwise not seen or heard - so it felt like we had this piece of paradise to ourselves.

The room was perfectly accommodating and the off-grid elements were charming without compromising convenience/comfort. Sunrises are spectacular, evenings are quiet with a mild and relaxing chorus of animal life.

We loved our mornings on the hammock, followed by yoga in her open air yoga structure, and quick trips to Uncle Robert's for acai bowls and smoothies and walks to the ocean on the cooled lava coast.

Ask about the local black sand beach, and make sure to drive South on 130 onto the cooled lava and go as far as your comfort will allow and drive North into Pahoa (and pick up a hitchhiker) to explore the town. Hilo is less than an hour away and well worth the drive. Explore and enjoy!

Reasons to stay Natasha?

The view.
The serenity.
The gentle welcome.

All is at appears in the photos and you will love the sunrise. 

Natasha responded to all inquiries and welcomed me in by carrying my luggage up the stairs like it was suitcase of air. I was very happy with my stay.

A peaceful and nice place to stay if you wish to relax and enjoy a beautiful view of the ocean. Clean room and good facilities. We enjoyed the open yoga room (for work out, though) and the terrace. It is located a bit remote, you need to drive around fifteen minutes to the closest (small) town, Pahoa. Bring earplugs if noisy frogs disturb your sleep. Natasha met us upon arrival and gave some good advice.

We had such a great time staying at this place. This is our second time to visit the Big Island. We wanted to stay somewhere close to the ocean and quite place. It was perfect for us. Amazing view and close to the ocean. 
We had a bit difficulty finding the place because we arrive during the night time. We called Natasha. She helped us to find the place. 
Thank you,
We were made very welcome, the place was very clean

On arriving, I was confused about the road to turn on since it doesn't look like a standard road for a mainlander, but as long as you turn in and see the Noni plant you're doing good.

that being said, this place is FANTASTIC. I had such a beautiful time even though I stayed for one night. The studio is gorgeous and comes with all the kitchen items you may need to cook. The outdoor yoga studio is great... Views from that, the balcony and hammock overlooking the ocean is absolutely incredible. Natasha kept open communication and allowed me to keep my luggage at her place after check out so I wouldn't need to keep all my stuff in my car while visiting the beach. She was incredible, the property was great and the studio was amazing. Can't say enough good stuff about this little gem in the jungle.

Natasha's space is absolutely beautiful. It was the peaceful retreat I needed. The views are outstanding, and the porch is a very relaxing place to sit and contemplate life. Natasha is also a lovely host who is most welcoming and hospitable.
Fantastic!! Location, ambiance, clean, comfortable and Natasha is a great host! Can't wait to stay a few days next time!

Warmly and friendly welcome from Natasha. We enjoyed the very calm and nature place very much! Nice and very clean room with an amazing ocean view. The farmers market was an extra tip from Natasha and we enjoyed good and cheap food and drinks. Next shops and restaurants are aprox. 15 min away. The room is well equiped with kitchen things.

The room and setting were even more beautiful than the photographs. Natasha is a perfect and very helpful host. Our room and the bathroom are only a couple of years old and Natasha keeps the place spotless. The bed was extremely comfortable. Maybe we were just tired, but my wife and I slept soundly until 8:30 in the morning!
There was small collection of tea in our room to make a morning brew. There's also a coffee maker but unfortunately we didn't bring any coffee with us and we didn't find any in the room. Pahoa is the closest place to buy any food or drinks, so I suggest stocking up in Hilo or Pahoa before arriving if you'd like some food on hand. There's a small fridge, bar sink and hot plate in the room.

Thanks to Natasha we could explore the Kalapana area while staying in a very tidy, calm, peaceful and yet central appartment. If you need some time off from the busy life, this is were you should go. Once Pele is a alife again, you will also be close to the area where lava is flowing into the ocean and forming new earth.
Natasha also provided us with first hand information and a map about the local attractions and areas to explore.

Thanks again for the nice stay Natasha!
Lovely, peaceful local. Friendly host. Wish we could have stayed longer!
Clean, comfortable, spacious and beautiful place to stay. Natasha is a lovely host!

This place is awesome, as is Natasha! The place looks EXACTLY like the pic's and unlike other places to stay in Kalapana for viewing the lava, she doesn't charge a cleaning fee or security deposit. It's a super quiet, "off the grid" location, although wi-fi is available. We had trouble connecting to the wi-fi, however, we used our 4G with Verizon to post our pic's of the lava viewing so it was fine. 

You can't go wrong with this place as the ocean view is spectacular and the room is fabulous. The coqui frogs songs throughout the evening were a nice addition as I love their songs to their tribes. LOL
Definitely book this place if you want a great location, hostess, an ocean view and solitude. It's an awesome place and I highly recommend it!

Natasha made us feel very welcome in her secluded get-away. It was just as promised and Natasha even upgraded us to a bigger accommodation. The house is on an idyllic farm in Kalapana, close to the current lava flow, some nice beaches, and good hiking. I can highly recommend it.

Natasha was super quick to respond to messages.
Even at 5am she would reply quite quickly.
Place was easy to find using her instruction and very close to Volcanoe.
Lovely clean place with high ceiling too.
Definitly a great quiet place to stay. Very clean and a beautiful view. Lots of privacy

Great stay,
We really enjoy staying at Natasha's house.
Very close to lava viewing. Also Natasha gave us a lot of  recommendations about dining places: and all were great.

Thanks again.

We had a wonderful stay!!  Natasha was a great host!  We loved the location, it was private and secluded!!  Loved the night sounds, cool breezes and beautiful views!! We would love to come back and stay here again!!! ❤️

Natasha's place was super quiet and pleasant. We could see the steam plume from the lava ocean entry point (5 miles to the SE) from her balcony which was really a treat. 

The king-sized bed was fantastic and the room, spacious and cozy. 

The elevation was just above sea level which made for very pleasant temperatures. The koki frogs sang us to sleep but weren't too noisy.

Pahoa town is nice and close as is chill kalapana village.

Great stay and would stay again.

This is a truly special spot on the big island of Hawaii.  Everything about Natasha's place was great - the bed was amazingly comfortable, the bathroom was completely renovated and very clean, the room was spacious, the view was amazing and the hammock was dangerously comfortable - we almost didn't leave the deck!  Natasha also made check in super easy and took the time to give us fabulous recommendations for things to do, places to eat and sites to see.

The room and everything was totally amazing. It was 4th place we stayed in Big island- this one was the best:) ocean view, birds songs, friendly cat, nice and cozy room, very comfortable bed.. 100% I will recommend for my friends;)

Carved out of the jungle, Lotus Dream is peaceful, beautiful and very close to all the lava viewing. Natasha was a wonderful host. This place really couldn't have exceeded our expectations any further!!

We had a great stay here! Natasha made us feel very welcomed and offered us some great local advice. Lovely space with a very comfortable bed. And to be able to see the lava plumes from the deck was a real treat! Would definitely recommend to friends

Natasha's place was a wonderful stay and her rate is quite fair. Nice and clean and all the basics are there. The only "wish it was different" was that the bar sink was so small that washing dishes was definitely a monk-like exercise. Every thing was clean and nicely decorated. The place is well cared for and it shows. We felt welcome and comfortable. We loved the little frog and lizard that hang out under the lights on the porch.

Our stay at Natasha's worked well for our visit to see the Kalapana lava flow by foot and sea, as well as visit Volcano National park for a few day hikes. The location is ideal if these activities are on your itinerary!

Fotos do not show how amazing this place is. Everything is great quality and put together in a very thoughtful way. Bed sheets and towels are crisp clean and top quality, and the mattress is super comfortable.
And Natasha is the exceptional host.

This place is really wonderful. The host always responded to all our requests with perfect correspondence. Equipment is perfect, the interior is very beautifully arranged. I would definitely stay there again in this place. Thank you very much Meghan

Its difficult to put into words how much we enjoyed our stay at Christine's place ... We loved the location and lucked out on enjoying the facility by ourselves ... There were a few issues associated with the fact that the amenities are off grid but Christine and her team went out of her way to make our stay great and it was! Our time there went past so quickly and We are sure we will be back. Best wishes from Roger and Anne-Mieke in New Zealand

This place is amazing! We felt like home - or even we wish this property would be our home. The quality of all material, of all appliances is outstanding. All products offered are organic. We could see the love that was put into building the whole property. We stayed in the cabin but were allowed to use the main house, too, which we did from time to time and it is more than what anybody could expect. We would love to come back. It was definitely our best airbnb in Hawaii.

name: Bronte Beach Jewel Apartment
summary: Our beautiful one bedroom apartment is located at only 5 min walking from the beach (green link path), with a nice and wide balcony with amazing ocean view. Perfectly located: food stores and bus stop at few steps and 10 min away from Bondi Junction,
space: Located in one of the best and most quite suburb in Sydney (Bronte), our place is perfect for couples, singles or just friends who want to spend an amazing holiday in Sydney. The amazing terrace with ocean view, the peaceful neighbourhood, the beach and public transports just at few steps make our apartment a real jewel. We love it and we really hope you will as well!
description: Our beautiful one bedroom apartment is located at only 5 min walking from the beach (green link path), with a nice and wide balcony with amazing ocean view. Perfectly located: food stores and bus stop at few steps and 10 min away from Bondi Junction, Located in one of the best and most quite suburb in Sydney (Bronte), our place is perfect for couples, singles or just friends who want to spend an amazing holiday in Sydney. The amazing terrace with ocean view, the peaceful neighbourhood, the beach and public transports just at few steps make our apartment a real jewel. We love it and we really hope you will as well! Guests will have access to all apartment areas (no restrictions) including common laundry. Unfortunately we won't be able to attend our guests during those days as we will be overseas but there will be a friend and a neighbour to help you with the keys and for anything else. As the apartment is very close to the beach we strongly recommend to experience the costal walk which
neighborhood_overview: As the apartment is very close to the beach we strongly recommend to experience the costal walk which brings you from Bondi Beach to Coogee giving you beautiful landscapes. Bronte beach offers many different chances to enjoy the beach such as the rock pool, a beautiful park with BBQ's and sport activities.
notes: It's very easy to get here: by using public transports you can jump on the bus 378 from the city and Central Station (from early in the morning till late night) or from Bondi Junction interchange if you want to catch a train (e.g. from the airport or from the city.
transit: There is a bus stop just at few steps from our house which allows you to go to Bondi Junction  to do some shopping, to the city center  and to many other locations. Average ticket price is $2.30
access: Guests will have access to all apartment areas (no restrictions) including common laundry.
interaction: Unfortunately we won't be able to attend our guests during those days as we will be overseas but there will be a friend and a neighbour to help you with the keys and for anything else.
house_rules: Pets are not allowed, even if we love them. Also it's not allowed smoking. Our block is very quite and neighbours are super kind and polite: we won't to bother them with party or loud "events". We like to keep our house as much clean and tidy as possible and we expect our guests will do the same in our absence.

host.host_about: Easy going, always with a big and true smile on my face!

reviews.comments:
Everything was perfect! The couple is very nice and the house is in a perfect spot,very clean and the atmosphere was perfect for the christmas period :)

thank you very much ragazzi!!!:)
Nicearea close to beach

name: Studio-Private Entrance /Bath/Kitchen Near JFK
summary: Elegantly  furnished studio with private entrance, kitchen ,bathroom, laundry, backyard.  Only 2 Blocks away from St. John's Uni, Queens Hospital. Walk to transportation to Manhattan. 10 Mins away from JFK. Free Street Parking available at all times.
space: This is an elegant studio on ground floor of single family house with private backyard. Plenty of free street parking.
description: Elegantly  furnished studio with private entrance, kitchen ,bathroom, laundry, backyard.  Only 2 Blocks away from St. John's Uni, Queens Hospital. Walk to transportation to Manhattan. 10 Mins away from JFK. Free Street Parking available at all times. This is an elegant studio on ground floor of single family house with private backyard. Plenty of free street parking. **Guests will have access to the entire apartment and you will not be sharing the apartment at any time. Apartment has its own entrance, so you can come in and go out any time of the day. **Sleeping Area -Queen sized bed with comfortable mattress. -Additional  two raised twin size air beds to accommodate two extra guests available upon request. (See reviews and picture) -All bedding (sheets, pillows, comforter) and fresh towels provided. **Living Area -Large living space with a recliner and small table with two chairs. -Brand new 42'' LED TV with premium channels. -High speed WIFI internet **Bathroom -Shampoo & soaps -Fres
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very secure. With lots of students, young families etc.
transit: -We are only 10 mins from JFK. We have the number for car service if you need.  -We are also only steps away from public transportation to Manhattan.
access: **Guests will have access to the entire apartment and you will not be sharing the apartment at any time. Apartment has its own entrance, so you can come in and go out any time of the day. **Sleeping Area -Queen sized bed with comfortable mattress. -Additional  two raised twin size air beds to accommodate two extra guests available upon request. (See reviews and picture) -All bedding (sheets, pillows, comforter) and fresh towels provided. **Living Area -Large living space with a recliner and small table with two chairs. -Brand new 42'' LED TV with premium channels. -High speed WIFI internet **Bathroom -Shampoo & soaps -Fresh towels **Kitchen -Large refrigerator, cook-top, microwave, coffee maker and  cooking & serving utensils. -Complimentary coffee, tea and basic food supplies needed for breakfast. (Cookies, milk,cereal etc..) **Laundry -Washing machine and dryer. **Back yard -Large table with six chairs and large gas barbecue. **Professional cleaning service before every stay.
interaction: I am local and available 24/7 for anything my guests may need during their stay. Think of me as a concierge.
house_rules: Unfortunately we don't allow the following; - Guests not listed - Pets - Smoking - Check - in after 10pm (ask for late check-in) - No any film shooting in/outside of the house

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: The space is lovely. Very comfortable. Very quiet. Sol and Izak were very accommodating. Great spot if you need some nice relaxing privacy. Highly recommended.
Absolutely wonderful from start to end. This was better than booking a hotel for not only price but privacy!

Sol is very nice and flexible with the check in time and offer a parking spot also hair dryer. It is quiet and had a private entrance. But the refrigerator and also the heater is quite noisy at night, I have to take bus then subway to the city. the bus is a little long to wait. Overall, it is a nice place though.

Absolutely great studio!!! I really enjoy staying here, the privacy is great, the neighborhood is great, the safety is great and every detail is great!!! ~~~很好的住处,有独立的出入通道｡附近也很安全,完全不用考虑安全问题｡而且附近也很方便,出去就是超市,很多便利店可以选择｡真的是一个很好的房间!
It was a really short but good experience the place is nice and sol and her husband are really nice people

Sol and her husband are very nice and welcoming and made us feel at home.The place was nice and clean.Great location for transportation, supermarket, restaurants.  would recommend staying at Sol's Studio.

The apartment is a wonderfully self-contained space that should suit anyone. Those little added extras like a full TV package is great when you just want to stay inside and though it's quiet it's also close enough to a good travel tributary. 

And of course our hosts were wonderful though they left us alone for the most part. 

A wonderful place and experience!
the place is clean and roomy.

Isak was very welcoming and even drove us to the subway so we wouldn't be late for our Broadway show (we were going  to take the bus, but didn't leave enough time). We did not meet Sol because she had to leave town unexpectedly for a funeral.

Our stay was comfortable and we were plenty warm (the weather was snowy and in the 20's / 30's outside while we visited). We slept soundly and were not awoken by any noises. The bed was very comfortable. We were able to watch cable tv and use the Wi-Fi.

After checking out, Isak contacted me to tell me I had left a jacket in the closet. We arranged a time for me to stop by the house and pick out up.

Isak went above and beyond our expectations and made our stay and first Airbnb experience just right. Thank you Isak!

Hosts were incredibly kind, gracious and accommodating. Excellent communication. Getting to Manhattan was simple and convenient using either the QM6 or the Q65 to the J/Z. The studio itself was comfortable and private -- also had a refrigerator, freezer and microwave. Included high speed internet and FIOS TV with premium movie channels. Hosts also provided coffee, milk, and other breakfast items. Best of all, they offered a parking space right outside the entrance of the studio.

We really felt at home in Sol’s studio. Sol and her husband are great hosts – very kind, friendly and flexible with our arrival and departure times. They welcomed us with some breakfast items. The studio is very spacious: it has a large bedroom with everything you need: a very comfortable bed, a table, cupboard, armchair and big TV. In the kitchen there is some space to store the luggage, a big freezer and two cook tops, which is enough to cook a decent meal. The studio is in the basement of Sol’s family house but it has its own entry and privacy. The connection to Manhattan is good; the bus runs every few minutes and takes you to the express subway lines. Moreover, the studio is beautifully furnished and decorated. You can feel that the owners put a lot of care into it. In fact we were glad every evening to come home to such a cosy and welcoming place. When we come back to NYC we would like to stay here again.

Eine sehr hübsche und geräumige Wohnung, in der es alles gibt, was man braucht! Die Gastgeber sind freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir werden gerne wieder hier buchen.

Dal primo fino all'ultimo momento siamo stati veramente molto bene in questo appartamentino accogliente e comodo. Molto vicino all'aeroporto e allo stesso tempo collegato bene con Manhattan. Prenoteremo volentieri ulteriori soggiorni ogni qual volta torneremo a NY

We really enjoyed this lovely place! Sol and Isaac warmly welcomed us and Sol had even stocked up on some milk, cereal and coffee/tea for us. The place is exactly what it looks like in the picture and is very comfortable for two people. We were able to park right outside the place and the neighborhood is nice. I highly recommend staying with Sol!
房东非常热情的接待我们,这个房子是独立初入,代有卫生间和厨房,非常干净,附近也有华人超市 和餐厅,到机场和曼哈顿非常方便,我们很满意｡

Sol and Izak were great hosts, they definitely went our of their way to make us feel at home. Two extremely genuine people that truly want to make sure you're taken care of and enjoying the city. I highly recommend their studio. It's perfect and our entire experience was nothing short of exceptional. Thank you guys!
We had an excellent stay with Sol & Izak! The space was extremely comfortable, and the coffee & breakfast items were a nice touch. We look forward to staying again during a future NYC trip!

I spent 24 nights in this cozy studio apartment. I have nothing but good words to say. It actually is slightly bigger than what looks like in the pictures. The family had to go abroad almost as soon as I arrived, but they were always very fast in responding to any question I had. Everything was clean and they left coffee, cereals and milk for breakfast, which I found very sweet. The area is totally safe, and it's very easy and fast to get to Manhattan. Everything you might need is in the area, which makes everything easier for people who don't have a car. During my stay I had no problem. The only little flaw that I can find is that some days it got pretty hot, but this is New York summer weather. I read the old reviews, and I have to say that I found the mattress really comfortable. Maybe the fridge is a little noisy indeed, but honestly after the first day I didn't even notice it anymore. I highly recommend this place, I hope that you will enjoy it as much as I did

Sol ist eine warmherzige, Vermieterin, die sich um die Versorgung der Mieter sorgt. Mit Milch und Kornflakes :-) für den Ankunftstag.
Sowie dem Ventilator bei 35 Grad in New York.

Sol was very kind and flexible with the check in/ out time ! 
The apartment is lovely and the bed is very comfortable. Everything was clean and the bus connection is great. I would definitely recommend!

La communication avec Sol a été simple, rapide et très sympathique. Elle a été très disponible. L'appartement est aussi très agréable . Nous avons beaucoup apprécié le confort. Tout était propre et tout fonctionnait. De plus, le quartier est calme et sur. J'y ai passé un bon séjour.

The first thing was the great welcoming of the hosts. They had even put 70s years birthday decorations i the room for Nicholas with a cake and candle. This was a lovely gesture that one could not expect at all. Then they took us to the bus stop and showed us all about the area: grocery shops, restaurants etc. 
There was plenty of food and other things supplied by the hosts: coffee, teas, sugar, a box of cereals, oats, fresh milk, orange juice, honey, fresh sliced bread, salt, black pepper. Also plenty of washing up liquid, kitchen paper towel, washing  liquid, toilet paper. The made one feels at home straight  away.
A big plus pf tis property, is peace and safety of the location. A big minus is the remoteness of the location: 1 hour + to Central Manhattan, with often standing room only on the subway at morning and evening rush hours but also at noon too. This is the trade off to make.
我跟我老公在sol房子里度过了让人难忘的两天｡在纽约这个繁忙的大都市里,能住在如此安静,温馨的家,完全忘记旅途的劳累｡sol非常贴心,给我们准备了牛奶,红茶,咖啡以及各种小吃,非常让人难忘的一次体验,感谢sol

This private entrance studio is located in a very safe area. Near JFK airport. (Exactly like is described) Within walking distance to fast food eateries. The host Sol and husband are very nice, friendly people. Easy to talk with. 
The studio is definitely a cozy space. The shower is a little on the narrow side (which we're not used too). 
As a first time Airbnb user, the vacation experience was definitely an adventure and would recommend for all to try Airbnb!

The hosts Sol & Isaac were very friendly and helpful. They make you feel very welcome by leaving a cake to have with your tea or coffee .
They make themselves available anytime for questions you may have.

We spent 6 nights at Sol's cosy studio. It was an excellent place for international visitors like we since we had everything necessary for a comfortable stay in bustling Big Apple. The place is well connected with public trsnsportation (bus Q46 and subway Union Turnpike serving lines F and E). I would like to return next time to their house and strongly recommend this listing.

Sol and her husband were very welcoming. The flat was tidy and clean. There was milk, coffee and cake for a quick snack when I arrived. The connections to JFK airport and Manhattan were quite good via bus and train.
Overall I enjoyed the couple of days in Queens and Sol was even kind enough to let me stay a few hours longer before checking out and catching my flight.
Thanks a lot for the hospitality

Omg!! It was beyond excellent! First off Sol and Issac are sweet, caring people that don't bother you at all if you want your privacy! In the beginning I arrived a little late (sorry about that again guys) and they were so understanding and sweet about it! The space is everything you would hope for if you are just visiting or even if you wanted to rest for a day. They have great tv, a cozy bed and lazy boy chair that is a dream! The decor is inviting and pleasant just like them! The neighborhood is quite and there was always parking available! I highly highly recommend his place to anyone!

Sol has such a great place. We enjoyed the comfy bed, the lazyboy in front of the tv (while watching HD movies), the washroom is clean and complete with what you needed (hot shower for cold weather, shampoo and body wash, supply of tissue paper), Sol's place has facility for cooking and washing clothes but we never got to try it. Sol welcomed us when we came, showed us around the house briefly and gave us instructions on traveling to Manhattan. Sol is very responsive to every question that we ask her.

Sol was very inviting and showed us around as soon as we got there and made us feel very welcome. Everything was exactly as shown in the pictures and very clean and tidy. Sol left some basics like cereal, cake and milk which was very kind and when I made an enquiry Isaac came down straight away and sorted any issues . Parking is good near the house and we were left in private unless we needed help, I will definitely be coming here again when I come to New York, thank you for the lovely stay.

Sol is a very nice and helpful host! The apartment is down at the basement but it is very clean! All the household goods and appliances are prepared and ready to use. One thing that made me a little bit uncomfortable is that there is a bit of moldy smell in the apartment. I didn't find a good way to make the smell go away. Hope Sol can do something about this. Overall, this apartment is wonderful! Parking is easy to find and public transits is super accessible around the area! Thank you, Sol!

Sol was a wonderful host. She kept in touch from the moment we booked her place until we checked in. Her place is spectacular. Everything is exactly the same as the photos portrayed. Very clean space! When we arrived, she assisted with our luggage, briefly showed us the place , provided a small treat (cake with tea/coffee) and left us. Did not see or hear from her until check out. (Would've been nice of the host to check in on her guest to make sure everything was ok). 

The only issue we had was the bathroom. (It gets very cold in the winter and there is no heat in there). Overall, it was an awesome to  place, close to public transportation. Would definitely stay there again. Thanks again Sol!

I had a wonderful stay. Sol was very welcoming, walked me through the place, showed me all the goods and appliances available. The space including the bathroom is very clean and comfortable. With the separate entrance, I enjoyed the privacy. I would definitely stay there again. Thanks Sol!

Sol was a wonderful host!  She made sure that we were happy and  comfortable.   Her home was warm and inviting and, we especially enjoyed having morning coffee and hot tea. It was a perfect visit to Queens.

Thank you Sol and we hope to see you again soon!

Our visit to Sol and Izak's place was great it was just as the photo's and even bigger in person. They provided Breakfast for our first day and that was appreciated as we arrived late. We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone looking for a clean friendly place to stay in Queens close to the airport

The experience was great. The place is as described. The hosts were amazing!! I didn't have a chance to meet Sol, but I got a chance to meet Izak and he was very polite and things went smoothly. They have everything you'll need and they even provide complimentary coffee and tea. Everything was clean which made me and my boyfriend really happy. Overall I had a great experience.

Sol is warm heart,she tied up before we arrived there,and we arrived home easily,then she tell us how go and buy our  food.
we are joy in NY,thanks!

Although I only got a chance to meet Sol, my stay at their comfy home was great. Just as the description says, there are many nearby places to eat and/or get groceries. The nearest subway on foot is Pearson's Ave, which was a 15 minute walk or less! Overall, my boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay!

Sol & Izak were great hosts! They made themselves available for when we arrived, even though we arrived an hour later than planned due to transportation delays. They showed us how/where to take the bus that takes us to the subway station to the city, which was very helpful. Overall, our stay was very comfortable, and this is a place we would definitely recommend!

A very good stay in this private studio near SJU.  Very plaisant home, good furnished , and very quitte with a good localisation near stores, deli, and buses. Very worm welcome , Sol offert even the necessary for thea or coffee!

Perfect place to stay, easy access to everything.  The house was clean and exactly like the pictures.  Sol is wonderful and will like to stay again when I visit NY.   Sol thank you so much, your an excellent host.  You help us a lot and was ready to answer and question.
Sol was really sweet. I felt very welcomed at her place. I loved having my own privite place to stay. It was literally my own home away from home. I would stay here again! :)

Overall our stay in this residence was very nice. From the beginning until the end the hosts were friendly and communicative. Some positive points:
- warm face to face welcome 
- coffee , thee and breakfast available at arrival
- clean room, bathroom and kitchen 
- towels, toiletpaper, cups and pans available
- private entrance
- safe neigbourhood 
- public transport on a walking distance ( 5 min bus and 15 -20 min metro to Manhattan 
- Large tv with hbo channels

Great place to relax after a busy day in Manhatten

We arrived at an unconventional time but she made sure we were tended to. The living space itself was perfect. It was easy access to all the venues that we needed to attend and there was ample parking space nearby. Also the area was quite private and we felt comfortable there. She kept in touch and made sure we could ask for anything if needed. We were able to do laundry, store food in the fridge, etc.

Even though we stayed only one night, we enjoyed our time there. The neighborhood is really nice, there are some restaurants and stores that you can walk to. Izzet helped us a lot with a lot of things, such as renting cars. He is very kind and respectful. Like his smile ^_^

I booked this when I was looking for a place to stay close to sju for my daughter's graduation. Sol's place is very nice and comfortable. Everything is clean and ready. She even provided cake, cereal, coffee and milk. The place comes with a kitchenette and if you wanted to, could cook meals, she had pots and pans, dishes, utensils and everything needed. If I am in the area again, I will definitely try to stay at this place again. Thank you! Sol. I really appreciate my stay with you.

Although Sol and Izak were not available at the time we arrived, Sol gave clear instructions on how to get in the studio and was readily available for queries. They have a welcome pamphlet that indicates: their contact details, address, username and wifi password as well as instructions on how to get in and out of manhattan. Amenities such as washer, dryer, microwave, coffee maker, coffee and tea as well as plates and utensils were available and it really felt like you were home. It was our first time trying AirbNb and it definitely exceeded our expectations. Thanks again for having us!

We stayed in Sol's studio apartment offering in Queens, NY.  The location was great for the two purposes of our trip... going out to Long Island for a wedding and seeing a bit of Manhattan via the subway.  Sol was friendly and generous. And she provided us with a wonderful stay and a clean, accessible, well-cared for, and well-stocked apartment. Sol has thought of everything!  I will recommend her as a host and this apartment to anyone.

Sol was a great host and my wife and I had a very nice experience staying in Sol's accommodation. The accommodation was clean and tidy and Sol had kindly left us milk and breakfast for our arrival. Would definitely stay in Sol's accommodation again.
Loved my experience there the neighborhood was perfect sol was amazing looking forward to returning
We enjoyed our stay at Sol's. She was very welcoming and showed us the way around the neighborhood. I recommend it!

Sol was an exceptional host and the accommodations were excellent.
We have family in the area so we will be back !
Thanks Sol and family !

Sol's place was fabulous, and she was an incredible hostess.  Knowing that I was arriving very late that night, and wouldn't have had time to shop, she very kindly provided my son and I with cereal and milk for breakfast, as well as tea and coffee for our entire stay!  What a lovely treat! The apartment is very private, and was exactly as described.  We travelled into Manhattan daily - the bus connection to the metro station took about 10mins, and the trip into Manhattan took about 40mins. Sol also gave us lots of good advice about what to do/not to do!
Perfect!

Izak was an incredible host. He met us upon our arrival. Izak even texted us to see if we were safe and if we needed anything as a crazy thunderstorm rolled into the area. The studio was clean and charming. Having wifi and a washer/dryer was a plus. Izak made dining recommendations which we followed and found a wonderful hibachi restaurant on Union Turnpike called Nikko Hibachi. Thank you Sol & Izak!

My host made me feel very welcome. The apartment was just how it was described and even though I only stayed for a short while I was really satisfied with the apartment. The hosts were really nice and communicated with me in a timely manner. Parking was easy to find and the neighborhood was nice and quiet. I would definitely recommend that people stay here.

Sol met us with a warm welcome and was helpful with directions and organising a driver for a very early JFK departure. The apartment is very convenient for its proximity to JFK. A bus then the subway takes you into Manhattan in about an hour. The apartment is self-contained with washer, dryer and kitchen. A simple breakfast of cereal and coffee is provided. Thanks Sol :-)

Desde antes de llegar Sol se mostró muy atenta con nosotros. Nos dio consejos sobre cómo llegar a casa, qué taxi tomar. Nos recibió cálidamente, dio indicaciones de la casa, nos ofreció información importante y las dudas que tuvimos, las resolvió. Estuvo al pendiente de nosotros las veces que coincidimos con ella.

Sol was a lovely host. The apartment was exactly as described, clean and with good facilities. She was kind enough to keep our main luggage secure even after check out as we had a late flight and wanted a few more hours to explore. Communication was excellent and made our last day in new York very pleasant. Many thanks!
非常干净 房东提供了牛奶和面包 唯一是没有空调 房东人很nice

Sol was very kind and let us check in early. Had milk and coffee available for our stay. The location was perfect only a few blocks from St Johns university.  We were a bit warm the first night as there was no air conditioning only a fan, but when I informed Sol she provided another fan which made it much more comfortable.  Overall great stay. Thank you Sol!

Sol's house was exactly what we were looking for while visiting with our son and his girlfriend. Great location near St. John's University with many good restaurants nearby and easy access to public transit to Manhattan, airports and our son's school out on Long Island. Beds were comfortable, TV options were great and the refrigerator and kitchen allowed us to prepare several meals at the house.
I would highly recommend Sol and her house to anyone looking for an affordable and accessible place to tour NYC and the surrounding area.

Our stay at Sol's place was simply perfect. We had to check in slightly early and Sol accommodated for this, she has a very friendly personality. She provided us with cereal and milk, amongst other things which were ideal as we had not yet explored the area and so this was extremely convenient. The area was very clean, had WiFi, a good selection of TV channels and the shower was perfectly acceptable. The kitchen is minimally equipped, however this was not much of an issue for us and there is also a washing machine and dryer which is useful. All in all, we were delighted by our stay at Sol's and couldn't recommend it enough.

Todo fue perfecto. Desde la llegada a la casa, Sol fue una anfitriona ideal. Nos recibió cariñósamente y nos explicó todo lo referente a la casa y las comunicaciones con Manhattan. Nos dejó también algunas cosillas para comer, cosa que se agradece bastante después de un largo viaje. También se preocupó de nosotros durante el viaje para ver qué tal nos iba.
En cuanto al alojamiento, no hace falta decir mucho más de lo que nos dice en el anuncio. Es bastante fiel a las fotos. Cuenta con todo lo que hace falta para tener una estancia perfecta. No nos faltó de nada. Además, está muy bien comunicado y dispone de establecimientos de todo tipo bastante cercanos.
En resumen, bastante recomendable para pasar unas vacaciones perfectas en Nueva York. De 10. 
-----
Everything was perfect. From arrival at the house, Sol was a great hostess. We were greeted warmly and explained everything about the house and communications with Manhattan. We also left some things to eat, which is appreciated well after a long journey. He also took care of us during the trip to see how we were.
As for accommodation, needless to say much more than what it says in the ad. It is quite true to the photos. It has everything needed for a perfect stay. We did not want for anything. It is also very well connected and has all kinds of establishments close enough.
In short, highly recommended for a perfect holiday in New York. From 10.
Great

Our hosts were great, so welcoming and kind. Likewise the studio was stocked with everything we needed - you can really tell Sol takes the time to really look after her guests and think about their stay. 
We felt really welcome. Thank you so much, it was a great stay.
Our stay was wonderful. Sol had coffee, tea, pound cake, and creamer available for us, as well as a wonderful private patio and the convenience store is a short walk away. We really enjoyed our stay.

Wir wurden herzlich empfangen und uns wurde das Studio gezeigt .
Sol & Izak gaben uns hilfreiche Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt und erklärten uns den Weg in die City. Das Studio fanden wir wie beschrieben vor. Es befindet sich in einer nicht viel befahrenen Straße und man kann kostenlos an der Straße parken. 
Wir können diese Unterkunft mit gutem Gewissen weiterempfehlen :) .

If you are looking for a place to stay close to St. John's University this is perfect! Very clean and private. Will likely stay here again. On street parking was simple and easy to find right outside our door. Host was gracious and kind. Very accommodating.
房东非常热情,我们沟通了check-in时间,没想到她亲自在房间里面等到我们过来,再给我们钥匙,并告诉我相关的事项｡房子虽然很小但是感觉很私密和安全｡如果下次还去纽约,我们希望还能住在这里｡
Sol was an excellent Host!  We enjoyed our stay at her place which was very convenient for us for the event we were attending.
Cf my other today comment's

The property is in Jamaica Queens. It's definitely more of your quiet, residential neighborhood, very appropriate for families since I was traveling with my toddler in tow. Stores and fast food restaurants are within half a mile walking distance. Not far at all. I rented a car so this location was great because there was plenty of parking! It was also the midpoint of JFK Airport and Woodside Queens where I drove to most of the time. If you're looking for a place closer to the city with easy access to subway stations then this property will not serve you well. You'll need to take a bus to subway station. 

Apartment has its own entrance through the back which is great! On a nice day you can have a picnic outside on the yard or just relax to reset your mind from all the NYC craziness. :-) The property does offer a cozy and warmth feeling. It is also not cluttered with any of the owner's belongings like some Airbnb properties are (Airbnb advises hosts to stow away belongings for safety reasons). The apartment is equipped with a full size bed I believe if I'm not mistaken, free wifi and cable tv. Apartment does not have a full kitchen BUT it does have a full size refrigerator and microwave....AND a washer/dryer! Loved it and used it. We went home with clean clothes and no laundry to wash! 

I had a late check in and Sol was very accommodating with this. She even assisted me with my luggage and tried to console my crying 3 year old boy to make him feel more comfortable. Any questions I had, Sol was quick to respond back. She was easy to get a hold of and a pleasure to speak with all the time! She is a great host and will go the extra mile to make your stay as comfy and safe as possible. She even welcomes you with treats!!!
I loved the stay at Sol's place. Everything is organized and clean. Definitely highly recommended if you are looking for a spot in Queens!

It's our third experience in Sol's house. Also great: as Sol's hospitality and the room is always perfectly clean. 
The proximity of SJU is very interesting and we can take easily bus and metro for  manhatan 
Thank's Sol and we expect see you in May for our son's graduation.
The apartment was very clean and Sol and her husband Isaac were good hosts. Look forward to coming back.
街區寧靜,鄰近公車站,高速公車可直達市區,交通便利,鄰近機場｡房間設施齊全､整潔舒適,房東親切,回覆率高,有需要都會即時協助｡值得推薦!

My experience at Sol's place was wonderful. She texted me personally thanking me for choosing her place. I had her personal cell # to ask her any questions I had. Her place was clean and roomy for my daughter and I. Washer/dryer/fridge/microwave/coffee and coffee pot/tea/cereal/milk/desert.. Super Clean bedding and extra linens and towels, lotion, shampoo and conditions, body wash...The amenities were endless. Super close to St John's University and Queena Hospital and only 25 min from Manhattan! I would highly recommend Sol's  place for your NYC getaway! Thank you Sol!!

Sol , es una excelente anfitriona .solo agradecimientos para ella y su esposo, muy amables y a nuestra llegada tenían desayuno ya que era muy temprano a nuestra salida nos ayudó con el taxi.. volvería a quedarme alli .. Mi familia y yo quedamos muy contentos. El lugar es tal como las fotos y esta equipado de todo para un estadía amena.
Sol's place is a great place to stay when you want to get away from home. It was clean, cozy, close to public transportation and  eateries.

Sol's place was cozy, it was the basement of her home so often I could hear them getting ready for the day in the kitchen so it would wake me and I felt like I had to be quiet. Besides that, it was a great value with lots of amenities. It was a better deal then almost any hotel I could find. Lots of parking available at night time.
Great host who gave us a beautiful basement studio, everything is up to date. The community is a peaceful slice of suburban Queens. This a great starter for beginning AIRBNB users. A+

If you see Ms. Sol you know that you are in good hands.
Ms. Sol responded to every text and calls instantly, can't imagine staying else where but at Ms. Sol place.
Very nice cosy private apartment.
5 star. Love New York
Sol's is a good host and this is our first time came to New York and the place was good too!  Can't wait come to stay here again.

Sol's place is warm and quiet and just perfect for my business trip.

Great value and cute place near St. John's University.  Sol and Issac quick to offer help. Easy check in and check out.  They are both a lovely couple.  Great directions and get location if your visiting St. John's. I recommend renting a car it a bit out of the city  Manhattan about 40min subway ride.  To be able to  utilize your time a car rental would be very beneficial to the explore.  St. John's University about 2-3 blocks easy walk. We will be back to stay when visiting campus.

Clean, safe, exactly as described.  My sons stayed for 3 nights when in town visiting their sister who attends SJU.  Perfect location.  Sol was so kind and helpful.  Can't wait to stay again!

Clean, comfortable, friendly hostess. Good bed mattress. If you take the bus for the first time make sure you have plenty of change if you havn't got a metro pass yet. Weekly pass for $31 is worth it.
Sol is a wonderful, responsive host. Her apartment is comfortable and private. I would recommend this place to anyone in search of a quality night's stay at a reasonable price for NYC.
Within easy walking distance to St. John's University and transit. Nice private entrance and comfy space, felt very clean and welcoming
The process of check-in was very smooth. Hosts communicate well and are very nice welcoming people. The apartment is private and quiet, close to transportation.
Perfect place to stay in Queens. Thank you for the wonderful hospitality. Everything that is needed is available in the apartment. We will be back again
A+. I'd definitely stay here again. The Apt was great with great people...

Sol was very accommodating, she made sure we had everything that we needed to make our stay at ease. She even left some treats for us upon arrival. She was very accessible and timely in responding when needed.
Great comfy and cozy place!

Sol is an amazing host. Her place is cozy and very accurate to the description. She was very helpful and even went out of her way to help me with what I needed. I highly recommend it. 

The location is not the closest to the hype tourist places, but it's easy enough to get by.
This place is perfect! Very accommodating, clean, spacious, and comfortable. Sol is great! I really enjoyed my stay here!

Our host was friendly, attentive to us as guests, and answered any questions we had. Lovely location to stay for a couple of days in Queens. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in the area!

It was our fourth stay. Every thing was perfect.
we really enjoy the terrace in the garden . Great .

The location was perfect for us. If you're visiting St John's, it couldn't be better, walking distance. The outdoor patio was nice. The dog across the way was really loud. Otherwise I would highly recommend.

The most assets of the studio are :
