and Sol is really a great host !!

Sol and Izak are very nice people and great hosts. They provided lots of information for how to get to and from the different sights in Nyc. The accommodations were very clean and provided everything we needed. Great experience overall.
드라마에서 보던 미국식 집입니다. 깨끗하고 시설도 좋아서 편하게 지냈습니다. 호스트도 친절합니다. 한적한 동네라서 조용합니다. 교통을 이용하기는 좀 불편합니다. 지하철 타는 곳은 버스를 타고 10분쯤 나가야하고 버스 배차는 좀 긴 편입니다.

My husband and I picked Sol and Izak’s place after reading the reviews and viewing the photos.  This was our first air b&b experience and we were hoping very much that it would be as the reviews and the photos.

Pros:  Location close to our activities (Website hidden by Airbnb) Street parking was fairly easy to find (Website hidden by Airbnb) Neighborhood quiet (Website hidden by Airbnb) Washer & Drye (Website hidden by Airbnb) Sol was kind enough to accommodate us with an early check-in.

Cons: Unfortunately we were unable to rest after a long overnight flight because of all the noise from upstairs.   All the walking back and forth felt like someone was trampling on our heads.  During our five day stay we did not rest properly at all because of the noise from lengthy phone conversations and general activities upstairs.  

The bed was uncomfortable.  Every time one of us moved it squeaked very loudly.  There were no nightstands.  I slept on the right side and there was no place to put a bottle of water or a box of tissues.  I kept hitting my elbow on the shelving unit at the side of the bed.  The layout of the apartment was not very convenient.  We were unable to watch TV because of the location of the TV.  The two lawn type chairs in front of the TV were difficult to sit down on and get out of.  The only mirror for getting dressed was in front of the bed.  The only table to layout make-up etc was away from the mirror.  We had to keep walking back and forth to get dressed.

Housekeeping notes:  It was a basement apt.  Although it was listed as having air-conditioning, there was NO air-conditioning.  There was a fan that was adequate but had to be kept on constantly.  Bathroom was miniscule.  The seal at the bottom of the shower was discolored.  The vent in the ceiling of the bathroom was full of dust.  The mirror in the bedroom needed repair.  The molding at the bottom right of the mirror was broken.  The ironing board cover needs replacing.  There was a huge burnt hole on the cover.  I had to get a t-shirt to cover the hole so that I could iron our clothes.

Personal Preferences:  I would have liked a bin to put our recyclables.  I would have also liked a box of tissues to be available.

Air B&B says to remember this is a person’s home not a hotel.  While I realize that it is a person’s home, that person, the Air B&B host is utilizing their home as a business, by charging a premium for guests to use their home in lieu of a hotel room.  In lieu of paying a premium, the guest should expect to receive certain basic expectations , like an adequate layout, a nightstand, a clean vent in the bathroom, bathroom sealant that is not discolored a comfortable chair to sit on, and a comfortable bed.  To be honest I felt rather let down by all the reviews.

Sol and Izak were the perfect hosts.  Always available for questions.  We felt very safe in the home.  It's  close to St. John's (10 min walk at the most).  I recommend Uber to train station if you want to go into Manhattan.

Nice place. Nice hosts. Their apartment was just as advertised so my expectations were fully met. Lots of food options within walking distance. I didn't use public transit so I can't comment on availability. All in all our stay was enjoyable and Sol &  Izak were great to deal with. Next time I'm in Queens I'll be contacting them for my accommodations.

It was a great private suite.. You can find what you need such as washer, single and double burners, iron, private bathroom, private small garden to have your breakfast... Communication and her response are quick.. If you have a family, it is right for you..
Great place!

Sol is an amazing host and the place was perfect.  It is just as advertised and she was so nice to leave us breakfast items and everything else we needed.  She is super fast with communication and was available for anything we asked.  We will definitely stay again if back in NY!

We had a very comfortable stay here. Sol warmly greeted us and made sure we had everything we needed. She even contacted us mid stay to ask if we needed anything else. So nice to have a private entrance making it easy to come and go. The unit is clean, air conditioned and has a large screen tv with cable. We will most definitely be returning!

Sol & Izak's place is a perfect room to stay in if you need a place in the Jamaica queens area. It's about 30-45 minutes from JFK via public transportation or maybe a 15-30 minute Uber/Lyft ride. 

The room was clean and very comfortable with a large flat screen HDTV with premium cable. The bed was comfortable as were the chairs. A microwave and coffee maker were included. The bathroom was fine. It's a very quiet neighborhood so you can definitely have a relaxing evening. I definitely recommend staying at Sol & Izak's place if you're looking for a place in Queens.

Really warm welcome and very useful tips.

Although you might want to visit Manhattan, Sol & Izak's place it's really close to public transportation, so you're just a bus and a subway away, very easy route.

Very clean place.
Sol was a very gracious host  and willing to help.

Excellent stay for couples. Room is comfortable. Having a washer/dryer, cooking items, full shower, private entrance, and access to patio made our stay very pleasant. Room is walking distance to shops in a very quiet neighborhood.
Sol and Izak were fantastic and the next time I am in NYC I will definately stay with them again.
Awesome! Close to St Johns

Very nice and quiet neighborhood. The house was very clean. The private entrance came out handy when we were coming home late every night. It's a 10 minute walk to St. John's. Sol was very attentive to any and all needs. I was pleasantly surprised by the tv in the room with all the cable channels and a washer and dryer for your needs. Perfect if you are staying in Queens and a 10 minute bus ride to the subways to go into the city.

My stay at Sol and Izak's was wonderful!!!!! My daughter is attending St. John's University which is literally a 5 min walk to  campus from this cozy, clean and safe studio. Sol greeted my daughter and I with hugs and we immediately felt like we were family and not just guests. She provided all the amenities that I could ask for and was accommodating on the changes that I had to make upon arrival (and there were many!) This will be my home away from home while my daughter attends the next four years at the university. Thank you Sol!!!!
Sol and Izak are great hosts! They are easy to reach and have a perfect place to stay. They are in a good neighborhood. The unit itself is clean and well stocked. 10/10 would recommend strongly!
This place is just perfect: cozy and colorful.

Sol & Izak's place was great. It was exactly what I was looking for for the weekend and was excellent for the price. Sol & Izak went above and beyond and made my stay stress free. Free street parking was also readily available which is also a huge bonus when going into the city. That alone is worth a lot. I would definitely book their place again if I was in the area.

Sol and Izak's place was in a lovely neighborhood, with an especially nice private patio and plenty of street parking which was a bonus for us.  The kitchen was adequate and had the essentials, but I wouldn't plan on doing a whole lot of elaborate cooking on the hot plates.  It was just what we needed to be able to see the concert at Forest Hill Stadium, which was only about a 15 minute drive.  They are very gracious hosts!
De fácil acceso y cerca del transporte.

This place is great! Not far from New York City, close to public transit and private. Sol was very sweet and accommodating to everything we needed! The room, bathroom and kitchen were perfect to what we needed for a short stay in New York. Definitely recommend this place!

I was in queens for an event at my daughters school, St. John's university. This place is about 5 min walk from the school and it's absolutely charming. It was nice, quiet and convenient we walked everywhere with no trouble. The hosts were very gracious and kind, I will def be booking this place again.

Sol is the most wonderful host and went out of her way to make our stay a pleasure, thank you. The apartment has everything you need, was immaculate and location is great for St John’s University where we were visiting our daughter, just perfect. We will be back!

My boyfriend and I stayed at this home to enjoy a few days in NYC. The home was clean and spacious and the host were helpful and very good with communication. The entrance was private and we definitely had our own space. We would definitely stay here again.

L'appartamento si trova nel quartiere di Queens a circa 15 minuti di taxi dall'aeroporto JFK e a 40 minuti da Manhattan con i mezzi pubblici. L'accoglienza di Sol è stata gentilissima ed è sempre disponibile ad aiutarti per qualsiasi motivo durante il soggiorno. L'appartamento ha un'entrata privata e internamente ha tutto il necessario. Ci siamo trovati molto bene e lo consiglio vivamente! Unica pecca, il materasso troppo molle!
Good
If you are looking for a host in Queens, look no further than Sol & Izak's place.

Nice space
Very private 
Good hosts 
We had everything we needed for a relaxing stay in NYC .

There’s only one word to sum up our stay at Sol and Izak’s place: perfect. The neighborhood is extremely safe with everything you need nearby, and public transport is very accessible and easy to navigate from this location. This place suited all our needs perfectly, and genuinely felt like home away from home. After long days sightseeing and shopping we always looked forward to going “home” to rest at the end of the day. There is literally not a single negative thing to say about the place or the two lovely hosts. I would always receive almost immediate replies to any questions I had via text message, and personally was always greeted with a big smile and warm hug. Thank you so much Sol and Izak for the wonderful stay, and for helping make our trip as special as it was. I sincerely hope to see you both again soon!
Great hosts!
Sol is very friendly and have a strong hospitality! She is the person who really care and offer help! It was a wonderful stay!
Amazing time with lovely hosts

I had a stay at sol & Izaks place and it was amazing. The place was clean and as pictured. If you are visiting St.Johns it is literally a 5 min walk. I ended up leaving some items once I checked out. Sol & izak had those items washed,dried and ready for me! Thank you for the stay and thoughtful treats!!

The hosts call it a studio apartment and I expected it to be much smaller. It was very spacious and clean. It has a table with good wifi. Just what I needed.

Very nice host.

Sol was very kind and welcoming. She met us in person and made sure our check in went smoothly. She is very humble and gave us plenty of tips to get around. The house is fully loaded with all that you would need. There was a washing and dryer along with detergents. Sol also made sure we had breakfast so she had left us a pack of cereals and milk which was a very sweet gesture. Lovely host. You will feel at home if you decide to stay here.

Sol & Izak were fantastic hosts.  Their AirBNB was a perfect location from us about 30 minutes via public transport outside of the city.  They were very communicative and helpful in teaching us how to get around the city.  The neighborhood was quiet and not far from the bus station too!
Sol & Izak were very thoughtful. They provided us with heaters, a cooktop and breakfast items. Also, the place was very clean.
The place is lovely. It's a quiet neighbourhood and Sol lives just above in case you need something. Sol is a very helpful person and a very good host.
It was nice  staying at sol and Izak’s place.thanks for all.highly recommended and I will back again next time.

This was our first Airbnb experience. Sol and Izak made us feel very welcome and comfortable. We found the space to be clean and perfect for my friend and I for the weekend. We were able to get into and out of the city using public transit very easily. And when we took our car we were able to find in street parking very close to the home each time. I’d happily recommend this place to anyone coming into NYC!

Eine wirklich zweckmäßig und gut eingerichtete Unterkunft. Die Gastgeber sind äußerst zuvorkommend und helfen gerne weiter. Den Garten haben wir zwar nicht genutzt, dennoch kann man bei einem längeren Aufenthalt dort Grillen und es sich gemütlich machen. Die Lage ist gut und ruhig. Das Haus ist ein wenig hellhörig aber nicht störend. In der Nähe gibt ein paar Lebensmittelläden und Restaurants bzw. die üblichen Verdächtigen wir Burger King etc. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln gelangt man gut nach Manhatten etc. Preis Leistung passt in allen Fällen.

Sol & Izak were such kind hosts. They always checked on us to see if we were okay. They were quick to respond whenever we had questions, and made sure our stay was enjoyable. A few things to note when booking is that Sol & Izak live upstairs so you occasionally hear them walking around and talking, there are only 2 tiny windows so it does get stuffy and hot (especially on hotter days), and the bathroom is on the smaller side so it is a little cramped when you're in there. These things didn't bother us much, but if it will bother you, don't book your stay here. Other than that, it was a pleasure to stay at Sol & Izak's place.
Much more than we expected, so amazing and close to public transit it made our visit that more wondrous.  A must stay, would recommend over and over.  Delightful hosts.  Nice and hospitable.
Lovely hosts. Very thoughtful. The house is very close to St Johns for anyone visiting the university! I wish I had known about their place sooner.
房子不大但很温馨,房东很热情｡

Loved the hospitality of the hosts, especially the hostess, Sol, who was the one we saw the most, although Izak stopped by to greet us the morning after we arrived.

The apartment is clean and spacious and has everything you need for a vacation at a reasonable cost. The space is very private in a quiet and safe community, and there are fast food restaurants, convenience stores, drug stores, and gas stations within walking distance. We would recommend this place to anyone who wishes to have a homier place than a hotel to stay at. There's also a private garden area outside the unit you are welcome to use.

Sol & Izak provide you with some breakfast items; you have the use of a hot plate, microwave, refrigerator, TV, wi-fi, small but full bathroom with shower, sink, medicine cabinet, and toilet, there's a washer and dryer in the unit for your use also. The bed is firm and comfortable and the linens are of good quality.
It was a very nice place to stay. It was about 30 minutes from the city at night. Nearest some nice little restaurants. Also some stores were you can pick up some needed toiletries, if needed.

What a find! Not only is it much cheaper than a hotel, it was quite spacious. Cute, IKEA-styled space, separate kitchen, cute little patio, even a washer/dryer to use. Sol left us with coffee and a cake and was a very sweet person. For me, the location was great, bc I was spending some time on LI and some time in NYC. We were able to find street parking close by every night, and there are lots of local businesses nearby, including delis and coffeeshops. it was perfect for us.
Awesome stay! I highly recommend Sol & Izak’s place. It is a home away from home❤️

Sol and Izak were very thoughtful, kind and respected our privacy.  The space was exactly as described and very clean.  Buses and trains were all within walking distance, and ran frequently all day and night.    There are many fantastic shops and eateries in the area.  We would definitely stay here again.

Sol e Izak fueron estupendos anfitriones. En todo momento estuvieron comunicados y atentos a nuestra comodidad. La estadía superó nuestras espectativas. El lugar es cómodo y está cerca del metro para viajar a los lugares más turísticos de New York. Es un lugar muy recomendable!!!!

Very clean and friendly host.  They provide welcome snacks, milk and water. Makes us feel at home.    5 minutes walk to St. John's University. We are sending kid to the summer camp at St. John's University.  Only 5 minutes walk, which is supper convenient.  Walk distance to public transit station, convenient store, restaurants. Quiet neighborhood.

Our two daughters and my husband and I spent a peaceful week enjoying Sol and Izak’s apartment home.  Our third and oldest daughter was attending a weeklong camp at nearby St John’s so the location was perfect for us.  So peaceful. We enjoyed the quiet patio and the cold air conditioning was a wonderful escape from the heat and humidity.  The home was stocked with all of the basic amenities that made for a comfortable stay.  We especially appreciated the laundry in the unit, and the complimentary coffee and breakfast supplies left for us.  Izak was also gracious enough to allow us to drop off our bags early, before our appointed   check in time.  Very gracious hosts, if you find yourself needing a stay in the St John’s area, this is your place!  Only a 5 minute walk through a beautiful neighborhood and you’re on campus!
Great cozy stay. Walking distance to food and Rite Aid. Quiet neighborhood. Friendly responsive hosts. Super close to JFK. Quick drive to shopping/movies/entertainment.
Everything was fantastic and the hosts were super accommodating when our flight got delayed!

My family (two adults and two young boys) stayed at Sol & Izak's studio, and we were very satisfied with the condition of the studio (pound cake and milk, amenities, cleanness, etc.). Sol & Izak were willing to accommodate our needs, and they were very responsive to our questions. We chose the studio because it was close to my conference site, and later we found that we just needed to take a bus to go to Flushing (it was a nice bus ride) to enjoy Asian foods and goods. My boys felt cozy during our stay, and we really enjoyed staying at Sol & Izak's studio.

While I had the chance to meet Izak,  I wasn't able to meet Sol.  But Sol and Izak still made it comfortable for me for my 9 days staying at their place.  They had placed extra towels and bed linens for my stay. I greatly appreciated it.  The area felt safe to me and even though I heard sirens a lot because it was near a Hospital,  I mostly slept through the night. Whenever I had any issue,  Izak would come help me within five minutes. He really helped with my paranoia fear with the windows.   I would definitely book again when I have the chance to visit nyc again.
Die Anbindung nach Manhattan ist gut und einfach. Die Wohnung ist genau wie beschrieben und Sol und Izak sind sehr freundliche Gastgeber.
Stay there, you deserve it

Sol &Isak are just the nicest and kindest people you could meet, they go out of there way for their guests! Their place is so convenient for us visiting our daughter at St John’s - it’s our third stay and we will be back again in a week!

Perfect place to visit NY, two blocks away from bus stop. We were allowed to check in early and Sol made sure we felt at home. The place has everything a tired traveller can need and beyond, thank you very much Sol and Izak, we will not hesitate staying with you on our next visit to NY.
Our 4th stay with Sol & Isak. They are so nice, and helpful and we love staying with them when visiting our daughter in NYC! Thanks for having us, we will be back!

My brother and I had an absolutely wonderful time in Sol & Izak’s home! They asked ahead of time if we needed an air mattress set up in addition to the bed. They also provided us with coffee, milk and cereal which was perfect for the mornings. Sol was nice enough to tell us exactly how to get to and from Manhattan, and was quick to respond if we had any questions about the place. The place itself is in a great location, and it was very easy to get to Manhattan on the subway. If you’re looking for a place to stay that’s a nice getaway from the hectic city, this is definitely a great choice!

I was very happy with my stay here. The neighborhood was safe and very easily, accessed food grocery and transportation! Sol and Izak were pretty amazing too, they left us with maps and a sight seeing guide. We had an amazing time in the city with quiet evenings in the suburbs!

Espacio muy cómodo, con entrada privada. Cerca de accesos principales en bus y al metro. Con todo lo  necesario para pasar una estancia agradable. Los anfitriones son personas fantásticas, comunicativas, cálidas y atentas en todo momento a nuestras necesidades. Un lugar que se siente como un hogar.
Clean very adequate accommodations in a safe area with reasonable access to public transportation.

Sol and Izak's place was terrific. It was located close to the bus station with easy access to the city. Their place was nice to come back to after a long day. Very comfortable and homey feeling.  Sol was so nice in offering travel tips to us. She also provided snacks and coffee which we really appreciated. I definitely would stay here again!

All as described. Nice touches and everything one may need during their stay i.e. a toster, coffee maker, kettle, TV, microwave oven.... It was wonderful to find milk in the fridge and some gooddies. As we arrived late it was so much appreciated. Lovely hosts. We had very good time there. P.S. Perfect location to reach St John's University on foot.
A nice place to stay.
Comfort and convenience.

Sol & Izak son los anfitriones ideales, les recomiendo mucho ya que tiene privacidad idonea y es muy limpio, realmente todo perfecto y a parte la ubicacion es genial para poder transportarte de un lugar a otro.

My significant other and I stayed at Sol & Izak’s place for a few nights and our overall experience was great. Clean, peaceful, spacious and it had all the necessities. I would recommended this place to anyone who’s looking for a place to stay.

Quite neighborhood and the perfect studio basement apartment for one or  two people. Has all  the amenities you will need while traveling (even a washer and dryer). Close to public transportation or easy access for Uber pick up. Very accommodating host. The place is clean and organized with a private entrance off the back alley way. (Use caution at night if traveling alone it’s kinda dark until flood lights turn on) Kitchen area will accommodate preparation of a small microwave meal or a one-pot skillet meal.  Nice size refrigerator and freezer. Bathroom is tiny but you can count on a hot drenching shower.  The toilet has low pressure so don’t put toilet paper in it to avoid clogging. The bed is fine for one large/tall adult but not two full sized people. If that’s an issue, Ask host for the air mattress. The host provided milk, cereal, tea and pound cake upon entry which we found very refreshing. I would stay at this place again when visiting New York.
Awesome experience, recommend !
This place was convenient, cozy and clean.
Very cozy and clean space.  Sol is very nice, and thoughtful, the location is great near all.
